comment: Last to jump; ridden out throughout.
comment_ch: 起步最慢，騎足全程
owner: Tony Yue Kwok Leung, Alexander Yue Ka Kuen & Richard Yue Ka Ming

comment: Shifted out in the Straight; ran on comfortably for 2nd.
comment_ch: 直路移出, 輕騎第二

comment: Raced in behind midfield, 4-1/2L behind 3 wide with cover,  swung widest and not competitive.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬四個半馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。直路上走最外疊，未見具競爭力。

comment: Dropped back from the wide draw to sit at the rear of the   field, 3 wide with cover. Only went fairly to the line,     under hands and heels, in the straight.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後墮居馬群後列，走第三疊，有遮擋。直路上受騎師手足並用催策，但衝刺僅屬普通。

comment: Settled midfield and wide; limited response when asked.
comment_ch: 外疊居中, 騎落一般
owner: Willie Yiu Man Hung & Victor Yiu Wai Yin

comment: Eased to rear, 2 wide, little dash 200M despite not suited  by the slow tempo.
comment_ch: 收慢留居後列，走第二疊。步速緩慢，不合發揮。二百米處略為上前。

comment: Slow to begin, settled worse than midfield, ridden along    near 600m to hold position, hard ridden home turn and could not pick up in the straight.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居中間之後位置。接近六百米處時受催策，保持位置。直路彎受力策，直路上未能加速。
owner: Wong Chung Hin & Arnold Wong Chi Chiu

comment: On-pace early; ran on for place under whip late.
comment_ch: 拉士鞭騎, 闖入一席
owner: Mr & Mrs Hui Kwong Chan, Kenneth Hui Yat Hing and Alexander Hui Yat Chuen

comment: Held up behind midfield 5Ls off the pace and was given a    rails run, took time to muster on straightening, got going  200M, went 4th 50M but not reached leaders.
comment_ch: 留居中間之後位置，落後領放馬五個馬位，沿欄上前。入直路時加速需時。二百米處追前。五十米處佔取第四位，但未能追上領先馬匹。
owner: Dr & Mrs Gene Tsoi Wai Wang

comment: Led along the rail; just caught.
comment_ch: 搶欄帶放, 拉士被過

comment: Dropped back early to sit towards the rear of the field, 3  wide with cover. 1 paced to the line and never progressed.
comment_ch: 早段墮居馬群後列，走第三疊，有遮擋。保持同速至終點，從未能追前。
owner: Lee Wan Keung & Lee Wong Wai Kuen

comment: Hard ridden from wide barrier, steadied 1000m to find cover but left wide from 700m. Switched wide in straight and      finished off strongly.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受力策。一千米處收慢以取得遮擋，但自七百米處起走外疊。直路上走外疊，以勁勢衝刺。

comment: Settled midfield, awkward at 1400m, steadied at 900m, urged along home turn, battled fairly to the line.
comment_ch: 居中間位置。千四米處走勢笨拙。九百米處收慢。轉直路彎時受催策，保持普通走勢至終點。
owner: Nelson Lee Yuk Ming, Norman Ng Si Pang & Eric Poon Hung Cheung

comment: Caught very wide without cover 1st turn, moved forward      trying to find a position close to rails but unable to do   so, run ended near 200M and eased.
comment_ch: 首次轉彎時走大外疊，沒有遮擋。發力上前，嘗試佔取靠近內欄的位置，但未能做到。接近二百米處時無以為繼，收慢。

comment: Hard ridden to hold fence, settling in box seat back        stretch. Shuffled back around turn but came again in        straight to get to within range 150m before run ended.
comment_ch: 受力策固守內欄，對面直路上居包廂位置。直路彎墮退，直路上再度上前，一百五十米處進佔爭勝之列，其後再無餘力。

comment: Always towards the rear, caught in the backwash of          interferences coming out of far side, no further            impression.
comment_ch: 一直居後列。跑離對面直路時受干擾，再無進展。
owner: Jimmy Chung Kwok Man & Dominic Chung Won Lok

comment: Ran on ordinary when asked in straight.
comment_ch: 直路有騎，但走勢一般
owner: Dawson Woo Ka Chung, Jackson Woo Ka Biu & The Executors of the Estate of the late Wilson Woo Ka Wah

handicap: THE CHINESE RECREATION CLUB CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 中華游樂會挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Settled down 4Ls back along the fence, badly outpaced 400M, soon beaten.
comment_ch: 居領放馬四個馬位之後的位置，走內欄。四百米處被大幅拋離，瞬即洩氣。

comment: Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, trapped 3 wide, harmed  by the slow pace, emptied 300M, checked 200M.
comment_ch: 受力策跟上馬群，居中間位置，走第三疊。慢步速不利發揮。三百米處再無餘力。二百米處勒避。

comment: Settled midfield, travelled 3Ls behind the leader, closed   off well to take the victory by only a short head.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬三個馬位。以佳勢衝刺，僅以一短馬頭位之先勝出。

comment: Ran well and led early; faded in the Straight.
comment_ch: 早段似模似樣, 直路收工

comment: Jumped with them, positioned a length behind the leader in  2nd, easy run on turn, finished off evenly in straight to   make frame without threatening.
comment_ch: 與對手同步躍出，居第二位，落後領放馬一個馬位。轉彎時走勢輕鬆。直路上保持同速，跑獲殿軍，未能構成威脅。

comment: Hard ridden forward to park outside the leader, kept on     steadily to the line without extra acceleration.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，居領放馬外側。保持穩定走勢至終點，但未能加速。
owner: Simon Leung Yuen Ho & Kirby Leung Kae Bik

comment: Smart break & bustled to race midfield 1 off with cover,    hard ridden turning in, one-paced in run home.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。受催策，居中間位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。入直路時受力策。直路上保持同速。

comment: Jumped away well; led all the way to score.
comment_ch: 起步敏捷, 貫注到底
owner: Dr John Shum Ding Ping, Dr Lawrence Chan Pui Wing & Francis Hung See Wai

comment: Dashed on strongly on the inside to score.
comment_ch: 內檔竄上，追勢甚佳

comment: Always in touch; ran on well to score.
comment_ch: 前後俱備，表現吸引

comment: Away with them, raced 5 lengths or so back on rail at rear, 7 lengths back on turn, failed to close off in straight.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘。居後列，落後領放馬約五個馬位，走內欄。直路彎落後領放馬七個馬位。直路上衝刺乏力。
owner: 10/11 Dennis C H Yip Trainer Syndicate

comment: Taken forward from a wide draw to a handy position 1.5L off the leader, but 3 wide no cover. Bumped and unbalanced at   700m. Never responded to pressure from the top of the       straight, and dropped out conspicuously.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受催策上前，居有利位置，落後領放馬一個半馬位，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。七百米處被碰撞並失去平衡，自直路早段起受催策但從未交出反應，並顯著墮退。

comment: Under a hold for 3rd; ran on well.
comment_ch: 按住第三，姿態輕鬆
owner: Mr & Mrs Michael C C Kao and Vivian Kao

comment: Shifted across behind runners from awkward draw, settling   at rear close to fence. Crowded for room 500m dropping to   last, taken wide in straight and ran on strongly.
comment_ch: 自第九檔出閘，在馬群之後切入，居後列，靠近內欄。五百米處受擠迫，墮退至包尾位置。直路上移出外疊，走勢強勁。

comment: Ran on ok; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 末段按番住，試來仍近

comment: Rolled forward to take the lead along the fence, soon       weakened after straightening.
comment_ch: 沿欄上前取得領先，入直路後瞬即轉弱。
owner: Cheuk Hon Kit, Chung Tai Keung, Roland Leung Wing Cheung & Cheuk Lit Piu

comment: Jumped away very slowly and remained at the back.
comment_ch: 出閘十分緩慢，留居後列。

comment: Positively ridden, prompted the pace 2-wide, kicked on      550M, lost lead inside 300M, fought on same pace to line.
comment_ch: 居前列競跑，追趕領放馬，走第二疊。五百五十米處加速上前，三百米處失去領先位置。 保持同速至終點。

comment: Always in touch; kept on well to score.
comment_ch: 且放且留，靭力十足

comment: Under whip early; dashed on for 3rd when recovered.
comment_ch: 一早開鞭，走順後加速第三
owner: Carmen Chan Wing Yee & Chan Fut Yan

comment: Ridden to lead on rails from a wide draw, made the running  to 350 metres, faded.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後在催策下帶頭，走內欄。領先至三百五十米處，其後力竭。

comment: Prominent, travelled 3Ls behind the leader 2 wide with      cover, benefited by the slow pace, weakened 200M.
comment_ch: 居前列，落後領放馬三個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。步速緩慢，有利發揮。二百米處轉弱。

comment: Showed good early pace; flattened late.
comment_ch: 快放兩段，拉士稍弱
owner: Steven Chan Sheung Chi & Kenneth Chan Sheung Yan

comment: Under restraint early; dashed well when clear.
comment_ch: 早段力留，直路望空好肯追馬

handicap: TUEN MUN PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 屯門公眾騎術學校讓賽
comment: Broke with others, over-raced fore of midfield 3 wide, lost cover & bumped 850m, 4th & driven into stretch, outpaced &  boxed on evenly.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，居中間之前位置，走第三疊，搶口。八百五十米處失去遮擋且被碰撞。入直路時居第四位，受催策，但被拋離，保持穩勢。
owner: Michael To Kwong Yip, Tso Lai Ming & To Wing Shuen

comment: Jumped well, ridden along in midfield in one-off position.  Switched out in straight but only one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策，居中間位置，走第二疊。直路上移出外疊，僅能保持同速。
owner: Dr Chang Fuk To & Maria Chang Lee Ming Shum

comment: Hard ridden from outside draw to sit outside leader on      settling. Co-leader passing 400m but unable to get past and boxed on gamely to line.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘後受力策，居領放馬外側。跑過四百米處時並排領先，但未能超越對手。保持勁勢至終點。

comment: Broke well, settled just better than midfield 3-wide,       similar turning in, soon weakened.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居中間稍前位置，走第三疊。入直路時居相若位置，瞬即轉弱。

comment: Began fairly, taken to fence 3-back from leader. Shaken up  400m, raced tight 350, switched out 300, kept on fairly     till checked 75m.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，切入內欄，落後領放馬三個馬位。四百米處受催策，三百五十米處緊迫競跑，三百米處移向外疊。保持普通走勢，七十五米處勒避。

comment: Pressed forward to park outside the leader, kept on until   weakened final 150M.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，居領放馬外側位置。保持走勢，最後一百五十米轉弱。
owner: Ho Yin Sang, Cheung Kwok Ping & Cheung Kwok Keung

comment: Began moderately, settled behind midfield on rails, saved   ground turning in, ran on steadily without threatening.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居中間之後位置，走內欄。入直路時節省腳程。保持穩勢，未能構成威脅。

comment: Settled midfield along the rail; under a hold and not fully tested.
comment_ch: 貼欄居中，扣實未試
owner: Au Kai Kwong & Michelle Jessica Au

comment: Niggled shortly after start; flattened halfway.
comment_ch: 起步已騎, 半程墮後

comment: Rearward early; made little progress when cleared.
comment_ch: 早段落後, 直路望空稍追

comment: Always at the rear, never a factor.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列，從未能構成威脅。

comment: Ran on for place under urge at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百稍騎，闖入一席

comment: Jumped OK; made progress in the Straight under a hold.
comment_ch: 起步順利, 直路按住追趕

comment: Raced midfield, 3.5Ls behind the leader on the fence,       despite not suited by the slow tempo, made some ground in   straight.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬三個半馬位，走內欄。儘管慢步速不合發揮，直路上略為追前。

comment: On pace early; found nothing when asked.
comment_ch: 跟前，直路騎落欠勁

comment: Tardy start; under whip in the straight.
comment_ch: 起步麻麻，直路開鞭

comment: Began OK and taken forward early to sit 4th, 1 off the      fence. Held up early in the straight, before coming off     heels to run on from 250m. Slightly 1 paced to the line     when clear late.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可。早段受催策上前，居第四位，走第二疊。直路早段受困，自二百五十米處起移離前駒後蹄追前。末段望空後略為保持均速至終點。
owner: Stanley Chiang Li Biau & Howard Yung Kung Ho

comment: Hard ridden forward, sat 2 wide, closed off strongly 300M   to score.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，走第二疊。三百米處展開強勁衝刺，勝出賽事。

comment: Pushed to hold the rail and led at fast sectionals, hung on until 300M weakened rapidly.
comment_ch: 受推策，固守內欄，以甚快步速領放。保持走勢至三百米處，其後迅速轉弱。

comment: Wide throughout; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 沿途蝕位，走勢平常
owner: Albert Po Ying Wai, Frances Po, Raymond Po Chit Hei & Rebecca Po Pui Yan

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 5Ls behind the leader on the      fence, ran on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬五個馬位，走內欄。以佳勢上前，取得亞軍。

comment: Flattened halfway; dropped back to rear.
comment_ch: 半程乏力，包尾而回

comment: Broke well, then pushed forward to track leader in one-out  position. Nudged forward from 500m to join leader 300m,     broke clear 150m but run down final strides.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，其後受推策上前追趕領放馬，走第二疊。自五百米處起受催策上前，三百米處並排領先。一百五十米處帶離對手，最後數步被超越。

comment: Wide throughout; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 全程蝕位, 平平無奇
owner: Chan Nam Lee, Ng Hung Yau, Wong Ting Chung & George Lau Ka Keung

comment: Showed good early speed; on pace for 3rd.
comment_ch: 馬有速度, 跟前入位

comment: Hard ridden to lead on settling, then slowed pace.          Overtaken passing 250m and faded. Had substantial amount of mucus in trachea.
comment_ch: 在力策下取得領先，其後減慢步速。跑過二百五十米處時被超越，並且力竭。氣管內有大量痰液。
owner: Ngan Pui Ying & Ngan Ng Yu Ying

comment: Raced midfield; ran on ok.
comment_ch: 不上不落, 但表現不差
owner: Mr & Mrs Peter Chan On Tak and Robert Chan Chi Man

comment: Taken back early; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 刻意拖後，未見真章

comment: Urged forward to take rail and led by a nose at slow        sectionals, headed by the eventual leader at 150M.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，切入內欄。以緩慢步速領先一馬鼻位，一百五十米處被頭馬超越。

comment: Ran on strongly for 2nd; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 見好即收，走勢有力
owner: Ho Sau Ki & Tommy Ho Chung Shing

handicap: CHEVALIER COLD STORAGE AND LOGISTICS HANDICAP
comment: Hard ridden to share the lead at slow sectionals, soon      flattened 200M.
comment_ch: 在力策下以緩慢步速並排領先，二百米處瞬即洩氣。

comment: Began OK, but only eased forward early to be placed towards the rear of the field, 1 off the fence. Came widest on the  turn and went well to the line for a promising Hong Kong    debut.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，早段上前，其後居馬群後列，走第二疊。直路彎走最外疊，末段走勢良佳。首次在港出賽，表現不俗。

comment: Broke well, bustled along 3 wide no cover midfield, ridden  for progress 450m, hard-ridden 200m, plugged on one pace.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策，居中間位置，在沒遮擋下走第三疊。四百五十米處受催策上前。二百米處受力策，但僅能保持同速。

comment: Eased back, took rail, pace good, lack room 400M,           progressed steadily when clear.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，移入內欄，步速中等。四百米處空位不足，望空後逐漸追前。
owner: Matthew C M Yum, Christopher Carson Yum, Nicholas Kevin Yum & Stephanie Carrie Yum

comment: Taken back to 2nd last on rail, switched off heels 1100m,   to last 700m, 4.5L back when switched wide & driven 430m,   strong closer to 3rd late.
comment_ch: 留居尾二位置，走內欄。千一米處避開他駒後蹄。七百米處居包尾位置。四百三十米處落後四個半馬位，移至外疊，受催策。末段衝刺強勁，跑獲季軍。

comment: Broke well, eased 1000m & settled midfield on rail, niggled at 500m, driven into stretch, plodded on one pace.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。一千米處收慢，留居中間位置，走內欄。五百米處受催策。入直路時再受催策，保持同速。

comment: Rolled forward and took box-seat, kept on nicely until 100M when couldn't find extra.
comment_ch: 上前佔取包廂位置。保持佳勢，一百米處再無餘力。
owner: Stanley Tsang Ming Chit & Raymond Chu Wai Hang

comment: Began OK, but was stuck midfield, 3 wide no cover after     settling. Faded from the 350m, and never ran on in the      straight.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居中間位置，在沒遮擋下走第三疊。三百五十米處力竭，直路上從未能上前。
owner: Philip Ma King Huen & Bankee Kwan Pak Hoo

comment: Eased to settle worse than midfield about 5Ls behind the    leader 2 wide with cover, despite the slow sectionals, made some ground in straight.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬約五個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。儘管步速緩慢，直路上略為追前。

comment: Chased leaders along the 2-path, couldn't accelerate enough passing 400M, out of contention mid-straight.
comment_ch: 追趕領先馬匹，走第二疊。跑過四百米處時未能加速。直路中段再無爭勝機會。

comment: Dropped back to a rail position behind midfield, 4Ls to     make up 400M, took a while to find clear running top of     straight, stayed on over final 250M for non-threatening 4th.
comment_ch: 墮居中間之後位置，走內欄。四百米處落後四個馬位。直路初望空需時。最後二百五十米保持走勢，跑獲第四，未能構成威脅。
owner: Charles Tung Chung Ho, Ronald Tung Pit Shing & Tung Pit Ching

comment: Niggled along after start; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 起步已騎, 走勢生硬
owner: Arthur Antonio da Silva, Betty da Silva & Teresa Marie da Silva

comment: First to jump; then eased back; ran on strongly past the post.
comment_ch: 起步最快，隨即拖住，過終點後追勢勁

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY PT GRACEFUL COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶娉婷系列讓賽
comment: Smart start from a wide draw, taken back to race behind     midfield 3 wide with cover, driven into stretch, ran on     centre track, bottomed close home & just missed frame.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘迅速，留居中間之後位置，走第三疊，有遮擋。受催策入直路，在跑道中央競跑。接近終點時再無餘力，僅失季席。
owner: Henry Chan Chi Chiu & Chan Chee Ling

comment: Hard ridden from outside draw, racing very wide into first  turn before settling in one-off position 2L from leader     back stretch. Under pressure from 400m and dropped back     quickly final 200m.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘後受力策，首次轉彎時走大外疊。對面直路上落後領放馬兩個馬位，走第二疊。自四百米處起受催策，最後二百米迅速墮退。

comment: Sharp start, early lead, passed 1300m, settled 3rd rail,    overraced slightly, crowded 550m, ridden along 480m, on     heels 200m, weakened.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，早段取得領先，千三米處被超越，居第三位，走內欄，跑來略為搶口。五百五十米處受擠迫。四百八十米處受催策。二百米處緊貼他駒後蹄，其後轉弱。
owner: Joseph Choi Yip Leung & Choi Fong Hon Mei

comment: Flattened at turn; finished last.
comment_ch: 彎位乏力, 包尾而回

comment: Never a factor, tailed out.
comment_ch: 從未構成威脅，包尾而回。
owner: Cheung Tin Chai & Cheung Shu Yan

comment: Rolled forward to take the fence and share the lead,        despite harmed by the fast sectionals, kept on steadily     until weakened final 100M.
comment_ch: 上前移入內欄，並排領先。儘管快步速不利發揮，但仍保持穩勢。最後一百米轉弱。

comment: Not quickened when under whip at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百開鞭, 未見加速

comment: Broke ok, outpaced & raced near tail on rail, rousted to    push 1 off 500m, hard-driven & continued to shift out       turning in, ran on moderately.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，被拋離，居尾列，走內欄。五百米處在催策下移出第二疊。入直路時在力策下持續向外移出，徐徐上前。

comment: Prompted the pace 2-wide, quickly asserted 250M, continued  on well in the lead and had enough to hold off fast         finishing 2nd late stages.
comment_ch: 追趕領放馬，走第二疊。二百五十米處迅速控制大局。末段在領放下保持佳勢，有足夠餘力抗衡衝刺強勁的亞軍馬匹。

comment: Made ground steadily; won comfortably.
comment_ch: 分段加速，輕鬆撲上
owner: Charles Tung Chung Ho, Ronald Tung Pit Shing & Tung Pit Ching

comment: At rear, 2 wide, benefited by the fast tempo, ran on ok in  straight.
comment_ch: 居後列，走第二疊。快步速有利發揮。直路上走勢普通。
owner: Ng Chong Muk, Wong Man & Ng Siu Luen

comment: Hard ridden to go forward, racing 3-wide without cover 2L   from leader. Turned 4-wide before running out of stamina    and fading final 200m.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，落後領放馬兩個馬位，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。轉直路彎時走第四疊，其後再無餘力，最後二百米逐漸力竭。

comment: Raced at rear; never in contention.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑, 無段好睇
owner: The Hon Martin Liao & Mrs Priscilla Liao

comment: Early speed to vie for lead, to rail & led outright 1150m,  soon 1L clear, reeled in & headed 600m, found nil in        weakening run to wire.
comment_ch: 早段加速上前爭奪領先。一千一百五十米處移人內欄帶頭，瞬即帶離一個馬位。逐漸被追近，六百米處被超越。末段轉弱，再無餘力。

comment: Ran on ordinary; finished at rear of the field.
comment_ch: 走勢乏力, 跟跑而回

comment: Made progress steadily; came from behind for 3rd.
comment_ch: 逐步加快, 後上第三
owner: Samson Yip Yan Tion, Dumas Chow Wai Sang & Eric Tong Man Leung

comment: At back, 7Ls off the leader on the rails, benefited by the  fast pace, held up 4-2, dashed well when clear, only won by a narrow margin.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬七個馬位，走內欄。步速甚快，有利發揮。自四百米處至二百米處受困，望空後以佳勢衝刺，僅以短距離之先勝出。

comment: Under restraint throughout; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 全程拖住，末見佳處
owner: Cheng Chor Chak & Cheng Siu Kwan

handicap_ch: 浪琴表國際騎師錦標賽（讓賽）－第一關
comment: Jumped with field, not pushed, settling between horses      four-back from leader. Taken wide in straight and ran on    steadily doing best work final 100m.
comment_ch: 與對手同步躍出，未受推策，落後領放馬四個馬位，在馬匹之間競跑。直路上移出外疊，走勢平穩。最後一百米表現最佳。
owner: The Executors of the Estate of the late Herbert Hui Ho Ming

handicap: LEI YUE MUN PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 鯉魚門公眾騎術學校讓賽
comment: Away OK, settled well back, ridden from 750m, never truly   travelling, found line very late centre track.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，遙居於後。七百五十米處受催策，但走勢欠順。末段在跑道中央上前。

handicap: THE HONG KONG ST JOHN AMBULANCE BRIGADE CENTENARY CELEBRATION CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港聖約翰救傷隊百週年紀念盃（讓賽）
comment: Fast start but soon outpaced & rowed along, raced rail      midfield, shifted out in stretch & driven, stayed on centre track for gradual inroads.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，但瞬即被超越及受催策。居中間位置，走內欄。直路上向外移出及受催策。保持在跑道中央，逐漸追前。
owner: Chan Hon Ming & Anthony So Hung Gun

comment: Limited response when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段有騎, 反應一般

comment: Jumped well; ran 2nd when under a hold in the Straight.
comment_ch: 起步敏捷，直路按番住

comment: Under restraint throughout; hit the line strongly late.
comment_ch: 沿途扣到實，末段自動湧上

comment: Always at rear, never a factor.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列。從未有力一爭。

comment: Quickly away, pressed forward, settling outside             hind-quarters of leader. Under pressure turning for home    and faded gradually. Substantial amount of blood in trachea.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。受催策上前，居領放馬外側，落後半個馬位。直路彎受催策，逐漸力竭。氣管內有大量血液。

comment: Always at rear, never a factor.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列。從未有力一爭。

handicap_ch: 維多利亞賽馬會錦標（讓賽）
comment: Speed to lead on rail, pressed & shaken up 380m, maintained narrow lead into stretch, headed 220m, no extra & boxed on.
comment_ch: 迅速取得領先，走內欄。三百八十米處被對手追迫，受催策。入直路時繼續以短距離帶頭。二百二十米處被超越，再無餘力，力拼。

comment: Under a hold and not fully tested; finished last.
comment_ch: 按住未試, 包尾而回

comment: Jumped with field, not pressured, racing four-wide behind   pace. Rolled forward 400m, looked chance 200m, checked 50m  by riderless horse.
comment_ch: 與對手同步躍出，未受催策，居領放馬之後，走第四疊。四百米處持續上前。二百米處看似具爭勝機會。五十米處勒避無人策騎的對手。
owner: Tommy Ho Chung Shing, Ho Ka Chun, Nancy Ho Kar Mei & Michael Ho Chung Hing

comment: Wide throughout; kept on well for 3rd.
comment_ch: 全程外疊, 蝕位仍近

comment: Bumped on jumping; made ground steadily to run 2nd.
comment_ch: 起步挨碰，逐步追趕

comment: Sharp break to press lead into 1st turn, raced close 3rd 1  off until settled 1 back on rail 1000m, niggled 500m,       driven 400m, boxed on evenly.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，開始轉首個彎位時追迫領放馬，居接近的第三位，走第二疊。一千米處落後一個馬位，走內欄。五百米處受催策。四百米處再受催策。保持穩勢。
owner: Willie Yiu Man Hung & Victor Yiu Wai Yin

comment: Flattened halfway; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 半程洩氣, 走勢平常

handicap: THE ASSOCIATION OF HONG KONG RACING JOURNALISTS CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港評馬同業協進會挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Ridden forward to get box-seat, 1-3/4L behind the leader,   suited to the slow pace, couldn't keep on passing 150M.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，居包廂位置，落後領放馬一又四分三個馬位。慢步速適合發揮。跑過一百五十米處時未能保持走勢。

comment: Settled midfield; raced under his own steam.
comment_ch: 居中跟跑, 按住順走
owner: Wallace Chim Hon Chun & Leung Man Wei

comment: Jumped awkwardly and lost ground, travelled 5Ls behind the  leader on the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, never    ran on.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，因而失地。落後領放馬五個馬位，走內欄。步速緩慢，不合發揮。從未能追前。

handicap: CHEVALIER COLD STORAGE AND LOGISTICS HANDICAP
comment: Never a factor, dropped off 300M.
comment_ch: 從未能構成威脅，三百米處墮退。

comment: Prominent early, however, was checked rounding the first    turn, suited by the fast pace, ran on gradually for 3rd.
comment_ch: 早段居前列，然而首次轉彎時勒避。快步速適合發揮，逐漸上前，跑獲季軍。
owner: George Lee Hing Fai, Wong Che Leung, Alan Lee Tat Luen & Wong Chi Kin

comment: Caught the eye when ran on strong under a hold.
comment_ch: 按住追趕, 表現吸引

comment: In 4th place 3-4Ls behind runaway leader, pushed along      450M, progressed to the lead inside 200M, driven clear and  continued on well to the line.
comment_ch: 居第四位，落後遙遙帶離的領放馬三至四個馬位。四百五十米處受推策追前，二百米處取得領先。受催策帶離，保持佳勢至終點。

comment: Began fairly, racing behind main pack but well away from    outer fence. Hung badly and difficult to ride from 600m,    racing alone down centre track. Stewards said racing        manners unacceptable.
comment_ch: 出閘一般。居主馬群之後，遠離外欄競跑。自六百米處起嚴重內閃，難以策騎，獨自在跑道中央競跑。競賽董事小組表示，此駒的走勢難以接受。

comment: Slow to begin; laying in when under whip in the Straight.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，直路鞭騎，有點內閃

comment: Raced in midfield, 5-1/4L behind along the rail, kept on    one paced to the line.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後五又四分一個馬位，走內欄。保持同速至終點。

comment: Caught the eye; ran 3rd under a hold.
comment_ch: 按住第三, 表現引人

comment: Eased to sit in midfield, trapped 3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, moved forward 600M, dashed well to the line.
comment_ch: 收慢留居中間位置，走第三疊。步速緩慢，不合發揮。六百米處上前。末段衝刺良佳。

comment: Pushed early, trapped 3 wide in midfield, not suited by the slow tempo, unleashed strong finishing efforts 300M.
comment_ch: 早段受推策，居中間位置，走第三疊。步速緩慢，不合發揮。三百米處以勁勢衝刺。

handicap: THE BOCHK WEALTH MANAGEMENT JOCKEY CLUB SPRINT
handicap_ch: 中銀理財馬會短途錦標
comment: Guided to a 2-wide position behind midfield, in 7th place   5Ls off the pace, ran on mildly passing 400M, awkwardly     placed final 150M and unable to ride out under full         pressure towards the line.
comment_ch: 居中間之後的第七位，落後領放馬五個馬位，走第二疊。跑過四百米處時保持普通走勢。最後一百五十米處於窘境，未能被力策至終點。

comment: OK away, and cruised forward to sit in a position worse     than midfield, on the fence. Still 5L off leaders on the    turn and had a tendency to hang out in the straight.        Finished off the last 200m strongly.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可。上前居中間之後位置，走內欄。直路彎仍落後領放馬匹五個馬位，直路上傾向外閃。最後二百米衝刺強勁。
owner: Cheung Sui Ling & Steven Leung Man Hung

comment: Midfield early; ran on for 3rd under urge late.
comment_ch: 拉士稍騎，後上第三
owner: Silas S S Yang, Wong Tak Wai, Ho Chi Keung & Cheung Yuk Tak

comment: Made progress under a hold; ran on well.
comment_ch: 自動加速，拖住追趕

comment: Away nicely and soon in box seat trailing leaders. Switched out top of straight to make run, finished strongly to grab  quinella placing.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，瞬即居包廂位置，跟隨領先馬匹。直路初向外移出以取位上前，衝刺凌厲，取得亞軍。
owner: The Executors of the Estate of the late The Hon Lau Wong Fat

comment: In touch early; kept on ok late for place.
comment_ch: 跟前, 直路走勢持續

comment: Slow to begin; not willing to stretch when being niggled throughout.
comment_ch: 慢閘, 沿途俾住, 不願展步

comment: Wide throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 全程外疊, 未見真章
owner: Au Kai Kwong & Michelle Jessica Au

comment: On heels early, pushed forward, box seat, out of fuel 250M.
comment_ch: 早段緊貼前駒後蹄。受推策上前，居包廂位置。二百五十米處力竭。

comment: Wide throughout; dashed on fairly well when asked late.
comment_ch: 沿途外疊，末段騎落肯走
owner: Michael To Kwong Yip, Tso Lai Ming & To Wing Shuen

comment: Taken back from widest gate, raced rail near rear, shifted  out 550m, crowded 350m, switched wide in stretch & driven   300m, boxed on centre track.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後留居後列，走內欄。五百五十米處向外移出。三百五十米處受擠迫。直路上移出外疊，三百米處受催策，在跑道中央力拼。
owner: Mr & Mrs Horatio Ho Yiu Wing, Ho Garrick Sai Man and Ho Leslie Sai Kit

comment: One-off on pace; kept on for 2nd.
comment_ch: 二疊跟前, 末段仲有

comment: Ran under his own steam; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 按住順走, 未見真章

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls behind the leader on the      fence, despite hampered by the slow pace, ran on nicely to  score by 3/4L.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬三個馬位，走內欄。步速緩慢，不利發揮。衝刺良佳，以四分三個馬位之先勝出。

comment: Limited response when asked.
comment_ch: 騎落欠勁, 走勢一般

comment: No early pace and settled at rear, pushed along passing     600m and finished off fairly.
comment_ch: 缺乏前速，居後列。跑過六百米處時受推策，衝刺一般。

comment: Raced under his own steam to run 2nd; impressive.
comment_ch: 紋風未動, 表現引人

comment: Under restraint early; ran on for 2nd when asked late.
comment_ch: 早段撐實, 拉士騎落有反應

comment: Ran under his own steam for a comfortable 2nd.
comment_ch: 紋風未動, 從容第二

comment: Settled in just better than midfield on rails in 6th and    then 5th on home bend, switched out to challenge after      straightening, ran on to be nearest at finish.
comment_ch: 居中間稍前的第六位，走內欄。直路彎上居第五位。入直路後向外移出以展開挑戰。保持走勢，終點線上最為接近。

comment: Pressed forward from wide draw, racing outside leader       before taking over passing 1400m. Kept steady pace to       straight before tiring.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘，受催策上前，居領放馬外側。跑過千四米處時取得領先。直路前保持穩勢，繼而漸呈疲態。

comment: On pace early; limited response when asked late.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，拉士騎落唔多

handicap: AUDEMARS PIGUET ROYAL OAK OFFSHORE HANDICAP
comment: Lacked early pace, made short-lived effort around the bend, soon weakened under pressure.
comment_ch: 欠缺前速，轉直路彎時一度發力。在催策下瞬即轉弱。

comment: Caught 3-wide no cover in 8th position, kept on same pace   in straight, never got into contention. (No Vet findings.)
comment_ch: 居第八位，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。直路上保持同速。從未有力爭勝。（獸醫檢查後並無發現任何明顯異常之處）

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY CONVERGENCE OF LOVE COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶亮聚系列讓賽
comment: Restrained on jumping and shifted across behind runners to  fence, dropping towards rear. Stayed on fence around turn,  ran on steadily in straight, doing best work final stages.
comment_ch: 躍出時受約束，在馬群之後切入內欄，墮居後列。轉直路彎時固守內欄。直路上穩步上前。末段表現最佳。

comment: Moderate start, parked midfield 3 deep with cover, to 1 off 800m, switched wide final turn & ridden, quickened to edge  brief lead 150m, headed 100m, held in run.
comment_ch: 出閘普通。居中間位置，走第三疊，有遮擋。八百米處移至第二疊。直路彎移出外疊，受催策。加速上前，一百五十米處一度帶頭。一百米處被超越，不敵頭馬。

comment: Raced wide throughout; ran on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 全程外叠, 加速追上

handicap: THE HONG KONG RACEHORSE OWNERS ASSOCIATION TROPHY (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港馬主協會錦標（讓賽）
comment: Taken back from the widest draw, raced 3 wide at rear,      there to turn, finished off well in straight to be nearest  on line.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後留居後列，走第三疊。直路彎前居相同位置。直路上衝刺良佳，過終點時最為接近。
owner: Chan Wing Kwan, Chang Wing Yiu & Cheung Kwok Wa

comment: At the start reared and rider being dislodged.
comment_ch: 出閘時以後足豎立，導致騎師被拋下。

handicap: THE HEUNG YEE KUK 90TH ANNIVERSARY CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 鄉議局九十周年盃（讓賽）
comment: Pressed forward to lead on settling, then set steady pace   to 300m when passed. Eased off heels 150m when giving       ground.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，以慢步速領放。三百米處被超越，一百五十米處收慢移離他駒後蹄，墮退。
owner: Ng Sun Wah & Chan Wo Ping

comment: Ridden early, then raced keenly before settling just better than midfield in 6th one off the rails, shifted out for a   run upon straightening but ran all over the place without   making any headway.
comment_ch: 早段受催策，跑來搶口，居第六位，走第二疊。入直路時向外移出取位，但走勢欠規矩，未能追前。
owner: Wong Chung Hin & Arnold Wong Chi Chiu

comment: On pace early; kept on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 跟前入位, 未見低落

handicap_ch: 浪琴表國際騎師錦標賽（讓賽）－第三關
comment: Began well, pushed forward but 3-wde, settling ahead of     midfield. Started run midway through back stretch but faded in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受推策上前，居中間之前位置，走第三疊。對面直路半程時開始發力，但直路上力竭。
owner: Matthew C M Yum, Christopher Carson Yum, Nicholas Kevin Yum & Stephanie Carrie Yum

comment: Not quickened when asked at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百推騎, 無加速力

comment: Outpaced early, beyond midfield on outside rail, ridden     350m but limited response.
comment_ch: 早段未能跟上步速，居中間之後位置，走外欄。三百五十米處受催策，但走勢平平。

comment: Taken forward from the wide draw to shadow the leader, 1    off the fence. Not vigorously ridden to the line, and went  in 1 paced.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受催策上前，跟隨領放馬，走第二疊。末段未受力策，保持同速。

comment: Began well but checked 1000m and lost position. Ridden to   make up ground close to fence, taken 3-wide entering        straight and ran on steadily to be closest at finish.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。一千米處勒避，因而失位。在催策下追前，靠近內欄競跑。入直路時移出第三疊。穩步上前，過終點時最為接近。

comment: Moderately away from gate 9, sent forward to take the lead, easy lead until near 600M, peaked early in straight and     headed near 300M, weakened gradually thereafter.
comment_ch: 自第九檔出閘普通，受催策上前，取得領先。輕鬆帶頭直至接近六百米處。直路初未能再增速。接近三百米處時被超越。其後逐漸轉弱。

comment: On pace along the outside rail; hit the line strongly for 2nd.
comment_ch: 沿外欄跟前，末段仍勁

comment: Jumped with field, raced keenly before checked off heels    950m. Settling in box seat, staying on rail in straight and kept on gamely without closing gap.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，跑來搶口，九百五十米處勒避他駒後蹄。居包廂位置，直路上沿欄上前，保持勁勢，但未能追近頭馬。

comment: Always at rear, never a factor.
comment_ch: 一直居後列，從未有力一爭。

comment: Jumped well, steadied, taken in to find cover, settling in  last pair. Dropped to last 1150m, then started forward move 700m, racing 4-wide to reach midfield. Taken to centre      track on straightening and finished off nicely.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，收慢，向內移入尋找遮擋，居最後兩位。一千一百五十米處墮居包尾位置。七百米處開始發力上前，走第四疊，進佔中間位置。入直路時移至跑道中央，衝刺良佳。

comment: Held up 3-4Ls off the pace in midfield and kept to the      inside throughout, not clear run 200M, kept on mildly when  every chance final 150M.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後三至四個馬位，沿途固守內欄。二百米處未能望空。最後一百五十米已獲機會盡展所長，但僅能保持普通走勢。

comment: Under whip late; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 拉士開鞭，仍覺稚嫩

comment: Raced behind runners; hit the line strongly when clear at 200m.
comment_ch: 沿途跟馬林，二百望空，大步湧上
owner: Mr & Mrs Leung Lun, Paul Leung Yuk Hung and Kenneth Leung Yuk Wai

comment: Kept its position when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路有騎, 保持位置

comment: Jumped away well; kept on well to score.
comment_ch: 起步敏捷，貫注到底
owner: James Lau Po Man & Alice Woo Wai See

comment: Patiently ridden behind midfield, fanned wide into          straight, finished strong to go 3rd near line.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，留力候上。入直路時走外疊，以勁勢衝刺，接近終點時取得季軍。

handicap: THE HONG KONG EXCHANGES CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港交易所挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Jumped with field, not pushed, settling behind midfield     along rail. Shaken up entering straight and kept on         steadily without threatening first three.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，未受推策。居中間之後位置，走內欄。入直路時受催策，保持穩定走勢，但未能對首三名馬匹構成威脅。

comment: Soon dropped to last few, forced to check about 600 metres  out, never a danger.
comment_ch: 瞬即墮居最後數位，約六百米處勒避。從未構成威脅。

handicap: THE HONG KONG CLUB CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
comment: First out, holding inside rail till 1450m, slipping into    box seat 1200m. Kept on gamely before fading final stages.  Has substantial amount of blood in trachea.
comment_ch: 出閘最快。固守內欄直至一千四百五十米處。千二米處居包廂位置。保持勁勢，末段力竭。氣管內有大量血液。
owner: Rusy M Shroff & Purviz R Shroff

comment: Travelled in worse than midfield, 7-1/2L behind 2 wide with cover, never ran on.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬七個半馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。從未能追前。

handicap_ch: ＰＡＮＡＳＯＮＩＣ路路亨通行車記錄器讓賽

comment: Never far off in 5th, 2Ls off leader on the turn, worked    home well from top of straight, took lead near 50M and held sway at the finish.
comment_ch: 居第五位，從未遠離領放馬。直路彎落後領放馬兩個馬位。自直路初起在催策下以佳勢衝刺，接近五十米處時取得領先，過終點時保住冠軍。

comment: Shifted across at rear soon after start, cutting to fence   at turn. Wide into straight then weaved between horses      while running on. Rider dropped right rein 100m.
comment_ch: 出閘後瞬即向內移入，居後列。直路彎切入內欄。入直路時走外疊，其後在馬匹之間穿插上前。騎師於一百米處右邊韁繩脫手。

comment: Always well behind.
comment_ch: 沿途遙居於後。

comment: Not far off from leaders early stages,  made the home turn  awkwardly on his debut, gave ground from 500M, weakened to  last.
comment_ch: 今仗初出，早段落後領先馬匹不遠。轉直路彎時走勢笨拙。自五百米處起墮退，其後轉弱，包尾過終點。

comment: Hard ridden forward, box seat, ran on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，居包廂位置，走勢良佳，跑獲亞軍。

comment: Broke well, pressed forward to race 1L outside leader.      Under pressure soon after straightening and gave ground     gradually.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，受催策上前，居領放馬外側，落後一個馬位。入直路後瞬即受催策，逐漸墮退。

comment: Raced greenly; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 走勢稚嫩，未見佳處

comment: First into stride, then shared pace to 900m before settling 1L behind leader in one-off position. Rolled forward to     challenge 350m but unable match winner final stages.
comment_ch: 出閘最快，並排領先至九百米處，繼而居領放馬一個馬位之後的位置，走第二疊。三百五十米處上前展開挑戰，末段不敵頭馬。

comment: On pace early; ran on for 3rd when asked.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，拉士稍騎入位

comment: Broke well, pressed forward to grab third but shuffled back to fifth as field packed up. Stayed on rail around turn,    got split 350m, powered through to lead 200m before pulling clear on hands and heels riding.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前，進佔第三位，其後於馬群上前時墮居第五位。轉直路彎時固守內欄。三百五十米處取得空位，以勁勢上前，二百米處取得領先。在騎師手足並用催策下帶離對手勝出。

comment: From wide gate taken across behind runners early stages,    settled down 6-7Ls back in rear pair, brought wide for his  run entering straight, ran on moderately for 3rd without    threatening winner.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘，早段在馬群之後切入內疊，居最後兩位，落後六至七個馬位。入直路時移出外疊取位，走勢普通，跑獲第三，未能威脅頭馬。
owner: Dr & Mrs Gene Tsoi Wai Wang

comment: Hard ridden early, 3 wide at back, suited by the fast       tempo, ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 早段受力策，居後列，走第三疊。快步速適合發揮。走勢普通。
owner: Michael Lam King Poy, Ernest Lam Jen Ho & Christopher Lam Jen Toa

comment: Raced awkwardly at turn; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 轉彎欠順，表現一般

comment: Under restraint early; limited response when asked.
comment_ch: 早段捉實，騎落一般

comment: Settled behind the pace, 2Ls behind the leader, kept on     steadily to the line.
comment_ch: 居領放馬之後，落後領放馬兩個馬位。保持穩定走勢至終點。

comment: First to jump; led all the way to score.
comment_ch: 應聲彈出, 帶放到底

comment: Hard ridden forward, 2-3 wide, harmed by the fast pace, ran on well until 200M, out of fuel.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，走第二至第三疊。步速甚快，不利發揮。二百米處前走勢甚佳，其後力竭。

comment: Fractious in gate; jumped ok and was prominent; won well.
comment_ch: 閘內發脾氣, 起步順利, 有前有後

comment: Began awkwardly, pushed forward, racing one-off 2L from     leader. Under pressure turning for home and gave ground     steadily in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，受推策上前，落後領放馬兩個馬位，走第二疊。轉入直路時受催策，直路上逐漸墮退。

comment: Blocked throughout; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 全程無位，末段按返

comment: Failed to muster despite being vigorously ridden along,     midfield 2 wide, checked first bend, no turn of foot.
comment_ch: 儘管受力策，但未能加速，居中間位置，走第二疊。首次轉彎時勒避，未能加速。

comment: Began well but soon restrained to midfield, raced keenly    passing 800M and fell back to near the rear, was put to a   serious drive inside 250M but couldn't pick up the pace.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，但瞬即受約束，居中間位置。跑過八百米處時搶口，墮退至接近包尾位置。最後二百五十米受力策，但未能加速。

comment: Never far off mainly in 5th within 3L of pace on rails,     made steady progress without threatening from a similar     position into straight.
comment_ch: 從未遠離領放馬，大多居第五位，落後不逾三個馬位，走內欄。入直路時居相若位置，以穩定走勢上前，但未能構成威脅。

handicap_ch: 其士企業網絡方案讓賽
comment: Began only fairly, hard ridden to make up ground, settling  in box seat 2L from leader 950m. Raced tight passing 400m,  got clear run 250m, kept on gamely under whip.
comment_ch: 出閘僅屬一般，受力策追前。九百五十米處居包廂位置，落後領放馬兩個馬位。跑過四百米處時緊迫競跑。二百五十米處望空，在受鞭策下持續力拼。
owner: Mr & Mrs Baffin Wong Yu Kwan

comment: Fractious in gate, slow to move, taken to outside rail,     dropping to near last. Allowed to coast under good tempo,   switched in 200m to avoid heels, ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 在閘內煩躁不安，出閘緩慢，移出外欄，墮居接近包尾位置。在快步速下獲許順其自然競跑。二百米處向內移入，避開他駒後蹄，走勢一般。
owner: Peter Lam Kin Ngok & Stephen Ip Shu Kwan

comment: Hit the front halfway to score; moved better than before
comment_ch: 半程透出，大幅進步

comment: Led all the way and hit the line strongly to score.
comment_ch: 貫注到底，靭力增強

comment: Always in touch; hit the line strongly to score.
comment_ch: 前後俱備，愈跑愈勁
owner: Charles Tung Chung Ho, Ronald Tung Pit Shing & Tung Pit Ching

comment: OK to begin, finding a position midfield on the rail.       Pushed solidly to the line, and just stole 4th in the last  stride.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居中間位置，走內欄。在推策下保持勁勢至終點，於最後一步取得第四名。

comment: On-pace early; ran on for 2nd when asked.
comment_ch: 望空跟前, 推騎第二
owner: Dr & Mrs Wilson Ip Chun Heng

comment: On-pace early; ran on for 3rd when being hard ridden.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，末段認真考驗
owner: Kenneth Lam Sze Ken, Timothy Junior Lam & Sabrina Chao Sih Ming

comment: Raced greenly; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 走勢稚嫩，未見佳處

handicap_ch: 其士企業網絡方案讓賽
comment: Began well, hard ridden to hold position but tightened 900m and dropped back to rear. Clear last passing 500m, took     rails run in straight but found nothing.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受力策保持位置。九百米處受緊迫，墮居後列。跑過五百米處時明顯包尾。直路上移入內欄，再無餘力。
owner: Mr & Mrs Li Yiu Keung and Clement Li

comment: Hard ridden early but not enough pace, settling behind      midfield in one-off position. Edged forward 450m, switched  in halfway up the straight and finished strongly.
comment_ch: 早段受力策，但速度不足，居中間之後位置，走第二疊。四百五十米處上前，直路中段移入內疊。衝刺強勁。

comment: On pace early; fought on gamely for 2nd.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，力拼第二
owner: Michael Chan Se Ping & Law Lai Wan

comment: Outpaced, settling well back along fence. Made up some      ground around turn, stayed on fence in straight and ran on  well to be closest at finish.
comment_ch: 前速不及對手。遙居於後，沿欄競跑。直路彎略為追前。直路上固守內欄。以佳勢上前，過終點時最為接近。

comment: Urged to lead early; stayed on well.
comment_ch: 搶放接近，末段仲有

comment: Shown early speed; eased at turn; came home well in the straight for 2nd.
comment_ch: 望空搶放, 轉彎回氣, 直路再上

comment: Eased out to sit midfield, on the fence. Kicked clear of    the main group and had no threats for 2nd, making slight    ground on winner late as he eased.
comment_ch: 出閘後收慢，居中間位置，走內欄。發力帶離馬群，居第二位，但未能威脅頭馬。末段頭馬收慢時略為追近。
owner: Rotary Club of Sha Tin Syndicate

comment: Taken back early; shifted out in the Straight; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 刻意拖後，直路移出，見好即收
owner: The HK Racehorse Owners Association Syndicate

comment: Began fairly, pushed forward, then travelled keenly from    800m. Urged forward 3-wide around turn, kept chasing in     straight but unable close gap to leading pair.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，受推策上前，自八百米處起搶口。直路彎走第三疊，受催策上前，直路上持續追趕頭兩名馬匹，但未能追上。

comment: Pushed to hold the rail in midfield, progressed steadily    300M to score.
comment_ch: 受推策居中間位置，固守內欄。三百米處逐漸上前，勝出賽事。

comment: Slow away, pushed to hold the rail in midfield, benefited   by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M for 2nd.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，受推策，居中間位置，固守內欄。步速甚快，有利發揮。三百米處穩步上前，取得亞軍。
owner: Mok Kam Hung & Michael Mok Kwan Yuen

comment: Raced wide throughout; ran under his own steam.
comment_ch: 全程外叠, 按住順走

comment: Ridden along early to look for cover but kept 4-wide        mostly, covering extra ground around turn. Boxed on         one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 早段受催策以尋找遮擋，但大多走第四疊。轉直路彎時多走腳程。直路上保持同速。

comment: Jumped with them, unable to slot in, raced 3 wide with no   cover in 4th, still no cover on turn, took the lead early   in straight, kept on well until headed final 150M, weakened gradually thereafter.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，未能切入內欄，居第四位，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。直路彎仍沒有遮擋。直路初取得領先。保持佳勢，最後一百五十米被超越。其後逐漸轉弱。
owner: Mr & Mrs Eddie Wong Ming Chak and Kameny Wong Kam Man

comment: Jumped well, showed good speed to take the lead, enjoyed    the easy lead to turn, peaked early in straight, headed     near 250M, weakened thereafter.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，加速取得領先。直路彎前輕鬆領放。直路初未能再增速。接近二百五十米處時被超越。其後轉弱。

comment: First to jump; led all the way to score.
comment_ch: 應聲彈出，搶放到底
owner: Poon Tit Man & Wong Kwong Fai

comment: Under restraint early; weakened in the Straight.
comment_ch: 早段撐到實, 但直路走勢乏力

comment: Taken back to rear while racing keenly, remained well       behind to straight, baulked for a run until the 200 metres,
comment_ch: 留居後列，跑來搶口。直路前一直遙居於後。二百米處前受困。

comment: Urged to lead early; being asked late for 3rd.
comment_ch: 全程搶放, 拉士稍騎

comment: Saved ground for 2nd when asked late.
comment_ch: 慳位追上, 末段要騎

comment: At rear, trapped 3 wide, favoured by the fast tempo,        progressed steadily 250M for 2nd.
comment_ch: 居後列，走第三疊，快步速有利發揮。二百五十米處逐漸上前，跑獲亞軍。
owner: Mr & Mrs Raymond Chan Shu Keung

handicap: TUEN MUN PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 屯門公眾騎術學校讓賽
comment: Fast start, close 2nd until settled 1 back on rail from     850m, crowded turning in, driven between rivals 300m to     join leader, close duel final 100m, no extra last strides.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居接近的第二位，自八百五十米處起落後一個馬位，走內欄。入直路時受擠迫，三百米處在馬匹之間受催策，力追頭馬，最後一百米激烈拼鬥，最後數步再無餘力。

comment: Niggled along coming down the Rock; weakened and dropped back.
comment_ch: 落山已騎，乏力墮退

comment: Pressed forward from inside draw, holding box seat and      travelling strongly. Appeared reluctant to take splits up   the straight and weakened noticeably. Stewards ruled        performance unacceptable.
comment_ch: 自內檔出閘，受催策上前，居包廂位置，走勢強勁。直路初看似不願取位上前，顯著轉弱。競賽董事小組認為此駒表現難以接受。

comment: Pressed forward from outside draw to race outside hind      quarters of leader along back stretch. Left flat-footed top of straight and faded.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受催策上前。對面直路上居領放馬外側位置，落後半個馬位。直路初走勢遲緩，其後力竭。

comment: Hard ridden early but not muster, behind midfield,          benefited by the fast tempo, lack room 400M, made steady    ground when clear.
comment_ch: 早段受力策，但未能加速，居中間之後位置。步速甚快，有利發揮。四百米處缺乏空位，望空後穩步上前。

comment: Quickened steadily; ran on ok.
comment_ch: 逐步趕上, 不過不失
owner: Edward Wong Chung Bun, Andy Wong Ka Wai, Dickson Wong Chung Wai & Ceicy Wong Wing Sze

comment: Settled at the back from a wide gate, waited with well      behind, switched wide for a run early in straight, finished off race strongly to snatch victory final stride.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，居後列。其後遙遙落後，留力候上。直路初移出外疊取位，以勁勢衝刺，最後一步勝出賽事。

comment: In worse than midfield, 4-1/4L behind 3 wide without cover, made ground until bumped at 150M, one paced thereafter.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後四又四分一個馬位，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。上前，一百五十米處碰撞對手，其後保持同速。

comment: Hard ridden from wide draw to lead on settling, cutting in  to rail passing 900m. Overtaken passing 300m but battled on gamely to the line.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，受力策，取得領先。跑過九百米處時切入內欄。跑過三百米處時被超越，以勁勢力拼至終點。

comment: Emerged as leader 1000M, had every chance and led to 250M,  faded over final 100M.
comment_ch: 一千米處取得領先，已獲機會盡展所長。領放至二百五十米處，最後一百米逐漸力竭。

comment: Steadied on jumping, shifted across behind runners,         settling at rear. Never in the hunt.
comment_ch: 出閘後收慢，在馬群之後切入內疊，居後列。從未參與競逐。
owner: Mr & Mrs Kenny Cheng Tsin Ki

comment: Raced backwards when asked at turn.
comment_ch: 轉彎已騎，不進反退

comment: Dropped back early to sit 2nd last, 1 off the fence 7L off  the leader. Stayed on OK in the straight, and still gaining some ground late.
comment_ch: 早段墮居尾二位置，走第二疊，落後領放馬七個馬位。直路上保持普通走勢，末段略為追前。

comment: Led at break, eased & headed 1660m, sat 1 back 1 off,       ridden 600m, stayed on one pace.
comment_ch: 出閘後領先，繼而收慢。一千六百六十米處被超越，落後一個馬位，走第二疊。六百米處受催策。保持同速。
owner: Mr & Mrs James Lau Chi Wing, Lau Kai Tai & Michelle Lau Wing Sheung

comment: Eased and travelled at tail end, 6-3/4L behind 3 wide and   without cover, failed to make any ground.
comment_ch: 收慢，居尾列，落後六又四分三個馬位，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。未能追前。

comment: Quickened at home turn; quickened well to win.
comment_ch: 彎位發力, 後上掄元
owner: Mr & Mrs Horatio Ho Yiu Wing, Ho Garrick Sai Man and Ho Leslie Sai Kit

comment: Shifted across behind runners from wide draw, settling      towards rear away from fence. Taken wide in straight and    ran on steadily.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後在馬群之後切入內疊，居後列位置，離欄競跑。直路上移出外疊，穩步上前。
owner: The Hon Ronald Arculli GBM GBS JP & Johanna K J Arculli BBS

comment: Being asked early; not willing to stretch.
comment_ch: 早段已騎, 不願展步

comment: Not quickened when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段要俾，無加速力

comment: Taken back early; dashed on the inside late.
comment_ch: 起步拖後, 拉士內檔竄上
owner: Lo Kui Lun, Lo Hoe, Stanley Lo Shek Yin & Sharon Lo Ching Wun

comment: On pace early; ran on for 3rd when asked late.
comment_ch: 跟前第三, 末段要騎

comment: Ridden forward to take the fence and share the lead at slow tempo, kept on strongly to hold off challenger by 1/2L.
comment_ch: 受催策上前佔取內欄，以慢步速並排領先。保持勁勢，以半個馬位之先力拒對手挑戰，掄元。

comment: Ridden early but didn't muster, dropping to rear away from  fence. Made up some ground around turn, but one-paced in    straight.
comment_ch: 早段受催策，但未能加速，墮居後列，離欄競跑。轉直路彎時略為追前，但直路上保持同速。

comment: Eased forward early, finding a spot in midfield, 3 wide     with cover. Only ran fairly in the straight, and didn't     respond to urging. Eased out over the last 150m.
comment_ch: 早段上前，居中間位置，走第三疊，有遮擋。直路上走勢僅屬一般，對催策毫無反應。最後一百五十米收慢。

comment: Made progress along the rail when under whip at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百開鞭, 貼欄追趕

handicap: THE HEUNG YEE KUK 90TH ANNIVERSARY CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 鄉議局九十周年盃（讓賽）
comment: Crowded for room shortly after start, then taken forward    one-off, two-back. Urged forward on straightening, hit      front 300m, caught 200m, flattened 100m.
comment_ch: 出閘後不久受擠迫，其後受催策上前，落後兩個馬位，走第二疊。入直路時受催策上前，三百米處取得領先。二百米處被追上，一百米處洩氣。
owner: Arthur Antonio da Silva, Betty da Silva & Teresa Marie da Silva

comment: Pressed forward early to sit forward of midfield, 3-4 wide  with limited cover. Well positioned on the turn, but gave   nothing in the straight. Dropped out quickly from the 200m.
comment_ch: 早段受催策上前，居中間之前位置，走第三至第四疊，略有遮擋。直路彎居好位，直路上再無餘力。自二百米處起迅速墮退。

comment: Slowly away, 2nd last 7-8Ls away, not quickened when shoved along 400M, never involved.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢。居尾二位置，落後領放馬七至八個馬位。四百米處受催策，但未能加速。從未參與競逐。

comment: Hard ridden forward, harmed by the fast sectionals, raced   on the inner part of track, emptied 400M.
comment_ch: 受力策上前。步速甚快，不利發揮。走內疊，四百米處再無餘力。

comment: Slow to begin; limited response when asked.
comment_ch: 起步緩慢，直路推騎欠勁

comment: Taken across behind runners, not suited by the slow early   pace, strode forward passing 1100M to race outside the      lead, emptied 300M and backed away to last.
comment_ch: 於馬群之後切入內疊，早段慢步速不合發揮。跑過千一米處時展步上前，居領放馬外側。三百米處洩氣並墮居包尾。

comment: Quickened at home turn; fought on gamely for 2nd.
comment_ch: 彎位發力, 力拼第二

comment: Ran on for 3rd when asked in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路考驗，闖入一席
owner: Eric Cheng Kam Chung & Vene Cheng Wing Ni

comment: From wide barrier showed good gate speed to lead, set       strong pace to straight, unable to fend off impressive      winner 300M but kept grinding to the line, edged out to 3rd close home.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘迅速，取得領先。直路前以快步速領先。三百米處不敵表現出色的頭馬，持續力拼至終點，取得季軍。
owner: Cheuk Hon Kit, Chung Tai Keung, Roland Leung Wing Cheung & Cheuk Lit Piu

comment: Hard ridden forward to take the fence and led by 1L at fast sectionals, kept on strongly until headed by the winner     final 150M, held on for 2nd.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，切入內欄，以快步速領先一個馬位。保持勁勢，最後一百五十米被頭馬超越。保持位置，取得亞軍。

comment: Raced in behind midfield, 5-1/2L behind 2 wide, in the      Straight ran on only one paced.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後五個半馬位，走第二疊。直路上僅能保持同速。

handicap: THE HONG KONG FOOTBALL CLUB CENTENARY CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港足球會百週年紀念挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Began well, urged forward but wide, settling one-off,       two-back. Lost some ground around turn, one-paced in        straight.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前，走外疊，其後移入第二疊，落後兩個馬位。轉直路彎時略為墮退。直路上保持同速。
owner: Wong Hing Chun, Wong Mee Chun & The Executors of the Estate of the late Wong Man Yui

comment: Began OK, racing in midfield but wide with cover. Kept      3-wide around turn and boxed on gamely in straight to be    nearest at finish.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可。居中間位置，走外疊，有遮擋。直路彎保持走第三疊，直路上以頑強鬥志力拼上前，過終點時最為接近。

comment: Pushed forward early to take a share of the lead, 1 off the fence. Never ran on in the straight, and eased out late.
comment_ch: 早段受推策上前，並排領先，走第二疊。直路上從未能上前，末段收慢。
owner: Dr Henry Kao So Ping, Geoffrey Edward Kao & Timothy Daniel Kao

comment: Jumped OK, ridden but didn't muster, dropping to rear in    one-off position. Travelled keenly approaching turn, taken  very wide in straight, boxed on one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策，但未能加速，墮居後列，走第二疊。趨近直路彎時跑來搶口。直路上移出大外疊，保持同速。

comment: Slow to begin; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 走勢一般

comment: Being ridden throughout; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 沿途俾住，未見佳處

comment: Hampered on jumping, drove forward to be 2nd along the      2-path, pace strong, gave ground abruptly from 600M before  finishing tailed out. (Irregular Heart Rhythm.)
comment_ch: 躍出時受阻礙，受催策上前，居第二位，走第二疊。賽事步速甚快。自六百米處起急促墮退，包尾大敗而回。（心律不正常。）

comment: Broke ok, bustled to vie for lead, soon settled 1 back 1    off, 3rd & no cover 700m, niggled 450m, driven into         stretch, one-paced & tapered closing stages.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可。受催策，爭奪領先。瞬即落後一個馬位，走第二疊。七百米處居第三位，沒有遮擋。四百五十米處受催策，入直路時再受催策。保持同速，末段轉弱。
owner: Steven Chan Sheung Chi & Kenneth Chan Sheung Yan

comment: Began awkwardly, lost ground on jumping, recovered to race  along the fence in midfield, 4.5Ls off leader (winner)      400M, kicked home belatedly showing the best stride late,   nearest finish.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，因而失地。恢復走勢後沿欄居中間位置。四百米處落後領放馬（頭馬）四個半馬位。末段衝刺強勁，過終點時最為接近，但發力太晚。

comment: On pace early; weakened badly late.
comment_ch: 主動搶前，末段散晒

comment: Hit the front at turn; just caught.
comment_ch: 彎位透出, 臨門被過

comment: Hard ridden early, sat midfield, lack room 400M, unleashed  strong finishing efforts when clear despite not suited by   the slow pace.
comment_ch: 早段受力策，居中間位置。慢步速不合發揮，四百米處缺乏空位，但望空後衝刺強勁。
owner: Mr & Mrs Mark Fong Chung and Matthew Fong

comment: Tardy start widest, raced 3 wide with cover at tail, minor  advance 850m, driven very wide into stretch, stayed on      centre track for solid headway.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘緩慢，居尾列，走第三疊，有遮擋。八百五十米處略為追前。入直路時受催策，走大外疊。在跑道中央保持走勢，追前甚多。

comment: Commenced awkwardly, steadied at 900m when settling on      speed, challenged strongly at 400m and tried valiantly in   the run to the line.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，九百米處跟隨領放馬，收慢。四百米處以勁勢展開挑戰，末段奮起力拼。

comment: Quickened at 400m; made ground steadily for 2nd.
comment_ch: 四百發力，逐步上前

comment: Began well from a wide draw, failed to muster, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, hampered and carrier wider near 700M, still made some progress in straight despite hard     run. (Lost right front plate at the start)
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘良佳，未能加速，居中間之後位置，走第三疊，有遮擋。接近七百米處時受阻，移出更外疊，雖已耗力甚多，直路上仍略為上前。（起步時失去右前蹄的蹄鐵。）

comment: Moderately away, raced 2 wide, 3 lengths back in 4th, same  position to turn, showed good response early in straight,   peaked near 150M, finished 3rd.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居第四位，落後三個馬位，走第二疊。直路彎前居相同位置。直路初受催策，走勢甚佳。接近一百五十米處時未能再增速，跑獲季軍。
owner: Max Ngan Man Hung & Anthony Wu Ting Yuk

comment: Under a hold midfield; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 按住居中，走勢不弱

comment: Began OK, ridden to hold rail, settling midfield. Under     pressure turning for home and gave ground steadily in       straight.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，在催策下固守內欄，居中間位置。轉入直路時受催策，直路上逐漸墮退。
owner: Willie Yiu Man Hung & Victor Yiu Wai Yin

comment: Fought on gamely for 3rd when shifted out in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路移出，奮力上前

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, ran on steadily for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬五個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。穩步上前，跑獲季軍。
owner: Lee Wan Keung & Lee Wong Wai Kuen

comment: On-pace early; found nothing when asked.
comment_ch: 跟前，直路騎落唔多
owner: Johnny Wong Ka Keung, Ernest Ip Koon Wing, Christopher Chan Wai Tong & Michael Cheng Woon Yin

comment: Ran on ordinary when being ridden along early.
comment_ch: 一早已騎，走勢欠勁

comment: Moderately away, positioned 1 out 1 back, difficult to      settle near 900M, peaked early in straight, weakened        gradually thereafter.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居第二疊第二位，接近九百米處時難以穩定走勢。直路初未能再增速，其後逐漸轉弱。

comment: Urged along on jumping from wide barrier, crossed to the    lead before home turn, soon tackled by rival leaving the    bend, fought on briefly then gave way 250M.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受催策，直路彎前移入內欄領先。入直路時瞬即被對手挑戰，一度力拼，二百五十米處墮退。
owner: Lim U Po Chu & Wong Ching Yue

comment: Closer up early stages before shuffled back behind midfield around the 1000-metre bend, travelled 3-wide but with cover down far side, made no impression from a similar position   into straight.
comment_ch: 早段追前。一千米處轉彎時墮居中間之後位置。對面直路上走第三疊，有遮擋。入直路時居相若位置，毫無表現。

comment: Pushed forward to obtain box seat, kept on until swamped in last 200M.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，佔取包廂位置。保持走勢，最後二百米被後上馬匹超越。

comment: Up with the pace early; kept on ok.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，走勢持續

comment: Away fairly, pressed forward, settling along rail 4L from   leader. Under pressure turning for home and dropped out in  straight.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策上前，落後領放馬四個馬位，走內欄。轉入直路時受催策，直路上墮退。

comment: Jumped fairly, travelled very wide without cover in better  than midfield, widest runner entering straight, never       recovered.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居中間之前位置，走大外疊，沒有遮擋。入直路時走最外疊，從未恢復走勢。
owner: Mr & Mrs Ben Wong Chung Mat

comment: Bumped start, at rear, no progress.
comment_ch: 出閘時被碰撞，居後列，毫無進展。

comment: Held ground throughout; ran on ordinary when asked.
comment_ch: 不上不落，騎落一般

comment: Pressed forward from an outside draw to get forward         position, settling 3-wide without cover 2L from leader.     Urged forward turning for home, stayed in contention to     200m before tiring.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，受催策上前，居前列位置，落後領放馬兩個馬位，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。轉入直路時受催策上前，持續力拼，二百米處呈現疲態。

comment: Not quickened when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段要騎，未見加速

comment: Pushed early but not muster, at back, held up 4-2, dashed   strongly when clear despite not suited by the slow pace.
comment_ch: 早段受推策，但未能加速。居後列，四百米處至二百米處受困。步速緩慢，不合發揮，但望空後仍以勁勢衝刺。

comment: Hard ridden to hold the rail in midfield, 4.5Ls off the     leader, suited by the fast tempo, but dropped off rapidly   500M.
comment_ch: 受力策固守內欄，居中間位置，落後領放馬四個半馬位。步速甚快，適合發揮，但五百米處迅速墮退。
owner: Tony Ng Fung Sing & Michael Ling Siu Ming

comment: Ran on ordinary when under whip in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路開鞭, 走勢一般

comment: Faded when asked at turn.
comment_ch: 彎位已騎, 不進反退
owner: Liu Shun Hong & George Ma Pui Pui

comment: Led early; just caught late.
comment_ch: 沿途搶放，拉士被過
owner: James Ngai & Joseph Hui Ying Biu

comment: Began well, eased across, settled 3rd 1 off no cover,       forced 3 deep when leader drifted, under pressure turning   for home, weakened.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，向內移入。居第三位，走第二疊，沒有遮擋。領放馬斜跑時被迫走第三疊，轉入直路時受催策，轉弱。

comment: Prominent early stages, remained in touch making the turn   for home but didn't respond to pressure 500M, beaten early  straight.
comment_ch: 早段居前列。轉直路彎時仍居啣接位置。五百米處受催策，但毫無反應。直路初洩氣。

comment: Rearward early; never in contention.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑, 無段好睇
owner: Mr & Mrs Kenny Cheng Tsin Ki

comment: On-pace early; had a hold late.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢, 拉士按住

comment: Ran on fairly; came from behind for 3rd.
comment_ch: 後上第三，表現不差

comment: Jumped well, ridden to find cover, crossing to fence in     midfield passing 1200m. Switched out 350m but unable to get clear run until passing 200m. Finished off well.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策以取得遮擋。跑過千二米處時切入內欄，居中間位置。三百五十米處向外移出，跑過二百米處時始能望空，衝刺良佳。

comment: Eased back early to sit just behind midfield on the fence.  Moved forward at the 600m, and ran solidly in the straight, without threatening a place.
comment_ch: 早段收慢，留居中間稍後位置，走內欄。六百米處發力上前。直路上走勢強勁，未能對入位馬匹構成威脅。

comment: Ran on ordinary; never a threat.
comment_ch: 走勢平常, 毫無威脅
owner: Chan Nam Lee, Ng Hung Yau, Wong Ting Chung & George Lau Ka Keung

comment: Taken across early to sit midfield 3 wide, before being     sitting wide with no cover from 1000m. Well placed on the   turn, but never kicked and not pushed vigorously to the     line.
comment_ch: 早段向內移入，居中間位置，走第三疊。自一千米處起走外疊，沒有遮擋。直路彎居好位，但從未能加速，末段未受力策。
owner: Dr & Mrs Gene Tsoi Wai Wang

comment: Tardy start; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 起步麻麻，走勢欠順

comment: Slow to begin; under whip in the straight.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 直路又推又打

comment: Settled midfield; under whip and hard ridden in the Straight.
comment_ch: 居中跟跑，直路又推又打

handicap: HKU JOCKEY CLUB STUDENT VILLAGES HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 香港大學賽馬會舍堂村讓賽
comment: Began well, but not used up early to sit midfield on the    fence. Came out for a run at 250m, and ran on OK when given room late.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。早段未受催策，居中間位置，走內欄。二百五十米處移出外疊取位，末段在取得空位後走勢尚可。

comment: Taken back as usual, travelled 11Ls behind the leader 2     wide with cover, suited by the fast sectionals, ran on      without any real threats.
comment_ch: 如常留後，落後領放馬十一個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。步速甚快，適合發揮。持續上前，但未能構成真正威脅。

comment: Ridden along for 3rd in a less competitive race.
comment_ch: 騎住第三，對手太弱

comment: Being ridden in the straight; ran on greenly.
comment_ch: 直路推騎, 走勢仍嫩

comment: Pressed forward, trapped 3 wide, harmed by the fast         sectionals, flattened 200M.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，走第三疊，快步速不利發揮。二百米處洩氣。

comment: Bumped start, raced at rear throughout, emptied early in    straight, never competitive.
comment_ch: 出閘時與對手互相碰撞，沿途居後列。直路初再無餘力。從未有力一爭。

comment: Raced behind leaders, under pressure home turn and weakened out of it in straight.
comment_ch: 居領先馬匹之後位置。轉直路彎時受催策。直路上轉弱。

comment: Flattened halfway; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 半程洩氣，走勢一般

comment: Pushed forward to take the fence and led by 1.5Ls, kept on  fairly until final 250M headed.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，移入內欄，領先一個半馬位。保持普通走勢，最後二百五十米被超越。

comment: Taken back at start, sat 3 wide near rear, minor advance    1000m to back of mid-rank 750m, niggled 600m & driven very  wide final turn, moderate headway centre track.
comment_ch: 出閘後留居後列位置，走第三疊。一千米處略為追前，七百五十米處居中間之後位置，六百米處受催策，直路彎走大外疊，受催策，在跑道中央略為追前。

comment: Settled down midfield, 3Ls off the pace along the 3-path,   driven along 550M, offered limited response early straight, no threat to leaders from 200M, eased towards the line.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬三個馬位，走第三疊。五百五十米處受催策，直路初在催策下反應僅平平。自二百米處起未能對領先馬匹構成威脅，趨近終點時收慢。

comment: Wide at turn; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 蝕位轉彎, 走勢仍嫩
owner: Clement Ma Kang Ching, Josiah Ma Pok Man & David Ma Yeuk Lai

comment: Been ridden throughout; weakened in the straight.
comment_ch: 騎足全程, 直路唔多

comment: Pressed forward from an outside draw to lead on settling    and crossing to fence. Tried to kick clear on entering      straight and kept finding when challenged only to lose in   final strides.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，受催策上前領先並切入內欄。入直路時試圖帶離對手，受對手挑戰但持續力拼，僅於最後數步見負。

comment: Sharp break, settled behind pace on rail, 2L back & niggled a touch 800m, shifted out to challenge 420m, boxed on in    pursuit, to 2nd 250m, always held.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居領放馬之後，走內欄。八百米處落後兩個馬位，略受催策。四百二十米處向外移出以展開挑戰。持續力拼，二百五十米處進佔第二位，但一直未能超越頭馬。

comment: Asked and quickened at 300m to score.
comment_ch: 三百發力, 考驗取勝

comment: Settled worse than midfield about 7Ls behind the leader 2   wide with cover, swung wide turning in, finished off well   for 2nd.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬約七個馬位，在有遮擋下走第二疊。入直路時移出外疊，末段衝刺甚佳，跑獲亞軍。

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader on the      fence, despite the slow tempo, ran on gradually for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬四個馬位，走內欄。儘管步速緩慢，仍逐漸上前，跑獲季軍。

comment: Moderate start, settled rail midfield, shaken up 400m,      shifted 1 off & battling run to lead 80m, maintained        momentum through line.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居中間位置，走內欄。四百米處受催策，移至第二疊，力拼上前，八十米處取得領先。保持勁勢至終點。

comment: Broke well from a wide gate, soon taken back towards the    rear, moved slightly closer approaching home bend, found    nothing in the run home.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘迅速，瞬即留居後列。趨近直路彎時略為追近。直路上再無餘力。

comment: Leapt out of the barrier, missed the kick and settled at    the rear of the field. Plugged away steadily under hands    and heels in the straight, without ever threatening.
comment_ch: 開閘時一對前腳並舉，因而漏閘，居馬群後列。直路上在騎師手足並用催策下保持穩勢，但未能構成威脅。

comment: Ridden to hold forward position, settling 1.5L behind       leader before turn. Swung wide into straight but only       one-paced.
comment_ch: 受催策，居前列位置，直路彎前落後領放馬一個半馬位。入直路時移出外疊，但僅能保持同速。

comment: Outpaced, dropping between horses at the rear. Lost touch   with main field soon after straightening, finishing a long  way back.
comment_ch: 出閘後被拋離，在馬匹之間墮居後列。入直路後不久被主馬群拋離，遙遙落後過終點。

comment: Urged early; well tested in the straight.
comment_ch: 起步已騎，直路考驗

comment: Not hurried, eased to a position behind midfield about 6Ls  off the slow pace, kept to inside throughout, stayed on     past weakening horses, no impression on leaders.
comment_ch: 未受催策，收慢留居中間之後位置，落後步速緩慢的領放馬約六個馬位。沿途走內疊，保持走勢，超越數匹走勢轉弱的馬匹，未能對領先馬匹構成威脅。

comment: Pressed forward from widest draw, racing 4-wide before      cutting in 900m to sit a half length outside leader. Under  pressure from 300m and faded gradually.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘後受催策上前，走第四疊，九百米處切入領放馬外側位置，落後半個馬位。自三百米處起受催策，逐漸力竭。

comment: 1st to jump; being asked late for 2nd.
comment_ch: 起步敏捷，拉士稍騎

comment: Raced into forward of midfield from gate 1. Maintained      position 1L behind along the rail. Faded out in last 100M.
comment_ch: 自第一檔出閘後上前，居中間之前位置。沿欄保持在領放馬一個馬位之後的位置。最後一百米力竭。

comment: Came home from behind to score when asked late.
comment_ch: 拉士考驗, 後上取勝
owner: Mr & Mrs William Yem Wai Lai

handicap_ch: 浪琴表國際騎師錦標賽（讓賽）－第四關
comment: Held up 2-wide behind midfield, 6Ls to make up 400M, chased steadily without threatening.
comment_ch: 留居中間之後位置，走第二疊。四百米處落後六個馬位。逐漸追趕對手，但未能構成威脅。

comment: Always in touch; ran on ok for 2nd.
comment_ch: 有前有後, 走勢輕鬆

comment: Began awkwardly and didn't kick. Struggled to find early    position, before dropping back towards rear of the field.   Unsettled and stuck wide no cover 1200m. Last on the turn.  Plugged on fairly to get a couple of slow ones late.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，未能發力，早段掙扎上前取位，墮居馬群後列。千二米處未能穩定走勢，在沒遮擋下走外疊。直路彎居包尾位置。保持普通走勢，超越數匹走勢緩慢的對手。

comment: Raced behind runners; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 沿途走馬林，走勢不弱

handicap_ch: 法國賽馬及育馬委員會讓賽
comment: Raced at the rear, 6-3/4L behind along the rail, made good  ground, shifted in at 100M and ran on nicely to the line.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後六又四分三個馬位，走內欄。追前甚多。一百米處向內移入。保持佳勢至終點。

comment: No daylight in the Straight; raced under his own steam.
comment_ch: 直路受困，按住順走
owner: Yvonne Lui Lai Kwan and Dr & Mrs Philip Ho Kin Hoi

comment: Jumped well, settled in rear of mid-division, kept on at    the one pace in the run home.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，居中間之後位置，末段保持同速。

comment: Jumped with field, ridden to hold midfield position along   rail. Held position turning into straight, boxed on gamely  to 200m before tiring.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，受催策以保持在中間位置，走內欄。轉入直路時保持位置，持續力拼至二百米處，其後呈現疲態。

comment: Hit the front at turn; won comfortably.
comment_ch: 彎位透出, 毫不費力

comment: Eased back early from the wide draw to sit behind midfield, 3-4 wide with limited cover. Didn't show a great turn of    foot in the straight, and went to the line only fairly.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，早段收慢，留居中間之後位置，走第三至第四疊，略有遮擋。直路上未能以勁勢加速，僅能以普通走勢奔向終點。

comment: Urged to lead along the rail; under a hold in the Straight.
comment_ch: 貼欄搶放, 直路按番住
owner: The Hon & Mrs Kenneth Lau Ip Keung

comment: Hard ridden forward to settle in a prominent position, kept on one pace to the line for 4th.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，居前列。保持同速至終點，跑獲殿軍。

comment: Ran on strongly centre of track for 3rd.
comment_ch: 中檔竄上, 走勢甚佳

comment: Jumped well, ridden along between horses before settling    three-back close to rail. Lost position around turn, took   inside run in straight, finished off nicely.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，在馬匹之間受催策，落後領放馬三個馬位，走內欄。轉直路彎時失位，直路上走內疊，以佳勢衝刺。

comment: Asked coming down the Rock; shifted out in the Straight; dashed on well for 3rd.
comment_ch: 落山已騎, 直路望空, 大步上前
owner: Chadwick Mok Cham Hung, Wong Wing Hong & Wilson Lam Jing Shing

comment: Jumped in at start, up into 3rd on rail early, shuffled     back into midfield position on fence by 1500m, pushed off   rail 580m, hampered slightly 400m, chased willingly, almost on terms 120m, never quite passed.
comment_ch: 出閘時向內躍出，早段上前居第三位，走內欄。千五米處前墮退至中間位置，走內欄。五百八十米處移離內欄，四百米處略為受阻。力追頭馬，一百二十米處幾乎追平，但從未能超越頭馬。
owner: Rolon Cheung Cho Yiu & Wilson Cheung Wing Yim

comment: Ran on only fairly when asked at 300m.
comment_ch: 三百稍騎，不過不失

comment: Moderate start, improved steadily to join the leader        rounding home bend, unable to sustain effort and faded      inside the final 300 metres.
comment_ch: 出閘普通。轉直路彎時逐漸推進，追上領放馬。後勁不繼，最後三百米力竭。

comment: Taken back early; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 留前試後, 未見佳處

comment: Flattened halfway; dropped back to rear.
comment_ch: 半程洩氣，包尾而回

comment: Settled at rear; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 墮後跟跑，未見真章
owner: Simon Tam Ngak Chou & Tam Hin Chi

handicap: THE KOWLOON CRICKET CLUB CENTENARY CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 九龍木球會百週年紀念盃（讓賽）
comment: Began awkwardly, steadied 700m, switched in passing 400m to move forward but had to switch out when baulked 180m, ran   on well.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，七百米處收慢，跑過四百米處時移入內疊推進。一百八十米處受阻，移出外疊，走勢良佳。

comment: OK away and settled in midfield, 1 off the fence. Got clear running from the 250m, and ran to the line OK, wearing down 3rd but without threatening the first 2.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可。居中間位置，走第二疊。自二百五十米處起望空，奔向終點時走勢尚可。逐步追近季軍馬匹，但未能威脅前兩名馬匹。

comment: Ridden early; ran on strongly late.
comment_ch: 早段已騎, 拉士愈追愈勁

comment: Camped handy, travelled 2Ls behind the leader 2 wide with   cover, kept on one pace to the line for 4th.
comment_ch: 居有利位置，落後領放馬兩個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。保持同速至終點，跑獲殿軍。

comment: Midfield 2 wide, dropped off steadily 600M.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，走第二疊。六百米處逐漸墮退。

comment: Eased at start, never competitive.
comment_ch: 出閘後收慢，從未有力一爭。

comment: Broke well, positioned behind the pace and waited. Shaken   up 750m, rolled forward 3-wide into straight, worked home   strongly to win on the post.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，居領放馬之後位置，留力候上。七百五十米處受催策，入直路時走第三疊上前，衝刺凌厲，終點線上取勝。

comment: No early speed, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
comment_ch: 缺乏前速，沿途居後列。從未有力一爭。

comment: At rear 2-3 wide, checked 900M, pace good, made steady      ground 200M.
comment_ch: 居後列，走第二至第三疊。九百米處勒避。步速偏快。二百米處逐漸上前。

comment: Made progress under a hold; won comfortably.
comment_ch: 按住上前, 姿態從容

comment: Urged throughout; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 騎足全程, 無段好睇
owner: Yeung Kwok Ki, Angela Yeung Pui Yan, Thomas Yeung Chuen Chow & Patricia Yeung Pui Chee

comment: Asked at turn; struggled for 4th.
comment_ch: 轉彎已騎, 走勢勉強

comment: Up with the pace; flattened in the Straight.
comment_ch: 跟前, 直路力度已減弱

comment: Always in touch; ran on comfortably for 3rd.
comment_ch: 有前有後，姿態從容

comment: Eased back, trapped 3-4 wide, raced keenly, not suited by   the slow pace, emptied 350M.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，走第三至第四疊。搶口，慢步速不合發揮。三百五十米處力竭。

comment: Rolled forward and led by a nose along the rail, headed     passing 200M, just held onto 2nd.
comment_ch: 上前領先一馬鼻位，走內欄。跑過二百米處時被超越，僅保亞軍。

comment: Took rail and lead easily, drifted away 300M, ran on well   to score.
comment_ch: 移入內欄，輕鬆領放。三百米處帶離。走勢良佳，勝出賽事。

comment: Raced in midfield, 2-3/4L off the pace 2 wide with cover,   finished off only one paced.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬二又四分三個馬位，在有遮擋下走第二疊。末段僅能保持同速。

comment: Raced midfield, 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover,    ran on steadily for 4th without any serious threat to the   placegetters.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬五個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。保持穩勢，跑獲殿軍，未能對前三名馬匹構成嚴重威脅。
owner: Michael Lau Chor Chiu & Steve Lau Tsz Chung

handicap: THE HONG KONG GOLF CLUB CENTENARY CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港高爾夫球會百週年紀念盃（讓賽）
comment: Jumped OK, ridden along ahead of midfield, then taken       3-wide turning for home. Kept on fairly in straight. Rider  rapped by stewards on riding early in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，受催策，居中間之前位置，轉直路彎時移至第三疊。直路上保持普通走勢。小組批評騎師在直路早段的騎法。

comment: Settled down in midfield 3-4Ls off the pace, had cover      along the 3-path, ran on steadily without threatening.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬三至四個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。穩步上前，但未能構成威脅。
owner: Chan Hon Ming & Anthony So Hung Gun

comment: Limited response when asked in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路推騎，未見加速

comment: Responded ok for 2nd when asked late.
comment_ch: 拉士推騎，尚有反應
owner: Peter P C Fan, Montgomery Ho Shun Wah & Dr Michael Mok Hing Hung

comment: Taken back from wide barrier early, ridden forward passing  1000M and improved to a midfield position 3-wide, gave      chase on leaders final 300M but always held.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘，早段留後，跑過一千米處時受催策上前，推進至中間位置，走第三疊。最後三百米追趕領先馬匹，但一直未能追上。

comment: At back, 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, lack room      400M, closed off strongly when clear.
comment_ch: 居後列，走第二疊。快步速有利發揮。四百米處缺乏空位，望空後衝刺凌厲。

comment: Pushed to occupy the box seat, enjoyed the slow sectionals, closed off strongly 300M, just beaten by narrow margin in   2nd.
comment_ch: 受推策，佔取包廂位置。步速緩慢，有利發揮。三百米處以勁勢衝刺。僅以短距離之差見負，屈居亞軍。
owner: Mr & Mrs James Lau Chi Wing, Lau Kai Tai & Michelle Lau Wing Sheung

comment: Responded fairly when under whip and hard ridden.
comment_ch: 又推又打，反應尚可
owner: Bonnie Chan Yiting, Anthony Derek Lai Shu Yan, Ricky Choy Wing Kay & Dominic Lee Kan Nam

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY GOLD CHARISMA COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶金飾魅力系列讓賽
comment: Punched forward and settled in one-off one-back position 2L off, kept on well going to the line.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，落後一個馬位，走第二疊。以佳勢上前至終點。
owner: Wu Kai Char & Wu Wai Chor

handicap: HKU FACULTIES OF MEDICINE AND ENGINEERING HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 港大醫學院與工程學院讓賽
comment: Broke ok wide, taken back to rail near tail, shifted out    520m, driven 430m, switched centre 350m, stayed on for dour headway.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘尚可。留居接近包尾位置，走內欄。五百二十米處向外移出，四百三十米處受催策。三百五十米處移至跑道中央競跑。保持走勢，力拼上前。
owner: Terence Leung Chi Kin, Patrick Wong Man Kam, Jason Leung Hok Shan & Jeffrey Mark Wong

comment: Settled at rear; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑，未有好感
owner: Mr & Mrs Peter Chan On Tak and Robert Chan Chi Man

comment: Urged to lead early; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 早段走勢欠順，後上接近
owner: Alfred Chong Kin Ngai & Jack Chong Chun Kit

comment: Began well, used inside draw to hold rail, settling in      taking box seat. Closed in turning for home to look a       chance 200m before turning one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，藉內檔之利固守內欄，居包廂位置。轉直路彎時追近領放馬，二百米處看似具爭勝機會，其後保持同速。

comment: Limited response when asked at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百推騎，反應一般
owner: Dr Carl Leung Ka Kui, Paulo Sam, Henry Sam Chien Man & Chow Hong

comment: Steadied on jumping and dropped back to be last up the back straight. Checked at the 900m. Came widest on the turn, and ran on well late, without threatening the first 3.
comment_ch: 出閘後收慢，對面直路上墮居包尾位置。九百米處勒避。直路彎走最外疊，末段走勢甚佳，但未能威脅三甲馬匹。

comment: Ran on for 3rd when shifted out in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路移出, 追回一席

comment: Always in touch; won comfortably.
comment_ch: 前後俱備，有餘未盡
owner: Vincent Chan Wing Sing & Jason Chan Kam Kwan

comment: Hard ridden to take the rail and led at good pace, soon     emptied 300M.
comment_ch: 受力策，移入內欄，以快步速領放。三百米處瞬即再無餘力。

comment: Dropped in from a wide gate, raced 3 deep with cover behind midfield, ridden 500m, stayed on centre track for sound     headway.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後切入，居中間之後位置，在有遮擋下走第三疊。五百米處受催策。直路上在跑道中央競跑，追前甚多。
owner: Wu Yan Wah & Chan Siu Ying

comment: On-pace early; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，表現唔曳
owner: Chan Hon Ming & Anthony So Hung Gun

comment: Under a hold throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 沿途拖住，未見真章

comment: Taken across behind runners after the jump, settled down    2nd last in a strongly run race, 5Ls to make up 400M,       closed off fastest and got up for 2nd near line without     reaching easy winner.
comment_ch: 出閘後在馬群之後切入內疊，居尾二位置，賽事步速甚快。四百米處落後五個馬位。衝刺最快，接近終點時進佔第二位，但未能追上輕易獲勝的頭馬。

comment: Began well and taken forward early to share the lead, on    the rails. Never responded to pressure at any stage, and    dropped back from the 300m to finish last.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。早段受催策上前，並排領先，走內欄。沿途對催策毫無反應，自三百米處起墮退。包尾而回。

comment: Ridden but slow to muster, steadied 1400m then left wide    without cover 3L from leader. Kept on gamely in straight to be closest at finish.
comment_ch: 受催策，但加速緩慢。千四米處收慢，其後落後領放馬三個馬位，走外疊，沒有遮擋。直路上保持勁勢，過終點時最為接近。

comment: Started ok but lacked early toe, raced rail behind          midfield, niggled along 750m, switched out & ridden 400m,   kept on one pace.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，但缺乏前速。居中間之後位置，走內欄。七百五十米處受催策。四百米處移出外疊，受催策。保持同速。

comment: Under whip after start; hard ridden for 3rd.
comment_ch: 起步開鞭, 力騎入位
owner: Tony Yue Kwok Leung, Alexander Yue Ka Kuen & Richard Yue Ka Ming

comment: Taken back to settle at rear; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 沿途拖後, 未受考驗

comment: Crowded out start, picked up then bumped and unbalanced     1100m, dropping behind midfield along rail. Improved turn,  kept on steadily in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘時受擠迫，加速上前。千一米處與對手互相碰撞，因而失去平衡，沿欄墮居中間之後位置。直路彎推進上前。直路上保持穩勢。

comment: Broke well from the two draw, assumed lead on rails setting a reasonable pace, found no extra under strong pressure in  straight and swamped close to home.
comment_ch: 自第二檔出閘迅速，取得領先，走內欄，步速中等。直路上受力策，但再無餘力。接近終點時被超越。
owner: Elseda Shum Mei Chu, Professor Hextan Ngan Yuen Sheung, Chu Kwong Por & Andrew Shuen Pak Man

comment: Ridden along early to go forward and lead, travelled well   home turn, established a break in straight before being     overpowered final 100m.
comment_ch: 早段受催策上前，取得領先。轉直路彎時走勢良佳。直路上帶離對手。最後一百米被超越。

comment: Bumped on jumping, no pace, dropping to last before turn.   Well back entering straight, taken to centre track, kept on well.
comment_ch: 出閘時碰撞對手。缺乏前速，直路彎前墮居包尾位置。入直路時遙居於後，直路上移至跑道中央競跑。保持佳勢。

comment: Eased at start, took cover at rear, 2 wide, dashed well     200M.
comment_ch: 出閘後收慢，居後列，取得遮擋，走第二疊。二百米處衝刺良佳。
owner: Barry Wong Kam Keung & Wong Kam Fai

comment: Jumped well; fought back late to win.
comment_ch: 起步最快, 拉士回氣再上
owner: Hau Shiu Kai & Gigi Hau Ying Chi

comment: Ridden early to hold rail, taking box seat before shuffled  two-back at turn. Blocked for run 250m, shifted in and      finished strongly, severely checked close to line.
comment_ch: 早段受催策，居包廂位置，固守內欄。直路彎墮退兩個馬位。二百五十米處受阻，繼而向內移入，以勁勢衝刺。接近終點時大力勒避。

comment: Missed break, 2L detached & bustled, under whip 700m &      advanced to join main body at 600m, hard-ridden centre      track, stayed on for strong late headway.
comment_ch: 漏閘，被馬群拋離兩個馬位，受催策。七百米處受鞭策上前，六百米處追上主馬群。在跑道中央受力策。保持走勢，末段以勁勢上前。

comment: In 6th place, 10Ls off the strong pace in middle stages,    stayed on fairly entering straight before turning one pace  final 100M.
comment_ch: 居第六位，中段落後走勢強勁的領放馬十個馬位。入直路時保持普通走勢。最後一百米保持同速。

comment: Under a hold throughout; raced under his own steam.
comment_ch: 全程捉實，清風送爽

comment: Sharp start, quickly out-sped, settled back of midfield 1   off but niggled to hold place, shifted 3 deep 620m, ridden  along turning in, short spurt but found little thereafter.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，瞬即被超越。居中間之後位置，走第二疊，在催策下保持位置。六百二十米處移至第三疊，入直路時受催策。短暫發力，但其後再無餘力。
owner: Michael T H Lee & Dr Henry Chan Hin Lee

comment: Shifted across from wide draw to fence towards the rear     soon after start. Took inside run in straight and kept on   fairly until tiring final 150m.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘後瞬即留居後列位置，移入內欄。直路上走內疊，保持普通走勢，最後一百五十米呈現疲態。

comment: Fast break, posted outside leader, niggled 600m,            hard-ridden 400m, battled past fading longtime leader at    50m but no match for winner, lost 2nd at wire.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居領放馬外側。六百米處受催策，四百米處受力策。力拼上前，五十米處超越沿途領放的對手，但未能追及頭馬。終點線上失卻亞席。
owner: Kenneth To Kin Ting & Martin To Chun Ting

comment: Settled worse than midfield about 7Ls behind the leader on  the fence, made some ground in straight.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬約七個馬位，走內欄。直路上略為追前。
owner: Wai Siu Kee & Edmond Lee Man Bun

comment: Raced 4-wide in a prominent position far side, shuffled     back towards the rear around the bend, no further           impression.
comment_ch: 對面直路上居前列，走第四疊。轉直路彎時墮居後列。再無表現。

comment: Soon guided to a position behind midfield, saved ground on  inner and 5Ls off the pace throughout, had no offering      final 300M, never a threat.
comment_ch: 出閘後瞬即居中間之後位置。全程走內疊節省腳程，落後領放馬五個馬位。最後三百米再無餘力，從未構成威脅。

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls behind the leader on the      fence, not suited by the very slow pace, one paced home.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬三個馬位，走內欄。極慢步速不合發揮，末段保持同速。

comment: Four wide at turn; under a hold in the Straight.
comment_ch: 四疊轉彎，直路按番住

comment: Ran on comfortably under a hold; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 按住未試，姿態輕鬆

comment: Limited response when asked; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 騎落一般，未見佳處
owner: Clement Ma Kang Ching, Josiah Ma Pok Man & David Ma Yeuk Lai

comment: Jumped well, travelled wide and without cover until 800M    being ridden along to settle outside the leader, in the     early straight was bumped and became unbalanced, finished   disappointing.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，在沒遮擋下走外疊。八百米處受催策，居領放馬外側位置。直路初被碰撞，因而失去平衡。末段走勢令人失望。

comment: Asked at turn; limited response in the Straight.
comment_ch: 轉彎已騎, 直路唔多
owner: Mr & Mrs Arthur Chan Kwan Hung

comment: Bucked out of the gate, and left the rider behind.
comment_ch: 出閘時躍起，在鞍上無人下跑離閘廂。
owner: Mr & Mrs Johnny Ng Sai Chun, Raymond Ng Lok Man and Dr Kevin Ng King Man

comment: Raced on the outside; kept on comfortably for 3rd.
comment_ch: 靠外檔走，輕鬆第三

comment: Quickly into stride, pushed forward to lead on settling     before crossing to fence. Joined up front turning for home, kept on fairly to 200m before tiring.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前領先，移入內欄。入直路時被對手追上，保持普通走勢，二百米處呈現疲態。

comment: Chased the pace early, kept on same pace when pushed along  half-way, flattened out 200M.
comment_ch: 早段追趕領放馬。半程時受推策，保持同速。二百米處洩氣。

comment: Not quickened when under whip at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百開鞭，未見加速

handicap: POK FU LAM COUNTRY PARK HANDICAP
comment: Began awkwardly, then crowded and before settling on rail   5L from leader. Turned in behind wall of horses, got split  350m before forcing way between horses to win close home.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙。其後受擠迫，落後領放馬五個馬位，走內欄。在並列馬群之後向內移入。三百五十米處取得空位上前，繼而被迫在馬匹之間競跑。末段勝出賽事。

comment: Responded fairly when under whip at 300m.
comment_ch: 三百開鞭，反應尚可
owner: Sir Po-shing & Lady Woo, Jackson Woo Ka Biu and The Executors of the Estate of the late Wilson Woo K

comment: Began awkwardly from wide barrier, soon taken across behind runners, last of 10 6-7Ls off the pace, finished off        moderately final 300M.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘笨拙，瞬即自馬群之後切入內疊，十駒中包尾，落後領放馬六至七個馬位。最後三百米走勢普通。

handicap_ch: 皮亞士紀念挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Began fairly, ridden to hold forward position, settling     midfield close to rail. Shaken up top of straight and boxed on one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，在催策下居前列位置。其後居中間位置，走內欄。直路初受催策，保持同速。

comment: Ran on comfortably under a hold for 4th.
comment_ch: 按住第四，姿態從容

comment: Pushed forward from the wide draw early to be one of the    early leaders, 1 off the fence. Looked OK at the 200m, but  looked to lay out away from the whip and only plugged to    the line late.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，早段受推策上前，並排領先，走第二疊。二百米處似乎走勢尚可，但末段在鞭策下看似外閃，僅能保持同速至終點。
owner: Mr & Mrs Patrick Lau Tak Wai and William Lau Man Yuen

comment: Not quicken when clear in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路望空, 未見加速

comment: Ran on comfortably for 2nd when shifted out in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路移出，輕鬆趕上

comment: Always at rear, never looked likely.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列，從未看似有力爭勝。

comment: Settled just off the leaders, pace good, held up 4-2,       closed off strongly when clear and scored.
comment_ch: 居領放馬匹稍後位置，步速頗快。自四百米處至二百米處受困。望空後衝刺強勁，順利掄元。

comment: Broke ok & raced 3 wide with cover midfield until exposed   800m, niggled 550m, driven wide home turn, found nil &      tapered.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，居中間位置，走第三疊，有遮擋。八百米處失去遮擋。五百五十米處受催策。轉直路彎時受催策走外疊，再無餘力及轉弱。

comment: Switched off to last, settled 9-10Ls off the pace, couldn't pick up turning home, never in the picture.
comment_ch: 收慢留居包尾位置，落後領放馬九至十個馬位。轉入直路時未能加速，從未參與競逐。

comment: Fast start & rousted to press early lead, soon taken back   to fore of midfield 1 off with cover, driven very wide      400m, vied for 2nd 300m, tapered in run.
comment_ch: 出閘快速，早段受催策，追迫領放馬。瞬即留居中間之前位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。四百米處受催策，走大外疊。三百米處爭奪第二位，逐漸轉弱。

comment: Taken back from wide barrier, 8Ls off the pace at the tail  of main group middle stages, made some progress up the      fence passing 400M, hampered 150M but not making material   difference to the results.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後留後，中段居主馬群尾列，落後領放馬八個馬位。跑過四百米處時沿欄略為追前。一百五十米處受阻礙，但對賽果沒有實質影響。
