comment: Began nicely from the one draw settling one back on rails   just behind the eventual winner, failed to quicken to       challenge after straightening.
comment_ch: 自第一檔出閘迅速，沿欄居頭馬稍後位置，落後一個馬位。入直路後未能加速上前挑戰。

comment: No early speed but held rail four-back from leader. Had to  switch out in straight to get clear run and finished        strongly.
comment_ch: 缺乏前速，落後領放馬四個馬位，固守內欄。直路上須向外移出以望空，衝刺強勁。

comment: Eased and raced in behind midfield, 5-1/4L behind 2 wide,   swung widest and ran on well to score by 1/2L.
comment_ch: 收慢留居中間之後位置，落後五又四分一個馬位，走第二疊。轉彎時移出最外疊，走勢良佳，以半個馬位之先勝出。

comment: Shifted out in straight; never tested.
comment_ch: 直路移出, 按住未試
owner: Lau Chi Kit, Tony Lee, Kevin Law Hau Wai & John Lo Wah Shing

comment: Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 2 wide, benefited by    the fast tempo, progressed steadily 300M to score.
comment_ch: 受力策保持居中間位置，走第二疊，快步速有利發揮。三百米處逐漸追前，勝出賽事。
owner: Lincoln Ling & Fione Yip Sze Pui

comment: Slow into stride, not pushed, settling along rail towards   the rear. Put under pressure entering straight but found    nothing.
comment_ch: 起步緩慢，未受推策，沿欄居後列。入直路時受催策，但再無餘力。

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader 3 wide      without cover, harmed by the slow pace, kept on one pace to the line.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬四個馬位，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。慢步速不利發揮，保持同速至終點。

handicap: THE HONG KONG RIDING FOR THE DISABLED ASSOCIATION CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港傷健策騎協會盃（讓賽）
comment: Slow into stride, taken to rail, settling towards rear.     Improved position around final turn but only one-paced in   straight.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，切入內欄，居後列。轉直路彎時推進，但直路上僅能保持同速。

comment: Slow to begin; asked to run 2nd but still raced greenly.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，考驗第二，但試來仍覺稚嫩
owner: Mr & Mrs Johnny Wong Chun Nam

comment: Began OK and eased forward to sit handily on the fence      early. Began to run on in the straight, but was bumped and  unbalanced at the 200m and never recovered, only plugging   away late.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，早段上前居前列位置，走內欄。直路上開始發力，但二百米處被碰撞及失去平衡，從未能恢復走勢，末段僅能勉力而為。

comment: Took no part.
comment_ch: 並無參與競逐。

handicap: THE HONG KONG COUNTRY CLUB CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港鄉村俱樂部挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Crowded shortly after the Start. Travelled worse than       midfield along the rail, 6-1/4L behind. Failed to make any  impression.
comment_ch: 起步後不久受擠迫。居中間之後位置，落後領放馬六又四分一個馬位，走內欄。毫無表現。

comment: Moderately away from gate 1, positioned on rail in          midfield, there to turn, kept to inside after               straightening, finished off evenly. (Lame right hind leg    next day morning.)
comment_ch: 自第一檔出閘普通，居中間位置，走內欄。直路彎前居相同位置。入直路後持續走內疊，末段走勢平穩。（賽後翌晨右後腿不良於行。）

comment: Flattened halfway; weakened badly.
comment_ch: 半程洩氣, 乏力墮退

comment: Urged to lead early; ridden out for 2nd.
comment_ch: 望空帶放, 推騎到底

comment: Behind midfield, 2 wide, favoured by fast pace, made minor  ground 200M.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，走第二疊。步速甚快，有利發揮。二百米處略為上前。

comment: Started well & prominent, soon snagged to sit fore of       midfield 1 off with cover, switched out & driven in         contention 440m, briefly vied for 3rd, one paced & tapered  late.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居前列位置。瞬即居中間之前位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。四百四十米處移向外疊，在催策下力拼。一度爭奪第三位，末段保持同速，繼而轉弱。

comment: Began fairly, raced wide behind midfield, peaked on turn,   emptied early in straight and eased.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居中間之後位置，走外疊。直路彎未能再加速，直路初再無餘力，末段收慢。
owner: Jimmy Chung Kwok Man & Dominic Chung Won Lok

comment: On-pace along the rail; flattened in the straight.
comment_ch: 貼欄跟前，直路勁平

comment: Pushed forward, trapped 3 wide just off the leaders without cover, out of fuel 200M.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，居領先馬匹稍後位置，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。二百米處力竭。

comment: Travelled just off the pace near stands rail, shifted in    off the rail for a run 500 metres out, responded well       inside final 150 metres to just get up on line.
comment_ch: 居領放馬稍後位置，靠近外欄競跑。五百米處向內移離外欄取位。最後一百五十米對催策反應甚佳，過終點時險勝。

comment: Cut across behind runners after start; ran on well along the rail.
comment_ch: 起步切入, 沿欄追勢不弱

comment: Always in touch; ran on fairly well for 3rd.
comment_ch: 前後俱備，表現唔曳

comment: Not pressed early and held 3-wide at rear back stretch.     Four-wide around final turn, one-paced in straight. Lame    left front leg.
comment_ch: 早段未受催策，對面直路上居後列，走第三疊。轉直路彎時走第四疊。直路上保持同速。左前腿不良於行。

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY GOLD CHARISMA COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶金飾魅力系列讓賽
comment: Slow break, travelled in behind midfield,  5-1/4L behind    along the rail, continued to make ground steadily for 4th.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居中間之後位置，落後五又四分一個馬位，走內欄。持續穩步上前，跑獲殿軍。
owner: Michael Ng Chun Ho , Randy Chu Wai Ping & Jenny Ng Wing Sum

comment: Lifted his feet off the ground on jumping; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 出閘起擒, 未見佳處

comment: Sent forward to take the fence and led at fast pace, kept   on steadily until final 250M headed.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，移入內欄，以快步速領放。保持穩勢，最後二百五十米被超越。

comment: First out, taken to rail and then settled behind the pace,  some 2L from leader. Closed in top of straight to look a    chance, kept on gamely to 100m before tiring.
comment_ch: 出閘最快，移入內欄，居領放馬之後，落後約兩個馬位。直路初居接近位置，看似有力一爭。保持勁勢，一百米處呈現疲態。
owner: Mr & Mrs James Tien Pei Chun

comment: Pushed forward early from the wide draw to ensure a         position up the front, on the rail. Drifted back to 2nd at  the 800m, 2L off the leader. Had nothing left in the        straight, and went to the line 1 paced late.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後早段受推策上前，以確保取得領先，走內欄。八百米處墮居第二位，落後領放馬兩個馬位。直路上已無餘力，末段保持同速。

comment: Ridden along early, stuck wide first turn, eased to get in, settled beyond midfield 1 off, overracing slightly, 3 wide  650m, couldn't pick up 400m, sprinted very late.
comment_ch: 早段受催策，首次轉彎時走外疊。收慢向內移入，居中間之後位置，走第二疊，略為搶口。六百五十米處走第三疊，四百米處未能加速，末段展開衝刺。

comment: Responded fairly well when asked at turn.
comment_ch: 彎位已騎, 反應不俗

handicap: LEI YUE MUN PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 鯉魚門公眾騎術學校讓賽
comment: Away on terms, eased to midfield spot 6 deep, ridden 450m,  one-paced to line.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，收慢留居中間位置，走外欄第六疊。四百五十米處受催策。保持同速至終點。
owner: Mr & Mrs Anthony Chow Wing Kin

comment: Settled 1 out 1 back, raced strongly throughout, drifted    away 300M without being fully tested.
comment_ch: 居第二疊第二位，沿途走勢強勁。三百米處帶離對手，未能全力發揮。

comment: Three wide at turn; quickened for 2nd.
comment_ch: 三疊轉彎, 加速上前
owner: George Lee Hing Fai, Wong Che Leung, Alan Lee Tat Luen & Wong Chi Kin

comment: No gate speed, back to a clear last & ridden 1600m, niggled 800m, driven 550m, widest into straight, OK very late.
comment_ch: 缺乏前速，居包尾位置，千六米處受催策。八百米處再受催策。五百五十米處亦受催策。入直路時走最外疊，末段走勢尚可。
owner: Julian Hui Chun Hang & Michele Monique Reis

comment: Under a hold throughout; impressive.
comment_ch: 全程扣實, 走勢引人

comment: Hit the front at one stage; just caught to run 2nd.
comment_ch: 一度透出, 埋門被過

comment: Moderately away from gate 11, sent forward to race a length or so back in 4th, 3 wide with no cover on turn, kept on    well in straight to make frame.
comment_ch: 自第十一檔出閘普通，受催策上前，居第四位，落後領放馬約一個馬位。直路彎走第三疊，沒有遮擋。直路上保持佳勢，跑入殿軍。

comment: Tardy start, raced 3 wide with cover near rear, niggled     650m, under pump at tail 500m, found nil & eased.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居後列，在有遮擋下走第三疊。六百五十米處受催策。五百米處再受催策，居包尾位置。再無餘力及收慢。
owner: Donna Cheung Hoi Ling & Vivian Kao

comment: Raced under his own steam; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 按住順走，未受考驗

comment: Faded in straight, tailed out
comment_ch: 直路散晒, 遠遠包尾

comment: Settled just off the pace on rails, soon came to challenge  upon straightening, fought on dourly to gain upper hand     close to home.
comment_ch: 居領放馬稍後位置，走內欄。入直路時瞬即展開挑戰。奮力力拼，接近終點時佔得上風。

comment: Hit the front in the Straight; won comfortably.
comment_ch: 直路透出, 表現輕鬆

comment: Smart start, ridden to lead & to rail 1400m, narrow lead &  driven 420m, headed 380m, found nil & faded out.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。千四米處受催策，取得領先，移入內欄。四百二十米處受催策，以短距離領先。三百八十米處被超越，再無餘力，力竭。
owner: Paul Lo Chung Wai & Kathy Lo Ho Hsiu Lan

comment: Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 2 wide, benefited by    the fast pace, progressed steadily 250M.
comment_ch: 受力策以保持在中間位置，走第二疊。步速甚快，有利發揮。二百五十米處穩步上前。

comment: Settled midfield; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 貼欄居中, 走勢平常

comment: On pace early; hit the front and won when asked late.
comment_ch: 跟前，拉士一騎即透出

comment: Jumped smartly and ridden along to lead, travelled          comfortably mid-race, under strong hold home turn, let down strongly but overpowered final 50m.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策取得領先。中段走勢順暢。轉直路彎時受約束。衝刺強勁，但最後五十米被超越。

comment: Ridden along from an outside draw and left without cover    from 800m towards the rear. Never in the hunt.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受催策。居後列，自八百米處起失去遮擋。從未參與競逐。

comment: Unbalanced on jumping, but recovered to sit just forward of midfield, on the fence. Plugged away solidly in the         straight, without threatening a place.
comment_ch: 出閘時失去平衡，恢復走勢後居中間稍前位置，走內欄。直路上走勢甚佳，但沒有入位機會。
owner: Arthur Antonio da Silva, Betty da Silva & Teresa Marie da Silva

comment: Settled midfield, made steady ground in straight, awkward   late.
comment_ch: 居中間位置。直路上穩步上前。末段處於窘境。

comment: Led with good early speed; kept on well to score.
comment_ch: 速高帶到，靱力十足

comment: Began well, not pushed, settling along fence, 3L from       leader. Lost position final turn but not bustled. Got split between horses 290m, finished strongly to win close home.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，未受推策，落後領放馬三個馬位，走內欄。直路彎失位，但未受催策。二百九十米處在馬匹之間取位上前，衝刺強勁，接近終點時勝出賽事。
owner: Dr Peter Cheng Ming Chuen, Allen Chan Wing Loong, Leung Kwan Tong & Morley Hui Chong Wai

comment: Jumped awkwardly; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 起步論盡，走勢生硬

comment: Eased to rear, 2 wide , pace good, never improved.
comment_ch: 收慢居後列，走第二疊。步速中等，從未能上前。

comment: Came from behind to score when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段考驗，後上掄元

comment: Rolled forward to occupy the box seat, enjoyed the run      behind the leader, ran on well to score by 3/4L.
comment_ch: 上前佔取包廂位置，居領放馬之後，走勢良佳，以四分三個馬位之先勝出。

comment: On-pace along rail; just caught.
comment_ch: 沿欄跟前, 埋門被過

comment: Pushed to occupy the box seat, kept on steadily until final stages weakened.
comment_ch: 在推策下居包廂位置，保持穩定走勢。末段轉弱。

comment: Under whip at turn; tailed off.
comment_ch: 轉彎開鞭，遙遙包尾

comment: Jumped ok; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 起步順利, 騎落肯追

comment: Always in touch; ran on well to score.
comment_ch: 且放且留, 表現甚佳

comment: Jumped away well; led all the way to score.
comment_ch: 起步敏捷，一氣呵成

comment: Jumped away ok; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 起步順利, 走勢平常

comment: Settled midfield; limited response when asked.
comment_ch: 居中跟跑, 騎落欠勁

comment: Being hard ridden when shifted out in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路移出，大力推騎
owner: Mr & Mrs Ronald Lo Yeung Chun

handicap: LEI YUE MUN PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 鯉魚門公眾騎術學校讓賽
owner: Alan Chan Yau Yuet & Chris Chan Cheong Hoi

comment: Never far off the pace, 3Ls behind leader at 400M, going    one pace in the run home, steadied 100M and eased off.
comment_ch: 落後領放馬不遠。四百米處落後領放馬三個馬位。末段保持同速。一百米處收慢。

comment: Led early; ran 2nd but not fully tested.
comment_ch: 主動搶放, 點到即止

comment: Began OK, and taken forward to sit in a handy position 3L   off the leader 1 off the fence. Fading before the turn,     gave nothing late and was eased out.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策上前，居前列位置，落後領放馬三個馬位，走第二疊。直路彎前力竭，末段再無餘力及收慢。

comment: Led early; flattened in straight.
comment_ch: 快放兩段, 直路唔多

comment: Bumped on jumping, but recovered to go forward and sit      around midfield, on the rail. Came wider on the turn, but   never responded to urgings in the straight and was eased up over the last 100m.
comment_ch: 起步時被碰撞。其後恢復走勢，上前居大約中間位置，走內欄。直路彎移出較外疊，直路上從未對催策交出反應。最後一百米收慢。

comment: Taken back soon after start, racing towards rear before     dropping to clear last around turn. Switched out in         straight but failed to muster despite hard riding.
comment_ch: 起步後不久留後，居後列。轉直路彎時墮居包尾位置，遙遙落後。直路上向外移出，儘管受力策，但未能加速。

comment: Responded fairly when asked at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百推騎, 反應尚可
owner: Mr & Mrs Ben Wong Chung Mat and Vincent Wong Yin Shun

comment: Made little progress when being asked late.
comment_ch: 末段推騎, 追番多少

comment: Urged to lead early; stayed on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 刻意搶出，放入一席

comment: Started out from the widest gate. Never created an          impression.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘。毫無表現。
owner: Mr & Mrs Lee Man Bing, Lee Siu Fung and Mic Lee Wing Lun
Mr & Mrs Charley Chan Wing Chin

comment: Jumped with field, ridden to hold rail, gradually edging    forward to lead 1050m. Collared 300m out and faded.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，受催策固守內欄。逐漸上前，一千零五十米處取得領先。三百米處被超越，力竭。

comment: Sat in 3rd chasing the pace, always in firing line, faded   passing halfway point, first to be beaten.
comment_ch: 居第三位，追趕領放馬。沿途居前列。跑過半程時力竭，最先洩氣。

comment: Jumped fairly and settled towards rear, ran home nicely     down middle of track.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，居後列。在跑道中央衝刺良佳。

comment: Slow to begin; quickened momentarily at turn; flattened in the Straight.
comment_ch: 慢閘, 轉彎湧一湧, 直路收工

comment: Not quickened when being hard ridden late.
comment_ch: 末段力策, 未見加速
owner: Ho Sai Chu, Wu Kwok Cheung & Gary Wu Tsz Kei

comment: Settled midfield, travelled 3Ls behind the leader on the    fence, ran on nicely for 2nd.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬三個馬位，走內欄。走勢良佳，跑獲亞軍。

handicap_ch: 新加坡賽馬公會錦標（讓賽）
comment: Travelled in midfield but mostly trapped 3 wide and without cover, dropped off when rounding Home Turn.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，但大部分途程走第三疊，沒有遮擋。轉直路彎時墮退。
owner: Mr & Mrs Philip Ng Yuk Wing and Michael Ng Mun Kit

comment: Took rail and led easily at advantageous slow sectionals,   hung on well until 50M overhauled.
comment_ch: 移入內欄，以有利的慢步速輕鬆領放。保持佳勢，五十米處被超越。

comment: Ran on for 3rd when under whip late.
comment_ch: 末段鞭騎，追回一席

comment: Switched off to the rear early stages, switched out to      3-wide approaching back-straight, improved to midfield but  lost cover from 1200M, run ended 250M, eased when no        chance. (No Vet findings)
comment_ch: 早段留居後列位置，趨近對面直路時移出第三疊，追前至中間位置，自千二米處起失去遮擋。二百五十米處再無餘力，再無爭勝機會時收慢。（賽後接受獸醫檢查，並無發現任何明顯異常之處。）
owner: Mr & Mrs Ben Wong Chung Mat and Vincent Wong Yin Shun

comment: Eased back early and settled at the rear of the field. Wide on the turn and progressed solidly to the line without      threatening a place.
comment_ch: 早段收慢，留居馬群後列。直路彎走外疊。末段以勁勢上前，但未有入位機會。

comment: Hopped at start, under heavy drive to press forward, 3 deep 1st turn, pressed on to lead 1150m, quickly opened up 6L    lead at fast splits, under riding 320m, grabbed 200m,       weakened.
comment_ch: 出閘時一對前腳並舉，受力策上前。首次轉彎時走第三疊。受催策，一千一百五十米處取得領先，以快步速迅速帶離六個馬位。三百二十米處受催策。二百米處被超越，轉弱。

comment: Travelled in behind midfield before the turn, 8L behind 3   wide with cover, improved position when rounding turn, made good ground and finished off gamely for 2nd.
comment_ch: 轉直路彎前居中間之後位置，落後八個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。轉直路彎時上前，追前甚多。末段衝刺強勁，跑獲亞軍。

comment: Under a hold in the Straight; hit the line strongly.
comment_ch: 直路按實，自動湧上
owner: Charles Chan Kam Kwong, Bruce Lee Sing Keung & Yuen Shun Yiu

comment: Settled at rear; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑，未受考驗

comment: Within striking distance always, driven to lead inside 200M and gradually lengthened his advantage towards finish.
comment_ch: 沿途落後領放馬不遠。二百米處受催策上前領先，逐漸帶離群駒掄元。

comment: Under a hold throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 全程扣實，未受考驗

comment: Ran on ok when asked at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百稍騎, 表現不差

handicap: POK FU LAM COUNTRY PARK HANDICAP
comment: Began well, ridden along to hold rail 3L from leader.       Dropped back slightly back stretch, edged forward around    home turn, took inside run in straight and finished off     strongly.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策固守內欄，落後領放馬三個馬位。對面直路上稍微墮退。轉直路彎時上前。直路上走內疊，衝刺強勁。

comment: Box seat, not suited by the fast tempo, ran on strongly to  the line, just beaten by narrow margin in 2nd.
comment_ch: 居包廂位置。快步速不合發揮。走勢強勁至終點，僅以短距離見負，跑獲亞軍。
owner: St Joan of Arc School PSA Syndicate

handicap: THE HONG KONG RIDING FOR THE DISABLED ASSOCIATION CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港傷健策騎協會盃（讓賽）
comment: Pushed hard to lead passing 1250m and then steadied pace.   Kicked clear on straightening for home, still well ahead    200m, run down final stages.
comment_ch: 受大力推策，跑過一千二百五十米處時取得領先。其後收慢步速。入直路彎時加速帶離。二百米處仍遙遙領先。末段被超越。
owner: Melody Kwok Sze Wai & Junbon Chan Chun Bong

handicap: THE BOCHK WEALTH MANAGEMENT JOCKEY CLUB MILE
handicap_ch: 中銀理財馬會一哩錦標
comment: No early pace, dropping back and taken to fence, then       ridden forward settling 3-back from leader. Not much room   top of straight, hampered 250m, kept on nicely to line.
comment_ch: 缺乏前速，墮後並移入內欄，其後受催策上前，落後領放馬三個馬位。直路初空位不足，二百五十米處受阻，保持佳勢至終點。

comment: Got off OK, not pushed, settling in midfield in one-off     position. Hampered 1400m, taken to rail four-back from      leader. Kept on fairly in straight under hard riding.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，未受催策，居中間位置，走第二疊。千四米處受阻，落後領放馬四個馬位，移入內欄。直路上在力策下保持普通走勢。

comment: Held up 3-wide in mid-division, lost cover from 800M,       beaten early straight, eased when no chance.
comment_ch: 留居中間位置，走第三疊。自八百米處起失去遮擋。直路初洩氣，再無爭勝機會時收慢。
owner: The Hon Ronald Arculli GBM GBS JP & Johanna K J Arculli BBS

comment: Jumped well before eased back to find cover, proved         difficult to settle passing 1000M, didn't travel during the race and couldn't finish off on straightening.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，收慢留後以取得遮擋。跑過一千米處時難以穩定走勢，沿途走勢欠順。入直路時衝刺乏力。

comment: Jumped OK, not pressed, taken out to find over and last on  settling. Put under pressure from 400m and ran on           moderately.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，未受催策，向外移出以尋找遮擋，居包尾位置。自四百米處起受催策，走勢普通。

comment: Under restraint midfield; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 扣實居中，未見真章

comment: Saved ground to run 2nd; ran on comfortably.
comment_ch: 慳位上前, 表現從容

comment: Broke well, eased to midfield, shifted 3 wide no cover for  advance 900m & rolled to lead 750m, extended & raced 1.5L   clear turning in, shaken up & drew clear.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，收慢留居中間位置，九百米處移出第三疊推進，沒有遮擋，七百五十米處取得領先。轉入直路時帶離一個半馬位，受催策，掄元。

comment: Outpaced early and trailed field to straight before running on fairly in straight to be closest at finish.
comment_ch: 早段被拋離，尾隨馬群至直路。直路上走勢一般，過終點時最為接近。
owner: Lau Chi Kit, Tony Lee, Kevin Law Hau Wai & John Lo Wah Shing

comment: Steadied start to near tail 3 wide with cover, niggled      700m, widest into stretch & driven, weak effort centre      track.
comment_ch: 起步後收慢，居接近包尾位置，走第三疊，有遮擋。七百米處受催策。入直路時走最外疊，受催策，在跑道中央衝刺疲弱。

comment: Moderate start, raced wide behind midfield, wider entering  straight, kept on steadily without quickening.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居中間之後位置，走外疊，入直路時走更外疊。保持穩勢，未能加速。

comment: On-pace early; weakened late.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢，末段墮退
owner: Vincent Chan Wing Sing & Jason Chan Kam Kwan

comment: Taken back to last, shifted 3 wide 900m, back to 1 off      700m, checked turning in when wide but in pocket, switched  back & widest 210m, kept on for minor inroads.
comment_ch: 留居包尾位置，九百米處移出第三疊。七百米處移回第二疊，入直路時勒避，走外疊但受困，二百一十米處墮後，走大外疊。保持走勢，略為追前。

comment: Lifted its feet on jumping; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 出閘起擒，走勢稚嫩

comment: Jumped fairly, settled behind leaders, issued challenged on straightening and fought strongly to the line.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，居領先馬匹之後位置。入直路時展開挑戰。以勁勢力拼至終點。

comment: Eased back, trapped 2-4 wide, pace good, ran on ok in       straight.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，走第二至第四疊。步速中等。直路上走勢尚可。

comment: On pace early; flattened late.
comment_ch: 前快後平, 欠貫注力

comment: Hard ridden to lead on settling, then set good pace to      straight. Overtaken passing 300m but kept battling to 100m  when swamped.
comment_ch: 受力策取得領先，直路前步速中等。跑過三百米處時被超越，持續力拼，一百米處被後上馬匹超越。
owner: Cheuk Hon Kit, Chung Tai Keung, Roland Leung Wing Cheung & Cheuk Lit Piu

comment: Pushed to settle in front of midfield, 3Ls behind the       leader 2 wide with cover, kept on one pace to the line.
comment_ch: 在催策下居中間之前位置，落後領放馬三個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。保持同速至終點。

comment: Hit the front in the straight; kept on well to score.
comment_ch: 直路透出, 直領到底
owner: Eric Cheng Kam Chung & Vene Cheng Wing Ni

comment: At back, on the fence, never progressed.
comment_ch: 居後列，走內欄。從未能上前。

comment: Bumped on jumping; under whip when clear at 400m.
comment_ch: 出閘挨碰, 四百望空, 開鞭考驗

comment: Wide throughout; quickened to score.
comment_ch: 全程外疊，加速取勝
owner: Albert Ngan Kam Wai, Gordon Ngan Kam Kee & Martin Ngan

comment: Showed good early speed; kept on well for 3rd.
comment_ch: 速高帶放，末段仍勁

comment: Hit the front at 1000m; kept on in the Straight to score.
comment_ch: 一千帶出，直路騎落仲有

comment: Saved ground to make progress; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 慳位上前, 追勢不弱

comment: Slow to begin, detached from the field middle stages, not   made up ground when placed under pressure, never involved.  (Unacceptable Performance.)
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢。中段被馬群拋離。受催策，但未能追前。從未參與角逐。（表現難以接受。）

comment: Began fairly, crowded, but pressed forward 3-wide in        midfield to first turn when shuffled back. Rolled forward   from 500m, 4-wide into straight, one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，受擠迫，但受催策上前，居中間位置，走第三疊。首次轉彎時墮退。自五百米處起上前。入直路時走第四疊，保持同速。

comment: Moderately away, raced prominently, peaked on turn,         weakened gradually in straight and eased final 100M. (Lame  right front and right hind legs; See racing incidents.)
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居前列位置，直路彎未能再增速。直路上逐漸轉弱，最後一百米收慢。（右前腿及右後腿均不良於行，見競賽事件報告。）

comment: Check at start and lost ground, one paced in straight.
comment_ch: 起步時勒避，失地。直路上保持同速。
owner: Chan Kam Hung & Alan Chan Kin On

comment: Always at rear; never in contention.
comment_ch: 無段好睇，墮後跟跑
owner: Yeung Kwok Ki & Cheng Kar Shing

comment: Pushed to midfield, 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide with       cover, despite the fast tempo, one paced home without       threatening.
comment_ch: 受推策居中間位置，落後領放馬四個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。儘管步速偏快，但末段僅能保持同速，未能構成威脅。
owner: Ng Chong Muk, Wong Man & Ng Siu Luen

comment: Fast start & disputed lead, soon edged towards stands rail, 1L 3rd & niggled 500m, ridden 400m, limited response &      tapered late.
comment_ch: 出閘快速，爭奪領先，瞬即移向外欄。五百米處在催策下居第三位，落後一個馬位。四百米處受催策，反應平平，末段轉弱。

comment: Raced midfield, 4.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover,  never ran on.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬四個半馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。從未能上前。

owner: Mr & Mrs Sebastian Man Shiu Wai

comment: Led all the way; hit the line strong to score.
comment_ch: 貫注到底，力度增強

comment: Restrained to race at the rear, 9Ls off the pace middle     stages, saved ground on the inside home turn, closed off    strongly up the fence inside 300M, got up 2nd near line.
comment_ch: 在約束下居後列。中段落後領放馬九個馬位。直路彎走內疊節省腳程。最後三百米沿欄以勁勢衝刺，接近終點時取得亞軍。

comment: Without cover throughout; ran under his own steam.
comment_ch: 沿途望空，按住順走

comment: Jumped fairly, settled in midfield, made no impression in   straight.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，居中間位置。直路上毫無表現。

comment: At rear, travelled 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, closed to the line well.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬六個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。衝刺良佳。

comment: Not hurried early stages, eased back to rear group 5-6Ls    off the pace, saved ground but couldn't find the necessary  response when asked passing 400M.
comment_ch: 早段未受催策，收慢留居馬群後列，落後領放馬五至六個馬位。走內欄節省腳程，跑過四百米處受催策但反應平平。

comment: Quickly into stride, up with pace early but restrained to a position ahead of midfield passing 1200M, not pace to       challenge first 2 entering straight, kept on moderately for non-threatening 3rd.
comment_ch: 展步迅速。早段與領放馬並跑，但跑過千二米處時受約束，保持在中間之前位置。入直路時未能加速對首兩名馬匹展開挑戰。保持普通走勢，跑獲季軍，但未能構成威脅。

comment: Pushed to hold the rail in front of midfield, not suited by the slow sectionals, just held ground in straight.
comment_ch: 受推策固守內欄，居中間之前位置。慢步速不合發揮。直路上僅能保持位置。

comment: Broke well, ridden to hold fence, surging forward to lead   passing 1150m. Skipped 2L clear turning for home but        collared 300m out. Boxed on gamely to 100m before giving    ground gradually.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策固守內欄。受催策上前，跑過一千一百五十米處時取得領先。轉直路彎時帶離兩個馬位，但三百米處被超越。一百米處前以勁勢力拼，繼而逐漸墮退。

comment: Hard ridden to obtain a prominent spot, 2 wide, benefited   by the slow tempo, ran on until 100M flattened.
comment_ch: 在力策下居前列位置，走第二疊。步速緩慢，有利發揮。保持走勢，一百米處洩氣。

comment: Settled behind midfield, switched off rails for a run       turning in, kept on steadily.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，入直路時移離內欄以取位上前。保持穩定走勢。

comment: Always in touch; just caught late.
comment_ch: 前後俱備, 拉士被過

comment: Raced wide; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 外叠競走, 表現一般

comment: Settled at rear; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑, 未見真章

comment: Settled at rear; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑，未見真章

comment: Bumped start, pressed forward but left wide without cover   700m. Three-wide into straight, ran on well.
comment_ch: 起步時與對手互相碰撞，受催策上前，七百米處在沒遮擋下走外疊。入直路時走第三疊，走勢甚佳。

comment: No speed, dropping to rear, becoming clear last along back  stretch. Trailed field thereafter. Never competitive.
comment_ch: 缺乏前速，墮居後列。對面直路上全程遙居包尾位置，其後尾隨馬群。從未見具競爭力。

handicap_ch: 浪琴表國際騎師錦標賽（讓賽）－第四關
comment: Sat behind midfield 6-7Ls behind runaway leader, ran on     under pressure passing 300M but couldn't accelerate enough, no clear run final 100M.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後遙遙領先的領放馬六至七個馬位。跑過三百米處時在催策下上前，但加速不足，最後一百米未能望空。
owner: Rusy M Shroff & Purviz R Shroff

comment: Smart start widest but taken back to 1 off near rear,       driven wide turning in, closed off for sound gains.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘迅速，但留居後列，走第二疊。入直路時受催策，走外疊。末段追前甚多。
owner: Tung Woo Ping, Tung Wai Shing & Tung Sau Man

comment: Good break, stalked lead 1 off stands' rail, travelled      strongly, shaken up 300m, responded to whip from 200m &     quickened to lead 50m, edged away.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，跟隨領放馬，走外欄第二疊。走勢強勁，三百米處受催策。自二百米處起受鞭策交出反應。五十米處加速取得領先，險勝對手。
owner: Karson Choi Ka Tsan & Donnie Yen Chi Tan

comment: Began well, led for a few strides before settling half      length behind and inside leader. Looked chance entering     straight but flattened 200m and weakened.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，領先數步，繼而居領放馬內側半個馬位之後的位置。入直路時看似具爭勝機會，但二百米處洩氣並轉弱。

comment: Last to jump; found nothing when ridden going up the Rock.
comment_ch: 起步最慢，上山已騎，毫無反應
owner: Leung Lun Ping & Sidney Leung Kwun Wa

comment: Urged to lead early; ran on for 2nd when asked.
comment_ch: 搶放第二, 拉士力騎

comment: Settled down 2-wide in midfield, swung wide from 550M,      couldn't go on inside 350M, faded away.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，走第二疊。自五百五十米處起向外移出，三百五十米處再無餘力，力竭。
owner: Mr & Mrs Tam Kwok Chu and Thomas Tam Wing Yiu

comment: Snagged back to settle rail behind midfield, shuffled to    near rear 750m, shifted out home turn & driven, plugged on  one pace.
comment_ch: 收慢移入內欄，居中間之後位置。七百五十米處墮居後列。直路彎向外移出，受催策。保持同速。
owner: Anthony Sham Hon Sum & Jim Fung Kwong Chun

comment: Pressed forward, sat just off the lead 2 wide, not suited   by the fast sectionals, closed off strongly 300M to score.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，居領放馬稍後位置，走第二疊。步速甚快，不合發揮。三百米處衝刺強勁，取得勝利。

comment: On pace early; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，走勢討好

comment: Slow to begin; made progress when asked.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，騎住上前

comment: Began awkwardly, recovered and pressed forward close to     rail to settle 4L behind leader at turn. Under pressure     soon after straightening and gave ground steadily.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙。恢復走勢後受催策上前，靠近內欄競跑。直路彎落後領放馬四個馬位。入直路後瞬即受催策，逐漸墮退。

comment: Urged to lead along the rail; kept on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 搶欄帶放, 力度增強

comment: Hard ridden forward, 2 wide, pace good, ran on well until   100M flattened.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，走第二疊，步速甚快。以佳勢上前，一百米處洩氣。

handicap: HKU FACULTIES OF LAW AND SOCIAL SCIENCES HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 港大法律學院與社會科學學院讓賽
comment: Began well, allowed to slide forward at own speed, settling between horses 3-back from leader. Held for clear run early in straight, took split 350m out, hit from 200m, run down   close to the wire.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，獲許以本身步速上前。居馬群之中，落後領放馬三個馬位。直路初受困，三百五十米處在馬匹之間穿插上前，二百米處領先，接近終點時被超越。

handicap_ch: 其士企業網絡方案讓賽
comment: Quickly into stride, hard ridden to hold lead before        slowing pace approaching turn. Caught passing 250m, kept on gamely to 100m when flattened.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受力策保持領先。趨近直路彎時減慢步速。跑過二百五十米處時被超越。保持勁勢，一百米處洩氣。

comment: Rousted to lead 1300m, to rail 950m, headed 650m & ridden   to vie for advantage, led again 420m, all out & headed      220m, faded out.
comment_ch: 受催策，千三米處取得領先。九百五十米處移入內欄。六百五十米處被超越，受催策爭奪領先。四百二十米處再取得領先。力拼，二百二十米處被超越，力竭。

comment: Very slow away, at rear along the rails, pace good, lack    turn of foot in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘十分緩慢，居後列，走內欄。步速中等，直路上未能加速。

comment: Three wide throughout; never in contention.
comment_ch: 全程三疊, 毫無走勢

comment: Showed good early pace; flattened late; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 前快後平, 毫無好感

comment: Slow into stride and last on settling. Trailed field        thereafter and never competitive.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居包尾位置。其後尾隨馬群，從未見具競爭力。
owner: Dr & Mrs Wilson Ip Chun Heng

comment: Ran on for 4th under whip; moved better than before.
comment_ch: 鞭騎第四, 有點進步

comment: Began well, hugging rail three-back from leader. Closed in  around turn but held for run top of straight. Finished      strongly when clear 250m.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，固守內欄，落後領放馬三個馬位。轉直路彎時追近，但直路初受困。二百五十米處望空後展開強勁衝刺。

comment: Settled 2-wide in midfield, never far off from leader,      outpaced passing 400M, soon beaten and no impression.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，走第二疊，從未遠離領放馬。跑過四百米處時被拋離。瞬即洩氣，再無表現。

comment: Began awkwardly losing ground, ended up in rear pair 8Ls    off the good pace, got past a few beaten runners in         straight, never threatening.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，失地，居最後兩位，落後步速中等的領放馬八個馬位。直路上超越數匹已洩氣對手，從未能構成威脅。

handicap: THE INDIAN RECREATION CLUB CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 印度遊樂會挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Parked outside the leader, 1-1/2L off the pace, not suited  to the quick tempo, not competitive.
comment_ch: 居領放馬外側，落後領放馬一個半馬位。步速甚快，不合發揮。從未有力一爭。

handicap_ch: 其士企業網絡方案讓賽
comment: Jumped well, given early reminders, settling one-back,      one-off. Kept tabs on leading pair to straight, given       another reminder 300m, kept on gamely to line to just miss  quinella spot.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，早段受鞭策，落後一個馬位，走第二疊。跟隨領放兩駒至直路，三百米處再受鞭策。保持勁勢至終點，僅失亞席。

comment: Ridden out form the gate; led all the way to score.
comment_ch: 起步騎出, 愈走愈勁

comment: Sharp break, niggled to dispute lead 1200m, settled close   2nd 1000m, driven 400m, found nil & weakened.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，千二米處在催策下爭奪領先。一千米處居接近的第二位，四百米處受催策。再無餘力，走勢轉弱。

comment: Always at rear; never in contention.
comment_ch: 無段好睇，遠離水準
owner: Mr & Mrs Michael C C Kao, Vivian Kao and Francis Kao Wai Ho

comment: Began awkwardly, severely checked 1500M, settled down       midfield along the fence and shuffled further back hone     turn, picked up strongly from 300M, closing on winner late  just ran out of ground.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，千五米處大力勒避，居中間位置，走內欄。直路彎墮後更遠。自三百米處起加速強勁，末段追近頭馬，僅敗。
owner: Purviz R Shroff & The Executors of the Estate of the late Rusy M Shroff

comment: No daylight in the Straight; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 直路無位，追勢不俗

comment: Jumped well but slow to muster, dropping to rear before     picking up speed wide without cover from 1400m. Wide into   straight, boxed on gamely.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，但未能加速，墮居後列。自千四米處起增速，走外疊，沒有遮擋。入直路時走外疊，其後力拼上前。

comment: Settled midfield; ran on ok.
comment_ch: 居中跟跑, 中規中矩
owner: Mr & Mrs Kenny Cheng Tsin Ki

comment: Wide throughout; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 全程外疊，走勢欠勁
owner: Liang Lo Ching Yung & Rose Ng Kai Ching

comment: Settled behind the leader, 1-3/4L off  2 wide with cover,   not suited to the quick tempo, dropped off approaching 250M.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬一又四分三個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。步速甚快，不合發揮。趨近二百五十米處時墮退。

comment: Settled in midfield along the rail, 5-3/4L off the pace.    Stayed on the rail after the Home Turn and raced inner      track, made ground in the straight.
comment_ch: 沿欄居中間位置，落後領放馬五又四分三馬位。直路上沿欄追前。

comment: Began well, pushed forward from wide draw, settling ahead   of midfield in one-off position. Switched out entering      straight and ran on strongly to just miss a placing.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘良佳，受推策上前，居中間之前位置，走第二疊。入直路時向外移出，走勢強勁，僅失一席。

comment: Smart start, raced handy 3 wide with cover until slotted 1  off 1 back 750m, shifted out to challenge turning in,       narrow lead  250m, headed 180m & tapered.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居前列位置，走第三疊，有遮擋。七百五十米處落後一個馬位，走第二疊。轉入直路時向外移出以展開挑戰，二百五十米處以短距離領先。一百八十米處被超越，轉弱。
owner: Justin Yue Kwok Hung & James Yue Chun Hong

comment: Average to begin, awkwardly placed near 900M, raced 2 wide, 2 lengths or so back, there to turn, made some progress in  straight to get 3rd.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，接近九百米處時處於窘境，走第二疊，落後約兩個馬位。直路彎前居有利位置。直路上略為上前，跑獲第三。
owner: Tung Woo Ping, Tung Wai Shing & Tung Sau Man

comment: Made ground steadily; hung in but still won.
comment_ch: 分段追趕, 內閃仍勝

comment: Jumped fairly, settled in midfield on rails, came under     strong pressure upon straightening, ran on doggedly to      narrowly miss first two.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，居中間位置，走內欄。入直路時受力策。以頑強鬥志力拼上前，僅失前兩名。
owner: Kevin Kwong Ka Wing, Chan Bing Woon, Kwong Wai Bong & Michelle Chan Sin Man

comment: Showed good early speed; stayed on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 馬有速度，放入一席

comment: Began well, taken to fence inside early leader before       taking over running from 600m. Battled strongly in straight but run down close home.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，切入內欄，早段居領放馬內側，自六百米處起領先。直路上以勁勢力拼，接近終近時被超越。

comment: Raced as the back-marker, over 14Ls off the pace mid        stages, pushed along 600M, ran on well to go 4th late       stages but no serious threat to first three.
comment_ch: 居包尾位置。中段落後領放馬逾十四個馬位。六百米處受推策。末段走勢良佳，進佔第四位，但未能對前三名馬匹構成重大威脅。

comment: Settled 3-wide near the rear, pushed wider mid-way through  home turn, wheeled out widest in straight, finished well.
comment_ch: 居後列，走第三疊。直路彎中途在催策下移至更外疊。直路上移至最外疊，以佳勢衝刺。

comment: Ran on ok when being ridden along early.
comment_ch: 起步已騎，反應不差

comment: In worse than midfield along the rail, 4-1/2L behind the    leader, not suited to the slow tempo, improved only         slightly.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬四個半馬位，走內欄。慢步速不合發揮，僅略為追前。

comment: Always held ground; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 不上不落, 未盡全力
owner: Au Kai Kwong & Michelle Jessica Au

comment: First to jump but unable to clear inside runners and kept   3-wide without cover 1L from leader. Kept on well to 200m   before turning one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘最快，但未能帶離內側馬匹。沿途落後領放馬一個馬位，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。保持佳勢至二百米處，其後保持同速。
owner: Stephen So Chi Ming & Samuel Chan Ying Leung

comment: Always at the rear, not a factor.
comment_ch: 一直居後列，未能構成威脅。

handicap: POK FU LAM RESERVOIR ROAD HANDICAP
comment: Dropped back from the wide draw to sit 2nd last by the      1200m, 14L off the leader. Patiently ridden in the          straight, finding a run at 200m. Finished off well, and     only just missed a place.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後留後，千二米處居尾二位置，落後領放馬十四個馬位。直路上伺機上前，二百米處出現空位。末段衝刺甚佳，僅未能入位。

comment: Ran on well when clear in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路望空, 大步肯走
owner: Mrs Kao Chan Ming Man & Cheung Ka Wai

comment: Jumped fairly but soon dropped to worse than midfield, gave further ground from a similar position into straight.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，瞬即墮居中間之後位置。入直路時居相若位置，墮退。

comment: Driven forward from wide barrier, pressed the pace 2-wide,  couldn't go on inside 200M, faded away
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘受催策上前，追迫領放馬，走第二疊。二百米處未能持續上前，力竭。

comment: Broke evenly, settled midfield 1 off, travelled strongly,   pulled centre track and ridden 350m, sprinted quickly,      comfortable win.
comment_ch: 出閘平平，居中間位置，走第二疊。走勢強勁，三百五十米處移至跑道中央，受催策，衝刺強勁，輕鬆取勝。

comment: Shifted across behind runners from wide draw, settling in   last pair in one-off position. Took inside runs in          straight, finished strongly to just miss.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後於馬群之後切入，居最後兩位，走第二疊。直路上走內疊，衝刺強勁，僅敗。

comment: Went to press forward early, before being steadied off      heels soon after jumping and settled forward of midfield, 1 off the fence. Ran on from the 300m. Nosed in front at      100m, and just held out challenger.
comment_ch: 出閘後受催策上前，其後瞬即收慢避開他駒後蹄，居中間之前位置，走第二疊。自三百米處起持續上前。一百米處以短距離領先，過終點時險勝。
owner: Michael T H Lee & Dr Henry Chan Hin Lee

comment: Hit the line strongly when let go late.
comment_ch: 拉士一鬆，佳勢上前

comment: Blocked before turning in; not stretching properly in the Straight.
comment_ch: 入彎前受阻，直路走勢欠順

handicap: THE ASSOCIATION OF HONG KONG RACING JOURNALISTS CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港評馬同業協進會挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Towards the rear along the rail, 5-1/2L off the pace, did   not run on.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬五個半馬位，走內欄。從未能上前。
owner: Ng Wai Hung & Mingo Tang Hing Chee

comment: Restrained to near the rear, 7Ls behind leader, swung       3-wide home turn, closed off well early straight but run    ended 150M.
comment_ch: 在約束下留居後列，落後領放馬七個馬位。直路彎移出第三疊。直路初衝刺良佳，但一百五十米處無以為繼。
owner: Raymond Chow Wai Kam & Lau Wing Sang

handicap: THE HOPEFUL FUTURE FOR YOUTH HANDICAP
comment: Began awkwardly, ridden to make up ground settling 3-back   along rail. Switched out 350m to get run, looked a chance   200m, unable match winner final strides.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙。在催策下追前，落後領放馬三個馬位，沿欄競跑。三百五十米處向外移出取位，二百米處看似具爭勝機會。最後數步未能與頭馬抗衡。

comment: Hit the line strongly when being persuaded late.
comment_ch: 拉士稍騎，衝刺凌厲
owner: Mr & Mrs Simon Suen Siu Man

comment: Caught in traffic late; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 末段受困，未見真章
owner: Sin Tung Hing, Sin Yuk San & Sin Yuk Lok

comment: Settled midfield; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 居中跟跑，走勢一般
owner: Mr & Mrs Dannis Lee Cheuk Yin

comment: Settled midfield throughout; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 沿途居中, 走勢不弱

comment: Fast start, snagged to sit 1 back 2nd, niggled 600m,        hard-ridden into stretch, boxed on until emptied & lost 2nd 130m, faded to wire.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，留居第二位，落後一個馬位。六百米處受催策，受力策入直路，持續力拼，一百三十米處再無餘力，失去第二位，終點前力竭。

comment: OK away and taken forward early to be handily placed behind the leaders, 1 off the fence. Tried to run on from the      turn, but was held up until the 200m, and went to the line  steadily when clear.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，早段受催策上前，居領先馬匹之後的位置，走第二疊。自直路彎起嘗試發力，但受困至二百米處。望空後穩步上前至終點。
owner: Ho Sau Ki & Tommy Ho Chung Shing

comment: Jumped well from the widest draw, raced 2 wide, 5 lengths   or so back, same position on turn, taken wide in straight   and finished off very strongly to score.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘迅速，落後約五個馬位，走第二疊。直路彎居同一位置，直路上移出外疊。衝刺十分凌厲，勝出賽事。

comment: Under a hold and settled midfield; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 按實居中, 未受考驗

comment: Slow to begin; limited response when under whip in the Straight.
comment_ch: 起步最慢，直路鞭騎，反應平常

comment: Up with the pace along rail; kept on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 貼欄跟前, 末段仲有

comment: At back, 2 wide, struggled to keep up with the field in     middle stages, suited by the fast tempo, lack room 400M,    progressed steadily when clear.
comment_ch: 居後列，走第二疊。中段掙扎以跟上馬群。快步速適合發揮。四百米處缺乏空位，望空後逐漸追前。

comment: Bumped start, at back 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace,  held up most straight, ran on ok.
comment_ch: 出閘時被碰撞。居後列，走第二疊。步速緩慢，不合發揮。直路上大部分途程受困，走勢尚可。

comment: Settled in midfield racing one off the rails down far side, came under pressure rounding home bend, worked home         steadily without threatening.
comment_ch: 對面直路上居中間位置，走第二疊。轉直路彎時受催策。末段保持穩勢，但未能構成威脅。
owner: Au Kai Kwong, Yu Chun Hong, Cissy Yu Wing Sze & Winnie Yu Wing Yin

comment: Sat towards the rear 5L off the pace 3 wide with cover, did not run on.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬五個馬位，在有遮擋下走第三疊。未能保持走勢。

comment: Checked at start, then taken closer to the rail from the    wide draw, in behind midfield, 6-1/4L behind 2 wide, kept   on until flattened at 250M.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘時勒避，移近內欄，居中間之後位置，落後六又四分一個馬位，走第二疊。保持走勢，二百五十米處洩氣。

comment: Always at rear, never a factor, tailed out.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列。從未有力一爭，包尾大敗而回。
owner: Mr & Mrs Charley Chan Wing Chin

comment: Bumped start, raced at tail throughout, never competitive.
comment_ch: 出閘時被碰撞，沿途居包尾位置。從未有力一爭。

handicap: THE HONG KONG ST JOHN AMBULANCE BRIGADE CENTENARY CELEBRATION CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港聖約翰救傷隊百週年紀念盃（讓賽）
comment: Broke well & camped rail fore of midfield, overraced 750m & shifted 1 off, close to heels 680m & overraced 500m, shaken up 400m, driven to narrow lead 100m just edged it.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居中間之前位置，走內欄。七百五十米處搶口，移至第二疊。六百八十米處靠近他駒後蹄。五百米處搶口。四百米處受催策。一百米處受催策以短距離領先，僅僅取勝。

comment: Wide throughout; impressive.
comment_ch: 全程望空，走勢討好

comment: Hard ridden to sit in front of midfield, 2 wide, pace good, made ground 300M.
comment_ch: 受力策，居中間之前位置，走第二疊，步速偏快。三百米處追前。
owner: Terence Leung Chi Kin, Patrick Wong Man Kam, Jason Leung Hok Shan & Jeffrey Mark Wong

comment: Slightly slow out settling towards the rear on rails, saved ground turning in, made modest progress without threatening.
comment_ch: 出閘稍慢，沿欄居後列。入直路時走內欄節省腳程。略為追前，未能構成威脅。
owner: Steven Sham Chun Kit & Rosa Lee Sham Suk Fan

comment: Raced genuinely; ran on well from behind.
comment_ch: 後上可人, 口勁收歛
owner: Mr & Mrs Kenny Cheng Tsin Ki

comment: Began awkwardly, unable to slot in, raced 4 wide with no    cover throughout, failed to close off in straight when hard run took effect.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，未能切入內欄，沿途在沒遮擋下走第四疊。走外疊耗力太多，直路上衝刺乏力。

comment: Jumped away well; hit the line strongly to score.
comment_ch: 應聲彈出，愈放愈順

comment: Settled at rear; found nothing when asked.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑, 騎都唔郁

comment: Took early lead, sat behind leader passing 1000M, in touch  top of straight, gave chase hard but unable to sprint       quickly enough over final 200M. (Lame RF leg)
comment_ch: 早段領先，跑過一千米處時居領放馬之後，直路初居啣接位置。奮力追前，最後二百米加速力不足。（右前腿不良於行。）

comment: Ran on ordinary; no improvement.
comment_ch: 走勢平常, 未覺進步
owner: Pauline Ngan Po Ling & Ngan Hei Keung

comment: A shade keen early stages, restrained to race behind        midfield, progress over final 200M, made good late          impression.
comment_ch: 早段略為搶口，受約束，居中間之後位置。最後二百米追前，末段表現良佳。

comment: Quickly away, leading field on settling before crossing to  fence 1100m. Set good pace to straight, kicked 2L clear     passing 300m. Started to shorten stride 100m but managed to hold on for minor placing.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，取得領先，千一米處移入內欄。直路前以中等步速領放。跑過三百米處時帶離兩個馬位。一百米處步幅開始收窄，但仍能保住季軍。

comment: Jumped well, allowed to stride forward at own pace,         settling one-out, one-back first turn.  Steadied 700m when  pace increased, urged forward 450m to hit front 150m,       pulling clear final stages.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，獲許以本身步速展步上前，首次轉彎時居第二疊第二位。七百米處步速加快時收慢。四百五十米處受催策上前，一百五十米處取得領先，末段帶離對手。

comment: Eased back, travelled 6.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with   cover, swung wide turning in, ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 收慢留居後列，落後領放馬六個半馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。入直路時移向外疊，保持普通走勢。

comment: Eased at start, took cover at rear, 8Ls off the leader 2    wide, not suited by the slow pace, unleashed strong         finishing efforts 200M.
comment_ch: 出閘時收慢，取得遮擋，居後列，落後領放馬八個馬位，走第二疊。慢步速不合發揮。二百米處展開強勁衝刺。

comment: Made little progress in straight; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 直路稍追, 未有好感

handicap: THE HONG KONG CHINESE AMATEUR ATHLETIC FEDERATION CENTENARY GOLD CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 華協會百週年紀念金盃（讓賽）
comment: Slow start and raced towards the rear, 4-3/4L behind on the rail, never in contention.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居後列。落後四又四分之三個馬位，走內欄。從未參與競逐。

comment: Taken back at start, widest on straightening, did not run   on.
comment_ch: 起步後留後。入直路時走最外疊，未能上前。

comment: Midfield early; made some ground under whip in straight.
comment_ch: 直路鞭騎，追番多少
owner: Jose Yu Sun Say & Yu Wah Yung

handicap: POK FU LAM RESERVOIR ROAD HANDICAP
comment: Hampered on jumping and eased forward early, eventually     sitting worse than midfield and 1 off the fence. Came       widest in the straight, but only used sparingly in the run  home.
comment_ch: 出閘時受阻礙，早段上前，居中間之後位置，走第二疊。直路上走最外疊，末段略受催策。

comment: Broke well, wide no cover 1st turn, tracked behind 2nd 1    off with cover, driven & shifted out 400m, grinding run to  lead 230m, emptied & headed close home.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。首次轉彎時走外疊，沒有遮擋。其後跟隨領放馬，居第二位，走第二疊，有遮擋。四百米處受催策，移出外疊。奮力上前，二百三十米處取得領先。接近終點時再無餘力，被超越。

comment: Behind midfield, trapped 3 wide, not suited by the slow     tempo, dashed well 200M.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，走第三疊。步速緩慢，不合發揮。二百米處衝刺良佳。
owner: 07/08 Me Tsui Yu Sak Trainer Syndicate

comment: Jumped with field, ridden but didn't muster, dropping to    rear. Held position around turn, swung wide into straight,  ran on strongly under the whip.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘。受催策，但未能加速，墮居後列。直路彎保持位置，入直路時移出外疊。在鞭策下以勁勢上前。

comment: Came out running, clear leader on settling, then put under  a hold. Kicked ahead soon after straightening and went to   the post unchallenged.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，帶離領先，其後受約束。入直路後瞬即加速上前，過終點時未受挑戰。

comment: At back as usual, 2-3 wide, pace good, dashed well 200M.
comment_ch: 如常居後列，走第二至第三疊。步速中等，二百米處衝刺良佳。

comment: Midfield throughout; ran on only fairly when asked.
comment_ch: 不上不落, 騎落一般
owner: Max Ngan Man Hung & Anthony Wu Ting Yuk

comment: Up with the pace; found nothing when under whip at 300m.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢, 三百開鞭, 毫無反應

comment: Slow into stride, ridden but didn't muster, settling in     last pair. Switched out in straight but only one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，受催策，但未能加速，居最後兩位。直路上向外移出，但僅能保持同速。
owner: Mr & Mrs Li Yiu Keung and Clement Li

comment: Chased leaders, raced fiercely when steadied to obtain      cover 1000M, ran on one pace entering straight, couldn't go on 250M.
comment_ch: 追趕領先馬匹，跑來搶口，一千米處收慢以取得遮擋。入直路時保持同速。二百五十米處未能上前。
owner: Mr & Mrs Arthur Wong Chun Mo

comment: Ran on for 3rd when being hard ridden.
comment_ch: 大力推騎, 闖入一席
owner: Nelson Lee Yuk Ming, Norman Ng Si Pang & Eric Poon Hung Cheung

handicap: THE HONG KONG CHINESE AMATEUR ATHLETIC FEDERATION CENTENARY GOLD CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 華協會百週年紀念金盃（讓賽）
comment: Rolled into box-seat, sat 2-1/4L behind the lead, weakened  passing 150M.
comment_ch: 居包廂位置，落後領放馬二又四分之一個馬位。跑過一百五十米處時轉弱。
owner: Cheung Ming Man, Cheung Ying Ho, Freddy Choi Kwok Sai & Joseph Lee Chung Tak

comment: Led early; ran on for 3rd when asked late.
comment_ch: 主動搶放，末段要騎

comment: Began awkwardly from draw 13, towards the rear and no       closer than 3-wide throughout, weakened turning in, soon    left behind. (No vet findings)
comment_ch: 自第十三檔出閘笨拙，居後列，沿途走第三疊或更外疊。入直路時轉弱，瞬即被拋離。（ 賽後接受獸醫檢查，並無發現任何明顯異常之處。）

handicap: POK FU LAM PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 薄扶林公眾騎術學校讓賽
comment: Smart start, early speed to sit handy 3 deep no cover,      snagged 860-m to slot 1 back 1off, soon under pressure &    retreated, under pump 6th turning in, no headway.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，前速快，居前列，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。八百六十米處受阻，落後一個馬位，走第二疊。瞬即受催策及墮退。入直路時居第六位，受催策，未能追前。

comment: Bumped start, ridden to stay with pace, settling midfield   but wide. One-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘時被碰撞，受催策跟上步速，居中間位置，走外疊。直路上保持同速。

comment: Near last, travelled 7Ls behind the leader 2 wide with      cover, never looked competitive.
comment_ch: 居接近包尾位置，落後領放馬七個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。從未看似有力一爭。

comment: Niggled along to be up with the pace; being hard ridden late.
comment_ch: 俾住跟前, 拉士力騎

comment: Eased and raced towards the rear, 5-1/4L behind 2 wide      until shifting to rail at 600M, made minor ground late.
comment_ch: 收慢留居後列，落後五又四分一個馬位，走第二疊。六百米處移入內欄。末段略為上前。

comment: Weakened and dropped off; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 愈跑愈後，毫無表現
owner: Mr & Mrs Wong Shun Yuen and Wong Shing Ngai

comment: Towards the rear hugging the rail on settling, 5Ls to make  up 400M, shifted out to center of track, closed off         moderately over final 250M and no threat to clear cut       winner.
comment_ch: 居後列位置，固守內欄。四百米處落後五個馬位，向外移至跑道中央。最後二百五十米走勢普通，未能威脅穩操勝券的頭馬。

handicap: THE KOWLOON CRICKET CLUB CENTENARY CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 九龍木球會百週年紀念盃（讓賽）
comment: Began well, not pushed, settling close to outer fence       behind midfield. Started forward move 500m, blocked for run until 120m, finished strongly.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，未受推策，居中間之後位置，靠近外欄競跑。五百米處開始上前，受困，一百二十米處望空後衝刺強勁。

comment: Travelled worse than midfield about 6Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, despite hampered early straight, ran on    nicely thereafter.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬約六個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。儘管直路初受阻，其後仍走勢良佳。

comment: Took a few steps to get going, then forged ahead to sit 1L  behind leader in one-off position. Pressed forward on       straightening but unable overhaul winner.
comment_ch: 加速需時，其後發力上前，落後領放馬一個馬位，走第二疊。入直路時受催策上前，但未能超越頭馬。

comment: Niggled along before settling in midfield, similar but      wider entering straight, ran home one-paced.
comment_ch: 受催策，其後居中間位置。入直路時居相若位置，走較外疊。末段保持同速。

comment: Fast start, settled 1 back on rail, niggled 500m, shifted   out turning in, driven 350m, boxed on evenly.
comment_ch: 出閘快速，落後一個馬位，走內欄。五百米處受催策。入直路時向外移出。三百五十米處受催策，保持穩勢。
owner: Lau Chi Tak & Lau Chi Wing

comment: Ridden out for 3rd; ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 推騎入位, 走勢勉強
owner: Lau Yiu Chu, Cynthia Lau, Sandra Lau & Robert Lau

comment: Soon after start became unbalanced, settled behind          midfield, commence to improve passing 500M, shifted out for clear running in early straight, worked home solidly.
comment_ch: 起步後瞬即失去平衡，居中間之後位置。跑過五百米處時開始推進。直路初向外移出以望空。末段衝刺強勁。

comment: Bumped at start, settled midfield, pushed along to improve  home turn and ran on fairly in straight.
comment_ch: 起步時被碰撞，居中間位置。直路彎受推策上前。直路上走勢一般。

comment: Raced keenly behind leader, brief effort passing 400M,      inclined to shift ground under pressure, swamped by rivals  250M, eased late. (No Vet findings / Unacceptable           Performance)
comment_ch: 在領放馬之後跑來搶口。跑過四百米處時一度發力追前，在催策下傾向斜跑。二百五十米處被對手超越，末段收慢。（賽後接受獸醫檢查，並無發現任何明顯異常之處／表現難以接受）
owner: Tommy Ho Chung Shing, Ho Ka Chun, Nancy Ho Kar Mei & Michael Ho Chung Hing

comment: Broke ok, snagged to race back of midfield 1 off with       cover, advanced a spot 1000m, over-raced 800m, shifted wide & driven home turn, outpaced & faded.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，居中間之後位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。一千米處上前。八百米處搶口。轉直路彎時受催策移出外疊，被拋離，力竭。

comment: At back as usual, trapped 3-4 wide, unleashed strong        finishing efforts 300M despite not suited by the slow pace.
comment_ch: 如常居後列，走第三至第四疊。步速緩慢，不合發揮。三百米處以勁勢衝刺。

comment: Began well, raced outside the leader to home bend, folded   up quickly after straightening. (Bled & lame)
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，直路彎前居領放馬外側。入直路後迅速力竭。（流鼻血及不良於行。）

comment: Pressed forward from outside draw, settling 1L behind       leader. Bumped and taken out 400m, checked 200m when giving ground. Minor wound on right hind paster.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後受催策上前，落後領放馬一個馬位。四百米處被碰撞及帶向外跑。二百米處墮退時勒避。右後足系部有一處細小的傷口。
owner: Mr & Mrs Chau Kam Chuen and Helen Chau Hoi Man

handicap_ch: 香港中文大學校友會聯會盃（讓賽）
comment: Began well, pressed forward, holding box seat. Got shuffled back around turn, stayed on fence but only one-paced in     straight.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前，居包廂位置。轉直路彎時墮後。直路上固守內欄，僅能保持同速。

comment: Hard ridden to go forward from widest draw, racing wide     till settling half a length behind leader passing 850m.     Boxed on to 200m before tiring.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘，受力策上前，走外疊。跑過八百米處時落後領放馬半個馬位，二百米處前持續力拼，洩氣。

comment: Made progress when shifted out in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路移出, 自動湧上

handicap_ch: ＰＡＮＡＳＯＮＩＣ快馬加鞭電子高速煲讓賽
comment: Prominent, travelled 2Ls behind the leader on the fence,    not suited by the fast tempo, one paced home for 4th        without threatening.
comment_ch: 居前列，落後領放馬兩個馬位，走內欄。快步速不合發揮。末段保持同速，跑獲殿軍，未能構成威脅。

comment: Eased back 2 wide, pace good, progressed steadily 250M,     just missed by a nose in 2nd.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，走第二疊。步速甚快，二百五十米處穩步上前。僅以一馬鼻位之差見負，屈居亞軍。

comment: Caught the eye when under a hold throughout.
comment_ch: 全程按實，走勢吸引

comment: Began well, hugging fence, settling in box seat. Kept tabs  on leader to straight, took inside run and kept on well     without threatening winner.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，固守內欄，居包廂位置。跟隨領放馬至直路。直路上走內欄，保持佳勢，但未能威脅頭馬。

comment: Settled midfield; limited response when asked.
comment_ch: 不上不落，但騎落一般

comment: Ridden to hold forward position, settling one-off,          one-back. Urged forward final turn, hit front 250m, pulled  clear.
comment_ch: 在催策下保持前列位置，落後領放馬一個馬位，走第二疊。直路彎受催策上前，二百五十米處領先，帶離勝出。

comment: Fairly away from gate 1, raced 5 to 6 lengths back at rear, last turning in, eased early in straight, finished tailed   out, unacceptable performance.
comment_ch: 自第一檔出閘一般，居後列，落後五至六個馬位。入直路時居包尾位置。直路初收慢，遙遙尾隨而回。表現難以接受。

comment: Cut across after jumping; raced under his own steam.
comment_ch: 起步切入，拖住順走

comment: Taken back early; raced under his own steam.
comment_ch: 刻意拖後, 輕抒腳頭

comment: Slow to begin, settled midfield along the fence, driven     350M but made no additional headway over final 200M.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢。居中間位置，沿欄競跑。三百五十米處受催策，最後二百米再無進展。

comment: Began from the widest gate, settled in 5th within 3L of     pace travelling wide without cover, ran home one-paced.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘，居第五位，落後領放馬不逾三個馬位，走外疊，沒有遮擋。末段保持同速。

comment: Ridden to be on-pace; kept on to score under whip.
comment_ch: 推騎跟前, 拉士鞭騎取勝

comment: Began well, ridden to hold rail three-back from leader.     Urged forward from 400m, switched out 280m to get run,      finished strongly.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。受催策，落後領放馬三個馬位，固守內欄。自四百米處起受催策上前，二百八十米處移出外疊取位。衝刺強勁。

comment: Travelled in midfield, 2L behind 2 wide, ran on well from   150M and hit the line strongly for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後兩個馬位，走第二疊。自一百五十米處起走勢良佳，衝刺強勁，跑獲季軍。

comment: Jumped away OK; ran on for 3rd when asked.
comment_ch: 起步順利，稍騎入位

comment: Jumped with field, racing down centre track before edging   towards outer fence passing 800m. Shifted in 400m for clear running and finished strongly to snatch 2nd placing on line.
comment_ch: 對手同步出閘。在跑道中央競跑，跑過八百米處時移向外欄。四百米處向內移入以望空。衝刺強勁，終點線上取得亞軍。
owner: Alan Chan Yau Yuet & Chris Chan Cheong Hoi

comment: Behind mid-division early stages, shuffled further back     midway, 3-wide home turn, couldn't quicken enough to        challenge.
comment_ch: 早段居中間之後位置，半程時墮後更遠。直路彎走第三疊。加速不足以展開挑戰。
owner: Mr & Mrs William Yem Wai Lai

comment: Broke well, eased back to 1 off with cover near rear,       advanced  a spot 1000m, bumped to 3 deep 850m, wide forward move 700m to 4th 500m, scrubbed & no extra, tapered in run.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，收慢留居後列，走第二疊，有遮擋。一千米處略為上前，八百五十米處被碰撞，走第三疊。七百米處在外疊上前，五百米處進佔第四位。受催策，但再無餘力，逐漸轉弱。

comment: Bumped start, pressed forward but 4-wide from outer fence,  settling 3L behind leader at half-way mark. Began giving    ground passing 400m and finished well back.
comment_ch: 出閘時碰撞對手。受催策上前，走外欄第四疊。半程時落後領放馬三個馬位。跑過四百米處時開始墮退，遙遙尾隨而回。
owner: Kwan Shiu Man & Jessica Kwan Mun Hang

comment: Made progress steadily; won comfortably.
comment_ch: 分段加快，姿態輕鬆

comment: Jumped fairly, settled just worse than midfield on rails,   saved ground on rails around home bend and into straight,   kept on well to finish.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，沿欄居中間稍後位置。轉直路彎及入直路時走內欄節省腳程。保持佳勢至終點。

comment: Rolled forward to take the rail and led by 3/4L, despite    suited to the slow pace, weakened and headed after 200M.
comment_ch: 上前移入內欄，領先四分三個馬位。儘管慢步速適合發揮，但過了二百米處後轉弱及被超越。

comment: Slow into stride, taken to rail and improved to behind      midfield. Put under pressure on straightening but only      one-paced.
comment_ch: 起步緩慢，其後移入內欄，推進至中間之後位置。入直路時受催策，但僅能保持同速。

comment: Led all the way to score.
comment_ch: 應聲彈出，一放而回

comment: Hard ridden forward, took rail and led at slow sectionals,  hung on until 200M emptied.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，移入內欄，以慢步速領放。保持走勢，二百米處再無餘力。

comment: Settled in midfield, came under pressure turning in, soon   faded. (Epiglottic entrapment)
comment_ch: 居中間位置，入直路時受催策。瞬即力竭。（會厭被覆蓋。）

comment: Began fairly, unable to go early pace and soon last along   rail. Never likely.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，缺乏前速，瞬即居包尾位置，沿欄競跑。從未有力一爭。
owner: Mr & Mrs Senta Wong and Vinci Wong

comment: Smart break, relaxed to midfield & shifted 1 off with       cover, steadied off heels exiting back stretch, dropped to  rail 700m, shaken up 430m, quickened between rivals 350m,   driven to lead 120m, worked clear.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，放鬆競跑，居中間位置，移至第二疊，有遮擋。離開對面直路時收慢避開他駒後蹄。七百米處移入內欄。四百三十米處受催策。三百五十米處在對手之間加速。一百二十米處受催策領先，帶離勝出。

comment: Began well, pressed forward, holding rail 2-back from       leader. Had to switched ground in straight to get run,      boxed on.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。受催策上前，落後領放馬兩個馬位，固守內欄。直路上須轉換跑線以取位。持續力拼。

comment: Under a hold; ran on strong after the post.
comment_ch: 按住順走, 過終點後餘勢強

comment: Raced in worse than midfield, 3-3/4L off 3 wide with cover, kept pushing but dropped off near 250M.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後三又四分三個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。持續力拼，但接近二百五十米處時墮退。

comment: Jumped with field and quickly taken to outer fence,         settling one-away about 3L from leader. Switched out        passing 400m and made ground gradually to be closest at the finish.
comment_ch: 與馬群同步出閘，瞬即被帶出外欄，走外欄第二疊，落後領放馬約三個馬位。跑過四百米處後移出外疊，徐徐上前，終點前最接近。

comment: Began OK, crossed in from wide draw to settle along fence   three-back from leader. No run early in straight, shifted   out, finished strongly down centre-track.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘普通，切入內欄，落後領放馬三個馬位。直路初無路可上，移向外疊。直路上在跑道中央衝刺凌厲。

comment: Front rank at break, snagged & drifted back, outpaced &     niggled 3rd last 800m, 4 deep no cover on turn, last into   stretch, found nil.
comment_ch: 出閘時居前列位置，收慢留後，被拋離，受催策，八百米處居尾三位置。直路彎走第四疊，沒有遮擋。包尾入直路，再無餘力。

handicap: THE TUNG WAH GROUP OF HOSPITALS 145TH ANNIVERSARY CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 東華三院一百四十五周年挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Hard ridden but wide to lead on settling then set slow      pace. Kept on strongly when passed 350m but flattened final strides.
comment_ch: 在力策下領先，走外疊，以緩慢步速領放。保持勁勢，三百五十米處被超越，最後數步洩氣。
owner: Mr & Mrs Kenny Cheng Tsin Ki

comment: Wide throughout; never tested.
comment_ch: 蝕位競走, 未見真章

comment: Led along the rail; hit the line strong to score.
comment_ch: 貼欄快放，愈跑愈勁
owner: Mr & Mrs James Tien Pei Chun

handicap: LEI YUE MUN PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 鯉魚門公眾騎術學校讓賽
comment: Fair break & niggled along 2.5L back, under pump 500m,      shifted centre 350m, plugged on one pace.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，受催策，落後兩個半馬位。五百米處受催策。三百五十米處移至跑道中央，保持同速。

comment: Held up near the rear, soon outpaced entering straight,     eased when no chance final 150M.
comment_ch: 留居後列。入直路時瞬即被拋離。最後一百五十米失去爭勝機會，因而收慢。

comment: Raced in midfield along the rail, 3-3/4L behind the leader, finished off well inside final 150M for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬三又四分三個馬位，沿欄競跑。最後一百五十米衝刺良佳，取得季軍。

comment: Rearward early; made some ground under whip in straight.
comment_ch: 直路鞭騎，追番多少

comment: Caught the eye when came home strong to score centre of track.
comment_ch: 中檔竄上, 表現吸引

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY HUGGING FAMILY COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶抱抱家庭系列讓賽
comment: At back, travelled 7Ls behind the leader along the fence,   not suited by the very slow sectionals, made some ground in straight without threatening.
comment_ch: 居後列位置，落後領放馬七個馬位，走內欄。步速十分緩慢，不合發揮。直路上略為追前，未能構成威脅。

comment: Towards the rear, over 10Ls off the strong pace in middle   stages, last turning home, ran on moderately without        threatening.
comment_ch: 居後列。中段落後步速甚快的領放馬逾十個馬位。轉直路彎時居包尾位置。走勢普通，未能構成威脅。

comment: Steadied after start, shifted across to rail, became        unbalanced first turn, then made up ground settling 3-back  from leader. Kept on early in straight before tiring final  200m.
comment_ch: 起步後收慢，移入內欄。首次轉彎時失去平衡。其後追前，落後領放馬三個馬位。直路初保持走勢。最後二百米漸呈疲態。

comment: Taken back, travelled 5Ls behind the leader 3 wide with     cover, not suited by the slow sectionals, unable to show    make any impression in straight.
comment_ch: 留後，落後領放馬五個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。慢步速不合發揮。直路上未能構成威脅。

comment: Dashed on well to make minor inroads late.
comment_ch: 拉士稍追，餘勢猶強

comment: Speed to vie for initial lead on rail, soon nudged along    under pressure, 4th & driven 400m, drifted in & boxed on    evenly.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，早段爭奪領先，走外欄。瞬即受催策，四百米處居第四位，再受催策，向內移入，穩步上前。

comment: Taken back from wide gate to rail near tail, niggled along, under pump 400m, hard-ridden & plugged in for moderate      progress.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後留居接近包尾位置，走內欄，受催策。四百米處受催策。其後受力策，略為上前。
owner: Fung Wing Chung, Kenneth Fung King Keung, Patrick Fung King Hung & Monica Fung Mun Sin

comment: Began well, racing with leading pack before settling in box seat passing 1400m. Boxed on gamely in straight before      tiring final 200m.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。與領放馬匹並跑，跑過千四米處時居包廂位置。直路上力拼上前，最後二百米漸呈疲態。

comment: Very slow away, never better than midfield along the fence.
comment_ch: 出閘十分緩慢，從未超逾中間位置，走內欄。
owner: Brandon Lau, Gilda Liu, Gabrielle Liu & Issac Liu

comment: Broke with others, raced centre track back of midfield,     niggled early, under pump 450m, found nil & faded out       tamely.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，居中間之後位置，在跑道中央競跑。早段受催策。四百五十米處受催策，再無餘力，力竭敗退。

comment: Hit the front at 200m; ran on well to score.
comment_ch: 二百透出, 直奔終點

comment: No early pace, racing behind main bunch on settling but     well away from outer fence. Took closer order passing 400m  but only one-paced under hard riding.
comment_ch: 缺乏前速。居主馬群之後，遠離外欄競跑。跑過四百米處時追近，但在力策下僅能保持同速。

comment: Settled midfield, tried to issue challenge on straightening but unable to quicken.
comment_ch: 居中間位置。入直路時嘗試展開挑戰，但未能加速。
owner: Mr & Mrs Anthony Chow Wing Kin

comment: Smart break & bustled forward to lead 5 deep at 1480m,      headed 1250m & sat 2nd outside leader, niggled 500m, driven 400m, emptied 150m & faded out.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。受催策上前，一千四百八十米處領先，走第五疊。一千二百五十米處被超越，居領放馬外側的第二位。五百米處受催策，四百米處再受催策。一百五十米處再無餘力，繼而力竭。

comment: Came home strong when shifted out in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路移出，勁勢撲上
owner: Julian Hui Chun Hang & Michele Monique Reis

comment: Jumped well, settled in rear of midfield, 4-wide rounding   home bend, forced to steady 300 metres out, kept on same    pace under pressure.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居中間之後位置。轉直路彎時走第四疊。三百米處須收慢。其後在催策下保持同速。
owner: Mr & Mrs Stephen Lee Hoi Yin

comment: Pressed forward from an outside draw, racing 3-wide without cover 3L from leader to turn. Taken very wide in straight,  kept on fairly to 200m before tiring.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，受催策上前。直路彎前落後領放馬三個馬位，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。直路上走大外疊，二百米處前保持普通走勢，其後洩氣。

comment: Not stretching out; ran last.
comment_ch: 出腳欠順，包尾而回
owner: Dr Chan Kuen Ting, Dr Law Chiu Fung, Dr William Ignace Wei & Ruby Hui Like Sea

comment: Bumped on jumping and taken back from the wide barrier to   sit at the rear of the field, 1 off the fence. Ran on       steadily in the straight, without ever threatening to place.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘時被碰撞，留居馬群後列，走內欄。直路上穩步上前，但未有機會入位。

comment: Raced at rear; never in contention.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑, 從未參予競逐

comment: Dropped back early to sit last, 1 off the fence. Came       widest on the turn and only ran on fairly when asked in the straight. Struggled to make up ground, and only beat home a couple easing out.
comment_ch: 早段墮居包尾位置，走第二疊。直路彎走最外疊。直路上受催策，但僅能保持一般走勢。掙扎上前，末段僅能超越兩匹正在收慢的對手。
owner: Stanley Chiang Li Biau & Howard Yung Kung Ho

comment: Sharp start, soon to rail & sat 1 back, ridden 250m & edged 1 off, kept on one pace.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，瞬即落後領放馬一個馬位，走內欄。二百五十米處受催策，走第二疊。保持同速。
owner: James Ngai & Joseph Hui Ying Biu

handicap: THE HONG KONG RACEHORSE OWNERS ASSOCIATION TROPHY (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港馬主協會錦標（讓賽）
comment: Jumped well from a wide draw, sent forward to race outside  leader, shared lead on turn, kept on very well in straight  to score.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘迅速，受催策上前，居領放馬外側位置。直路彎並排領先。直路上保持甚佳走勢，取得勝利。
owner: Hui Leung Wah & Hui Chun Yuen

comment: Pressed forward from an outside gate to race behind the     pace before moving forward outside leader around turn. Kept on fairly to 200m before flattened.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受催策上前，居領放馬之後。轉直路彎時發力上前，居領放馬外側。二百米處前保持普通走勢，其後洩氣。

comment: Taken behind from widest gate, niggled along 2nd last,      ridden turning in, found nil & eased when beaten.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後留後，受催策，居尾二位置。入直路時受催策，再無餘力，洩氣及收慢。
owner: Raymond Chow Wai Kam, Lau Wing Sang & Enrico Chow Yue Hin

comment: Led centre track; flattened late.
comment_ch: 中檔搶放, 拉士轉弱

comment: Settled just in front of midfield, 3-1/2L off 3 wide        without cover, gave ground on straightening and finished    tailed out.
comment_ch: 居中間稍前位置，落後三個半馬位，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。入直路時墮退。尾隨而回。

comment: Jumped smartly and sent forward to settle on speed,         quickened nicely at 400m to take lead, fought on strongly   final 200m to go down narrowly.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前，居前列競跑。四百米處以佳勢加速，取得領先。最後二百米以勁勢力拼，以短距離見負。
owner: Joe Ho Kui Yin & Ricky Lee Chi Hung

comment: Ridden forward, trapped 3 wide until cleared and shifted in to race outside the lead near 700M, emptied near 100M.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，走第三疊直至帶離對手。接近七百米處時向內移入，居領放馬外側位置。接近一百米處時力竭。

comment: Eased to sit behind midfield along the rails, pace good, no turn of foot in straight, on heels 250M.
comment_ch: 收慢留居中間之後位置，走內欄。步速甚快，直路上未能增速。二百五十米處靠近他駒後蹄。

handicap: THE HEUNG YEE KUK 90TH ANNIVERSARY CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 鄉議局九十周年盃（讓賽）
comment: Began well, settling one-back, one-off. Steadied turning    for home, looked chance passing 300m, then one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，落後一個馬位，走第二疊。轉直路彎時收慢，跑過三百米處時看似有力爭勝，其後保持同速。
owner: Cheung Ming Man, Cheung Ying Ho, Freddy Choi Kwok Sai & Joseph Lee Chung Tak

comment: Cruised forward early and settled behind midfield. Had to   come wide in the straight to get clear running, eventually  kicking at 200m. Ran very strongly from that point.
comment_ch: 早段上前，居中間之後位置。直路上須移至外疊望空。二百米處發力，衝刺凌厲。
owner: Chadwick Mok Cham Hung, Wong Wing Hong & Wilson Lam Jing Shing

comment: Bumped and unbalanced start then hard ridden to hold        forward position and prevent leader from crossing. Took     over lead 1200m, kept on well to 150m before giving ground.
comment_ch: 出閘時被碰撞，失去平衡，其後在力策下居前列，避免領放馬切入內欄。千二米處取得領先。保持佳勢至一百五十米處，其後墮退。

handicap: THE HONG KONG GOLF CLUB CENTENARY CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港高爾夫球會百週年紀念盃（讓賽）

comment: Always at rear, never ran on.
comment_ch: 一直居後列，從未能上前。

comment: Speed to lead & bustled, headed 960m, shuffled to 1 back 1  off, shifted 3 deep 400m, driven into stretch, boxed on one pace.
comment_ch: 加速上前領先，受催策。九百六十米處被超越，墮居領放馬一個馬位之後的位置，走第二疊。四百米處移至第三疊。入直路時受催策，保持同速。

comment: Had a hold throughout; finished at rear.
comment_ch: 按住未試, 包尾而回

comment: Pushed to midfield, 5.5Ls behind the leader on the fence,   despite the very slow tempo, made minor ground in straight.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，居中間位置，落後領放馬五個半馬位，走內欄。儘管步速十分緩慢，直路上略為上前。

comment: Rolled forward to obtain box-seat 3L behind. Stayed on the  rail after turn and raced inner track, weakened after 200M.
comment_ch: 上前佔取包廂位置，落後三個馬位。轉彎後固守內欄，過了二百米處後轉弱。

comment: Found nothing when ridden coming down the Rock.
comment_ch: 落山已騎, 不進反退
owner: Wu Wei Lam & Kenneth Wu Kai Chung

comment: Up with the pace; ran on strongly in the straight for 2nd.
comment_ch: 跟前，直路愈追愈近
owner: Albert Ngan Kam Wai, Gordon Ngan Kam Kee & Martin Ngan

comment: Taken back early; came home strongly from behind.
comment_ch: 留前試後，追勁十足

handicap: AUDEMARS PIGUET ROYAL OAK CONCEPT HANDICAP
comment: Began well, pressed forward, 2-back along rail. Switched    out turning for home, began run 300m out, finished strongly to win on line.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前，落後兩個馬位，走內欄。轉直路彎時向外移出。三百米處開始發力，末段衝刺強勁，終點線上取勝。
owner: Hui Leung Wah & Hui Chun Yuen

comment: Fast into stride, took the lead easily, uncontested         throughout, kicked clear early in straight and scored       comfortably. (Lost left front plate shortly after the       start.)
comment_ch: 展步迅速，輕鬆取得領先。沿途未受挑戰，直路初加速帶離對手，輕鬆取勝。（起步後不久失去左前蹄的蹄鐵。）
owner: Mr & Mrs Vincent To Wai Keung

handicap_ch: 浪琴表國際騎師錦標賽（讓賽）－第四關
comment: Positively ridden, always close up behind leader, ran on    well to go 2nd near finish, held by winner.
comment_ch: 受積極催策，沿途緊隨領放馬。以佳勢上前，接近終點時進佔第二位，但未能超越頭馬。

comment: Not quickened when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路推騎，未見加速

comment: On-pace early; asked late.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，拉士要俾

comment: Settled 2-wide behind midfield from the widest gate, met    minor interference 900 metres out, made short-lived effort  around home bend, but one-paced under pressure from 5L 7th  into straight.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後居中間之後位置，走第二疊。九百米處受輕微干擾。轉直路彎時一度發力上前，入直路時居第七位，落後五個馬位，受催策，但僅能保持同速。
owner: Chan Wing Kwan, Chang Wing Yiu & Cheung Kwok Wa

comment: Asked at turn; came from behind for 3rd.
comment_ch: 轉彎已騎, 後上第三
owner: Hau Shiu Kai & Gigi Hau Ying Chi

comment: Travelled front of midfield on rail, pushed along passing   500M, quickened after 200M, came home strongly.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，沿欄競跑。跑過五百米處時受推策。過了二百米處後加速。衝刺強勁。

comment: Hampered on jumping and lost ground, but still managed to   push forward and find a position forward of midfield, on    the fence. Under pressure before the straight and ran flat  in the straight. Vet-cut to off hind tendon.
comment_ch: 出閘時受阻礙，因而失地，但仍能受推策上前，居中間之前位置，走內欄。直路前受催策，直路上走勢平平。賽後接受獸醫檢查，發現右後腿肌腱部位有一處割傷。

comment: Slow to begin; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 起步放唔出, 毫無表現

comment: Pushed to keep up in midfield, 2 wide, just held ground in  final stages.
comment_ch: 受推策保持居中間位置，走第二疊。末段僅能保持位置。
owner: Dr Henry Kao So Ping, Geoffrey Edward Kao & Timothy Daniel Kao

comment: Crowded on jumping; failed to respond.
comment_ch: 起步擠迫，走勢欠勁

comment: Settled in box seat, pace good, lack room 400M, ran on      fairly when clear.
comment_ch: 居包廂位置，步速中等，四百米處缺乏空位，望空後走勢一般。
owner: Mr & Mrs Vincent To Wai Keung

comment: At back, along the fence, pace good, never improved.
comment_ch: 居後列，走內欄。步速中等，從未能上前。

handicap: AUDEMARS PIGUET LADY ROYAL OAK OFFSHORE HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 愛彼ＬＡＤＹ　ＲＯＹＡＬ　ＯＡＫ　ＯＦＦＳＨＯＲＥ讓賽
comment: At back, 3 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, made steady    ground 350M.
comment_ch: 居後列，走第三疊。步速甚快，有利發揮。三百五十米處以穩定走勢上前。
owner: Dr & Mrs Horace Ngan Kit Keung

comment: Bumped on jumping and cruised forward early to sit          midfield, 3 wide with limited cover. Came wide on the turn  and ran on steadily in the straight.
comment_ch: 出閘時被碰撞，早段上前佔取中間位置，走第三疊，略有遮擋。直路彎移出外疊，直路上穩步上前。

comment: Not hurried early stages, dropped back to the rear over 7Ls behind leaders, didn't respond to riding passing 500M,      never involved.
comment_ch: 早段未受催策，墮居後列，落後領先馬匹逾七個馬位。跑過五百米處時受催策但毫無反應，從未參與競逐。
owner: Stephen Ho Wai Man, Fred Ho Ka Chun & Derek Ho Ka Chung

comment: Very slow away, never competitive.
comment_ch: 出閘十分緩慢。從未有力一爭。

comment: Eased to sit in midfield, 2 wide, pace good, just held      ground in straight.
comment_ch: 收慢留居中間位置，走第二疊，步速中等。直路上僅能保持位置。

comment: Speed to lead & bustled initially, to rail 1300m, narrow    lead & shaken up 400m, kicked clear & held advantage to     wire.
comment_ch: 加速上前取得領先，早段受催策，千三米處切入內欄。四百米處以短距離領先，受催策，帶離對手，保持優勢至終點。

comment: Settled in midfield along the rail, 6L off the pace, harmed by the slow tempo, ran on steadily for 4th.
comment_ch: 沿欄居中間位置，落後領放馬六個馬位。步速緩慢，不利發揮。穩步上前，跑獲殿軍。

comment: Responded well for 3rd when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段推騎, 反應不俗
owner: Vijay Harish Mohinani, Nilesh Murli Sajnani & Jaikishin Ishwardas Daswani

comment: Ridden to grab forward position from an outside draw,       racing wide without cover 1.5L from leader. Kept on well to 200m before tiring.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後受催策，佔取前列位置，落後領放馬一個半馬位，在沒遮擋下走外疊。保持佳勢至二百米處，其後呈現疲態。
owner: Stanley Tsang Ming Chit & Raymond Chu Wai Hang

comment: Began awkwardly, ridden to hold midfield position, checked  800m, struck heels and blundered 700m. One-paced in         straight.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，在催策下居中間位置。八百米處勒避，七百米處踏著他駒的後蹄及失蹄。直路上保持同速。
owner: Helena Wai Suk Chong & Cheung Kwok Wing

comment: Up with pace; ran 3rd when under whip in the Straight.
comment_ch: 跟前, 直路鞭騎第三
owner: Emily Wong Man Yan & Wong Ying Sheung

comment: Pressed on from a wide gate, travelled wide without cover   in a prominent position, dropped out under pressure from    rounding home bend.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，受催策，居前列，走外疊，沒有遮擋。自直路彎起在催策下墮退。

comment: Ran on ordinary; finished last.
comment_ch: 愈跑愈後，包尾而回

handicap: THE CRAIGENGOWER CRICKET CLUB CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 紀利華木球會挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Sharp break, prominent early, steadied 620m to sit 1 back   on fence 550m, edged out & driven turning in, kept on       evenly.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，早段居前列位置。六百二十米處收慢，五百五十米處落後領放馬一個馬位，走內欄。入直路時移向外疊及受催策，保持穩定走勢。

handicap_ch: 香港特區行政長官盃（讓賽）
comment: Prominent, despite trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, kept on strongly until final 100M headed by the winner,     hung on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居前列位置，沿途走第三疊，沒有遮擋。保持勁勢，最後一百米被頭馬超越。保持走勢，取得季軍。

comment: Difficult to load; weakened at turn; tailed off.
comment_ch: 入閘扭計, 轉彎乏力, 遠遠包尾

comment: At back, travelled 9Ls behind the leader on the fence,      saved ground turning in, ran on nicely for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬九個馬位，走內欄。入直路時走內欄節省腳程。以佳勢上前，跑獲季軍。

comment: Urged forward to obtain box-seat, travelled 1-1/2L behind   the leader, little dash after straightening, weakened at    200M.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，佔取包廂位置，落後領放馬一個半馬位。入直路後略為上前。二百米處轉弱。

comment: Taken back early; came home strong from behind.
comment_ch: 留前試後，效果理想

comment: Got off OK, not pushed, last on settling. Moved up 1700,    taken wider 1500m, surged forward from 800m but run ended   400m, faded.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，未受推策，包尾。千七米處上前，千五米處移出較外疊。自八百米處起受催策上前，但四百米處無以為繼，力竭。

comment: Jumped with field, ridden to hold rail 3-back from leader   back stretch. Improved around turn but one-paced final 200m.
comment_ch: 與對手同步躍出，受催策固守內欄。對面直路上落後領放馬三個馬位。轉直路彎時推進，但最後二百米保持同速。

comment: On pace but wide; being hard ridden late.
comment_ch: 外疊跟前，末段力騎
owner: Dr & Mrs Wilson Ip Chun Heng

comment: Away nicely then raced one-out behind midfield. Swung wide  entering straight, finished strongly while hanging in under pressure near 250m.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，其後居中間之後位置，走第二疊。入直路時向外移出，接近二百五十米處時在催策下內閃，以勁勢衝刺。

comment: Ridden early to hold forward position, grabbing box seat    first turn, 4L from leader. Took inside run in straight,    but only one-paced under hard riding.
comment_ch: 早段在催策下保持居前列位置，首次轉彎時奪取包廂位置，落後領放馬四個馬位。直路上走內疊。受力策，但僅能保持同速。

handicap: POK FU LAM PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 薄扶林公眾騎術學校讓賽
comment: Broke ok, settled midfield 1 off with cover, 3 wide on      turn, peeled 4 deep & shaken up 400m, quickened to 2nd      250m, held in run.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居中間位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。直路彎走第三疊，四百米處移至第四疊及受催策。二百五十米處加速上前進佔第二位，末段保持位置。

comment: Under whip to take the lead; ran 3rd when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 開鞭搶出，直路再騎

comment: Settled worse than mid, failed to run on.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，未能上前。

comment: Jumped ok; ran on for 3rd with plenty in hand.
comment_ch: 起步順利，輕易入位，有餘未盡

comment: Tardy start; ran on for 2nd when asked late.
comment_ch: 起步麻麻, 末段稍騎入位

comment: Niggled after start to hold forward position before         settling one-out, 3L from leader back stretch. Rolled       forward to race outside leader 600m when pace slackened.    Took over running 350m, no extra when joined 150m.
comment_ch: 出閘後受催策，居前列，對面直路上落後領放馬三個馬位，走第二疊。六百米處步速減慢時上前居領放馬外側位置。三百五十米處帶頭。一百五十米處被追上，再無餘力。

comment: Even break, settled midfield on rail, lost place 500m,      ridden 440m, scrubbed along 270m, responded, made up handy  late ground.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，沿欄居中間位置。五百米處失位。四百四十米處受催策。二百七十米處受催策，走勢甚佳，末段追前。

comment: Settled midfield, travelled 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide    with cover, never ran on.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬六個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。從未能上前。

comment: Settled down 4Ls in mid-division, couldn't quicken turning  home, soon out of it and weakened noticeably final 100M.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後四個馬位。轉直路彎時未能加速，其後瞬即力竭，最後一百米顯著轉弱。

comment: Sluggish & bumped at start, soon improved to midfield on    rail, overraced 900m to 600m, ridden 350m, shifted out      200m, stayed on moderately.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，受碰撞。瞬即推進至中間位置，走內欄。九百米處至六百米處搶口，三百五十米處受催策，二百米處移出外疊。保持普通走勢。
owner: Mr & Mrs Sebastian Man Shiu Wai

comment: Up with the pace; kept on one-paced in the Straight.
comment_ch: 跟放，直路保持同速

comment: Travelled in midfield, 6-1/4L behind along the rail, no     dash and one paced in the run home.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬六又四分之一個馬位，走內欄。直路上保持同速，衝刺乏力。

comment: Even break, ridden to press forward, settled 2nd 1 off,     under pressure 400m, faded meekly.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策上前，居第二位，走第二疊。四百米處受催策，逐漸力竭。

comment: Pushed forward to obtain the box seat, kept on one pace     until final 100M weakened.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，佔取包廂位置。保持同速，最後一百米轉弱。

comment: Rolled forward to obtain the box seat, benefited by the     slow pace, ran on well for 3rd in a bunched finish.
comment_ch: 上前佔取包廂位置。步速緩慢，有利發揮。以佳勢上前，在多駒幾乎齊過終點下取得季軍。

comment: No early pace, racing behind midfield along fence. Switched out home turn to get clear passage and ran on fairly to     just miss the frame.
comment_ch: 欠缺前速，居中間之後位置，走內欄。直路彎向外移出以取位上前，走勢普通，僅失卻一席殿軍。
owner: Stewart Leung Chi Kin & Eliza Leung Sze Man

comment: Slow to begin; raced under his own steam.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 跟跑而回
owner: Vijay Harish Mohinani, Nilesh Murli Sajnani & Jaikishin Ishwardas Daswani

comment: Began fairly, ridden but no speed, dropping to midfield     along rail 4L from leader. Made good ground around final    turn to be 2nd into straight, hit the front 280m, bolted    home under hands and heels riding.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，受催策但缺乏前速，墮居中間位置，落後領放馬四個馬位，走內欄。轉直路彎時追前甚多。入直路時居第二位。二百八十米處取得領先。在騎師手足並用催策下衝刺凌厲。

comment: Pushed forward, held one-off and one-back position,         prominent for the majority of the straight, weakened inside 100M.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，居領放馬一個馬位之後的位置，走第二疊。直路大部分途程居前列，最後一百米轉弱。

comment: Quickened for 2nd when shifted out in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路移出, 加速第二

comment: Settled wide midfield; raced under his own steam.
comment_ch: 外疊居中, 拖住順走

comment: Kept on for 2nd; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 跟前入位, 走勢平穩
owner: Mr & Mrs Eddie Wong Ming Chak and Kameny Wong Kam Man

comment: Slow into stride and then difficult to settle, dropping to  last pair. Taken out turning for home, made some progress   initially before tiring final 200m.
comment_ch: 起步緩慢，難以穩定走勢，墮居最後兩位。轉直路彎時移向外疊。直路初略有進展，最後二百米漸呈疲態。

comment: Settled midfield; responded OK when asked late.
comment_ch: 居中, 末段騎落有反應

comment: Pushed forward after taken in on jumping to race outside    the leader 3/4L off, 2 wide. Maintained forward position in the straight, only headed when weakened passing 100M.
comment_ch: 出閘後移入內疊，受催策上前，居領放馬外側，落後四分三個馬位，走第二疊。直路上保持居前列，一百米處轉弱，被超越。

comment: Steadied shortly after start, settling midfield in one-off  position back stretch. Taken wide in straight, kept on      fairly to 200m before tiring.
comment_ch: 出閘後不久收慢，對面直路上居中間位置，走第二疊。直路上移出外疊，保持普通走勢，二百米處呈現疲態。

comment: Urged forward and sat outside the leader, suited to the     slow pace, inconvenienced passing 200M, did not run on.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，居領放馬外側。步速緩慢，適合發揮。跑過二百米處時受妨礙，未能上前。

comment: Jumped well from a poor draw, soon settled in midfield in   5th or 6th, baulked for a run early in straight, quickened  well once into the clear passing 200 metres, asserted       authority late.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘迅速，瞬即居第五或第六位。直路早段受阻。跑過二百米處時望空後隨即以佳勢加速。末段控制大局。
owner: Wong Hing Chun, Wong Mee Chun & The Executors of the Estate of the late Wong Man Yui

comment: Slightly slow out, raced 2 to 3 lengths back on the stands  rail, finished off very strongly to score narrowly.
comment_ch: 出閘稍慢，落後兩至三個馬位，走外欄。末段衝刺凌厲，以短距離之先勝出。

comment: Wide throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 全程外疊, 未見真章

comment: Towards rear when hampered and veered wide losing a few     lengths 1200 metres out, soon recovered to just worse than  midfield but wide without cover down far side, made no      impression in home straight.
comment_ch: 居後列位置，受阻並向外斜跑，千二米處墮退數個馬位。瞬即恢復走勢，對面直路上居中間稍後位置，走外疊，沒有遮擋。直路上毫無表現。

comment: Never in the hunt.
comment_ch: 從未參與競逐。
owner: Mr & Mrs Chan Chung Yin and Mr & Mrs Clevin Got Chong Key

comment: Began well, racing in midfield but wide. Under pressure     turning for home and gave ground steadily in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居中間位置，但走外疊。轉直路彎時受催策。直路上逐漸墮退。

comment: Jumped OK; under a hold throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 起步順利, 沿途拖住, 未受考驗

comment: Settled worse than midfield, awkward on heels at 650m,      failed to run on.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置。六百五十米處靠近他駒後蹄處於窘境，未能上前。

comment: In midfield along the rail, 2-3/4L off the pace, not suited to the slow pace, little dash near 250M, one paced          thereafter.
comment_ch: 沿欄居中間位置，落後二又四分三個馬位。慢步速不合發揮，接近二百五十米處時略為上前，其後保持同速。
owner: Poon Chi Keung & Thomas Poon Ho Wing

comment: At rear throughout, never improved.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列，從未能推進。

comment: Ran comfortably when under a hold throughout.
comment_ch: 全程扣實，走勢輕鬆

comment: Hard ridden forward to settle in midfield without cover,    gradually moved forward 1000M, flattened rounding the Home  Turn.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，居中間位置，沒有遮擋。一千米處逐漸上前，轉直路彎時洩氣。

comment: Average to begin, raced 2 wide, 6-7 lengths back at rear,   there to turn, angled our near 500M, failed to close off in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘一般。居後列，落後領放馬六至七個馬位，走第二疊。直路彎前居相同位置，接近五百米處時移出外疊。直路上衝刺乏力。
owner: Michael T H Lee & Dr Henry Chan Hin Lee

comment: Under a hold throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 緊韁扣實，未受考驗

comment: Ran on well when shifted out in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路移出，自動湧上

comment: Slightly slow out, sent forward to take the early lead,     headed near 1100M, sat on the leader's back, there to turn, no response to riding in straight. (Lame right front leg    with a sore fetlock next day.)
comment_ch: 出閘稍慢，受催策上前。早段取得領先。接近千一米處時被超越，居領放馬之後。直路彎前居相同位置。直路上受催策，但未能交出反應。（賽後翌日右前腿不良於行，以及右前蹄球節疼痛。）
owner: Pang Chor Fu & Stephen Pang Ho

comment: Quickened well when being asked late.
comment_ch: 末段稍騎，加速上前
owner: Dr & Mrs Gene Tsoi Wai Wang
