comment: Rolled forward to settle in a prominent position, however,  trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, weakened soon      after straightening.
comment_ch: 上前居前列位置，沿途走第三疊，沒有遮擋。入直路後瞬即轉弱。

comment: Very slow away, at rear, raced 2-4 wide, no progress.
comment_ch: 出閘十分緩慢，居後列，走第二至第四疊。毫無進展。

comment: Ran on ordinary; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 走勢平常，未見佳處

comment: Slow to begin, guided to the fence, settled down 3-4Ls back in midfield, kept on steadily entering straight, no         impression on first few. (Lost RF plate 1600M)
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，移入內欄，居中間位置，落後三至四個馬位。入直路時保持穩勢，未能威脅前列馬匹（於千六米處失去右前蹄的蹄鐵）。

comment: Won with plenty in hand under a hold.
comment_ch: 按住第一, 大把在手
owner: Lee Wan Keung & Lee Wong Wai Kuen

comment: Led early; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 沿途快放，末段按番住

comment: Ran on fairly well when quickened for 3rd centre of track.
comment_ch: 中檔竄上，表現唔曳

comment: Began fairly settling within striking distance in 4th,      shuffled back to 5th leaving the Rock and similar into      straight, fought on steadily without threatening in the run home.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，居第四位，落後領放馬不遠。跑離大石鼓處時墮退至第五位。入直路時居相若位置。末段持續力拼，但未能構成威脅。

comment: Chased leader in a strongly run race, nudged along to keep  up 500M, out-finished and lost 2nd mid-straight, weakened   towards finish.
comment_ch: 賽事步速偏快，力追領放馬。五百米處受催策以保持位置。直路中段衝刺力不及對手，失去第二位。接近終點時轉弱。

comment: Away quickly, then pressured forward to race a length       behind leader on settling. Shaken up 400m when tempo        increased, hit front 250m, battled on gamely to hold off    late challenge.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，其後受催策上前，落後領放馬一個馬位。四百米處步速加快時受催策，二百五十米處取得領先。末段力拼以抗衡對手的挑戰。

comment: Jumped fairly, niggled along near the centre of the track   in distant 6th, one-paced closing stages.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，受催策，在接近跑道中央競跑，居第六位，落後甚遠。末段保持同速。
owner: Raymond Leung Yim San, Leung Chung Wai & Leung Chung Shun

comment: Pushed to keep up in midfield, harmed by the slow pace,     trapped 4 wide throughout, flattened 250M.
comment_ch: 受推策，保持在中間位置。步速緩慢，不利發揮。沿途走第四疊。二百五十米處洩氣。
owner: Steven Chan Sheung Chi & Kenneth Chan Sheung Yan

comment: Soon after the start blundered badly and rider was          dislodged.
comment_ch: 出閘後瞬即嚴重失蹄，並將騎師拋下。
owner: Willie Yiu Man Hung & Victor Yiu Wai Yin

handicap_ch: 浪琴表國際騎師錦標賽（讓賽）－第三關
comment: Hard ridden 4-wide to stay with pace before easing off      around turn but still wide. Kept on steadily to 200m before turning one-paced.
comment_ch: 受力策以跟上步速，走第四疊。直路彎收慢，持續走外疊。保持穩勢至二百米處，繼而保持同速。

comment: Pushed forward early to be handily placed 4th, 1 off the    fence. Ran on steadily in the straight, and had a nose in   front at the 200m. Peaked soon after and swamped late.
comment_ch: 早段受推策上前，居前列第四位，走第二疊。直路初保持穩勢。二百米處領先一馬鼻位。其後瞬即未能再增速。末段被後上馬匹超越。
owner: Mr & Mrs Michael Cheng Wing On and Janice Cheng Po Hei

comment: Under restraint after start; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 起步捉到實, 未受考驗

comment: Could not keep up with pace early; ran on strongly after the post.
comment_ch: 早段跟唔住，過終點後餘勢勁

comment: Prominent, travelled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide with      cover, accelerated strongly to claim the trophy.
comment_ch: 居前列位置，落後領放馬四個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。以勁勢加速，勝出賽事。

comment: Ran on for 3rd when asked in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路推騎, 闖入一席
owner: Lau Chi Tak & Lau Chi Wing

comment: Ran on ordinary when under whip late.
comment_ch: 末段開鞭，反應平常

comment: Outpaced early, dropping to rear but away from fence. Taken to centre track on straightening and ran on steadily        without looking dangerous.
comment_ch: 早段被拋離，墮居後列位置，離欄競跑。入直路時移至跑道中央競跑，穩步上前，看似未能構成威脅。
owner: Wong Chung Hin & Arnold Wong Chi Chiu

comment: Responded ok when asked at turn.
comment_ch: 彎位已騎, 反應不差

comment: Not stretching out properly; never in contention.
comment_ch: 出腳凌亂，無段好睇

comment: Rolled to occupy the box seat, despite suited by the very   slow tempo, kept on only fairly without extra acceleration.
comment_ch: 佔取包廂位置，儘管極慢步速適合發揮，僅能保持一般走勢，未能額外加速。

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, harmed by the very slow pace, unable to show any     dash in straight.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬六個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。步速十分緩慢，不利發揮。直路上衝刺乏力。

comment: Taken back from wide, raced rear rank 1 off, in traffic off home turn, snatched off heels 380m, shaken up 250m,         quickened but bumped 140m, just failed.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後留居後列，走第二疊。入直路時受困。三百八十米處避開他駒後蹄。二百五十米處受催策，一百四十米處加速，但被碰撞，僅敗。

handicap_ch: 香港中文大學校友會聯會盃（讓賽）
comment: Vigorously ridden from the jump to get forward position but couldn't muster sufficient speed, dropping to behind        midfield but wide. Taken to centre field on straightening   but found little under hard riding.
comment_ch: 出閘後受力策佔取前列位置，但加速不足，墮居中間之後位置，走外疊。入直路時移至跑道中央。受力策，但再無餘力。

comment: Began fairly, restrained and shifted across behind runners  to rail, settling at rear. Left flat-footed 600m when tempo increased, took rails run in straight, ran on nicely to     100m when flattened.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，受約束，在馬群之後切入內欄，居後列。六百米處賽事步速加快時走勢遲緩。直路上走內欄。走勢良佳，一百米處洩氣。
owner: Mr & Mrs Simon Suen Siu Man

comment: Rolled forward and took box-seat, weakened approaching 200M and gradually dropped off.
comment_ch: 上前佔取包廂位置，趨近二百米處時轉弱，逐漸墮退。

comment: Began OK and quickly taken to fence 4-back from leader.     Niggled to keep pace, came off fence 500m, got split 320m,  ran on strongly to win close home.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，迅速切入內欄，落後領放馬四個馬位。受催策以保持走勢，五百米處離欄競跑。三百二十米處取位上前，衝刺強勁，終點前取勝。
owner: Ricky Wong Kin Chat & Helen Leung Yee Wan

comment: On pace early; kept on for 2nd when being hard ridden.
comment_ch: 跟前第二，但拉士力騎到尾

comment: Slow to begin; raced keenly halfway; flattened late.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 中段搶口, 直路勁平
owner: Ho Sau Ki & Tommy Ho Chung Shing

comment: Missed break, soon recovered & rolled on rail to midfield,  strong traveller 400m, driven into stretch, plugged on      evenly.
comment_ch: 漏閘。瞬即恢復走勢，上前居中間位置，走內欄。四百米處走勢強勁，受催策入直路，保持穩勢。

comment: Tardy start; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 起步麻麻，走勢仍嫩

comment: Broke ok, sat 3 wide with cover behind midfield, shifted 1  off 850m & advanced a spot, ridden 400m, found little in    tepid stretch run.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居中間之後位置，走第三疊，有遮擋。八百五十米處移入第二疊及略為追前，四百米處受催策。直路上再無餘力，衝刺乏力。

comment: Led early; under a hold in the Straight to run 2nd.
comment_ch: 主動搶放，直路按番住

comment: Jumped with field, ridden along, settling midfield in       one-off position. Bumped and unbalanced 700m but held       position to straight when one-paced.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，受催策，居中間位置，走第二疊。七百米處與對手互相碰撞，失去平衡，但保持位置。直路上保持同速。
owner: Ng Sun Wah & Chan Wo Ping

comment: Jumped best, taken to fence and set good tempo. Put under   pressure turning for home but kept battling till swamped    final strides.
comment_ch: 出閘最快，移入內欄，以中等步速領放。轉直路彎時受催策，持續力拼，最後數步被超越。

comment: Broke ok to park midfield 1 off with cover, shifted 3 deep  400m, driven into stretch, stayed on for solid late headway.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，居中間位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。四百米處走第三疊，受催策入直路，保持走勢，末段追前甚多。

comment: Niggled along throughout; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 沿途俾住, 反應平常

comment: Dropped back from the wide draw to sit last, one off the    fence. Ran on solidly under hands and heels in the          straight, without ever threatening.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後墮居包尾位置，走第二疊。直路上在騎師手足並用催策下以勁勢上前，但從未能構成威脅。

comment: Taken back from a wide draw, raced 6 to 7 lengths back at   rear, there to turn, no daylight in straight, nearest on    line.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後留居後列，落後六至七個馬位。直路彎前居相同位置。直路上未能望空，過終點時最為接近。

handicap: AUDEMARS PIGUET LADY ROYAL OAK HANDICAP
comment: Beaten for early pace, dropping 4-back along rail. Took     inside run in straight but only one-paced.
comment_ch: 前速不及對手，墮居落後領放馬四個馬位的位置，沿欄競跑。直路上走內疊，僅能保持同速。

comment: Urged to lead early; just caught.
comment_ch: 全程搶放，埋門被過

comment: Bustled forward initially, 4 wide & prominent 1st turn,     slotted handy 1 off with cover 1350m, niggled 600m, crowded home turn, boxed on evenly centre track.
comment_ch: 早段受催策上前，轉首個彎位時居前列位置，走第四疊。一千三百五十米處居有利位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。六百米處受催策，直路彎受擠迫。直路上在跑道中央保持穩定走勢。

comment: Hard ridden to sit in midfield, trapped 3 wide, not suited  by the slow pace, emptied 300M.
comment_ch: 受力策，居中間位置，走第三疊。步速緩慢，不合發揮。三百米處再無餘力。
owner: Civic Chan Sin Wik & Chu Po Yi

comment: Broke well, parked 2nd 1 off no cover, niggled 600m, under  pump 450m, soon beaten & faded in stretch.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。居第二位，走第二疊，沒有遮擋。六百米處受催策，四百五十米處再受催策。直路上瞬即洩氣及力竭。
owner: Willie Yiu Man Hung & Victor Yiu Wai Yin

comment: Didn't respond to initial urgings and was stuck 5-6 wide no cover early, before dropping back worse than midfield, 4    wide with no cover. Forced wider at the 400m, but was       already a beaten horse, and dropped out quickly.
comment_ch: 起初受催策，但毫無反應，早段須走第五至第六疊，沒有遮擋，繼而墮居中間之後位置，走第四疊，沒有遮擋。四百米處被迫移出更外疊，但已洩氣，迅速墮退。

comment: Blocked for a clear running in the Straight; finished last.
comment_ch: 直路曾受阻，包尾而回
owner: Ricky Wong Kin Chat & Helen Leung Yee Wan

comment: Flattened halfway; weakened in the Straight.
comment_ch: 半程洩氣，直路墮退
owner: Pui Kwan Kay & Raymond Chu Yuet Chung

comment: Settled midfield; flattened in the Straight.
comment_ch: 居中跟跑，直路勁平

comment: Positioned 3-wide in the group chasing the pace, lost cover from 1200M, dropped away 300M, eased when  no chance.
comment_ch: 力追領放馬，走第三疊。自千二米處起失去遮擋。三百米處墮退。不具爭勝機會時收慢。
owner: Amy Li Chi Lin, April Tsui Siu Yee & Ben Tsui Siu Lun

comment: Began well, ridden to hold rail three-back from leader. Got close to heels top of straight, gave ground steadily from   200m.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，受催策固守內欄，落後領放馬三個馬位。直路早段靠近他駒後蹄，自二百米處起逐漸墮退。
owner: Mr & Mrs Colin Lo Chor Cheong

comment: OK away and taken forward to sit in a handy position, 1 off the fence trailing the leader. Came wide on the turn,       looking for better running, with the winner getting the     jump inside. Chasing best late, but just missed.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可。受催策上前，居跟隨領放馬的有利位置，走第二疊。直路彎移出外疊，以期在跑道狀況較佳部分競跑，而頭馬則在其內側快速上前。末段追勢最佳，僅敗。

comment: Caught the eye when under a hold throughout for 3rd.
comment_ch: 紋風未動，走勢吸引

comment: Ridden forward to take the lead along the fence at fast     sectionals, out of fuel 200M.
comment_ch: 沿欄受催策上前，以快步速領先。二百米處再無餘力。

comment: Asked early; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 一早已騎，走勢論盡

comment: Hampered shortly after start, settled towards rear, ground  home steadily in straight.
comment_ch: 起步後不久受阻礙，居後列。直路上穩步上前。

comment: Ran on OK for 3rd when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段考驗，反應尚可

comment: Shifted out after start; hit the line strongly.
comment_ch: 起步主動移出，走勢有力

comment: Pushed to hold the rail in midfield, pace good, just held   ground in straight.
comment_ch: 受推策，固守內欄，居中間位置。步速偏快。直路上僅能保持位置。

comment: Led early; flattened late.
comment_ch: 搶放兩段, 欠貫注力

comment: Always in touch; won comfortably.
comment_ch: 有前有後，拉士輕易趕過

comment: Began OK, not much speed, settling four-back from leader    along rail. Switched out entering straight but only         one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，前速不快。落後領放馬四個馬位，走內欄。入直路時移向外疊，但僅能保持同速。

comment: Parked outside the leader, 1/2 behind, stayed on gamely     until 250M, one paced thereafter and got passed just before the line for 4th.
comment_ch: 居領放馬外側，落後半個馬位。二百五十米處前保持凌厲走勢，其後保持同速。過終點前僅被超越，失卻一席殿軍。
owner: Peter Lam Kin Ngok & Stephen Ip Shu Kwan

comment: Travelled slightly in behind midfield, 7-3/4L behind 2 wide with cover, ran on strongly but was no match to the winner.
comment_ch: 居中間稍後位置，落後領放馬七又四分之三個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。走勢強勁，但不敵頭馬。

comment: Jumped away well; ran on strongly to score.
comment_ch: 應聲彈出, 愈走愈勁

handicap: THE HONG KONG RUGBY UNION CUP (HANDICAP)
comment: Ridden but didn't muster, dropping behind midfield. Left    3-wide without cover 1,500m and allowed to edge forward.    Began run 600m, hit front 300m, kept finding to the line.
comment_ch: 受催策，但未能加速，墮居中間之後位置。千五米處走第三疊，沒有遮擋，其後獲許上前。六百米處開始發力上前，三百米處取得領先。持續力拼至終點。
owner: Mr & Mrs Kenny Cheng Tsin Ki

comment: Slow to begin; ran on for 3rd when wide throughout.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 全程外疊, 蝕位第三

comment: Ridden along but wide early, settling in one-off position   behind midfield. Switched out wide in straight but found    nothing.
comment_ch: 早段受催策，但走外疊。其後居中間之後位置，走第二疊。直路上移出外疊，再無餘力。
owner: Billy Albert Kan Che Kin & Benjamin Kan Yiu Chung

comment: Caught the eye when ran on well under a hold.
comment_ch: 按住追近，表現悅目
owner: Hau Shiu Kai & Gigi Hau Ying Chi

comment: Began from the widest gate, remained wide behind midfield,  ran home at the same pace.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘，居中間之後位置，保持在外疊。末段保持同速。

comment: From draw 1 settled 3Ls off the pace along the fence, made  steady progress up the rails final 300, got up to join      leader 50M and prevailed in a close finish.
comment_ch: 自第一檔出閘，沿欄落後領放馬三個馬位。最後三百米沿欄穩步上前，五十米處追上領放馬，與對手爭持至終點，僅勝。

comment: Allowed to find feet behind midfield, well away from outer  fence. Lost position approaching 400m when given reminders, one-paced.
comment_ch: 獲許順其自然地展步上前，居中間之後位置，遠離外欄競跑。趨近四百米處受催策時失位，保持同速。
owner: Leung Moon Chuen, Edmond Leung Wai Choi & George Leung Wai Ki

comment: Under a hold throughout; ran on strongly to score.
comment_ch: 全程捉到實，自動湧上

comment: Under restraint early; limited response when asked.
comment_ch: 早段扣實，騎落欠勁

comment: Sluggish start & rousted on rail to settle behind midfield, niggled on turn, crowded & buffeted in stretch, driven in   clear 180m, kept on one pace.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，受催策，居中間之後位置，走內欄。直路彎受催策。直路上受緊迫及擠碰。一百八十米處望空，受催策，保持同速。

comment: Broke well from the middle gate, settled 3L back in 5th     travelling 3-wide down far side, took closer order from the Rock, improved under pressure from 1L 3rd into straight to  hold minor chance briefly but winner too strong.
comment_ch: 自中檔出閘迅速。對面直路上居第五位，落後領放馬三個馬位，走第三疊。自大石鼓處起進佔較接近位置。入直路時居第三位，落後領放馬一個馬位，受催策上前，一度略具爭勝機會，但不敵頭馬。
owner: Chan Wing Kwan, Chang Wing Yiu & Cheung Kwok Wa

comment: Pushed forward to take the fence and led alone at slow      sectionals, challenged 600M, kept on gamely until weakened  latter stages, hung on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，移入內欄，以慢步速單騎領放。六百米處受挑戰。保持勁勢，末段轉弱。保持走勢，跑獲季軍。

comment: Taken back early to sit worse than midfield, 3 off the      fence. Towards the rear of the field rounding the turn,     showed tremendous turn of foot from the 400m. Too strong    late, and still looked to have something in hand.
comment_ch: 早段留居中間之後位置，走第四疊。轉直路彎時居馬群後列。四百米處加速強勁。末段走勢凌厲，勝來游刃有餘。

handicap_ch: 香港大學專業進修學院讓賽
comment: Away well, mixing it with pace makers before easing 2L back passing 1500m. Dropped back further as pace hotted up,      picked up momentum from 400m and finished off strongly.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，居領放馬匹之間，其後收慢，千五米處落後兩個馬位。賽事步速加快時進一步墮後，自四百米處起開始加速，衝刺強勁。

comment: Ridden early, settled behind midfield on rails, hampered    upon straightening, ran home one-paced.
comment_ch: 早段受催策，居中間之後位置，走內欄。入直路時受阻礙。末段保持同速。
owner: William Lee Ka Chung, Peter Ho Chiu Kee & Spencer Lee Ka Kit

comment: Broke well, sat midfield 1 off with cover, driven turning   in, outpaced & plodded on tamely.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居中間位置，在有遮擋下走第二疊。入直路時受催策，衝刺力不及對手，走勢疲乏。

comment: Jumped well, eased into midfield spot on rail, keen early,  ridden 400m, had his chance, outgunned late.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，收慢留居中間位置，走內欄。早段搶口，四百米處受催策，已獲機會盡展所長，末段不敵首三名馬匹。
owner: Mr & Mrs Arthur Wong Chun Mo

comment: Settled in midfield on rail, saved ground turning in, found nothing in straight.
comment_ch: 沿欄居中間位置。入直路時走內欄節省腳程。直路上再無餘力。
owner: Lily Chan Li Lei & Marc Chan

comment: Up with the pace; kept on late.
comment_ch: 跟前，末段走勢持續

comment: Bumped heavily at the start, pushed along to take lead      early stages, under pressure on straightening and weakened  final 200m.
comment_ch: 起步時與對手互相大力碰撞。早段受推策，取得領先。入直路時受催策。最後二百米轉弱。

handicap: POK FU LAM RESERVOIR ROAD HANDICAP
comment: Pushed and settled to race in midfield, 3-3/4L behind 2     wide, pushed from home turn, found nothing.
comment_ch: 受推策，居中間位置，落後三又四分三個馬位，走第二疊。自直路彎起受推策，再無餘力。

handicap: THE HONG KONG RACEHORSE OWNERS ASSOCIATION TROPHY (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港馬主協會錦標（讓賽）
comment: Began well from a wide draw, positioned 1 out 1 back,       improved from 500M, peaked early in straight, weakened      gradually thereafter.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘迅速，居第二疊第二位。自五百米處起推進，直路初未能再增速，其後逐漸轉弱。
owner: Dr John Shum Ding Ping, Dr Lawrence Chan Pui Wing & Francis Hung See Wai

comment: Rearward early; ran on strongly in the Straight.
comment_ch: 早段落後, 直路衝刺有力
owner: Mr & Mrs Horatio Ho Yiu Wing, Ho Garrick Sai Man and Ho Leslie Sai Kit

comment: Started well, raced handy 3 deep & lost cover 1000m, close  up 3rd & driven 360m, battled evenly in pursuit but all out & lost 3rd late.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。一千米處居前列，走第三疊，失去遮擋。三百六十米處追近至第三位，受催策。以穩勢追趕，受力策，但末段失去季席。
owner: Dr Daniel Lee Tin Chak, Daisy Ho Chiu Fung, Pansy Ho Chiu King & Maisy Ho Chiu Ha

comment: Slow start, raced at tail 1 off, bustled 920m, under pump   750m, shifted out & hard-driven home turn, widest in run,   stayed on for sound inroads.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居包尾，走第二疊。九百二十米處受催策，七百五十米處再受催策。直路彎向外移出及受力策，直路上走最外疊。保持走勢，追前甚多。
owner: Wan Chun, Wan Yuk Sim & Jonathan Yiu Chi Fung

comment: Shifted across behind runners from wide draw, settling at   rear along fence. Well back entering straight, got close to heels before finishing off strongly final 200m.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，在馬群之後切入，居後列，走內欄。入直路時遙居於後。靠近他駒後蹄，最後二百米以勁勢衝刺。

comment: Began well, crowded out shortly after but soon in box seat  trailing leader. Under pressure turning for home and gave   ground quickly in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，其後不久受擠迫，瞬即居包廂位置，跟隨領放馬。入直路時受催策，直路上迅速墮退。

comment: Eased back from draw 10 on jumping, detached last 8Ls off   the pace, made limited gains from 350m, not reach           contention.
comment_ch: 自第十檔出閘後收慢留後，遙遙包尾，落後領放馬八個馬位。自三百五十米處起略為追前，但無力爭勝。

comment: Settled behind runners; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 直路拖住，跟馬林走

comment: Crowded out and bumped start, not pushed, settling 3-wide   behind midfield. Urged forward 600m, finished strongly down centre track.
comment_ch: 出閘時受擠迫及碰撞對手，未受推策。居中間之後位置，走第三疊。六百米處受催策上前，直路上在跑道中央衝刺凌厲。
owner: Sir Po-shing & Lady Woo, Jackson Woo Ka Biu, Dawson Woo Ka Chung and The Executors of the Estate of

comment: Broke OK, ridden along between horses, settling in midfield 3L from leader. Made progress around turn and kept on       gamely in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，在馬匹之間受催策，居中間位置，落後領放馬三個馬位。直路彎追前，直路上持續力拼。

handicap: HKU FACULTIES OF LAW AND SOCIAL SCIENCES HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 港大法律學院與社會科學學院讓賽
comment: Shifted across behind horses from wide draw, settling       towards rear but in one-off position. Steadied around turn, switched out straight, one-paced.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，在馬群之後切入內疊。居後列，走第二疊。轉直路彎時收慢，直路上移向外疊，保持同速。

comment: Always in touch; ran on comfortably to score.
comment_ch: 前後俱備，姿態輕鬆

comment: Ran on ok when being asked.
comment_ch: 騎落肯走，仲有兩腳

comment: Broke ok, soon outpaced & slotted midfield 1 off with       cover, niggled 750m & shuffled back, 3rd last & driven into stretch, weak run home.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，瞬即被拋離，居中間位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。七百五十米處受催策，其後墮退。入直路時受催策，居尾三位置。直路上轉弱。

comment: Always in touch to run 3rd; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 有前有後, 點到即止

comment: Ran on fairly when made progress under a hold.
comment_ch: 按住追近，表現唔曳

handicap: HKU FACULTIES OF BUSINESS & ECONOMICS AND SCIENCE HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 港大經濟及工商管理學院與理學院讓賽
comment: Ridden forward to park outside the leader, soon after       straightening weakened. (Questioned for disappointing       performance, see incident report)
comment_ch: 受催策上前，居領放馬外側。入直路後瞬即轉弱。（騎師被查詢有關此駒表現令人失望的原因，見競賽事件報告。）

comment: Sat 2-3Ls behind runaway leader, moved up to challenge      400M, soon opened up a good lead on straightening, kept on  well to the line and fully in control final 100M.
comment_ch: 落後遙遙領先的領放馬兩至三個馬位，四百米處上前展開挑戰，入直路時瞬即以佳勢領先。保持佳勢至終點，最後一百米穩操勝券。

comment: Asked at turn; came from behind for 3rd.
comment_ch: 轉彎已騎，後上第三

comment: Wide throughout; under a hold in the Straight.
comment_ch: 沿途蝕位, 直路按返

comment: Pushed along early to race on speed, unable to quicken at   300m and battled one paced to the line.
comment_ch: 早段受推策上前，跟隨領放馬。三百米處未能加速，保持同速至終點。

comment: Under restraint along the rail; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 貼欄捉實, 未見真章

comment: Slow to begin; shifted to centre track; made progress steadily for 3rd.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，隨即移入中檔，逐步上前
owner: Samson Yip Yan Tion, Dumas Chow Wai Sang & Eric Tong Man Leung

comment: Dashed well on the inside; moved better after change of stable.
comment_ch: 內檔湧上，轉廐見好

comment: Pushed forward, 2 wide, hung out from 600M, just ran on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，走第二疊。自六百米處起外閃。僅能保持走勢，取得季軍。

comment: Began well but kept three-wide without cover 2L from        leader. Urged forward 1000m but effort short-lived dropping back to 3rd. One-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，落後領放馬兩個馬位，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。一千米處受催策上前，但瞬即無以為繼，墮居第三位。直路上保持同速。
owner: Paul Lo Chung Wai & Kathy Lo Ho Hsiu Lan

comment: Taken back to race at rear, positioned 2 wide behind        midfield, slightly improved on turn, taken wide in straight and made good progress, just missed frame. (Sustained a     wound to the right hind leg.) (See Racing Incidents.)
comment_ch: 留居後列位置，其後居中間之後位置，走第二疊。直路彎略為追前，直路上移出外疊，追前甚多，僅未能跑入位置。（右後腿有一個傷口。）（見競賽事件報告。）

comment: Bumped on jumping; made progress steadily when recovered.
comment_ch: 起步受碰, 收正後逐步上前

comment: Shifted across behind horses from outside draw and last on  settling. Still last entering straight,  shifted out 300m   when blocked for run, kept on fairly final stages.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後在馬群之後切入內疊，居包尾位置。入直路時仍然包尾。三百米處受困，向外移出。末段保持普通走勢。

comment: Came from behind for 2nd when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段推騎，後上第二

comment: Average to begin, raced 2 wide, 4 lengths back behind       midfield, 3 wide with cover turning in, emptied early in    straight.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居中間之後位置，落後領放馬四個馬位，走第二疊。入直路時走第三疊，有遮擋。直路初再無餘力。
owner: Cheng Chor Chak & Cheng Siu Kwan

comment: Sat towards the rear along the rail, 9-3/4L behind the      leader, made no more than minor ground.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬九又四分三個馬位，走內欄。僅能略為追前。
owner: Brandon Lau, Gilda Liu, Gabrielle Liu & Issac Liu

handicap_ch: 香港大學專業進修學院讓賽
comment: Bounced well, outpaced, dropped quickly to rear in one-off  position. Widest into straight, ran on steadily under hard  riding.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，但被拋離，迅速墮居後列位置，走第二疊。入直路時走大外疊，在力策下穩步上前。

comment: Settled at rear and ran home fairly.
comment_ch: 居後列。末段衝刺一般。

comment: Bumped and unbalanced start, dropping to rear along fence.  Switched out entering straight but found little under hard  riding.
comment_ch: 出閘時被碰撞，失去平衡。墮居後列，沿欄競跑。入直路時移出外疊，在力策下再無餘力。

comment: Responded fairly well when asked at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百推騎，反應不俗

comment: Dropped back early to settle at the rear of the field. Ran  on steadily early in the straight, and switched inside, off heels, after missing a run at 200m. Only plugged to the     line steadily after that.
comment_ch: 早段留居馬群後列。直路初穩步上前，二百米處無路可上後移入內疊，避開他駒後蹄。其後保持穩勢至終點。

comment: Jumped well, unable to slot in early, sent forward to take  the lead near 850M, headed final 200M, dropped off tamely   thereafter. (Blood in trachea.) (See Racing Incidents.)
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，早段未能切入內欄，受催策上前，接近八百五十米處時領先。最後二百米被超越，其後乏力墮退。（氣管內有血。）（見競賽事件報告。）

comment: Pushed early, midfield 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, flattened 200M.
comment_ch: 早段受推策，居中間位置，走第二疊。步速緩慢，不合發揮。二百米處洩氣。
owner: Liu Shun Hong & George Ma Pui Pui

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY PT BRIDAL COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶純．結婚嫁系列讓賽
comment: Good jump, early pace to take forward position, settled 4th 1 off, shuffled back slightly 750m, under pressure 600m,    short of room 400m, switched back to inside, stuck on.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，前速甚快，居前列第四位，走第二疊。七百五十米處略為墮退。六百米處受催策，四百米處空位不足，向內移入，保持走勢。

comment: Settled worse than midfield about 4Ls behind the leader on  the fence, despite not suited by the slow tempo and         couldn't able to find a run latter stages, finished off     nicely for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬約四個馬位，沿欄競跑。儘管慢步速不合發揮，末段又未能取位上前，仍以佳勢衝刺，跑獲季軍。

comment: Slow to begin; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 但表現不差

comment: Taken back to 3-wide in last few from a wide gate, unable   to quicken under pressure in straight.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，留居最後數位，走第三疊。直路上受催策，但未能加速。

comment: On pace early; kept on fairly well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 跟放第二，表現唔曳

comment: Broke well but eased to find cover, settling along rail     towards rear. Unhappy with pace and set off passing 1000m,  circling field to take over 650m out, increasing lead with  every stride to win by wide margin.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，收慢以尋找遮擋，居後列，走內欄。步速不合發揮，跑過一千米處時發力。繞過馬群上前，六百五十米處取得領先。逐步帶離對手，大勝而回。

comment: Sharp start & crossed to stands rail, rolled to lead 500m,  shaken up 400m, all out & headed 100m, no extra.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，移至外欄。五百米處上前領先。四百米處受催策。全力以赴，但一百米處被超越，再無餘力。

comment: Under a hold throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 全程扣實，未受考驗

comment: Taken back from the widest gate, raced at tail, still well  back on turn, made minor headway in straight.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘，留居包尾位置。直路彎仍遙居於後，直路上略為追前。

comment: Crowded and lost ground start, then ridden to hold one-off  position in midfield. Had to shift several times in         straight to get clear passage, finished off well.
comment_ch: 出閘時受擠迫，因而失地。其後受催策，居中間位置，走第二疊。直路上須數度轉換跑線以望空，衝刺良佳。

comment: Quickened steadily; performed nicely for 2nd.
comment_ch: 逐步追趕, 表現成熟

comment: Restrained well back from the widest gate. Stayed always to the rear and created no further impression.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後受約束，遙居於後。沿途居後列，再無表現。

handicap_ch: ＰＡＮＡＳＯＮＩＣ快馬加鞭電子高速煲讓賽
comment: Eased to settle worse than midfield, 8Ls behind the leader  on the fence, despite favored by the fast tempo, ran on     only fairly.
comment_ch: 留居中間之後位置，落後領放馬八個馬位，走內欄。儘管快步速有利發揮，走勢僅屬一般。
owner: Jimmy Chung Kwok Man & Dominic Chung Won Lok

comment: Jumped on terms, ridden to go forward, settled just behind  leaders 3 deep with cover, overraced slightly, ridden along 500m, near lead 320m, checked sharply 140m, eased.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，受催策上前，居領先馬匹稍後位置，在有遮擋下走第三疊，跑來略為搶口。五百米處受催策。三百二十米處居接近領放馬位置。一百四十米處大力勒避，其後收慢。
owner: Mr & Mrs David Lee Fook Sang and Calvin Lee Ka Wo

comment: Slow to begin; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 起步最慢，走勢生硬

comment: Not willing to change legs when under whip late.
comment_ch: 拉士開鞭，唔肯轉腳

comment: Away with them, raced 3 wide in midfield, failed to close   off in straight.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，居中間位置，走第三疊。直路上未能展開衝刺。
owner: Sandia Yit Lau Ying Lam & Yit Kwok Leung

comment: Ran on comfortably for 3rd along the rail.
comment_ch: 沿欄順走, 表現從容

comment: Responded well when asked at 300m.
comment_ch: 三百發力，反應良好

comment: Camped handy, harmed by the slightly fast sectionals,       emptied soon after straightening.
comment_ch: 居前列。略快步速不利發揮。入直路後瞬即再無餘力。

comment: Quickly into stride, leading for a few strides before       settling one-out, one-back. Taken wide entering straight,   boxed on fairly to 200m before turning one-paced.
comment_ch: 起步迅速，領先數步後居第二疊第二位。入直路時移出外疊。二百米處前走勢一般，其後保持同速。

comment: Away well, prominent early before dropping back midfield, 1 off the fence. Strong down the outside and looked like he   would clear out in the straight. Struggled once he got the  lead at 150m, just ground  the win late.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，早段居前列，其後墮居中間位置，走第二疊。直路上在外疊展開強勁衝刺，看似能輕鬆取勝。一百五十米處取得領先後走勢轉弱，過終點時險勝。

comment: Eased back, raced 4-5 wide throughout, never competitive.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，沿途走第四至第五疊。從未見具競爭力。
owner: Cheung Kwong Kwan & Chadwick Mok Cham Hung

comment: Looking for cover early; quickened for 2nd late.
comment_ch: 早段找遮擋，末段加速上前

comment: Slow start & last pair on outer, ridden along 600m, plugged on past beaten rivals.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居最後兩位，走外疊。六百米處受催策，保持走勢，超越已洩氣對手。

comment: Flattened in straight; dropped back to rear.
comment_ch: 直路乏力, 包尾而回
owner: Joseph Choi Yip Leung & Choi Fong Hon Mei

comment: Taken back at start & raced at rear, niggled along 700m,    driven wide 400m, stayed on centre track for minor headway.
comment_ch: 出閘後留居後列。七百米處受催策。四百米處受催策，走外疊。直路上在跑道中央競跑，略為追前。

comment: Shared lead early; hit the front at 200m and won.
comment_ch: 拍實鬥放, 二百透出

comment: Settled down in 5th, stayed within striking distance        passing halfway, closed off willingly for 3rd beaten only a neck.
comment_ch: 出閘後居第五位，跑過半程時保持有利位置。衝刺強勁，跑獲第三，僅以一馬頸位之差見負。

comment: On pace under restraint; ran on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 扣實跟前，姿態不俗
owner: Conrad Fung Kwok Keung, Chris Fung Kwok Hung & The Executors of the Estate of the late Fung Cheung

comment: Midfield, dashed strongly 300M despite not suited by the    slow pace.
comment_ch: 居中間位置。儘管慢步速不合發揮，但三百米處衝刺強勁。

comment: Six wide at turn; hit the line strongly for 3rd.
comment_ch: 六疊轉彎, 望空湧上

comment: Always in touch; ran on nicely to score.
comment_ch: 有前有後, 成熟佔先

comment: Soon took up running on rails attempting to make all but    only to be overhauled inside the final 100 metres.
comment_ch: 瞬即取得領先，走內欄。嘗試一放到底，僅於最後一百米被超越。

comment: Came home from behind well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 留前試後, 效果理想

comment: Dashed slightly faster under urge late
comment_ch: 拉士稍騎, 有點追勢

comment: Took rail in front of midfield, dashed well 300M to score.
comment_ch: 移入內欄，居中間之前位置。三百米處衝刺良佳，取得勝利。

comment: Eased back, took cover, 2 wide, favoured by the fast pace,  lack room 4-2, dashed well when clear.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，取得遮擋，走第二疊，快步速有利發揮。自四百米處起至二百米處缺乏空位，望空後衝刺良佳。
owner: Elseda Shum Mei Chu, Professor Hextan Ngan Yuen Sheung, Chu Kwong Por & Andrew Shuen Pak Man

comment: Turned its head sideways in the Straight; nearest at finish.
comment_ch: 直路頭側側, 走勢仍近

comment: Bumped shortly after start, pressed forward but didn't      settle, dropping behind leading pair at turn. Kept on       fairly to 200m before fading.
comment_ch: 起步後不久碰撞對手。受催策上前，但未能穩定走勢。直路彎墮居領放雙駒之後。保持一般走勢至二百米處，繼而力竭。

comment: Urged forward from inside draw to hold box seat on          settling. Stayed on fence from start to finish but never    able to get closer. One-paced.
comment_ch: 自內檔出閘後受催策上前，居包廂位置。沿途固守內欄，但從未能追近領放馬。保持同速。

comment: Taken back at start, settled towards rear, bumped and       unbalanced in the early straight, one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘後留居後列位置。直路初被碰撞，因而失去平衡。保持同速。
owner: Mr & Mrs Lo Chung Yin and Lo Chin Pang

comment: Speedy break & bustled to sit 2nd 1 off no cover, pressed   leader 700m, outpaced & 1L back turning in, soon 2L back ,  one-paced in run, lost 3rd on nod.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策。居第二位，走第二疊，沒有遮擋。七百米處追迫領放馬，其後墮退。入直路時落後一個馬位，其後瞬即落後兩個馬位。保持同速，在叮噹馬頭下失去季軍。

comment: Under a hold throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 全程拖住, 未受考驗

comment: Hard ridden to go forward but didn't muster and eased off   1000m, settling at rear. Left fence 600m, shifted out and   bumped 400m, finished strongly to win close home.
comment_ch: 受力策上前但未能加速，一千米處收慢，居後列。六百米處移離內欄，四百米處向外斜跑及碰撞他駒，衝刺強勁，接近終點時取勝。

comment: Jumped well and lead easily, travelled well and kicked      strongly on straightening to win easily.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，輕鬆取得領先。走勢順暢，入直路時加速強勁，從容取勝。

comment: Began from the widest draw, given reminders to keep up with the pace before settling just outside the lead, faded out   of contention inside the 300 metres.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘，在催策下追及領放馬，其後居領放馬外側。三百米處力竭，再無爭勝機會。

comment: Well there, lost position entering straight, gave ground    steadily.
comment_ch: 居好位，入直路時失位，逐漸墮退。

handicap: THE HONG KONG UNIVERSITY ALUMNI ASSOCIATION CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港大學校友會挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Ridden but outpaced, dropping to rear along fence. Severely checked passing 700m, took inside run in straight,          one-paced. Had substantial amount of blood in trachea.
comment_ch: 受催策，但被拋離，墮居後列，走內欄。跑過七百米處時大力勒避。直路上走內疊，保持同速。氣管內有大量血液。

comment: Settled down 4Ls off the pace behind midfield, responded    well passing 300M but unable to match stride with winner    final 150M.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬四個馬位。跑過三百米處時對催策反應良佳，但最後一百五十米不敵頭馬。

comment: Raced midfield; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 沿途跟跑, 未有好感

comment: Shifted towards mid track at 300m; strode out strongly late.
comment_ch: 三百移出，大步湧上

comment: Slow to begin, settled in midfield 4-5Ls off the pace, kept on steadily inside 400M, got up for 3rd 100M out but was    well held by first two.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居中間位置，落後領放馬四至五個馬位。最後四百米保持穩勢，一百米處佔取第三位，但不敵頭兩名馬匹。
owner: The Hon Ronald Arculli GBM GBS JP & Johanna K J Arculli BBS

comment: Broke fairly from inside draw to be placed midfield, on the rail. Held up early in the straight and forced a run        through from 200m. Ran well to the line, and just missed a  place late.
comment_ch: 自內檔出閘一般，居中間位置，走內欄。直路早段受困，自二百米處起穿越空位上前。保持佳勢至終點，末段僅失三甲。

handicap_ch: 賽馬天下四十週年紀念盃（讓賽）
comment: Ridden all the way but stayed back, never a factor.
comment_ch: 沿途受催策，但留居後列。從未有力一爭。
owner: Michael T H Lee & Dr Henry Chan Hin Lee

comment: Niggled early; not willing to stretch.
comment_ch: 一早已騎, 唔多肯走

comment: Racing backwards when asked coming down the Rock.
comment_ch: 落山已騎，不進反退
owner: Ricky Wong Kin Chat & Helen Leung Yee Wan

comment: Began awkwardly, and positioned at the rear of the field    early. Crowded out of a run and lost some ground at 800m.   Asked to go at 350m, but had already lost contact with the  field, and was eased out late.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，早段居馬群後列。八百米處受擠迫，略為失地。三百五十米處受催策，但已被馬群拋離，末段收慢。

comment: Dropped back early to be near the tail of the field, 1 off  the fence. Unsettled early and was forced 4-5 wide at the   800m. Unlucky at the top of the straight, and taken widest. Too much to do late and never in it.
comment_ch: 早段墮退，居接近尾列位置，走第二疊。早段難以穩定走勢，八百米處須走第四至第五疊。直路初一度處於窘境，其後移至最外疊。末段仍落後，從未能追前。
owner: Lau Chi Kit, Tony Lee, Kevin Law Hau Wai & John Lo Wah Shing

comment: Started ok & raced 1 off 1 back, shuffled to midfield,      niggled 700m, driven 450m & shifted out, quickened to vie   for 2nd, tapered & swamped final 150m.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，落後一個馬位，走第二疊。留居中間位置，七百米及四百五十米處兩度受催策，移向外疊。加速上前爭奪第二位，最後一百五十米轉弱及被超越。
owner: Mr & Mrs Michael Cheng Wing On

comment: Settled at rear; found nothing when asked in the straight.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑，直路騎落無走勢

comment: Fast start wide, snagged to race fore of mid & trapped 3    wide no cover, overraced, shaken up 400m, tapered out       centre track.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘快速，收慢，居中間之前位置，走第三疊，沒有遮擋，跑來搶口。四百米處受催策。在跑道中央競跑，逐漸轉弱。
owner: Mr & Mrs Julian Chow Kai Wo, Chow Wing Shuen and Chow Cheuk Wai

comment: Began awkwardly, dropping back to last early, keen and on   heels. Keen up the back straight before becoming unbalanced at 700m. Last on the turn, but ran steadily to the line and picked up some slower ones late.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，早段墮居包尾位置，跑來搶口，靠近他駒後蹄競跑。對面直路上繼續搶口，七百米處失去平衡。直路彎居包尾位置。直路上穩步上前，末段超越數匹走勢較緩慢的對手。

comment: From widest barrier soon taken across behind runners,       settled last over 10Ls off the pace, not found much when    pushed along, soon beaten.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後瞬即在馬群之後移入內疊，居包尾位置，落後領放馬逾十個馬位。受推策，但無甚餘力，瞬即洩氣。

comment: Never a factor.
comment_ch: 從未有力一爭。

comment: Ridden along early but wide, before easing behind midfield  in one-off position. One-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 早段受催策，走外疊。其後收慢留居中間之後位置，走第二疊。直路上保持同速。

comment: Limited response when asked; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 騎落一般, 未見佳處

comment: Ran on well for 2nd when shifted out at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百移出, 佳勢上前

comment: Began fairly, shaken up to hold rail position behind        midfield. Lay in and unbalanced turn, kept on fairly in     straight.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，受催策，居中間之後位置，走內欄。轉彎時內閃及失去平衡。直路上保持普通走勢。

comment: Slow to begin; made progress saving ground.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 慳位追趕

comment: Began OK, not pressured, racing towards rear in one-off     position. Switched out wide in straight to make run but     found little under pressure.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，未受催策，居後列，走第二疊。直路上移出外疊取位，在催策下反應平平。

comment: Hard ridden forward to obtain a prominent spot,  kept on    well for 3rd.
comment_ch: 受大力催策佔取前列位置，保持佳勢跑獲第三。

comment: Up with the pace; flattened in the straight.
comment_ch: 跟前, 直路力度已減
owner: Joseph Choi Yip Leung & Choi Fong Hon Mei

comment: Always at rear, made no impression in straight.
comment_ch: 一直居後列，直路上毫無表現。

comment: Wide throughout; under a hold to race under his own steam.
comment_ch: 全程外疊, 拖住順走

comment: Hampered soon after start, then ridden to hold one-out      position behind midfield. Found little in straight but      awkwardly placed close to heels final stages.
comment_ch: 出閘後不久受阻，其後受催策，居中間之後位置，走第二疊。直路上再無餘力。末段靠近前駒後蹄處於窘境。

handicap: AUDEMARS PIGUET LADY ROYAL OAK HANDICAP
comment: Began well, pressed forward but wide, before slipping       behind midfield at turn. Turned wide, picked up momentum    from 300m, just failed.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。受催策上前，走外疊。直路彎居中間之後位置，走外疊。自三百米處起增速，僅敗。

comment: Pushed to sit in front of midfield, 2 wide, ran on well to  the line for 3rd.
comment_ch: 受推策居中間之前位置，走第二疊。以佳勢上前至終點，跑獲季軍。

comment: In touch early; kept on ok late for place.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑, 走勢持續

comment: Fairly away, but pushed forward early to be early leader.   Set very slow pace early, tending to get the head up when   restrained. Led on the turn, but had nothing left and faded late. Subsequently found to be lame.
comment_ch: 出閘一般。早段受推策上前帶頭，以十分緩慢的步速領放。其後受約束時傾向昂首。直路彎仍保持領先，但末段再無餘力及力竭。賽後被發現不良於行。

comment: Ran on strongly when asked late.
comment_ch: 拉士有騎，走勢有力
owner: Lim U Po Chu & Wong Ching Yue

comment: Urged to lead from the break, set even pace, kept on        soundly leaving the turn, headed near 100M, pleasing debut.
comment_ch: 出閘後在催策下取得領先，以平穩步速領放。跑離直路彎時保持佳勢。接近一百米處時被超越。首戰表現可喜。
owner: Alan Tsang Ping Sing, Fiona Tsang Wai Sze & Claudia Tsang Hei Man

comment: Made progress steadily to score; moved better than before.
comment_ch: 逐步追上, 成熟進步

comment: Began well from gate 13, sent forward to take the lead,     easy lead on turn, headed near 250M, weakened thereafter.
comment_ch: 自第十三檔出閘迅速，受催策上前，取得領先。直路彎輕鬆領放。接近二百五十米處時被超越，其後轉弱。
owner: Peter Lam Kin Ngok & Stephen Ip Shu Kwan

comment: Broke well, ridden to hold rail before checked 800m but     holding box seat. Set off after leader on straightening but only one-paced final 200m.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策固守內欄。八百米處勒避，保持居包廂位置。入直路時跟隨領放馬發力，但最後二百米僅能保持同速。

comment: Raced at rear; not willing to stretch.
comment_ch: 遠遠包尾, 唔多肯走
owner: Wong Wai Kan & Dr William Wong Tsing Wai

comment: Sent forward to take the rail and led by 1L, dropped off    gradually from 350M out.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，移入內欄，落後一個馬位。自三百五十米處起逐漸墮退。

comment: Lost ground start but picked up quickly to settle four-back into turn. Came off fence entering straight, powered        through to lead 150m, run down final strides.
comment_ch: 出閘後失地，但迅速追前，入彎時落後四個馬位。入直路時移離內欄，受催策上前，一百五十米處取得領先。最後數步被超越。

comment: Broke well from the middle draw, raced wide in prominent    position around stables bend, settled just off the pace in  2nd far side, faded under pressure after straightening.
comment_ch: 自中檔出閘迅速，轉馬房彎時居前列，走外疊。對面直路上居領放馬稍後的第二位。入直路後在催策下力竭。

comment: Taken back early; hit the line strongly when clear in the Straight.
comment_ch: 起步拖住，直路望空，自動湧上
owner: Eleanor Kwok Law Kwai Chun & Patrick Kwok Ho Chuen

comment: Made progress steadily when shifted out in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路移出, 逐步追趕

comment: Slowly away, raced 7 to 8 lengths back at tail, still well  back on turn, failed to close off in straight, never a      threat.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居尾列，落後領放馬七至八個馬位。直路彎仍遙居於後。直路上衝刺乏力。從未能構成威脅。

comment: Began OK, not pushed, settling behind midfield. Lost        position final turn when blocked for running, kept on       one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，未受推策，居中間之後位置。轉直路彎受困時失位。直路上保持同速。

comment: Began well from gate 1, raced in midfield, closer to the    middle of the track, stayed on same pace, never troubled    the first few.
comment_ch: 自第一檔出閘迅速，居中間位置。靠近跑道中央競跑，保持同速，但未能威脅前數名馬匹。

comment: Pushed forward, enjoyed the slow sectionals, drifted away   300M to score.
comment_ch: 受推策上前。慢步速適合發揮。三百米處帶離對手勝出。

comment: Jumped well, shared early pace till taking box seat 1750m.  Saved ground turn, steadied 300m when unable to get clear   run, picked up pace but steadied again 80m, plugged on.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，早段並排領先，一千七百五十米處留居包廂位置。直路彎走內欄節省腳程。三百米處未能望空時收慢，其後加速，但八十米處再度收慢，保持同速。

handicap: HKU JOCKEY CLUB STUDENT VILLAGES HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 香港大學賽馬會舍堂村讓賽
comment: Began OK, before settling just worse than midfield, 1 off   the fence. Faded badly from turn and tailed out.            Unacceptable performance.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可。居中間稍後位置，走第二疊。自直路彎起嚴重力竭，包尾大敗而回。表現難以接受。

comment: Blocked for a run at 300m; made ground mid track when cleared.
comment_ch: 三百受阻, 修正後中檔竄上

comment: In touch early; had a hold in straight.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑, 直路按住順走

comment: Began well, but stuck 3 wide forward of midfield before     pushing forward to lead at the 800m. Still in control at    the 150m, but peaked soon after and swamped late.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，但走第三疊，居中間之前位置，受推策上前，八百米處帶頭。一百五十米處仍然領先，但瞬即未能再增速，末段被馬群超越。

handicap_ch: 浪琴表國際騎師錦標賽（讓賽）－第一關
comment: Ridden to maintain forward position but held three-wide     without cover. Taken wider on straightening, kept on fairly to 150m then one-paced.
comment_ch: 受催策保持前列位置，但走第三疊，沒有遮擋。入直路時移出外疊，一百五十米處前保持一般走勢，其後保持同速。

comment: Gave limited response when asked to make ground.
comment_ch: 騎住追趕，未見佳處

comment: Jumped fairly, niggled along in midfield early stages,      moved closer rounding home bend, improving when hampered    200 metres out, soon renewed effort to claim 2nd near the   line.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，早段在催策下居中間位置。轉直路彎時進佔較接近位置，推進上前，二百米處受阻。瞬即重新發力，接近終點時取得亞軍。

comment: Settled midfield along the rail; limited response when asked.
comment_ch: 沿欄居中, 騎落唔多

comment: Ran on ordinary; tailed off.
comment_ch: 走勢乏力, 遠遠包尾

comment: Eased back, trapped 4 wide, pace good, made some ground in  straight.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，走第四疊。步速甚快，直路上略為上前。

comment: Jumped away well; just caught.
comment_ch: 起步敏捷, 埋門被過

comment: Slow to begin; being hard ridden and under whip in the Straight.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢, 直路又推又打
owner: Terry Chan Tat Wah, Cho Kwai Chee, Kwok Shun Tim & Lam Mau

comment: Rearward early; responded ok when asked at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百推騎, 反應唔錯

comment: Failed to muster speed, caught 3-wide in midfield, lacked   the needed response 350M, faded away 100M.
comment_ch: 未能加速，居中間位置，走第三疊。三百五十米處受催策但反應平平，一百米處墮退。

comment: Taken back to race behind runners; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 拖住跟跑，未見真章

comment: Taken back, 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover,        despite the fast tempo, ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 留後，落後領放馬六個馬位，在有遮擋下走第二疊。步速甚快，但走勢普通。
owner: Fong Kit Shan, Louisa Tang Sin Yee & Ken Lee Ka Fai

comment: Restrained on jumping and taken to fence at rear. Improved  around turn, had to weave between horses in straight but    finished strongly.
comment_ch: 出閘後受約束，移入內欄，居後列。轉直路彎時推進。直路上須在馬匹之間穿插上前，但衝刺強勁。
owner: Sammy Sean Lee & Aaron Lee Ho Ting

handicap_ch: 維多利亞賽馬會錦標（讓賽）
comment: Rolled forward from the inside draw, sat inside the lead    along the rail, kept on until 150M and then flattened.
comment_ch: 自內檔出閘後上前，居領放馬內側，走內欄。保持走勢至一百五十米處，其後洩氣。
owner: Anthony Ma Kwan Ping, Glenda Ma & Kevin Ma

comment: Pushed forward early, then steadied and crossed, sitting    3rd 2L off the leader. Tight  top of straight when looking  for a run, before switching to the rail. Ran well late,     barely missing a place in a blanket finish.
comment_ch: 早段受推策上前，其後收慢並被超越，居第三位，落後領放馬兩個馬位。直路早段尋找空位時受緊迫，繼而移向內欄。末段走勢良佳，在多駒齊過終點下僅失三甲。

comment: Restrained on jumping and shifted across behind runners     from an outside draw at rear. Raced keenly when shaken up   before turn, last into straight, plodded.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受約束，在馬群之後切入內欄，居後列。直路彎前受催策，跑來搶口。包尾入直路，緩緩上前。

comment: Bustled along to find the lead, led from 1100M and set good pace under 7lb claimer, couldn't fend off rivals near 250M  though and weakened rapidly towards finish.
comment_ch: 受催策以取得領先，在騎師獲讓七磅下自千一米處起以中等步速領放。接近二百五十米處時不敵對手挑戰，接近終點時迅速轉弱。

comment: Urged to lead along the fence; kept on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 貼欄快放，闖入一席

comment: Came from behind for 3rd when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段稍騎，後上第三

comment: Eased back early; made ground steadily on the inside for 3rd.
comment_ch: 早段稍留, 直路從內檔逐步上前

comment: OK away, before eventually settling midfield, 1 off the     fence. Pushed from the turn. Battled on in the straight and was weakening late, but just held 3rd.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，其後居中間位置，走第二疊。直路彎受推策。直路上力拼，末段轉弱，但僅保住季軍。

comment: Took rail, led easily at fast sectionals, dropped off       rapidly 400M.
comment_ch: 移入內欄，以快步速輕鬆領放。四百米處迅速墮退。

comment: Began well form draw 1, settled 3Ls back in 5th, pushed     along 500M, closed relentlessly under pressure to collar    leader 50M, edged away at the finish.
comment_ch: 自第一檔出閘迅速，居第五位，落後三個馬位。五百米處受推策。在催策下持續追前，五十米處超越領放馬，過終點時奠定勝局。

comment: Close up in 3rd, taken back for cover just behind the       leaders inside the 600 metres, found nothing under pressure in the run home.
comment_ch: 居接近的第三位，六百米處留居領放馬匹稍後有遮擋的位置。末段受催策，但再無餘力。

handicap_ch: 滙豐百週年紀念碗（讓賽）
comment: Pressed forward from an outside draw, taking over lead      passing 1050m. Kicked clear entering straight and kept on   strongly to line.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，受催策上前。跑過一千零五十米處時取得領先。入直路時加速帶離，保持勁勢至終點。

comment: Raced at rear; laying-in in the Straight.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑, 直路內閃

comment: Six wide at turn; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 六叠轉彎, 毫無走勢
owner: N T Heung Yee Kuk Syndicate

handicap: THE SPORTS CLUB DIAMOND JUBILEE CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 五陵會鑽禧挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Settled at the rear, 8-1/4L behind the leader 2-3 wide,     despite suited to the fast tempo, did not threaten.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬八又四分一個馬位，走第二至第三疊。儘管快步速適合發揮，但未能構成威脅。

comment: Taken back early to cut across; made progress centre track.
comment_ch: 起步拖後切入，直路從中檔追趕

comment: Broke ok, raced midfield on rail, rolled forward a spot     800m, switched out 400m & driven 350m, advanced to 3rd in   even run home.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居中間位置，走內欄。八百米處略為上前，四百米處移向外疊，三百五十米處受催策。上前居第三位，以穩定走勢衝刺。

comment: Prominent, travelled 2.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with    cover, benefited by the slow sectionals, ran on nicely to   get 3rd.
comment_ch: 居前列位置，落後領放馬兩個半馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。慢步速有利發揮，保持佳勢，跑獲第三。

comment: Began well, settling in midfield close to fence. Raced      tight early in straight but kept on steadily when clear to  be nearest at finish.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，留居中間位置，靠近內欄競跑。直路初緊迫競跑，望空後保持穩勢，過終點時最為接近。
owner: Rusy M Shroff & Purviz R Shroff

comment: Fast start, bustled up to 2nd 1 off no cover, shuffled to   3rd 1 back 600m, soon niggled, 3 wide & driven turning in,  plugged on one pace.
comment_ch: 出出閘迅速，受催策。居第二位，走第二疊，沒有遮擋。六百米處墮居第三位，落後一個馬位。瞬即受催策，入直路時走第三疊及受催策。保持同速。
owner: Wong Hing Chun, Wong Mee Chun & The Executors of the Estate of the late Wong Man Yui

comment: Urged to lead early; kept on for 2nd.
comment_ch: 主動搶放，末段仲有

comment: Never better than midfield, kept on same speed turning      home, never involved.
comment_ch: 從未超越中間位置，轉彎時保持同速。從未參與競逐。

comment: Under restraint along the rail; quickened  late to score.
comment_ch: 沿欄撐實, 拉士加速撲上

comment: Travelled at rear along the rail, 4-1/4L off the pace.      Improved gradually when rounding Home Turn, checked and     lost its running at 400M, never ran on thereafter.
comment_ch: 沿欄居後列，落後領放馬四又四分一個馬位。轉直路彎時逐漸推進。四百米處勒避及失去跑線，其後從未能追前。

comment: Driven forward to take the fence and share the lead, kept   on gamely until final 100M weakened.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，移入內欄，並排領先。保持勁勢，最後一百米轉弱。

comment: Always in touch; moved better than before to run 2nd.
comment_ch: 有前有後, 表現進步

comment: Never in contention; tailed off.
comment_ch: 遠遠包尾，乏善足陳

comment: Jumped away well; just caught late.
comment_ch: 起步敏捷，拉士被過

handicap: THE HONG KONG EXCHANGES CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港交易所挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Ridden early to stay close to pace before easing into       one-off position 4L from leader. Put under pressure turning for home but only one-paced.
comment_ch: 早段受催策，緊隨領放馬。其後收慢，落後領放馬四個馬位，走第二疊。轉直路彎時受催策，但僅能保持同速。

comment: Four wide at turn; quickened for 2nd.
comment_ch: 四疊轉彎，加速第二

comment: Cut across to rail after start; kept on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 起步搶欄, 放入一席
owner: Eddie Chow Bing Chung, Ivan Chow Ping Kin & Enrico Chow Yue Hin

comment: Raced midfield; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 居中跟跑, 追勢一般
owner: Eleanor Kwok Law Kwai Chun & Patrick Kwok Ho Chuen

comment: Urged to lead early; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 沿途搶放, 拉士按番住

comment: Dropped back early and sat 2nd last by the 1200m mark. Held the rail and looked to run on from the 300m, but never      responded to urgings and was eased out from the 150m.
comment_ch: 早段墮後，千二米處居尾二位置。固守內欄，自三百米處起看似逐漸上前，但在催策下全無反應，自一百五十米處起收慢。
owner: Wong Chung Hin & Arnold Wong Chi Chiu

comment: Ran on ordinary when asked at turn.
comment_ch: 入彎已騎, 走勢平常

owner: Fong Kit Shan, Louisa Tang Sin Yee & Ken Lee Ka Fai

comment: Began fairly, pushed along to settle behind leaders, asked  for effort on straightening but unable to quicken, one      paced to the line.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，受推策上前，居領放馬匹之後。入直路時受催策，但未能加速。保持同速至終點。

comment: Slow to begin; made progress steadily.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 逐步加快
owner: Mr & Mrs Sebastian Man Shiu Wai

comment: Pressed forward from widest draw, racing 3-wide 2.5L from   leader on settling. Lost position passing 1000m dropping    behind midfield but still 3-wide. Gave ground turning for   home and finished tailed out.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後受催策上前，落後領放馬兩個半馬位，走第三疊。跑過一千米處時失位，墮居中間之後位置，但仍走第三疊。轉入直路時墮退，包尾大敗而回。

comment: Quickened momentarily at turn; not properly tested late.
comment_ch: 彎位湧一湧，見好即收
owner: Dr the Hon Tang Ying Yen, Henry

comment: Settled midfield; not properly tested.
comment_ch: 扣實居中，走勢含蓄
owner: Stanley Tsang Ming Chit & Raymond Chu Wai Hang

comment: Under restraint early; quickened late to score.
comment_ch: 早段撐實，拉士加速取勝

comment: Being pushed early; weakened in the straight.
comment_ch: 起步已騎, 直路墮退

comment: Bumped start, at rear, raced 2-5 wide, harmed by the slow   pace, lack turn of foot.
comment_ch: 出閘時被碰撞。居後列，走第二至第五疊。步速緩慢，不利發揮。未能增速。
owner: James Lau Chi Wing, Lau Kai Tai & Michelle Lau Wing Sheung

comment: Began well, ridden along in midfield between horses but     travelled keenly after 1000m. Improved around turn, got     close 200m, then one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，居中間位置，在馬匹之間競跑，過了一千米處後搶口。直路彎上前，二百米處追近，其後保持同速。

comment: Badly crowded out on jumping, dropping to last. Never in    the hunt.
comment_ch: 出閘時嚴重受擠迫，墮居包尾位置。從未參與競逐。

comment: Pressed forward, took rail and led at fast sectionals, out  of fuel 200M, bumped 100M.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，走內欄，以快步速領放。二百米處力竭，一百米處與他駒互相碰撞。

comment: Broke well, ridden to lead, in front on rail 1st turn,      joined 1200m & passed soon after, raced at head of main     pack, ridden 700m, joined in on straightening, effort       short-lived, one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策取得領先，首次轉彎時沿欄領放。千二米處並排領先，其後瞬即被超越。居主馬群首位。七百米處受催策。入直路時並排領先。短暫發力，保持同速。

comment: Smart break, pushed forward from widest to press lead 1st   turn, 2nd & ridden 400m, handed lead 270m, all out & headed 190m, faded out.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘迅速，受推策上前，首次轉彎時追迫領放馬。四百米處居第二位，受催策，二百七十米處取得領先。全力以赴，一百九十米處被超越，力竭。
owner: Paul Lo Chung Wai & Kathy Lo Ho Hsiu Lan

comment: Wide throughout; ran on strong in the straight.
comment_ch: 全程蝕位，直路湧上

comment: Crowded for room 1100M and pushed to a wide no cover        position, strolled forward to chase leaders but had little  left passing 250M.
comment_ch: 千一米處受擠迫，被擠出外疊，沒有遮擋。上前追趕領先馬匹，但跑過二百五十米處時再無餘力。
owner: Cheung Ming Man, Cheung Ying Ho, Freddy Choi Kwok Sai & Joseph Lee Chung Tak

comment: Started with others, midfield 3 deep when overraced 1100m & shuffled to back of mid rank 1 off with cover, on & off     bridle, hard-ridden 420m, wide in stretch, stayed on for    late gains.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，居中間位置，走第三疊。千一米處搶口，墮居中間之後位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。一時上口，一時脫口，四百二十米處受力策。直路上走外疊。保持走勢，末段追前。

comment: Raced rearward; made some ground in straight.
comment_ch: 居後跟跑, 直路稍追

comment: On-pace early; weakened in the straight.
comment_ch: 跟前, 直路力度已減

comment: Began OK, allowed to stride forward but three-wide,         gradually edging forward to race outside leader turning for home. Kept on well early in straight before tiring final    200m.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，獲許展步上前，走第三疊。轉直路彎時逐漸上前居領放馬外側，直路初保持佳勢，最後二百米洩氣。

comment: Travelled in behind midfield, 5-1/2L behind 2 wide, slight  dash early but showed nothing thereafter.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後五個半馬位，走第二疊。早段略為上前，但其後毫無表現。

comment: Taken behind at break to race at tail, ridden 400m & kept   on past beaten rivals.
comment_ch: 出閘後留居尾列位置。四百米處受催策，保持走勢，超越兩匹已洩氣的對手。

comment: Began fairly, taken to rail and pressed forward four-back   from leader. Checked and shifted out 1100m losing ground,   one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，切入內欄，受催策上前，居領放馬四個馬位之後的位置。千一米處勒避及向外斜跑，因而失地。直路上保持同速。

comment: Eased to settle midfield from a wide gate, travelled 4Ls    behind the leader 2 wide with cover, switched wide turning  in, ran on nicely for 3rd.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後收慢，居中間位置，落後領放馬四個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。入直路時移出外疊。走勢良佳，跑獲季軍。

comment: Urged throughout; gave nothing.
comment_ch: 騎足全程，毫無走勢
owner: Sherman Ting Wing Cheung, Joyce Ting Tung Sum & David Ting Chi Ho

comment: At back 2 wide, dashed strongly 300M despite not suited by  the slow pace.
comment_ch: 居後列，走第二疊。步速緩慢，不合發揮，但三百米處仍以勁勢衝前。

comment: Six wide at turn; ran on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 六叠轉彎，走勢純熟
owner: Mok Kam Hung & Michael Mok Kwan Yuen

comment: Worked from a wide draw, eventually crossing to lead for    rails run at the Rock, led the field into straight but soon passed by the winner 300 metres out.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，受催策，切入內欄，大石鼓處取得領先。領先入直路，三百米處瞬即被頭馬超越。

comment: Settled midfield; ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 居中跟跑，中規中矩

comment: Behind midfield, 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, little dash 400M.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，走第二至第三疊。步速緩慢，不利發揮。四百米處略為上前。

comment: Eased back, 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash  250.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，走第二至第三疊。步速緩慢，不利發揮。二百五十米處略為上前。
owner: Ho Tze Man, Wilson Ng Ching Hung, Simon Chau Sik Ming & Ralph Hui Shu Tong

comment: Going backwards when being under whip over the final stages.
comment_ch: 末段開鞭，不進反退
owner: Boniface Ho Ka Kui & Steve Ho

comment: Settled at rear; found nothing when asked.
comment_ch: 居後跟跑，騎都唔郁
owner: Pang Wai Hak, Pang Ka Yeung & Andy Pang Ka Wai

comment: Up with the pace early; found nothing late.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑, 拉士唔多

comment: Not enough speed to lead; tailed off.
comment_ch: 起步放唔出, 遠遠包尾

comment: Steadied at 700m; hard ridden late.
comment_ch: 七百收慢，末段力騎

comment: Slow to begin; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，走勢平常

handicap: THE BOCHK WEALTH MANAGEMENT JOCKEY CLUB SPRINT
handicap_ch: 中銀理財馬會短途錦標
comment: Close up behind leaders early stages, 3Ls back in 5th       turning in but lacked a finishing response, faded to last   150M. (Bled)
comment_ch: 早段追近領先馬匹，入直路時居第五位，落後三個馬位。衝刺時在催策下欠缺反應，一百五十米處墮退至包尾。（流鼻血）

comment: Began OK, but had to come across from the wide draw to sit  worse than midfield, 4-5 wide. Came wide on the turn, but   only battled on fairly and was easing out late.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘普通，向內移入，居中間之後位置，走第四至第五疊。直路彎走外疊，走勢僅屬一般，末段收慢。

comment: Eased back, took rail, pace good, progressed steadily 250M.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，移入內欄。步速甚快。二百五十米處穩步上前。

comment: Hard ridden to keep up at back along the fence, no progress.
comment_ch: 在力策下留居後列，走內欄。毫無進展。

comment: Ran on fairly well when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路推騎，走勢不俗

comment: Responded fairly well when under whip at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百開鞭，反應不差
owner: Lianne Lam & Matthew Lam Kin Hong

comment: Settled on rail at rear; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 沿欄居後, 未受考驗

comment: Outpaced, taken to rail, settling in last pair. Failed to   quicken at any stage and never competitive.
comment_ch: 前速不及對手，其後移入內欄，居最後兩位。沿途未能加速，從未見具競爭力。

comment: On pace early; raced under his own steam in the Straight.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，直路未曾騎過

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls behind the leader 3  4 wide  with cover, not suited by the slow tempo, never ran on.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬三個馬位，走第三至第四疊，有遮擋。步速緩慢，不合發揮。從未能追前。
owner: HK Football Club Horse Racing Syndicate

comment: Ridden early but found pace too hot, dropping behind        midfield. Came off fence turning for home, battled on       gamely in straight, doing best work final 100m.
comment_ch: 早段受催策，但未能跟上前速，墮至中間之後位置。轉入直路時移離內欄，直路上以勁勢力拼。最後一百米表現最佳。

comment: Taken back from a wide gate, travelled 6Ls behind the       leader 2 wide with cover, ran on well for 4th.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後留後，落後領放馬六個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。以佳勢上前，取得第四名。
owner: Tony Lo Chin Ho, Kwok Ying Lung & Wong Tsz Wa

comment: Kept on when asked late.
comment_ch: 拉士推騎，保持走勢

handicap: POK FU LAM PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 薄扶林公眾騎術學校讓賽
comment: Prominent, travelled 3/4L off the pace grand side, dropped  off when bumped prior 250M, made up ground nicely           thereafter for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居前列，落後領放馬四分三個馬位，靠近外欄競跑。二百五十米處前被碰撞時墮退，其後追前甚多，取得季軍。
owner: Au Kai Kwong & Michelle Jessica Au

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, ran on well for 2nd, however, beaten by an           impressive winner.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬三個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。保持佳勢跑獲第二，敗於強勁頭馬蹄下。

comment: Came from behind to score when asked at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百考驗，後上取勝

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls behind the leader on the      fence, despite harmed by the slow pace, blocked 200M,       finished off well for 2nd when clear.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬三個馬位，走內欄。儘管慢步速不利發揮，而且二百米處受困，但望空後衝刺良佳，取得亞軍。

handicap_ch: 日本中央競馬會錦標（讓賽）
comment: First out but not pushed, setting in box seat back stretch. Shuffled two-back entering turn, no room top of straight,   boxed on.
comment_ch: 出閘最快，但未受推策，對面直路上居包廂位置。進入直路彎時墮後兩個馬位。直路早段空位不足，其後力拼上前。
owner: Eric Cheng Kam Chung & Vene Cheng Wing Ni

comment: Came home well from behind for 2nd.
comment_ch: 後上第二，走勢純熟
owner: William Ching Hon Kuen & Raymond Ching Wei Man

comment: Raced midfield; moved only fairly.
comment_ch: 居中跟跑，中規中矩
owner: Dr Daniel Lee Tin Chak, Daisy Ho Chiu Fung, Pansy Ho Chiu King & Maisy Ho Chiu Ha

comment: Behind midfield, trapped 3-4 wide, suited by the fast pace, no progress in straight.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，走第三至第四疊。快步速適合發揮。直路上毫無進展。

comment: Ridden at turn; made minor inroad late.
comment_ch: 彎位已騎，末段稍追

comment: Slow start, raced tail centre track, niggled to advance a   spot 450m, ridden 400m & edged towards far side, plodded on past fading rivals.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居尾列，在跑道中央競跑。四百五十米處在催策下略為上前。四百米處受催策，在內疊上前，保持同速，超越力竭的對手。

comment: Moderate start, always in last few and never seen with a    chance.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，一直居最後數位，從未有力一爭。

comment: Began smartly from gate 2, raced a length or so back in     4th, finished off very well to get 2nd, nice debut.
comment_ch: 自第二檔出閘迅速，居第四位，落後約一個馬位。衝刺甚佳，初出即跑獲亞軍，表現良佳。

comment: Hard ridden to take rail and led at good sectionals,        reduced quickly 200M.
comment_ch: 受力策佔取內欄，以快步速領放。二百米處迅速轉弱。

comment: On pace early; not making ground in the Straight.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢, 直路未能再進

comment: At rear, travelled 9Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, under pressure rounding the Home Turn, made plenty of       ground in straight.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬九個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。轉直路彎時受催策。直路上追前甚多。

comment: Flattened halfway; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 半程乏力, 試來欠集中
owner: Mr & Mrs Li Yiu Keung and Clement Li

handicap: THE BOCHK WEALTH MANAGEMENT JOCKEY CLUB MILE
handicap_ch: 中銀理財馬會一哩錦標
comment: Began fairly, driven forward to sit one-back, one-off on    settling. Switched out top of straight to go forward, hit   front passing 100m, run down close to line.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策上前，居第二位，走第二疊。直路初向外移出上前，跑過一百米處時取得領先，接近終點時被超越。
owner: Ming Shui Sum & Alice Ming Bo Ting

comment: Restrained in midfield early, shifted out to 3-wide 700M,   pushed wider 550M, kept up with the pursuit to 150M,        flattened late stages. (Jockey questioned)
comment_ch: 早段留居中間位置。七百米處向外移出，走第三疊。五百五十米處受推策，移出更外疊。一百五十米處前繼續力追。末段洩氣。（騎師被查詢此駒的跑法。）

comment: Slow start & bumped rival, driven at tail, soon 2/3L        detached, some headway home turn & shifted out in stretch,  stayed on past beaten rivals.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，碰撞對手。居包尾，受催策，瞬即落後馬群兩至三個馬位。直路彎略為上前，直路上移出外疊。保持走勢，超越數匹已洩氣的對手。
owner: Mr & Mrs Senta Wong and Vinci Wong

comment: Raced greenly; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 走勢生硬，無段好睇

comment: Broke on terms, outpaced early, settled beyond midfield 3   deep, overracing 800m, ridden 4 deep 600m, widest into      straight, never in it.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，早段被拋離，居中間之後位置，走第三疊。八百米處跑來搶口。六百米處走第四疊，受催策。入直路時走最外疊，從未能爭勝。

comment: Crowded for room at start, shifted across behind runners    and last on settling. Switched out entering straight and    ran on steadily.
comment_ch: 出閘時受擠迫。在馬群之後切入內疊，居包尾位置。入直路時移出外疊，穩步上前。

comment: Made ground steadily; ran on comfortably for 2nd.
comment_ch: 逐步追趕，從容第二

comment: Hard ridden forward, box seat, not suited by the fast       sectionals, ran on until 200M flattened.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，居包廂位置。快步速不合發揮。持續上前，二百米處洩氣。

comment: First to jump; hit the line strong to score.
comment_ch: 應聲彈出, 貫注到底

comment: Began well, stayed with pace but lost position after being  crossed first turn. Switched out in straight and boxed on   gamely.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，跟上步速，但首個彎位被超越後失位。直路上向外移出，持續力拼。
owner: Mr & Mrs Kenny Cheng Tsin Ki

comment: Raced handy; hit front late.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，拉士透出

comment: Settled in front of midfield about 3Ls behind the leader 2  wide with cover, harmed by the fast tempo, weakened 250M.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，落後領放馬約三個馬位，在有遮擋下走第二疊。步速甚快，不利發揮。二百五十米處轉弱。

comment: Bumped start, positioned a length or so back in 2nd, easy   run throughout, kept on well in straight to score.
comment_ch: 起步時碰撞他駒，居第二位，落後約一個馬位。沿途走勢輕鬆。直路上保持佳勢，勝出賽事。
owner: Tony Yue Kwok Leung, Alexander Yue Ka Kuen & Richard Yue Ka Ming

comment: Slow to begin; mage ground at turn; flattened in the straight.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 入彎上前, 直路唔多
owner: Eleanor Kwok Law Kwai Chun & Kitty Kwok Sea Nga

comment: Driven after the start but outpaced by early leaders,       settled 3-4Ls back, pushed to 2-wide from 1200M, under      pressure and looked beaten at top of straight but responded to jockey's perseverance to claim 5th.
comment_ch: 出閘後受催策，早段被領先馬匹拋離，落後領放馬三至四個馬位。自千二米處起受催策走第二疊，直路初受催策及看似洩氣。在騎師持續催策下作出反應，跑獲第五名。
owner: Lim U Po Chu & Wong Ching Yue

comment: Settled midfield; ran on ok.
comment_ch: 不上不落，但走勢不差
owner: Mr & Mrs James Tien Pei Chun

handicap: LEI YUE MUN PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 鯉魚門公眾騎術學校讓賽
comment: Took lead easily, hung on well to win.
comment_ch: 從容領先，保持佳勢勝出。

comment: Jumped fast, eased, settled midfield 3 deep no cover,       roused along 850m, lost position 700m, checked 480m, stayed on, outpaced.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，收慢，居中間位置，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。八百五十米處受催策，七百米處失位。四百八十米處勒避，保持走勢，但被拋離。

comment: Hard ridden forward, 2 wide, benefited by the slow          sectionals, ran on well to the line, just hold on to win.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，走第二疊。步速緩慢，有利發揮。末段以佳勢上前，僅勝。

comment: Urged for the lead; kept on late for 3rd.
comment_ch: 騎住搶出，末段唔斷

comment: Held up 2-wide in midfield, inclined to lay in 900M, kept   on steadily from 300M, awkwardly placed 100M, took 3rd just before line.
comment_ch: 留居中間位置，走第二疊。九百米處傾向內閃。自三百米處起保持穩勢。一百米處處於窘境，終點前取得季軍。

comment: Eased at start, took cover at rear, pace good, made the     move around the field in 4-5 wide, unleashed strong         finishing efforts 250M.
comment_ch: 起步後收慢，居後列，取得遮擋。步速中等。繞過馬群上前，走第四至第五疊。二百五十米處展開強勁衝刺。

comment: Outpaced and soon at rear in one-out position. Well back    entering straight before picking up momentum 250m to finish close behind place-getters.
comment_ch: 出閘後被拋離，瞬即居後列，走第二疊。入直路時遙遙落後，二百五十米處加速，緊隨三甲馬匹過終點。

comment: Ran on ok under whip at 400m.
comment_ch: 四百開鞭，反應不差

comment: On-pace early; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢, 直路按番住

comment: Shifted out in the straight; plenty in hand.
comment_ch: 直路移出，大把在手

comment: Raced midfield; failed to quicken under hard riding.
comment_ch: 大力推騎, 未見加速

comment: Held up in midfield along the rail, 4Ls off the strong pace on settling, no clear run to 300M, switched and ran on well making late gains on 3rd.
comment_ch: 留居中間位置，落後快步速的領放馬四個馬位，走內欄。三百米處前未能望空。末段轉換跑線，走勢良佳，追近季軍馬匹。

handicap: THE KOWLOON CRICKET CLUB CENTENARY CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 九龍木球會百週年紀念盃（讓賽）
comment: Began well, raced with leading pack to 800m before settling 2L back. Kept on well to 200m before tiring.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，居領放馬群之中，八百米處落後兩個馬位。保持佳勢，二百米處呈現疲態。

comment: Ridden to stay close to early pace but left wide without    cover from 1200m. Kept on fairly in straight before tiring  final 200m.
comment_ch: 早段受催策，保持在接近領放馬的位置，但自千二米處起在沒遮擋下走外疊。直路上保持一般走勢，最後二百米漸呈疲態。

comment: Hampered start, recovered and pressed forward to settle     one-back, one-off. Rolled forward top of straight but       unable to sustain effort. One-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘時受阻。恢復走勢，受催策上前，落後領放馬一個馬位，走第二疊。直路早段上前，但未能持續勁勢。保持同速。

comment: With early leaders, retrained along the fence 3Ls behind    leader, had every chance inside 300M, kept pace with the    leaders until weakening final 100M.
comment_ch: 早段與領放馬匹並跑。受約束，落後領放馬三個馬位，沿欄競跑。三百米處已獲機會盡展所長。與領放馬匹並跑，最後一百米轉弱。
owner: Wong Wai Kan & Dr William Wong Tsing Wai

comment: Looking for cover early; made progress for 3rd when asked.
comment_ch: 早段找遮擋, 拉士輕騎追上

comment: Settled midfield along the fence; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 沿欄居中, 走勢平常
owner: Tony Lau Yiu Tong, Thomas Lau Sum Fai & Lau Yi Fai

handicap: TUEN MUN PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 屯門公眾騎術學校讓賽
comment: Started well & bustled to fore of midfield on rail,         over-raced 850m, awkward on turn, ridden into stretch,      switched out 300m, stayed on dourly for 3rd.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，受催策，居中間之前位置，走內欄。八百五十米處搶口，直路彎處於窘境。受催策入直路，三百米處移出外疊，保持勁勢，跑獲季軍。

comment: Taken back, travelled 7Ls behind the leader 2 wide with     cover, benefited by the fast sectionals, made plenty of     ground in straight.
comment_ch: 留後，落後領放馬七個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。快步速有利發揮。直路上追前頗多。

comment: Wide throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 全程外疊, 未見真章

comment: Pressed forward 3-wide from outside draw, settling 3-back,  one-off. Urged forward top of straight and kept on well to  line.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘，受催策上前，走第三疊。其後落後三個馬位，走第二疊。直路初受催策上前，保持佳勢至終點。

handicap: THE HONG KONG CLUB CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
comment: Allowed to settle early, holding rail 2-back from leading   pair. Closed in slightly around turn, switch out in         straight, finished well.
comment_ch: 早段獲許穩定走勢，落後領先兩駒兩個馬位，固守內欄。轉直路彎時略為追前。直路上向外移出，以佳勢衝刺。

comment: Bounded in the air on jumping and slow to begin; raced under his own steam.
comment_ch: 起擒慢閘，隨意跟跑

comment: Responded well when clear in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路望空，推騎追近

comment: Travelled towards the rear, mostly wide and without cover,  not a factor.
comment_ch: 居後列，大多走外疊，沒有遮擋。從未構成威脅。

comment: Last to jump; made progress steadily in the Straight.
comment_ch: 起步最慢, 直路逐步追趕
owner: Raymond Leung Yim San, Leung Chung Wai & Leung Chung Shun

comment: Being asked at turn; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 轉彎已騎, 走勢欠勁

comment: Performed fairly well when made progress along the rail.
comment_ch: 沿欄追趕，表現唔曳
owner: Henry Chan Chi Chiu & Chan Chee Ling

comment: Jumped fairly settling in midfield, soon came to challenge  after straightening, quickened well to take charge 100      metres out.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，居中間位置。入直路後瞬即展開挑戰，加速良佳，一百米處超越對手。
owner: Danny Lau Tat Pong, Liu Ling Yi, Ho Tak Sum & Lee Wong Tim

comment: At rear, 2-3 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, no dash.
comment_ch: 居後列，走第二至第三疊。步速甚快，有利發揮。衝刺乏力。
owner: Chan Nam Lee, Ng Hung Yau, Wong Ting Chung & George Lau Ka Keung

comment: Niggled along throughout; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 騎足全程，走勢一般

comment: Taken back, travelled 7Ls behind the leader 2 wide with     cover, despite harmed by the slow sectionals, made some     ground in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘後留後，落後領放馬七個馬位，在有遮擋下走第二疊。步速緩慢，不利發揮。直路上略為追前。

comment: Steadied soon after start, shifted across behind runners,   and last on settling. Switched out in straight and ran on   fairly.
comment_ch: 出閘後瞬即收慢，在馬群之後切入內疊，居包尾。直路上移向外疊，保持普通走勢。

comment: Rolled to occupy the box seat, travelled nicely behind the  leader, ran on steadily until final 50M weakened.
comment_ch: 上前佔取包廂位置，在領放馬之後競跑，走勢良佳。穩步上前，最後五十米轉弱。
owner: Cheung Ming Man, Cheung Ying Ho, Freddy Choi Kwok Sai & Joseph Lee Chung Tak

comment: Broke well, surged forward to lead narrowly on settling but kept away from outer fence by another runner. Set good pace to 400m when overtaken and gave ground gradually.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，上前以短距離領先，但受一駒阻擋而未能移至外欄。以甚快步速領放，四百米處被超越，逐漸墮退。

comment: Slow to begin; made ground steadily and just missed.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，逐步加速撲上

comment: At back, never a factor.
comment_ch: 居後列，從未有力一爭。

handicap_ch: 浪琴表國際騎師錦標賽（讓賽）－第二關
comment: Jumped well, steadied and shifted across behind runners     from outside draw, settling at rear. Took inside run in     straight and ran on steadily.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘良佳，收慢在馬群之後切入內疊，居後列位置。直路上走內疊，保持穩勢。

comment: On-pace early; quickened for 2nd when asked late.
comment_ch: 跟放，拉士騎落有加速力

comment: Limited response when being hard ridden.
comment_ch: 大力推騎，反應一般

comment: Led along the rail; under a hold in the Straight.
comment_ch: 沿欄搶放，直路按番住

handicap_ch: 新加坡賽馬公會錦標（讓賽）
comment: Raced in midfield along the rail, about 3-3/4L behind, away from rail at 800M, checked at 400M, ran on slightly late.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後約三又四分三馬位，走內欄。八百米處移離內欄。四百米處勒避。末段略為上前。

comment: Raced wide throughout; ran on ok for 2nd.
comment_ch: 全程外叠, 從容第二

comment: Very slow away, took rail at back, pace good, made steady   ground 300M for 3rd.
comment_ch: 出閘十分緩慢。移入內欄，居後列，步速甚快。三百米處穩步上前，跑獲季軍。

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, ran on only fairly.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬三個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。僅能保持普通走勢。

comment: Going all over the place when asked in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路推騎，閃出閃入

comment: Crowded on jumping; made progress steadily for 3rd.
comment_ch: 起步擠迫，分段加速追上

comment: Up with the pace; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，點到即止

comment: Up with pace; kept on ok.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，保持速度

comment: Always in touch; kept on well to score.
comment_ch: 前後俱備，直領到底

comment: Ridden along behind midfield early but kept wide, covering  extra ground around turn. One-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 早段居中間之後位置，受催策，走外疊，直路彎多走腳程。直路上保持同速。
owner: Terence Leung Chi Kin, Patrick Wong Man Kam, Jason Leung Hok Shan & Jeffrey Mark Wong

comment: Taken back and travelled at the rear, 7L behind 3 wide with cover, made impressive ground and ran home strongly.
comment_ch: 留居後列，落後領放馬七個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。追前甚多，衝刺強勁。
owner: Samson Yip Yan Tion, Dumas Chow Wai Sang & Eric Tong Man Leung

comment: Jumped only fairly; weakened halfway.
comment_ch: 起步一般, 半程乏力墮退

comment: Began well, before easing back to sit worse than midfield,  1 off the fence. Stayed close to the rail and ran OK to the line under hands and heels, closing margins late.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，繼而收慢留居中間之後位置，走第二疊。持續靠近內欄競跑，在騎師手足並用催策下衝刺尚可，末段追近對手。

comment: Always in touch; kept on well.
comment_ch: 有前有後，靱力十足

comment: Settled behind runners; ran on strongly.
comment_ch: 沿途跟馬林, 走勢洶湧

comment: Raced without cover; limited response when asked.
comment_ch: 望空競走，騎落唔多
owner: Dr Chang Fuk To & Maria Chang Lee Ming Shum

comment: Niggled along coming down the Rock; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 落山已騎，走勢生硬

comment: Crowded start, travelled 4.5Ls behind the leader stand      side, ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 起步時受擠迫，落後領放馬四個半馬位，走外欄。走勢一般。
owner: Fung Kok Po & Raymond Liu Wai Fung

handicap_ch: 法國賽馬及育馬委員會讓賽
comment: Slow to jump, at last and travelled detached throughout.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居包尾位置。沿途脫離馬群。

comment: On-pace early; ran on ok under a hold.
comment_ch: 跟放，末段按住順走
owner: Philip Yu Chi Wai & Dr Jennie Hope Peterson

comment: Quickly guided to the fence, sat 3Ls off leader ahead of    mid-division, pushed along middle of home turn, couldn't    pick up turning home, eased when no chance.
comment_ch: 迅速移入內欄，居中間之前位置，落後領放馬三個馬位。直路彎中段受推策，轉入直路時未能加速。再無爭勝機會，收慢。

comment: Ridden to stay with pace but held wide without cover 5L     from leader. Held position to straight before tiring.
comment_ch: 受催策跟上步速，在沒遮擋下走外疊，落後領放馬五個馬位。直路前保持位置，其後漸呈疲態。

comment: Pressed forward, settling in 2nd, 2L behind leader to       straight. Kept battling to 200m before giving ground.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，直路前居第二位，落後領放馬兩個馬位。持續力拼至二百米處，繼而墮退。

comment: Began awkwardly, went forward tracking leaders along the    inside, kept up the chase entering straight, held final     100M.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，上前跟隨領先馬匹，走內疊。入直路時持續追趕，最後一百米不敵對手。

comment: Ridden along throughout; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 沿途俾住，未見加速
owner: Natalis Chan Pak Cheung & Ceci Wong Hang Sau

comment: Not quickened when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段推騎，未見加速

comment: Dashed on strongly when asked late.
comment_ch: 拉士考驗，反應凌厲
owner: Billy Chan Wing Kwong & Billy Chan Chun Kit

comment: Laying in throughout; but still hit the line strongly to score.
comment_ch: 沿途內閃，走勢仍勁

comment: Taken back from a wide gate, unable to slot in, raced 3     wide and without cover at rear, slightly improved on turn,  emptied early in straight when hard run took effect.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後留後。未能移入內欄，居後列，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。直路彎略為上前。因已耗力太多，直路早段再無餘力。

comment: Hampered at start; closed off well.
comment_ch: 起步碰撞，後上接近

comment: Pushed forward to take the rail and shared lead, remained   competitive until final 200M weakened.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，並排領先，走內欄。二百米處前保持爭勝機會，其後轉弱。

comment: Camped handy, faded badly soon after straightening,
comment_ch: 居前列，入直路後瞬即嚴重力竭。

comment: Under restraint along the rail; never tested in the Straight.
comment_ch: 沿欄扣實, 直路未曾騎過

comment: Settled worse than midfield, travelled 5Ls behind the       leader 3 wide with cover, ran on steadily until final 100M  weakened.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬五個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。穩步上前，最後一百米轉弱。

comment: Caught wide no cover early stages, strode forward to lead   passing 1200M, led uncontested to straight but couldn't     find extra when challenged by rivals inside 300M, faded     towards the finish.
comment_ch: 早段走外疊，沒有遮擋。跑過千二米處時展步上前領放。直路前單騎領放，但最後三百米受對手挑戰時再無餘力。接近終點時力竭。

comment: Settled worse than midfield about 7Ls behind the leader     along the fence, suited by the fast sectionals, ran on      fairly.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬約七個馬位，沿欄競跑。快步速適合發揮。走勢一般。

comment: Taken back at start, detached at tail until closed up 700m, minor advance 3 deep 550m, very wide into stretch, found    nil.
comment_ch: 出閘後留居包尾位置，遙遙落後。七百米處追近主馬群。五百五十米處略為上前，走第三疊。入直路時走大外疊。再無餘力。
owner: Albert Po Ying Wai, Frances Po, Raymond Po Chit Hei & Rebecca Po Pui Yan

comment: Ridden to hold rail position, settling 3-back from leader.  Came off fence passing 600m but caught in traffic until     300m before finishing strongly.
comment_ch: 在催策下固守內欄，落後領放馬三個馬位。跑過六百米處時移離內欄。三百米處前受困，其後以勁勢衝刺。

comment: Pressed forward to share the lead stand side, stayed on     until final 300M weakened.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，並排領先，走外欄。保持走勢，最後三百米轉弱。

comment: Bumped start, no speed, settling between horses at the      rear. Took inside run in straight but only one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘時受碰撞，欠缺前速。居後列，在馬匹之間競跑。直路上走內疊，僅能保持同速。

comment: Flattened in the straight; ran last.
comment_ch: 直路乏力, 包尾而回

handicap_ch: 法國賽馬會馬主事務部讓賽
comment: Hard ridden to be in front of midfield, 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, unleashed strong finishing efforts 300M and got 3rd.
comment_ch: 受力策，居中間之前位置，走第二至第三疊。慢步速不利發揮，三百米處衝刺凌厲。跑獲季軍。

comment: Always at rear, harmed by the very slow sectionals, never   ran on.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列。步速十分緩慢，不利發揮。從未能追前。

comment: Shaken up at start, close up briefly before gradually       dropping towards last few coming out of back straight, no   response under pressure in the run home.
comment_ch: 出閘後受催策，一度追前，跑離對面直路時逐漸墮居最後數位，直路上受催策但未能交出反應。

comment: Pushed forward to take the rail and led by a nose, headed   passing 150M but kept on until flattened inside 100M.
comment_ch: 受推策上前移入內欄，領先一馬鼻位。跑過一百五十米處時被超越，但保持走勢，最後一百米洩氣。

comment: Under restraint early; kept on one-pace in the Straight.
comment_ch: 早段撐實，直路保持速度

comment: Began moderately; raced at rear.
comment_ch: 起步一般，墮後跟跑

comment: Soon dropped to last few, one-paced.
comment_ch: 瞬即墮居最後數位，保持同速。

comment: Under a hold throughout; ran on strong after the post.
comment_ch: 起步麻麻, 直路考驗追上

comment: Ran on ordinary; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 愈跑愈後, 依然故我

comment: Pressed forward from an outside draw to lead passing 850m.  Kicked 2L clear soon after straightening and went to the    post unchallenged.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受催策上前，跑過八百五十米處時取得領先。入直路後瞬即加速帶離兩個馬位，在未受威脅下奔向終點。

comment: Hard ridden to stay close to pace, then niggled to hold     position back stretch. Under pressure from 600m but did not respond. Unacceptable performance.
comment_ch: 受力策，靠近領放馬競跑，對面直路上受催策以保持位置。自六百米處起受催策，但毫無反應。表現難以接受。

comment: Broke ok & rousted on rail to lead, joined 600m, headed &   driven 450m but found nil & faded.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，沿外欄上前取得領先。六百米處被追上，四百五十米處被超越，受催策，但再無餘力，力竭。

handicap: THE HONG KONG FOOTBALL CLUB CENTENARY CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港足球會百週年紀念挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Bumped start, ridden to hold midfield position between      horses, checked around turn, faded gradually in straight.
comment_ch: 起步時碰撞他駒，受催策，居中間位置，在馬匹之間競跑。轉直路彎時勒避。直路上逐漸力竭。
owner: Civic Chan Sin Wik & Chu Po Yi

comment: Rolled forward into the lead and led by 1-1/2L at slow      sectionals, kept on until headed and weakened passing 200M.
comment_ch: 上前領先，以慢步速帶離一個半馬位。保持走勢，跑過二百米處時被超越並轉弱。

comment: Settled in front of midfield, 2 wide, dashed strongly 300M  despite not suited by the slow pace.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，走第二疊。步速緩慢，不合發揮，但三百米處仍以勁勢衝刺。

comment: Very slow away, never join competition.
comment_ch: 出閘十分緩慢，從未參與競逐。

comment: Under restraint early; behind runners in the straight.
comment_ch: 早段捉實，直路走馬林

comment: Fractious in stalls, began awkwardly, settled 5Ls back      towards the rear, failed to pick up entering straight,      eased mid-straight. (No abnormal findings)
comment_ch: 於閘內煩躁不安，出閘笨拙，居後列位置，落後五個馬位。入直路時未能加速，直路中段收慢。（獸醫檢查後並無發現任何異常之處。）

comment: Ran on ok when shifted out late.
comment_ch: 拉士移出, 越追越近

comment: Led under good pace; won with something in hand.
comment_ch: 速高帶到, 有餘未盡

comment: Kept on one pace when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路有騎，保持同速

comment: Pressed forward to take the fence and led by 1.5Ls at slow  sectionals, kept on one pace until weakened over the final  furlong.
comment_ch: 受催策上前移入內欄，以慢步速領放，領先一個半馬位。保持同速，最後二百米轉弱。
owner: Ming Shui Sum & Alice Ming Bo Ting

comment: Settled towards the rear along the rail, 6L behind the      leader. Checked at 700M after getting its head on the side, never looked likely in the straight.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬六個馬位，走內欄。七百米處將頭轉側後勒避。直路上從未看似有力一爭。

comment: Raced midfield, 3.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover,  despite the fast tempo, made no impression in straight.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬三個半馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。儘管步速偏快，但直路上毫無表現。

comment: Led throughout; ran on strong to score.
comment_ch: 主動帶放, 直奔終點

comment: Always in last few and never seen with a chance.
comment_ch: 一直居最後數位，從未看似有力爭勝。

comment: Going all over the place at 400m; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 四百片來片去，走勢稚嫩

comment: Wide throughout; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 全程外叠，但走勢不弱

comment: Trailed the field most of way, saved ground turning in, ran on past well-beaten horses in the run home.
comment_ch: 大部分途程尾隨馬群。入直路時走內欄節省腳程。直路上超越已洩氣潰敗的對手。
owner: Jimmy Chung Kwok Man & Dominic Chung Won Lok

comment: Jumped well, raced 2 wide, 2 lengths or so back in 5th,     angled out turning in, showed no progress in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居第五位，落後約兩個馬位，走第二疊。入直路時向外移出。直路上毫無進展。
owner: Fong Kit Shan, Louisa Tang Sin Yee & Ken Lee Ka Fai

comment: Led all the way to score; moved better than before.
comment_ch: 速高帶到, 再進一步
owner: Philip Yu Chi Wai & Dr Jennie Hope Peterson

comment: Began fairly, allowed to stride at own pace, racing behind  midfield in one-off position. Severely checked 700m, took   inside run in straight and kept on fairly.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，順其自然地上前。居中間之後位置，走第二疊。七百米處嚴重勒避，直路上走內疊，保持普通走勢。

comment: Hard ridden to keep up at rear, favoured by the fast pace,  progressed steadily 200M.
comment_ch: 居後列，受力策跟上馬群。快步速有利發揮。二百米處逐漸追前。
owner: Julian Hui Chun Hang & Michele Monique Reis

comment: Soon took up running and led the field to the 350 metres,   folded up quickly.
comment_ch: 瞬即帶頭，領先至三百五十米處，其後迅速力竭。

comment: Racing backwards; never in contention.
comment_ch: 愈跑愈後, 毫無表現

comment: Difficult to settle shortly after start, raced at rear in   the middle of the track, failed to close off.
comment_ch: 起步後不久難以穩定走勢，居後列，在跑道中央競跑。末段衝刺乏力。

comment: At the rear and finished tailed out. Not a factor.
comment_ch: 居後列，包尾大敗而回。從未構成威脅。
owner: Sin Tung Hing, Sin Yuk Lok & Sin Yuk San

handicap_ch: 賽馬天下四十週年紀念盃（讓賽）
comment: Sat towards the rear, 7-1/4L behind the leader 2 wide with  cover, not competitive.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬七又四分一個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。從未見具競爭力。

comment: On-pace early; ran on comfortably for 2nd.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，走勢從容
owner: Alan Chan Yau Yuet & Chris Chan Cheong Hoi

comment: On pace early; ran on for 2nd when asked.
comment_ch: 跟前，末段騎落肯走

comment: Always in touch; ran 2nd comfortably.
comment_ch: 有前有後, 姿態從容

comment: Outpaced early; raced under his own steam.
comment_ch: 沿途跟唔住，隨意跟跑
