comment: Eased back, travelled 7Ls behind the leader on the fence,   swung wide turning in, made plenty of ground in straight.
comment_ch: 留居後列，落後領放馬七個馬位，走內欄。入直路時移出外疊。直路上追前頗多。

handicap: THE ORIENTAL WATCH SHA TIN TROPHY (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 東方表行沙田錦標（讓賽）
comment: Urged to a gain a forward position just behind leader,      lacked the needed kick inside 300M, faded from mid-straight.
comment_ch: 受催策佔取領放馬稍後的前列位置。三百米處未能加速。自直路中段起力竭。

comment: Tardy start & bustled early, settled 1 off with cover fore  of midfield, niggled 450m, hard-ridden turning in, plugged  on evenly.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢。早段受催策，居中間之前位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。四百五十米處受催策。入直路時受力策，走勢平穩。

handicap_ch: 維多利亞賽馬會錦標（讓賽）
comment: Always at the rear, never a factor.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列。從未有力一爭。

comment: Settled midfield; ran on ok.
comment_ch: 不上不落, 但走勢不弱
owner: Peter Li Chak Ming, Ricky Wong Kin Chat, Tommy Wong Kwok Chuen & Shen Hing Sun
Timmy Chan Tien Kay & Jamson Chan Wing Chai

comment: Vied for lead towards the stands' rail, remained a presence to 200M, headed and faltered late stages.
comment_ch: 爭奪領先，走外欄。二百米處前保持居前列，末段被超越及轉弱。
owner: Mr & Mrs Peter Chan On Tak and Robert Chan Chi Man

comment: Midfield along the fence, not suited by the slow pace, just held ground in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘後居中間位置，沿欄競走。慢步速不合發揮，直路上僅能保持位置。

comment: Caught 3-wide no cover in mid-division, improved to 4th     passing 600M, finished off fairly from 350M, faded late     stages.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。跑過六百米處時上前居第四位。自三百五十米處起衝刺普通，末段力竭。
owner: Ng Sun Wah & Chan Wo Ping

comment: Broke OK, natural speed to get into spot just behind speed, settled 3rd on rail, pulled off leader's back & ridden      400m, strode up to lead 350m, kicked clear, worn down final strides.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，順其自然上前，居領放馬稍後的第三位，走內欄。四百米處自領放馬之後向外移出，受催策。三百五十米處上前取得領先。加速帶離，最後數步被超越。

comment: Ran on well halfway; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 中段湧一湧，見好即收

comment: Outpaced early, dropping to rear along fence. Stayed at     rear till home straight when taken wide and finished off    nicely.
comment_ch: 早段被拋離，墮居後列，走內欄。保持居後列位置，直路上移出外疊，衝刺良佳。
owner: Mr & Mrs Victor Lui Ting and Ian Lui

comment: Raced wide; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 外疊跟跑, 未受考驗

comment: Rolled forward and took up box-seat, 2-1/2L behind, pulled  away at 250M and hit the line strongly to score.
comment_ch: 上前佔取包廂位置，落後兩個半馬位。二百五十米處帶離對手，以勁勢過終點，勝出賽事。

comment: Jumped well, sent forward to take the lead, travelled well  on turn, peaked early in straight and headed near 300M,     kept on evenly to the line.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前取得領先。直路彎走勢良佳。直路初未能再增速，接近三百米處時被超越，其後保持穩勢至終點。
owner: Bryan Hui I Yeung, Hui I Yuen, Allan Chau Kit Ho & Chau Man Kwok

comment: At back along the fence, favoured by the fast tempo, lack   room 300M, progressed steadily when clear.
comment_ch: 居後列，走內欄。步速甚快，有利發揮。三百米處空位不足，望空後以穩定走勢上前。
owner: Eric Mo Pui Woo & Johnny Mo Cheuk Fai

comment: Found nothing when under whip at turn.
comment_ch: 彎位開鞭, 毫無威脅

comment: Never a factor.
comment_ch: 從未有力一爭。
owner: William Lee Ka Chung, Peter Ho Chiu Kee & Spencer Lee Ka Kit

comment: Began well, ridden to stay with early pace before taking    position outside leader 850m. Under pressure from 350m and  faded gradually.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。早段受催策，跟上領放馬。八百五十米處居領放馬外側。自三百五十米處起受催策，逐漸力竭。

comment: Settled midfield under restraint; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 拖住居中，未受考驗
owner: Star Chan Iu Seng, Winnie Chan Wing Yan, Simon Chan Cham Man & Vincent Chan Cham Wai

comment: Taken back early; never in contention.
comment_ch: 刻意拖後, 從未參予競逐

comment: Settled in midfield, commenced move leaving the Rock, just  over 2L back in 5th turning into straight but baulked early on, fought on steadily inside final 200 metres.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，跑離大石鼓時開始上前。入直路時居第五位，落後僅逾兩個馬位。直路初受阻。最後二百米持續力拼。

comment: Ridden to hold midfield position but wide, hard to settle   and checked 800m. Swung wider into straight but only        plodded home. Superficial wound right front leg.
comment_ch: 在催策下居中間位置，走外疊，難以穩定走勢，八百米處勒避。入直路時移出更外疊，直路上僅能保持同速。右前腿表皮有傷口。

comment: Began well, racing with leading pack before crowded out     850m and losing ground. Boxed on one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，與領先馬匹並跑。八百五十米處受擠迫，因而失地。直路上保持同速。

comment: Broke ok, bustled to midfield on rail, nudged along 400m,   driven 350m, outpaced in tame run home.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策，居中間位置，走內欄。四百米處受催策，三百五十米處再受催策。直路上被拋離，走勢疲乏。

comment: Slow to begin; ran on strong late.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，走順後自動湧上
owner: Mr & Mrs Arthur Wong Chun Mo

comment: Always in touch; just won.
comment_ch: 有前有後, 拉士趕過

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY LOVE IS BEAUTY COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶愛很美系列讓賽
comment: Never a factor, tailed out.
comment_ch: 從未構成威脅，包尾而回。

comment: Sluggish at start, tightened on rails when towards the rear past the winning post the first time, raced keenly in       midfield when pace slackened far side, found nil in         straight.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，首次跑過終點時受緊迫，居後列，走內欄。對面直路上步速減慢時搶口，居中間位置。直路上再無餘力。

comment: On pace along the rail; ran 4th when asked late.
comment_ch: 貼欄跟前，末段要騎
owner: Mr & Mrs Johnny Wong Chun Nam

comment: Caught in traffic in the Straight; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 直路受困，未受考驗

comment: Pushed forward from the wide barrier, eventually sitting    handy, 3 wide with no cover. Well positioned in front on    the turn, but only responded fairly when asked the question and plugged to the line.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，受推策上前，居前列，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。轉直路彎時領先，位置不俗，但受催策時反應僅屬一般，保持同速至終點。

comment: Sent forward and raced prominently, 2-3/4L off 2 wide, kept on until 200m and found no extra.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，居前列，落後二又四分三個馬位，走第二疊，保持走勢，二百米處再無餘力。
owner: The Hon Ronald Arculli GBM GBS JP & Johanna K J Arculli BBS

comment: Jumped well, shared early pace but wide before easing       one-back, one-off at turn. Swung wide into straight, picked up momentum to hit front 150m, pulled clear.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。早段居前列位置，走外疊。直路彎收慢，落後一個馬位，走第二疊。入直路時移出外疊。加速上前，一百五十米處取得領先。帶離餘駒取勝。

comment: Out-paced early; wide at turn; made up ground late.
comment_ch: 早段跟唔住, 轉彎蝕位, 追回失地

comment: Shifted out in the straight; hit the line strong to run 2nd.
comment_ch: 直路移出，衝刺凌厲

comment: Pushed out early to share the lead into an early speed      dual, before dropping back to sit 1 off, 1 back. Peaking    late, and just held onto 3rd from a fast finishing field.
comment_ch: 早段受推策，並排領放，繼而爭奪領先。其後墮後，落後一個馬位，走第二疊。末段未能再增速，在群駒快速衝刺下僅保住季軍。

comment: Found nothing when being hard ridden.
comment_ch: 大力推騎，無加速力

comment: Pushed forward from an outside draw, racing wide till       taking over lead 1000m and crossing to fence. Collared 200m and gave ground gradually.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受推策，走外疊，一千米處取得領先，切入內欄。二百米處被超越，逐漸墮退。

comment: Speed to lead, soon to rail, narrow lead turning in, shaken up 400m & kicked 1.5L clear, all out & pressed 200, headed  150m, tapered.
comment_ch: 快速上前領先，瞬即移入內欄。入直路時以短距離領先。四百米處受催策，帶離一個半馬位。二百米處受力策，被緊迫。一百五十米處被超越，繼而轉弱。

comment: Jumped away well; led all the way to score.
comment_ch: 起步敏捷, 直領到底

comment: Eased back, travelled 7Ls behind the leader on the fence    1200M, harmed by the slow tempo, peeled wide turning in,    ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 千二米處收慢留後，落後領放馬七個馬位，走內欄。慢步速不利發揮。入直路時移出外疊，走勢普通。
owner: Lillian Lee Lai Man & Kenny Tse Chiu Ping

handicap: THE HONG KONG GOLF CLUB CENTENARY CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港高爾夫球會百週年紀念盃（讓賽）
comment: Bounced well, racing inside leader till easing into box     seat 1400m. Began run passing 400m, battled strongly but    unable mow down leader.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，居領放馬內側，其後收慢，千四米處佔取包廂位置。跑過四百米處時開始發力，衝刺凌厲，但未能追上頭馬。

comment: Ran on ordinary; not at its best.
comment_ch: 走勢平常, 未及舊觀

comment: Wide throughout; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 全程蝕位，追勢不弱

comment: Cut across after start; ran 2nd when asked.
comment_ch: 起步切入，騎住第二
owner: Mr & Mrs Ben Wong Chung Mat

comment: Took rail easily and led at advantageous slow sectionals,   made all.
comment_ch: 輕鬆移入內欄，以有利發揮的慢步速領放。一放到底。

comment: Ran on strongly for 2nd when under whip in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路鞭騎, 追勁十足
owner: Mr & Mrs James Tien Pei Chun

comment: Ridden out throughout; never in contention.
comment_ch: 騎足全程, 不願展步

comment: On-pace early; under a hold in the straight.
comment_ch: 跟前，直路按住順走

comment: Tardy start, bustled to settle back in pack 1 off with      cover, switched wide & stoked up 500m, very wide progress   to lead 160m, kicked clear, eased down last strides.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，受催策居後列，走第二疊，有遮擋。五百米處移出外疊並加速。走大外疊追前，一百六十米處取得領先，加速帶離。最後數步收慢。

comment: Held up 2-wide midfield in a strongly run race, let down    well from 300M but couldn't reel in winner, went clear 2nd  late stages.
comment_ch: 步速偏快，留居中間位置，走第二疊。自三百米處起衝刺良佳，但未能超越頭馬。末段帶離餘駒，跑獲亞軍。

comment: Niggled along throughout; ran on fairly well for 3rd.
comment_ch: 沿途俾住, 反應不差

handicap: POK FU LAM RESERVOIR ROAD HANDICAP
comment: Cruised out early and allowed to settle at the rear of the  field, on the fence. Never travelled at all, and gave       nothing in the straight. Eased up from the 100m.
comment_ch: 早段留居馬群後列，走內欄。從未能展步，直路上毫無表現。自一百米處起收慢。

handicap_ch: 新加坡賽馬公會錦標（讓賽）
comment: In worse than midfield, about 4-1/2L behind but wide,       improved to race prominently at 600M, weakened noticeably   approaching 150M.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後約四個半馬位，但走外疊。六百米處推進，居前競跑。趨近一百五十米處時顯著轉弱。

comment: Crowded on jumping; made progress steadily; hit the front at 200m.
comment_ch: 起步擠迫, 分段加快, 二百透出
owner: Albert Hung Chao Hong & Stephanie Hung Yujie

comment: Taken back early; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 拖住居後, 未受考驗
owner: Michael Lau Chor Chiu & Steve Lau Tsz Chung

handicap: THE HONG KONG RIDING FOR THE DISABLED ASSOCIATION CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港傷健策騎協會盃（讓賽）
comment: Began fairly, shifted across behind runners, settling at    rear. Came off fence 600m, finished strongly between horses but blocked for run 100m.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，在馬群之後切入內欄，居後列。六百米處移離內欄，在馬匹之間以勁勢衝刺，但一百米處受阻。
owner: Star Chan Iu Seng, Winnie Chan Wing Yan, Simon Chan Cham Man & Vincent Chan Cham Wai

comment: Awkward at turn; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 轉彎欠順, 走勢稚嫩

comment: Ran on fairly for 3rd under whip at 300m.
comment_ch: 三百鞭騎, 勉強入位

comment: 3Ls off the leader on the fence, not suited by the fast     pace, reduced quickly 300M.
comment_ch: 落後領放馬三個馬位，走內欄。步速甚快，不合發揮。三百米處迅速轉弱。

handicap: THE HONG KONG JOCKEY CLUB COMMUNITY TROPHY (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港賽馬會社群盃（讓賽）
comment: Shifted in soon after start but held 4-wide at rear. Pushed forward 3-wide around turn to get within range of leaders   at 400m before tiring.
comment_ch: 出閘後瞬即向內移入，但仍走第四疊，居後列。轉直路彎時受推策上前，走第三疊。四百米處追近領先馬匹，其後漸呈疲態。
owner: Lam Ngai Fung & Thomas Poon Ho Wing

comment: Up with the pace; caught in traffic in the Straight.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢, 直路受困
owner: Kenneth Lam Sze Ken, Timothy Junior Lam & Sabrina Chao Sih Ming

comment: Made minor inroads when under whip in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路開鞭, 追番多少
owner: Joseph Choi Yip Leung & Choi Fong Hon Mei

comment: Travelled in front of midfield, 3-1/4L behind 2 wide with   cover, dashed little near 250M, showed little thereafter.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，落後三又四分一個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。接近二百五十米處時略為追前，其後再無餘力。

handicap: HKU FACULTIES OF BUSINESS & ECONOMICS AND SCIENCE HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 港大經濟及工商管理學院與理學院讓賽
comment: Rolled forward to occupy the box seat along the fence,      switched wide turning in, dashed strongly to score by 2Ls   with plenty in hand.
comment_ch: 上前進佔包廂位置，走內欄。入直路時移向外疊，以勁勢衝刺。以兩個馬位之先勝出，勝來猶有餘力。
owner: Raymond Chow Wai Kam & Lau Wing Sang

comment: Beaten for early pace and soon at rear but wide. Kept wide  around turn, one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 早段被領放馬匹拋離，瞬即墮居後列位置，走外疊。轉直路彎時持續走外疊。直路上保持同速。
owner: Michael Lau Chor Chiu & Steve Lau Tsz Chung

comment: Laying in when asked in the Straight to score.
comment_ch: 考驗取勝，但直路仍覺內閃

comment: no show
comment_ch: 冇到

comment: Hard ridden to keep up in midfield 2 wide, not suited by    the slow tempo, lack room 400M, ran on ok.
comment_ch: 受力策，保持在中間位置，走第二疊。步速緩慢，不合發揮。四百米處缺乏空位上前，其後走勢尚可。

comment: Under restraint early; never tested late.
comment_ch: 早段捉實，末段冇騎
owner: Christopher So Chi Hang & Eddie Ng Tao

comment: Flattened in the Straight; finished last.
comment_ch: 直路勁平，包尾而回

comment: Prominent, caught 3-wide until 1100M, shuffled back a bit   entering home turn, struggled to keep up and gave way from  500M.
comment_ch: 居前列位置，千一米處前走第三疊。進入直路彎時略為墮後。掙扎上前，自五百米處起墮退。

comment: Dropped back early from the wide draw to be in the last     pair, 10L off the leaders. Ran on OK late from a rear       position, easing up late when out of contention.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後早段墮居最後兩位，落後領先馬匹十個馬位。末段後上走勢尚可，在再無爭逐機會下收慢。

handicap: THE PENINSULA GOLDEN JUBILEE CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
comment: Raced prominently, 3/4L off the lead along the outside      rail, kept on until couldn't match the pace passing 300M.
comment_ch: 居前列位置，落後領放馬四分三個馬位，走外欄。保持走勢，跑過三百米處時未能跟上步速。

comment: Wide throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 沿途蝕位, 未見真章
owner: Sandia Yit Lau Ying Lam & Yit Kwok Leung

comment: First to jump, taken behind runners, settled beyond         midfield 3 deep with cover, taken widest into straight,     ridden 450m, sprinted strongly, hit lead 200m, stayed on    doggedly to score.
comment_ch: 出閘最快，留居馬群之後，居中間之後位置，在有遮擋下走第三疊。入直路時移至最外疊。四百五十米處受催策，衝刺強勁，二百米處取得領先，保持頑強鬥志，勝出賽事。

comment: Settled at rear; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑，未受考驗
owner: Nelson Lee Yuk Ming, Norman Ng Si Pang & Eric Poon Hung Cheung

comment: Bumped and unbalanced shortly after start, settled along    rail 4L from leader. Picked up speed top of straight and    ran on strongly to win close home.
comment_ch: 起步後不久碰撞對手，失去平衡。落後領放馬四個馬位，沿欄競跑。直路早段加速上前。以勁勢上前，接近終點時取勝。
owner: Amy Li Chi Lin, April Tsui Siu Yee & Ben Tsui Siu Lun

comment: Stride for stride to share lead; flattened late.
comment_ch: 拍住鬥放, 拉士勁平
owner: Tang Yip Sau Yung & Tang Kwok Yung

comment: On-pace early; flattened late.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢，末段勁平

comment: Raced in midfield, 4-1/4L off the pace 2 wide with cover,   strong dash from 200M, held off close challenge to score by a short head.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬四又四分一個馬位，在有遮擋下走第二疊。二百米處展開強勁衝刺，力拒亞軍馬匹的挑戰，以短馬頭位之先掄元。

comment: Sat in front of midfield along the rail from an inner draw, 3L behind the leader, despite the fast pace, ran only       strongly to the line and scored.
comment_ch: 自內檔出閘，居中間之前位置，落後領放馬三個馬位，走內欄。儘管步速偏快，但終點前走勢強勁，勝出賽事。

comment: Eased back, 8Ls off the leader 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, progressed steadily 600M, unleashed strong finishing  efforts 300M to score.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，落後領放馬八個馬位，走第三至第四疊。慢步速不利發揮。六百米處逐漸追前。三百米處展開強勁衝刺，勝出賽事。
owner: Dr & Mrs Wilson Ip Chun Heng

comment: Bumped shortly after start, pressed forward to lead 800m,   then eased, sitting outside leader around turn. Kept on     well till flattened 100m.
comment_ch: 起步後不久碰撞他駒，受催策上前，八百米處取得領先，繼而收慢。轉直路彎時居領放馬外側位置。保持佳勢，一百米處洩氣。
owner: Eric Cheng Kam Chung & Vene Cheng Wing Ni

comment: Jumped well to lead; strode out well to win.
comment_ch: 起步最快, 大步帶到

comment: Lagged back early, attacked along mid track
comment_ch: 早段稍留, 中檔竄上

comment: Taken back from wide gate, raced last pair but trapped wide no cover, over-raced 900m, driven 400m & shifted widest in  run, stayed on for minor late inroads.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後留後。居最後兩位，走外疊，沒有遮擋。九百米處搶口。四百米處受催策，直路上移出最外疊。保持走勢，末段略為追前。

comment: Jumped fairly, restrained and shifted across behind runners settling at rear. Got shuffled back turning for home and    one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，受約束，在馬群之後切入內疊，居後列。轉直路彎時墮退。直路上保持同速。

comment: Hit the line strongly for 3rd inside.
comment_ch: 內檔竄上, 加速力強

comment: Hard ridden to sit in front of midfield, 2 wide, on heels   500M, emptied 200M.
comment_ch: 受力策居中間之前位置，走第二疊。五百米處緊貼他駒後蹄。二百米處再無餘力。

comment: Under a hold in the Straight; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 直路按返, 未受考驗

comment: Eased back, 2 wide, ran on ok in final stages.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，走第二疊。末段走勢尚可。

comment: Up with the pace; ran on ordinary when under whip at 300m.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢, 三百鞭騎, 反應平常

comment: Not hurried early stages, towards the rear 5Ls back, ran on well final 300M down center of track. (Blood in trachea.)
comment_ch: 早段未受催策，居後列，落後領放馬五個馬位。最後三百米在跑道中央以佳勢上前。（氣管有血）

comment: Led early; flattened in the Straight.
comment_ch: 搶放兩段, 直路收工

comment: Raced handy on the outer fence, 2-1/4L off the pace, kept   going and finished off well for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居前列，落後領放馬二又四分一個馬位，走外欄。持續力拼，衝刺良佳，取得季軍。

comment: Slow to begin; made progress centre track.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 直路從中檔竄上

comment: Pushed forward to park outside the leader, kept on steadily until weakened final 150M to hold 4th.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，居領放馬外側。保持穩勢，最後一百五十米轉弱，保住殿軍。

handicap: THE HONG KONG COUNTRY CLUB CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港鄉村俱樂部挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Rolled into front of midfield 5L behind, 2 wide with cover. Dashed well from final 200M to score.
comment_ch: 上前居中間之前位置，落後領放馬五個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。最後二百米衝刺良佳，勝出賽事。

comment: Finished at rear; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 包尾而回, 未見佳處
owner: Lily Scheng Hsi Feng & Vicky Tang

handicap_ch: 新加坡賽馬公會錦標（讓賽）
comment: Towards the rear, about 5-3/4L behind 3 wide with cover,    ran on strongly and held off challenge to score by a neck.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後約五又四分三馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。走勢強勁，力拒對手的挑戰，以一馬頸位之先勝出。
owner: Sammy Sean Lee & Aaron Lee Ho Ting

comment: Under whip at 400m; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 四百開鞭，走勢生硬

comment: Crowded at start losing ground, recovered steadily on rail  to be just worse than midfield home bend, obtained a run    300 metres out and ran on well to take charge nearing       finish.
comment_ch: 起步時受擠迫，因而失地，逐漸恢復走勢，走內欄。直路彎進佔中間稍後位置。三百米處取得空位上前，走勢甚佳，接近終點時取得領先。

comment: Held up in 5th on the rail within striking distance, soon   came to challenge in the straight, responded well to take   charge over 100 metres out, won readily.
comment_ch: 沿欄居第五位，落後領放馬不遠。直路上瞬即上前挑戰。受催策，走勢甚佳，一百米處取得領先，輕鬆勝出。

comment: Bumped, stumbled shortly after start, then ridden along     3-wide behind midfield. Made forward move top of straight   to get within striking range 200m then one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘後被碰撞，不久失蹄，居中間之後位置，走三疊。直路早段上前，二百米處落後領放馬不遠，其後保持同速。

comment: On-pace early; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑, 末段按返
owner: St Joan of Arc School PSA Syndicate

handicap_ch: 香港中文大學校友會聯會盃（讓賽）
comment: Began OK, taken to fence but outpaced, dropping towards     rear. Shaken up top of straight but found nothing.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，移入內欄，被拋離，墮居後列。直路初受催策，但再無餘力。

comment: Hit the line late to score; moved better than before.
comment_ch: 拉士透出，走勢復甦

comment: Jumped ok; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 起步順利，表現不差
owner: Gary Hung Hing Ming, Stephen Lok Tsz Ho & Joseph Cheng Pok Man

comment: Hit the front late; kept on well to score.
comment_ch: 拉士透出, 愈走愈勁
owner: Chadwick Mok Cham Hung, Wong Wing Hong & Wilson Lam Jing Shing

comment: Kept on for 4th; nearest at finish.
comment_ch: 走勢接近, 老馬仲有兩腳

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 5Ls behind the leader on the      fence, not suited by the very slow pace, one paced home.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬五個馬位，走內欄。步速十分緩慢，不合發揮。末段保持同速。

comment: Pressed forward from outside draw but kept 4-wide back      stretch. Wide without cover around turn, taken to centre    track 400m, one-paced.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，受催策上前，但對面直路上走第四疊。轉直路彎時在沒有遮擋下走外疊。四百米處移至跑道中央，保持同速。

handicap: THE BOCHK WEALTH MANAGEMENT JOCKEY CLUB SPRINT
handicap_ch: 中銀理財馬會短途錦標
comment: Held up in rear pair 7Ls off the pace, stayed on moderately down outside, not reach contention.
comment_ch: 居最後兩位，落後領放馬七個馬位。末段在外疊保持一般走勢，未能參與競逐。

comment: Slightly slow, roused along, settled midfield 1 off, keen   at times, improved between runners 620m, limited room 500m, clipped heels shortly afterwards, clicked up 300m, fair to  line.
comment_ch: 出閘稍慢，受催策，居中間位置，走第二疊。時有搶口。六百二十米處在馬匹之間推進。五百米處空位不足，其後不久踏著他駒後蹄。三百米處上前，末段走勢一般。

comment: Slowly away, and settled towards the rear of the field.     Never competitive. Unacceptable performance.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居馬群後列。從未有力一爭。表現難以接受。

handicap_ch: 日本中央競馬會錦標（讓賽）
comment: Pressed forward from outside draw settling one-back,        one-off 1000m. Rolled forward 400m, hit front 280m, caught  shortly after, boxed on.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後受催策上前，一千米處落後領放馬一個馬位，走第二疊。四百米處上前，二百八十米處取得領先。其後不久被超越，但仍力拼上前。
owner: Dr & Mrs Horace Ngan Kit Keung

comment: Slow break & bustled, raced rail back in field, minor       inroads into stretch, kept on for minor headway.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，受催策，居馬群後列，走內欄。入直路時略為追前。保持走勢，略為上前。

comment: Niggled along throughout; struggled for 2nd.
comment_ch: 沿途俾住, 走勢勉強

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY PT BRIDAL COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶純．結婚嫁系列讓賽
comment: Slightly slow, drifted back despite riding, settled beyond  midfield on outside, checked slightly and shuffled back     1050m, blocked for run 700m, ridden 500m, under heavy drive soon after, green but steamed home.
comment_ch: 出閘稍慢，受催策下墮退，居中間之後位置，走外疊。一千零五十米處略為勒避及墮退。七百米處受困，五百米處受催策，其後瞬即受力策。走勢稚嫩，但衝刺強勁。
owner: Nelson Lee Yuk Ming, Norman Ng Si Pang & Eric Poon Hung Cheung

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 5Ls behind the leader on the      fence, despite the fast pace, one paced home.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬五個馬位，走內欄。儘管步速偏快，但末段僅能保持同速。

comment: Soon took up running setting a steady pace while throwing   his head for first half of race, nearly headed by the       eventual winner which shifted wide in straight, finally     yielded lead over 150m out when fading under pressure.
comment_ch: 瞬即帶頭，以平穩步速領放，前半程頭部經常擺動。直路初幾乎被移出外疊競跑的頭馬超越，最終於一百五十米處失去領先位置，受催策，但逐漸力竭。
owner: Tsang Tak Kwong, Pat Ching Pui Yuk, Grace Yu Sok Yin & Dr Kenneth Chau Kai Fung

comment: Sat in front of midfield along the rail, 3L off the pace,   not suited to the slow pace, dropped off significantly near 250M.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，落後領放馬三個馬位，沿欄競跑。步速緩慢，不合發揮。接近二百五十米處時顯著墮退。

comment: Ran on ok when quickened for 3rd.
comment_ch: 加速第三，走勢純熟

comment: Shifted out at 300m; limited response when asked.
comment_ch: 三百移出，騎落唔多

comment: Settled midfield; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 不上不落, 但走勢不弱

comment: Travelled in midfield, 2-3/4L behind 3 wide with cover,     harmed by the slow pace, did not threaten.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後二又四分三個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。慢步速不利發揮。未能構成威脅。

comment: Raced along the rail; ran on for 3rd when let go.
comment_ch: 貼欄順走，一鬆即有

comment: Jumped well, hard ridden to hold outside rail while sharing early pace. Looked chance when urged forward 400m but       unable match place-getters final stages.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受力策固守外欄，早段並排領先。四百米處受催策上前，看似具爭勝機會，但末段不敵三甲馬匹。

comment: Fast break, stalked lead in 4th & edged to 1 off stands     rail, 5th when shifted inside at 300m, shaken up 280m,      quickened to lead 100m, drew clear, eased at wire.
comment_ch: 出閘快速，跟隨領放馬，居第四位，移至外欄第二疊。三百米處向內移入，居第五位。二百八十米處受催策。加速上前，一百米處取得領先。帶離對手，過終點時收慢。

comment: Began well, restrained to a midfield position along the     2-path, 4Ls to make up 400M, stayed on mildly without       threatening.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受約束，居中間位置，走第二疊。四百米處落後四個馬位。保持普通走勢，未能構成威脅。
owner: Au Kai Kwong & Michelle Jessica Au

comment: Broke well, camped midfield on rail, shifted 1 off 550m,    edged out & driven 340m, quickened in pursuit, led close    home.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居中間位置，走內欄。五百五十米處移出第二疊。三百四十米處向外移出，受催策。加速追趕對手，接近終點時取得領先。

comment: Slow start & niggled 2nd last, raced 1 off until hung out   exiting backstretch, ridden 450m, widest turning in, closed off for minor inroads.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，受催策，居尾二位置，走第二疊。跑離對面直路時外閃。四百五十米處受催策。入直路時走最外疊。末段略為追前。

comment: Outpaced early, dropping back but kept wide towards the     rear. Wide around turn, one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 早段被拋離，墮居後列位置，走外疊。直路彎走外疊，直路上保持同速。
owner: Willie Yiu Man Hung & Victor Yiu Wai Yin

comment: Fast break, raced handy 1 off with cover, shifted 3 deep &  niggled 400m, driven into stretch, quickened to lead 180m,  drew clear.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。居有利位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。四百米處移出第三疊，受催策。入直路時再受催策。加速上前，一百八十米處取得領先。帶離勝出。
owner: Hau Shiu Kai & Gigi Hau Ying Chi

comment: Looking for cover early; ran on for 4th when clear.
comment_ch: 早段找遮擋，望空接近

comment: In front of midfield, 2 wide, flattened in straight.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，走第二疊。直路上洩氣。

comment: Cruised forward early to sit midfield, 3 wide with cover.   Ran on well in the straight and was briefly hampered on the line.
comment_ch: 早段上前，居中間位置，走第三疊，有遮擋。直路上走勢良佳，過終點時一度受阻。

comment: Bit slow out; made some ground under urge outside.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 外檔稍騎追近

comment: Eased back, travelled 5Ls behind the leader 3 wide with     cover, despite harmed by the very slow pace, dashed well    for 2nd, missed by a short head.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，落後領放馬五個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。儘管極慢步速不利發揮，仍衝刺良佳，僅以一短馬頭位之差落敗，跑獲亞軍。

comment: Restrained on jumping and taken to fence, settling in last  pair. Trailed field thereafter and only one-paced under     hard riding in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘後受約束，移入內欄，居最後兩位。其後尾隨馬群。直路上受力策，但僅能保持同速。

comment: Pushed forward, sat 2 wide, pace good, emptied 300M.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，走第二疊，步速中等。三百米處力竭。

comment: Closest to the leader for most of the way, helped by the    slow pace in first half, moved to the front line 500M,      outpaced by leaders 250M, kept on one pace final stages.
comment_ch: 大部分途程最接近領放馬，前半程步速緩慢，有利發揮。五百米處發力上前居前列，二百五十米處被領先馬匹拋離，末段保持同速。
owner: Stephen Chang Tso Tung, Timothy Sun & Leung Sze Tien

comment: Hard ridden from outside draw, racing 4-wide outside        leading pack before settling outside leader 900m. Rolled    forward on straightening, hit front 200m, run down on line.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後受力策，居領放馬群外側，走第四疊。九百米處居領放馬外側位置。入直路時上前，二百米處取得領先，過終點時被超越。
owner: Ngan Pui Ying & Ngan Ng Yu Ying

comment: Responded ok when under whip late.
comment_ch: 拉士開鞭, 有點反應

comment: Raced at rear; never in contention.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑，遠離水準
owner: Silas S S Yang, Cheung Yuk Tak, Wong Tak Wai & Ho Chi Keung

comment: Pressed forward from wide draw to lead on settling,         crossing to rail 1750m and slowing pace. Shuffled back to   3rd 1100m but retook lead 400m. Battled strongly final      200m, losing in final strides.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，受催策上前領先。一千七百五十米處切入內欄，減慢步速。千一米處墮至第三位，四百米處再度領先。最後二百米以勁勢力拼，最後數步被擊敗。

comment: Slow to begin; never in contention.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，從未參予競逐
owner: Mr & Mrs Allen Shi Lop Tak and Kathleen Shi Pui Ka

comment: Aggressively ridden to lead on settling, setting good pace  to 900m when passed, taking sit behind leading pair.        Switched out entering straight and ran on strongly to just  miss.
comment_ch: 受力策取得領先，以中等步速領放，九百米處被超越，留居領放兩駒之後的位置。入直路時移出外疊，衝刺強勁，僅敗。

comment: Pushed early, stayed 3 wide throughout in the lead, harmed  by the fast sectionals, ran on well until 100M flattened.
comment_ch: 早段受推策，沿途在領放下走第三疊。快步速不利發揮。走勢良佳，一百米處洩氣。

comment: At rear, travelled 9Ls behind the leader on the fence,      despite harmed by the slow tempo, ran on nicely.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬九個馬位，走內欄。步速緩慢，不利發揮。以佳勢上前。
owner: Wai Siu Kee & Edmond Lee Man Bun

comment: Taken back to just worse than midfield from the widest      gate, in similar position turning in, one-paced.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘，留居中間稍後位置。入直路時居相若位置，保持同速。

comment: Urged to lead along the rail; ran on strongly to score.
comment_ch: 起步搶欄，愈騎愈有

comment: Held up behind midfield in 7th / 8th spot, travelled        strongly throughout, made rapid headway entering straight   to take charge inside 300M, soon well clear and kept on     strongly in the lead, never in danger.
comment_ch: 留居中間之後約第七至第八位，沿途走勢強勁。入直路時迅速追前，三百米處控制大局，瞬即帶離對手，保持勁勢，從未受到威脅。
owner: Mr & Mrs Sebastian Man Shiu Wai

comment: Made progress steadily; ran on comfortably.
comment_ch: 分段加快，姿態從容
owner: Dr Peter Cheng Ming Chuen, Allen Chan Wing Loong, Leung Kwan Tong & Morley Hui Chong Wai

handicap: THE TUNG WAH GROUP OF HOSPITALS 145TH ANNIVERSARY CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 東華三院一百四十五周年挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Began fairly, not pushed, racing three-wide before settling one-off, 4-back. Not much room early in straight, switched  in, kept on fairly.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，未受催策，走第三疊。其後落後領放馬四個馬位，走第二疊。直路初空位不足，向內移入，保持普通走勢。

comment: Made minor inroads when under whip at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百開鞭，拉士稍追

comment: Hard ridden forward, sat 2 wide, benefited by the slow      sectionals, held ground for 3rd.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，走第二疊，慢步速有利發揮。保持位置，跑獲季軍。
owner: Matthew C M Yum, Christopher Carson Yum, Nicholas Kevin Yum & Stephanie Carrie Yum

handicap: THE ASSOCIATION OF HONG KONG RACING JOURNALISTS CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港評馬同業協進會挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: In midfield along the rail, 4L behind the leader, weakened  after straightening.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬四個馬位，走內欄。入直路後轉弱。
owner: To Wai, Andy To Kai Pong, Benson To Kai Sang & Canning To Kai Fung

comment: Under a hold in the Straight; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 直路按返, 刻意掩藏

owner: Yvonne Lui Lai Kwan and Dr & Mrs Philip Ho Kin Hoi

comment: Eased at start, took cover at back, 2 wide, pace good, ran  on only fairly.
comment_ch: 起步後收慢，留居後列取得遮擋，走第二疊。步速中等。走勢僅屬一般。

comment: Urged to race midfield, performed ok
comment_ch: 俾住居中，不過不失

comment: Never far off, 5th at 400M and 3Ls off the pace,  battled   on but failed to make up ground on leaders.
comment_ch: 從未遠離領先馬匹，四百米處居第五位，落後領放馬三個馬位。力拼但未能追上領放馬匹。

comment: Rolled forward, gradually cutting in to settle two-back     along rail. Under pressure from 350m but only one-paced.    Substantial amount of blood in trachea.
comment_ch: 出閘後上前，逐漸切入內欄，落後領放馬兩個馬位。自三百五十米處起受催策，但僅能保持同速。氣管內有大量血液。

comment: Camped handy, travelled 2Ls behind the leader 2 wide with   cover, suited by the slow sectionals, kept on one pace to   get 4th without serious threat.
comment_ch: 居前列位置，落後領放馬兩個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。慢步速適合發揮。保持同速，取得第四名，未能構成真正威脅。

comment: Led early; struggled for place.
comment_ch: 主動搶放, 捱入一席
owner: Mr & Mrs Baffin Wong Yu Kwan

comment: Eased forward early to sit midfield, on the rail. Had open  ground, and well placed to chase at the 300m, but couldn't  muster a big kick and only OK to the line.
comment_ch: 早段上前，居中間位置，走內欄。直路上望空，三百米處居好位蓄勢待發，但加速力不足，奔向終點時走勢僅屬普通。

comment: Bumped, unbalanced start, taken to fence 4-back from        leader. Got close to heels 700m, rolled forward on          straightening, hit front 200m, run down on line.
comment_ch: 出閘時碰撞對手，失去平衡。落後領放馬四個馬位，切入內欄。七百米處靠近前駒的後蹄，入直路時上前。二百米處領先，過終點時被超越。

comment: Speed to lead on rail, driven into stretch, soon all out &  headed 150m, tapered & mugged at post for 2nd.
comment_ch: 加速上前領放，走內欄。入直路時受催策，瞬即力拼，一百五十米處被超越。逐漸轉弱，過終點時失去亞軍。

comment: Raced behind midfield after checked near 1000M, 5-1/2L      behind 2 wide with cover, improved gradually in the         straight.
comment_ch: 接近一千米處時勒避，其後居中間之後位置，落後五個半馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。直路上逐漸推進。
owner: Wallace Chim Hon Chun & Leung Man Wei

comment: Steadied after jumped and taken to rail at the rear.        Improved position slightly first turn, switched out 400m to make run, got split 100m, finished strongly.
comment_ch: 出閘後收慢，移入內欄，居後列。首次轉彎時略為追前。四百米處向外移出取位，一百米處取得空位上前，衝刺強勁。
owner: Mr & Mrs Michael Cheng Wing On

comment: Slow away, behind midfield on the rails, little dash 200M.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居中間之後位置，走內欄。二百米處略為衝刺。

handicap: THE BOCHK WEALTH MANAGEMENT JOCKEY CLUB SPRINT
handicap_ch: 中銀理財馬會短途錦標
comment: In 8th place 5Ls off the pace, brought wide on              straightening, quickened up well to go 2nd 100M, tried to   close the gap on winner but ran out of ground.
comment_ch: 居第八位，落後領放馬五個馬位。入直路時移出外疊，加速甚佳，一百米處進佔第二位。嘗試拉近與頭馬之間的距離，但未能追上。

handicap_ch: 維多利亞賽馬會錦標（讓賽）
comment: Pushed and settled in worse than midfield, 7-1/4L behind    along the rail, swung widest and one paced to the line.
comment_ch: 受推策居中間之後位置，落後七又四分一個馬位，走內欄。移至最外疊，保持同速至終點。

comment: Outpaced, dropping to last pair 900m. Clear last entering   turn, still last at 200m, ran on nicely final 100m.
comment_ch: 被拋離，九百米處墮至最後兩位。入直路彎時遙居包尾，二百米處仍居包尾，最後一百米以佳勢上前。

comment: Made ground steadily; came from behind to score.
comment_ch: 逐段加速，後上取勝

comment: Began well, then pressed forward but held 3-wide without    cover 1L behind leading pair. Still wide in straight before fading final 200m.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，其後受催策上前，落後領放兩駒一個馬位，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。直路上仍走外疊，最後二百米力竭。

comment: At back, 8.5Ls off the leader along the fence, benefited by the fast tempo, never improved.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬八個半馬位，走內欄。步速甚快，有利發揮，未能改善走勢。

comment: Taken back early; shifted out in the straight; finished strong for 3rd.
comment_ch: 留前試後，直路移出，追勁十足
owner: Carmen Chan Wing Yee & Chan Fut Yan

comment: Sharp break widest to press lead 3 deep, snagged 1000m to 1 back 1 off, strong traveller, switched out 300m & driven,   swept to lead 170m, kicked clear.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘迅速，追趕領放馬，走第三疊，一千米處落後一個馬位，走第二疊。走勢強勁，三百米處移出外疊，受催策，以勁勢上前，一百七十米處取得領先，帶離勝出。

comment: Pressed to sit just in front of midfield, 3-1/4L behind 3   wide with cover, ran on well for 4th.
comment_ch: 受催策，居中間稍前位置，落後領放馬三又四分一個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。以佳勢上前，跑獲殿軍。
owner: Chan Cheung Hi, Lam Suet Wan & Tsoi Huk Yam

comment: Ridden vigorously between horses to hold forward position   but started to over-raced and eased one-back, one-off 700m. Kept on well to 200m before tiring.
comment_ch: 受力策，居前列位置，在馬匹之間競跑，開始搶口，其後收慢，七百米處落後一個馬位，走第二疊。二百米處前保持佳勢，末段洩氣。
owner: Mr & Mrs Tam Kwok Chu and Thomas Tam Wing Yiu

comment: Broke with others, rousted forward & vied for lead 1000m,   soon settled close 2nd on rail, shifted 1 off 700m, driven  to edge lead 380m, all out & headed 100m, fought on in      defeat.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，受催策上前，一千米處爭奪領先。瞬即居接近的第二位，走內欄。七百米處移至第二疊，受催策。三百八十米處上前領先，全力拼鬥。一百米處被超越，持續力拼，雖敗猶榮。

comment: Pushed wide to lead & crossed to rail 1000m, headed 800m,   regained lead 720m, 0.5L up & shaken up 350m, all out &     headed 150m, tapered.
comment_ch: 在推策下領先，走外疊。一千米處移入內欄，八百米處被超越。七百二十米處再度領先。三百五十米處領先半個馬位，受催策。全力以赴，但一百五十米處被超越，轉弱。

comment: Laid in when under whip at 400m; ran on strongly for 2nd.
comment_ch: 四百開鞭，內閃仍勁

comment: Tardy start; made little progress in the straight.
comment_ch: 起步麻麻，直路追番多少

comment: Eased at start, too cover at back, 2 wide, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
comment_ch: 出閘後收慢留居後列，走第二疊，有遮擋。步速緩慢，不合發揮。二百米處衝刺良佳。

comment: Occupied a more prominent spot on the fence, lack room      400M, dashed well when clear and scored.
comment_ch: 佔取較前列位置，走內欄。四百米處空位不足，望空後以佳勢衝刺，勝出賽事。

handicap: THE BOCHK WEALTH MANAGEMENT JOCKEY CLUB SPRINT
handicap_ch: 中銀理財馬會短途錦標
comment: Began awkwardly, soon recovered to race in midfield 3Ls off the good pace, kicked on well 300M  and drove past leader   150M, well on top final stages.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，瞬即恢復走勢。居中間位置，落後快步速的領放馬三個馬位。三百米處加速甚佳，一百五十米處在催策下超越領放馬，末段穩操勝券。

comment: Eased back early; quickened in the Straight for 2nd.
comment_ch: 早段稍留，直路加速上前

comment: Hard ridden to obtain box seat, not suited by the fast      pace, out of fuel 200M.
comment_ch: 受力策佔取包廂位置，快步速不合發揮。二百米處再無餘力。
owner: Eddie Chow Bing Chung, Ivan Chow Ping Kin & Enrico Chow Yue Hin

handicap: THE HONG KONG EXCHANGES CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港交易所挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Slightly slow start, back beyond midfield but trapped 3     deep, improved quickly 500m & under a ride soon after,      widest into straight, faded late.
comment_ch: 出閘略為緩慢，居中間之後位置，走第三疊。五百米處迅速推進，瞬即受催策。入直路時走最外疊。末段力竭。

comment: Hard ridden forward to hold the rail and keep up with the   fast pace, just held ground in straight.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，固守內欄，跟上步速甚快的領放馬。直路上僅能保持位置。

comment: Settled at rear; ran on ordinary when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑, 直路騎落一般

comment: On pace early; under a hold in the Straight.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢, 直路按返
owner: The Hon Ronald Arculli GBM GBS JP & Johanna K J Arculli BBS

comment: Pushed forward, sat 2 wide, pace good, ran on until 100M    flattened.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，走第二疊。步速甚快，保持走勢，一百米處洩氣。

comment: Restrained soon after start and shifted across behind       horses, settling one-off, three back. Switched out in       straight and ran on steadily.
comment_ch: 起步後不久受約束，在馬群之後切入，落後領放馬三個馬位，走第二疊。直路上向外移出，走勢平穩。

comment: Quickly into stride, racing close to pace before easing off approaching 400m. Held up passing 100m when one-paced.
comment_ch: 展步迅速，接近領放馬。趨近四百米處時收慢。跑過一百米處時受困，保持同速。

handicap_ch: ＰＡＮＡＳＯＮＩＣ快馬加鞭電子高速煲讓賽
comment: Settled worse than midfield about 7Ls behind the leader 2   wide with cover, suited by the fast sectionals, made minor  ground in straight.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬約七個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。快步速適合發揮。直路上略為追前。
owner: Steven Sham Chun Kit & Rosa Lee Sham Suk Fan

comment: Away on terms, natural speed to press forward, awkward 1st  turn and trapped 3 deep, settled 2nd 1 off, a little keen   at times, asked for effort 320m, faded very late.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，順其自然上前，首次轉彎時走第三疊，走勢笨拙。其後居第二位，走第二疊，不時略為搶口。三百二十米處受催策，末段力竭。

comment: Drew widest and dropped back from the jump to be 4th last   early, 7L off the leaders. Ridden for luck in the straight, with a gap opening up 400m. Went to the line strongly with  minimal urging. Kicked again when challenged late.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後墮退，早段居尾四位置，落後領先馬匹七個馬位。直路上伺機上前，四百米處出現空位。在略受催策下以勁勢衝刺。末段受對手挑戰，再次發力。

comment: Settled worse than midfield about 6Ls behind the leader on  the fence, despite the fast pace, never ran on.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬約六個馬位，走內欄。儘管步速甚快，但從未能追前。

comment: Raced greenly; tailed out.
comment_ch: 走勢欠順, 包尾而回
owner: Lee Yuen Fat & Ng Kam Ming

comment: On-pace early; quickened ok in straight to win.
comment_ch: 跟前, 直路加速取勝

comment: Hit the front at turn; kept on well to score.
comment_ch: 彎位透出, 未見低落

comment: Held up in 5th 7-8Ls off the strong pace, ran on only       fairly when placed under pressure 400M, out-finished and    never got into contention.
comment_ch: 居第五位，落後走勢強勁的領放馬七至八個馬位。四百米處在催策下走勢僅屬一般。衝刺力不及對手，從未有力爭勝。
owner: Eleanor Kwok Law Kwai Chun & Patrick Kwok Ho Chuen

comment: Jumped fairly, soon took up running on rails, led before    joined by eventual runner-up around the bend, re-gained     slender lead over 200 metres out, but unable to sustain     effort and overhauled close to home.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，瞬即取得領先，走內欄。轉直路彎時被亞軍馬匹追上。二百米處以短距離再度領先，但無以為繼，接近終點時被超越。

comment: Always in touch; ran on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 有前有後, 走勢純熟
owner: Cheuk Hon Kit, Chung Tai Keung, Roland Leung Wing Cheung & Cheuk Lit Piu

comment: Ran on well when asked at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百稍騎, 衝刺不俗
owner: Mr & Mrs Stephen Ho Wai Man, Fred Ho Ka Chun and Derek Ho Ka Chung

comment: Pushed forward, sat just off the leader 2 wide, pace good,  ran on well for 3rd.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，居領放馬稍後位置，走第二疊，步速甚快。以佳勢上前，取得季軍。

handicap: J J THE JET PLANE HANDICAP
comment: Rolled forward to park outside the leader, kept on one pace until final 200M weakened. (Lost plate 50M)
comment_ch: 上前居領放馬外側，保持同速，最後二百米轉弱。（五十米處失去蹄鐵）

comment: Began fairly, ridden but didn't muster, settling towards    rear. Shuffled back to last around turn and finished tailed out. Barrier manners, performance unacceptable.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，受催策，但未能加速，居後列。轉直路彎時墮退至包尾位置，大敗而回。閘廂和競賽表現均難以接受。

comment: Under restraint early; hit the front late to score.
comment_ch: 早段拉實，末段透出

comment: Urged to lead early; ran on comfortably for 2nd.
comment_ch: 沿途帶放, 見好即收

comment: Moderate break, raced 3 wide no cover behind midfield,      rolled on to 6th exiting back side, driven 450m, stayed on  evenly.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居中間之後位置，走第三疊，無遮擋。離開對面直路時追前至第六位。四百五十米處受催策，其後均速上前。

handicap: HKU FACULTIES OF ARCHITECTURE AND ARTS HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 港大建築學院與文學院讓賽
comment: Urged to the front, set strong pace to straight, headed     nearing 400M, weakened rapidly from 300M. (Jockey dropped   whip 200M)
comment_ch: 在催策下帶頭，直路前以快步速領放。接近四百米處時被超越，自三百米處起迅速轉弱。（騎師於二百米處跌掉馬鞭。）

comment: Dropped back from the wide draw to sit towards the rear of  the field, 3 wide with cover. Came wider in the straight    and rattled home OK late.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後墮居馬群後列，走第三疊，有遮擋。直路上走更外疊，末段衝刺尚可。
owner: Dr Edward Cheung Wing Yui, Lam Man Chun & Jason Tam Siu Keung

comment: Jumped well from gate 1, positioned a length or so behind   the leader, easy run to turn, finished off evenly in        straight without threatening.
comment_ch: 自第一檔出閘良佳，落後領放馬約一個馬位。直路彎前走勢輕鬆，直路上穩步上前，未能構成威脅。

comment: Settled in a prominent spot, 6Ls behind the leader on the   fence, not suited by the fast sectionals, kept on one pace  to the line.
comment_ch: 居前列，落後領放馬六個馬位，走內欄。快步速不合發揮，保持同速至終點。

comment: Ran on for 2nd under a hold, not fully tested
comment_ch: 按住第二, 點到即止
owner: The Hon & Mrs Andrew Li Kwok Nang

comment: Always in touch; ran 3rd under a hold.
comment_ch: 有前有後，扣實第三

comment: Pushed forward, settled along the fence, ran on well for    3rd.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，走內欄。走勢甚佳，跑獲季軍。

comment: Settled at rear; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑，走勢生硬

comment: Shared lead early; kept on late for 3rd.
comment_ch: 拍實鬥放，末段仲有
owner: The Hon & Mrs Kenneth Lau Ip Keung

handicap: HKU FACULTIES OF ARCHITECTURE AND ARTS HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 港大建築學院與文學院讓賽
comment: Held up 2-wide in midfield, 3Ls off the pace 400M, fought   on under pressure but not making headway on leaders.
comment_ch: 留居中間位置，走第二疊。四百米處落後領放馬三個馬位。在催策下力拼，但未能追近領先馬匹。

comment: Settled midfield under a hold; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 按實居中, 未見真章

comment: Up with the pace; stretched out well for 3rd.
comment_ch: 跟前入位，大步肯走
owner: Michael Lau Chor Chiu & Steve Lau Tsz Chung

comment: Began fairly, ridden to find cover but unable get closer    than four-wide back stretch. Lay out around turn and gave   ground in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策以尋找遮擋，但對面直路上走第四疊或更外疊。轉直路彎時外閃，直路上墮退。
owner: Civic Chan Sin Wik & Chu Po Yi

comment: Jumped OK, eased from wide gate, settled 3rd from last 1    off, ridden 400m, widest entering straight, charged home to score.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘尚可，收慢留居尾三位置，走第二疊。四百米處受催策，入直路時走大外疊，衝刺凌厲，掄元。

comment: Taken back from the widest draw, raced at tail for the      majority of the race, taken widest in straight and made     reasonable progress without threatening the first few.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後留後，大部分途程居包尾位置。直路上走最外疊，追前頗多，但未能威脅前數名馬匹。

comment: Moderately away from a wide draw, raced 2 wide in midfield, wider on turn, no clear running early in straight, made     some progress thereafter. (See Racing Incidents)
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘普通，居中間位置，走第二疊。直路彎走更外疊。直路初未能望空，其後略為上前。（見競賽事件報告。）

comment: At rear throughout, never a factor.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列。從未有力一爭。

comment: Pressed forward from wide draw, sitting outside leader      early stages before settling 3rd, 2L back. Gave chase soon  after straightening but unable to close gap to first two.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，受催策上前。早段居領放馬外側，繼而居第三位，落後兩個馬位。入直路後瞬即力追，但未能追近首兩名馬匹。

comment: Tardy start & bustled, raced behind midfield 1 off with     cover, driven 300m, kept on dourly for headway.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，受催策，居中間之後位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。三百米處受催策，在持續力拼下追前。
owner: Siu Chak Wai, Siu Wai Chung & Jimmy Siu Wing Kin

comment: Soon led from drawn 1, led slowly first 400M but quickened  up from 2nd quarter, opened up 5Ls lead home turn, couldn't sustain run inside 200M, weakened rapidly.
comment_ch: 自第一檔出閘後瞬即帶頭。首四百米以緩慢步速領放，但自第二段起加快步速。直路彎領先五個馬位。最後二百米後勁不繼，迅速轉弱。

comment: Pushed to hold the rail in front of midfield, no dash.
comment_ch: 受推策固守內欄，居中間之前位置。衝刺乏力。

comment: Led all the way; won comfortably.
comment_ch: 一氣呵成, 姿態輕鬆

comment: Began well, ridden along early before settling in box seat  around turn. No run early in straight but only one-paced    when clear.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，早段受催策，轉直路彎時居包廂位置。直路初無路可上，但望空後僅能保持同速。
owner: Mr & Mrs Eddie Wong Ming Chak and Kameny Wong Kam Man

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY CONVERGENCE OF LOVE COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶亮聚系列讓賽
comment: Quickly away, shared pace before forging to a clear lead    1050m. Set steady pace to straight, kicked clear 300m and   kept on strongly to the line.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，並排領先，一千零五十米處帶離對手。直路前以平穩步速領放。三百米處加速帶離，保持勁勢至終點。
owner: Lo Kui Lun, Lo Hoe, Stanley Lo Shek Yin & Sharon Lo Ching Wun

comment: Shifted out in the Straight; made progress when asked.
comment_ch: 直路移出, 推騎追上
owner: The Hon Ronald Arculli GBM GBS JP & Johanna K J Arculli BBS

comment: Ran 2nd under a hold; moved better than before.
comment_ch: 按住上前, 重現生氣
owner: The Executors of the Estate of the late Dr Cornel Li Fook Kwan

comment: Broke quickest from the outside gate, and pushed forward to lead. Never kicked in straight, and faded out from 300m.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘最快，受推策上前領放。直路上從未能發力。三百米處力竭。

comment: Eased to sit in midfield, trapped 3 wide, harmed by the     slow tempo, no dash.
comment_ch: 收慢留居中間位置，走第三疊。慢步速不利發揮。衝刺乏力。

comment: Hard ridden forward, trapped 3-4 wide, pace good, held      ground in straight.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，走第三至第四疊。步速中等，直路上保持位置。

comment: Made ground steadily; ran on well.
comment_ch: 逐步追趕, 表現甚佳

comment: Settled in midfield on rails from the one draw, saved       ground turning for home, failed to quicken under pressure   in the run home.
comment_ch: 自第一檔出閘，居中間位置，走內欄。轉直路彎時節省腳程。末段在催策下未能加速。

comment: Jumped smartly, ridden along to take lead, kicked in early  straight and held off to win.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前領先。直路初加速，力抗對手的挑戰勝出。
owner: Wu Kai Char & Wu Wai Chor

comment: Settled worse than midfield about 5Ls behind the leader 2   wide with cover, benefited by the fast sectionals, ran on   steadily for 4th.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬約五個馬位，在有遮擋下走第二疊。步速甚快，有利發揮。穩步上前，跑獲殿軍。
owner: Edward Wong Chung Bun, Andy Wong Ka Wai, Dickson Wong Chung Wai & Ceicy Wong Wing Sze

comment: Slow into stride, no early pace and settled at rear along   fence. Switched out in straight but held for run 300m, then one-paced.
comment_ch: 展步緩慢，缺乏前速，居後列，走內欄。直路上向外移出，但三百米處受困。其後保持同速。

handicap: THE HOPEFUL FUTURE FOR YOUTH HANDICAP
comment: No early pace, settling behind midfield in one-off          position. Well back entering straight, switched out 250m    but no run and switched out again 100m. One-paced.
comment_ch: 缺乏前速，居中間之後位置，走第二疊。入直路時遙居於後。二百五十米處向外移出，但無路可上。一百米處再度向外移出。保持同速。
owner: Mr & Mrs Simon Suen Siu Man

handicap: LEI YUE MUN PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 鯉魚門公眾騎術學校讓賽
comment: Hard ridden to keep up at rear, 6Ls off the leaders, no     progress.
comment_ch: 受力策，居後列，落後領先馬匹六個馬位，毫無進展。

comment: Travelled in behind midfield, 3-1/2L behind the pace 2 wide with cover, made ground steadily in Straight.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬三個半馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。直路上以穩定走勢上前。

comment: Niggled early before shifting across behind horses,         settling five-back, one-off. Held behind horses early in    straight, switched out widest 300m and finished off well.
comment_ch: 早段受催策，繼而在馬群之後切入內疊。落後領放馬五個馬位，走第二疊。直路早段在馬群之後受困，三百米處移出最外疊。衝刺良佳。

comment: Broke down and was retired out of the race near 1200M.      (Lame left front fetlock)
comment_ch: 接近千二米處時跛腳，未能完成餘下賽事。（左前蹄球節不良於行。）
owner: Dr Carl Leung Ka Kui, Paulo Sam, Henry Sam Chien Man & Chow Hong

comment: Started well, nudged along to handy 4-wide 1st turn,        slotted 1 off 1 back, shifted 3 deep 800m but short-lived   advance, under pump 500m & soon hard-ridden, weakened       tamely.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，受催策，首次轉彎時居前列位置，走第四疊。其後留居第二疊第二位，八百米處移至第三疊，一度推進上前，五百米處須受催策，瞬即受力策，乏力轉弱。

comment: Started well & rousted initially, 4 wide no cover 1st turn, slotted 3 deep with cover behind midfield 1250m, under pump 600m, struggled & faded out.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，起初受催策。首次轉彎時走第四疊，沒有遮擋。一千二百五十米處走第三疊，有遮擋，居中間之後位置。六百米處受催策，掙扎上前，力竭。
owner: Odilia Poon Kam Yee & Tommy Poon Ching Tong

comment: At back, 2 wide, pace good, never improved.
comment_ch: 居後列位置，走第二疊，步速中等。從未能推進。

comment: Shifted out in the Straight; ran on well late.
comment_ch: 直路移出, 追勢甚佳

comment: Good start, natural speed to settle forward, eased to       settle fore of midfield, trapped 4 deep no cover and        overracing 700m, pressed forward 600m, almost joint lead    400m, weakened badly.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，以本身步速上前居前列，其後收慢留居中間之前位置。七百米處在沒遮擋下走第四疊，跑來搶口。六百米處受催策上前，四百米處幾乎追上領放馬，其後嚴重轉弱。
owner: Eddie Chow Bing Chung, Ivan Chow Ping Kin & Enrico Chow Yue Hin

comment: Four wide at turn; came from behind to run 2nd.
comment_ch: 四疊轉彎，後上第二

comment: Took rail at rear, harmed by the slow pace, little dash     200M.
comment_ch: 出閘後切入內欄，居後列。步速緩慢，不利發揮。二百米處略為追前。
owner: Wong Man Kit & Vincent Wong Ling Sun

comment: Bumped start, raced in front of midfield 3-1/2L off 2 wide, swung wide and found nothing in the Straight.
comment_ch: 起步時碰撞他駒，居中間之前位置，落後三個半馬位，走第二疊。直路上移出外疊，再無餘力。
owner: Arthur Antonio da Silva, Betty da Silva & Teresa Marie da Silva

comment: Urged early; well tested in straight.
comment_ch: 起步已騎, 直路開鞭

comment: Broke ok, raced midfield 3 deep with cover, niggled 700m,   to 1 off 650m & under pump 550m, plodded on tepidly.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居中間位置，在有遮擋下走第三疊。七百米處受催策。六百五十米處移至第二疊。五百五十米處受催策，走勢疲乏。

comment: Hard ridden to hold the rail at back, harmed by the slow    pace, no turn of foot.
comment_ch: 受力策固守內欄，居後列。慢步速不利發揮。未能加速。

comment: Hit the front at 200m; drew away to score.
comment_ch: 二百透出, 大勝對手

comment: Began OK but soon outpaced and last on settling. Trailed    field thereafter and finished tailed out.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，但瞬即被拋離，居包尾位置。其後尾隨馬群，包尾大敗而回。
owner: HK Kln City Ind & Comm Assn Syndicate

comment: Pressed forward from an outside draw to race outside leader on settling. Moved forward 600m to put pressure on leader,  kept battling in straight until flattened final strides.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，受催策上前，居領放馬外側。六百米處上前追迫領放馬，直路上持續力拼，最後數步洩氣。

comment: Racing backwards; never in contention.
comment_ch: 愈走愈後, 未及水準
owner: Cheung Hon Kit, Joanna Cheung Wai Sze & Jonathan Cheung Yu Shing

comment: Settled worse than midfield about 7Ls behind the leader on  the fence, switched wide turning in, finished off strongly  to score by a nose.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬約七個馬位，走內欄。入直路時移出外疊。末段衝刺強勁，以一馬鼻位之先險勝。
owner: Sammy Sean Lee & Aaron Lee Ho Ting

comment: Well tested in the straight; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 直路初開鞭，末段按番住
owner: Mr & Mrs Senta Wong and Vinci Wong

comment: Urged to lead along rail; not properly tested.
comment_ch: 沿欄搶放, 見好即收

comment: Limited response when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段推騎, 未見加速
owner: Matthew Wong Leung Pak, Janice Wong Oi Ying, James Wong Cheuk On & Timothy Wong Cheuk Tim

comment: Hampered at start; made little progress late.
comment_ch: 起步碰撞，末段稍追

comment: Eased to rear, never competitive.
comment_ch: 收慢留居後列。全無競爭力。

comment: Hard ridden from outside draw, racing wide before shifting  in to settle 1L behind leader. Boxed on gamely in straight  until swamped final strides.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘後受力策，走外疊，繼而向內移入，落後領放馬一個馬位。直路上以勁勢力拼。最後數步被超越。

comment: Hard ridden to take rail and led at good pace, hung on      until 200M flattened.
comment_ch: 受力策移入內欄，以中等步速領放。保持走勢，二百米處洩氣。

comment: Hard ridden to take the rail and lead, clocked fast         sectionals, ran on until 200M weakened.
comment_ch: 受力策，沿欄以快步速領放。持續上前，二百米處轉弱。
owner: Anthony Ma Kwan Ping, Glenda Ma & Kevin Ma

comment: Quickened for 3rd when asked at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百輕騎，加速第三

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY CONVERGENCE OF LOVE COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶亮聚系列讓賽
comment: Began OK, ridden to obtain forward position settling        between horses 4L from leader at turn. Held up in traffic   early in straight before finishing fairly when clear.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，受催策佔取前列位置。轉彎時在馬匹之間競跑，落後領放馬四個馬位。直路初受困，望空後衝刺一般。

comment: Hard ridden forward to settle in a prominent position,      however trapped wide without cover throughout, soon         weakened after straightening.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，居前列，但沿途在沒遮擋下走外疊。入直路後瞬即轉弱。

comment: Began well, ridden along, settling one-off, one-back.       Shaken up top of straight and kept on steadily to line      without looking dangerous.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策，走第二疊，落後一個馬位。直路初受催策，保持穩勢至終點，但未能構成威脅。
owner: Chan Cheung Hi, Lam Suet Wan & Tsoi Huk Yam

comment: Eased back then broke down after passing the winning post   on the first occasion.
comment_ch: 留居後列，首次跑過終點後跛腳。

comment: Pushed forward from the inside draw to be early leader,     before being crossed at 1000m, and settling 3rd/4th.        Hampered when missing a run at 200m, and went to the line 1 paced late.
comment_ch: 自內檔出閘，受推策上前。早段取得領先。一千米處被超越，居第三或第四位。二百米處無路可上時受阻礙。末段保持同速。

comment: Up with the pace; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，走勢平常
owner: Karson Choi Ka Tsan & Donnie Yen Chi Tan

comment: Ran on ok when asked late.
comment_ch: 拉士考驗，追勢不俗

comment: Bumped start, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, similar  position on turn, finished off evenly in straight.
comment_ch: 起步時與對手互相碰撞，居中間位置，走第三疊，有遮擋。轉彎時居相若位置。直路上以穩定走勢衝刺。

comment: Good break wide, steadied to slot 1 off with cover near     rear, shifted 3 deep 1000m & rolled to 2nd at 720m, parked  1 off, niggled 400m, 3rd & driven 300m, found nil &         weakened.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘迅速，收慢留居後列，走第二疊，有遮擋。一千米處移出第三疊。七百二十米處上前，居第二位，走第二疊。四百米處受催策。三百米處居第三位，受催策。再無餘力及轉弱。

comment: Prominent, travelled 2Ls behind the leader 2 wide with      cover, despite benefited by the slow sectionals, ran on     only fairly and well beaten over the last furlong.
comment_ch: 居前列，落後領放馬兩個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。步速緩慢，有利發揮，但衝刺僅屬普通，最後二百米洩氣潰敗。
owner: Au Kai Kwong, Yu Chun Hong, Cissy Yu Wing Sze & Winnie Yu Wing Yin

comment: Slow to muster speed despite being ridden along, held up    behind midfield, brought wide nearing 400M, ran on well to  go 2nd near line but not getting to winner.
comment_ch: 受催策，但加速緩慢。居中間之後位置，接近四百米處移出外疊。以佳勢上前，接近終點時居第二位  ，但未能追近頭馬。

comment: Kept on when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段稍騎，保持走勢

comment: Always in touch; hit the front at 200m to score.
comment_ch: 有前有後，二百透出

comment: Away with them, travelled keenly in the early stages, raced 2 wide, 2 lengths back in 5th, similar position on turn,    unable to get clear running in straight, not tested. (See   Racing Incidents.)
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，早段跑來搶口，居第五位，落後兩個馬位，走第二疊。直路彎居相若位置。直路上未能望空，未受催策。（見競賽事件報告）

comment: Ran on ordinary; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 走勢平常, 未見佳處
owner: Patrick Lee Pak Wing, Edmond Chau Chin Hung & Christina Lee Oi Ping

comment: Fair start, down to rail, ridden aggressively to improve,   settled beyond midfield on inside, overracing 800m, ridden  along 450m, never likely.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，移入內欄，受力策以推進，居中間之後位置。八百米處搶口，四百五十米處受催策，從未看似有力爭勝。

comment: Never far off the pace, couldn't sprint with them passing   400M, dropped out of contention quickly. (No Vet findings)
comment_ch: 從未遠離領放馬。跑過四百米處時未能與對手一起衝刺。迅速墮退，再無爭勝機會。（賽後接受獸醫檢查，並無發現任何明顯異常之處。）
owner: Stephen So Chi Ming & Samuel Chan Ying Leung

comment: Fairly away, then crowded and settled towards the back of   the field, on the fence. Lost a run 300m, and came out off  heels to keep progressing. Battled on to the line.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，其後受擠迫，居馬群後列，走內欄。三百米處無路可上，向外移出避開他駒後蹄，持續上前，力拼至終點。
owner: Christopher So Chi Hang & Eddie Ng Tao

comment: Made ground steadily; ran 2nd and not fully tested.
comment_ch: 逐步加速，點到即止
owner: Alan Tsang Ping Sing, Fiona Tsang Wai Sze & Claudia Tsang Hei Man

comment: Missed break, raced rail near rear, niggled 600m & soon     under pump, kept on one pace.
comment_ch: 漏閘，居後列位置，走內欄。六百米處受催策，瞬即受力策，保持同速。
owner: Mr & Mrs Simon Suen Siu Man

comment: Behind midfield, 2 wide, suited by the fast tempo, no       progress.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，走第二疊。步速甚快，適合發揮。毫無進展。
owner: Willie Yiu Man Hung & Victor Yiu Wai Yin

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 5Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, never looked likely.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬五個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。從未看似有力一爭。

comment: Impeded at break, taken to near rear on inner, progress     700m, niggled along 500m, hard-ridden home turn, switched   out 300m but bumped rival & unbalanced, stayed on evenly.
comment_ch: 出閘時受阻礙，留居後列位置，走內疊。七百米處推進上前，五百米處受催策。直路彎受力策，三百米處向外移出，碰撞對手及失去平衡，保持穩勢。
owner: Kevin Kwong Ka Wing, Chan Bing Woon, Kwong Wai Bong & Michelle Chan Sin Man

comment: Slightly slow to begin; moved forward behind the pack; ran on for 3rd under whip.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 迅即跟回馬群, 二百鞭騎入位
owner: Mr & Mrs Simon Suen Siu Man

comment: Hard ridden to hold rail inside leader to and around turn.  Kicked ahead 350m, kept finding under intense pressure      final 200m, to be beaten on line.
comment_ch: 受力策，趨近及轉直路彎時居領放馬內側，固守內欄。三百五十米處發力上前，最後二百米在力策下持續力拼，過終點時僅敗。

comment: Led all the way and kept on well to score.
comment_ch: 主動搶放，靭力十足

comment: Ran on ordinary when asked; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 騎落欠勁，未有好感

comment: Prominent, travelled 2Ls behind the leader 2 wide with      cover, broken down 200M.
comment_ch: 居前列，落後領放馬兩個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。二百米處跛腳。
owner: Mr & Mrs Desmond Wong Shung Yiu

comment: Fast out and went straight to the lead, quickened nicely on straightening to comfortably hold off all challengers.
comment_ch: 出閘快速，隨即上前領放。入直路時以佳勢加速上前，輕鬆壓倒挑戰馬匹勝出。

comment: Raced keenly at turn; shifted out in the straight; being asked late.
comment_ch: 轉彎搶口, 直路移出, 推騎追上

comment: Quickened at turn; weakened in the straight.
comment_ch: 彎位發力, 直路墮退

comment: Settled down in midfield, wide no cover after 1000M, crept  closer to pace home turn, every chance, weakened 150M.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，一千米處後走外疊，沒有遮擋。直路彎追近領放馬，甚具勝望。一百五十米處轉弱。
owner: Queenie Siu Fung Kou & Lau Kwok Man

comment: Eased back early; dashed on well from behind.
comment_ch: 留前試後，表現不差
owner: Sammy Sean Lee & Aaron Lee Ho Ting

comment: Been niggled along; came from behind for 4th.
comment_ch: 沿途俾住，後上第四
owner: Lillian El-Azar, Karim El-Azar & J A Filmer-Wilson

comment: Jumped away well; led all the way to score.
comment_ch: 起步敏捷，帶放而回

comment: Led all the way and score.
comment_ch: 望空搶放，愈走愈勁

comment: Ran on for 3rd, impressive
comment_ch: 按住第三，表示吸引

comment: Ran on ordinary when shifted out in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路移出, 追勢平常

comment: Settled in midfield, 3-3/4L behind the leader 3 wide        without cover, dropped off when rounding Home Turn, did not run on.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬三又四分三個馬位，在沒有遮擋下走第三疊。轉直路彎時墮退，未能保持走勢。

handicap: HKU FACULTIES OF MEDICINE AND ENGINEERING HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 港大醫學院與工程學院讓賽
comment: In front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the good pace on the rails, flattened 250M, on heels 200M.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，落後快步速的領放馬三個半馬位，走內欄。二百五十米處洩氣。二百米處靠近他駒後蹄。

comment: Lacked toe at start & bustled to 5th on rail, checked off   heels 1030m & shuffled to back of midfield, driven home     turn, found little in tame stretch run.
comment_ch: 缺乏前速，在催策下進佔第五位，走內欄。一千零三十米處勒避他駒後蹄，墮居中間之後位置。直路彎受催策。直路上走勢疲乏，無甚餘力。

comment: Raced midfield; well tested throughout.
comment_ch: 起步鞭騎, 騎足全程

handicap: THE HOPEFUL FUTURE FOR YOUTH HANDICAP
comment: Jumped OK but outpaced, dropping behind midfield along      rail. Held position around turn but only one-paced in       straight.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可。前速不及對手，墮居中間之後位置，沿欄競跑。直路彎保持位置，直路上僅能保持同速。
owner: Dr Irene Lau Mun Yee & Lo Yat Fung

comment: Bumped start, no early speed, raced 5 lengths or so back at rear, bumped running rail and unbalanced near 600M, similar position on turn, made good progress in straight to make    frame.
comment_ch: 出閘時碰撞對手，缺乏前速，居後列位置，落後約五個馬位。接近六百米處時碰撞內欄，失去平衡。直路彎居相若位置，直路上追前甚多，跑獲殿軍。

comment: Slow to begin and only fairly into stride, sitting last     early almost 10L off the leader. Still trailing on the turn and only fair in the straight, picking up a couple easing   out late.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，展步一般，早段居包尾位置，落後領放馬近十個馬位。直路彎仍居包尾位置。直路上走勢僅屬一般，末段超越兩匹收慢的對手。

comment: Settled in worse than midfield, 5-1/4L off 2 wide with      cover, harmed by the quick tempo, never ran on.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後五又四分一個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。步速甚快，不利發揮。從未能上前。

comment: Slow to begin; limited response when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，直路推騎，反應一般
owner: Damian Yap Chun Wing & Alfred Donald Yap

comment: Pushed forward early and stuck 3 wide, before pressing to   share the lead at 900m. Never responded when asked in the   straight and went to the line 1 paced.
comment_ch: 早段受推策上前，走第三疊，九百米處在催策下並排領先。直路上受催策，毫無反應，保持同速至終點。

comment: Raced under his own steam when shifted out in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路移出, 按住順走

comment: Began well, positioned a length behind the leader on rail,  easy run on turn, kept on well in straight to get 3rd, no   threat to the winner.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，沿欄落後領放馬一個馬位。直路彎走勢輕鬆，直路上保持佳勢，跑入季席，未能威脅頭馬。

comment: Ridden along from wide barrier, crossed to the lead near    1000M, shook off nearest pursuers 300M, ran on well enough  only to be headed by winner 100M and lost 2nd near line.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受催策，接近一千米處時切入內欄帶頭。三百米處擺脫苦纏的對手，以佳勢上前，僅於一百米處被頭馬超越，接近終點時失去亞席。

comment: Broke well, shared early pace before easing 3L back along   rail first turn. Taken off fence 700m when field speeded    up, bumped 450m, severely checked 200m when attempting to   improve, kept on well despite racing tight.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。早段並排領先。其後收慢，首次轉彎時落後三個馬位，走內欄。七百米處馬群加速時移離內欄。四百五十米處與對手碰撞。二百米處嘗試推進時大力勒避。儘管緊迫競跑，但仍保持佳勢。

comment: Raced just inside the leader near the stands rail, failed   to match the eventual winner's turn of foot in the final    200 metres.
comment_ch: 居領放馬內側位置，靠近外欄競跑。最後二百米加速不及頭馬。

comment: Punched forward to occupy the box seat, ran on strongly to  score by a neck.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，佔取包廂位置。走勢強勁，以一馬頸位之先勝出。

comment: Even start, eased to last, settled at rear 3 deep with      cover, nudged along 1300m, hard ridden momentarily 800m,    ridden along 500m and under a heavy drive soon after,       strong late.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，收慢留居包尾位置，在有遮擋下走第三疊。千三米處受催策。八百米處一度受力策。五百米處受催策，瞬即受力策，末段衝刺強勁。
owner: Julian Hui Chun Hang & Michele Monique Reis

comment: Looking for cover early; hit the line strongly to score when clear.
comment_ch: 早段找遮擋，拉士望空即撲上

comment: Began well, pushed forward, sitting 1L behind leader on     settling. Inched closer around turn, hit front 300m,        battled strongly when challenged, pipped on post.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受推策上前，落後領放馬一個馬位。轉直路彎時追近，三百米處取得領先。受挑戰時以勁勢力拼，終點線上僅敗。

comment: Restrained and taken in, settling towards rear in one-off   position. Took inside run in straight and ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 受約束及移入內疊，居後列，走第二疊。直路上走內疊，保持普通走勢。
owner: Wu Kai Char & Wu Wai Chor

comment: Ran on only fairly when asked at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百推騎，未復佳態

comment: Under restraint after start; shifted out in the Straight and made progress when asked.
comment_ch: 起步拖住，直路移出，推騎追趕

comment: Came from behind for 3rd when clear in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路望空, 後上第三
owner: Mrs Kao Chan Ming Man & Cheung Ka Wai

comment: Hard ridden forward, 2 wide, benefited by the slow pace,    emptied 200M.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，走第二疊。步速緩慢，有利發揮。二百米處再無餘力。
owner: Michael Ng Chun Ho , Randy Chu Wai Ping & Jenny Ng Wing Sum

comment: Prominent, kept on steadily to the line without threatening.
comment_ch: 居前列位置，保持穩定走勢至終點。未能構成威脅。

comment: Jumped well, strode forward at own pace, settling behind    midfield along rail. Switched out for clear running in the  straight and finished off nicely.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，順其自然展步上前，居中間之後位置，走內欄。直路上向外移出以望空，衝刺良佳。

comment: Asked at turn; made progress in the Straight when asked.
comment_ch: 轉彎發力, 直路騎住追趕
owner: Chan Cheung Hi, Lam Suet Wan & Tsoi Huk Yam

comment: Moderate break wide, lacked toe, raced rear rank 4 deep     with cover, last & ridden 600m, hard driven turning in,     plugged on for even headway.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘普通，缺乏前速，居後列，在有遮擋下走第四疊。六百米處居包尾位置，受催策。入直路時受力策。穩步上前。

comment: Raced midfield without cover; ran on ok.
comment_ch: 望空居中，中規中矩

comment: Towards the rear despite ridden along early, made up late   ground in straight, never nearer.
comment_ch: 早段受摧策，但居後列位置。直路上追前，末段最為接近。

comment: Limited response when asked at 300m.
comment_ch: 三百推騎, 反應平常

comment: Held ground throughout; just to pass the trial.
comment_ch: 不上不落，旨在考閘

comment: Ridden along early to hold forward position before moving   into box seat first turn. Kept on well early in straight    before tiring final 100m.
comment_ch: 早段受催策，居前列位置，首個彎位移至包廂位置。直路初保持佳勢，最後一百米呈現疲態。

comment: Settled just worse than midfield, tightened passing the 400 metres, kept on steadily without quickening.
comment_ch: 居中間稍後位置。跑過四百米處時受緊迫。保持穩勢，但未能加速。

comment: Waited with, saved ground on inside turning in, fought on   steadily to be nearest at finish.
comment_ch: 留力待拼，入直路時走內疊節省腳程。持續力拼，過終點時最為接近。

comment: Hard ridden early, at rear along the fence, favoured by the fast pace, ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 早段受力策，居後列，走內欄。步速甚快，有利發揮。走勢一般。

comment: Pushed early but not muster, took rail in midfield, little  dash 250M.
comment_ch: 早段受推策，但未能加速。居中間位置，移入內欄。二百五十米處略為上前。

comment: Always at rear; ran on only fairly.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑, 走勢一般

comment: Wide throughout; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 全程外疊, 走勢不弱

comment: Rearward early; never in contention.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑, 唔多肯走
owner: The Hon Ronald Arculli GBM GBS JP & Johanna K J Arculli BBS

comment: Taken back from a wide gate, travelled 6Ls behind the       leader on the fence, sung wide turning in, stormed home to  score by 1L.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後留後，落後領放馬六個馬位，走內欄。入直路時移出外疊。末段衝刺強勁，以一個馬位之先勝出。

handicap: CHEVALIER COLD STORAGE AND LOGISTICS HANDICAP
comment: Settled in front of midfield on the rails, lack room 400M,  never improved.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，走內欄。四百米處空位不足，從未能推進。

comment: Sat towards the rear, 5-1/2L behind 3 wide with cover, made nice ground to come home for 4th.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬五個半馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。追前甚多，跑獲殿軍。

comment: Pressed forward from wide draw, racing wide but with cover  3L from leaders. Blocked for run early in straight, kept on fairly to 200m before fading.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，受催策上前，落後領先馬匹三個馬位，走外疊，但有遮擋。直路初受困。二百米處前保持普通走勢，繼而力竭。
owner: Tony Lau Yiu Tong & Thomas Lau Sum Fai

handicap_ch: 香港大學專業進修學院讓賽
comment: Quickly out, sharing early pace before settling 2L from     leader but 3-wide. Dropped to 4th around final turn, picked up momentum 300m, finished well.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，早段並排領先，其後落後領放馬兩個馬位，走第三疊。直路彎墮居第四位，三百米處開始加速，衝刺良佳。

comment: Made progress under a hold; impressive.
comment_ch: 按實上前，表現引人

comment: Taken back early; ran on awkwardly in the Straight.
comment_ch: 刻意拖後, 直路騎落欠順
owner: Matthew Wong Leung Pak, Janice Wong Oi Ying, James Wong Cheuk On & Timothy Wong Cheuk Tim

comment: Hung out at turn; finished last.
comment_ch: 轉彎外閃，包尾而回
result_ch: 只准參與一千米直路賽
owner: Pang Wai Hak, Pang Ka Yeung & Andy Pang Ka Wai

comment: Restrained after jumping and shifted across to fence behind horses, settling at rear. Entered straight behind a wall of horses, picked up momentum while weaving between horses to  be closest at finish.
comment_ch: 出閘後受約束，在馬群之後切入內欄，居後列。入直路時居馬群之後，在馬匹之間穿插上前時加速，過終點時最為接近。
owner: Allen Shi Lop Tak & Kimmy Ngan King Lin

comment: Pushed forward and sat outside the leader 1L off, kept on   until passing 250M when couldn't find extra.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，居領放馬外側，落後一個馬位。保持走勢，跑過二百五十米處時再無餘力。
owner: The Hon Ronald Arculli GBM GBS JP & Johanna K J Arculli BBS

comment: Pushed forward early from the wide draw to lead, sitting 3  wide up the back straight. Starting to fade late, and being chased down, but just managed to hold onto the win late.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，早段受推策上前領先，對面直路上走第三疊。末段開始力竭，並被對手追近，但仍能僅保住冠軍。

handicap: THE HONG KONG GOLF CLUB CENTENARY CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港高爾夫球會百週年紀念盃（讓賽）
comment: Began well, hampered 1050m, settled three back along fence. Put under pressure 400m, got split 250m, charged home       strongly. Rider dropped whip 200m.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。一千零五十米處受阻礙，落後領放馬三個馬位，走內欄。四百米處受催策。二百五十米處取得空位上前，衝刺強勁。二百米處騎師跌掉馬鞭。
owner: James Ngai & Joseph Hui Ying Biu

comment: Slightly awkward jump, eased, back to near rear on rail,    clicked up 600m, railed through, checked 380m, short of     room thereafter, clear 240m, struggled to pick up.
comment_ch: 出閘稍為笨拙，留居後列位置，走內欄。六百米處加速。沿途走內欄，三百八十米處勒避，其後空位不足。二百四十米處望空，未能加速。

comment: Chased pace, moved up to challenge leader 300M, hit lead    150M, kept on well closing stages under top weight.
comment_ch: 追趕領放馬。三百米處上前挑戰領放馬，一百五十米處取得領先。末段在負頂磅下保持佳勢。

comment: In touch early; had a hold late.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑, 末段按住順走
owner: The Hon Ronald Arculli GBM GBS JP

comment: Eased back, 2-3 wide, little dash 400M, run ended 150M.
comment_ch: 收慢留居後列，走第二至第三疊。四百米處略為上前，一百五十米處無以為繼。

comment: Taken back from widest gate to sit last pair, shifted 3     deep 700m, ridden turning in, bumped rival 350m, never a    factor.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後留居最後兩位。七百米處移至第三疊。入直路時受催策。三百五十米處碰撞對手。從未有力一爭。

comment: Poor start from a poor draw, soon ridden positively         circling the field to take up running on rails 900 metres   out, unable to sustain effort and headed over 100 metres    out.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘差劣，瞬即受催策，繞過馬群上前，九百米處領放，走內欄。後勁不繼，一百米處被超越。

handicap: THE SPORTS CLUB DIAMOND JUBILEE CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 五陵會鑽禧挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Settled in behind midfield, 7L off along the rail, shifted  out after straightening and made nice ground.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後七個馬位，沿欄競跑。入直路後移出外疊，追前甚多。

comment: Awkward start, raced midfield on rail, shifted out turning  in, shaken up 400m, kept on under hard drive without        threatening.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，居中間位置，走內欄。入直路時向外移出。四百米處受催策。在力策下保持走勢，但未能構成威脅。

comment: Hard ridden early to hold midfield position away from       fence. Made progress around turn, got clear passage 370m,   hit front 200m, pulled clear.
comment_ch: 早段在力策下居中間位置，離欄競跑。轉直路彎時推進。三百七十米處望空，二百米處取得領先，帶離對手勝出。

comment: Bumped start, then steadied before first turn, settling     one-back, one-off. Travelled comfortably to straight,       shaken up 400m but unable haul in winner.
comment_ch: 起步時與對手互相碰撞。首個彎位前收慢，落後領放馬一個馬位，走第二疊。直路前走勢暢順。四百米處受催策，但未能追上頭馬。
owner: James Lau Po Man & Alice Woo Wai See

comment: Five wide at turn; under a hold in the Straight; impressive.
comment_ch: 五疊轉彎，直路按實，走勢悅目
owner: HK Football Club Horse Racing Syndicate

comment: Taken back on jumping from 12, settled down 7Ls back in the rear, stayed on passing beaten horses only, not reached     contention.
comment_ch: 自第十二檔出閘後留後，居後列，落後領放馬七個馬位。保持走勢，僅能超越數匹已洩氣的對手，從未有力一爭。
owner: Anthony Chow Wing Kin & Michael Tong Hing Yuen

comment: Responded ok when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段推騎, 反應尚可

comment: Fair break, eased to settle last, outpaced from 1000m,      niggled 850m to tack on, ridden 440m, never in contention   but made good late ground.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，收慢留居包尾位置。自一千米處起被拋離。八百五十米處受催策以跟上。四百四十米處再受催策。從未有力爭勝，但末段追前甚多。

comment: Jumped well from a tricky gate, sent forward to take the    lead, enjoyed the easy lead throughout, kept on strongly in straight to score.
comment_ch: 自第九檔出閘迅速。受催策上前帶頭，沿途輕鬆領放。直路上保持勁勢，取得勝利。

comment: Under restraint along the rail; plenty in hand.
comment_ch: 貼欄扣實，大把在手

comment: Smart break & rousted to lead 1600m, to rail 1300m, slowed  tempo in backstretch, wound it up on turn, neck ahead &     driven into stretch, all out & headed 200m, weakened.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，千六米處在催策下取得領先，千三米處移入內欄。對面直路上減慢步速。直路彎發力，入直路時領先一馬頸位，受催策。全力以赴，二百米處被超越，其後轉弱。
owner: Tang Shu Chun, Michael Tang Hon Chau, Tang Chan Shui Kuen & Bernadette Tang Yim Lai Nor

comment: Ridden to maintain forward position, travelled strongly to  800m when got close to heels. Swung very wide into straight and finished off strongly.
comment_ch: 在催策下保持前列位置。走勢強勁，八百米處靠近前駒後蹄。入直路時移出大外疊，衝刺強勁。

comment: Began well but not pushed and allowed to hold rail inside   leader. Inched forward along rail around turn to hit the    front on straightening. Kept finding under heavy pressure   for narrow win.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳但未受催策，獲許沿欄競走，居領放馬內側。直路彎沿欄上前，入直路時領先。受大力催策而持續上前，險勝。

comment: Jumped best to lead 4-wide early stages, taken back to      2-wide in 3rd within 2L of lead entering back straight,     faded from approaching home straight. (Struck into)
comment_ch: 出閘最快。早段帶頭，走第四疊。進入對面直路時留居第三位，落後領放馬不逾兩個馬位，走第二疊。自趨近直路起力竭。（右後腿曾被踢中。）

owner: Mr & Mrs Allen Shi Lop Tak and Kenneth Shi Ho Ming

comment: Came from behind for 4th; never a threat.
comment_ch: 後上第四, 但毫無威脅

comment: Began fairly, ridden forward but wide, then steadied 1000m. Improved position around turn, wide in straight, gave       ground final stages.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策上前，走外疊。一千米處收慢。轉直路彎時推進。直路上走外疊，末段墮退。

comment: Dropped back to near the rear 6-7Ls off the pace, picked up momentum 400M, made rapid headway and led near 100M,        swiftly shook clear under hands and heels riding, won with  plenty in hand.
comment_ch: 墮居後列，落後領放馬六至七個馬位。四百米處加速，迅速上前。接近一百米處領先，在騎師手足並用催策下迅速帶離對手，勝來猶有餘力。

comment: Ridden shortly after start; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 起步已騎, 毫無走勢

comment: Jumped away well; under a hold in the Straight.
comment_ch: 起步敏捷，直路拖住

comment: Broke well, taken back from wide to slot 1 off near rear,   edged 3 deep 750m, fanned wide final turn, driven & ran on  strongly, just missed frame.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘迅速，留居後列，走第二疊。七百五十米處移至第三疊。轉直路彎時走外疊，受催策，衝刺強勁，僅失季軍。

comment: Settled at rear; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑, 未受考驗

handicap: THE HONG KONG CLUB CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
comment: Steadied and shifted in behind horses from wide draw to get to rail at the rear. Last passing 200m before running past  beaten horses.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後收慢，在馬群之後移入內欄，居後列。跑過二百米處時居包尾位置，其後超越已洩氣的對手。

comment: First to jump; won easily.
comment_ch: 應聲彈出，輕易取勝
owner: Jimmy Chung Kwok Man & Dominic Chung Won Lok

comment: Slow to begin; made progress saving ground in the Straight.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，直路慳位追趕

comment: Good break, soon settled rail back of midfield, off fence & driven 300m, switched out 250m & bumped rival, solid closer without threatening.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，瞬即沿欄居中間之後位置。三百米處離欄競跑，受催策。二百五十米處移出外疊並碰撞他駒。力追上前，但未能構成威脅。
owner: Rusy M Shroff & Purviz R Shroff

comment: Eased to race towards the rear, 8-1/4L behind 2 wide,       continued to make ground steadily when going to the line.
comment_ch: 收慢留居後列，落後八又四分一個馬位，走第二疊。跑向終點時持續以穩定走勢上前。

comment: Broke well, held slender lead on rails far side before      ceding narrow advantage rounding home bend, weakened        noticeably after straightening.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，對面直路上以短距離領先，走內欄。轉直路彎時稍稍落後。入直路後顯著轉弱。
owner: Mr & Mrs Desmond Wong Shung Yiu

comment: Settled in rear of midfield on rails, commenced move on top of home bend, switched out for a run entering straight, ran on under pressure to assert authority inside final 100      metres.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，走內欄。直路彎早段開始推進。入直路時向外移出取位。在催策下保持走勢，最後一百米控制大局。

handicap: HKU FACULTIES OF ARCHITECTURE AND ARTS HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 港大建築學院與文學院讓賽
comment: Behind midfield, unable to slot in from 13 and was strung   out in the 4-path making the first turn, no cover to        straight, ran on well enough to take 3rd despite covering   more ground than rivals.
comment_ch: 自第十三檔出閘後居中間之後位置，未能切入內疊，首次轉彎時走第四疊。入直路前沒有遮擋。雖然比對手多走腳程，但保持佳勢，跑獲第三。

handicap: THE ASSOCIATION OF HONG KONG RACING JOURNALISTS CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港評馬同業協進會挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Began well but eased back, settling along rail behind       midfield but only 4L from leader. Stayed on rail on         straightening, rolled forward strongly only to fail         narrowly.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，收慢留居中間之後位置，落後領放馬四個馬位，走內欄。沿欄入直路，衝刺強勁，僅以短距離落敗。

comment: Up with the pace; ran on ordinary when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢, 直路騎落欠勁

comment: Wide throughout but still ran on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 全程外疊, 蝕位仍近
owner: Mr & Mrs Hamen Fan Shi Hoo and Alex Fan Chen Yen

comment: Wide throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 全程外疊，未受考驗
owner: Vijay Harish Mohinani, Nilesh Murli Sajnani & Jaikishin Ishwardas Daswani

comment: Jumped well, pressed forward but caught wide without cover  3L from leader 800m. Left flat-footed top of straight when  leaders kicked, but battled on gamely before flattened      final strides.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。受催策上前，八百米處落後領放馬三個馬位，走外疊，沒有遮擋。直路初領先馬匹加速時走勢遲緩。持續力拼，最後數步洩氣。

comment: Hit the front at 200m; won with plenty in hand.
comment_ch: 二百透出，大把在手

comment: Smart start widest, pace to edge lead 3 deep 960m, headed   620m, ridden 450m but emptied 300m, eased down.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘迅速，九百六十米處加速上前領先，走第三疊。六百二十米處被超越。四百五十米處受催策。三百米處力竭，繼而收慢。
owner: Cris Ng Ka Shuen & Gregory James Holmes

comment: Ridden along early then steadied and shifted in to find     cover, settling close to fence in midfield. Stayed on fence around turn and kept on fairly in straight.
comment_ch: 早段受催策，繼而收慢移入接近內欄位置以尋找遮擋，居中間位置。直路彎沿欄競跑，直路上保持普通走勢。

comment: Led all the way to score; moved better than last trial.
comment_ch: 一放到底，比上次閘好
owner: Kenneth To Kin Ting & Martin To Chun Ting

comment: Limited response when asked late.
comment_ch: 拉士稍騎, 乏力跟跑

comment: Asked at turn; faded in the straight.
comment_ch: 轉彎發力, 直路收工

comment: Restrained from start to take up running along the rail.    Did not create an impression throughout.
comment_ch: 出閘後受約束，移入內欄競跑。沿途毫無表現。

comment: Came from behind for 4th; ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 後上第四, 中規中矩

comment: Being ridden halfway; ran on ok.
comment_ch: 半程已騎，有點追勢
owner: Chan Wing Kwan, Chadwick Mok Cham Hung & Chan Wai Leung

comment: Bumped on jumping and hampered shortly after, settled       towards rear, pushed along passing 600m and ran home one    paced.
comment_ch: 躍出時與他駒互相碰撞，其後不久受阻礙，居後列。跑過六百米處時受推策。末段保持同速。
owner: Wan Chun, Wan Yuk Sim & Jonathan Yiu Chi Fung

handicap: THE HONG KONG FOOTBALL CLUB CENTENARY CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港足球會百週年紀念挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Broke ok, parked 1 back 1 off, niggled 650m, shuffled back  & bustled 520m, driven into stretch, plugged on tamely.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，居第二疊第二位。六百五十米處受催策。五百二十米處墮退，受催策。入直路時受催策，衝刺乏力。

comment: Rolled forward and occupied box-seat from barrier 1, suited to the slow pace, ran on well for 3rd.
comment_ch: 自第一檔出閘後上前，佔取包廂位置。慢步速適合發揮。以佳勢上前，取得季軍。

comment: Slow to begin; then under restraint; raced awkwardly.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，緊彊扣實，走勢欠順

comment: At the rear and gave ground rounding turn, never a factor.
comment_ch: 居後列。轉直路彎時墮退。從未有力一爭。
owner: Li Sai Hung & Vanessa Li Pik Man

comment: Jumped well from a wide gate, unable to slot in, raced wide and without cover for the majority of the race, failed to   close off in straight when hard run took effect.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘迅速，未能移入內欄。大部分途程走外疊，沒有遮擋。耗力太多，直路上衝刺乏力。

comment: Caught the eye when came from behind inside for 2nd.
comment_ch: 內檔竄上, 表現吸引
owner: Mr & Mrs Yiu King Chuen & Chris Yiu Chun Hang

comment: Slow to begin; under a hold throughout; dashed on well late.
comment_ch: 慢閘，全程按實，拉士有走勢

comment: Led centre track; kept on well to score.
comment_ch: 中檔領放，貫注到底

comment: Restrained at rear; never tested
comment_ch: 拖住跟跑, 旨在考閘

comment: Shifted across behind runners from an outside draw and last on rail on settling. Never likely.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後在馬群之後移入內欄，居包尾位置。從未看似有力一爭。

comment: Broke inwards at start, settled just beyond midfield 1 off, shifted 3 deep 1000m, under vigorous drive 650m, no         response.
comment_ch: 出閘時向內躍出，居中間稍後位置，走第二疊。一千米處移至第三疊，六百五十米處受力策，但毫無反應。

comment: Ran on comfortably for 2nd; plenty in hand.
comment_ch: 從容第二, 大把在手

comment: Settled in midfield, fought on dourly in straight to snatch victory just inside the 100 metres.
comment_ch: 居中間位置。直路上持續力拼，一百米處取得勝利。

comment: Taken back from a wide draw, raced 6 lengths back at rear,  there to turn, finished off very strongly in straight to    get 2nd.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，留居後列，落後六個馬位。直路彎居相同位置，直路上衝刺凌厲，跑獲亞軍。

comment: Away nicely, raced 3-wide initially before setting one-out, one back. Took a few strides to gain momentum in straight,  finished strongly final 200m to grab second placing.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，早段走第三疊。其後居第二疊第二位。直路上加速需時。最後二百米衝刺強勁，跑獲亞軍。

comment: Under whip early; weakened badly.
comment_ch: 一早開鞭，乏力墮退
owner: Yeung Kwok Ki & Cheng Kar Shing

comment: Began fairly. Picked up speed between horses, settling      midfield. Under hard riding from 400m but only one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，逐漸加速，在馬匹之間競跑，居中間位置。自四百米處起受力策，但保持同速。

handicap: POK FU LAM COUNTRY PARK HANDICAP
comment: Slow to begin, taken back to rear, outpaced and left behind passing 400M, never involved.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，墮居後列。跑過四百米處時被拋離及墮退，從未參與競逐。

comment: On-pace early; weakened badly late.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢, 直路乏力墮退
owner: Mr & Mrs Arthur Chan Kwan Hung

comment: Pushed to obtain a trailing position behind leader, took    over command  200M and drew off  impressively towards       finish.
comment_ch: 受推策，居領放馬之後。二百米處控制大局，末段帶離對手，以漂亮姿態勝出。

comment: Ridden forward to take the fence and led at fast tempo,     kept on until weakened final furlong.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，移入內欄，以快步速領放。保持走勢，最後二百米轉弱。

comment: Up with the pace early; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，拉士按返

comment: Being niggled early; shifted out in the straight; made progress under whip.
comment_ch: 一早已騎, 直路移出, 開鞭追上

comment: Good break & driven  to lead 1040m, sat 1 off, headed 870m  & raced close 2nd, shaken up  to lead 270m, kicked 1.5L     clear, emptied late & headed close home.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。一○四○米處在催策下取得領先，走第二疊。八百七十米處被超越，居接近領放馬的第二位。受催策，二百七十米處領先，其後帶離一個半馬位。末段再無餘力，接近終點時被超越。

comment: Ridden to hold position early, settling three-back from     leader along fence. Shaken up entering straight but only    one-paced.
comment_ch: 早段在催策下保持位置，落後領放馬三個馬位，沿欄競跑。入直路時受催策，但僅能保持同速。
owner: Dr Rita Fan Hsu Lai Tai & Andrew Fan Chun Wah

comment: At back, 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, ran on ok in straight.
comment_ch: 居後列，走第二疊。步速緩慢，不合發揮。直路上走勢尚可。

comment: Reared & missed break, last pair & niggled on rail          initially, bumped 800m, niggled to advance a place          thereafter, hard-ridden in stretch, found little.
comment_ch: 以後足豎立及漏閘，居最後兩位，早段受催策，走內欄。八百米處被碰撞，其後在催策下略為上前。直路上受力策，無甚餘力。

comment: Hard ridden to occupy box seat, just held ground in         straight.
comment_ch: 受力策佔取包廂位置。直路上僅能保持位置。
