comment: Wide throughout; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 沿途外疊，走勢一般

comment: At rear 9L behind, 2 wide with cover. Did not create any    impression.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬九個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。毫無表現。
owner: Stewart Leung Chi Kin & Eliza Leung Sze Man

comment: Unable to slot in for cover, raced keenly, 3-wide in        pursuit of leaders home turn, kept on through final 400M    despite tough trip, not pace of first few final stages.
comment_ch: 未能切入內疊以取得遮擋，跑來搶口，直路彎走第三疊，跟隨領先馬匹。雖然多走腳程，但最後四百米仍保持走勢，末段不敵前數名馬匹。

handicap: THE HONG KONG RUGBY UNION CUP (HANDICAP)
comment: Began well, pressed forward, holding one-off spot behind    leader. Eased one-back, one-off back stretch, took inside   run in straight, finished strongly but just failed.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。受催策上前，居領放馬之後，走第二疊。對面直路上收慢，落後一個馬位，走第二疊。直路上走內疊。衝刺強勁，僅敗。

comment: Slow to begin; under whip early; not willing to stretch.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，一早開鞭，不願展步

comment: Over-raced early; not stretching out properly.
comment_ch: 早段搶口, 出腳論盡

comment: Settled in forward of midfield in 5th one off the rails,    commenced run rounding home bend gaining 3rd into straight, kept on steadily without threatening.
comment_ch: 居第五位，走第二疊。轉直路彎時開始發力，入直路時進佔第三位。保持穩勢，但未能構成威脅。

comment: Bumped shortly after start, ridden along ahead of midfield  but 5L from leader. Faded quickly final 300m.
comment_ch: 起步後不久被碰撞，受催策，居中間之前位置，落後領放馬五個馬位。最後三百米迅速力竭。

comment: Rear rank at break, gradual advance 4 wide to lead 850m, to rail 700m, headed 600m, driven 500m, soon  emptied & faded  tamely.
comment_ch: 出閘後居後列，在第四疊逐漸上前，八百五十米處取得領先。七百米處移入內欄。六百米處被超越。五百米處受催策，瞬即洩氣，力竭敗退。

comment: Bit slow out, no surprising performance
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 走勢平常

comment: Jumped well and shared early pace before taking clear lead  entering course proper. Joined up front passing 150m but    kept on well till running on empty final 50m.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，早段並排領放。入直路時帶離餘駒。跑過一百五十米處時被追上，但保持佳勢，最後五十米再無餘力。
owner: Alan Chan Yau Yuet & Chris Chan Cheong Hoi

comment: Bumped start, at back, 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no  progress.
comment_ch: 出閘時與對手互相碰撞，居後列，走第二疊。慢步速不利發揮。毫無進展。

comment: Began fairly, steadied and taken back, shifting across to   rail, dropping to last 1200m. Got inside run in straight,   made up some ground initially before turning one-paced      final 150m.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，收慢留後，切入內欄。千二米處墮居包尾位置。直路上在內疊取位，起初略為追前，最後一百五十米保持同速。
owner: Carter Mok Man Fung & Siemen Mok Tsoi Sin Man

comment: Scrambled forward early, but managed to get stuck 3 wide no cover in a share of the lead. Battled gamely in front down  the straight, just peaking at the 50m and losing a place.
comment_ch: 早段受催策上前，並排領先，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。直路上居前列位置，力拼，五十米處未能再增速，僅失季席。
owner: Peter Young Wai Po & Dr Arthur Leung Shing Tat

comment: Eased at start, took rail, checked early, pace good, ran on fairly in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘後收慢，走內欄。早段勒避，步速中等。直路上走勢一般。

comment: Travelled in about a midfield position, 3-3/4L behind 2     wide, kept on until about 250M and then flattened.
comment_ch: 約居中間位置，落後三又四分三個馬位，走第二疊。保持走勢至大約二百五十米處，其後洩氣。

comment: Pushed to occupy the box seat, ran on well to score         comfortably.
comment_ch: 在推策下佔取包廂位置，以佳勢上前，從容勝出。

comment: Ran on ordinary; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 走勢平常，未見佳處

comment: On pace for 3rd; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 跟前入位，表現唔曳
owner: Au Kai Kwong & Michelle Jessica Au

comment: Came from behind for 2nd in a less competitive field.
comment_ch: 後上第二，對手太曳

comment: Hit the front at turn; won with something in hand.
comment_ch: 彎位透出, 有餘未盡

comment: Under a hold throughout; quickened when asked at 200m.
comment_ch: 沿途按實, 二百一騎, 加速上前
owner: Michael Lau Chor Chiu & Steve Lau Tsz Chung

comment: Taken back from the widest draw, positioned 4 wide with     some cover at rear initially, slightly improved thereafter, 3 wide with cover in midfield, finished off strongly in     straight to get 2nd.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後留後，早段走第四疊，略有遮擋，居後列。其後略為上前，居中間位置，在有遮擋下走第三疊。直路上衝刺強勁，跑獲亞軍。

comment: Jumped OK, ridden along in midfield between horses, crowded for room 700m, kept on one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，居中間位置，受催策，在馬匹之間競跑。七百米處受擠迫，直路上保持同速。

comment: Jumped well and ran on for 2nd.
comment_ch: 起步順利，放入一席

comment: Difficult to load; found nothing when hard ridden at 200m.
comment_ch: 閘內扭計, 二百力騎, 毫無進展

comment: At back, dropped off 300M.
comment_ch: 居後列位置，三百米處墮退。

comment: In midfield along the rail, 4-3/4L off the pace, finished   off well once cleared passing 200M.
comment_ch: 沿欄居中間位置，落後領放馬四又四分三個馬位。跑過二百米處時望空，隨即以佳勢衝刺。

comment: Taken back early; not changed legs in the straight.
comment_ch: 留前鬥後，直路唔肯轉腳

comment: Settled in box seat, enjoyed by the slow sectionals, closed off strongly 300M to score.
comment_ch: 居包廂位置。慢步速適合發揮。三百米處衝刺強勁，勝出賽事。

comment: Slightly slow start, ridden through to midfield spot 1 off, shifted 3 deep 600m, improved quickly, ridden 350m, hanging left shortly afterwards, weakened.
comment_ch: 出閘稍慢，受催策，居中間位置，走第二疊。六百米處移出第三疊，迅速推進。三百五十米處受催策，其後不久外閃，轉弱。

comment: Hit the line strongly to score when changed racing ground at 300m.
comment_ch: 三百轉移跑線，勁勢上前

comment: Ran on ok for 3rd when made ground on the inside.
comment_ch: 內檔竄上, 表現唔曳
owner: Alan Tsang Ping Sing, Fiona Tsang Wai Sze & Claudia Tsang Hei Man

comment: Shifted across behind horses from wide draw, dropping to    last pair in one-off position. Made some ground early in    straight before tiring.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘後在馬群之後切入，居最後兩位，走第二疊。直路早段略為追前，其後漸呈疲態。
owner: Tony Ng Fung Sing & Michael Ling Siu Ming

comment: Always at rear; never in contention.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑，遠離水準
owner: Mr & Mrs Ben Wong Chung Mat

comment: Jumped with field, ridden to hold spot one-off, one-back    before taken wide without cover 800m. Looked chance 400m    but unable to close gap.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，受催策保持位置，落後領放馬一個馬位，走第二疊。八百米處移出外疊，沒有遮擋。四百米處看似具爭勝機會，但未能追近對手。
owner: Lim U Po Chu & Wong Ching Yue

comment: Bumped start, trapped 3 wide at rear, no progress.
comment_ch: 出閘時與對手互相碰撞，居後列，走第三疊。毫無進展。
owner: Wu Kai Char & Wu Wai Chor

comment: Awkward start, raced in midfield 5-1/4L off along the       fence, checked at 400M, showed nothing. (Heart              irregularity)
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，居中間位置，落後五又四分一個馬位，走內欄。四百米處勒避，毫無表現。（心律不正常。）

comment: Camped handy, travelled 3Ls behind the leader 2 wide with   cover, ran on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 居前列，落後領放馬三個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。以佳勢上前，取得亞軍。

comment: Hit the line strongly to score when clear at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百望空，一揮即就

comment: Settled in last few, switched out for a run passing the 400 metres, quickened well to assert authority over 100 metres  out.
comment_ch: 居最後數位，跑過四百米處時移出外疊取位。最後一百米加速甚快，控制大局。
owner: Ricky Wong Kin Chat & Helen Leung Yee Wan

comment: Pressed forward from inside draw to hold rail three back    from leader. Switched wide on entering straight and ran on  steadily without looking dangerous.
comment_ch: 自內檔出閘後受催策上前，固守內欄，落後領放馬三個馬位。入直路時移出外疊，穩步上前，但未能構成威脅。
owner: The Executors of the Estate of the late Herbert Hui Ho Ming

comment: Saved ground throughout for 2nd; moved better than before.
comment_ch: 一步不蝕，試來有點進步

comment: Jumped well from gate 1, raced in midfield, still 6 lengths back on turn, failed to close off in straight.
comment_ch: 自第一檔出閘迅速，居中間位置。轉彎時仍落後六個馬位。直路上衝刺乏力。

handicap: THE HONG KONG CLUB CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
comment: Bumped start, restrained, shifted across behind runners,    dropping to rear, more than 10L from leader back stretch.   Took rails run in straight but only one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘時與對手互相碰撞，受約束，在馬群之後切入內欄，墮居後列。對面直路上落後領放馬逾十個馬位。直路上沿欄競跑，但僅能保持同速。

comment: One-paced throughout; led all the way to score.
comment_ch: 均速帶放, 直領到底

owner: Guo Qin Jun, Kwok Ho & Chiu Yi

comment: Settled midfield; under a hold; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 不上不落，扣實未試

comment: Raced greenly at turn; dropped back to rear.
comment_ch: 轉彎欠順, 落後跟跑

comment: Good break, sat 1 off with cover fore of midfield, 2L back  & driven turning in, quickened 300m, gradually closed to    wire but just failed.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居中間之前位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。入直路時落後領放馬兩個馬位，受催策。三百米處加速。逐漸追前至終點，但僅敗。

comment: Won comfortably on the inside.
comment_ch: 內檔竄上，姿態從容

comment: Slow to begin; then quickened forward; flattened late.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，迅即上前，拉士勁平

comment: Up with the pace early; ran on ok.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，不過不失

comment: Tardy start; made progress when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 起步麻麻, 直路推騎, 有點追勢
owner: Mr & Mrs Simon Suen Siu Man

comment: OK away and eased forward early to settle midfield, on the  fence. Sat back and smoked the pipe until the turn, but was boxed in looking for a run. Got clear at 200m, producing a  huge run to the line and just missing late.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，早段上前，居中間位置，走內欄。直路彎前留力，輕鬆競跑，其後取位時受困。二百米處望空，末段交出強勁衝刺，僅敗。

comment: Ridden climbing up the hill; flattened in the Straight.
comment_ch: 上山已騎，直路勁平

comment: No clear running at 200m; under a hold and not fully tested.
comment_ch: 二百受困，扣實未試

comment: Speed to lead & rousted to snag rail, headed 1000m,         regained lead 800m, shaken up 380m, kicked on but soon all  out & headed 200m, tapered to wire.
comment_ch: 出閘後迅速領先，受催策佔取內欄。一千米處被超越，八百米處重新取得領先。三百八十米處受催策，加速上前，瞬即全力以赴，二百米處被超越，終點前轉弱。
owner: Tang Shu Chun, Michael Tang Hon Chau, Tang Chan Shui Kuen & Bernadette Tang Yim Lai Nor

comment: Not quickened when asked late.
comment_ch: 拉士推騎，未見加速

comment: Always in touch; kept on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 有前有後, 放入一席
owner: The Executors of the Estate of the late George Wong Kin Wah

comment: Dropped back early to sit at the rear of the field, 3 wide  with cover. 2nd last at the 400m, before coming wider in    the straight. Ran strongly in the straight with the fastest last 400m, and closing in quickly and the first 2.
comment_ch: 早段墮居馬群後列，走第三疊，有遮擋。四百米處居尾二位置，直路上走更外疊，衝刺強勁，最後四百米締速最快，迅速追近頭兩名馬匹。

comment: Settled towards rear and remained there throughout.
comment_ch: 出閘後居後列位置。全程居後列位置。
owner: Wan Chun, Wan Yuk Sim & Jonathan Yiu Chi Fung

comment: Restrained throughout; never tested.
comment_ch: 全程扣實, 未受考驗

comment: Up with the pace; won comfortably.
comment_ch: 跟前, 直路輕易趕過
owner: Stacey Martin Wong, Ko Po Ming & Chan Shung Fai

comment: Flattened late; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 末段勁平，未有好感

comment: Always well behind, never seen with a chance and very wide  into straight. (Lame)
comment_ch: 一直遙遙落後，從未有力一爭。入直路時走大外疊。（不良於行。）
owner: Chan Nam Lee, Ng Hung Yau, Wong Ting Chung & George Lau Ka Keung

comment: Shifted across behind runners, settling at rear 10L from    leader. Urged forward 600m, got split top of straight, hit  front 100m, run down final strides.
comment_ch: 於馬群之後切入內疊，居後列，落後領放馬十個馬位。六百米處受催策上前，直路初取得空位，一百米處領先。最後數步落敗。

comment: Wide throughout; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 全程外疊, 未見佳處

comment: On-pace early; kept on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 快放第二, 力度增強

comment: Limited response when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路推騎, 無加速力

comment: Always at rear, despite the fast pace, never ran on.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列。步速甚快，但從未能上前。

comment: In midfield, 2-1/4L behind 3 wide with cover, flattened at  200M.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後二又四分一個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。二百米處洩氣。

comment: Caught wide no cover behind midfield, found disappointingly little when asked, never reached contention.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，走外疊，沒有遮擋。受催策，但再無餘力，令人失望。從未能上前爭勝。

handicap: THE HONG KONG YOUNG INDUSTRIALISTS COUNCIL SILVER JUBILEE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港青年工業家協會２５周年銀禧盃（讓賽）
comment: Jumped fast, natural speed to settle just behind leaders    3rd, keen at times, held together until 500m, switched out  420m, hit lead 300m, raced right away.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，順其自然地上前。居領先馬匹稍後的第三位，時有搶口。五百米處前未受催策，四百二十米處向外移出。三百米處取得領先，帶離對手勝出。

comment: No early speed and soon 3-wide at rear but with cover.      Travelled well to straight when came under pressure and     weakened. Stewards ruled performance unacceptable.
comment_ch: 缺乏前速，瞬即居後列，在有遮擋下走第三疊。直路前走勢良佳。直路上受催策，但轉弱。小組認為此駒表現難以接受。

comment: Led early; flattened late.
comment_ch: 主動搶放, 末段勁平
owner: Matthew Wong Leung Pak, Janice Wong Oi Ying, James Wong Cheuk On & Timothy Wong Cheuk Tim

comment: Slightly slow, nudged to edge forward, trapped wide, eased  behind, overracing, settled midfield 1 off, pulled 3 deep   to improve 900m, hit lead 800m, vigorous drive 500m, fought off challengers, strong staying effort.
comment_ch: 出閘略慢，受催策上前，走外疊。收慢留後，跑來搶口，居中間位置，走第二疊。九百米處移出第三疊以推進。八百米處取得領先。五百米處受力策。力拒其他馬匹挑戰，保持勁勢。
owner: Johnny Wong Ka Keung, Ernest Ip Koon Wing, Christopher Chan Wai Tong & Michael Cheng Woon Yin

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY LOVE IS BEAUTY COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶愛很美系列讓賽
comment: Easily obtained prominent spot, benefited by the slow       sectionals, closed off strongly 200M to score.
comment_ch: 從容佔取前列位置。步速緩慢，有利發揮。二百米處以勁勢衝刺，勝出賽事。
owner: Mr & Mrs Loh Dai Jur, Elton Loh Kin and David Loh Wai

comment: Dropped back to the rear, crept closer when pace slackened  over home turn, stayed on moderately final 400M, always     held by first two.
comment_ch: 墮居後列。轉直路彎時領放馬步速減慢，進佔較接近位置。最後四百米保持穩勢，一直未能追上首兩名馬匹。

comment: Quickly recovered from a moderate start to gain 3rd spot    some 2L back and one off the rails, held similar into       straight but soon faded.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，迅速恢復走勢，居第三位，落後約兩個馬位，走第二疊。入直路時居相若位置，但瞬即力竭。
owner: Liu Shun Hong & George Ma Pui Pui

comment: Eased forward early, settling worse than midfield, one off  the fence. Wider on the turn. Looked gone 200m, but showed  good turn of foot late to get 3rd on the line.
comment_ch: 早段上前，居中間之後位置，走第二疊。直路彎走更外疊，二百米處看似再無餘力，但末段加速上前，終點線上跑獲季軍。
owner: Purviz R Shroff & The Executors of the Estate of the late Rusy M Shroff

comment: Urged to lead early; just caught.
comment_ch: 沿途搶放, 拉士被過

comment: Made ground progressively; hit the front mid track to score.
comment_ch: 分段加快，中檔突圍

comment: Up with the pace; laying in slightly late.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，末段有點內閃
owner: Mr & Mrs Robert Chan Chin Yuan

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY LOVE FOREVER COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶愛恆久系列讓賽
comment: Surged forward to lead clearly on settling, setting good    pace to straight. Collared passing 300m and weakened        quickly final 200m.
comment_ch: 上前取得領先，直路前以中等步速領放。跑過三百米處時被超越。最後二百米瞬即轉弱。
owner: Anthony Ma Kwan Ping, Glenda Ma & Kevin Ma

comment: Raced handy on the rail; kept on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 貼欄順走, 闖入一席
owner: Helena Wai Suk Chong & Cheng Chor Kit

comment: Slightly slow to begin; made progress along the rail to win narrowly.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，沿欄追趕，後上險勝

comment: Settled towards rear, ran on fairly in straight.
comment_ch: 居後列，直路上走勢一般。

comment: Dashed on well to score when persuaded at 300m.
comment_ch: 三百輕騎,加速力強

comment: Pushed to keep up in midfield, 2-3 wide, pace good, led     300M, hung on well until 100M overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 受推策保持居中間位置，走第二至第三疊。步速中等。三百米處取得領先。保持佳勢，一百米處被超越。保持走勢，跑獲季軍。

comment: Hard ridden to sit in midfield, 2 wide, checked badly 900M, ran on fairly in final stages.
comment_ch: 受力策，居中間位置，走第二疊。九百米處大力勒避。末段走勢普通。

comment: Shifted out in the Straight; raced under his own steam.
comment_ch: 直路移出, 隨意跟跑
owner: James Lau Chi Wing, Lau Kai Tai & Michelle Lau Wing Sheung

comment: Began fairly, taken to rail, settling towards rear. Got     shuffled back when field speeded up 500m, took inside run   in straight but found little room and shifted out 200m but  only one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，移入內欄，居後列。五百米處馬群加速時墮後。直路上走內疊，但空位不足。二百米處向外移出，僅能保持同速。

comment: At rear, trapped very wide, never a factor.
comment_ch: 居後列，走大外疊。從未有力一爭。

comment: Eased back and raced 5-1/4L behind the lead along the rail, made good ground and finished off nicely.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，落後領放馬五又四分一馬位，走內欄。追前甚多，衝刺良佳。

comment: Cut across after start; ran under his own steam.
comment_ch: 起步切入，跟跑而回
owner: Sir Po-shing & Lady Woo, Jackson Woo Ka Biu and The Executors of the Estate of the late Wilson Woo K

comment: Moderately away from a tricky gate, taken back to race 6    lengths back on rail at rear, there to turn, made very good progress in straight to get 2nd.
comment_ch: 自第九檔出閘普通，留居後列，落後六個馬位，走內欄。直路彎前居相同位置，直路上追前甚多，取得亞軍。

comment: Niggled along going up the Rock; failed to quicken.
comment_ch: 上山已騎，乏力跟跑

comment: At rear, travelled 7Ls behind the leader on the fence, made minor ground along the inside.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬七個馬位，走內欄。沿欄略為追前。

comment: Began fairly, raced 5 lengths or so back behind midfield,   slightly improved along the rail on turn, finished off very strongly in straight to score by a neck.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居中間之後位置，落後約五個馬位。直路彎沿欄略為推進。直路上衝刺凌厲，以一馬頸位之先勝出。

comment: From draw 1 obtained a trailing position just off the pace, saved ground and travelled well into straight, kept up the  chase over final 300M, not pace of winner late stages.
comment_ch: 自第一檔出閘後居領放馬稍後位置。入直路時走內欄節省腳程，走勢良佳。最後三百米持續力追，末段加速力不及頭馬。

comment: On-pace early; kept on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，闖入一席

comment: Pushed forward, 2 wide, harmed by the fast tempo, emptied   200M.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，走第二疊。步速甚快，不利發揮。二百米處再無餘力。

comment: Sent forward and shared lead in a 2 wide position, was      bumped heavily at 250M, did not run on thereafter.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，並排領先，走第二疊。二百五十米處被對手大力碰撞。其後未能上前。

handicap_ch: 日本中央競馬會錦標（讓賽）
comment: Ridden to hold fence inside leader to 800m before taking    the sit. Took inside run on straightening but only          one-paced.
comment_ch: 在催策下固守內欄，八百米處前居領放馬內側，繼而居領放馬之後。入直路時走內疊，但僅能保持同速。

comment: Broke well, bustled initially to lead 1000m, raced 3 wide   no cover & headed 800m, 0.5L 3rd & driven 500m, soon        emptied & faded.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。初段受催策，一千米處取得領先，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。八百米處被超越。五百米處居第三位，落後領放馬半個馬位，受催策。瞬即再無餘力及力竭。

comment: Under restraint early; ran on for 3rd comfortably.
comment_ch: 早段撑到實，姿態從容
owner: Chiu Yu Hei & Edmond Chiu Sung Pak

comment: On back foot at start, settled near tail on rail, pulled    out 580m & urged, ridden 350m, made up plenty of ground,    hit lead 20m and pulled away.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居接近尾列，走內欄。五百八十米處向外移出及受催策。三百五十米處受催策，追前甚多，二十米處取得領先，帶離對手勝出。

comment: Inconvenience stat and clear last on settling. Trailed      field to straight before running past tired horses.
comment_ch: 出閘時受妨礙，居包尾位置。跟隨馬群入直路，其後超越數匹已洩氣的對手。

comment: Laying in throughout; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 沿途內閃，走勢一般
owner: Mr & Mrs Li Yiu Keung and Clement Li

comment: Pushed forward early but failed to cross, soon eased back   to midfield, sat 2 wide, pace good, progressed steadily     250M for 2nd.
comment_ch: 早段受推策上前，但未能切入內疊，瞬即收慢，留居中間位置，走第二疊。步速中等，二百五十米處逐漸追前，跑獲亞軍。
owner: Wong Hing Chun, Wong Mee Chun & The Executors of the Estate of the late Wong Man Yui

comment: Dropped back early from the wide draw to sit towards the    rear of the field, 3 wide. Ran strongly in the straight and made up a lot of ground.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後早段墮後，居馬群後列，走第三疊。直路上走勢強勁，追前甚多。

comment: Taken back as usual to sit worse than midfield, on the      rail. Held up when attempting a run at 200m, before         switching back in and running well late.
comment_ch: 如常留後，居中間之後位置，走內欄。二百米處試圖取位時受困，其後移回內疊，末段衝刺良佳。

comment: Rolled forward to take the fence and led by 1L at fast      sectionals, kept on nicely until final furlong flattened.
comment_ch: 上前移入內欄，以快步速領先一個馬位。保持佳勢，最後二百米洩氣。

comment: Slow start, over-raced 1200m, settled 3 wide with cover     behind midfield, advanced a place on turn, driven into      stretch but struggled in run home.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，千二米處搶口，居中間之後位置，在有遮擋下走第三疊。直路彎略為推進。入直路時受催策，但直路上掙扎上前。

comment: Bounced OK, not pushed, dropping to rear in one-out         position. Taken wide entering straight, given reminders     before eased down final stages when beaten.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，未受推策，墮居後列，走第二疊。入直路時移出外疊，受催策。末段洩氣時收慢。

comment: Hit the line strong when shifted out in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路移出，衝刺甚佳

comment: Pressed forward from wide draw to share pace before easing  back 3L from leaders. Urged forward top of straight, hit    front 150m before run ended.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，受催策上前，並排領先，繼而收慢，落後領先馬匹三個馬位。直路初受催策上前。一百五十米處取得領先。末段無以為繼。

comment: Jumped with field, switched out but held between horses 6L  from leader. Lay in when put under pressure 400m, one-paced.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，移出外疊，落後領放馬六個馬位，在馬匹之間競跑。四百米處在催策下內閃。保持同速。

comment: Jumped fairly, ridden along to hold midfield position on    rails, dropped away quickly after straightening.
comment_ch: 出閘一般。在催策下保持居中間位置，走內欄。入直路後迅速墮退。
owner: Mr & Mrs Robert Lau Siu Kit

comment: Took position at rear along the rail after shifting in from a wide draw, 5L behind the leader. Kept to the rear until   last 200M when room opened for running.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，向內移入後居後列，落後領放馬五個馬位，沿欄競跑。保持居後列，最後二百米取空位上前。

comment: Box seat, suited by the slow tempo, soon emptied 400M.
comment_ch: 居包廂位置。慢步速適合發揮，四百米處瞬即再無餘力。

handicap: THE HONG KONG FOOTBALL CLUB CENTENARY CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港足球會百週年紀念挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Bumped start, urged forward, settling one-back, one-off.    Under pressure soon after straightening and gave ground     gradually.
comment_ch: 起步時被碰撞，受催策上前，落後一個馬位，走第二疊。入直路後瞬即受催策，逐漸墮退。

comment: Driven forward to lead on settling, crossing to fence       1800m. Set steady sections, kicked 2L clear entering        straight, kept finding under pressure only to be run down   on last stride.
comment_ch: 受催策上前帶頭。千八米處移入內欄，以平穩步速領放。入直路時加速帶離兩個馬位。在催策下持續力拼，僅於最後一步被超越。

comment: Away with them, raced 2 wide in 8th, similar position on    turn, angled out near 500M, showed no response to riding in straight.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘。居第八位，走第二疊。直路彎居相若位置，接近五百米處時移出外疊。直路上對催策毫無反應。

comment: Hit the front at one stage; flattened late.
comment_ch: 一度透出，拉士轉弱
owner: Ken Leung Woon Kin & Leung Kwun

comment: Always in touch; won comfortably.
comment_ch: 有前有後，姿態輕鬆

comment: Urged to lead centre track; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 中檔搶放，點到即止

comment: Settled in midfield, 6-1/4L off 2 wide with cover, checked  at 950M, did not improve in the Straight.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬六又四分一個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。九百五十米處勒避。直路上未能推進。

comment: Taken back from wide gate to settle at rear, pushed along   home turn and finished off fairly.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後留後，居後列。直路彎受推策，以普通走勢衝刺。

comment: Settled midfield; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 居中跟跑，末段按住順走

comment: From widest draw made some use early to obtain a midfield   position, driven out 400M but didn't close off the race.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘，早段略為耗力以佔取中間位置。四百米處受力策，但未能以勁勢衝刺。

comment: 1st to jump; led all the way to score.
comment_ch: 應聲彈出，一放而回

comment: Weakened late; finished last.
comment_ch: 末段勁平，包尾而回

comment: Soon took up running, led to the 300 metres, dropped out    under pressure.
comment_ch: 瞬即帶頭，三百米處前領先，受催策但墮退。

comment: On heels start; dashed strongly outside to win.
comment_ch: 起步擠阻, 直路移出, 勁勢上前

comment: Broke well, ridden to hold forward position, settling       one-out, one-back. Shaken up turning for home but broke     left front leg 450m and fell. Put down humanely.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，受催策保持居前列第二疊第二位。轉入直路時受催策，四百五十米處左前腳跛腳並跌倒。人道毁滅。

comment: Had rail run throughout, tracked leaders, did best work     final 200M, nearest finish.
comment_ch: 沿途走內欄，跟隨領放馬匹。最後二百米走勢最佳，過終點時最為接近。

handicap: THE HONG KONG RIDING FOR THE DISABLED ASSOCIATION CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港傷健策騎協會盃（讓賽）
comment: Bumped start, restrained and shifted in, settling in last   pair. Last turning for home, finished off one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘時與他駒互相碰撞，受約束及向內斜跑，居最後兩位。入直路時居包尾，末段保持同速。
owner: Dr Irene Lau Mun Yee & Lo Yat Fung

comment: Taken forward early, sitting wide early before settling     2nd, 1 off the fence and 1L off the leader. Went to the     line 1 paced in the straight.
comment_ch: 早段受催策上前，走外疊。其後居第二位，落後領放馬一個馬位，走第二疊。直路上保持同速。

comment: Midfield along the fence, suited by the fast tempo,         flattened in straight.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，走內欄。快步速適合發揮。直路上洩氣。

comment: Under a hold late; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 末段按返，未見真章

comment: Broke well & rousted 3 wide 1st turn to lead 1350m, impeded rival when shifted in 1300m & snared rail 1250m, 0.5L clear & driven 370m, headed 110m & tapered to wire.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，首個彎位受催策，走第三疊，一千三百五十米處取得領先。千三米處向內斜跑，阻礙對手，一千二百五十米處移入內欄。三百七十米處領先半個馬位，受催策。一百一十米處被超越，末段轉弱。
owner: Tang Shu Chun, Michael Tang Hon Chau, Tang Chan Shui Kuen & Bernadette Tang Yim Lai Nor

comment: Always at the rear, never a factor.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列，從未有力一爭。

comment: In midfield, 5-1/4L behind 2 wide with cover, swung widest  after turn, did not run on.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後五又四分一個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。過了直路彎後移出大外疊，未能上前。

comment: Close up in 3rd, not found extra when pushed approaching    top of straight, dropped away passing 250M.
comment_ch: 居緊隨領放馬的第三位。趨近直路早段時受推策，但再無餘力。跑過二百五十米處時墮退。

comment: Racing handy; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 輕鬆跟放，表現唔曳

comment: Not pressed, dropping to rear in one-off position. Stayed   at rear around turn, ran on fairly in straight between      horses while hanging in under pressure.
comment_ch: 未受催策，墮居後列，走第二疊。直路彎居後列，直路上在馬匹之間受催策，走勢普通並內閃。
owner: Carmen Chan Wing Yee & Chan Fut Yan

comment: Bumped and unbalanced start, pushed forward 3-wide, 2L from leader. Taken wider in straight, made ground to 200m before tiring.
comment_ch: 起步時被碰撞，失去平衡。受推策上前，落後領放馬兩個馬位，走第三疊。直路上移出更外疊，追前至二百米處漸呈疲態。
owner: Tony Lo Chin Ho, Kwok Ying Lung & Wong Tsz Wa

comment: Smart start & prominent, soon slotted 1 off 1 back until    shuffled to 3 back on rail 1000m, niggled 650m, driven      final turn, kept one pace.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。居前列位置，瞬即落後領放馬一個馬位，走第二疊。一千米處墮居落後領放馬三個馬位的位置，走內欄。六百五十米處受催策，直路彎再受催策。保持同速。

comment: Harmed by the slow tempo, never competitive at rear.
comment_ch: 慢步速不利發揮，居後列，從未有力一爭。

comment: Made ground steadily; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 分段加快，後上接近

comment: Ran on strongly when clear in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路望空，大步肯走

comment: Always at rear, never a factor.
comment_ch: 一直居後列，從未有力一爭。

comment: Up with the pace; ran on nicely for 3rd.
comment_ch: 跟前入位, 走勢純熟

comment: Under a hold and wide throughout.
comment_ch: 沿途外疊，緊韁按實

comment: Under a hold throughout; jockey's feet out of the stirrup.
comment_ch: 全程拖住，騎師甩腳踏

comment: Up with the pace; hung in late.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑, 末段有點內閃

comment: Raced at the rear, 5-3/4L behind the leader 2 wide with     cover, gained ground nicely on the outer Straight.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬五又四分三個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。直路上在外疊以佳勢上前。
owner: Billy Chan Wing Kwong & Billy Chan Chun Kit

comment: Steady start, raced 3 off stands fence near rear, ridden    450m, found nil for pressure.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居後列，走外欄第四疊。四百五十米處受催策，但再無餘力。
owner: Leung Lun Ping & Sidney Leung Kwun Wa

handicap: TUEN MUN PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 屯門公眾騎術學校讓賽
comment: Lacked early toe & bustled initially, settled near rear 3   wide with cover, forced widest on turn & driven 500m, kept  on one pace.
comment_ch: 缺乏前速，初時受催策，居後列位置，走第三疊，有遮擋。直路彎走最外疊，五百米處受催策。保持同速。

comment: Taken back to tail on inner, settled last pair 1 off,       niggled 650m, shifted out final turn, driven 350m, plugged  on one pace.
comment_ch: 出閘後收慢居包尾，為包尾兩駒之一，走第二疊。六百五十米處受催策，直路彎移出外疊。三百五十米處受催策，其後保持同速。
owner: Mr & Mrs Simon Suen Siu Man

comment: Kept on well for 2nd when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路有騎，保持速度

comment: Pushed forward to cross and led by 1/2L, not suited to the  quick tempo, weakened passing 250M.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，切入內欄，領先半個馬位。步速甚快，不合發揮。跑過二百五十米處時轉弱。

handicap_ch: 法國賽馬及育馬委員會讓賽
comment: Pushed forward and settled to race in box-seat, sat 1-1/4L  off, flattened and found no extra passing 200M.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，居包廂位置，落後一又四分一個馬位。跑過二百米處時洩氣，再無餘力。

comment: Pushed forward and parked outside the leader 3/4L behind,   suited to the slow tempo, closed off well to score.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，居領放馬外側，落後四分三個馬位。步速緩慢，適合發揮。衝刺良佳，取得勝利。
owner: Bryan Hui I Yeung, Hui I Yuen, Allan Chau Kit Ho & Chau Man Kwok

comment: Crowded start, travelled 4Ls behind the leader on the       fence, not suited by the slow pace, made no impression in   straight.
comment_ch: 出閘時受擠迫，落後領放馬四個馬位，走內欄。慢步速不合發揮。直路上毫無表現。
owner: Bonnie Chan Yiting, Anthony Derek Lai Shu Yan, Ricky Choy Wing Kay & Dominic Lee Kan Nam

comment: Quickened steadily; ran on ok.
comment_ch: 逐步追趕, 姿態輕鬆

comment: Cruised forward early to settle midfield, 3 wide with       limited cover. Started his run before the turn, and ran     strongly in the straight. Nosed in front at the 200m, and   had enough in the tank to hold on late.
comment_ch: 早段上前，居中間位置，走第三疊，略有遮擋。彎位前開始發力。直路上走勢強勁。二百米處以些微距離領先。末段餘力足以取勝。

comment: Dropped back when asked; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 愈騎愈後，毫無好感

comment: Smart break but lacked toe & bustled a touch to race rail   midfield, closed to 1 back turning in, checked out of       pocket 350m & driven, quickened to lead 140m, drew clear.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，但缺乏前速，略受催策，沿欄居中間位置。入直路時追近至領放馬一個馬位之後的位置。三百五十米處因受困而勒避，受催策。一百四十米處加速取得領先，帶離對手勝出。

comment: Settled midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide    with cover, not suited by the slow pace, ran home fairly.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬四個馬位，在有遮擋下走第二疊。步速緩慢，不合發揮。末段走勢一般。

comment: Sharp start, bustled on rail to narrow lead 880m, driven    400m, all out & headed 300m, folded & faded.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策，走內欄，八百八十米處領先短距離。四百米處受催策。三百米處受力策，但被超越。洩氣力竭。

comment: Eased to the rear, sat 7-1/4L behind along the rail,        hampered at 400M, made nice ground, finished off strongly.
comment_ch: 收慢留居後列，落後七又四分一個馬位，走內欄。四百米處受阻。追前甚多，衝刺強勁。

comment: Sluggish start, nudged along initially to race midfield 1   off, popped 3 deep no cover 900m, ridden for progress 600m, 4th & driven into stretch, boxed on dourly.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，早段受催策，居中間位置，走第二疊。九百米處移至第三疊，沒有遮擋。六百米處受催策上前。入直路時居第四位，受催策。末段力拼。

comment: Sluggish break, raced at tail 1 off, improved a spot on     turn, driven 400m, kept on for minor late headway.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢。居包尾位置，走第二疊。直路彎上前，四百米處受催策。保持走勢，末段略為追前。
owner: Mr & Mrs Stephen Ho Wai Man, Fred Ho Ka Chun and Derek Ho Ka Chung

comment: Under a hold throughout; ran under his own steam.
comment_ch: 全程扣實, 姿態從容

comment: Quickly into stride, hugging outside fence 3L from leader.  Urged forward 400m, bumped and unbalanced when trying to    improve 300m. Badly held up till 150m, finished well when   clear.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。固守外欄，落後領放馬三個馬位。四百米處受催策上前，三百米處試圖推進時碰撞對手，失去平衡。其後嚴重受困至一百五十米處，望空後衝刺良佳。
owner: Susan Wong Suk Ching, Ginny Man Wing Yee & Cheng Tsz Bong

comment: Positioned ahead of midfield 4Ls behind runaway leader, had every chance turning in, turned one pace 200M.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，落後遙遙領先的領放馬四個馬位。入直路時已獲機會盡展所長，二百米處保持同速。

comment: Flattened halfway; weakened sharply late.
comment_ch: 半程洩氣, 急劇墮退

comment: Quickly into stride to lead on settling. Set strong pace to straight, kicked ahead 350m but caught passing 100m.        Battled on gamely to hold minor placing.
comment_ch: 迅速展步，帶頭，直路前以快步速領放。三百五十米處加速上前，但跑過一百米處時被超越。以勁勢力拼，保住季軍。

comment: Slow into stride and last on settling. Trailed field to     200m before making up some late ground.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居包尾位置。尾隨馬群至二百米處，末段略為追前。

comment: Ran on well when persuaded at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百稍騎，追勢可人

comment: Hit the front at one stage; ran comfortably for 3rd.
comment_ch: 一度透出，表現從容
owner: Kenneth Kong Siu Chee & Elaine Kong Yick Ning

comment: Ran on ordinary when asked in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路推騎，反應一般

comment: Being ridden throughout; stayed on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 騎足全程, 闖入一席
owner: To Wai, Andy To Kai Pong, Benson To Kai Sang & Canning To Kai Fung

comment: On pace without cover; ran on strongly for 2nd.
comment_ch: 望空搶放, 愈追愈勁

comment: Sharp start, rolled to lead 1 off 1030m, to rail 820m, all  out & headed 400m, faded tamely.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，一千零三十米處上前領先，走第二疊。八百二十米處切入內欄，四百米處受力策，但被超越，乏力墮退。

comment: Failed to muster, at rear, 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow     pace, little dash 200M.
comment_ch: 未能加速，居後列，走第二至第三疊。慢步速不利發揮。二百米處略為上前。

comment: Broke well, then ridden to hold rail in midfield. Got       shuffled back around turn, found little in straight though  was inconvenienced 350m.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，其後受催策，居中間位置，固守內欄。轉直路彎時墮退，直路上再無餘力，三百五十米處受妨礙。

comment: Failed to muster speed, soon ended up in rear, pushed wide  entering home turn, never involved.
comment_ch: 出閘後未能增速，瞬即居後列。開始轉直路彎時受推策，走外疊。從未參與競逐。
owner: Eric Cheng Kam Chung & Vene Cheng Wing Ni

comment: Crowded jumping out travelling in last few, wide around     home bend and into straight, kept on past well-beaten       horses in the run home.
comment_ch: 出閘時受擠迫，居包尾數位，轉直路彎及入直路時走外疊。保持走勢，直路上超越數匹洩氣潰敗的馬匹。

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY CONVERGENCE OF LOVE COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶亮聚系列讓賽
owner: The Executors of the Estate of the late The Hon Lau Wong Fat

handicap: THE HONG KONG COUNTRY CLUB CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港鄉村俱樂部挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Restrained from a wide gate to travel along the rail at     rear, 9-1/2L off. Made steady headway down the Straight,    only to be beaten by an impressive winner.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受約束，居後列，落後領放馬九個半馬位，走內欄。直路上逐漸上前，僅負於走勢強勁的頭馬蹄下。
owner: Wilson Wong Kan Po & Derek Wong Sau Leung

comment: Outpaced early; never in contention.
comment_ch: 早段跟唔住，毫無走勢
owner: Edward Chan Kwok Man & Karen Chan Ka Yin

comment: Settled in front of midfield, not suited by the fast pace,  just held ground in straight.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置。快步速不合發揮。直路上僅能保持位置。
owner: Kevin Kwong Ka Wing, Chan Bing Woon, Kwong Wai Bong & Michelle Chan Sin Man

comment: Last to jump; made progress when shifted out at 300m.
comment_ch: 起步最慢，三百移出，推騎追趕

comment: On-pace early; flattened in the Straight.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢, 直路勁平
owner: Raymond Chow Wai Kam, Lau Wing Sang & Enrico Chow Yue Hin

comment: Parked outside the leader, kept challenging until the final 100M when couldn't find extra, just hung on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居領放馬外側。持續挑戰對手，最後一百米再無餘力。僅保住季席。

comment: Ran on fairly well for 3rd when asked.
comment_ch: 騎住第三，表現唔曳

comment: Jumped well, took up running passing the winning post the   first time, obtained rails run passing the 1200 metres, set sedate pace down back straight, kicked clear after home     turn, hung on well under pressure.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，首次跑過終點時取得領先。跑過千二米處時移入內欄，對面直路上以慢步速領放。直路彎後加速帶離對手，在催策下保持佳勢。

comment: Caught the eye when hit the line strong on the inside for 2nd.
comment_ch: 內檔竄上, 表現悅目

comment: One paced; kept on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 均速第三, 保持走勢

comment: Settled midfield under a hold; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 按住居中, 未受考驗

comment: Began well, pressed forward to sit behind leading trio 800m before settling one-off, one-back at turn. Rolled forward   from 300m but unable peg back leading pair.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前。八百米處居領放三駒之後，直路彎落後一個馬位，走第二疊。自三百米處起上前，但未能追及領放兩駒。

handicap: THE PENINSULA GOLDEN JUBILEE CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
comment: Sent forward and raced as part of the lead, run interrupted at 200M, not a threat anyway.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，居領放馬匹之間。二百米處受干擾，但無論如何未能構成威脅。
owner: Alan Tsang Ping Sing, Fiona Tsang Wai Sze & Claudia Tsang Hei Man

comment: Wide throughout; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 外疊競走, 未見佳處
owner: Albert Po Ying Wai, Frances Po, Raymond Po Chit Hei & Rebecca Po Pui Yan

comment: Been ridden throughout; never in contention.
comment_ch: 騎足全程, 無段好睇

comment: Began well, urged forward but crowded and lost ground 500m, dropping three-back. Crowded again 400m, kept on fairly to  200m before tiring.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前，但五百米處受擠迫及失地，墮退三個馬位。四百米處再受擠迫。保持一般走勢至二百米處，漸呈疲態。
owner: Paul Lo Chung Wai & Kathy Lo Ho Hsiu Lan

comment: Wide throughout; ran on strongly.
comment_ch: 全程外疊，走勢仍勁
owner: Christopher So Chi Hang & Eddie Ng Tao

comment: Taken up early, before dropping back to sit midfield, 3     wide with no cover from 700m. Ran solidly in the straight   without kicking and snuck into 3rd on the line.
comment_ch: 早段受催策上前，繼而墮居中間位置。自七百米處起走第三疊，沒有遮擋。直路上走勢強勁，未有發力。過終點時跑獲季軍。

comment: Always in touch; ran on well to score.
comment_ch: 有前有後, 走勢純熟
owner: Steven Chan Sheung Chi & Kenneth Chan Sheung Yan

comment: Ridden forward to race outside and 1L behind the leader,    kept on going and closed off okay for 3rd.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，居領放馬外側一個馬位之後的位置。持續上前，末段衝刺尚可，跑獲季軍。

comment: Ran on for 3rd when asked at 400m.
comment_ch: 四百發力，追回一席

comment: Began fairly, allowed to travel at own pace, settling along fence behind midfield. Stayed on rails entering straight    and boxed on fairly.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，順其自然地競跑。居中間之後位置，沿欄競跑。入直路時固守內欄，走勢普通。

comment: Began moderately, gradually picked up on rails to hold one  back position in 3rd on rails, held similar into straight,  fought on steadily to gain upper hand final stages.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，逐漸加速上前，居第三位，落後領放馬一個馬位，走內欄。入直路時保持在相若位置。持續力拼，末段佔得上風。

comment: Failed to quicken; never in contention.
comment_ch: 走勢欠勁，未及水準

comment: Away well enough, intended to lead but did not muster early pace despite ridden in early stages, ended up behind        midfield 5Ls off the pace, not picked up entering straight.
comment_ch: 出閘頗佳，騎師原擬讓坐騎領放，但早段在催策下仍未能加速，居中間之後位置，落後領放馬五個馬位。入直路時未能加速。

comment: Responded well when under whip at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百開鞭，反應良好

comment: Hit the front at 300m; kept on well to score.
comment_ch: 三百透出, 靱力增強
owner: Mr & Mrs Ben Wong Chung Mat

comment: Settled worse than midfield; ran on ordinary when asked.
comment_ch: 不上不落, 騎落唔多

comment: Taken forward early and sat forward of midfield, 3 wide     with cover. Eased out of a run at 300m and lost ground, and only went hands and heels from that point and was eased out late.
comment_ch: 早段受催策上前，居中間之前位置，走第三疊，有遮擋。三百米處收慢並失去空位，因而失地。自該處起僅能在騎師手足並用催策下上前，末段收慢。

comment: Tardy start; never in contention.
comment_ch: 躍出笨拙，無段好睇

comment: Began well, making use of good draw to settle three-back,   one-off. Travelled well to turn when put under pressure     without responding. Not tested latter stages of race.       Jockey reported not comfortable in action.
comment_ch: 自內檔出閘迅速，落後領放馬三個馬位，走第二疊。直路彎前走勢良佳，其後受催策時毫無反應。末段未能全力發揮。騎師報告坐騎動作欠順。
owner: Kenneth Kan Ho Wing & Dr Ho Lig Kang

comment: Led with good pace early; weakened and dropped back.
comment_ch: 快放兩段，乏力墮退
owner: Albert Po Ying Wai, Frances Po, Raymond Po Chit Hei & Rebecca Po Pui Yan

comment: On pace early; limited response when asked late.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢, 末段騎落欠勁

comment: Slowly away, raced 2 wide at rear, 6 lengths back, similar  position on turn, improved from 500M, finished off very     strongly in straight to get 2nd.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居後列，落後六個馬位，走第二疊。直路彎居相若位置。自五百米處起推進。直路上衝刺凌厲，取得亞軍。

comment: Ran on fairly well when shifted out in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路移出，自動湧上

comment: Came home strong for 2nd when shifted out in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路移出, 佳勢上前

comment: Moderately away from a wide draw, raced in midfield, 9      lengths back on turn, made some progress in straight        without threatening.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘普通，居中間位置，轉彎時落後九個馬位。直路上略為上前，未能構成威脅。
owner: Au Kai Kwong, Yu Chun Hong, Cissy Yu Wing Sze & Winnie Yu Wing Yin

comment: Taken across behind runners, sat reserved along the fence   5Ls off the pace, driven 450M and taken wide leaving the    bend, stayed on well without threatening first few.
comment_ch: 在馬群之後切入內欄，留居領放馬五個馬位之後的位置。四百五十米處受催策，入直路時移出外疊。保持佳勢，但未能威脅前數名馬匹。

comment: Reserved near the rear 5Ls off the pace, held up behind     runners and unable to obtain clear running until after      100M, stayed on towards the finish.
comment_ch: 留居後列，落後領放馬五個馬位。在馬群之後受困，過了一百米處後才能望空，末段保持走勢。
owner: James Lau Po Man & Alice Woo Wai See

comment: Made minor inroads for 4th when quickened at turn.
comment_ch: 轉彎發力, 有點追勢

comment: Steadied soon after start and taken across behind horses at rear but still wide. Taken wider passing 800m, one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘後瞬即收慢，在馬群之後切入，但仍走外疊，居後列。跑過八百米處時移出更外疊。直路上保持同速。

comment: Jumped slowly and awkwardly before settling 7L behind       leader. Hanged wide in the straight and raced strongly to   finish third.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢及笨拙，落後領放馬七個馬位。直路上走外疊，衝刺強勁，跑獲季軍。

comment: Shifted across behind runners from wide draw and last on    settling though kept away from fence. Switched very wide in straight and finished off strongly.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，於馬群之後切入，包尾，離欄競跑。直路上移出大外疊，衝刺強勁。

comment: Smart start & rousted initially, settled midfield 1 off     with cover, shifted out 450m & driven, wide into stretch,   plugged on one pace.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，初時受催策，居中間位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。四百五十米處向外移出，受催策，入直路時走外疊，保持同速。

comment: Hard ridden to take the rail and led at advantageous slow   sectionals, hung on well until 100M flattened.
comment_ch: 在力策下切入內欄，以有利的緩慢步速領放。保持佳勢，一百米處洩氣。

comment: Began OK, hard ridden early but failed to muster, settling  towards rear along outer fence. Well back passing 400m      before running on fairly final stages.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，早段受大力催策但未能加速，居後列位置，走外欄。跑過四百米處時遙居於後，末段走勢普通。
owner: Mr & Mrs Peter Chan On Tak and Robert Chan Chi Man

comment: Prominent, however trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, weakened over the last furlong.
comment_ch: 居前列位置，沿途走第三疊，沒有遮擋。最後二百米轉弱。

comment: Began OK, but didn't push forward and settled worse than    midfield, 3 wide. Race was run before the turn, and faded   quickly in the straight to be tailed out 26L last.          Unacceptable performance.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，但未受催策，居中間之後位置，走第三疊。直路彎前敗局已定，直路上迅速力竭，墮後尾隨而回，大敗二十六個馬位。表現難以接受。

comment: Held up at start, overraced behind midfield 1400m, shuffled near tail & checked 720m, driven 350m but crowded turning   in, plugged on tepidly.
comment_ch: 起步後留後。千四米處搶口，居中間之後位置。墮居接近包尾位置，七百二十米處勒避。三百五十米處受催策，但入直路時受擠迫，衝刺乏力。

handicap: THE HONG KONG RUGBY UNION CUP (HANDICAP)
comment: Began fairly, pressed forward to hold rail 3-back from      leader. Made home turn awkwardly, had open run in straight, kept on fairly.
comment_ch: 出閘一般。受催策上前，落後領放馬三個馬位，固守內欄。直路彎走勢笨拙，直路上望空。保持一般走勢。

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 10Ls behind the leader on the     fence, benefited by the fast run, ran on nicely until       weakened final 50M.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬十個馬位，走內欄。快步速有利發揮，走勢良佳，最後五十米轉弱。

comment: Flattened halfway; going backwards.
comment_ch: 半程洩氣，墮退而回
owner: HK Kln City Ind & Comm Assn Syndicate

comment: Niggled along to take box-seat, sat 3-1/2L off the lead,    remained in touch until 250M when flattened.
comment_ch: 受催策以佔取包廂位置，落後領放馬三個半馬位。居啣接位置至二百五十米處洩氣。

comment: Under a hold throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 全程捉實，旨在考閘

comment: Settled at rear; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑，未受考驗

comment: Urged forward to hold box seat soon after start, keeping    tabs on leader to straight when blocked for run. Spent      force passing 200m.
comment_ch: 出閘後瞬即受催策上前，佔取包廂位置，跟隨領放馬，直路上受困。跑過二百米處時瞬即洩氣。

comment: Caught the eye when ran 3rd under a hold.
comment_ch: 按住第三, 表現吸引

comment: Took rail behind the front runners, progressed steadily     300M for 2nd.
comment_ch: 居領先馬匹之後，切入內欄。三百米處以穩定走勢上前，取得亞軍。
owner: Billy Albert Kan Che Kin & Benjamin Kan Yiu Chung

comment: Blocked after jumping; not properly tested.
comment_ch: 起步受阻，跟跑未試
owner: Amy Li Chi Lin, April Tsui Siu Yee & Ben Tsui Siu Lun

comment: Eased back and travelled at the rear, 8-3/4L behind the     leader 2 wide with cover. Despite suited to the fast tempo, ran home one paced only.
comment_ch: 留居後列，落後領放馬八又四分三個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。儘管快步速適合發揮，末段僅能保持同速。
owner: Mr & Mrs Michael Cheng Wing On

comment: Flattened halfway; failed to respond.
comment_ch: 半程洩氣，欠貫注力

comment: Behind midfield, 5Ls off the leaders on the rails, harmed   by the slow pace, little dash 100M.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬匹五個馬位，走內欄。慢步速不利發揮，一百米處衝前少許。
owner: Tony Lo Chin Ho & Wong Tsz Wa

comment: Pushed to sit in front of midfield, 2 wide, not suited by   the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
comment_ch: 受推策，居中間之前位置，走第二疊。慢步速不合發揮。直路上僅能保持位置。
owner: Mr & Mrs Eddie Wong Ming Chak and Kameny Wong Kam Man

comment: Settled in midfield along the rail 4-1/4L behind, despite   the fast tempo, finished off steadily from final 250M.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬四又四分一個馬位，走內欄。步速甚快，自二百五十米處起以穩勢衝刺。

comment: Raced at the rear, 11-1/4L behind initially 3 wide before   hampered and taken wider at 900M, made minimal ground.
comment_ch: 早段居後列位置，落後領放馬十一又四分一個馬位，走第三疊。九百米處受阻，移出更外疊，略為追前。
owner: Wong Chung Hin & Arnold Wong Chi Chiu

handicap_ch: 浪琴表國際騎師錦標賽（讓賽）－第一關
comment: Pushed forward from inside draw to grab box seat on         settling, 2L from leader. Tracked leader to straight but    only one-paced when asked for an effort.
comment_ch: 自內檔出閘，受推策上前佔取包廂位置，落後領放馬兩個馬位。直路前跟隨領放馬，受催策，但僅能保持同速。

comment: Made ground steadily; won narrowly.
comment_ch: 逐步加速, 後上險勝

comment: Limited response when being hard ridden in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路大力推騎, 反應一般

comment: Slow into stride then vigorously ridden to make up ground,  grabbing box seat 2L from leader at turn. Held for run top  of straight, got clear 200m, finished off nicely.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，其後受力策追前。直路彎奪取包廂位置，落後領放馬兩個馬位。直路初受困。二百米處望空，衝刺良佳。

handicap_ch: 浪琴表國際騎師錦標賽（讓賽）－第一關
comment: Pressed forward from outside draw, racing 3 and 4 wide      behind midfield. Took home turn wide, kept wide in          straight, one-paced.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後受催策上前，居中間之後位置，走第三至第四疊。直路彎移出外疊。直路上走外疊，保持同速。

comment: Began well, racing down centre track before edging closer   to outer fence 850m. Shaken up passing 400m, hit front      200m, held off late challenge.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，在跑道中央競跑，八百五十米處移近外欄。跑過四百米處時受催策，二百米處取得領先，末段力拒對手的挑戰。

comment: Began OK then pressed forward but wide to lead passing      1100m, cutting to fence 850m. Under pressure top of         straight, collared 300m, box on till flattened 100m.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策上前，走外疊。跑過千一米處時取得領先，八百五十米處切入內欄。直路初受催策，三百米處被超越。持續力拼，一百米處洩氣。
owner: Joseph Choi Yip Leung, Choi Fong Hon Mei, Andrew Choi Shing Fai & Angela Choi Hun Yung

comment: Settled midfield; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 居中跟跑，進步不大

comment: Eased to settle worse than midfield about 7Ls behind the    leader, made some ground in straight despite travelling     wide without cover throughout.
comment_ch: 收慢留居中間之後位置，落後領放馬約七個馬位。沿途在沒遮擋下走外疊，但直路上略為追前。

comment: Settled worse than midfield throughout, hampered by the     very slow tempo, unable to run on.
comment_ch: 沿途居中間之後位置。步速十分緩慢，不利發揮。未能追前。

comment: Eased to sit in midfield, not suited by the slow pace, lack room 400M, no turn of foot when clear.
comment_ch: 收慢留居中間位置。步速緩慢，不合發揮。四百米處空位不足，望空後未能加速。

comment: On pace to run 2nd; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 跟前入位，點到即止

comment: Slowly away, recovered to race in 11th, 8 lengths back on   rail, kept to inside after turning in, no daylight in       straight and held up for clear running over the concluding  stages, not able to be ridden out near the finish.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢。恢復走勢，居第十一位，落後領放馬八個馬位，走內欄。入直路後保持走內疊。直路上未能望空，末段受困。接近終點時未能受力策。

comment: Settled near the tail-end, 7-1/4L behind 3 wide with cover, harmed by the fast pace, not competitive.
comment_ch: 居接近包尾位置，落後七又四分一個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。快步速不利發揮，無力爭勝。

comment: Slow, taken to fence and last on settling. Trailed field to straight, switched to centre track 400m and finished        powerfully, going from last to first in final 300m.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，移入內欄，居包尾位置。直路前跟隨馬群。四百米處移至跑道中央，衝刺強勁。最後三百米自包尾位置追前至第一位。
owner: R & C Legh Racing Pty Ltd, G P I Racing, Gurners Bloodstock Co, G Pulitano, S W Kay, Ms M A Keating,

comment: Always in touch; won with something in hand.
comment_ch: 前後俱備, 輕勝對手

comment: Ridden halfway; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 半程已騎，走勢欠勁

comment: Showed early speed; but flattened late.
comment_ch: 馬有速度，但拉士已見轉弱
owner: The Executors of the Estate of the late George Wong Kin Wah

comment: Made ground steadily; came home strong to score.
comment_ch: 分段加快，後上甚勁

comment: Asked at turn; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 轉彎發力，末段按番住
owner: Michael Lam King Poy, Ernest Lam Jen Ho & Christopher Lam Jen Toa

comment: OK away and found a position midfield, on the rail, when    settling. Looked to have peaked at 200m, but ran on OK      again from 150m and picked up a couple of slower ones.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，居中間位置，走內欄。二百米處看似未能再增速，但自一百五十米處起恢復普通走勢，超越數匹步速較慢的對手。

comment: Had a hold at 200m; raced with cover.
comment_ch: 二百捉實, 跟馬林走

comment: Led all the way; hit the line strong to score.
comment_ch: 早騎領放，貫注到底
owner: Ho Sau Ki & Tommy Ho Chung Shing

comment: Niggled along to lead; kept on late to score.
comment_ch: 騎住切入搶放, 末段捱到

comment: Hard ridden forward, settled just off the lead 2 wide,      benefited by the slow sectionals, weakened 200M.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，居領放馬稍後位置，走第二疊。步速緩慢，有利發揮。二百米處轉弱。
owner: Samuel Wu Sheung Shau, Jonathan Cheng Shing Hey & Michael Chan Ting Bond

comment: Ran on one-paced comfortably for 2nd.
comment_ch: 均速第二, 走勢從容

comment: Crowded out start, steadied, shifted across behind horses   and last on settling. Never competitive though did run past beaten horses.
comment_ch: 出閘時受擠迫。減慢步速，在馬群之後移入內疊，居包尾位置。從未見具競爭力，但仍能超越已洩氣的對手。
owner: Vijay Harish Mohinani, Nilesh Murli Sajnani & Jaikishin Ishwardas Daswani

comment: Began fairly, then ridden to make up ground settling        four-back 8L from leader. Made ground along rail early in   straight but flattened final 100m.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，受催策以追前，居內欄的第四位，落後領放馬八個馬位。直路初沿欄追前，但最後一百米洩氣。

comment: Quickly away, pressed forward but wide, then sat outside    leader passing 850m. Rolled forward on straightening, took  over 200m, scooted home.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前，走外疊。跑過八百五十米處時居領放馬外側，入直路時上前。二百米處取得領先，衝刺凌厲。
owner: The Hon Ronald Arculli GBM GBS JP & Johanna K J Arculli BBS

comment: Under restraint early; ran on ordinary in the straight.
comment_ch: 早段稍留, 直路走勢平常
owner: Kathy Lo Ho Hsiu Lan & Paul Lo Chung Wai

comment: Jumped fairly, never better than midfield, wide into        straight, one-paced under pressure.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，從未超越中間位置。入直路時走外疊，在催策下保持同速。
owner: Mr & Mrs Stephen Ho Wai Man, Fred Ho Ka Chun and Derek Ho Ka Chung

comment: Pressed forward from an outside draw to race outside leader to 800m before dropping 2L back around turn, Rolled forward 300m, hit front 200m, no extra when challenged close home.
comment_ch: 自第八檔出閘後受催策上前，八百米處前居領放馬外側。直路彎墮退兩個馬位。三百米處上前，二百米處取得領先。接近終點時受挑戰，再無餘力。
owner: Albert Ngan Kam Wai, Gordon Ngan Kam Kee & Martin Ngan

comment: Away evenly, 3 deep early, pushed wider 1300m & eased,      settled beyond midfield 1 off & keen, 3 deep from 900m,     under riding 700m, back to 2nd last 450m, widest into       straight, one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，早段走第三疊。千三米處移至更外疊及收慢，居中間之後位置，走第二疊，跑來搶口。自九百米處起走第三疊。七百米處受催策。最後四百五十米墮居尾二位置。入直路時走最外疊，保持同速。
owner: Nelson Lee Yuk Ming, Norman Ng Si Pang & Eric Poon Hung Cheung

comment: Jumped well, raced 2 to 3 lengths back on rail, there to    turn, no clear running early in straight, finished off      evenly when clear thereafter.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，落後兩至三個馬位，走內欄。直路彎前居相同位置。直路初受困。望空後保持穩勢。

comment: Slow away, hard ridden at back, favoured by the fast tempo, blocked 4-2, made good ground when clear.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居後列，受力策。快步速有利發揮。自四百米處至二百米處受困。望空後追前頗多。

comment: Dropped back to rear from wide barrier, ridden patiently    8Ls behind leader, ran on steadily to claim 4th just in     time, no threat to first 3.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，墮居後列，落後領放馬八個馬位，留力候上。以穩定走勢上前，及時取得第四位，未能對首三名構成威脅。
owner: Julian Hui Chun Hang & Michele Monique Reis

comment: Restrained in midfield, wide no cover from 700M, ran on     same pace passing 400M, weakened final stages.
comment_ch: 受約束居中間位置，自七百米處起走外疊，沒有遮擋。跑過四百米處時保持同速，末段轉弱。
owner: Allen Shi Lop Tak & Kimmy Ngan King Lin

comment: Pushed early, failed to cross in front, trapped 3 wide in   midfield, ran on until 200M flattened.
comment_ch: 早段受推策，未能上前切入內欄，居中間位置，走第三疊。保持走勢，二百米處洩氣。

comment: Pushed early but not muster, sat 2 wide behind midfield,    not suited by the slow pace, blocked 400M, dashed strongly  when clear.
comment_ch: 早段受推策，但未能加速。居中間之後位置，走第二疊。慢步速不合發揮。四百米處受阻，望空後以勁勢衝刺。

comment: Niggled throughout; ran on strongly after the post.
comment_ch: 沿途俾住，過終點餘勢強

comment: Bumped start, pressed forward, holding one-off position 1L  behind leader. Boxed on gamely in straight before tiring    and fading final 200m.
comment_ch: 出閘時碰撞對手，受催策上前，居領放馬一個馬位之後的位置，走第二疊。直路上以頑強鬥志力拼。最後二百米漸呈疲態，繼而力竭。

comment: Prominent, 2-3/4L off the pace, along the rail. Not suited  to the fast tempo, headed passing final 200M.
comment_ch: 居前列，落後領放馬二又四分三個馬位，走內欄。步速甚快，不合發揮。跑過二百米處時被超越。

handicap: TUEN MUN PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 屯門公眾騎術學校讓賽
comment: Jumped out well, travelled wide and without cover, improved to midfield at home turn, widest on straightening, came     home fairly. Lame right front next day.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，走外疊，沒有遮擋。直路彎進佔中間位置。入直路時移出最外疊，衝刺一般。翌日右前腿不良於行。

comment: Settled worse than midfield, travelled 5Ls behind the       leader 2 wide with cover, finished off strongly for 4th.    (Questioned for riding)
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬五個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。衝刺強勁，跑獲殿軍。（騎師被查詢騎法。）

comment: Switched off to the rear 7Ls off the pace, waited with      until reaching top of straight, angled out to clear 400M,   pressed winner final 150M but was held.
comment_ch: 收慢留居後列，落後領放馬七個馬位。留力至直路早段。四百米處向外移出以望空。最後一百五十米向頭馬施壓，但未能超越該駒。
owner: Sammy Sean Lee & Aaron Lee Ho Ting

comment: Not quickened when niggled along throughout.
comment_ch: 沿途俾住, 無加速力

handicap: TUEN MUN PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 屯門公眾騎術學校讓賽
comment: Jumped smartly, raced outside the leader, fought hard       entire straight, finished OK.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居領放馬外側位置。直路上沿途力拼，衝刺尚可。
owner: Mr & Mrs Julian Chow Kai Wo, Chow Wing Shuen and Chow Cheuk Wai

comment: Dropped in from wide gate to race at tail, shifted widest   into stretch, plugged on one pace.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後向內移入，居包尾位置。入直路時移出最外疊。保持同速。

comment: Began well, rolling forward at own pace, settling           three-back, one-off. Swung wide into straight, shaken up    and urged forward, hit front 100m, kept on strongly.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，以本身步速上前，居領放馬三個馬位之後的位置，走第二疊。入直路時移出外疊，受催策上前，一百米處取得領先，保持勁勢勝出。

comment: Fast start, settled handy 1 off with cover, driven 420m &   switched out, quickened to press lead, not a threat in      solid run home, held on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。居有利位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。四百二十米處受催策，移出外疊。加速上前，向領放馬施壓。末段以勁勢衝刺，但未能構成威脅。保住季軍。

comment: Began moderately; ran on comfortably for 3rd under a hold.
comment_ch: 起步一般，按住上前，輕描淡寫

comment: Shifted across behind runners from wide draw, settling at   rear before making ground back stretch. One-paced in        straight. Rider dropped rein after 200m.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後在馬群之後切入內疊。居後列，對面直路上追前。直路上保持同速。過了二百米處後，騎師韁繩脫手。

comment: At rear along the fence, hung out badly and checked at      bends, never a factor.
comment_ch: 居後列，走內欄。嚴重外閃，轉彎時勒避。從未有力一爭。

handicap_ch: 浪琴表國際騎師錦標賽（讓賽）－第二關

comment: Crowded out start, raced 7 lengths back at rear, ridden on  turn, showed no response, finished tailed out.
comment_ch: 出閘時受擠迫，居後列，落後七個馬位。直路彎在催策下毫無反應，包尾大敗而回。
owner: Edward Chan King Sang, Chan Wo Ping & Ng Sun Wah

comment: In midfield, raced keenly early, 4Ls off the pace 400M but  lacked the necessary response in straight, held ground      final 200M.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，早段搶口。四百米處落後領放馬四個馬位，直路上未能對催策交出反應。最後二百米保持位置。

comment: Pushed early, at back, 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no  turn of foot.
comment_ch: 早段受推策，居後列，走第二疊。步速緩慢，不利發揮。未能加速。
owner: Raymond Leung Yim San, Leung Chung Wai & Leung Chung Shun

comment: Ridden to hold forward position, settling one-back, one-off back stretch, put under pressure turning for home but only  one-paced under vigorous riding.
comment_ch: 受催策保持居前列，對面直路上落後一個馬位，走第二疊。轉彎時在力策下僅能保持同速。
owner: Lincoln Ling & Fione Yip Sze Pui

comment: Slow to begin; made minor inroads saving ground in the Straight.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，直路慳位稍追

comment: Ran on ok when ridden out for 4th.
comment_ch: 推騎第四，似好非好

comment: Held up in midfield, 6th and 3Ls off the pace 400M, kept on fairly behind main rivals, faded late. (Bled.)
comment_ch: 留居中間位置，四百米處居第六位，落後領放馬三個馬位。居主要對手之後，保持普通走勢。末段力竭。（流鼻血。）

comment: Slow to begin; made progress when asked late.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，末段推騎追近
owner: Tony Lau Yiu Tong, Thomas Lau Sum Fai & Lau Yi Fai

comment: Raced at the rear, 7-1/2L behind 2 wide, not a factor.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後七個半馬位，走第二疊，無力一爭。

comment: Shifted out at back straight; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 刻意移出，扣實而回

comment: Broke OK, snagged to midfield, trapped 3 wide no cover,     rolled forward to sit  outside leader 900m, niggled 650m &  soon under pump, found little in stretch, faded.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，收慢留居中間位置，在沒遮擋下走第三疊。九百米處上前居領放馬外側位置。六百五十米處受催策，瞬即再受催策。直路上無甚餘力，繼而力竭。

comment: Bumped at start; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 起步碰撞，走勢一般

comment: Began well, pressed forward and then taken to fence 2L from leader 1200m. Dropped back slightly when tempo increased    around turn, switched out 200m to make run and finished     well under the whip.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前。千二米處移入內欄，落後領放馬兩個馬位。轉直路彎步速加快時略為墮退。二百米處向外移出取位，在鞭策下衝刺良佳。

comment: Jumped OK, hard ridden but didn't muster and held wide      behind the pace. Rolled forward from 1000m to sit outside   leader 850m. Gave ground soon after entering straight.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受力策，但未能加速，居領放馬之後位置，走外疊。自一千米處起上前，八百五十米處居領放馬外側。入直路後瞬即墮退。
owner: Sherman Ting Wing Cheung, Joyce Ting Tung Sum & David Ting Chi Ho

comment: Began fairly, urged forward then steadied 1500m when kept   wide. Made long forward move from 1300m, looping field back stretch to get 3rd entering straight when flattened,        finishing tailed out. Unacceptable performance.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策上前，千五米處收慢，保持走外疊。自千三米處起追前甚多，對面直路上繞過馬群上前，入直路時佔取第三位，但洩氣，包尾大敗而回。表現難以接受。
owner: Thomas Lee Kwok Wing, Patrick Ng Pak Hong, Albert Lee Wai Choi & The Executors of the Estate of the

comment: 1st to jump; led all the way to score.
comment_ch: 應聲彈出, 帶放到底

comment: Broke well, not far off the pace early stages, moved up to  track leader 900M, led 250M, fought on when challenged by   rival from 200M, beaten to 2nd near 50M but well clear of   remainders.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。早段落後領放馬不遠。九百米處發力上前，跟隨領放馬。二百五十米處取得領先。自二百米處起受對手挑戰時力拼。接近五十米處時洩氣，居第二位，但遠遠帶離餘駒。
owner: Wong Chung Hin & Arnold Wong Chi Chiu

comment: Always in touch; won comfortably.
comment_ch: 有前有後，姿態輕鬆

comment: Responded well for 3rd when asked.
comment_ch: 推騎第三, 反應良好

comment: Inconvenienced shortly after start, taken to rail but       outpaced, dropping to rear. Left flat-footed 500m when      field speeded up, swung wide into straight but found        nothing under hard riding.
comment_ch: 出閘後不久受妨礙，移入內欄，被拋離，墮居後列。五百米處馬群加速時走勢遲緩。入直路時移出外疊，受力策，但再無餘力。

comment: Slow to begin; going all over the place; never in contention.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，片出片入，遠離水準

comment: Hard ridden early but not muster, 8.5Ls off the leader 2    wide, favoured by the fast pace, no progress.
comment_ch: 早段受力策，但未能加速，落後領放馬八個半馬位，走第二疊。步速甚快，有利發揮。毫無進展。

comment: Raced wide behind midfield, in similar position turning in, one-paced in the run home.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，走外疊。入直路時居相若位置。末段保持同速。

comment: Up with the pace; ran on for 2nd when asked.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，推騎追上

comment: Lost touch from the start, over 10Ls behind, never involved.
comment_ch: 自出閘起被大幅拋離，落後逾十個馬位。從未參與競逐。
owner: Eric Cheng Kam Chung & Vene Cheng Wing Ni

comment: Travelled wide just better than midfield early stages,      obtained cover in home straight the first time but          difficult to settle to slow pace at times, slightly worse   when pace quickened far side, found nothing in the run home.
comment_ch: 早段居中間稍前位置，走外疊。首次在直路上競跑時取得遮擋，但在慢步速下不時難以穩定走勢。對面直路上步速加快時稍為墮後。直路上再無餘力。
owner: Tsui Yuk Shan, Stanley Yim Yuk Lun & Jacky Yim Tsz Kit

comment: Under whip early in the Straight; not willing to stretch.
comment_ch: 直路初已開鞭，不願展步

comment: Last to jump; then with the field; being hard ridden in the Straight.
comment_ch: 出閘最慢,隨即跟回馬群,直路又推又打

comment: Missed break, bustled forward to midfield 3 wide no cover,  driven turning in but found nil & weakened.
comment_ch: 漏閘。受催策上前，居中間位置，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。入直路時受催策，但再無餘力，並且轉弱。
owner: Raymond Leung Yim San, Leung Chung Wai & Leung Chung Shun

comment: Up with leaders early, eased off to midfield before home    turn, challenged along inside passing 400M, ran on well for 3rd, no match for winner final 150M.
comment_ch: 早段與領先馬匹併跑，直路彎前收慢留居中間位置。跑過四百米處時在內疊展開挑戰，走勢良佳，但最後一百五十米不敵頭馬，跑獲季軍。

comment: Led at break & bustled but soon collared & snagged to       midfield 1 off with cover, bustled 800m, snatched off heels 700m & in retreat, last turning in, eased.
comment_ch: 出閘後領先，受催策，但瞬即被超越，留居中間位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。八百米處受催策，七百米處移離對手後蹄，墮退，包尾轉入直路，收慢。

comment: Held up behind midfield, 5Ls to make up on leader 400M,     picked up strongly passing 200M, motored home and was just  denied narrowly.
comment_ch: 留居中間之後位置。四百米處落後領放馬五個馬位。跑過二百米處時加速強勁，衝刺凌厲，僅敗。
owner: Guo Qin Jun, Kwok Ho & Chiu Yi

comment: Not quickened when asked coming down the Rock.
comment_ch: 落山已騎，未見加速
owner: Mr & Mrs Ben Wong Chung Mat

comment: Crowded early, remained in rear to straight, shifted wide   for the turn, finished off race nicely.
comment_ch: 早段受擠迫，直路前沿途包尾。直路彎移出外疊，衝刺良佳。

comment: Made ground steadily to score comfortably.
comment_ch: 逐步加快, 姿態輕鬆

comment: Hard ridden forward, 2 wide, harmed by the fast pace,       checked badly 250M, reduced afterwards.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，走第二疊。步速甚快，不利發揮。二百五十米處大力勒避，其後轉弱。
owner: Chan Kam Hung & Alan Chan Kin On

comment: Began well, pushed forward, settling two-back from leader.  Lost position around turn, one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，受推策上前，落後領放馬兩個馬位。直路彎失位，直路上保持同速。
owner: Danny Lau Tat Pong, Liu Ling Yi, Ho Tak Sum & Lee Wong Tim

comment: Raced behind runners; dashed on strongly when clear.
comment_ch: 沿途跟馬林，拉士望空撲上

comment: Towards the rear and raced along the rail 4-1/4L behind the leader, harmed by the slow pace, not competitive.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬四又四分一個馬位，走內欄。步速緩慢，不利發揮。毫無競爭力。

comment: Ran on ordinary when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段推騎，反應平常
owner: Charmaine Wong Kam Mei & Chan Fu Ho

comment: Under restraint; hit the line strong for 3rd.
comment_ch: 紋風未動, 望空湧上

comment: Flattened in the Straight; dropped back to rear.
comment_ch: 直路乏力, 墮退而回
owner: To Wai, Andy To Kai Pong, Benson To Kai Sang & Canning To Kai Fung

comment: Always at rear; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 走勢欠順, 落後跟跑

comment: Hard-ridden to hold fence 3L from leader. Closed in turning for home, came off fence 250m to pass tiring runner but     caught close to the line.
comment_ch: 受力策，落後領放馬三個馬位，固守內欄。直路彎追近領放馬。二百五十米處移離內欄，超越漸呈疲態的對手。接近終點時被超越。
owner: Kwan Shiu Man & Jessica Kwan Mun Hang

comment: Began fairly, then steadied when crowded, dropping to       behind midfield in one-off position. Put under pressure     400m out and boxed on fairly.
comment_ch: 出閘一般。其後受擠迫時收慢，墮居中間之後位置，走第二疊。四百米處受催策，保持普通走勢。

handicap: PANASONIC STEAM IH WARM JAR HANDICAP
comment: Smart break, over-raced 3 wide no cover midfield, driven    430m, weakened tamely.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居中間位置，在沒擋下走第三疊，跑來搶口。四百三十米處受催策，乏力轉弱。

comment: Quickly into stride, racing a half length behind leader to  900m when drew alongside. Pressed ahead top of straight,    caught 150m, kept on well.
comment_ch: 起步迅速，居領放馬半個馬位之後的位置，九百米處與領放馬並跑。直路初受催策取得領先，一百五十米處被超越，保持佳勢。

comment: Found nothing when shifted out in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路移出，毫無走勢

comment: Behind midfield along the fence, pace good, no turn of foot.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，走內欄。步速中等，未能加速。

comment: Settled in front of midfield, 2-3/4L off the leader 2 wide  with cover, harmed by the slow pace, no dash.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，落後領放馬二又四分三個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。慢步速不利發揮，衝刺乏力。

comment: Made up good ground when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段考驗，追回甚多

comment: Dropped back from the wide draw to eventually sit 2nd last, 8L off the leader. Held up in the straight until the 200m,  and looked to progress before being held up again over the  last 100m and never fully tested.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後墮居尾二位置，落後領放馬八個馬位。直路上受困至二百米處，其後看似能夠追前。最後一百米再度受困，從未能全力發揮。
owner: Cheung Kwong Kwan & Chadwick Mok Cham Hung

comment: Ridden positively from the middle draw, settled 2L off the  pace before shifting out for a run entering straight,       sustained effort to take charge inside final 100 metres.
comment_ch: 自中檔出閘後受催策，落後領放馬兩個馬位，入直路時向外移出取位。持續力拼，最後一百米控制大局。

comment: Found nothing when under whip at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百開鞭，毫無反應

comment: Camped handy, travelled 2.5Ls behind the leader on the      fence, ran on steadily for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居前列，落後領放馬兩個半馬位，沿欄競跑。保持穩勢，跑獲季軍。

handicap_ch: 香港大學專業進修學院讓賽
comment: Jumped well and settled behind leader, unable to quicken on straightening and battled to the line.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居領放馬之後位置。入直路時未能加速，力拼至終點。

comment: Sent forward vying for lead, offered a mild bid early       straight, headed near 200M, no extra late (No Vet findings)
comment_ch: 受催策上前，爭奪領先。直路初略為上前，接近二百米處時被超越，末段再無餘力。（獸醫檢查後並無發現任何明顯異常之處。）

comment: Outpaced, settling towards rear close to fence. Took closer order around turn and kept on fairly in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘後被拋離，居後列，靠近內欄競跑。轉直路彎時進佔較接近位置。直路上保持普通走勢。

comment: At rear, travelled 14Ls behind the leader with cover,       benefited by the fast pace, made some ground in straight    without threatening.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬十四個馬位，有遮擋。快步速有利發揮。直路上略為追前，未能構成威脅。
owner: James Lau Chi Wing, Lau Kai Tai & Michelle Lau Wing Sheung

comment: Urged to lead along the rail; kept on to score.
comment_ch: 騎住搶欄, 貫注到底

comment: Eased back from a wide barrier, settled towards the rear,   8L off 2 wide with cover. Improved gradually around turn,   led passing 200M, finished off strongly to score.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後收慢留居後列，落後八個馬位，在有遮擋下走第二疊。轉直路彎時逐漸上前。跑過二百米處時最得領先，末段衝刺強勁，取得勝利。

comment: Caught the eye when settled midfield under a hold.
comment_ch: 扣實居中, 表現引人
owner: Mr & Mrs Chau Kam Chuen and Helen Chau Hoi Man

comment: Prominent, travelled 2Ls behind the leader in the middle    part of the track, ran on steadily for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居前列，在跑道中央落後領放馬兩個馬位，保持穩勢，跑獲季軍。

comment: Rolled forward to obtain box-seat, 1-3/4L behind. Taken to  centre of the track after rounding the Home Turn, finished  off one paced.
comment_ch: 上前佔取包廂位置，落後一又四分三馬位。直路上移至跑道中央競跑，保持同速至終點。

comment: Urged forward from an awkward draw, settling 1L behind      leader before turn. Came under pressure soon after          straightening and faded.
comment_ch: 自第十檔出閘後受催策上前，直路彎前落後領放馬一個馬位。入直路後瞬即受催策，繼而力竭。

comment: Jumped moderately, gradually settled just off the pace on   rails, still close up after straightening but unable to     sustain run inside final 200 metres.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，逐漸上前，居領放馬稍後位置，走內欄。入直路後仍緊隨領放馬，但最後二百米後勁不繼。
owner: Mr & Mrs Vincent To Wai Keung

comment: Hung in when asked at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百推騎，有點內閃

comment: Not quickened when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段要俾，未見加速
owner: Mr & Mrs Colin Lo Chor Cheong

comment: Fast start & bustled early to 1 back on rail, trapped in    pocket 300m & checked in tight running 200m, shuffled back, driven 100m, quickened too late.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。早段受催策，落後領放馬一個馬位，走內欄。三百米處受困。二百米處在窄位勒避，墮退。一百米處受催策，加速太遲。

comment: Never far off to straight, soon weakened.
comment_ch: 直路前從未遠離領放馬，瞬即轉弱。
owner: Tsang Tak Kwong, Pat Ching Pui Yuk, Grace Yu Sok Yin & Dr Kenneth Chau Kai Fung

comment: Wide throughout; under restraint in the Straight.
comment_ch: 全程外疊, 直路撐實

comment: Slow to begin; ridden throughout; ran on ok after the post.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，沿途俾住，過終點後有追勢

comment: Jumped away nicely; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 起步順利，旨在考閘

comment: Under restraint after jumping; ran on comfortably.
comment_ch: 起步抽到實, 表現輕鬆

comment: Got off OK, no speed, steadied 1100m in one-off position    behind midfield. Raced keenly around turn losing position,  one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，欠缺前速。千一米處收慢，居中間之後位置，走第二疊。轉直路彎時搶口，失位，直路上保持同速。

comment: Taken back at break to rail near rear, shifted out final    turn & driven, plugged on for moderate headway.
comment_ch: 出閘後留後，移入內欄，居後列。轉直路彎時向外移出，受催策。保持同速，略為上前。

handicap_ch: 賽馬天下四十週年紀念盃（讓賽）
comment: Slow start, raced just behind midfield along the rail,      5-1/4L behind, dropped off near 150M.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢。居中間稍後位置，落後五又四分一個馬位，沿欄競跑。接近一百五十米處時墮退。
owner: The Executors of the Estate of the late The Hon Lau Wong Fat

comment: Hard ridden early but never muster, behind midfield on the  fence, harmed by the slow pace, lack room 400M, no dash     when clear.
comment_ch: 早段受力策，但從未能加速。沿欄居中間之後位置。慢步速不利發揮。四百米處缺乏空位。望空後衝刺乏力。

comment: Shared lead early; ran on comfortably for 2nd.
comment_ch: 拍實鬥放，姿態輕鬆

handicap: AUDEMARS PIGUET ROYAL OAK CONCEPT HANDICAP
comment: Began well, pressed forward but kept wide without cover 2L  from leader. Covered extra ground turn and tired quickly    after passing 200m.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前，落後領放馬兩個馬位，在沒遮擋下走外疊。轉直路彎時多走腳程。跑過二百米處後迅速呈現疲態。
owner: Mr & Mrs Allen Shi Lop Tak and Kenneth Shi Ho Ming

comment: Settled down behind midfield 5-6Ls off the pace, not        quickened entering straight, well beaten.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬五至六個馬位。入直路時未能加速，洩氣潰敗。

comment: Raced rearward; responded only fairly when asked in straight.
comment_ch: 直路推騎，反應一般

comment: Raced greenly; tailed out.
comment_ch: 走勢欠順，包尾而回

comment: Settled midfield, travelled 5Ls behind the leader grand     side, never ran on.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬五個馬位，靠近外欄競跑。從未能上前。

comment: Quickened at turn; ridden out to the wire.
comment_ch: 彎位發力, 考驗到底

comment: Began OK, ridden along behind midfield before checked 700m  and didn't settle for some distance. One-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可。受催策，居中間之後位置。七百米處勒避，繼而在一段途程上未能穩定走勢。直路上保持同速。
owner: Wallace Chim Hon Chun & Leung Man Wei

comment: Raced in midfield, 4-1/2L behind along the rail, ran on     well and just missed out on 2nd prior to going to the line.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後四個半馬位，走內欄。以佳勢上前，僅於過終點前失去亞軍。
owner: Chan Hon Ming & Anthony So Hung Gun

comment: Rolled forward to take the fence and share the lead at fast tempo, kept on nicely until weakened over the final         furlong, hung on for 4th.
comment_ch: 上前移入內欄，以快步速並排領放。保持佳勢，最後二百米轉弱，保持走勢，跑獲殿軍。

comment: Midfield on rail; found nothing when asked.
comment_ch: 貼欄順走, 騎落欠勁

comment: Shifted across behind runners from outside draw but unable  to cross to rail and held wide at rear. Allowed to roll     forward around turn to within 3L of leader before turning   one-paced.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘，在馬群之後切入，但未能移入內欄，居後列，走外疊。轉直路彎時獲許上前，落後領放馬不足三個馬位，其後保持同速。
owner: Albert Hung Chao Hong & Stephanie Hung Yujie

comment: Up with the pace; kept on one-paced in the Straight.
comment_ch: 跟放，直路保持同速

comment: Restrained in midfield early, no closer than 3-wide         throughout, made early move from halfway to join leaders,   run ended inside 300M, weakened.
comment_ch: 早段受約束居中間位置，沿途走第三疊或更外疊。自半程起已開始發力上前，與領放馬並跑。最後三百米後勁不繼，走勢轉弱。

comment: Jumped well, ridden to cross, stuck 3 deep out of straight, settled 4th 1 off, under a hard drive 500m, switched over   heels 210m, stayed on.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策向內移入，跑離直路時走第三疊。其後居第四位，走第二疊。五百米處受力策，二百一十米處避開他駒後蹄，保持走勢。

handicap: HKU FACULTIES OF LAW AND SOCIAL SCIENCES HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 港大法律學院與社會科學學院讓賽
comment: Settled slightly behind midfield, 5L behind 2 wide with     cover, no dash in the straight.
comment_ch: 居中間稍後位置，落後五個馬位，在有遮擋下走第二疊。直路上衝刺乏力。

comment: Tardy start; found nothing when under whip and hard ridden in the Straight.
comment_ch: 慢閘，直路又推又打，毫無進展
owner: Terry Chan Tat Wah, Cho Kwai Chee, Kwok Shun Tim & Lam Mau

comment: Found nothing when being niggled along throughout.
comment_ch: 騎足全程, 毫無進展

comment: Found nothing when asked in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路推騎, 不進反退

comment: Responded only fairly when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路推騎, 反應尚可

comment: Quickened at turn; ran on strongly in the Straight.
comment_ch: 彎位發力, 直路愈追愈勁

comment: Began fairly, then difficult to settle, dropping behind     midfield. Stayed on rail in straight, checked 200m, then    raced tight and not properly tested.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，其後難以穩定走勢，墮居中間之後位置。直路上固守內欄，二百米處勒避。其後緊迫競跑，未能全力發揮。

comment: Taken back early; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 拖住居後, 未見真章
owner: Charles Chan Kam Kwong, Bruce Lee Sing Keung & Yuen Shun Yiu

comment: Positively ridden, up with leaders early, tracked leaders   900M, fought on same speed turning in, no extra towards     finish. (Jockey dropped whip 350M)
comment_ch: 受催策，早段與領先馬匹併跑，九百米處跟隨領先馬匹。入直路時保持同速，終點前再無餘力。（騎師於三百五十米處跌掉馬鞭。）
owner: Queenie Siu Fung Kou & Lau Kwok Man

comment: On pace early; flattened in the Straight.
comment_ch: 跟前, 直路力度已轉弱

comment: Raced midfield under a hold, not fully tested
comment_ch: 按實居中，走勢含蓄

comment: Restrained to near the rear, caught 3-wide during race,     improved to midfield home turn, kept on fairly under        pressure final 300M.
comment_ch: 在約束下居後列，沿途走第三疊。直路彎進佔中間位置。最後三百米受催策，保持一般走勢。

comment: Taken back from wide gate and remained at rear throughout.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後留後。沿途居後列。

comment: Settled worse than midfield about 5Ls behind the leader 2   wide with cover, despite the fast pace, unable to run on.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬約五個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。儘管步速甚快，但未能追前。
owner: Tung Woo Ping, Tung Wai Shing & Tung Sau Man

comment: Taken back from wide to 3 deep with cover near rear, a      touch keen, driven wide into stretch, stayed on centre      track for sound gains.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後留居後列，走第三疊，有遮擋，略為搶口。入直路時受催策，走外疊。直路上在跑道中央保持走勢，追前甚多。

comment: Prominent, travelled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence,    ran on steadily along the inside for 4th.
comment_ch: 居前列，落後領放馬三個馬位，走內欄。在內疊穩步上前，跑獲殿軍。

comment: In 4th position throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 全程四位, 力掩鋒茫

comment: Kept on one-paced when asked late.
comment_ch: 拉士開鞭，未見再進

comment: Slow into stride and settled at rear, widest on             straightening and ran home fairly.
comment_ch: 展步緩慢，居後列。入直路時走最外疊。末段走勢普通。
owner: Elseda Shum Mei Chu, Professor Hextan Ngan Yuen Sheung, Chu Kwong Por & Andrew Shuen Pak Man

comment: Bumped start, raced 3 wide with cover near tail, niggled    800m, hard-ridden turning in, stayed on moderately centre   track.
comment_ch: 起步時被碰撞，居接近尾列，在有遮擋下走第三疊。八百米處受催策。入直路時受力策。直路上在跑道中央競跑，保持普通走勢。

comment: Under a hold along the rail; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 貼欄按實，走勢含蓄

comment: Settled outside leader, travelled well home turn, tried     hard but no match for winner.
comment_ch: 居領放馬外側。轉直路彎時走勢良佳。受力策，但不敵頭馬。

comment: Jumped best to soon take up running, held lead to the 800   metres, one-back on rails turning in, unable to peg back    the winner despite coming under strong pressure.
comment_ch: 出閘最快，瞬即取得領先，保持領先至八百米處。入直路時落後一個馬位，走內欄。受力策但未能追上頭馬。

comment: Driven early from a wide gate racing wide without cover in  a prominent position to home straight, folded up quickly    inside final 200 metres.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，早段受催策。直路前居前列，走外疊，沒有遮擋。最後二百米迅速力竭。

comment: Sharp break, restrained to 3 wide with cover near rear,     ridden 450m, plugged on evenly.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受約束居後列，走第三疊，有遮擋。四百五十米處受催策，穩步上前。
owner: Poon Chi Keung & Thomas Poon Ho Wing

comment: Hard ridden forward, 1 out 1 back, just held ground for 2nd.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，居第二疊第二位。僅能保持位置，取得亞軍。

comment: Raced in midfield, 3L off along the rail, hung in in the    Straight and ran on one paced.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後三個馬位，走內欄。直路上內閃，保持同速。

comment: Smart break, lacked pace & slid back, soon under pump back  of midfield, found nil in weakening stretch run.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，缺乏前速及墮後，瞬即受催策，居中間之後位置。直路上再無餘力，走勢轉弱。

comment: Pushed forward early to be handily placed 4th on the rail,  4L off the early leader. Didn't respond in the in the run   home, drifting back in the straight.
comment_ch: 早段受推策上前，居有利的第四位，落後領放馬四個馬位，走內欄。直路上對催策毫無反應，並且墮後。

comment: Shifted across behind runners from an outside draw and      distant last on settling. Tagged on to main field entering  straight, took inside run and finished off nicely.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，在馬群之後切入，居遙遙落後的包尾位置。入直路時跟隨主馬群，走內疊，以佳勢衝刺。

comment: Bumped start, pressed forward to lead 1300m. Set good       sections and still clear with 200m to go. Tired final       stages but held for second.
comment_ch: 出閘時與他駒互相碰撞。受催策上前，千三米處取得領先。以快步速領放，二百米處仍領先。末段已呈疲態，但保住亞席。

comment: Asked at turn; ridden along for 2nd.
comment_ch: 入彎已騎, 考驗第二

comment: Settled worse than midfield about 5Ls behind the leader 2   wide with cover, swung widest turning in, closed off well   for 3rd in a bunched finish.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬約五個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。入直路時移出最外疊，衝刺良佳，在多駒幾乎齊過終點下取得季軍。
owner: Chan Wing Kee, Peter Poon & Parken Tai Pak Kwan

comment: Always in touch; won comfortably.
comment_ch: 前後俱備，輕鬆趕過

comment: Began well from a wide draw, sent forward to race           prominently, shared lead after 900M, peaked after turning   in, weakened thereafter and eased final 100M.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘迅速。受催策上前，進佔前列位置。過了九百米處後與對手並排領先，入直路後未能再增速。其後轉弱，最後一百米收慢。

owner: Conrad Fung Kwok Keung, Chris Fung Kwok Hung & The Executors of the Estate of the late Fung Cheung

comment: Raced handy; flattened late.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑, 末段唔多

comment: Hard ridden forward to take the fence and share the lead at fast sectionals, kept on steadily until weakened final 150M.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，移入內欄，與步速甚快的領放馬並跑。保持穩勢，最後一百五十米轉弱。
owner: Mr & Mrs Peter Chan On Tak and Robert Chan Chi Man

comment: Travelled in front of midfield, sat 3-3/4L off along the    rail, kept on and hit the line strongly to finish 2nd.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，落後三又四分三個馬位，走內欄。保持走勢，衝刺強勁，跑獲亞軍。
owner: Mr & Mrs Raymond Chan Shu Keung

comment: Began well, ridden forward but wide, three-back from        leader. Improved position turn, wide into straight, hit     front 350m, pulled clear.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前，落後領放馬三個馬位，走外疊。轉彎時推進上前。入直路時走外疊。三百五十米處取得領先，帶離勝出。

comment: On pace; no clear running in the Straight.
comment_ch: 前段跟跑, 直路無位

comment: Very awkward start and shifted out, settled to race in      one-off one-behind position 2L off, slight dash before 200M then flattened.
comment_ch: 出閘十分笨拙，向外斜跑，居第二疊第二位，落後兩個馬位。二百米處前略為衝刺，其後洩氣。
owner: Andrew Fan Chun Wah, Adam Lee Yat Keung & Gary Mui Ho Cheung

comment: Began well, rolled forward inside leader before settling in box seat 1000m. Followed leaders to straight, looked chance 200m when got clear run, but only one-paced. Has            substantial amount of blood in trachea.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，在領放馬內側上前，一千米處居包廂位置。直路前跟隨領先馬匹，二百米處望空，看似具爭勝機會，但僅能保持同速。氣管內有大量血液。

comment: Bumped start, pressed forward to sit in slipstream of       leaders. Put under pressure 400m but only one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘時與對手互相碰撞，受催策上前，居領放馬稍後位置。四百米處受催策，但僅能保持同速。

comment: Under restraint early; quickened to score.
comment_ch: 起步撐實，加速取勝
owner: Lau Chun, Eddie Lau Kin Yeung, Stephen Hon Bing Man & Samuel Chow Wai Wong

comment: Up with the pace; weakened in the straight.
comment_ch: 跟前，直路乏力墮退

comment: Ridden to lead from the middle draw, obtained rails run     over 1200 metres out, led the field until faded over 200    metres out.
comment_ch: 自中檔出閘後受催策上前領先，千二米處移入內欄。領先至二百米處力竭。

comment: Shifted out and bumped soon after start, dropping to rear   along fence. Taken out and made ground turn, wide in        straight, boxed on fairly.
comment_ch: 出閘後不久向外斜跑，碰撞對手，墮居後列，走內欄。直路彎向外移出並追前。直路上走外疊，走勢普通。

comment: Urged to lead along the rail; fought on gamely for 2nd.
comment_ch: 搶欄帶放, 力拼第二

comment: Wide throughout; ran last.
comment_ch: 蝕位競走，包尾而回
owner: Peter Li Chak Ming, Ricky Wong Kin Chat, Tommy Wong Kwok Chuen & Shen Hing Sun

comment: Not quickened when asked in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路再騎，未見加速
owner: Willie Yiu Man Hung & Victor Yiu Wai Yin

comment: Made progress steadily; came from behind for 3rd.
comment_ch: 逐段加快, 後上第三

comment: Taken back and shifted to rail, settled to race behind      midfield about 7-1/2L behind, kept up until 250M only.
comment_ch: 移入內欄，留居中間之後位置，落後約七個半馬位。僅能保持走勢至二百五十米處。
owner: Cheung Kun Tong, Erick Cheung Ka Shing & Ryan Edward Tse

comment: Slightly slow to begin; ran on fairly well along the rail.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，沿欄追勢不弱

comment: Led evenly, couldn't sustain run entering straight, headed  inside 300M, weakened towards finish.
comment_ch: 以平穩步速領放，入直路時未能保持走勢。三百米處被超越，終點前轉弱。

comment: Moderately away, 2 away from the stands rail in midfield,   closed off well to get 2nd without threatening the winner.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居中間位置，走外欄第二疊。衝刺良佳，跑獲亞軍，未能威脅頭馬。
owner: Justin Yue Kwok Hung & Jeremy Yue Chun Hay

comment: Jumped OK, ridden forward settling 3L from leader in        one-off position. Closed in around turn, rolled forward     from 250m but run ended 50m from line.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策上前，落後領放馬三個馬位，走第二疊。直路彎追近，自二百五十米處起上前，但最後五十米無以為繼。

comment: Speedy start, sat close 2nd inside leader, ridden 400m &    took narrow lead 280m, all out & headed 120m, boxed on to   wire.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居領放馬內側接近的第二位。四百米處受催策。二百八十米處以短距離領先。全力以赴，一百二十米處被超越。力拼至終點。
owner: Peter Lam Kin Ngok & Stephen Ip Shu Kwan

comment: Brushed on jumping; on pace for 3rd.
comment_ch: 出閘挨碰，跟前入位

comment: Urged to lead early; kept on to score.
comment_ch: 早騎領放, 末段仲有

comment: Hit the line strongly when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段一騎，勁勢撲上

comment: Under a hold throughout; never tested.
comment_ch: 全程按實，未見真章

comment: Soon outpaced.
comment_ch: 瞬即被拋離。

comment: Made ground turning in; flattened late.
comment_ch: 轉彎湧一湧, 直路勁平

handicap_ch: 浪琴表國際騎師錦標賽（讓賽）－第二關
comment: Bumped start, pressed forward, taking box seat. Urged       closer around turn, hit front soon after straightening,     kept on well before swamped final stages.
comment_ch: 出閘時被碰撞，受催策上前，居包廂位置。直路彎受催策追前，入直路後瞬即取得領先，保持佳勢，末段被馬群超越。

handicap_ch: 日本中央競馬會錦標（讓賽）
