comment: Allowed to find own pace, settling four-back one-off back   stretch. Urged forward 500m, wide into straight, one-paced.
comment_ch: 獲許順其自然地競跑，對面直路上落後領放馬四個馬位，走第二疊。五百米處受催策上前，入直路時走外疊。保持同速。
owner: Dr Chang Fuk To & Maria Chang Lee Ming Shum

comment: At back, 2 wide, unleashed strong finishing efforts 300M    despite not suited by the slow pace.
comment_ch: 居後列，走第二疊。儘管慢步速不合發揮，但三百米處展開強勁衝刺。

comment: Hard ridden to keep up with the pace in midfield, 2 wide,   ran on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 受力策以跟上步速，居中間位置，走第二疊。以佳勢上前，取得亞軍。

comment: Flattened at turn; weakened badly and dropped back.
comment_ch: 彎位乏力, 急劇墮退

comment: Held up at the rear of main group, 5Ls to make up 400M,     went for gap inside and made sound progress final 300M,     went 2nd late stages.
comment_ch: 留居主馬群後列，四百米處落後五個馬位。在內疊取位，最後三百米以佳勢上前。末段取得亞軍。

comment: Under a restraint; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 按住跟跑，未見佳處

comment: Settled midfield 4-1/2L off the pace, 2 wide with cover.    Failed to respond when asked and was eased down after final 100M.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬四個半馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。在催策下未能作出反應，一百米處後收慢。

comment: Hard ridden to lead from a wide draw, crossing to fence     1000m. Set good pace to straight, kicked clear entering     straight, won with something in hand.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受力策，取得領先。一千米處移入內欄，直路前以快步速領放。入直路時加速帶離對手，勝來猶有餘力。

comment: Settled midfield and wide; kept on in the straight.
comment_ch: 蝕位居中, 直路保持走勢

comment: Led all the way; performed progressively.
comment_ch: 一氣呵成, 成熟再進

comment: Had a hold throughout; no room in straight.
comment_ch: 全程拖住, 直路受困

comment: Ridden forward and led by 2L, 2 wide without cover. Was up  with the pace until headed by the eventual winner at 200M.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，領先兩個馬位，在沒遮擋下走第二疊。追上領放馬，二百米處被頭馬超越。
owner: Dr Eric Li Ka Cheung, Omelia Li Kwan Chi Hing & Krizia Li Po Yee

comment: Hard ridden forward to take the lead along the fence,       fought on strongly to get 2nd, just beaten by a nose.
comment_ch: 受力策上前領先，走內欄。以勁勢力拼上前，取得亞軍，以一馬鼻位之差僅敗。

comment: First out, racing hard against the outside fence. Overtaken passing 400m but batted on gamely to hold down second spot.
comment_ch: 出閘最快，沿外欄力拼。跑過四百米處時被超越，但持續力拼，保住亞軍。
owner: Au Kai Kwong & Michelle Jessica Au

comment: OK away and cruised forward early to be slightly worse than midfield, 1 off the fence. Awkward on heels and lost some   momentum 700m. Never responded to pressure and only fair to the line.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，早段上前佔取中間稍後位置，走第二疊。七百米處靠近他駒後蹄處於窘境，略失步韻。從未對催策交出反應，僅能保持一般走勢至終點。
owner: Kwan Shiu Man & Jeffrey Kwan Chun Ming

comment: Made use of inside draw to hold rail position three back    from leader. Made progress around turn but found little     when popped the question final 400m.
comment_ch: 善用內檔之利，固守內欄 ，落後領放馬三個馬位。轉直路彎時上前，最後四百米受催策，但再無餘力。

comment: Not quickened when asked at turn.
comment_ch: 轉彎已騎, 無加速力

comment: Very slow to begin, and pushed up to sit forward of         midfield, on the fence. Only 1 paced in the straight, and   awkward on heels near the finish.
comment_ch: 出閘十分緩慢，受推策，居中間之前位置，走內欄。直路上僅能保持同速，接近終點時靠近對手後蹄處於窘境。
owner: Carter Mok Man Fung & Siemen Mok Tsoi Sin Man

comment: Travelled in midfield, 4-1/2L behind 2 wide, shifted wide   on straightening, kept on but couldn't match winner's       effort inside final 100M.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後四個半馬位，走第二疊。入直路時移出外疊。保持走勢，但最後一百米不敵頭馬。

comment: Never better than midfield, lost position into straight,    kept on at the finish.
comment_ch: 從未超越中間位置，入直路時失位。保持走勢過終點。

comment: Not willing to stretch; tailed off.
comment_ch: 不願展步, 包尾而回

handicap: POK FU LAM COUNTRY PARK HANDICAP
comment: Raced one-out ahead of midfield mostly to straight when put under pressure, making some progress to 200m before turning one-paced.
comment_ch: 直路前大部分途程居中間之前位置，走第二疊，直路上受催策。略為追前，二百米處保持同速。

comment: Raced wide in midfield without cover, kept on steadily      without quickening.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，走外疊，沒有遮擋。保持穩勢，未能加速。

comment: Niggled along to go forward; flattened late.
comment_ch: 騎住攞頭, 末段勁平

comment: Jumped well, settled in midfield one off the rails,         commenced run 3-wide rounding home bend, asserted authority passing the 200 metres.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居中間位置，走第二疊。直路彎開始上前，走第三疊。跑過二百米處時控制大局。
owner: Mok Kam Hung & Michael Mok Kwan Yuen

comment: Began fairly, taken in from outside draw, settling at rear  in one-off position. Shuffled back to last around turn,     plodded home.
comment_ch: 自第九檔出閘一般，其後向內移入。居後列，走第二疊。直路彎墮居包尾位置，直路上走勢疲弱。
owner: William Lee Ka Chung, Peter Ho Chiu Kee & Spencer Lee Ka Kit

comment: Under a restraint midfield; ran on well late.
comment_ch: 拖住居中，末段有追勢

comment: Broke ok to sit 1 off with cover midfield, raced keenly     under restraint, advanced a spot on turn, ridden 500m,      shadowed winner to go 2nd 110m, tapered last strides.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可。居中間位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。在約束下跑來搶口，直路彎略為上前。五百米處受催策。跟隨頭馬上前，一百一十米處進佔第二位。最後數步轉弱。

comment: Chased leaders along the inside, moved up to challenge      350M, contested the lead with eventual winner, fought on to the line but was always held.
comment_ch: 追迫領先馬匹，走內疊。三百五十米處上前挑戰，與頭馬爭奪領先。力拼至終點，但沿途不敵頭馬。

comment: Travelled at the rear, 4-3/4L behind along the rail, made   little ground only in the Straight.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後四又四分三個馬位，走內欄。直路上僅能略為追前。

comment: Raced tight shortly after start, got close to heels 1400m,  eased three-back, one-off. Shaken up 350m but took time to  wind up doing best final 100m.
comment_ch: 出閘後不久緊迫競跑。千四米處靠近他駒後蹄，收慢留居領放馬三個馬位之後的位置，走第二疊。三百五十米處受催策，但加速需時，最後一百米表現最佳。

comment: Sluggish break, pushed forward to fore of midfield 1 off    with cover, shifted out & ridden final turn, one-paced,     checked off heels 250m, tapered tamely.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，受推策上前，居中間之前位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。轉直路彎時受催策向外移出，保持同速。二百五十米處勒避他駒後蹄，乏力轉弱。
owner: Mr & Mrs Li Yiu Keung and Clement Li

comment: Led at start, headed 1500m & settled 1 back on rail, driven 400m & shifted out, quickened to press lead 150m, held &    peaked 100m, faded to wire.
comment_ch: 出閘後取得領先。千五米處被超越，落後領放馬一個馬位，走內欄。四百米處受催策，向外移出。一百五十米處加速追迫領放馬，但未能超越該駒，一百米處未能再增速。末段力竭。

comment: Hard ridden forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3-4   wide, reduced quickly 400M.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，落後步速甚快的領放馬一個半馬位，走第三至第四疊。四百米處迅速轉弱。

comment: Taken back from gate 8, raced at tail, bumped near 900M and eased shortly thereafter. (Lame left front.) (See Racing    Incidents.)
comment_ch: 自第八檔出閘後留居尾列。接近九百米處時碰撞他駒，其後不久收停。（左前腿不良於行。）（見競賽事件報告。）

comment: Eased back, 3-4 wide, pace good, no progress.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，走第三至第四疊。步速甚快，毫無進展。

comment: Showed early speed, raced closer to the middle of the       track, a length back without cover, finished off well to    get 2nd, just narrowly beaten by the winner.
comment_ch: 早段加速上前，在接近跑道中央競跑，落後一個馬位，沒有遮擋。末段衝刺甚佳，跑獲亞軍，僅以短距離之差敗於頭馬蹄下。
owner: Henry Chan Chi Chiu & Chan Chee Ling

comment: Found nothing when being hard ridden in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路力推, 毫無進展
owner: James Lau Chi Wing, Lau Kai Tai & Michelle Lau Wing Sheung

comment: Good break, settled 4th 1 off with cover, shaken up in 3rd  430m, no extra & swamped 100m, tapered to wire.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，居第四位，走第二疊，有遮擋。四百三十米處居第三位，受催策。一百米處再無餘力，被後上馬群超越，終點前轉弱。

comment: Jumped on terms from 11 and crossed to a 2-wide spot in     midfield, 3Ls off leader at 600M in a slowly run race, kept responding to pressure from 300M, did best work late and    just failed to nail the winner.
comment_ch: 自第十一檔與對手同步出閘，切入第二疊，居中間位置，六百米處落後領放馬三個馬位。步速緩慢，自三百米處起持續對催策有反應。末段表現最佳，僅以短距離之差不敵頭馬。

comment: Over-raced early; failed to quicken.
comment_ch: 早段搶口, 久貫注力
owner: Mr & Mrs Sebastian Man Shiu Wai

comment: Slightly slow to muster, posted 3 deep no cover beyond      midfield, up to midfield spot 500m, widest into straight &  ridden, no threat.
comment_ch: 加速稍慢，居中間之後位置，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。五百米處追前至中間位置，入直路時走大外疊，受催策，未能構成威脅。

handicap: THE BOCHK WEALTH MANAGEMENT JOCKEY CLUB SPRINT
handicap_ch: 中銀理財馬會短途錦標
comment: Chased leaders in a strongly run race, responded well when  driven out 350M, led 200M, did enough to hold off late      challenge from LUCKY BUBBLES.
comment_ch: 在快步速下追趕領先馬匹。三百五十米處受力策，反應良佳。二百米處取得領先。末段力拒「幸運如意」的挑戰。

comment: On-pace early; flattened late to run 3rd.
comment_ch: 跟前入位, 但拉士力度已減

comment: At rear throughout, never looked competitive.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列，從未看似有力一爭。
owner: Eddie Chow Bing Chung, Ivan Chow Ping Kin & Enrico Chow Yue Hin

comment: Slow into stride, dropping to last, then shifted across     behind running to fence. Made up some ground around turn    but found little in straight under hard riding.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，墮居包尾位置。其後在馬群之後切入內欄。直路彎略為追前。直路上受力策，但再無餘力。

comment: Jumped away well; kept on well to score.
comment_ch: 應聲彈出，貫注到底

comment: Slow into stride and clear last on settling. Switched out   wide in straight to make run but only one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，遙遙包尾。直路上移出外疊取位，但僅能保持同速。
owner: Peter Li Chak Ming, Ricky Wong Kin Chat, Tommy Wong Kwok Chuen & Shen Hing Sun

comment: Lost both front plates early and was stuck midfield 6 wide  early, after not being able to muster speed from the wide   draw. Didn't respond in the straight and only went to the   line fairly. Jockey stated didn't handle track.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘後未能加速，早段失去一對前蹄的蹄鐵，居中間位置，走第六疊。直路上受催策但沒有反應，奔向終點時走勢僅屬普通。騎師指該駒未能應付跑道狀況。

comment: Slow start, raced rail near rear, shifted out turning in,   crowded & checked 300m, driven 250m, kept on for limited    late inroads.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居後列，走內欄。入直路時移向外疊，三百米處受擠迫及勒避，二百五十米處受催策。保持走勢，末段略為上前。

comment: Under restraint midfield; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 按住居中, 未見真章
owner: Mr & Mrs Allen Shi Lop Tak and Kenneth Shi Ho Ming

comment: Smart start, tracked pace mid pack, niggled 400m, driven    260m, outpaced & kept on evenly.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，跟隨領放馬，居中間位置。四百米處受催策。二百六十米處受催策，但被拋離，保持同速。
owner: Lam Ngai Fung & Thomas Poon Ho Wing

comment: Speed to lead on rail, headed 770m & shuffled 1 back 700m,  shifted 1 off no cover 520m, driven 400m, found nil & faded out.
comment_ch: 沿欄迅速上前領先，七百七十米處被超越，七百米處落後一個馬位。五百二十米處走第二疊，沒有遮擋。四百米處受催策，再無餘力，末段力竭。

comment: Soon taken back from a wide gate, trailed the field to      straight, finished off race well near the centre of the     track.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，瞬即留後，直路前跟隨馬群。直路上在接近跑道中央衝刺良佳。

comment: Raced awkwardly at turn; faded in the straight.
comment_ch: 彎位欠順, 直路墮退

comment: Jumped poorly and pushed forward early, eventually settling worse than midfield closest to rail. Travelled well until   the turn, but never responded to pressure and ran to the    line 1 paced late.
comment_ch: 出閘差劣。早段受推策上前，居中間之後位置，貼近內欄競跑。直路彎前走勢良佳，但其後從未對催策交出反應，末段保持同速。

comment: Camped handy, travelled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, benefited by the very slow sectionals, kept on one pace to  the line.
comment_ch: 居前列，落後領放馬三個馬位，走內欄。步速十分緩慢有利發揮，保持同速至終點。
owner: Lee Yue Chuen, Lee Cheung Wai Mi & Eric Lee Sai Kit

comment: Urged to lead along the rail; kept on for 2nd.
comment_ch: 貼欄搶放，走勢持續

comment: Travelled in midfield, 4-1/2L off the pace 2 wide after     taking cover near 700M, did not improve in the straight.
comment_ch: 接近七百米處時取得遮擋，其後居中間位置，落後領放馬四個半馬位，走第二疊。直路上未能推進。
owner: Shum Mak Ling, Hsu Wei Hsuan, Arthur Chiu Wing Hong & Gary Cheung Hang Ngai

comment: Niggled at early, improved along rails to soon reach 2L 5th but hampered and lost position 800 metres out, faded under  pressure after straightening.
comment_ch: 早段受催策，沿欄上前，瞬即進佔第五位，落後兩個馬位。八百米處受阻及失位。入直路後在催策下力竭。
owner: Mr & Mrs Francis Lee Bing Kwong, Yves Lee Kun Fun and Richard Lo Yuen Kin

comment: At rear along the rail; made progress in the Straight.
comment_ch: 沿欄居後, 直路有追勢

comment: Bumped start & nudged along, recovered to sit 1 back on     rail, niggled 500m, hard-driven 350m, kept on same speed    until tapered final 100m.
comment_ch: 出閘時受碰撞，受催策。恢復走勢上前，落後一個馬位，走內欄。五百米處受催策，三百五十米處受力策。保持同速，最後一百米轉弱。

comment: Sent forward to lead, under pressure home turn and weakened out of it.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，取得領先。轉直路彎時受催策，但轉弱。

comment: Moderately away, raced in 3rd, 5 lengths or so back on      turn, kept on well in straight, took the lead near 200M,    held off late challenges to score narrowly.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居第三位。轉彎時落後約五個馬位。直路上保持佳勢。接近二百米處時取得領先，末段壓倒對手的挑戰，以短距離之先險勝。

comment: Began fairly, outpaced, settling at rear along fence.       Switched out turning for home but found little under        pressure.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，被拋離，居後列，走內欄。入直路時移向外疊，但在催策下再無餘力。

comment: Wide throughout; made minor inroads in the Straight.
comment_ch: 沿途外疊，直路稍追

comment: Jumped away well; made progress when asked late.
comment_ch: 起步敏捷，拉士推騎上前
owner: Dr Edward Cheung Wing Yui, Lam Man Chun & Jason Tam Siu Keung

comment: Sent forward to take the rail and led by 1/2L, held lead    until headed approaching 200M, kept on thereafter to finish 2nd.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，領先半個馬位，走內欄。保持領先，趨近二百米處被超越。其後保持走勢，取得亞軍。

comment: Midfield, not suited by the slow pace, just held ground in  final stages.
comment_ch: 居中間位置。步速緩慢，不合發揮。末段僅能保持位置。
owner: Yu Pang Chun & Yu Kwok Chun

comment: Responded well when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段輕騎, 反應甚佳

comment: Began well, ridden forward in one-off position 3L from      leader. Urged forward top of straight and ran on steadily.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前，落後領放馬三個馬位，走第二疊。直路初受催策上前，走勢平穩。

comment: Restrained early; quickened well in straight.
comment_ch: 早段拖住，直路有追勢
owner: Lincoln Ling & Fione Yip Sze Pui

comment: Under restraint early; limited response when under whip at 200m.
comment_ch: 早段撐實，二百開鞭，反應一般
owner: James Lau Po Man & Alice Woo Wai See

comment: Crowded on jumping; made progress in the Straight.
comment_ch: 起步擠迫，直路追勢不差

comment: Moderately away from a wide draw, raced 2 wide, 5 lengths   or so back in 9th, same position on turn, finished off well in straight to get 2nd without threatening the winner. (See Racing Incidents.)
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘普通，居第九位，落後約五個馬位，走第二疊。直路彎居相同位置。直路上衝刺甚佳，跑獲亞軍，但未能威脅頭馬。（見競賽事件報告。）

comment: Under a hold throughout; hit the line strongly for 3rd.
comment_ch: 全程拉到實，走勢洶湧
owner: Mr & Mrs Victor Lui Ting and Ian Lui

comment: Midfield with cover, 2 wide, made steady ground 300M to     score.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。三百米處逐漸上前，勝出賽事。

comment: Not much early pace, settling behind midfield along rail.   Took closer order around turn, ran on fairly between horses in straight.
comment_ch: 缺乏前速，居中間之後位置，走內欄。直路彎追前，直路上在馬匹之間走勢普通。
owner: Civic Chan Sin Wik & Chu Po Yi

comment: Raced in midfield, 3L behind the leader 2 wide with cover,  hampered at 150M, made some ground thereafter.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬三個馬位，在有遮擋下走第二疊。一百五十米處受阻礙，其後略為追前。

handicap_ch: 新加坡賽馬公會錦標（讓賽）
comment: Rolled forward and led on the fence until 800M, gave ground thereafter and never recovered.
comment_ch: 沿欄上前領放至八百米處，其後墮退，從未能恢復走勢。
owner: The Hon & Mrs Kenneth Lau Ip Keung

comment: Being pushed forward; flattened late.
comment_ch: 俾住跟前，拉士勁平

comment: At rear, 5Ls the leader in the middle of the track, ran on  steadily for 4th without serious threats.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬五個馬位，在跑道中央競跑。穩步上前，跑獲殿軍，但未能構成真正威脅。

comment: Wide throughout; made minor progress late.
comment_ch: 全程外疊，拉士稍追

comment: Pushed early, suited by the fast tempo, behind midfield     along the fence, never improved.
comment_ch: 早段受推策，快步速適合發揮，居中間之後位置，走內欄。從未能上前。

comment: Began well, quickly taken to rail to hold box seat. Shifted out 500m and bumped, kept on fairly in straight before      tiring final stages.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，迅速移入內欄，居包廂位置。五百米處向外斜跑，碰撞對手。直路上保持一般走勢。末段漸呈疲態。

comment: Wide throughout; ran comfortably for 3rd.
comment_ch: 全程外疊，輕易入位

comment: Pushed forward, just off the leaders 2 wide, ran on well    for 2nd.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，居領先馬匹稍後位置，走第二疊。走勢良佳，取得亞軍。
owner: Peter P C Fan, Montgomery Ho Shun Wah & Dr Michael Mok Hing Hung

comment: Jumped OK but threw head about when restrained and shifted  across behind runners. Came off fence turning for home and  ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，在受約束時擺動頭部，在馬群之後切人內欄。轉直路彎時移離內欄，走勢一般。

comment: Flattened halfway; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 半程洩氣，未見佳處

comment: Flattened halfway; racing backwards.
comment_ch: 半程洩氣, 乏力墮退

comment: Always in touch; ran on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 有前有後，大步肯走

comment: Began well, ridden to hold forward position 3L behind       leading trio. Switched in 450m to move forward, joint       leader 200m, battled on gamely, losing in final strides.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策保持前列位置，落後領放三駒三個馬位。四百五十米處向內移入，發力上前。二百米處並排領先。以勁勢力拼，最後數步落敗。

comment: Rearward early under restraint; made limited ground in straight.
comment_ch: 拖住居後, 直路稍近

comment: On-pace early; hit the line strongly to score.
comment_ch: 透出取勝，愈走愈勁

comment: Hard ridden to take narrow lead on settling but kept away   from rail by inside runner. Under pressure early straight   gave ground from 300m. Unacceptable performance.
comment_ch: 受力策，以短距離領先，但受內側馬匹阻礙而離欄競跑。直路初受催策，自三百米處起墮退。（表現難以接受。）

comment: On pace early; not stretching out properly in the Straight.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢，直路騎落欠規矩

comment: Bustled along early on jumping from 11, sat one out one     back, kept up the chase on leader throughout in the         straight but was always held, lost 2 placings to 5th inside 50M.
comment_ch: 自第十一檔出閘後於早段受催策，居第二疊第二位。直路上沿途追趕領放馬但未能追及，最後五十米失去兩個席位，跑獲第五。
owner: Kwan Shiu Man & Jessica Kwan Mun Hang

comment: Eased to sit in midfield, trapped 3 wide throughout,        reduced quickly 400M.
comment_ch: 收慢留居中間位置，沿途走第三疊。四百米處迅速轉弱。

comment: Always in touch and won; moved better than before.
comment_ch: 前後俱備, 更進一步
owner: Conrad Fung Kwok Keung, Chris Fung Kwok Hung & The Executors of the Estate of the late Fung Cheung

handicap: THE EBENEZER SCHOOL & HOME FOR THE VISUALLY IMPAIRED 120TH ANNIVERSARY CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 心光盲人院暨學校１２０週年紀念盃（讓賽）
comment: Pushed to go forward, lay out 1000m when racing greenly,    continued hanging out when racing wide without cover  must trial.
comment_ch: 受推策上前。一千米處走勢稚嫩及外閃。在沒遮擋下走外疊，持續外閃。必須試閘及格後才可再次出賽。

handicap_ch: 浪琴表國際騎師錦標賽（讓賽）－第四關
comment: In 4th position, 4Ls to make up on runaway leader at 400M,  tried hard but effort leveled off passing 150M.
comment_ch: 居第四位。四百米處落後遙遙領先的領放馬四個馬位。力拼，但跑過一百五十米處時走勢平平。

comment: Among fastest to begin, pushed early but couldn't cross to  lead, eased to settle fore of midfield 3 deep & overracing, ridden 600m, came into race strongly at 250m, narrow lead   170m, just outbobbed.
comment_ch: 出閘最快，早段受推策，但未能切入內疊領先，收慢留居中間之前位置，走第三疊，跑來搶口。六百米處受催策，二百五十米處走勢強勁。一百七十米處以短距離領先，在叮噹馬頭爭逐下僅敗。
owner: Henry Chan Chi Chiu & Chan Chee Ling

comment: Eased at start, took cover at rear, 8Ls off the leader 2    wide, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
comment_ch: 出閘後收慢，取得遮擋，居後列，落後領放馬八個馬位，走第二疊。步速緩慢，不利發揮，毫無進展。
owner: James Ngai & Joseph Hui Ying Biu

comment: Ran on fairly well when asked late.
comment_ch: 拉士稍騎, 追勢不俗
owner: Kevin Kwong Ka Wing, Chan Bing Woon, Kwong Wai Bong & Michelle Chan Sin Man

comment: Made progress when asked; moved better than before.
comment_ch: 推騎追趕, 走勢有進

comment: Ridden halfway; ran on ok.
comment_ch: 半程已騎，幾肯追馬

comment: Pushed forward to take the fence and led at fast tempo,     kept on until weakened final 150M.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，移入內欄，以快步速領放。保持走勢，最後一百五十米轉弱。
owner: Kwan Shiu Man & Jessica Kwan Mun Hang

comment: Got off well, taken to rail, settling 3-back entering back  stretch. Got inside run in straight, hit front 150m, unable match winner final strides.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，移入內欄。進入對面直路時落後三個馬位。直路上走內疊，一百五十米處取得領先，最後數步不敵頭馬。

comment: Caught wide early from 12 before slotting into a 2-wide     position behind midfield, 5Ls off the pace 400M, responded  when put to task, couldn't match winner's finishing kick    but stayed on well for clear 2nd.
comment_ch: 自第十二檔出閘，早段走外疊。四百米處居中間之後位置，落後領放馬五個馬位，走第二疊。在催策下交出反應，雖不敵頭馬的末段衝刺，但保持佳勢，帶離對手，取得亞軍。

comment: Only fairly away before pushing forward to settle midfield, on the fence. Well placed on the turn, and ran strongly to  the line without a big kick.
comment_ch: 出閘僅屬普通，受推策上前，居中間位置，走內欄。直路彎居好位，衝刺強勁，但未能大幅加速。

comment: Asked momentarily at 200m; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 二百騎咗兩步，見好即收
owner: Mr & Mrs Lee Bing Kwong and Michael Lee Chak Hol

comment: Jumped OK, outpaced and soon at rear along rail. Shifted    out around turn but made little headway, dropping back to   last entering straight. Never competitive.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可。被拋離，瞬即居後列，沿欄競跑。直路彎移出外疊，略為追前。入直路時墮居包尾位置，從未見具競爭力。
owner: Michael Lam King Poy, Ernest Lam Jen Ho & Christopher Lam Jen Toa

comment: Even break, natural speed to settle handy, niggled 750m,    settled 4th on rail, asked for full effort 310m, hit lead   120m, just run down late.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，迅速佔取前列位置，七百五十米處受催策，居第四位，走內欄。三百一十米處受催策，全力以赴，一百二十米處取得領先，僅於末段被超越。

comment: Cruised forward from the wide draw to sit midfield, 1 off   the fence. Came wider on the turn, and ran on solidly.      Kicked late and was closing the margin on the winner, with  the fastest final sectional.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，上前居中間位置，走第二疊。直路彎走更外疊，穩步上前。末段加速，追近頭馬，終點前走勢最勁。

handicap: LEI YUE MUN PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 鯉魚門公眾騎術學校讓賽
comment: Began well, eased to sit just behind speed centre track,    dropped out from 600m.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，收慢留居領放馬稍後位置，在跑道中央競跑。自六百米處起墮退。

comment: Ran on ordinary when asked at turn.
comment_ch: 轉彎已騎, 走勢一般

comment: Restrained shortly after start and shifted across behind    runners, settling last but away from fence. Taken to centre track on straightening and finished off nicely.
comment_ch: 起步後不久受約束，在馬群之後切入內疊。居包尾位置，離欄競跑。入直路時移至跑道中央，衝刺良佳。
owner: Susan Wong Suk Ching, Ginny Man Wing Yee & Cheng Tsz Bong

comment: Hard ridden to hold the rail in front of midfield, not      suited by the slow pace, just held ground.
comment_ch: 受力策居中間之前位置，固守內欄。步速緩慢，不合發揮。僅能保持位置。

comment: Up with the pace; ran on comfortably for 3rd.
comment_ch: 跟放入位, 表現從容

comment: Pressed forward from outside draw but held wide in midfield without cover. Covered extra ground turn, still wide in     straight, tired quickly.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘，受催策上前，居中間位置，走外疊，沒有遮擋。轉彎時多走腳程。直路上仍走外疊，迅速呈現疲態。

comment: Pushed to sit in front of midfield, 2 wide, not suited by   the fast tempo, flattened in straight.
comment_ch: 受推策居中間之前位置，走第二疊，快步速不合發揮。直路上洩氣。

comment: Eased to rear, took rail, 7Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok in final stages.
comment_ch: 收慢，居後列，移入內欄，落後領放馬七個馬位。慢步速不利發揮。末段保持普通走勢。

comment: Aggressively ridden and given reminders but didn't muster   and eased back passing 1000m. Well back thereafter and      never competitive.
comment_ch: 受力策及鞭策但未能加速，跑過一千米處時收慢，大幅留後，從未有力爭勝。
owner: Lun Kwok Wai, Alan Lun Yue Hang & Ng Kam Kwan

comment: Settled midfield along the rail; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 貼欄居中, 走勢欠勁
owner: Mr & Mrs Peter P C Fan

comment: Slow to begin; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 起步最慢，走勢生硬
owner: Billy Chan Wing Kwong & Billy Chan Chun Kit

comment: Not quickened when being niggled throughout.
comment_ch: 沿途俾住, 未見加速

comment: No daylight in the Straight; not properly tested.
comment_ch: 直路受困，未有騎過

comment: Eased forward early to take a position at the rear of the   field, on the rail. Pushed forward to be midfield by 800,   before being bumped and losing some ground at 700m. Came    off heels 250m, and solid to the line late.
comment_ch: 早段上前，居馬群後列，走內欄。受推策上前，八百米處居中間位置。七百米處受碰撞，略為失地。二百五十米處避開他駒後蹄，末段衝刺不俗。
owner: Lillian Lee Lai Man & Kenny Tse Chiu Ping

comment: Slow to begin; ran on ordinary when asked at 300m.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 三百稍騎, 走勢一般

comment: Began fairly, ridden along down centre track 4L from        leader. Switched in passing 300m and ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，落後領放馬四個馬位，在跑道中央競跑。跑過三百米處時向內移入，走勢普通。

comment: Briefly crowded on jumping and awkward on heels early       before finding a position midfield early. Checked out of    run at 700m and dropped back. Took the shortcut along the   rails turning for home, but didn't kick in the straight.
comment_ch: 出閘時一度受擠迫，早段靠近他駒後蹄處於窘境，其後居中間位置。七百米處勒避他駒後蹄及墮退。轉直路彎時走內欄節省腳程，但直路上未能展開衝刺。

handicap_ch: 浪琴表國際騎師錦標賽（讓賽）－第二關
comment: Began well, urged forward one-back, one-off. Rolled forward entering straight to look a chance 200m before turning      one-paced and checked 100m.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，受催策上前，落後一個馬位，走第二疊。入直路時上前，二百米處看似有力爭勝，其後保持同速，一百米處勒避。

comment: Wide throughout; made minor inroads when asked.
comment_ch: 沿途蝕位，騎住稍追
owner: Peter Li Chak Ming, Ricky Wong Kin Chat, Tommy Wong Kwok Chuen & Shen Hing Sun

comment: Slow to begin; found nothing when asked.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，騎都唔郁

comment: Slightly slow out, soon picked up to forward of midfield on rails sharing 5th some 3L back around home bend, angled off rails to challenge entering straight, ran home one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘稍慢，瞬即加速，進佔中間之前位置，走內欄。轉直路彎時並列第五位，落後約三個馬位。入直路時移離內欄展開挑戰，末段保持同速。

comment: Jumped well, gradually settled in better than midfield on   rails, quickened well under pressure to assert authority    100 metres out.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，逐漸留居中間之前位置，走內欄。在催策下加速甚勁，一百米處控制大局。

comment: Shifted across behind runners soon after start, settling    towards rear on one-off position. Hard ridden in straight   but made little impression.
comment_ch: 出閘後瞬即在馬群之後切入第二疊，居後列。直路上受力策，但無甚表現。

comment: Taken back to rear, travelled 11Ls behind the leader on the fence, swung widest turning in, harmed by the very slow     pace, ran on nicely.
comment_ch: 留居後列，落後領放馬十一個馬位，走內欄。入直路時移出最外疊。步速十分緩慢，不利發揮，但衝刺良佳。
owner: Jimmy Chung Kwok Man & Dominic Chung Won Lok

comment: Raced at rear; never in contention.
comment_ch: 遠遠墮後，遠離水準

comment: Shared lead early; kept on late.
comment_ch: 扣實鬥放, 末段仲有

comment: Came from behind to score when asked late.
comment_ch: 拉士推騎, 後上取勝

comment: Prominent, however trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, kept on one pace until final 200M weakened.
comment_ch: 居前列位置，沿途走第三疊，沒有遮擋。保持同速，最後二百米轉弱。

comment: Jumped with field, not pressed, settling along rail 4-back  from leader. Improved position turning for home but only    one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘。未受催策，落後領放馬四個馬位，沿欄競跑。直路彎上前，直路上僅能保持同速。

comment: Up with the pace; being hard ridden for 2nd.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑, 力騎到底

comment: Raced inside; ran on only fairly.
comment_ch: 慳位上前, 走勢一般
owner: Philip Ma King Huen & Bankee Kwan Pak Hoo

comment: Eased to settle worse than midfield, 5Ls behind the leader  2-3 wide with cover, never ran on.
comment_ch: 收慢留居中間之後位置，落後領放馬五個馬位，走第二至第三疊，有遮擋。從未能上前。
owner: 07/08 Me Tsui Yu Sak Trainer Syndicate

comment: First to jump; impressive run.
comment_ch: 出閘最快, 走勢悅目
owner: Dr Edward Cheung Wing Yui, Lam Man Chun & Jason Tam Siu Keung

comment: Jumped with field but outpaced, settling behind midfield    along rail. Improved turning for home but no clear run up   the straight and not properly tested concluding stages.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，但前速不及對手，居中間之後位置，沿欄競跑。直路彎上前，但直路上未能望空。末段未能全力發揮。

comment: Settled midfield; ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 居中跟跑, 不過不失

comment: Quickened well without being asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路無騎, 自動湧上

comment: Rolled forward to occupy the box seat, benefited by the     slow tempo, ran on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 上前佔取包廂位置。慢步速有利發揮。以佳勢上前，取得亞軍。
owner: Amy Li Chi Lin, April Tsui Siu Yee & Ben Tsui Siu Lun

comment: Towards the rear 5Ls back, travelled keenly after 1400M,    ran on final 400M without threat to leaders.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後五個馬位。過了千四米處後搶口。最後四百米保持走勢，未能對領先馬匹構成威脅。

comment: Began OK, not pushed and taken to fence four-back from      leader. Switched out for clear run top of straight and ran  on fairly.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可。未受推策，其後移入內欄，落後領放馬四個馬位。直路早段移出外疊以望空，但走勢一般。

comment: On pace early; ran on for 4th when asked late.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，拉士要騎

comment: Broke well, pressed forward from wide draw but left 3-wide  passing 1000m. Came off bridle passing 400m and gave ground steadily. Not ridden out. Unacceptable performance.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘迅速，受催策上前，跑過一千米處時走第三疊。跑過四百米處時脫口，逐漸墮退。未受力策。表現難以接受。

comment: Did not find the early speed to lead, settled on the        outside of field chasing leaders, found little under        pressure over final 400M, never involved. (No Vet findings.)
comment_ch: 缺乏前速，未能帶頭，居馬群外側，追趕領先馬匹。最後四百米受催策，但再無餘力。從未參與競逐。（賽後接受獸醫檢查，並無發現任何明顯異常之處）
owner: Mr & Mrs Colin Lo Chor Cheong

comment: Began well, driven forward to sit outside hind-quarters of  leader to straight. Under pressure from 300m and faded.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前，直路前居領放馬外側位置，落後半個馬位。自三百米處起受催策，但力竭。

comment: Clumsy at turn; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 轉彎論盡, 走勢稚嫩

comment: Limited response when being hard ridden.
comment_ch: 大力推騎, 反應一般
owner: Ricky Wong Kin Chat & Helen Leung Yee Wan

comment: Bumped and unbalanced at start but pressed forward racing   3-wide to turn. Got shuffled back turning for home and      one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 起步時被碰撞，失去平衡，但直路彎前受催策上前，走第三疊。轉直路彎時墮退。直路上保持同速。

comment: Slow start, bustled to settle rail back of midfield, driven final turn & shifted out, stayed on for minor headway.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢。受催策，居中間之後位置，走內欄。直路彎受催策，向外移出。保持走勢，略為追前。

comment: Wide throughout; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 全程外疊，未有好感

comment: Began well but not pressured, settling between horses 3L    from leader. Ran on steadily in straight without looking    dangerous.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，未受催策，落後領放馬三個馬位，在馬匹之間競跑。直路上走勢平穩，未能構成威脅。

comment: Ran on for 3rd under a hold; performed progressively.
comment_ch: 按住第三，表現進步

comment: Broke well from a poor gate, travelled very wide in         midfield far side, taken back towards the rear for cover    rounding home bend, produced good late impression past      beaten horses closing stages.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘迅速，對面直路上居中間位置，走大外疊。轉直路彎時留居後列以取得遮擋，末段追前甚多，超越數匹已洩氣的對手。
owner: Steven Chan Sheung Chi & Kenneth Chan Sheung Yan

comment: Bounced well, pressed forward settling 3L behind the pace   one-away from outer fence. Shaken up passing 400m but only  one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前，落後領放馬三個馬位，走外欄第二疊。跑過四百米處時受催策，但僅能保持同速。

comment: Hard ridden forward, parked just off the leader 2 wide,     harmed by the fast pace, weakened 250M.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，居領放馬稍後位置，走第二疊。快步速不利發揮。二百五十米處轉弱。

comment: Settled one-out-one-back, kept on steadily under pressure   without quickening the length of straight.
comment_ch: 落後領放馬一個馬位，走第二疊。直路上在催策下保持穩定走勢，但未能加速。

comment: Pushed forward to take the rail and led by 1L, kept on      gamely to the finish.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，移入內欄，領先一個馬位。保持勁勢至終點。
owner: Dr Philip Ho Kin Hoi, Dr Ernest Yau Hok Shing & Dr Joseph Pang Yeuk She

comment: Taken back early; came home strong under a hold.
comment_ch: 起步稍留，按住湧上

comment: Always at the back, never in contention.
comment_ch: 一直居後列，從無爭勝機會。

comment: Jumped OK, ridden by didn't muster, dropping to rear. Began forward move passing 800m, 4-wide around turn, even wider   in straight, ground home for narrow win.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策，但未能加速，墮居後列。跑過八百米處時開始發力上前，轉直路彎時走第四疊。直路上走更外疊，奮力衝刺，以短距離之先勝出。

comment: Led early; kept on for 3rd in a less competitive field.
comment_ch: 快放第三, 對手太弱
owner: Charmaine Wong Kam Mei & Chan Fu Ho

comment: Responded ok when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段要騎，反應不俗
owner: Michael Lau Chor Chiu & Steve Lau Tsz Chung

comment: Always at rear; not suited by the distance.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑，路程不合

comment: Close up early, gradually shuffled back to midfield on      rails, lost further ground after straightening.
comment_ch: 早段上前，其後沿欄逐漸墮退至中間位置，入直路後失地更多。
owner: Choi Wong Ling Ling, Choi Kam Shan & Choi Yun Chor

comment: Restrained on jumping from wide barrier, guide to the fence 5-6Ls back, kept on fairly entering straight and never      seriously threatened.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受約束，移入內欄，落後五至六個馬位。入直路時保持普通走勢，從未能構成真正威脅。

comment: Broke ok & rousted a touch, rolled to lead 1400m, keen      1300m & crossed to rail, continued to over-race until       settled on turn, shaken up 420m, headed 260m & tapered.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可。略受催策，千四米處上前領先。千三米處搶口，切入內欄。持續搶口，直至直路彎始能穩定走勢。四百二十米處受催策。二百六十米處被超越，繼而轉弱。

comment: Settled at rear; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑，走勢生硬

comment: Settled at rear; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑，走勢平常

comment: Ridden halfway; struggled for 3rd.
comment_ch: 半程已騎，走勢牽強

comment: Front rank initially, snagged 1420m to fore of midfield 1   off with cover, switched out 820m to chase winner, to 2nd   650m, hard driven on turn, 1.5L down into stretch, tapered  final 100m, lost 2nd late.
comment_ch: 初時居前列位置，一千四百二十米處留居中間之前位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。八百二十米處移出外疊，追趕頭馬，六百五十米處進佔第二位。直路彎受力策，入直路時落後一個半馬位，最後一百米轉弱，末段失去亞席。

comment: Raced under his own steam; never tested.
comment_ch: 全程跟跑, 未受考驗

comment: Settled worse than midfield about 4Ls off the leader on the fence, ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬約四個馬位，沿欄競跑。走勢一般。

comment: Made ground steadily to run 3rd.
comment_ch: 分段加快，闖入一席

comment: Urged to lead early; flattened late.
comment_ch: 搶放兩段，拉士減弱
owner: Cris Ng Ka Shuen & Gregory James Holmes

comment: Going backwards when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段有騎, 不進反退

comment: Tightened shortly after start, then proved hard to settle   to turn. Shifted out 400m to get run but had to switch in   200m, ran on well.
comment_ch: 起步後不久受緊迫，直路彎前難以穩定走勢。四百米處移出外疊取位，二百米處向內移入。衝刺良佳。

comment: Dropped back from wide gate, raced rail near tail, checked  off heels 570m, driven into stretch, bumped rival 350m,     plugged on one pace.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後墮後，沿欄居接近包尾位置。五百七十米處勒避他駒後蹄。入直路時受催策。三百五十米處碰撞對手。保持同速。

handicap_ch: 賽馬天下四十週年紀念盃（讓賽）
comment: Ridden forward and sat outside the leader, ran on nicely    and held off late challenge to score.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，居領放馬外側。以佳勢上前，末段力抗對手來犯掄元。

comment: Taken back, soon driven along 2nd last, worked to join pack 700m, last 450m & adrift turning in, eased down.
comment_ch: 留居尾二位置，瞬即受催策。七百米處受催策跟上馬群。四百五十米處居包尾位置。入直路時被拋離，收慢。

comment: On-pace early; ran on comfortably for 3rd.
comment_ch: 跟前入位，姿態從容

comment: Blundered badly on jumping, with jockey badly unbalanced.   Managed to get forward to be 2nd, but never better than 3   wide with no cover. Race was run by the turn, and faded out quickly in the straight.
comment_ch: 出閘時嚴重失蹄，騎師嚴重失去平衡。其後上前至第二位，但走第三疊或更外疊，沒遮擋。轉直路彎時敗局已定。直路上迅速力竭。

comment: Ridden coming down the Rock; ran on well wide.
comment_ch: 落山已騎, 蝕位仍近

comment: Quickened going up the Rock; hit the line strongly to score.
comment_ch: 上山發力，愈追愈勁

comment: Very slow away, never competitive.
comment_ch: 出閘十分緩慢，從未有力一爭。

comment: On pace early; failed to give response.
comment_ch: 沿欄跟前, 走勢欠順

comment: Up with the pace; flattened late.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢，末段轉弱
owner: Cheung Kun Tong, Erick Cheung Ka Shing & Ryan Edward Tse

comment: Niggled throughout; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 沿途俾住，走勢欠勁

comment: Jumped ok; raced midfield without being asked.
comment_ch: 起步唔慢，按住居中
owner: Samuel Wu Sheung Shau, Jonathan Cheng Shing Hey & Michael Chan Ting Bond

handicap: CHEVALIER COLD STORAGE AND LOGISTICS HANDICAP
comment: In front of midfield, not suited by the slow tempo, just    held ground.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置。步速緩慢，不合發揮。僅能保持位置。

comment: Not quickened when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段稍騎，無加速力

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY PT GRACEFUL COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶娉婷系列讓賽
comment: Started well & handy initrially, soon snagged to midfield 3 wide with cover, driven into stretch, quickened to lead     200m & drew clear.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，早段居前列位置，瞬即留居中間位置，走第三疊，有遮擋。受催策入直路，加速上前，二百米處取得領先，帶離勝出。
owner: Evelyn Cheng Wei Kwan & Jacky Ho Fai Keung

comment: Ran on fairly well for 4th when under whip late.
comment_ch: 拉士開鞭, 追勢不差

comment: Inconvenienced start, shifted across behind horses to outer fence, checked 500m when making ground, shifted in 200m to  get run, one paced.
comment_ch: 出閘時受妨礙，在馬群之後切出外欄。五百米處上前時勒避，二百米處移向內疊以取位上前，保持同速。
owner: The Hon Ronald Arculli GBM GBS JP & Johanna K J Arculli BBS

comment: Four wide at turn; flattened late.
comment_ch: 四疊轉彎，末段勁平

comment: Eased back to find a cover early, travelled 2Ls behind the  leader in a small field, harmed by the slow pace, ran on    steadily to the line in a compact finish.
comment_ch: 早段收慢留後以取得遮擋，落後領放馬兩個馬位。步速緩慢，不利發揮。保持穩勢至終點，與多駒幾乎一齊衝線。

comment: Began well, settled just off the speed on rails, remained   similar into straight, kept on without quickening under     pressure.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居領放馬稍後位置，走內欄。入直路時仍居相若位置。在催策下保持走勢，未能加速。

comment: Hard ridden to hold position but tightened approaching      1000m. Turned wide, gave ground from 200m. Substantial      amount of mucus in trachea.
comment_ch: 受力策保持位置，但趨近一千米處時受緊迫。轉彎時走外疊。自二百米處起墮退。氣管內有大量膿痰。
owner: Mr & Mrs Matthew Chan Ka Shu

comment: Hard ridden from wide gate to go forward and settle outside leader, under pressure from 450m and weakened in run home.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘，受力策上前，居領放馬外側。自四百五十米處起受催策，末段轉弱。

comment: Hard ridden forward to take the fence and led by 1L, kept   on strongly to score.
comment_ch: 受力策上前移入內欄，領先一個馬位。保持勁勢，取得勝利。

comment: Saved ground; ran on fairly well for 3rd.
comment_ch: 慳位第三, 中規中矩

comment: Held up midfield, 3Ls off the pace halfway, made good       progress up the fence passing 400M, shifted out 200M to     continue his chase, led 100M and won going away in very     fast time.
comment_ch: 留居中間位置，半程時落後領放馬三個馬位。跑過四百米處時沿欄追前甚多。二百米處向外移出，繼續追趕。一百米處取得領先，締速甚快。帶離勝出。
owner: Mr & Mrs James Tien Pei Chun

comment: Led along the rail; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 搶欄帶放, 見好即收

comment: Raced keenly early; kept on well in the straight to score.
comment_ch: 早段搶口, 直路騎落仲有

comment: Taken back, travelled 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide with     cover, harmed by the slow pace, ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 出閘後留後，落後領放馬六個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。慢步速不利發揮，走勢普通。

comment: Fractious before start, slowly away, and last on settling.  Took inside run in straight and ran on steadily.
comment_ch: 起步前煩躁不安。出閘緩慢，居包尾位置。直路上走內疊，穩步上前。

comment: In behind midfield, 8L behind 3 wide with cover, under whip from 700M, continued to improve and ran on nicely to score.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後八個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。自七百米處起受鞭策，持續推進，走勢良佳，勝出賽事。
owner: Kwan Shiu Man & Jeffrey Kwan Chun Ming

comment: Sharp start widest, snagged to camp 1 off with cover near   rear, progress on turn, 5L down & checked 450m, forced      between rivals 380m, quickened & charged to lead at wire.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘迅速，居後列，走第二疊，有遮擋。轉彎時追前。四百五十米處落後五個馬位及勒避。三百八十米處在對手之間強行取位。加速發力，過終點時勝出賽事。

comment: Taken back early; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 刻意拖後, 未受考驗

comment: Very slow away, at back along the fence, not suited by the  slow tempo, little dash 200M.
comment_ch: 出閘十分緩慢，居後列，走內欄。慢步速不合發揮。二百米處略為上前。

comment: Wide throughout; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 沿途蝕位, 走勢平常

handicap: THE HONG KONG RIDING FOR THE DISABLED ASSOCIATION CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港傷健策騎協會盃（讓賽）
comment: First out but forced to race wide, dropping back to third   before moving outside leader around turn. Kept on fairly in straight before tiring final stages.
comment_ch: 出閘最快，但被迫走外疊。墮居第三位，轉直路彎時移至領放馬外側。直路上保持一般走勢。末段漸呈疲態。

comment: Began awkwardly, pressed forward 4-wide behind pace 1200m.  Rolled forward to sit outside leader 950m, boxed on well    but not ridden out final stages when close to heels.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，千二米處受催策上前，居領放馬之後，走第四疊。九百五十米處上前居領放馬外側，走勢良佳，但末段靠近對手後蹄，未受力策。

comment: Raced mainly 3-wide between runners in better than          midfield, in similar position turning in, folded up quickly after straightening.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，在馬匹之間競跑，大多走第三疊。入直路時居相若位置。直路上迅速力竭。

handicap: POK FU LAM RESERVOIR ROAD HANDICAP
comment: Went to push forward early, but foiled by the early pace    and dropped back, eventually finding a spot 4th/5th, 3 wide with no cover. Trapped on heels at 350m, but was already on the wane and never ran on in the straight.
comment_ch: 早段受推策上前，但未能跟上步速，繼而墮退，居第四至第五位，在沒遮擋下走第三疊。三百五十米處靠近他駒後蹄受困，但已力竭，直路上從未能上前。
owner: Mr & Mrs William Yem Wai Lai

comment: Hard ridden but slow to muster, gradually edging forward to hold 4th position at turn. Got shuffled back around turn,   one paced in straight.
comment_ch: 受力策，但加速緩慢。逐漸上前，直路彎居第四位，其後墮後。直路上保持同速。
owner: Steven Chan Sheung Chi & Kenneth Chan Sheung Yan

comment: Wide throughout; under a hold and not fully tested.
comment_ch: 全程蝕位, 按住未試

comment: Jumped slowly, travelled 8Ls behind the leader on the       fence, never looked competitive.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，落後領放馬八個馬位，走內欄。從未見具競爭力。
owner: Wong Yuet Sing & Tony Wong Sze Ho

comment: Good break, raced handy but 3 wide no cover, driven turning in, boxed on to 2nd 300m, unable to make inroads, tapered   late & edged out of frame.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居有利位置，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。入直路時受催策，力拼上前，三百米處居第二位。未能持續上前，末段轉弱，未能跑入三甲。

handicap: THE KOWLOON CRICKET CLUB CENTENARY CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 九龍木球會百週年紀念盃（讓賽）
comment: Began awkwardly, steadied, dropped to last one away from    outer fence. Switched to centre track passing 400m,         finished off nicely between horses.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，收慢，墮居包尾，走外欄第二疊。跑過四百米處時移至跑道中央，在馬匹之間競跑，衝刺良佳。

comment: Pushed forward, 2 wide, closed off strongly for 3rd.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，走第二疊。以勁勢衝刺，跑獲季軍。

comment: Fast break to dispute lead, soon restrained & raced fore of midfield 1 off with cover, driven into stretch, one-paced & faded out final 200m.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，爭奪領先，瞬即在約束下居中間之前位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。入直路時受催策，保持同速，最後二百米處力竭。
owner: Simon Leung Yuen Ho & Kirby Leung Kae Bik

comment: Began well, shared early pace before racing ungenerously    first turn, settling 3L from leader back stretch. Looked    chance entering straight but only one-paced final 200m.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，早段並排領先，首次轉彎時走勢欠順，對面直路上落後領放馬三個馬位。入直路時看似具爭勝機會，但最後二百米僅能保持同速。

comment: Eased back from a wide gate, travelled 6Ls behind the       leader on the fence, despite the slow sectionals, made some ground in straight.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後留後，落後領放馬六個馬位，走內欄。儘管步速緩慢，直路上略為追前。

comment: Reared and lost ground start and trailed field throughout.  Never competitive.
comment_ch: 開閘時以後足豎立，因而失地。沿途尾隨馬群。從未有力一爭。

comment: Broke well, lost touch after first 200 metres, dropped      further back coming onto course proper, produced some late  impression closing stages.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，過了首二百米後脫離馬群，跑離分支直路時進一步墮退。末段略為上前。

comment: Came across from the wide draw to sit midfield, 3 wide with limited cover. Ran well in the straight to figure in a      tight finish for the placing's.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後移向內疊，居中間位置，走第三疊，略有遮擋。直路上走勢甚佳，在激烈競爭下未能入位。

handicap: AUDEMARS PIGUET LADY ROYAL OAK HANDICAP
comment: Shifted across behind horses from outside draw, settling at rear but wide. Taken even wider in straight and kept on     fairly.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後在馬群之後切入，居後列，走外疊。直路上移出更外疊，保持一般走勢。

comment: Sat just off the leaders, trapped 3 wide, not suited by the fast sectionals, ran on well until 150M flattened.
comment_ch: 居領先馬匹稍後位置，走第三疊。步速甚快，不合發揮。走勢甚佳，一百五十米處洩氣。

comment: Under restraint early; made progress when being persuaded in the Straight.
comment_ch: 早段扣到實，直路稍騎，幾肯追馬

comment: Rolled forward, however, under heavy pressure near the      course proper, weakened 300M.
comment_ch: 上前，將近跑離分支直路時受力策，三百米處轉弱。

comment: Began OK, ridden along but hung out first turn, dropping    behind midfield. Hard to settle back stretch, hung out      600m, found little straight. Racing manners unacceptable.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策，首次轉彎時外閃，墮居中間之後位置。對面直路上難以穩定走勢，六百米處外閃，直路上再無餘力。走勢難以接受。

comment: Caught wide no cover in midfield from draw 12, moved closer to pace home turn, tried hard but couldn't go on passing    250M, weakened to line.
comment_ch: 自第十二檔出閘，居中間位置，走外疊，沒有遮擋。轉直路彎時發力追近領放馬。跑過二百五十米處時受力策，但未能上前。終點前轉弱。

comment: Under a hold throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 全程按住, 未受考驗

comment: Caught the eye when under a hold late.
comment_ch: 拉士捉實，惹人好感
owner: Tony Lo Chin Ho, Kwok Ying Lung & Wong Tsz Wa

comment: In midfield, 4-1/2L off the pace 2 wide with cover, not     competitive and dropped off significantly after 200M.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬四個半馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。毫無競爭力，過了二百米處後嚴重墮退。
owner: Johnny Wong Ka Keung, Ernest Ip Koon Wing, Christopher Chan Wai Tong & Michael Cheng Woon Yin

comment: Hard ridden early, at back, 2 wide, not suited by the slow  tempo, little dash 200M.
comment_ch: 早段受力策，居後列位置，走第二疊。步速緩慢，不合發揮。二百米處略為衝刺。

comment: Up with early pace, tracked leaders entering back straight, gave ground 400M, eased when well beaten.
comment_ch: 早段跟上步速，進入對面直路時跟隨領放馬匹。四百米處墮退。洩氣潰敗，因而收慢。

comment: Ridden early before settling in forward of midfield,        commenced move on top of home bend and making steady        headway down the straight until finding no extra inside     final 100 metres.
comment_ch: 早段受催策，居中間之前位置。直路彎早段開始推進，直路上穩步上前，最後一百米無以為繼。

comment: Ran on fairly when under whip in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路鞭騎，反應尚可
owner: So Shek Wing & Frederick Leung Sek Cheung

comment: Missed break & 2L adrift at tail, closed to tag on 450m,    shifted 1 off 250m & boxed on for minor late inroads.
comment_ch: 漏閘，居尾列，落後前駒兩個馬位。四百五十米處追上馬群尾列。二百五十米處移至第二疊，力拼，末段略為追前。

comment: Failed to quicken; tailed off.
comment_ch: 走勢乏力, 遠遠包尾
owner: Sherman Ting Wing Cheung, Joyce Ting Tung Sum & David Ting Chi Ho

comment: No daylight at 300m; raced behind runners.
comment_ch: 三百受困, 跟馬林走

handicap: THE HONG KONG RACEHORSE OWNERS ASSOCIATION TROPHY (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港馬主協會錦標（讓賽）
comment: Moderately away from a wide draw, taken back to race 7 to 8 lengths back at rear, there to turn, showed no response in  straight, never competitive.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘普通，留居後列，落後七至八個馬位。直路彎前居相同位置。直路上對催策毫無反應。從未有力一爭。

comment: Reserved in mid-division, saved ground along the rails,     headway 400M and loomed a strong threat behind leader       mid-straight, held up until 150M, closed off well final     stages, just missed.
comment_ch: 留居中間位置，沿欄競跑節省腳程。四百米處上前，直路中段居領放馬之後，構成重大威脅。一百五十米處前受困，末段衝刺良佳，僅敗。

comment: Ran on well to score; moved better than before.
comment_ch: 透出取勝, 表現進步
owner: Kenneth Lam Sze Ken, Timothy Junior Lam & Sabrina Chao Sih Ming

comment: Settled worse than midfield about 4Ls behind the leader     along the outer fence, ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬約四個馬位，走外欄。走勢一般。

comment: Rolled forward to cross and park outside the leader at fast sectionals, weakened badly rounding the Home Turn.
comment_ch: 上前切入內疊，居步速甚快的領放馬外側。轉直路彎時嚴重轉弱。

comment: Settled worse than midfield about 8Ls behind the leader 2   wide with cover, suited by the fast sectionals, ran home    strongly for 2nd.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬約八個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。快步速適合發揮，衝刺強勁，跑獲亞軍。

comment: Led along the rail; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 貼欄快放, 拉士按返

comment: Niggled along throughout; not willing to stretch.
comment_ch: 騎足全程，不願展步

comment: Eased back early and stuck 4-5 wide early around midfield.  Pushed forward from the 1000m to lead by the 800m. Pushed   hard in the straight, and looked beaten at 50m, before      kicking again late and just holding on.
comment_ch: 早段收慢留後，約居中間位置，走第四至第五疊。自一千米處起受推策上前，八百米處取得領先。直路上力拼，五十米處看似已洩氣，但末段再度發力，險勝。

comment: Reserved along the fence, settled down 3Ls off the pace     ahead of midfield, came through to challenge winner 250M    but always held, faded late stages.
comment_ch: 留力候上，沿欄居中間之前位置，落後領放馬三個馬位。二百五十米處挑戰領放馬但始終不敵，末段力竭。

comment: Broke well front rank wide on track, taken back to slot     fore of midfield 1 off with cover & niggled along, driven   400m, & closed centre to nick 3rd late.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，居前列位置，走外疊。其後留居中間之前位置，走第二疊，有遮擋，受催策。四百米處受催策，在跑道中央展開衝刺，末段跑入季席。
owner: Mr & Mrs Baffin Wong Yu Kwan

comment: Wide throughout; came home strong.
comment_ch: 沿途蝕位，大步湧上

comment: Allowed to stride forward to lead on settling and taken to  fence. Joined for a few strides passing 700m but edged      ahead again. Kicked 2L clear passing 250m and held off well for comfortable win.
comment_ch: 獲許展步上前領先，切入內欄。跑過七百米處時有數步被追及，再次上前領先。跑過二百五十米處時帶離兩個馬位，保持佳勢，從容勝出。

comment: Away nicely, not pushed, racing one-out in midfield 4L from leader. Hampered 500m, switched out turning for home, made  some progress to 200m before turning one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，未受催策，走第二疊，居中間位置，落後領放馬四個馬位。五百米處受阻礙。轉直路彎時向外移出。二百米處前略為上前，其後保持同速。

comment: Hard ridden to obtain box seat, benefited by the slow       sectionals, just held ground in straight.
comment_ch: 受力策佔取包廂位置。慢步速有利發揮。直路上僅能保持位置。

comment: Moderate start, travelled within striking distance of 2L    back on rails most of way before overhauled inside final    200 metres. (Blood in trachea next day)
comment_ch: 出閘普通，大部分途程落後領放馬兩個馬位，走內欄。最後二百米被超越。（翌日氣管內有血。）

comment: Crowded out at start, then hard ridden but slow to muster,  falling behind midfield 4L from leader. Stayed on rail      around turn and ran on fairly in straight.
comment_ch: 起步時受擠迫，繼而受力策，但加速緩慢，墮居中間之後位置，落後領放馬四個馬位。轉直路彎時固守內欄。直路上走勢一般。
owner: Christopher So Chi Hang & Eddie Ng Tao

comment: First to break, ridden to hold lead on rail, led at solid   sectionals, ridden 350m, claimed 150m, battled on well.
comment_ch: 出閘最快，在催策下沿欄帶頭，以快步速領放。三百五十米處受催策，一百五十米處被追上，以佳勢力拼。
owner: Mr & Mrs Chau Kam Chuen and Helen Chau Hoi Man

comment: Reserved near the rear early and middle stages, crept       closer home turn to be 5Ls off the pace 400M, stayed on     well between runners, got up 2nd near line.
comment_ch: 早段及中段留居後列。直路彎進佔較接近位置。四百米處落後領放馬五個馬位。在馬匹之間競跑，保持佳勢，接近終點時取得亞軍。

comment: Hard ridden to secure box seat, enjoyed the slow            sectionals, closed off strongly 300M to score.
comment_ch: 在力策下佔取包廂位置。步速緩慢，有利發揮。三百米處衝刺強勁，取得勝利。
owner: Mr & Mrs Peter P C Fan

comment: Quickened at turn; never tested.
comment_ch: 彎位發力，點到即止
owner: Odilia Poon Kam Yee & Tommy Poon Ching Tong

comment: Laying in slightly when being hard ridden.
comment_ch: 大力推騎，有點內閃

comment: Ran on ordinary when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路推騎，未復舊觀

comment: Hard ridden to lead on settling before crossing to fence    1300m and slowing pace. Kicked ahead entering straight but  run down final stages.
comment_ch: 受力策上前領放，千三米處切入內欄，減慢步速。入直路時發力，但末段被頭馬超越。
owner: Jose Yu Sun Say & Yu Wah Yung

comment: Average to begin, raced 4 lengths or so back at rear, made  no progress and emptied in the final furlong.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，居後列，落後約四個馬位，最後二百米未能上前，再無餘力。
owner: Yu Pang Chun & Yu Kwok Chun

comment: Slow to begin; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 走勢生硬

comment: On-pace early; hit the line strongly for 2nd.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，走勢甚勁

comment: Always at the rear, not a factor.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列，從未構成威脅。

comment: Up with the pace for 3rd; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 跟前入位，表現唔曳

comment: Broke well, taken back to race last pair on outer, last at  1060m, under pump 900m & advanced a spot, hard ridden 550m, plodded home tamely.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，墮居最後兩位，走外疊。一千零六十米處居包尾，九百米處受催策，略為上前。五百五十米處受力策，末段走勢疲乏。
owner: Mr & Mrs Johnny Ng Sai Chun, Raymond Ng Lok Man and Dr Kevin Ng King Man

comment: Jumped well, let speed go, settled fore of midfield on      rail, overraced 850m, settled better soon after, ridden     along 500m, never likely.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，放棄爭先，居中間之前位置，走內欄。八百五十米處搶口，瞬即穩定走勢，五百米處受催策，從未看似有力爭勝。
owner: Au Kai Kwong & Michelle Jessica Au

comment: Jumped OK but eased, dropping to rear between horses.       Shaken up turning for home, got close to heels passing      200m, switched out and finished off strongly.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，收慢，墮居後列，在馬匹之間競跑。轉直路彎時受催策，跑過二百米處時靠近他駒後蹄。向外移出，衝刺強勁。

comment: Made progress on the inside; impressive.
comment_ch: 內檔竄上，惹人好感
owner: William Ching Hon Kuen & Raymond Ching Wei Man

comment: Ridden to hold forward position but kept wide without cover from 900. Covered extra ground throughout, one-paced in     straight.
comment_ch: 在催策下居前列位置，自九百米處起走外疊，沒有遮擋。沿途多走腳程，直路上保持同速。

comment: Tardy start &bustled  to settle back of midfield on rail,   shifted 1 off 680m, niggled 540m, under pump turning in,    weakened tamely.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，受催策，居中間之後位置，走內欄。六百八十米處移出第二疊。五百四十米處受催策。入直路時再受催策，乏力轉弱。

comment: Under a hold throughout for 3rd; impressive.
comment_ch: 全程按實，表現悅目

comment: Broke well, niggled initially to rail fore of midfield,     switched out 500m but trapped in pocket, driven 200m,       blocked 150m, clear run close home & closed too late.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。初段受催策，居中間之前位置，走內欄。五百米處向外移出，受困。二百米處受催策，一百五十米處受阻。接近終點時望空，但太遲發力衝刺。

comment: Even break, outpaced early, ridden along, settled beyond    midfield on rail, pushed along 600m, made up some ground,   shifted out in straight, couldn't go on.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，早段被拋離。受催策，居中間之後位置，走內欄。六百米處受推策，略為上前。直路上移向外疊，未能保持走勢。

comment: Always in last few and never seen with a chance.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列，從未見具爭勝機會。

comment: Raced wide throughout; never tested.
comment_ch: 蝕位跟跑, 未見真章

handicap_ch: 浪琴表國際騎師錦標賽（讓賽）－第四關
comment: Caught wide no cover from draw 11, couldn't keep up 550M,   soon detached from the field.
comment_ch: 自第十一檔出閘後走外疊，沒有遮擋。五百五十米處未能跟上對手，瞬即被馬群拋離。

comment: Cruised forward early, settling around midfield on the      fence. Came in off heels 400m. Stayed on solidly in the     straight without ever threatening.
comment_ch: 早段沿欄上前，居大約中間位置。四百米處向內移入避開他駒後蹄。直路上保持勁勢。從未能構成威脅。

comment: Out-paced early; made progress by saving ground in the Straight.
comment_ch: 早段跟唔住, 直路慳位上

comment: Taken back early; caught the eye when hit the line strongly from behind.
comment_ch: 留前試後, 竄上引人
owner: Johnson Lam Pui Hung & Anderson Lam Hin Yue

comment: Jumped well, taken in for cover towards rear first turn     before switching out wide back stretch. Switched in home    turn, blocked 400m, switched out 300m, finished strongly to win eased down.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，向內移入以取得遮擋。首次轉彎時居後列。對面直路上移出外疊。直路彎向內移入。四百米處受阻。三百米處向外移出。衝刺強勁，取得勝利，末段收慢。

owner: Stephen So Chi Ming & Samuel Chan Ying Leung

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader along the   outer fence, ran home well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬四個馬位，走外欄。末段走勢甚佳，跑獲亞軍。

comment: Up with the pace; kept on under a hold in the straight.
comment_ch: 跟前, 直路按實, 保持走勢

comment: Saved ground and made progress; distance too short.
comment_ch: 慳位趕上，路程太短

comment: Slightly slow out, soon settled in rear of midfield, kept   on same pace in the run home.
comment_ch: 出閘稍慢，瞬即居中間靠後位置。直路上保持同速。

comment: Parked outside the leader throughout, bumped at 250M, ran   on till 150M when couldn't find extra.
comment_ch: 沿途居領放馬外側。二百五十米處與對手互相碰撞。保持走勢至一百五十米處，其後再無餘力。

comment: On-pace early; kept on for 2nd.
comment_ch: 主動搶走，末段唔斷
owner: Mr & Mrs Johnny Ng Sai Chun, Raymond Ng Lok Man and Dr Kevin Ng King Man

comment: Camped handy, travelled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, despite the fast pace, ran on steadily for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居有利位置，落後領放馬三個馬位，走內欄。在快步速下穩步上前，跑獲季軍。

comment: Always in touch; ran on nicely to win.
comment_ch: 有前有後，走勢成熟

comment: Urged to lead early; flattened in the Straight.
comment_ch: 搶放三段, 直路勁平

comment: Pressed forward on jumping to share early lead, before      settling three-parts of a length behind leader. Rolled      forward around turn, joint leader 200m, no extra final      stages.
comment_ch: 出閘後受催策，早段並排領先，其後落後領放馬四分三個馬位。直路彎上前，二百米處追上領放馬，末段再無餘力。
owner: Mr & Mrs Tony Tang Wai Bun and Kenneth Tang

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY CONVERGENCE OF LOVE COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶亮聚系列讓賽
comment: First into stride, sharing early pace before settling 3L    behind leader at turn. Under pressure soon after            straightening and faded quickly final 200m.
comment_ch: 展步最快，早段並排領先，轉彎時落後領放馬三個馬位。入直路後瞬即受催策。最後二百米迅速力竭。

comment: Showed good early speed; flattened late.
comment_ch: 前快後弱，欠貫注力
owner: The Executors of the Estate of the late The Hon Lau Wong Fat

comment: Raced in worse than midfield, 7-1/4L off the pace, never    ran on.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬七又四分一個馬位，從未能上前。

comment: At back, 2-3 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, never nearer.
comment_ch: 居後列，走第二至第三疊。步速甚快，有利發揮。以末段最為接近。
owner: Lau Che Keung, Xie Bangrong & Cheung Hiu Shun

handicap: THE HONG KONG RIDING FOR THE DISABLED ASSOCIATION CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港傷健策騎協會盃（讓賽）
comment: Bumped start, pressed forward taking first turn 5-wide.     Kept 3-wide back stretch 3L from leader, 4-wide into home   stretch, boxed on gamely.
comment_ch: 出閘時與他駒互相碰撞，首次轉彎時受催策上前，走第五疊。對面直路上落後領放馬三個馬位，走第三疊。入直路時走第四疊，末段力拼。

comment: Initially in behind midfield but was niggled along to       improve around turn, couldn't keep on in the Straight.
comment_ch: 早段居中間之後位置，直路彎在催策下追前。直路上未能保持走勢。
owner: Simon Leung Yuen Ho & Kirby Leung Kae Bik

comment: Crowded start, recovered and pushed forward, settling       one-off 3L from leader 900m. Had clear run on straightening and kept on well.
comment_ch: 出閘時受擠迫，其後恢復走勢，受推策上前。九百米處落後領放馬三個馬位，走第二疊。入直路時望空，保持佳勢。

handicap: THE TUNG WAH GROUP OF HOSPITALS 145TH ANNIVERSARY CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 東華三院一百四十五周年挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Urged forward from inside draw, settling in one-off         position 2L from leader. Rolled forward top of straight to  look chance but no extra final 100m.
comment_ch: 自內檔出閘，受催策上前。落後領放馬兩個馬位，走第二疊。直路初上前，看似有力一爭，但最後一百米再無餘力。

comment: Came home strong when shifted to centre of track halfway.
comment_ch: 半程移出中檔，衝刺甚勁
owner: Mr & Mrs Andrew Wong Kwok Kin

comment: Under a hold in the straight; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 直路無騎過, 未受考驗

comment: Made use of inside draw to lead on settling, then set       steady pace to straight, kicked ahead passing 300m and kept finding when challenged.
comment_ch: 自最內檔出閘，取得領先。直路前步速平穩。跑過三百米處時加速上前，受挑戰時持續力拼。

comment: Slow to begin; niggled along throughout.
comment_ch: 起步緩慢，騎足全程

comment: Ran on fairly when under whip in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路開鞭，反應尚可

comment: Limited response when under whip late.
comment_ch: 拉士開鞭，反應平常
owner: The Hon Andrew K N Li & Tan Boon Seng

comment: Not quickened when under whip at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百開鞭，未見力速

comment: At the rear throughout, no progress.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列，毫無進展。

comment: Awkward start; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 起步論盡, 走勢生硬

comment: Difficult to load; tardy start; ran on ordinary when asked.
comment_ch: 入閘困難，起步麻麻，騎落一般

comment: Began fairly, ridden but outpaced, dropping towards rear    between horses. Switched in 350m to make run but spent      force passing 100m and faded quickly.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，受催策但被拋離，墮居後列，在馬匹之間競跑。三百五十米處向內移入取位，但跑過一百米處時洩氣，迅速力竭。

comment: Jumped well from gate 1, positioned nicely in 4th, saved    ground throughout, 7 lengths back on turn, peaked early in  straight, emptied final 100M.
comment_ch: 自第一檔出閘迅速，居有利的第四位。沿途走內欄節省腳程。轉彎時落後七個馬位。直路初未能再增速。最後一百米力竭。
owner: Joseph Choi Yip Leung, Choi Fong Hon Mei, Andrew Choi Shing Fai & Angela Choi Hun Yung

comment: Showed early speed to take position in front of midfield    along the rail, 2 L off. Weakened in straight and swamped   upon final 250M.
comment_ch: 展現前速，居中間之前位置，落後領放馬兩個馬位，沿欄競跑。直路上轉弱。最後二百五十米被後上馬匹超越。

comment: Niggled to keep up with pace; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 推騎跟前, 不外如是

comment: Midfield in the straight; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 直路居中，未見真章

handicap: THE PENINSULA GOLDEN JUBILEE CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
comment: Raced towards the rear, 2-1/4L behind along the outside     rail, hampered at 200M, not competitive anyway.
comment_ch: 居後列位置，落後二又四分一個馬位，沿外欄競跑。二百米處受阻，但無論如何不具競爭力。

comment: Settled towards the ear, baulked for a run to the 200       metres, finished off race well.
comment_ch: 居後列，二百米處前受阻。以佳勢衝刺。

comment: Speed to lead, headed 1150m & raced 1 back on rail, shifted out on turn to join leader, shaken up to lead 420m,         quickened clear, in command.
comment_ch: 出閘後加速上前取得領先，一千一百五十米處被超越，落後一個馬位，走內欄。直路彎向外移出，追上領放馬。四百二十米處在催策下取得領先。加速帶離對手。

comment: Began well, racing between early leaders before taking sit  700m. Urged forward from 400m, kept on well to 200m,        turning one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。早段在領先馬匹之間競跑。七百米處居領放馬之後。自四百米處起受催策。二百米處前保持佳勢。其後保持同速。

comment: Saved ground and made progress; moved better than before.
comment_ch: 慳位追趕, 表現進步

comment: Dashed only fairly under urge at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百稍騎, 衝刺一般
owner: Eleanor Kwok Law Kwai Chun & Kitty Kwok Sea Nga

comment: Being ridden halfway; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 半程已騎，走勢平常

comment: Given early reminders to stay with pace, settling two-back  on fence 1400m. Stayed on rail entering straight but raced  tightly concluding stages and not ridden out.
comment_ch: 早段受催策跟上領放馬。千四米處落後兩個馬位，走內欄。入直路時持續走內欄，但末段緊迫競跑，未能被力策。

comment: Raced at rear; never in contention.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑, 從未參予競逐

handicap: PANASONIC STEAM IH WARM JAR HANDICAP
comment: Taken back at start, raced near rear 3 wide with cover,     driven 550m, outpaced in  rear & hard-ridden 350m,          responded & stayed on for strong late headway.
comment_ch: 出閘後留居後列，在有遮擋下走第三疊。五百五十米處受催策，仍居後列，未能跟上步速。三百五十米處受力策，走勢甚佳，末段保持勁勢，追前甚多。

comment: Pushed out to be the early leader, before eventually being  crossed at the 600m. Ran on well in the straight, just      fading late and missing a place by the barest of margins.
comment_ch: 早段在推策下取得領先。六百米處被超越。直路上走勢甚佳，末段力竭，僅以短距離之差失去一席季軍。
owner: Ng Sun Wah & Chan Wo Ping

comment: Pressed forward from an outside gate and forced to race     wide without cover 2.5L from leader. Dropped back slightly  turning for home but kept on gamely in the straight.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受催策上前，落後領放馬兩個半馬位，被迫在沒有遮擋下走外疊。轉直路彎時稍微墮退，但直路上保持勁勢。
owner: Chan Wing Kwan, Chang Wing Yiu & Cheung Kwok Wa

comment: Began well from gate 1, positioned 3 lengths back on rail   in 4th, there to turn, finished off evenly in straight      without threatening.
comment_ch: 自第一檔出閘迅速。居第四位，落後領放馬三個馬位，走內欄。直路彎前居相同位置。直路上保持穩勢，未能構成威脅。

comment: Bumped start, steadied, then taken across behind horses to  hold rail position four back from leader. Still well back   entering straight before picking up momentum and finishing  off nicely.
comment_ch: 出閘時被碰撞，收慢後於馬群之後切入內欄，落後領放馬四個馬位。入直路時仍遙居於後，其後加速上前以勁勢衝刺。
owner: Lam Ngai Fung & Thomas Poon Ho Wing

comment: Began only fairly, held up towards the rear 6-7Ls off the   good pace, not much room early straight, closed off well    when switched out 200M, got up for 2nd near line.
comment_ch: 出閘僅屬一般，留居後列，落後中等步速的領放馬六至七個馬位。直路初空位不足。二百米處向外移出，衝刺良佳。接近終點時跑獲亞軍。

comment: Niggled along throughout; failed to respond.
comment_ch: 沿途俾住，走勢欠勁
owner: Joseph Choi Yip Leung & Choi Fong Hon Mei

comment: On pace early; under a hold in the Straight.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑, 直路按返

comment: Tracked leader along the fence, loomed a threat early       straight, kept on moderately passing mid-straight, outpaced late stages.
comment_ch: 自第一檔出閘，沿欄跟隨領放馬。直路早段看似有力爭勝，跑過中段時保持穩勢，末段被拋離。

comment: Hampered start, pushed forward, settling outside hind       quarters of leader. Rolled forward passing 200m to look a   chance, flattened close home.
comment_ch: 出閘時被阻礙，受推策上前，居領放馬外側位置，落後半個馬位。跑過二百米處時上前，看似具爭勝機會。末段洩氣。
owner: Helena Wai Suk Chong & Cheung Kwok Wing

comment: Settled behind midfield on rails, commenced move rounding   home bend, reached 5th some 4L back on final turn,          sustained effort in straight to just get up on line.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，走內欄。轉直路彎時開始上前，入直路時進佔第五位，落後約四個馬位。直路上持續力拼，於終點線上僅勝。

comment: Wide throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 沿途外叠，未受考驗

comment: Dawdled out of the gate and dropped back early to sit       towards the rear of the field, 1 off the fence. Held up     early in the straight and slightly 1 paced when initially   clear, before picking up the tempo late.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，早段墮居後列位置，走第二疊。直路初受困，望空後初時略為保持同速，末段加速。

comment: Raced in worse than midfield, 5-3/4L behind the leader 2    wide with cover, despite suited to the fast tempo, did not  obtain clear running until 200M.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬五又四分三個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。步速甚快，適合發揮。二百米處前未能望空。
owner: Dr & Mrs Horace Ngan Kit Keung

comment: Began awkwardly, shifted across behind runners, settling    towards rear along rail. Reluctant to hold position around  turn, found little in straight under pressure.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙。在馬群之後切入內疊，居後列，沿欄競跑。直路彎不願保持位置。直路上受催策，但再無餘力。

comment: Shifted out gradually; under whip late.
comment_ch: 逐步移出，拉士開鞭
owner: Terry Chan Tat Wah, Cho Kwai Chee, Kwok Shun Tim & Lam Mau

comment: Jumped well, hard ridden to lead on settling, then set good pace to straight. Joined up front 100m out and swamped by   two rivals close home.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，在力策下領先，直路前以中等步速領放。一百米處被追上。接近終點時被兩駒超越。
owner: Mr & Mrs Loh Dai Jur, Elton Loh Kin and David Loh Wai

comment: Ran on well when asked late.
comment_ch: 拉士推騎，反應甚佳
owner: Mr & Mrs James Tien Pei Chun

comment: Fast start, taken back to rail midfield, ridden along 500m, plugged on tepidly.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。留後移入內欄，居中間位置。五百米處受催策，其後走勢疲弱。

comment: From widest draw caught no closer than 3-wide throughout,   3Ls back in midfield on settling, kept on moderately final  300M without threatening leaders.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後，居中間位置，落後三個馬位，沿途走第三疊或更外疊。最後三百米保持普通走勢，未能威脅領先馬匹。

comment: Dropped back early from the wide barrier to sit last, 10L   off the leader and 2L off the 2nd last horse. Caught up to  the field by 600m, and came widest down the straight. Ran   steadily to the line late.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後於早段墮居包尾位置，落後領放馬十個馬位，落後尾二馬匹兩個馬位。六百米處追上馬群，直路上走最外疊。末段保持穩勢。

comment: Good break, taken back to midfield, rousted 1150m to fore   of midfield 3 wide no cover, pushed 4 deep 600m, advanced   to press lead final turn, driven in 3rd 430m, kept on       dourly to 2nd.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，留居中間位置。一千一百五十米處受催策，居中間之前位置，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。六百米處受推策，走第四疊。直路彎上前追迫領放馬。四百三十米處受催策，居第三位。持續力拼，取得亞軍。

comment: Ran on for 3rd when being hard ridden.
comment_ch: 認真考驗, 搶回一席

comment: Away on terms, eased to settle beyond midfield 1 off,       niggled 850m, ridden again 450m, found line strongly late.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，收慢留居中間之後位置，走第二疊。八百五十米處受催策。四百五十米處再度受催策。末段衝刺強勁。

comment: Niggled along after start; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 起步已騎, 走勢平常
owner: Tony Lau Yiu Tong, Thomas Lau Sum Fai & Lau Yi Fai

comment: Bumped start, rolled forward, settling between horses 3L    from leader. Surged forward top of straight but unable      match first two.
comment_ch: 出閘時被碰撞。上前居領放馬之後三個馬位的位置，在馬匹之間競跑。直路早段加速上前，但未能與前兩名馬匹抗衡。

comment: Jumped fairly from a wide draw, ridden along to take up     running passing the 900 metres, obtained run on the rail    coming onto home bend, led the field until headed 150       metres out.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘普通，受催策，跑過九百米處時取得領先。入直路彎時沿欄取位上前，領先對手，一百五十米處被超越。

comment: Moderate start, soon niggled near tail, ridden 400m,        outpaced & plugged on evenly.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，瞬即受催策，居接近包尾位置。四百米處受催策，衝刺力不及對手，僅能保持同速。

comment: Made progress in the Straight in a less competitive field.
comment_ch: 直路稍追, 對手太弱

comment: Pressed forward from wide draw to lead on settling, cutting to fence 1400m. Picked up the pace from 500m to set up big  lead in straight but cut down final 50m.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受催策上前，取得領先。千四米處切入內欄。自五百米處起加速，直路上領前甚多，但最後五十米被頭馬超越。

comment: Moderate start & bustled to settle behind midfield 1 off    with cover, niggled 800m, driven 400m, widest into stretch, surged to lead 50m.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策，居中間之後位置，在有遮擋下走第二疊。八百米處受催策。四百米處受催策。入直路時走最外疊。五十米處上前取得領先。

comment: Lacked early pace & bustled, mustered to race rail behind   midfield, niggled 600m, driven 500m, plodded on same speed.
comment_ch: 缺乏前速，受催策加速，居中間之後位置，走內欄。六百米處及五百米處受催策，保持同速。

comment: Moderately away from a wide draw, unable to slot in,        travelled wide and without cover throughout, peaked early   in straight, weakened gradually thereafter.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘普通，未能移入內欄。沿途走外疊，沒有遮擋。直路初未能再增速。其後逐漸轉弱。

comment: Tardy start, sat 1 off with cover near rear, niggled 500m,  shifted 3 deep & driven 400m, widest into stretch,          one-paced in run.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居後列，走第二疊，有遮擋。五百米處受催策，四百米處移出第三疊，受催策。入直路時走最外疊，直路上保持同速。

comment: Camped handy, however trapped wide without cover            throughout, one paced and weakened 100M.
comment_ch: 居前列，但沿途走外疊，沒有遮擋。保持同速，一百米處轉弱。

comment: Tardy start; made progress steadily; came from behind to score.
comment_ch: 起步麻麻，分段加快，後上取勝

comment: Quickly in front and then raced keenly in the lead, pulling 3L clear around turn. Overhauled passing 250m and faded.
comment_ch: 迅速取得領先。其後在領放下搶口。轉直路彎時帶離三個馬位。跑過二百五十米處時被超越及力竭。

comment: Hard ridden from outside draw to lead passing 1500m,        cutting to fence 1200m. Kicked 2L clear 300m to win         unchallenged.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘後受力策，跑過千五米處時取得領先，千二米處切入內欄。三百米處帶離兩個馬位，從容勝出。

handicap: POK FU LAM COUNTRY PARK HANDICAP
comment: Tardy away, in rear pair 8Ls off the pace middle stages,    saved ground along fence home turn, limited progress early  straight and lacked further response final 200M.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，中段居最後兩位，落後領放馬八個馬位。直路彎沿欄競跑，以省腳程。直路初略為上前，最後二百米未能進一步交出反應。

comment: Raced rearward; failed to respond.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑, 走勢乏力

comment: Settled towards the rear, made rapid progress down far side and a joint the leader leaving the Rock, shifted sharply    out cornering for home, renewed effort from the 200 metres  to assert close to home.
comment_ch: 居後列。對面直路上迅速推進，跑離大石鼓處時並排領先。轉直路彎時大幅度向外移出。二百米處重新發力，接近終點時控制大局。

comment: Eased early; made progress in the Straight saving ground.
comment_ch: 早段稍留, 直路慳位追趕

comment: Fast break & prominent 1 off, settled 1 back 900m, shifted  3 deep to challenge 500m, progress to 2nd & ridden 400m,    emptied 200m & swamped.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。居前列位置，走第二疊。九百米處落後領放馬一個馬位。五百米處移出第三疊展開挑戰。四百米處上前進佔第二位，受催策。二百米處再無餘力，被超越。

comment: Pushed forward, sat 2 wide just off the leaders, only held  ground in straight.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，居領先馬匹稍後位置，走第二疊。直路上僅能保持位置。

comment: Tardy start, rolled forward to track leader 1 off no cover, 1 back 1 off from 650m & niggled, driven 400m, 3 wide final turn, bumped 250m & weakened.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，持續上前，跟隨領放馬，走第二疊，沒有遮擋。六百五十米處落後領放馬一個馬位，走第二疊，受催策。四百米處再受催策。轉直路彎時走第三疊。二百五十米處與對手互相碰撞，轉弱。

comment: Ran under his own steam; made limited ground in straight.
comment_ch: 隨意跟跑, 直路稍追

comment: Niggled along throughout; failed to respond.
comment_ch: 沿途俾住，力度未足

comment: Ridden along early, took lead 1500m, across to rail 1250m,  2L lead 950m, travelling strongly throughout, 3L lead 500m, under riding 400m, grabbed 150m, weakened late.
comment_ch: 早段受催策，千五米處領先，一千二百五十米處切入內欄。九百五十米處領先兩個馬位，沿途走勢強勁。五百米處領先三個馬位，四百米處受催策。一百五十米處被超越，末段轉弱。

comment: Ran on ok; kept on one-paced for 3rd.
comment_ch: 均速第三, 腳法純熟

comment: Sent forward and settled to race outside the lead after     being trapped wide initially, found no extra passing 200M.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，早段走外疊，其後居領放馬外側。跑過二百米處時再無餘力。

comment: First to break, straight to lead, 1L lead 1100m, even       sectionals, under a ride 420m, kicked solidly, claimed      150m, weakened very late.
comment_ch: 出閘最快，領先。一千一百米處領先一個馬位，保持穩定走勢。四百二十米處受催策，以佳勢加速。一百五十米處被超越，末段轉弱。

comment: Urged to lead early; weakened in the straight.
comment_ch: 沿欄搶放，直路力弱

comment: Reserved near the rear 6Ls behind leader, saved ground      along the rails, ran on from off the pace, got up for       non-threatening 4th near line.
comment_ch: 留居後列位置，落後領放馬六個馬位。走內欄節省腳程，大幅追前，接近終點時跑獲第四，未能構成威脅。

comment: Never a factor.
comment_ch: 從未有力一爭。

comment: Ridden to keep with the pace; kept on late.
comment_ch: 推騎跟前, 拉士唔斷

comment: Prominent before steadied and dropped to forward of         midfield near the rails, in similar position to straight,   baulked and switched in for a run over 200 metres out,      fought on well late.
comment_ch: 居前列，其後收慢，留居中間之前位置，靠近內欄競跑。直路前居相若位置。二百米處受困，向內移入取位。末段以佳勢力拼。

comment: Tracked the pace in 3rd, improved along the fence to join   leader 350M, fought on till no extra 150M.
comment_ch: 跟隨領放馬，居第三位，沿欄上前，三百五十米處追上領放馬。持續力拼，一百五十米處再無餘力。

comment: Eased back and travelled near the rear, 5-1/2L behind 2     wide with cover, no progress in the Straight.
comment_ch: 收慢留居後列，落後五個半馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。直路上毫無進展。

comment: Moderate start, raced keenly in forward of midfield, came   under pressure to challenge entering straight but had       nothing to give.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居中間之前位置，跑來搶口。入直路時受催策展開挑戰，但再無餘力。
owner: Mr & Mrs Stephen Lee Hoi Yin

comment: Led all the way to score; plenty in hand.
comment_ch: 速高帶到，大把在手

comment: Bustled from gate & soon prominent, settled behind speed 1  off with cover, driven turning in, outpaced in tame run     home.
comment_ch: 出閘後受催策，瞬即上前，居領放馬之後，走第二疊，有遮擋。入直路時受催策。末段被拋離，走勢疲乏。

comment: Pushed forward, one out one back, just held ground in       straight.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，居第二疊第二位。直路上僅能保持位置。

comment: Away fairly, niggled early, assumed front 1080m & down to   rail, joined & headed narrowly 750m, held together until    350m, reclaimed lead soon after, clearly headed 170m,       fought back & got bob.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，早段受催策，一千零八十米處取得領先，移入內欄。其後並排領先，七百五十米處被超越，落後短距離。三百五十米處始再受催策，其後瞬即再次領先。一百七十米處被超越，力拼，在叮噹馬頭爭逐下取勝。
owner: Alan Tsang Ping Sing, Fiona Tsang Wai Sze & Claudia Tsang Hei Man

comment: Hard ridden early but didn't muster, dropping to behind     midfield in one-off position. Put under pressure from 500m, steadied 350m when blocked for run, kept on fairly.
comment_ch: 早段受力策但未能加速，墮居中間之後位置，走第二疊。自五百米處起受催策。三百五十米處受阻時收慢，保持一般走勢。
owner: Mr & Mrs Philip Ng Yuk Wing and Michael Ng Mun Kit

comment: Looking for cover early; limited response when asked late.
comment_ch: 早段找遮擋，拉士騎落欠勁

comment: Hard ridden early, 2-3 wide just behind midfield, suited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 200M.
comment_ch: 早段受力策，走第二至第三疊，居中間稍後位置。步速甚快，適合發揮。二百米處穩步上前。

comment: Broke well, gradually taken back just off the pace, similar turning in but found nothing in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，逐漸留居領放馬稍後位置。入直路時保持相若位置，但直路上再無餘力。

comment: Pushed along from wide gate to settle on pace, tried to     challenge on straightening, battle solidly to the line.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後受推策，跟隨領放馬。入直路時嘗試展開挑戰，力拼至終點。

comment: In mid-division much further back than usual, made only     limited progress on straightening, no threat to leaders.
comment_ch: 居較慣常後頗多的中間位置，入直路時僅能略為上前，未能威脅領先馬匹。

comment: Settled on pace, unable to improve home turn, battled to    line one paced.
comment_ch: 跟隨領放馬。轉直路彎時未能推進。保持同速至終點。
owner: The Hon Ronald Arculli GBM GBS JP

comment: Slow into stride, settling in last pair along fence. Shaken up top of straight but got close to heels 150m and blocked  for run after that.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居最後兩位，走內欄。直路初受催策，一百五十米處靠近前駒的後蹄，其後受阻。

comment: Made minor progress in the Straight; not properly tested.
comment_ch: 直路稍追, 未盡全力

comment: Hard ridden to get forward position, settling in box seat   2L from leader. Put under pressure in straight but raced    ungenerously while inclined to lay in, boxing on for minor  placing.
comment_ch: 受力策以佔取前列位置，居包廂位置，落後領放馬兩個馬位。直路上受催策，但走勢欠順，傾向內閃。力拼，跑獲一席位置。

comment: Sent forward and raced in one-off one-back position, 1-1/4L off, ran on one paced to the line.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，居第二疊第二位，落後一又四分一個馬位。保持同速至終點。

comment: Quickly in front, racing wide before crossing to fence      1400m. Steadied pace then kicked clear 300m, won easily     though tiring last few strides.
comment_ch: 迅速取得領先，走外疊。千四米處移入內欄。減慢步速，三百米處加速帶離對手。最後數步漸呈疲態，但仍能從容勝出。
owner: Ming Shui Sum & Alice Ming Bo Ting

comment: Slow to begin; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，騎落欠勁

comment: Eased to rear, never a factor.
comment_ch: 收慢留居後列。從未有力一爭。
owner: Mr & Mrs Mark Fong Chung and Matthew Fong

comment: Raced midfield under restraint; never tested.
comment_ch: 拖住居中，未見真章
owner: Carter Mok Man Fung & Siemen Mok Tsoi Sin Man

comment: Limited response when under whip at 300m.
comment_ch: 三百開鞭，反應平常
owner: Frankie Wu Wing Kuen, Wu Kei Yu & Wong Lai Ying

comment: Ran on ok when asked late.
comment_ch: 拉士稍騎，中規中矩

comment: Found nothing when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段推騎，毫無進展

comment: Fractious in gate, reared at start, losing ground. Ridden   to join main field but never in the hunt, dropping to last  halfway up the straight.
comment_ch: 在閘廂內煩躁不安，開閘時以後足豎立，失位。在催策下追上主馬群，但從未參與競逐。直路中段墮退至包尾。
owner: Susan Wong Suk Ching, Ginny Man Wing Yee & Cheng Tsz Bong

comment: Missed break, recovered to 1 off with cover near rear,      bustled 500m, driven 420m, plugged on tepidly.
comment_ch: 漏閘，恢復走勢後居後列位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。五百米處受催策，四百二十米處再受催策，末段走勢一般。

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY PT BRIDAL COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶純．結婚嫁系列讓賽
comment: Away well, under riding early, settled midfield 1 off,      awkwardly placed 1100m, lost ground slightly, 3 deep 800m,  short of room 700m, ridden along 420m, took time to wind    up, found line steadily.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，早段受催策。居中間位置，走第二疊。千一米處處於窘境，略為失地。八百米處走第三疊。七百米處空位不足，四百二十米處受催策。需時加速，末段保持穩勢。

comment: Responded well when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段推騎，反應殊佳

comment: Dropped back from the wide draw to sit last by 800m, and    throwing the head around early. Didn't respond to pressure  in the straight, and eased a long way from home.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後墮後，早段擺動頭部，八百米處居包尾位置。直路上對催策毫無反應，距離終點尚遠時已收慢。

comment: Over-raced and led early; kept on for 2nd.
comment_ch: 早段搶口，放入一席

comment: Eased back, settled towards the rear, wide bid 500M, closed off well down outside, got up for 2nd near 50M, nearest     finish. (Jockey lost whip 200M.)
comment_ch: 收慢留居後列。五百米處走外疊。在外疊衝刺良佳，接近五十米處時進佔第二位，過終點時最為接近。（騎師於二百米處馬鞭脫手）

comment: Hard ridden forward, took rail and led at good pace, soon   dropped off 300M.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，移入內欄，以中等步速領放。三百米處瞬即墮退。

comment: Ridden to hold forward position but not enough sped,        crossed and shuffled back towards rear. Switched out 600m,  circled field to hit front 200m, flattened late.
comment_ch: 在催策下居前列，但前速不快，被超越後墮居後列。六百米處移出外疊，繞過馬群上前，二百米處取得領先。末段轉弱。

comment: Made progress for 4th comfortably.
comment_ch: 輕描淡寫，追回第四
owner: Mok Kam Hung & Michael Mok Kwan Yuen

comment: Pushed early but not muster, trapped 3 wide at back, never  improved.
comment_ch: 早段在推策下未能加速。居後列，走第三疊。從未能上前。

comment: Made use of inside draw to hold rail, three back from       leader. Came off fence turning for home and kept on gamely  in straight to be closest at the finish.
comment_ch: 把握自第一檔出閘的優勢貼欄競跑，落後領放馬三個馬位。入直路時移離內欄，直路上保持勁勢，過終點時最接近。

comment: Limited response when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段推騎, 反應平常
owner: Silas S S Yang, Wong Tak Wai, Ho Chi Keung & Cheung Yuk Tak

comment: Restrained after the jump, travelled in midfield along the  2-path, not quickened when driven out 300M, never dangerous.
comment_ch: 出閘後受約束，居中間位置，走第二疊。三百米處受力策時未能加速，從未能構成威脅。

comment: Settled in midfield, 5L behind the lead 2 wide, did not     improve position and ran on same paced.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬五個馬位，走第二疊。未能推進，保持同速。

comment: Eased back early, trapped 3 wide, moved forward 1000M to    take the rail and lead, took advantages from the slow pace, hung on well until 150M overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 早段收慢留後，走第三疊。一千米處上前，移入內欄帶頭，慢步速有利發揮。保持佳勢，一百五十米處被超越。持續上前，取得季軍。

comment: On pace early; laying in late when asked.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，但末段騎落有點內閃

comment: Slow out, quickly improved along rail midrace, angled out   on straightening and finished off strongly once clear.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，中段沿欄迅速上前。入直路時移出外疊，望空後即以勁勢衝刺。

comment: Jumped away well; struggled late.
comment_ch: 起步敏捷, 拉士唔多
owner: James Lau Po Man & Alice Woo Wai See

handicap: THE HONG KONG EXCHANGES CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港交易所挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Began awkwardly then badly hampered, dropping to last.      Never likely.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，其後嚴重受阻，墮至包尾。從未看似有力一爭。
owner: Albert Hung Chao Hong & Stephanie Hung Yujie

comment: Eased to settle worse than midfield 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 收慢，居中間之後位置，落後領放馬六個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。走勢一般。

handicap: POK FU LAM RESERVOIR ROAD HANDICAP
comment: Raced in midfield, 3-3/4L behind 2 wide making the first    turn, finished off strongly inside 150M to score.
comment_ch: 首次轉彎時居中間位置，落後三又四分三個馬位，走第二疊。最後一百五十米衝刺強勁，勝出賽事。

comment: Ridden forward to park outside the leader, kept on nicely   to hold 3rd.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，居領放馬外側。保持佳勢，保住季軍。
owner: Simon Leung Yuen Ho & Kirby Leung Kae Bik

handicap: THE ASSOCIATION OF HONG KONG RACING JOURNALISTS CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港評馬同業協進會挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Sat towards the rear, 5-1/2L off the pace 2 wide with       cover, harmed by the slow pace, made marginal ground only.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬五個半馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。慢步速不利發揮。僅能略為追前。
owner: Tony Lau Yiu Tong, Thomas Lau Sum Fai & Lau Yi Fai

comment: Crossed to the lead 1400M, proved difficult to settle when  being steadied behind leaders, kept on same pace in         straight, no extra passing 200M. (Lame next day)
comment_ch: 千四米處切入內欄領先，其後被超越，在領先馬匹之後收慢，但難以穩定走勢。直路上保持同速，跑過二百米處時再無餘力。（翌日不良於行。）

comment: Bumped start, in midfield 2-3/4L off along the rail,        checked near 500M when tempo slackened, kept on one paced.
comment_ch: 出閘時與他駒互相碰撞，居中間位置，落後二又四分三個馬位，走內欄。接近五百米處步速減慢時勒避，保持同速。

comment: On-pace for 3rd; ran on ok.
comment_ch: 跟前入位, 不過不失

comment: Broke with others, soon niggled to rail at rear of pack,    shifted 1 off for progress 750m, steadied 430m, not clear & checked 250m, no extra.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘。瞬即受催策，居馬群後列，走內欄。七百五十米處移出第二疊上前，四百三十米處收慢。未能望空，二百五十米處勒避。再無餘力。
owner: Albert Ngan Kam Wai, Gordon Ngan Kam Kee & Martin Ngan

comment: Broke ok, outpaced & bustled to sit behind midfield 1 off   with cover, driven 300m & edged out, quickened centre track & ran on to get up close home.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可。被拋離，在催策下居中間之後位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。三百米處受催策，移出外疊。直路上在跑道中央加速上前，接近終點時取勝。

comment: Not far off on rails, faded out of contention upon          straightening.
comment_ch: 落後領放馬不遠，走內欄。入直路時力竭，再無爭勝機會。
owner: Chan Bing Woon, Chan Hai Ming, Samson Chan Hung Sing & Chan Ming Shun

comment: Urged to lead early; weakened badly in the straight.
comment_ch: 騎住搶放, 直路散晒

comment: Shifted to grandstand rail after start; ran under his own steam.
comment_ch: 起步移出外欄，按住跟跑
