comment: Fairly away and not used up early to settle 3rd last early, on the rail and 7L off the leader. Held up in the run home  until 300m, running on OK when clear.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，早段未受催策，居尾三位置，落後領放馬七個馬位，走內欄。自直路初受困至三百米處，望空後走勢尚可。
owner: Mr & Mrs Robert Lam Chi Hing

comment: Settled worse than midfield 6L off, 2 wide with cover.      Suited to the fast pace, finished off strongly to score.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬六個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。步速甚快，適合發揮。衝刺凌厲，勝出賽事。
owner: Tony Lo Chin Ho, Kwok Ying Lung & Wong Tsz Wa

comment: Crowded start, shifted across behind runners to fence,      settling at rear. Switched out 400m, ran on fairly till     blocked 100m. Not tested final stages.
comment_ch: 出閘時受擠迫。在馬群之後移入內欄，居後列。四百米處移出外疊。走勢一般，一百米處受阻。末段未能全力發揮。
owner: Tony Lo Chin Ho, Kwok Ying Lung & Wong Tsz Wa

comment: Ridden forward to grab good spot one-back, one-off. Got     shuffled back to 5th around final turn but kept on well in  straight.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，居好位，落後一個馬位，走第二疊。轉直路彎時墮居第五位，直路上保持佳勢。
owner: The Hon Ronald Arculli GBM GBS JP & Johanna K J Arculli BBS

comment: Away on terms, outpaced early, settled near rear 3 deep,    severely checked 650m, eased right down.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，早段被拋離，居後列位置，走第三疊。六百五十米處嚴重勒避，隨即收慢。

comment: Under restraint along the rail; ran on comfortably.
comment_ch: 沿欄扣實，表現從容

comment: Laying in and ran on ordinary in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路內閃，表現一般

comment: Eased back early; ran on strongly for 2nd when shifted out in the straight.
comment_ch: 早段稍留，直路移出，追勢甚勁

comment: Raced wide in rear of midfield, slightly worse turning in,  produced some late impression closing stages.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，走外疊。入直路時略為墮後。末段衝刺良佳。

comment: Jumped away well; led all the way to score.
comment_ch: 應聲彈出，直奔終點

comment: Being ridden along; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 一早已騎，未見佳處

comment: Settled forward of midfield, hampered winning post first    time and then hung out, raced ungenerously and race wide    without cover , gave ground from 500m.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置。首次跑過終點時受阻，其後外閃，走勢欠規矩，在沒有遮擋下走外疊。自五百米處起墮退。

comment: Wide throughout; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 全程外疊, 蝕位仍近

handicap: THE HONG KONG ST JOHN AMBULANCE BRIGADE CENTENARY CELEBRATION CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港聖約翰救傷隊百週年紀念盃（讓賽）

comment: Jumped well, 2L back in 4th when unbalanced and lost        position past the Rock, found nothing in straight. (Bled)
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。跑過大石鼓時失去平衡及失位，居第四位，落後兩個馬位。直路上再無餘力。（流鼻血。）

comment: Always in touch; ran on nicely to score.
comment_ch: 前後俱備，早熟份子
owner: Mr & Mrs Chan Chung Yin and Mr & Mrs Clevin Got Chong Key

comment: Broke well, handy but trapped 3 wide no cover, pushed on    1050m to press lead, short-lived & soon retreated, faded    out tamely.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居前列位置，在沒有遮擋下走第三疊。一千零五十米處受推策，向領放馬施壓。短暫衝刺，瞬即墮退。力竭。

comment: Quickly into stride and set slow pace upfront under the     reins of 10lb claiming rider, not finishing pace of winner  200M but kept on gamely to hold 2nd just.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，在獲減十磅的騎師胯下以慢步速領放。最後二百米衝刺力不及頭馬，但仍保持勁勢。僅保住亞軍。

handicap_ch: 新加坡賽馬公會錦標（讓賽）
comment: Sat outside the lead until the field improved near 800M,    remained prominent, steadied at 100M but ran on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居領放馬外側。接近八百米處時馬群推進，保持居前競跑。一百米處收慢，但保持走勢，跑獲季軍。

comment: Shifted to centre of track at 200m; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 二百移出中檔, 追勢不弱

comment: Slow to begin; then moved forward; ran on to score when asked late.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 迅即上前, 拉士考驗險勝
owner: Karson Choi Ka Tsan & Donnie Yen Chi Tan

comment: Not quickened when under whip at turn.
comment_ch: 轉彎開鞭，未見加速
owner: Sherman Ting Wing Cheung, Joyce Ting Tung Sum & David Ting Chi Ho

comment: Settled at rear; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑, 騎落一般

comment: Raced wide in better than midfield early, taken back behind midfield to be closer to rails coming onto home bend,       switched out for a run entering straight, ran on well to    assert authority close to home.
comment_ch: 早段居中間之前位置，走外疊。入直路彎時留居中間之後位置以移近內欄。入直路時向外移出取位，以佳勢上前，接近終點時取得領先。
owner: Lau Yiu Chu, Cynthia Lau, Sandra Lau & Robert Lau

comment: Bumped start, hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 2-3 wide, no turn of foot.
comment_ch: 出閘時與對手互相碰撞，受力策保持在中間位置，走第二至第三疊。未能加速。

comment: Very slow away, behind midfield along the fence, favoured   by the fast pace, never progressed.
comment_ch: 出閘十分緩慢，居中間之後位置，走內欄。步速甚快，有利發揮。從未能上前。

comment: Led early; flattened in the Straight.
comment_ch: 望空帶放，直路勁平

comment: Eased back, 3 wide, dashed well 250M despite not suited by  the slow pace.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，走第三疊。儘管慢步速不合發揮，二百五十米處衝刺良佳。
owner: Mr & Mrs Tony Tang Wai Bun

comment: Commenced awkwardly and unbalanced, hampered at 1000m and   settled at rear, urged along home turn and ran home well.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，失去平衡。一千米處受阻礙，居後列。轉直路彎時受催策，走勢順暢。
owner: James Chan Shiu On, Joseph Chan Ho Lim, Janet Chan Ng Chee Tung & Wendy Chan Wing Kei

comment: Slow to begin; ran on well mid track for 2nd.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，修正後中檔竄上

comment: Jumped well, pressed forward 3-wide to sit outside leader,  before easing 1L behind at turn. Joined leader top of       straight, kept on till flattened 100m.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。受催策上前，居領放馬外側，走第三疊。直路彎收慢，落後領放馬一個馬位。直路早段追上領放馬。保持走勢，一百米處洩氣。

comment: Pushed up inside leader to 1200m before taking sit in       one-off position 1L behind. Moved up turning for home, hit  font 400m, boxed on to 200m before tiring.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，居領放馬內側。千二米處留居第二位，走第二疊。轉直路彎時上前。四百米處取得領先，力拼，二百米處漸呈疲態。

comment: Broke well from the one draw, driven along to assume lead   on rails, broke over 1L clear early in straight but soon    tiring.
comment_ch: 自第一檔出閘迅速，在催策下領先，走內欄。直路初帶離逾一個馬位，但瞬即呈現疲態。

comment: Always well there and ridden early, fought on steadily      without threatening.
comment_ch: 沿途居前列，早段受催策。持續力拼，但未能構成威脅。
owner: Mr & Mrs Robert Chan Chin Yuan

comment: Hit the line strongly when shifted out in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路移出, 追勢甚佳

comment: Jumped away well; kept on for 2nd.
comment_ch: 起步敏捷，放入一席

comment: On-pace early; dashed on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑, 衝刺有力
owner: Mr & Mrs Baffin Wong Yu Kwan

comment: Settled worse than midfield 6.5Ls behind the leader on the  fence, made some ground in straight.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬六個半馬位，走內欄。直路上上前少許。

comment: Under restraint early; ran on ordinary when asked.
comment_ch: 早段撐實，騎落一般

comment: On pace early; weakened in the Straight and dropped back.
comment_ch: 跟放兩段, 直路乏力墮退

handicap: THE PENINSULA GOLDEN JUBILEE CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
comment: Shifted out on jumping and bumped another, dropping to      rear. Travelled keenly passing 700m, taken very wide in     straight, one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘時向外斜跑，碰撞對手，繼而墮居後列。跑過七百米處時搶口，直路上走大外疊。保持同速。

comment: On-pace early; ran on well for 3rd.
comment_ch: 跟前入位, 姿態輕鬆

comment: Urged to lead early; kept on for 2nd.
comment_ch: 搶放第二，拉士唔斷

comment: Under a hold throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 沿途按實，未受考驗

comment: Ran on ordinary; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 走勢平常, 未有好感
owner: Johnny Wong Ka Keung, Ernest Ip Koon Wing, Christopher Chan Wai Tong & Michael Cheng Woon Yin

comment: Jumped away well; kept on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 起步敏捷, 放入一席

comment: Speed to edge lead on outer, rolled 1L clear 1250m &        crossed to rail, under pressure & headed 350m, found nil &  weakened out.
comment_ch: 在外疊加速上前領先，一千二百五十米處帶離一個馬位，移入內欄。三百五十米處受催策，被超越。再無餘力，轉弱。

comment: Slow to begin; caught the eye when quickened to score at 400m.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，四百發力，後上悅目

comment: Eased at start, took cover at rear, but trapped 2-3 wide,   lack turn of foot.
comment_ch: 起步後收慢，居後列有遮擋位置，但走第二至第三疊。未能加速。

comment: Settled worse than midfield about 5Ls behind the leader on  the fence, harmed by the very slow sectionals, never looked likely.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬約五個馬位，走內欄。步速十分緩慢，不利發揮。從未看似有力一爭。

comment: Stumbled start, raced at tail 1 off, edged 3 wide on turn,  hard-ridden into stretch, never a factor, eased when beaten.
comment_ch: 起步時失蹄，居尾列，走第二疊。直路彎移出第三疊。入直路時受力策，從未有力一爭，洩氣後收慢。
owner: Dr Daniel Lee Tin Chak, Daisy Ho Chiu Fung, Pansy Ho Chiu King & Maisy Ho Chiu Ha

comment: Jumped away OK; kept on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 起步順利，放入一席
owner: Matthew C M Yum, Christopher Carson Yum, Nicholas Kevin Yum & Stephanie Carrie Yum

comment: Sluggish start, taken back from widest to race last pair on outer, driven 500m & awkward on bend, swung very wide into  stretch, never a factor in weakening run home.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘緩慢，留居最後兩位，走外疊。五百米處受催策，直路彎走勢笨拙，入直路時移出大外疊。直路上轉弱，從未參與競逐。
owner: Matthew C M Yum, Christopher Carson Yum, Nicholas Kevin Yum & Stephanie Carrie Yum

comment: Urged to lead early; stayed on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 沿途快放, 末段仲有

handicap: THE HONG KONG RIDING FOR THE DISABLED ASSOCIATION CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港傷健策騎協會盃（讓賽）
comment: Ridden early to hold forward position but shuffled back     first turn, dropping to rear. Took inside run in straight   but found nothing under pressure.
comment_ch: 早段受催策，居前列位置。首次轉彎時墮居後列。直路上走內疊，但在催策下再無餘力。
owner: Stephen Ho Wai Man, Fred Ho Ka Chun & Derek Ho Ka Chung

comment: Broke well, bustled throughout to race 1 back 1 off 4th,    lost ground & hard at it turning in, boxed on & closed late to snag 2nd on nod.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，沿途受催策，居第四位，落後一個馬位，走第二疊。入直路時失地，奮起力追。末段力拼，在叮噹馬頭下跑獲第二。

handicap: HKU FACULTIES OF DENTISTRY AND EDUCATION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 港大牙醫學院與教育學院讓賽
comment: No speed, racing between horses at rear. Lost position      around turn and plodded on one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 缺乏前速。居後列，在馬匹之間競跑。直路彎失位，直路上保持同速。

handicap: POK FU LAM PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 薄扶林公眾騎術學校讓賽
comment: Tardy break, sat rail midfield, shifted 1 off 650m &        shuffled back, shaken up 400m, stayed on gamely to claim    3rd.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居中間位置，走內欄。六百五十米處移至第二疊及墮退。四百米處受催策，保持勁勢，取得季軍。

comment: Being niggled throughout; not stretching out properly.
comment_ch: 騎足全程，步伐凌亂
owner: Mr & Mrs Edward Chan Chi Keung

comment: Slotted into midfield initially, then improved to race      prominently along the Back Straight, however not            competitive.
comment_ch: 早段居中間位置。對面直路上推進至前列，但其後毫無競爭力。
owner: Mr & Mrs Kenny Cheng Tsin Ki

comment: Jumped with field, hard ridden to stay with pace but kept   wide. Allowed to slide forward from midfield to race        outside leader from 800m but spent force on straightening   and dropped out quickly. Unacceptable performance.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，受力策以跟上步速，但走外疊。獲許由中間位置上前，自八百米處起居領放馬外側位置。入直路時再無餘力，迅速墮退。表現難以接受。

comment: Ran on ok when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段推騎, 幾肯追馬

handicap: TUEN MUN PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 屯門公眾騎術學校讓賽
comment: Settled at rear, never in it, lame right front leg.
comment_ch: 居後列，從未參與競逐。右前腿不良於行。

comment: Gradually taken up to sit midfield, before crowded out of   his run at 900m and losing ground. Held up early in the     straight, and only started to get moving at 150m, and had   no time to make any impression.
comment_ch: 在催策下逐漸佔取中間位置，九百米處受擠迫並失地。直路初受困，一百五十米處始能發力，但為時已晚，再無表現。

comment: Began awkwardly, ridden along one-off, three-back before    steadied off heels 800m. Boxed on one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，受催策，落後三個馬位，走第二疊。八百米處收慢避開他駒後蹄。直路上保持同速。

comment: Broke ok, bustled forward to rail fore of midfield, minor   advance on turn, in pocket 400m, minor check 300m, soon     emptied & faded.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策上前，居中間之前位置，走內欄。直路彎略為追前，四百米處受困，三百米處輕微勒避，瞬即再無餘力及力竭。

comment: Began only fairly, hard ridden forward but failed to muster speed and detached from field 600M, never in the picture.   (Jockey : horse did not show interest in the race / Lame    next day.)
comment_ch: 出閘僅屬普通，受力策上前，但未能加速，六百米處被馬群拋離。從未參與競逐。（騎師表示坐騎對競賽失去興趣／翌日不良於行。）
owner: Helena Wai Suk Chong & Cheung Kwok Wing

comment: Settled in 4th one-out-one-back, soon came under pressure   to challenge after straightening but found no response.
comment_ch: 居第二疊第二位，即馬群中的第四位。入直路後瞬即受催策展開挑戰，但毫無反應。

comment: Eased back early; hit the line strong when clear.
comment_ch: 早段稍留，望空湧上

comment: Dropped back from the wide draw to be the early back        marker, 12L off the leader. Only ran on fairly in the       straight, and never threatened.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後墮後，早段居包尾位置，落後領放馬十二個馬位。直路上走勢僅屬一般，從未構成威脅。
owner: Cheung Sui Ling & Steven Leung Man Hung

comment: Ran comfortably for 2nd; plenty in hand.
comment_ch: 紋風不動，大把在手

comment: Hard ridden to hold the rail in midfield, benefited by the  fast pace, progressed steadily 300M to score.
comment_ch: 受力策固守內欄，居中間位置，快步速有利發揮。三百米處逐漸上前，取得勝利。

handicap: THE HONG KONG UNIVERSITY ALUMNI ASSOCIATION CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港大學校友會挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Began well, rolled forward three-wide 4L from leader. Put   under pressure turning for home and boxed on gamely but     unable close gap.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速後上前，落後領放馬四個馬位，走第三疊。轉直路彎時受催策，以勁勢力拼，但未能追近對手。

comment: Began awkwardly, held up behind midfield early stages,      shuffled back further 800M, brief effort inside 300M down   the inside, lacked the needed late response.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，早段居中間之後位置。八百米處進一步墮退，最後三百米在內疊一度發力。末段在催策下未能作出反應。

comment: Bounded in the air at start, ridden to make up ground,      settling 4L from leader at turn. Taken wide entering        straight, finished strongly down centre track to win on     line.
comment_ch: 起步時向上跳躍，受催策追前。轉彎時落後領放馬四個馬位。入直路時移出外疊。在跑道中央衝刺強勁。過終點時勝出。

comment: Eased early; dashed strongly to win when cleared.
comment_ch: 早段稍留, 望空湧上

comment: Showed good early speed; kept on well to score.
comment_ch: 速高帶到，靱力增強
result_ch: 只准參與一千米直路賽

comment: Bounced well, ridden along inside early leader before       settling one-back, one-off. Lost position turning for home, but kept on gamely to line.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，早段居領放馬內側，其後居第二疊第二位。轉彎時失位，但持續力拼至終點。

comment: Led early; weakened when under whip late.
comment_ch: 搶欄快放, 末段鞭騎欠勁
owner: Lincoln Ling & Fione Yip Sze Pui

comment: On-pace for 3rd; moved better than before.
comment_ch: 跟前入位，走勢比前進步

comment: Settled in worse than midfield along the rail, 6-1/2L       behind. Ran home one paced.
comment_ch: 沿欄居中間之後位置，落後六個半馬位。直路上保持同速。

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY LOVE IS BEAUTY COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶愛很美系列讓賽
comment: Hard ridden to keep up at back, not suited by the slow      tempo, never improved.
comment_ch: 在力策下保持居後列位置。步速緩慢，不合發揮。從未能推進。
owner: Mr & Mrs Baffin Wong Yu Kwan

comment: Up with the pace early; flattened in the straight.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，直路勁平

comment: Eased back early; came from behind to run 3rd.
comment_ch: 留前試後，望空撲上
owner: Mr & Mrs Horatio Ho Yiu Wing, Ho Garrick Sai Man and Ho Leslie Sai Kit

comment: Soon in rear, finished off race well down the centre of the home straight.
comment_ch: 瞬即居後列。直路上在跑道中央競跑，末段衝刺甚佳。

comment: Taken back, raced midfield 1 off with cover, forced 3 deep  650m, driven 400m, closed centre track to take 3rd.
comment_ch: 留居中間位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。六百五十米處須走第三疊。四百米處受催策。在跑道中央衝刺，取得季軍。
owner: Wong Wai Kan & Dr William Wong Tsing Wai

comment: Began well, ridden but unable to hold position, dropping to last pair. Never competitive.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策，但未能保持位置，墮居最後兩位。從未有力一爭。

comment: Finished last; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 包尾而回, 毫無表現

comment: Inconvenienced soon after jumping and dropped back to sit   worse than midfield, 1 off the fence. Never kicked in the   straight.
comment_ch: 出閘後瞬即受妨礙，墮居中間之後位置，走第二疊。直路上從未能發力。

comment: Began fairly and rolled into a prominent position, 1-1/2L   behind, 2 wide with cover. Shifted out upon final 300M to   run and stormed home to score.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，佔取前列位置，落後一個半馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。最後三百米向外移出取位，衝刺凌厲，跑獲頭馬。

comment: Steadied soon after start and shifted across behind         runners, settling at rear. Made forward move turning for    home, wide in straight, ran on steadily to be closest at    finish.
comment_ch: 出閘後瞬即收慢，在馬群之後切入內疊，居後列位置。轉入直路時上前，直路上走外疊，保持穩勢，終點線上最為接近。

comment: Sluggish start, soon detached at tail on rail & bustled,    hard driven into stretch, found nil, never a factor.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢。瞬即被拋離，居包尾位置，走內欄，受催策。入直路時受力策，再無餘力。從未構成威脅。

comment: Raced keenly early; ran on ordinary when asked late.
comment_ch: 早段望空有點搶口, 直路騎落欠勁

comment: Began awkwardly, settled towards rear 6Ls off the pace, bid wide 500M, closed off soundly to go 2nd near line, not      reached winner.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，居後列位置，落後領放馬六個馬位。五百米處走外疊，以勁勢衝刺，終點前跑獲第二，未能追上頭馬。

comment: Well there on stands rail, kept on without quickening under pressure inside final 300 metres. (Saddle shifted)
comment_ch: 居好位，走外欄。最後三百米在催策下保持走勢，但未能加速。（馬鞍滑移。）

comment: Raced behind runners; ran on fairly well when clear late.
comment_ch: 全程跟馬林, 拉士望空, 餘勢不俗

comment: Ridden along early to hold forward position, settling       one-off 3L from leader. Made forward move on straightening  but run petered out 200m and faded.
comment_ch: 早段在催策下保持前列位置，落後領放馬三個馬位，走第二疊。入直路時開始上前，二百米處逐漸轉弱，力竭。

comment: Crowded at start; wide throughout; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 起步擠迫, 全程外疊, 仍覺稚嫩

comment: Always in touch; led all the way to score.
comment_ch: 前後俱備，帶放到底

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY PT BRIDAL COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶純．結婚嫁系列讓賽
comment: Jumped strong, scrubbed along to lead, momentary lead       1300m, joined and headed 920m, 2nd on outside, under a ride 530m, weakened tamely.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策，千三米處一度取得領先。九百二十米處被趕上及超越，居領放馬外側第二位。五百三十米處受催策，其後乏力轉弱。
owner: Joseph Choi Yip Leung & Choi Fong Hon Mei

handicap: CHEVALIER COLD STORAGE AND LOGISTICS HANDICAP

comment: Began well from a wide draw, raced 3 wide with cover, 2 to  3 lengths back in midfield, carried wider turning in,       finished off very strongly in straight to score with        something in hand.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘迅速，居中間位置，落後兩至三個馬位，在有遮擋下走第三疊。入直路時移出更外疊。直路上衝刺凌厲，勝來游刃有餘。

handicap: THE ASSOCIATION OF HONG KONG RACING JOURNALISTS CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港評馬同業協進會挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Lost ground on turning head at start, hard ridden but       didn't muster, settling at rear. Last into straight, kept   shifting ground to find clear running, surged forward when  clear but tightened final stages and not ridden out.
comment_ch: 出閘時將頭轉側，因而失地，受力策但未能加速，居後列位置。包尾入直路，不斷轉換跑線以圖望空，望空後奮力衝刺，但末段受緊迫，未能全力施為。

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 4.5Ls behind the leader 3 wide    with cover, ran on steadily for 4th without threatening.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬四個半馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。保持穩勢，未能構成威脅，跑獲殿軍。

comment: Ridden out early; weakened badly in the straight.
comment_ch: 起步已騎, 直路散晒

comment: Settled in front of midfield 2 wide, closed off strongly    300M for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，走第二疊。三百米處衝刺強勁，跑獲季軍。

comment: Began well, but not used up early and taken to sit in       midfield, 3 wide with cover. Ran strongly to the line       despite a tendency to lay in, and pulled away in the last   100m.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，早段未受催策，留居中間位置，在有遮擋下走第三疊。末段傾向內閃，但走勢強勁，最後一百米帶離勝出。

comment: Jumped well, settled at handy position, under pressure and  weakened in the straight, failed to make impression.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居前列位置。直路上受催策，其後轉弱。未能構成威脅。

comment: Began well, taken forward settling one-out, one-back. Put   under pressure turning for home but only one-paced, tiring  final 100m.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前，居第二疊第二位。轉直路彎時受催策，但僅能保持同速，最後一百米呈現疲態。
owner: Mr & Mrs Sebastian Man Shiu Wai

comment: On pace racing wide; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 外疊跟前, 拉士按返

comment: Hit the front at turn; ran on strongly to score.
comment_ch: 彎位透出，直奔終點
owner: Eric Cheng Kam Chung & Vene Cheng Wing Ni

comment: Tracked leader early stages, drifted back to midfield down  the back-straight, 7Ls off runaway leader at 400M, kept     grinding to the line, creditable performance against much   higher rated rivals.
comment_ch: 早段跟隨領放馬。對面直路上墮居中間位置。四百米處落後遙遙領先的領放馬七個馬位。持續力拼至終點。面對評分遠高於自己的對手仍能交出頗佳表現。

comment: At rear throughout, never looked likely.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列，從未看似有力一爭。
owner: Mr & Mrs Simon Suen Siu Man

handicap: HKU JOCKEY CLUB STUDENT VILLAGES HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 香港大學賽馬會舍堂村讓賽
comment: Only fairly away, and found a position just worse than      midfield 4 wide. Shifted out, bumped heavily and unbalanced at 900m. Race was over by turn, and faded out.
comment_ch: 出閘僅屬一般。居中間稍後位置，走第四疊。九百米處向外斜跑，與對手大力碰撞，失去平衡。直路彎大勢已去，並且力竭。

comment: Good break, settled midfield on rail, crowded on turn,      driven into stretch & shifted out, quickened to lead 100m,  drew clear.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居中間位置，走內欄。直路彎受擠迫。入直路時受催策，向外移出。加速上前，一百米處取得領先，帶離勝出。

comment: Held ground throughout; asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 不上不落, 直路有騎

comment: Last to jump; never in contention.
comment_ch: 起步最慢，毫無走勢

comment: Always in touch; hit the front at 300m.
comment_ch: 且戰且走，三百透出

comment: Not quickened when being asked late.
comment_ch: 末段推騎，未見加速
owner: Clement Ma Kang Ching, Josiah Ma Pok Man & David Ma Yeuk Lai

comment: Wide throughout; ran on ok under a hold.
comment_ch: 全程外叠，按住追趕

comment: Crowded out and lost ground start, hard ridden to stay at   midfield one-away from outer fence. Urged forward from 350m but hampered 150m when finishing nicely.
comment_ch: 出閘後受擠迫並失地，受大力催策以保持中間位置，走外欄第二疊。自三百五十米處起受催策上前，一百五十米處受阻，衝刺良佳。
owner: Mr & Mrs George Chang and George Hing Chang

comment: Camped handy, travelled 2Ls behind the leader 3 wide with   cover, kept on one pace to the line.
comment_ch: 居有利位置，落後領放馬兩個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。保持同速至終點。

comment: Began well, racing with leading pack before forging ahead   and crossing to rail 1600m. Passed 960m, 4th into straight, faded from 250m.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，與領放馬匹並跑。千六米處加速上前，切入內欄。九百六十米處被超越。入直路時居第四位。自二百五十米處起力竭。

comment: Not quickened when ridden out on the rail.
comment_ch: 沿欄推騎, 無加速力

comment: Quickened at turn; ran on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 彎位發力，衝刺甚佳

handicap: THE HONG KONG RACEHORSE OWNERS ASSOCIATION TROPHY (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港馬主協會錦標（讓賽）
comment: Began well, raced 2 wide in 4th, travelled well on turn,    finished off very strongly in straight to score easily.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居第四位，走第二疊。直路彎走勢良佳。直路上衝刺凌厲，輕鬆掄元。

comment: Slow start, outpaced & bustled near rear, checked off heels 1080m & shuffled to 2nd last, under pump at tail 500m, hard ridden to pass beaten rivals.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，被拋離，受催策，居後列。一千零八十米處勒避前駒的後蹄，墮居尾二位置。五百米處受催策，居包尾位置。受力策，超越數匹已洩氣的對手。

comment: Average to begin, positioned 2 lengths or so back on rail,  steadied near 500M, no daylight early in straight, made     some progress when clear near 250M to get 3rd.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，落後約兩個馬位，走內欄。接近五百米處時收慢。直路初未能望空。接近二百五十米處望空後略為追前，跑獲季軍。

comment: Began well from a wide gate, worked his way to lead on      rails passing the 1000m but soon joined on top of home      bend, resisted challenge from the same horse throughout     home straight, outclassed by winner final stages.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘良佳，受催策上前，跑過一千米處時取得領先，走內欄。直路彎初瞬即被追上，直路上沿途力拒同一對手的挑戰，末段被強勁頭馬趕過。
owner: Peter P C Fan, Montgomery Ho Shun Wah & Dr Michael Mok Hing Hung

comment: Quickened steadily; performed nicely to win.
comment_ch: 逐步上前, 表現成熟

comment: Pushed forward from the wide draw to eventually share the   lead, 1 off the fence. Faded from the 350m, and dropped     back through the field from there.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受推策上前，其後並排領先，走第二疊。自三百五十米處起力竭，在馬群中墮退。
owner: Joseph Choi Yip Leung & Choi Fong Hon Mei

comment: Ran under his own steam; under a hold late up grandstand rail.
comment_ch: 沿外欄順走，按實而回

comment: Made ground along the rail to score; moved better than before.
comment_ch: 沿欄追上, 重現生氣

comment: Sent forward to follow the leader along the fence, switched to 2 wide 800M, kept on strongly until final stride beaten  by the winner.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，跟隨領放馬，沿欄競跑。八百米處移至第二疊。保持勁勢，最後一步不敵頭馬。

comment: Hard ridden early, trapped 3 wide in midfield, moved        forward 800M to take advantages from the slow tempo,        emptied 300M, checked 250M.
comment_ch: 早段受力策，居中間位置，走第三疊。慢步速有利發揮，八百米處上前，三百米處再無餘力，二百五十米處勒避。
owner: Tang Yip Sau Yung & Tang Kwok Yung

comment: Hard ridden to maintain box seat, ran on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 在力策下佔取包廂位置，以佳勢上前，取得亞軍。
owner: Steven Chan Sheung Chi & Kenneth Chan Sheung Yan

comment: Crowded early and eased back to sit at the rear of the      field, 1 off the fence. Never got a run early in the        straight, before finally getting clear, then bumped at      200m. Improved well in the limited time he had late.
comment_ch: 早段受擠迫，繼而收慢留居馬群後列，走第二疊。直路早段未能取得空位上前，其後始能望空。二百米處被碰撞。末段在有限時間內以佳勢追前。

comment: Eased back, never a factor.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，從未參與競逐。
owner: Mr & Mrs So Chun Yu and Celine So

comment: Hampered shortly after the start, back to beyond midfield & niggled, clicked up 500m, short of room 400m, checked 300m, couldn't pick up.
comment_ch: 起步後不久受阻礙，墮居中間之後位置，受催策。五百米處受催策。四百米處空位不足。三百米處勒避，其後未能加速。

comment: Raced handy; dashed ok for 2nd.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑, 追勢不差
owner: Dr Eric Li Ka Cheung, Omelia Li Kwan Chi Hing & Krizia Li Po Yee

comment: Taken back from the wide draw to sit at the rear of the     field. Started to improve from the top of the straight, but eased out of the race when jockey became concerned about    horses breathing.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後留居馬群後列。自直路初起開始推進，但騎師關注其呼吸聲，因而收慢。
owner: Dr & Mrs Horace Ngan Kit Keung

comment: Jumped away well; ran on strongly to score.
comment_ch: 起步敏捷, 愈走愈順
owner: Siu Chor Kee, Chu Man Chung & Tam Ping Lap

comment: Taken forward early, sitting very wide rounding the first   turn before finding a position in 5th, 1 off the fence.     Didn't respond in the straight, and was eased a long way    from home.
comment_ch: 早段受催策上前，首次轉彎時走大外疊，其後居第五位，走第二疊。直路上在催策下毫無反應，距離終點尚遠已收慢。

comment: Wide throughout; ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 全程蝕位, 但走勢唔曳

comment: Pushed forward to occupy the box seat, kept on steadily for 3rd.
comment_ch: 受推策上前佔取包廂位置。保持穩勢，取得季軍。

comment: Came from behind to run 4th; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 後上第四, 但試來仍嫩
owner: Simon Tam Ngak Chou & Tam Hin Chi

comment: With leaders early, eased back to sit ahead of midfield,    tracked the path of eventual winner turning home, tried     hard to the finish but couldn't bridge gap.
comment_ch: 早段並排領先，其後收慢留居中間之前位置。轉入直路時跟隨頭馬，奮力追前，但未能追近。
owner: Dr John Shum Ding Ping, Dr Lawrence Chan Pui Wing & Francis Hung See Wai

comment: Eased back took rail, favoured by the fast pace, worked     around the field in 3 wide from 600M, ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，移入內欄。快步速有利發揮。自六百米處起受催策繞過馬群上前，走第三疊，走勢一般。

comment: Crowded out start, raced 2 wide 2 lengths back in 6th,      similar position on turn, finished off one-paced.
comment_ch: 起步時受擠迫，居第六位，落後兩個馬位，走第二疊。直路彎居相若位置。末段保持同速。
owner: Shum Mak Ling, Hsu Wei Hsuan, Arthur Chiu Wing Hong & Gary Cheung Hang Ngai

comment: Camped handy, travelled 1.5Ls behind the leader, flattened  badly 400M, tailed out.
comment_ch: 居有利位置，落後領放馬一個半馬位。四百米處嚴重洩氣，尾隨而回。

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, despite not suited by the slow sectionals, peeled    widest turning in, made some ground in straight.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬五個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。步速緩慢，不合發揮。入直路時移出最外疊。直路上略為追前。
owner: Charles Tung Chung Ho, Ronald Tung Pit Shing & Tung Pit Ching

comment: Quickened for 2nd when under whip late.
comment_ch: 末段開鞭, 加速第二

comment: Away well, driven forward to settle one-out, one-back.      Looked a chance turning for home but only one-paced in      straight.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前，居第二疊第二位。轉直路彎時看似具爭勝機會，但直路上僅能保持同速。

comment: Jumped fairly, settled in midfield or just behind, given    reminders rounding home bend, made steady headway under     pressure in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居中間或稍後位置。轉直路彎時受催策，直路上在催策下以穏定走勢上前。

comment: Rolled forward to park outside the leader, found cover      1200M, dropped off 600M, finished tailed out.
comment_ch: 上前居於領放馬外側位置。千二米處取得遮擋。六百米處墮退，遙遙尾隨而回。
owner: Mr & Mrs Yeung Chi Hung, Ben Yeung Siu Chung and Yeung Kar Yan

comment: Began well from gate 1, positioned 1-2L back on rail, saved ground to turn, kept to inside after straightening, checked near 200M, made good late progress thereafter to be nearest on line. (Finished 5th but promoted to 4th on protest.)
comment_ch: 自第一檔出閘迅速，落後一至兩個馬位，走內欄。直路彎前走內疊節省腳程，入直路後持續走內疊。接近二百米處時勒避，其後追前甚多，過終點時最為接近。（以第五名過終點，但經抗議後獲升至第四名。）

comment: Best to jump, allowed to settle just behind speed, sat 3rd  on inside, nowhere to go 550m, pushed back to 9th into      straight, off rail 250m, checked 200m, switched back to     inside, luckless, finished strongly.
comment_ch: 出閘最快，獲許留居領放馬稍後第三位，走內欄。五百五十米處無路可上。入直路時墮居第九位。二百五十米處移離內欄。二百米處勒避，移回內欄，空位不足，衝刺強勁。

comment: Ran on fairly well when made ground between runners.
comment_ch: 馬林湧上，表現不差

comment: Initially in midfield but stayed 4 wide, near 800M was then allowed to improve slightly to race 3 wide without cover,   found no extra near 300M and eased down.
comment_ch: 早段居中間位置，走第四疊。接近八百米處時略為推進，在沒遮擋下走第三疊。接近三百米處時再無餘力，繼而收慢。
owner: Mrs Kao Chan Ming Man & Cheung Ka Wai

comment: At back early, 4Ls behind the leader in the middle part of  the track, kept on fairly until weakened final 100M.
comment_ch: 早段居後列，落後領放馬四個馬位，在跑道中央競跑。保持普通走勢，最後一百米轉弱。

comment: Began well, settling just forward of midfield, on the       fence. Well placed on the turn, but only 1 paced to the     wire.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居中間稍前位置，走內欄。直路彎居好位，但僅能保持同速至終點。

comment: At rear, travelled 5Ls behind the leader close to the outer fence, finished off nicely for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬五個馬位，靠近外欄競跑。以佳勢衝刺，跑獲季軍。
owner: Samson Yip Yan Tion & David Vrijmoed

comment: Under a hold to race behind runners; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 拖住跟跑，未見佳處

comment: Head turned sideways throughout; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 沿途頭側側，走勢一般
owner: Stephen So Chi Ming & Samuel Chan Ying Leung

comment: Pressed forward racing 3-wide without cover 3L from leader. Rolled forward to look a chance turning for home, still in  contention 200m before tiring.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，落後領放馬三個馬位，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。轉直路彎時持續上前，看似具爭勝機會。二百米處仍有力爭勝，但漸呈疲態。

comment: Came home for 3rd along the rail when asked.
comment_ch: 末段考驗, 沿欄趕上

comment: Under a hold in the Straight; never tested.
comment_ch: 直路按返, 未受考驗

comment: Tightened at start, trailed the field to straight, kept on  past well-beaten horses.
comment_ch: 出閘時受緊迫，入直路前尾隨群駒。保持走勢，超越數匹洩氣潰敗的對手。

comment: Towards the rear early stages, strode forward along the     3-path when pace slackened middle stages, with leaders      making home turn but had little left entering straight,     soon beaten and eased.
comment_ch: 早段居後列。中段賽事步速減慢時上前，走第三疊。直路彎與領先馬匹並跑，入直路時再無餘力。瞬即洩氣及收慢。
owner: Hui Yip Wing & Hui Chen Shu Ling

handicap: THE HONG KONG JOCKEY CLUB COMMUNITY TROPHY (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港賽馬會社群盃（讓賽）
comment: Ridden forward from a wide, settling 4L from leader but     wide. Ran very wide passing 500m and bumped another, faded  quickly in straight.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受催策上前，落後領放馬四個馬位，走外疊。跑過五百米處時走大外疊，被對手碰撞。直路上迅速力竭。

handicap_ch: 法國賽馬及育馬委員會讓賽
comment: Settled in front of midfield, 2-1/2L off along the rail,    raced keenly, kept on one paced to the line.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，落後兩個半馬位，走內欄，搶口。保持同速至終點。
owner: The Executors of the Estate of the late George Wong Kin Wah

comment: Trapped 4 wide in midfield without cover, harmed by the     slow pace, dashed strongly 400M despite all negative racing situations.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，走第四疊，沒有遮擋。步速緩慢，不利發揮。雖然形勢不利，但四百米處仍以勁勢衝刺。

comment: Raced midfield; ran on only fairly.
comment_ch: 居中跟跑, 走勢平常

comment: Began well but not pushed, settling four-back, one-off. Got tightened and lost position 1100m, one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，但未受催策。落後領放馬四個馬位，走第二疊。千一米處受緊迫，失位。直路上保持同速。

comment: Bumped at start, settled off pace, asked for effort at      400m, ran home strongly in straight.
comment_ch: 起步時碰撞對手，居領放馬之後。四百米處受催策。直路上衝刺強勁。
owner: James Lau Chi Wing, Lau Kai Tai & Michelle Lau Wing Sheung

comment: On-pace early; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢，直路按返

comment: Began well and taken forward early to be handily placed in  5th, 1 off the fence and keen. Began to run on well, before being tightened from the 200m and checked out of run 150m,  losing ground. Never recovered and eased to line.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，早段受催策上前，居有利的第五位，走第二疊，跑來搶口。開始以佳勢上前，自二百米處起受緊迫。一百五十米處勒避，因而失地，其後從未能恢復走勢，末段收慢。

comment: Led under good early speed to score; performed progressively.
comment_ch: 速高帶到，走勢轉熟

comment: Towards the rear, kept on steadily without quickening in    straight.
comment_ch: 居後列。直路上保持穩勢，未能加速。
owner: Au Kai Kwong, Yu Chun Hong, Cissy Yu Wing Sze & Winnie Yu Wing Yin

comment: Urged forward under 10lb claimer, steadied the pace once in the lead, led down the straight until 250M, faded late      stages.
comment_ch: 在獲減十磅的騎師胯下受催策上前，取得領先後瞬即減慢步速。直路上沿途領先直至二百五十米處。末段力竭。

comment: Awkward start, eased, settled beyond midfield on rail,      improved to midfield 900m, ridden 500m, never in it.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，收慢，居中間之後位置，走內欄。九百米處上前居中間位置。五百米處受催策，從未有力一爭。

handicap: HKU FACULTIES OF MEDICINE AND ENGINEERING HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 港大醫學院與工程學院讓賽
comment: Broke well & rousted initially in front rank, settled 1     back on fence, niggled 550m, driven into stretch, found nil & weakened tamely.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。初段受催策，居前列位置，落後一個馬位，走內欄。五百五十米處受催策，入直路時再受催策。再無餘力，轉弱墮退。

comment: Been ridden early; finished last.
comment_ch: 早段已騎，包尾而回

comment: Taken across behind runners, held up 2nd last 7Ls off the   pace, shifted back to inside for clear run 250M, kept on    moderately for non-threatening 5th.
comment_ch: 在馬群之後移入內疊，留居尾二位置，落後領放馬七個馬位。二百五十米處移回內疊望空，保持普通走勢，取得第五名，未能構成威脅。

comment: Broke ok, taken back, soon outpaced & bustled near rear 1   off with cover, shifted 3 deep & ridden on turn, last trio  & under pump into stretch, plodded on tamely.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，留後。瞬即被拋離，居後列，受催策，走第二疊，有遮擋。轉彎時移至第三疊，受催策。入直路時居最後三位，受催策，走勢疲乏。

comment: Pushed early but not muster, at back along the fence, not   suited by the slow pace, no turn of foot.
comment_ch: 早段受推策，但未能加速，居後列，走內欄。慢步速不合發揮，未有增速。
owner: Lau Che Keung, Xie Bangrong & Cheung Hiu Shun

comment: Up with the pace; limited response when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 跟前，直路騎落唔多

comment: Wide throughout; impressive.
comment_ch: 全程外疊，走勢悅目

comment: Shifted in at break & impeded rivals, snatched back to      tail, niggled along 600m & ridden for minor progress on     turn, plodded home tamely.
comment_ch: 出閘後向內斜跑，阻礙對手，留居包尾位置。六百米處受催策，直路彎在催策下略為追前，走勢疲乏至終點。
owner: Wong Wai Kan & Dr William Wong Tsing Wai

comment: Hard ridden forward 2 wide, pace good, dropped off quickly  400M.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，走第二疊，步速甚快。四百米處迅速墮退。

comment: Quickened at turn; ran on for 2nd and not fully tested.
comment_ch: 彎位發力, 點到即止

comment: Jumped well, ridden early to go forward before settling     behind midfield in one-out position. Dropped back steadily  around turn before plodding home in the straight.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。早段受催策上前。其後居中間之後位置，走第二疊。轉彎時逐漸墮退。直路上保持同速。

comment: Tardy start; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 起步麻麻，走勢一般
owner: Damian Yap Chun Wing & Alfred Donald Yap

comment: Raced under his own steam; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 全程跟跑, 未受考驗

comment: Jumped OK, ridden forward but didn't settle until turn when two-back and one-off. Checked approaching 700m, had clear   run in straight and ran on strongly.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，受催策上前，但轉彎前未能穩定走勢。轉彎時落後領放馬兩個馬位，走第二疊。趨近七百米處時勒避。直路上能夠望空，走勢強勁。

comment: Always in firing line, took over command 300M, rallied when challengers loomed large 150M, headed by first 2 final      stages.
comment_ch: 沿途居前列，三百米處控制大局。一百五十米處力拒大幅追前的對手，末段被前兩名馬匹超越。

handicap: POK FU LAM COUNTRY PARK HANDICAP
comment: Hard ridden from an outside draw to lead, crossing to fence 1700m. Started to race keenly when challenged up front      1400m, setting hot pace to 200m when emptied.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受力策取得領先。千七米處切入內欄。千四米處在領放下受挑戰時開始搶口。步速甚快，二百米處再無餘力。

comment: Pushed forward along rail, taking clear lead passing 850m   and slowing pace. Kicked clear soon after straightening and kept on strongly to the line.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，走內欄。跑過八百五十米處時取得領先，減慢步速。入直路後瞬即加速帶離。保持勁勢至終點。

comment: Under a hold for 3rd; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 按實第三，見好即收
owner: Charles Chan Kam Kwong, Bruce Lee Sing Keung & Yuen Shun Yiu

comment: Slow to begin; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，走勢平常
owner: Alfred Chong Kin Ngai & Jack Chong Chun Kit

comment: Broke well, settled just off the pace on rails, shuffled    further back in 6th coming out of far side, baulked after   straightening to the 200 metres, kept on. (Questioned for   disappointing performance)
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居領放馬稍後位置，走內欄。跑離對面直路時進一步墮後，居第六位。入直路後受困至二百米處，其後保持走勢。（騎師被查詢有關此駒表現令人失望的原因）

comment: Prominent, 2-1/4L behind the leader 2 wide with cover,      despite suited to the slow pace, did not run on.
comment_ch: 居前列，落後領放馬二又四分一個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。儘管慢步速適合發揮，但未能上前。

comment: Ridden forward to share the lead along the rail, kept on    going until headed passing 150M, did not run on.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，並排領先，走內欄。保持走勢，跑過一百五十米處時被超越，未能上前。
owner: Anthony Sham Hon Sum & Jim Fung Kwong Chun

comment: Settled worse than midfield about 5Ls behind the leader 3   wide without cover, made some ground in straight.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬約五個馬位，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。直路上略為追前。

comment: Shifted out in the Straight; ran on for 2nd when asked.
comment_ch: 直路移出, 推騎第二

comment: Eased back early to sit worse than midfield, 1 off the      fence. Ran strongly early in the straight, but ran out of   steam 100m and didn't progress from there.
comment_ch: 早段收慢，留居中間之後位置，走第二疊。直路初走勢強勁，但一百米處力竭，其後未有進展。

comment: Steadied soon after start and taken across behind runners   from wide draw, settling in last pair. Switched wide in     straight and powered home to score drawing clear.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後瞬即收慢，在馬群之後切入內疊，居最後兩位。直路上移出外疊，衝刺強勁，帶離對手勝出。

comment: Broke well, slipstreamed leader on rail, shaken up 320m &   quickened down inner to lead 180m, drew clear.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，跟隨領放馬，走內欄。三百二十米處受催策。在內疊加速上前，一百八十米處取得領先。帶離勝出。
owner: Stanley Tsang Ming Chit & Raymond Chu Wai Hang

comment: Began awkwardly, ridden to hold midfield position between   horses. Improved around turn, kept on well to 200m before   turning one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙。受催策，居中間位置，在馬匹之間競跑。直路彎上前。保持佳勢至二百米處，其後保持同速。
owner: Dr & Mrs Horace Ngan Kit Keung

comment: Under a hold throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 全程按住, 未受考驗

comment: Began OK but outpaced and dropped to last pair in one-off   position. Clear last around turn and never competitive.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，但被拋離，墮居最後兩位，走第二疊。轉直路彎時遙居包尾位置，全無競爭力。
owner: Edward Chan King Sang, Chan Wo Ping & Ng Sun Wah

comment: Slightly slow out, raced 3 to 4 lengths back at rear,       gradually improved on turn, angled out in straight and      finished off very strongly to score in good fashion.
comment_ch: 出閘略為緩慢，居後列，落後領放馬三至四個馬位。直路彎逐漸改善走勢，直路上向外移出。衝刺十分強勁，以漂亮走勢勝出。
owner: Mr & Mrs James Tien Pei Chun

handicap_ch: 浪琴表國際騎師錦標賽（讓賽）－第一關
comment: A little slow into stride, then taken to fence four-back    from leader. Got clear rails run in straight, ran on well   to 100m before turning one-paced.
comment_ch: 展步略慢，移入內欄，落後領放馬四個馬位。直路上望空，走內欄。走勢良佳，一百米處保持同速。
owner: Mr & Mrs Ben Wong Chung Mat

comment: Broke well, amongst leaders  4 wide early, taken back       passing the 1000 metre bend, hampered and shuffled back to  just worse than midfield 600 metres out, faded further      after straightening.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，早段居領放馬群中，走第四疊。跑過一千米處彎位時留後。六百米處受阻礙，墮居中間稍後位置。入直路後力竭。
owner: Barry Wong Kam Keung & Wong Kam Fai
Ming Shui Sum & Alice Ming Bo Ting

comment: Dropped back to near the rear, ended up as back-marker      1500M, 8Ls adrift in middle stages but crept closer over    the home turn, didn't have much luck in running when held   up on the inside to 200M then awkwardly placed near 100M.
comment_ch: 墮居後列位置，千五米處包尾，中段落後八個馬位。直路彎追前，二百米處前在內疊受困而未能望空，接近一百米處處於窘境。

comment: Dropping back to rear when ridden coming down the Rock.
comment_ch: 落山已騎，墮後跟跑

comment: Eased forward early to sit worse than midfield, 1 off the   fence. Ran strongly down the outside in the straight and    making up ground. Just missed a place in a tight finish.
comment_ch: 早段上前，居中間之後位置，走第二疊。直路上走外疊，以強勁走勢追前。在激烈競逐下僅未能入位。
owner: Mr & Mrs William Yem Wai Lai

comment: On pace along the rail; under a hold in the Straight.
comment_ch: 貼欄跟前, 直路按返

owner: Wai Siu Kee & Edmond Lee Man Bun

comment: Responded only fairly when asked; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 騎落一般, 走勢未熟
owner: Patrick Lee Pak Wing, Edmond Chau Chin Hung & Christina Lee Oi Ping

comment: Hard ridden from an awkward draw to lead on settling before crossing to fence. Set strong pace to 350m when collared    and faded quickly.
comment_ch: 自第八檔出閘後受力策，取得領先，繼而切入內欄。三百五十米處前以快步速領放，其後被超越及迅速力竭。
owner: Joe Ho Kui Yin & Ricky Lee Chi Hung

comment: Broke with others, initially taken back but trapped 4 wide  no cover, rolled to share 4th turning in, driven 400m,      found nil & weakened.
comment_ch: 與對手同步躍出，起初留後，走第四疊，沒有遮擋。入直路時上前，並列第四位。四百米處受催策，再無餘力及轉弱。

comment: Settled well behind, commenced run wide rounding home bend, ran on to hold some chance over 200 metres out, unable to   sustain effort close to home.
comment_ch: 遙居於後，直路彎走外疊，開始發力上前，二百米處有望爭勝，接近終點時未能保持走勢。

owner: Chan Wai Nam & Ian Chan Yau Nam

comment: Slowly away and wide throughout, soon recovered towards the rear of the field at the 1000 metre bend, gained closer to  midfield along back straight, gave ground approaching home  turn.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，沿途走外疊。瞬即恢復走勢，一千米處轉彎時居馬群後列。對面直路上進佔中間位置，趨近直路彎時墮退。
owner: Chan Bing Woon, Chan Hai Ming, Samson Chan Hung Sing & Chan Ming Shun

comment: Ridden along in first few, settled just over 2L back in 4th on rails, kept on before coming one-paced closing stages.
comment_ch: 居前列第四位，落後僅逾兩個馬位，走內欄。保持走勢，末段保持同速。

comment: Bumped start and travelled at the rear, 5-3/4L behind along the rail, continued to make ground steadily in the run home.
comment_ch: 出閘時與對手互相碰撞，居後列，落後五又四分三個馬位，沿欄競跑。直路上持續穩步上前。
owner: George Lee Hing Fai, Wong Che Leung, Alan Lee Tat Luen & Wong Chi Kin

comment: Urged to lead along the rail; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 搶欄帶放, 拉士按返

comment: Midfield, 2 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, checked 450M, made some ground 200M.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，走第二疊，快步速有利發揮。四百五十米處勒避。二百米處略為追前。

comment: Settled midfield; under a hold and not fully tested.
comment_ch: 居中跟跑，按住未試

comment: Pushed forward to obtain the box seat, benefited by the     slow pace, kept on steadily to the line for 4th.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，佔取包廂位置。慢步速有利發揮，保持穩勢至終點，跑獲殿軍。

comment: Always in touch; hit the line strongly to score.
comment_ch: 前後俱備, 拉士回氣再上

comment: Initially in midfield but niggled along in the Back         Straight to improve to sit outside the leader, harmed by    the fast tempo, however was not competitive.
comment_ch: 早段居中間位置，對面直路上受催策上前，進佔領放馬外側位置。快步速不利發揮，無力爭勝。

comment: Slow break, raced 11th 1 off with cover, shifted 3 deep     700m & ridden home turn, widest in run, solid closer.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居第十一位，在有遮擋下走第二疊。七百米處移出第三疊。直路彎受催策。直路上走最外疊，末段衝刺強勁。

comment: Quickly away, leading field to first turn before taking sit on leader. Put under pressure turning for home but only     one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，領先馬群，首次轉彎時留居領放馬之後。轉直路彎時受催策，僅能保持同速。

comment: Ridden along from an ousted draw but didn't muster and kept wide without cover towards the rear for most of the race.   Never likely.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受催策，但未能加速。大部分途程居後列，走外疊，沒有遮擋。從未有力爭勝。
owner: Mr & Mrs Eddie Wong Ming Chak and Kameny Wong Kam Man

comment: Broke well from a middle draw, settled within striking      distance one off the rails, ran on to hit the front over    150 metres out, soon drew clear.
comment_ch: 自中檔出閘迅速，落後領放馬不遠，走第二疊。持續上前，一百五十米處取得領先，瞬即帶離勝出。

comment: Failed to muster and travelled in worse than midfield,      7-1/2L 3 wide and without cover from 600M, did not feature.
comment_ch: 未能加速，自六百米處起居中間之後位置，落後七個半馬位，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。未能構成威脅。

handicap_ch: 多維爾八月週歲馬拍賣會讓賽
comment: Ridden along, gradually improved to 4L back in 5th on the   rail, ran home one-paced.
comment_ch: 受催策，逐漸進佔第五位，落後四個馬位，走內欄。末段保持同速。

comment: Taken back, in worse than midfield 4-1/4L behind on the     rail, held up from 200M to 150M then ran on nicely to the   line.
comment_ch: 留居中間之後位置，落後四又四分一馬位，走內欄。自二百米處起至一百五十米處受困。其後走勢良佳至終點。

comment: Began OK, outpaced, dropping to last pair first turn. Clear last passing 800m, swung wide into straight, found nothing  under hard riding.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可。前速不及對手，首次轉彎時墮居最後兩位。跑過八百米處時遙居包尾位置，入直路時移出外疊。在力策下再無餘力。

comment: Wide throughout; under a hold in the straight.
comment_ch: 全程外叠, 直路按返

comment: Bumped start, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn,      finished off evenly in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘後碰撞對手，居中間位置，走第二疊。直路彎居相同位置，直路上穩步上前。

comment: Shifted out at 200m; made progress when asked.
comment_ch: 二百移出, 推騎追趕

comment: Pushed to hold a spot 3 back on the fence, pace good,       dashed well 200M for 3rd.
comment_ch: 受推策保持位置，落後三個馬位，走內欄。步速中等，二百米處衝刺良佳，跑獲季軍。

comment: Slowly away, caught up with the backend of the field on     rails approaching home bend, ran home one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，趨近直路彎時追上馬群後列，走內欄。末段保持同速。

comment: Took up early running from draw 1, set slow fractions early stages, taken on by rival 900M, rallied well enough         entering straight, just failed to hold off winner late      stages.
comment_ch: 自第一檔出閘後於早段領先，早段以慢步速領放。九百米處受對手挑戰，入直路時以勁勢力拼，末段僅不敵頭馬。

comment: Began OK but outpaced, dropping to last pair passing 800m.  Still well back passing 400m but picked up momentum final   200m and finished strongly.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可。前速不及對手，跑過八百米處時墮居最後兩位。跑過四百米處時仍遙居於後，最後二百米加速上前。衝刺強勁。
owner: Dr Daniel Lee Tin Chak, Daisy Ho Chiu Fung, Pansy Ho Chiu King & Maisy Ho Chiu Ha

comment: Pushed forward to take the rail and sat inside the leader   2L off the pace. Maintained forward position and along the  rail in the straight, kept on nicely until headed at 200M.
comment_ch: 受推策上前切入內欄，居領放馬內側兩個馬位之後的位置。直路上沿欄居前列，保持佳勢，二百米處被超越。

comment: Flattened when asked at turn.
comment_ch: 轉彎推騎，乏力墮退

comment: Pressed forward from an outside draw, racing wide till      settling 1L behind leader in one-off position 1200m. Lay in under pressure in straight and boxed on one-paced.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，受催策上前，走外疊，千二米處落後領放馬一個馬位，走第二疊。直路上在催策下內閃，保持同速。
owner: The Hon Ronald Arculli GBM GBS JP & Johanna K J Arculli BBS

handicap_ch: 新加坡賽馬公會錦標（讓賽）
comment: Decent break, worked up to lead 1020m & to rail, shaken up  420m & kicked on, all out & headed 210m, tapered to wire.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。一千零二十米處受催策，切入內欄領放。四百二十米處受催策加速。全力以赴，二百一十米處被超越。終點前轉弱。
owner: Jose Yu Sun Say & Yu Wah Yung

comment: Hit the front at turn; ran on strongly to score.
comment_ch: 彎位透出，愈走愈勁

comment: Always in touch; kept on well to score.
comment_ch: 前後俱備，靭力十足
owner: Andrew Fan Chun Wah, Adam Lee Yat Keung & Gary Mui Ho Cheung

comment: Very awkward beginning, back to last, overraced and hung    off track, settled last 1 off, unable to settle, back to    rail 650m, under heavy pressure 350m, all over the place in the straight, never in it.
comment_ch: 出閘十分笨拙，墮居包尾位置，搶口及外閃。包尾，走第二疊，未能穩定走勢。六百五十米處移回內欄。三百五十米處受力策。直路上走勢欠規矩，從未參與競逐。

comment: On-pace for 3rd; ran on ok.
comment_ch: 跟前入位，中規中矩

comment: Always in touch; stayed on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 有前有後, 走勢持續

comment: Showed good speed to take the lead on the stands rail,      headed near 500M, kept on fairly until weakened final 100M.
comment_ch: 前速甚快，取得領先，走外欄。接近五百米處被超越，保持普通走勢，最後一百米轉弱。

comment: Shifted away after start; ran on for 4th when asked.
comment_ch: 起步斜走，推騎追趕

comment: Began well from the inside draw, and pushed up to be        handily placed in 4th, on the rails. Held the rail in the   run home, and easily burnt off the majority of the field.   Lead until 25m, and only beaten by a huge run.
comment_ch: 自第一檔出閘迅速，沿欄受推策上前，居第四位。直路上固守內欄，輕鬆拋離大部分對手，至二十五米處被超越，僅敗於走勢強勁的頭馬蹄下。

comment: On pace early; weakened in the Straight and dropped back.
comment_ch: 跟前, 直路乏力墮退

handicap_ch: 香港中文大學校友會聯會盃（讓賽）
comment: Pressed forward from a wide draw before being eased back to find cover, settling at rear but 3-wide. Taken to centre    field on straightening and found little despite several     reminders.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受催策上前，收慢以尋找遮擋，留居後列，走第三疊。入直路時移至跑道中央。儘管數次受催策，但再無餘力。

comment: Crowded for room at turn; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 彎位擠迫，未見真章

comment: In front of midfield along the fence, raced keenly in a     more prominent spot, lack turn of foot in straight.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，走內欄。居較前位置時跑來搶口。直路上未能加速。

comment: Began fairly, sat back in a 3-wide position towards the     rear, found nothing under pressure passing 400M, eased when no chance.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，留居後列，走第三疊。跑過四百米處時受催策，但毫無反應。敗局已定時收慢。
owner: Ringo Ng Yiu Kwok & Gowin Chan Sin Tseng

handicap: THE HONG KONG GOLF CLUB CENTENARY CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港高爾夫球會百週年紀念盃（讓賽）
comment: Pressed forward to lead on settling, cutting to fence 1400m and slowing pace. Picked up speed 500m, kept finding final  100m when strongly challenged.
comment_ch: 受催策取得領先，千四米處切入內欄，放慢步速。五百米處加速，最後一百米持續力拒對手的強勁挑戰。
owner: Bryan Hui I Yeung, Hui I Yuen, Allan Chau Kit Ho & Chau Man Kwok

handicap: THE EBENEZER SCHOOL & HOME FOR THE VISUALLY IMPAIRED 120TH ANNIVERSARY CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 心光盲人院暨學校１２０週年紀念盃（讓賽）

comment: Tardy start & raced 1 off near tail, switched 3 wide 650m,  wide into stretch, driven 420m, stayed on centre track for  minor headway.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居接近包尾位置，走第二疊。六百五十米處移出第三疊。入直路時走外疊。四百二十米處受催策。直路上在跑道中央保持走勢，略為上前。

comment: Under a hold in straight; kept on well.
comment_ch: 直路扣實, 姿態從容

comment: Raced at rear; never in contention.
comment_ch: 乏力跟跑，遠離水準

comment: Flattened halfway; gave nothing when asked.
comment_ch: 半程洩氣，騎都唔郁
owner: Mr & Mrs Allen Shi Lop Tak and Kathleen Shi Pui Ka

comment: Raced in 2nd last 8Ls off the pace early stages, patiently  waited with till 400M, stayed on to go 2nd  inside 100M,    not reached runaway winner.
comment_ch: 早段居尾二位置，落後領放馬八個馬位。四百米處前留力待拼。保持勁勢，一百米處進佔第二位，但未能追及遙遙領先的頭馬。

comment: Dropped back early from the wide draw to sit a clear 2nd    last. Plugged away fairly under minimal urging in the       straight.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後墮退，居於遙遙落後的尾二位置。直路上略受催策，走勢一般。

comment: Eased back, 2 wide, never a factor.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，走第二疊。從未有力一爭。
owner: Simon Leung Yuen Ho & Kirby Leung Kae Bik

comment: Flat-footed at start, losing ground, and last on settling.  Raced fiercely after being steadied 1300m, made up some     ground around turn, one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘時四足滯立及失地，居包尾位置。千三米處收慢，其後搶口。轉直路彎時略為上前，直路上保持同速。

comment: Jumped fairly settling in midfield, quickly obtained a      clear run passing the 400 metres, ran on to claim victory   inside final 50 metres.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居中間位置。跑過四百米處時迅速取得空位上前，最後五十米取得勝利。

comment: Broke well from a wide draw, settled wide in better than    midfield, 4-wide amongst the leaders entering the straight, unable to sustain effort inside final 200 metres.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘良佳，居中間之前位置，走外疊。入直路時追上領先馬匹，走第四疊。最後二百米未能保持走勢。

comment: Under restraint and settled at rear; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 拖住居後, 未受考驗

comment: Sped to the fore and allowed an easy lead, opened up 2L gap 200M, kept going well to hold off pursuers final stages.
comment_ch: 加速上前，輕鬆取得領先。二百米處領先兩個馬位，保持佳勢，末段力拒對手的挑戰。

comment: Broke well & prominent 3 wide 1st turn, slotted outside     leader 1300m & keen, pushed 3 deep no cover 520m, driven    400m, found nil & faded out.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，首次轉彎時居前列，走第三疊。千三米處移至領放馬外側，搶口。五百二十米處受推策走第三疊，沒有遮擋。四百米處受催策，再無餘力，末段力竭。

comment: Jumped fairly from a wide gate, settled mainly 3-wide in    mid-division, quickened well upon straightening to just get up on line.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘普通，大多居中間位置，走第三疊。入直路後加速良佳，終點線上僅勝。

comment: Urged throughout; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 騎足全程，未有好感

comment: Camped handy, travelled 2Ls behind the leader 2 wide with   cover, kept on one pace until faded 200M.
comment_ch: 居有利位置，落後領放馬兩個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。保持同速，二百米處力竭。

comment: Sent forward to take the rail and led by 1/2L, headed by    the eventual winner passing 100M, still ran on for a tight  finish and missed out only by a nose.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，切入內欄，領先半個馬位。跑過一百米處時被頭馬超越，末段在激烈爭持下仍保持走勢，僅以一馬鼻位之差落敗。

comment: Eased at start, 2 wide at rear, pace good, no progress.
comment_ch: 出閘後收慢，居後列，走第二疊，步速中等。毫無進展。
owner: Justin Yue Kwok Hung & James Yue Chun Hong

comment: Always in touch; won comfortably.
comment_ch: 前後俱備，姿態從容

comment: Under restraint and settled midfield; not properly tested.
comment_ch: 扣實居中，力掩鋒茫

comment: Pushed early, behind midfield 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, lack room 300M, made minor ground, hampered 100M.
comment_ch: 早段受推策，居中間之後位置，走第二疊。步速甚快，有利發揮。三百米處空位不足，略為上前，一百米處受阻。
owner: Emily Wong Man Yan & Wong Ying Sheung

comment: Pressed forward to lead at good pace, emptied 200M.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，以中等步速領放。二百米處力竭。

comment: Under restraint and settled midfield; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 扣實居中，表現不差
owner: Civic Chan Sin Wik & Chu Po Yi

comment: Bustled to lead, headed 1180m & snagged back to rail 2      back, shifted out to 3rd turning in & driven, boxed on      dourly.
comment_ch: 在催策下取得領先。一千一百八十米處被超越，收慢移入內欄，落後兩個馬位。入直路時向外移出，居第三位，受催策，持續力拼。

comment: Ran on ok when made ground between runners.
comment_ch: 馬林追趕，中規中矩

comment: Moderately away, raced 2 wide in midfield, there to turn,   finished off one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘普通。居中間位置，走第二疊。直路彎前居相同位置。直路上保持同速。
owner: Sammy Sean Lee & Aaron Lee Ho Ting

comment: Pushed to take rail and led at good pace, soon emptied 300M.
comment_ch: 受推策，移入內欄，以中等步速領放。三百米處瞬即再無餘力。

handicap_ch: 賽馬天下四十週年紀念盃（讓賽）
comment: Travelled in midfield along the rail, 3-3/4L off the pace,  dropped off slightly after straightening, slight dash near  150M to run on.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬三又四分三個馬位，沿欄競跑。入直路後略為墮退。接近一百五十米處時略為上前。

comment: Lost a considerable amount of ground when blundered badly   on jumping, 5-6Ls back near the rear, 3-wide bid 600M out   but never going the pace to challenge.
comment_ch: 出閘時嚴重失蹄，失地甚多，居後列，落後五至六個馬位。六百米處走第三疊，從未能加速上前挑戰。

comment: Niggled along to keep with pace; nearest at finish.
comment_ch: 騎住跟前, 走勢接近

comment: Always in touch; dead heat.
comment_ch: 有前有後, 平頭冠軍
owner: Mr & Mrs Tam Kwok Chu and Thomas Tam Wing Yiu

comment: Made ground under a hold; ran on comfortably for 2nd.
comment_ch: 按住追上, 毫不費力

comment: Hit the front at turn; ran 2nd and not fully tested.
comment_ch: 彎位透出, 點到即止

comment: Began well, holding rail three back from leader. Took       closer order around turn, stayed on rail in straight and    ran on steadily to be closest at finish.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，固守內欄，落後領放馬三個馬位。轉直路彎時進佔較接近位置。直路上持續走內欄，穩步上前，過終點時最為接近。
owner: Anthony Chow Wing Kin & Michael Tong Hing Yuen

comment: Quickened at turn; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 彎位發力，拉士按返

comment: Eased back early; responded fairly well when asked late.
comment_ch: 早段稍留，拉士騎落有反應

comment: Sluggish start & bustled to race rear rank 1 off,           over-raced 900m, niggled 650m, driven turning in & dour     progress, checked 200m, closed off for minor inroads.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢。受催策，居後列，走第二疊。九百米處搶口，六百五十米處受催策。入直路時受催策，奮力追前。二百米處勒避。末段展開衝刺，略為追前。
owner: Mr & Mrs Ronald Lo Yeung Chun

comment: Began fairly, pressed forward to hold one-off position      three-back from leader. Improved position 1200m, swung wide into straight, hit front 300m, battled gamely only to be    nosed out.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策上前。落後領放馬三個馬位，走第二疊。自千二米處起推進，入直路時移向外疊，三百米處領先。以勁勢力拼，叮噹馬頭爭逐下僅敗。

comment: Hard ridden forward to take the fence and share the lead,   kept on steadily until final 100M weakened.
comment_ch: 受力策上前移入內欄，並排領先。保持穩勢，最後一百米轉弱。

comment: Rolled forward to lead by a short-head through slightly     slow sectionals, once straightened unleashed strongly and   cruised to a comfortable victory.
comment_ch: 步速稍慢，上前帶頭，領先一短馬頭位。入直路後隨即展開強勁衝刺，上前以輕鬆姿態勝出。
owner: Dr Daniel Lee Tin Chak, Daisy Ho Chiu Fung, Pansy Ho Chiu King & Maisy Ho Chiu Ha

comment: Restrained to a rearward position after the jump, proved    difficult to settle, 5-6Ls to make up 400M but failed to    improve.
comment_ch: 出閘後受約束，居後列，難以穩定走勢。四百米處落後五至六個馬位，未能追前。

comment: Outpaced and soon in last pair along rail. Made forward     move around home turn but ran out of stamina shortly after  straightening and faded.
comment_ch: 被拋離，瞬即居最後兩位，走內欄。轉直路彎時上前，但入直路後不久無以為繼，力竭。

comment: Travelled in midfield, 4-1/4L off 2 wide with cover,        finished off only one pace.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬四又四分一個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。末段僅能保持同速。
owner: Mr & Mrs Senta Wong and Vinci Wong

comment: Shifted out in the Straight; made progress when asked.
comment_ch: 直路移出，稍騎上前
owner: Fong Kit Shan, Louisa Tang Sin Yee & Ken Lee Ka Fai

comment: Quickened at turn; under a hold in the straight.
comment_ch: 彎位上前, 直路按番住

comment: Rolled forward to park outside the leader, despite          benefited by the very slow tempo, faded soon after          straightening.
comment_ch: 上前居領放馬外側，儘管極慢步速有利發揮，入直路後瞬即力竭。

comment: Raced midfield along the rail, 3-3/4L behind. Not suited to the fast tempo, from final 100M weakened.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬三又四分三個馬位，走內欄。步速甚快，不合發揮。自一百米處起轉弱。

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY LOVE IS BEAUTY COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶愛很美系列讓賽

comment: Jumped well; ran under his own steam.
comment_ch: 起步敏捷，按住順走

handicap_ch: ＰＡＮＡＳＯＮＩＣ一撻即著藍馳王汽車電池讓賽
comment: Hard ridden to occupy box seat, benefited by the slow       sectionals, emptied 250M.
comment_ch: 受力策佔取包廂位置。慢步速有利發揮。二百五十米處再無餘力。

comment: Began well, ridden to hold forward position, taking first   turn 4-wide, settling 4L from leader. Made forward move     turning for home, fourth into straight before running out   of steam.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，在催策下居前列位置。首次轉彎時走第四疊，落後領放馬四個馬位。轉直路彎時發力上前，入直路時居第四位，其後再無餘力。

comment: Always at the rear, never a factor.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列，從未有力一爭。

comment: Sent forward and led by 1/2L in a 2 wide position, kept on  going and scored comfortably by 1-1/4L.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，領先半個馬位，走第二疊。持續上前，以一又四分一個馬位之先從容獲勝。

comment: Towards the rear, made no impression in straight.
comment_ch: 居後列，直路上毫無表現。

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY HUGGING FAMILY COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶抱抱家庭系列讓賽
comment: Pushed forward to lead along the fence at very slow         sectionals, kept on one pace to the line for 3rd.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，以十分緩慢的步速領放，走內欄。保持同速至終點，取得季軍。

handicap: THE STANDARD CHARTERED CHAMPIONS & CHATER CUP
comment: Held up 4Ls off the strong pace, picked up well chasing     leaders from 300M, still 1L down 150M, surged late under    strong drive, just denied at the post.
comment_ch: 落後快步速的領放馬四個馬位。加速良佳，自三百米處起力追領先馬匹。一百五十米處仍然落後一個馬位。末段在力策下衝刺。過終點時僅敗。
owner: Mr & Mrs Sebastian Man Shiu Wai

comment: Hampered start, ridden vigorously but failed to muster and  last on settling. Last into straight before running past    beaten horses.
comment_ch: 出閘時受阻。受力策，但未能加速，居包尾位置。入直路時仍居包尾位置，其後超越已洩氣的對手。

comment: Limited response when asked in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路有騎，反應一般

comment: Ran on fairly well under a hold.
comment_ch: 按實湧上, 表現不差
owner: Stephen Chang Tso Tung, Timothy Sun & Leung Sze Tien
Stephen Chan Pui Yan & Dr Lawrence Chan Pui Wing

comment: Missed the break, joined other back-markers approaching     home bend, found nothing in home straight.
comment_ch: 漏閘，趨近直路彎時追上其他後列馬匹。直路上再無餘力。
owner: Au Kai Kwong, Yu Chun Hong, Cissy Yu Wing Sze & Winnie Yu Wing Yin

handicap: THE HONG KONG RUGBY UNION CUP (HANDICAP)
comment: Steadied and shifted across behind runners, settling at     rear but wide. Allowed to roll forward from 1200m to within 3L of leader passing 400m before tiring and dropping back.
comment_ch: 出閘後收慢，在馬群之後切入。居後列，走外疊。自千二米處起獲許上前，跑過四百米處時落後領放馬不逾三個馬位，繼而漸呈疲態及墮退。

comment: Always at rear, never a factor.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列，從未構成威脅。
owner: The Hon & Mrs Kenneth Lau Ip Keung

comment: Began awkwardly and then steadied and shifted across behind horses, settling last in one-off position. Trailed field    around final turn but ran on fairly in the straight.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙。其後收慢，在馬群之後切入內疊。居包尾位置，走第二疊。直路彎尾隨馬群，直路上走勢一般。

comment: Struggled to keep up with the field early, sitting last and 3L off the next horse at 900m. Caught up by the home turn,  and had to go wide for a run. Powered home from the 250m,   catching first 2, but had too much to do.
comment_ch: 早段未能跟上馬群。九百米處居包尾位置，落後尾二馬匹三個馬位。直路彎追上馬群，並須走外疊取位。自二百五十米處起加速衝刺，追逐前兩名馬匹，但因早段落後太遠，已無力挽回。
owner: Carmen Chan Wing Yee & Chan Fut Yan

comment: Pushed forward to obtain the box seat, despite harmed by    the fast pace, ran on strongly for 2nd in a tight finish,   missed by a nose.
comment_ch: 受推策上前佔取包廂位置。快步速不利發揮，但衝刺強勁，在多駒幾乎齊過終點下以一馬鼻位之差見負，跑獲亞軍。

comment: Raced up with the pace for 3rd; performed progressively.
comment_ch: 跟前入位，走勢轉熟

comment: Under a hold throughout; raced under his own steam.
comment_ch: 全程按住，隨意跟跑

comment: Urged to lead under whip; struggled for 2nd.
comment_ch: 開鞭搶放, 捱入一席

comment: Won narrowly when being asked late.
comment_ch: 拉士推騎，險勝對手

handicap: HKU FACULTIES OF LAW AND SOCIAL SCIENCES HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 港大法律學院與社會科學學院讓賽
comment: Raced in midfield, 4L off the pace along the rail, finished off well and took 4th just before the line.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬四個馬位，走內欄。末段衝刺良佳，終點前取得殿軍。

comment: OK away and cruised forward early to sit around midfield,   on the rail. Plugged away until the 150m, kicking from that point and just nabbing 3rd on the line.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可。早段上前居大約中間位置，走內欄。保持同速至一百五十米處，自該處起加速上前。僅於終點線上跑入季席。

handicap: THE HONG KONG RIDING FOR THE DISABLED ASSOCIATION CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港傷健策騎協會盃（讓賽）
comment: Fractious before start and sat in stall but passed fit.     Jumped OK, ridden to hold fence three back from leader.     Kept on steadily in straight. Found to have blood at left   nostril, abrasions on right eye and lame right front leg.
comment_ch: 開閘前煩躁不安，在閘內坐下，但經獸醫檢查後認為適宜出賽。出閘尚可，受催策，固守內欄，落後領放馬三個馬位。直路上保持穩勢。被發現左邊鼻孔有血，右眼多處擦傷，以及右前腿不良於行。
owner: Mr & Mrs Robert Lam Chi Hing

handicap: HONG KONG PEOPLE ADMINISTERING HONG KONG HANDICAP
comment: Raced on pace wide and without cover, asked for effort and  quickly under pressure on straightening, weakened from 300m.
comment_ch: 跟隨領放馬，走外疊，沒有遮擋。受催策，入直路時迅速再受催策。自三百米處起轉弱。

comment: On-pace early; found nothing when asked.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢，騎落唔多

comment: Ridden forward to park outside the leader at fast pace,     kept on until weakened final 150M.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，居領放馬外側，步速甚快。保持走勢，最後一百五十米轉弱。
owner: Ho Yin Sang, Cheung Kwok Ping & Cheung Kwok Keung

comment: At rear, travelled 8Ls behind the leader on the fence,      suited by the fast tempo, dashed well to get 2nd.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬八個馬位，走內欄。快步速適合發揮，衝刺強勁，跑獲亞軍。

comment: Slow start & ridden, settled rail back of midfield, edged   out & shaken up 340m, kept on evenly.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，受催策，居中間之後位置，走內欄。三百四十米處向外移出，受催策，保持同速。

comment: Shifted out in the straight; ran on for 2nd when asked.
comment_ch: 直路移出，考驗第二

comment: Moderately away from a wide draw, sent forward to take the  lead, travelled well on turn, kept on strongly in straight  to score.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘普通，受催策上前領先。直路彎走勢良佳，直路上保持勁勢，取得冠軍。
owner: Mr & Mrs Arthur Wong Chun Mo

comment: Slightly slow out, raced at rear in the middle of the       track, showed no response in the concluding stages, never   competitive.
comment_ch: 出閘略為緩慢，居後列，在跑道中央競跑。末段在催策下毫無反應，從未有力一爭。

comment: At rear, travelled 8Ls behind the leader on the fence,      despite the slow tempo, ran home nicely.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬八個馬位，走內欄。儘管步速緩慢，末段衝刺良佳。

comment: Found nothing when asked at 400m.
comment_ch: 四百已騎，無加速力

comment: Wide at turn; ran on comfortably for 2nd.
comment_ch: 轉彎蝕位, 從容第二
owner: Wai Siu Kee & Edmond Lee Man Bun

handicap: THE BOCHK WEALTH MANAGEMENT JOCKEY CLUB SPRINT
handicap_ch: 中銀理財馬會短途錦標
comment: From inside draw driven to a trailing position just behind  leaders, had every chance in straight but unable to find    extra, flattened out 150M.
comment_ch: 自最內檔出閘，在催策下居領先馬匹稍後位置。直路上已獲機會盡展所長，但再無餘力，一百五十米處洩氣。

comment: Limited response when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路推騎, 反應一般

comment: Taken across from wide barrier, not hurried and held up at  the rear 7Ls off the pace, fanned wide 600M, offered up a   good kick down outside, led 150M and drew away.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後切入第四疊，未受催策。居後列，落後領放馬七個馬位。六百米處走外疊，直路上在外疊以佳勢加速上前。一百五十米處領先，帶離勝出。

comment: 3-wide in midfield throughout, laid out making the turn,    beaten at 400M.
comment_ch: 全程居中間位置，走第三疊。直路彎外閃，四百米處洩氣。

comment: Under a hold and settled midfield; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 拖住居中，未見真章
owner: William Ching Hon Kuen & Raymond Ching Wei Man

comment: Found nothing when asked at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百稍騎, 反應一般

comment: Pushed forward to lead at quick sectionals, did not show a  turn of foot and headed at 150M.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，以快步速領放。未能加速，一百五十米處被超越。

comment: Slow to begin; saved ground for 2nd.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 慳位上前
owner: Cheung Sui Ling & Steven Leung Man Hung

comment: Limited response when being hard ridden.
comment_ch: 大力推騎，未見加速
owner: Wong Chung Hin & Arnold Wong Chi Chiu

comment: Taken back at start, settled near rear 1 off outside fence, advanced a spot 600m, strong traveler & held up until       shifted inside & shaken up 50m, surged centre to lead 80m,  driven clear.
comment_ch: 出閘後留後，居後列，走外欄第二疊。六百米處追前，走勢強勁。受困，五十米處受催策向內移入。八十米處在跑道中央取得領先，在催策下帶離取勝。
owner: Justin Yue Kwok Hung & Jeremy Yue Chun Hay

comment: Crowded on jumping; ran on ordinary when shifted out in the Straight.
comment_ch: 起步擠迫，直路移出，走勢一般

comment: Pressed forward but held 3-wide before easing back and      getting cover 900m. Taken to rail around turn, ran on well  in straight.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，但走第三疊，繼而收慢，九百米處取得遮擋。轉直路彎時移入內欄。直路上走勢良佳。

comment: Ran on well; under a hold throughout.
comment_ch: 全程扣實，表現甚佳

comment: Emerged as leader 1300M, allowed an easy lead middle        stages, kicked home strongly passing 400M and no danger     150M out winning by comfortable margin.
comment_ch: 千三米處取得領先。中段輕鬆領放。跑過四百米處時走勢強勁。最後一百五十米拋離對手，從容勝出。

comment: Smart break, taken back to rail near rear, over-raced 830m, shuffled back 650m, switched out 500m & ridden, never a     factor.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，留居後列，走內欄。八百三十米處跑來搶口。六百五十米處墮退。五百米處向外移出，受催策。從未有力一爭。

comment: Under restraint early; made some ground when asked late.
comment_ch: 早段稍留，推騎追趕

comment: Slightly slow out, recovered to race in midfield on rail,   there to turn, kept to inside after straightening, finished off one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘稍慢，恢復走勢後居中間位置，走內欄。直路彎居相同位置，入直路後走內疊，保持同速。

comment: On pace early; flattened in the Straight.
comment_ch: 望空跟前, 直路勁平

comment: Jumped with field, ridden to hold forward position,         settling midfield in one-out position. Lost position around turn but boxed on fairly in straight without looking        dangerous.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，在催策下居前列位置。其後墮居中間位置，走第二疊。轉直路彎時失位。直路上走勢一般，未似能構成威脅。

comment: Began awkwardly and lost ground, before dropping back to    settle a clear last early. Plugged away fairly in the       straight.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，失地。早段墮居遙遙落後的包尾位置。直路上走勢普通。

comment: Broke well, not pushed, taken to fence and settled towards  rear. Took inside run on straightening, was making ground   when severely checked 100m and not properly tested.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，未受推策，移入內欄，留居後列。入直路時走內疊，正在上前之際於一百米處大力勒避，未能全力施為。
owner: Tony Lau Yiu Tong, Thomas Lau Sum Fai & Lau Yi Fai

comment: On-pace early; ran on comfortably for 2nd.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑, 表現從容

comment: Came from behind for 3rd; moved better than prior.
comment_ch: 後上第三, 走勢進步

comment: Towards the rear, stayed on moderately from off the pace,   not reached contention. (No Vet findings.)
comment_ch: 居後列，保持普通走勢，未能進佔具爭勝機會的位置。（賽後接受獸醫檢查，並無發現任何明顯異常之處）
owner: Natalis Chan Pak Cheung & Ceci Wong Hang Sau

comment: Held up behind midfield, 5Ls off the pace top of straight,  fought on one pace, no threat to leaders.
comment_ch: 留居中間之後位置，直路初落後領放馬五個馬位。保持同速，未能威脅領先馬匹。

comment: On pace early; ran on for 3rd when asked.
comment_ch: 跟前，拉士推騎保位
owner: Rotary Club of Sha Tin Syndicate

comment: At back, 2 wide, no dash in final stages.
comment_ch: 居後列，走第二疊。末段未能展開衝刺。

comment: First to jump; led all the way and won comfortably.
comment_ch: 應聲彈出，姿態輕鬆

handicap: THE HONG KONG RIDING FOR THE DISABLED ASSOCIATION CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港傷健策騎協會盃（讓賽）
comment: Away well, taken to fence behind leading pack, settling 4L  from leader back stretch. Closed in around turn, looked     chance 200m, no extra close home.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，在領先馬匹之後切入內欄。對面直路上落後領放馬四個馬位，轉直路彎時追近領放馬。二百米處看似有力一爭，接近終點時再無餘力。
owner: Lillian Lee Lai Man & Kenny Tse Chiu Ping

comment: Raced at rear; ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 全程跟跑，中規中矩

comment: Ran under his own steam; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 紋風未動, 未受考驗

comment: Settled towards the rear, 7L behind 3 wide with cover,      despite not suited to the slow pace, finished off nicely    from 200M for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬七個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。儘管慢步速不合發揮，自二百米處起衝刺良佳，跑獲季軍。

comment: Raced handy; kept on ok in straight.
comment_ch: 跟前, 直路保持走勢
owner: The Hon Ronald Arculli GBM GBS JP & Johanna K J Arculli BBS

comment: Slow start & bumped, raced last pair 1 off, 8L back & under pump 550m, plugged on past beaten rivals.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，受碰撞。五百五十米處居最後兩位，落後八個馬位，走第二疊，受催策。保持走勢，超越數匹已洩氣的對手。
owner: Steven Chan Sheung Chi & Kenneth Chan Sheung Yan

comment: Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 2 wide, not suited by   the slow tempo, lack room 300M, just held ground.
comment_ch: 在力策下保持中間位置，走第二疊。步速緩慢，不合發揮。三百米處缺乏空位上前，僅能保持位置。

comment: Began well, and was pushing forward to a handy position     before being checked out of a run 1300m, and settled        midfield 1 off the fence. Didn't give a lot in the          straight, but did beat a couple home.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。受推策上前，居有利位置。千三米處無路可上時勒避，居中間位置，走第二疊。直路上無甚餘力，但仍能超越兩駒。

handicap_ch: 維多利亞賽馬會錦標（讓賽）
comment: Lacked toe, raced near rear 1 off with cover, driven 550m   to hold position, widest into stretch, ran home evenly.
comment_ch: 缺乏前速，居後列，走第二疊，有遮擋。五百五十米處受催策保持位置。入直路時移出最外疊。末段保持同速。

comment: At back throughout, never a factor.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列，從未構成威脅。

comment: Sent forward to hold the fence and share the lead, kept on  steadily until weakened final 100M, hung on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 受催策上前固守內欄，並排領先。保持穩勢，最後一百米轉弱。保住季席。

comment: Always in touch; won with plenty in hand.
comment_ch: 有前有後，按韁取勝

comment: Raced at rear; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 全程跟跑，毫無好感

comment: Began awkwardly, sat behind midfield 5Ls off the pace along the rails, kept on same pace final 350M and made little     impression on debut.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，居中間之後位置，落後領放馬五個馬位，走內欄。最後三百五十米保持同速。今仗初出，表現平平。

comment: Sat outside the leader, 1/2L behind, in touch until 150M    when out gunned by the first three but kept on.
comment_ch: 居領放馬外側，落後半個馬位。一百五十米處前仍居啣接位置，其後被三甲馬匹超越，保持走勢。

comment: Pushed to take rail and lead, clocked advantageous slow     sectionals, hung on until 200M weakened.
comment_ch: 在推策下移入內欄領先，以有利的緩慢步速領放。保持走勢至二百米處轉弱。

comment: Ridden to find cover but held wide, dropping to rear. Ran   on steadily in straight but held for run 150m to 50m, and   then in restricted room concluding stages.
comment_ch: 受催策以取得遮擋，墮居後列，走外疊。直路上走勢平穩，自一百五十米處起至五十米處受困，末段在窄位競跑。
owner: Herbert Cheung Po Lun, Michael Chu Wing Keung & Lin Tak Fai

comment: OK to begin, eased, crowded 1000m, settled beyond midfield  1 off, checked 600m, impeded again 480m, no room 330m,      clear 250m, sprinted powerfully, luckless.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，收慢，一千米處受擠迫，居中間之後位置，走第二疊。六百米處勒避。四百八十米處再度受阻。三百三十米處空位不足，二百五十米處望空，以勁勢衝刺。陣上欠運。

comment: On-pace early; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢，末段按番住

comment: Slow start, raced rail behind midfield, progress on turn,   driven 300m, stayed on for minor inroads.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，沿欄居中間之後位置。直路彎推進。三百米處受催策，保持走勢，略為追前。
owner: Lily Scheng Hsi Feng & Vicky Tang

comment: Made progress when shifted out in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路移出，推騎追趕
owner: James Lau Chi Wing, Lau Kai Tai & Michelle Lau Wing Sheung

comment: Away nicely, pressed forward outside leader before taking   over 1280m and crossing to fence. Collared passing 200m but kept on gamely and held on for second.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，受催策上前，居領放馬外側，一千二百八十米處取得領先，移入內欄。跑過二百米處時被超越，保持勁勢，跑獲亞軍。

handicap_ch: 浪琴表國際騎師錦標賽（讓賽）－第三關

comment: Began well and allowed to cruise forward early, just        forward of midfield, 1 off the fence. Had no luck in the    straight until the last 100m, and ran on gamely from there.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。早段上前，居中間稍前位置，走第二疊。直路上受困直至一百米處，其後以勁勢上前。

comment: Slow start, taken behind to rail last trio, hard-ridden     turning in, found little in.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，留後，移入內欄，居最後三位。入直路時受力策，再無餘力。
owner: N T Heung Yee Kuk Syndicate

comment: Ran on ordinary when asked at turn.
comment_ch: 彎位已騎, 走勢欠勁

comment: Broke well, surged forward to lead on settling, crossing to fence at first turn. Led narrowly to turn-in when spent     force and faded.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，上前取得領先，首次轉彎時切入內欄。入直路時以短距離領先，直路上再無餘力，力竭。

comment: Always in touch; won impressively.
comment_ch: 有前有後，表現引人
owner: Ng Sun Wah & Chan Wo Ping

comment: Taken back to midfield near rails, snuck up to 2L 4th       entering back straight, remained similar turning for home,  tight on rails early in straight and forced to steady over  200 metres out, fought on to re-gain place late.
comment_ch: 留居中間位置，靠近內欄競跑。進入對面直路時居第四位，落後兩個馬位。入直路時居相若位置。直路初受擠迫，走內欄，二百米處被迫收慢。末段力拼，跑入位置。

comment: Dropped back at break, raced at rear throughout, never a    factor.
comment_ch: 出閘後墮後，沿途居後列。從未構成威脅。

comment: Began well from inside draw, tracked leaders along the      fence and had the run of the race, squeezed through to      challenge on inside passing 300M, briefly led 200M but not  matched finishing pace of first 2 late stages.
comment_ch: 自第一檔出閘迅速，沿欄跟隨領先馬匹，居好位。跑過三百米處時在內疊穿越窄位上前。二百米處一度取得領先，但末段衝刺力不及前兩名馬匹。

comment: Jumped OK; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 起步順利, 表現唔曳

comment: Jumped slowly, then rolled forward to park outside the      leader, however trapped 3 wide without cover throughout,    dropped off final 150M.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢。其後上前居領放馬外側，但沿途走第三疊，沒有遮擋。最後一百五十米墮退。

handicap_ch: 滙豐百週年紀念碗（讓賽）
comment: First into stride before handing over lead passing 1050m    and taking box seat. Took inside run entering straight,     looking chance 200m, no extra close home.
comment_ch: 展步最快，跑過一千零五十米處時被超越，居包廂位置。入直路時在內疊取位上前。二百米處看似具爭勝機會。末段再無餘力。

comment: Awkward start & bustled in detached last, driven to join    tail of pack 900m, detached again turning in, hacked home   once beaten.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，受催策，遙居包尾位置。九百米處受催策，追上馬群後列。入直路時再被拋離。末段洩氣。

handicap: AUDEMARS PIGUET ROYAL OAK CONCEPT HANDICAP
comment: Pushed forward from inside draw to hold box seat. Kept tabs on leader to straight but gave ground quickly from 200m.
comment_ch: 自內檔出閘後受推策上前，居包廂位置。入直路前跟隨領放馬。自二百米處起迅速墮退。
owner: Albert Hung Chao Hong & Stephanie Hung Yujie

comment: Hard ridden forward to take the rail and led by 3/4L        through slow sectionals, kept pushing until headed by the   winner inside 50M.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，佔取內欄，領先四分三個馬位，以慢步速領放。持續力拼，最後五十米被頭馬超越。

owner: Mr & Mrs James Lau Chi Wing, Lau Kai Tai & Michelle Lau Wing Sheung

comment: Began awkwardly losing ground, then pressed forward,        settling 3L from leader at turn. Kept on gamely in straight without threatening.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，失位。其後受催策上前，直路彎落後領放馬三個馬位。直路上保持勁勢，但未能構成威脅。

comment: Taken up early to be handily placed 3rd/4th, 1 off the      fence. Lost a run 550m. Plugged on fairly early in the      straight. Awkwardly placed on heels at 200m, but already    fading out by then.
comment_ch: 早段受催策上前，居第三至第四位，走第二疊。五百五十米處失位。直路初走勢一般。二百米處緊貼他駒後蹄處於窘境，但當時已逐漸力竭。

comment: Slightly slow to begin; never in contention.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 從未參予競逐

comment: Sent forward to take the lead early, found cover 1300M,     found nothing when place under pressure rounding the Home   Bend.
comment_ch: 早段受催策上前，取得領先。千三米處取得遮擋。直路彎受催策，再無餘力。
owner: Ng Wai Hung & Mingo Tang Hing Chee

comment: Eased early; quickened well along mid track.
comment_ch: 早段稍留，中檔湧上

handicap: HKU FACULTIES OF MEDICINE AND ENGINEERING HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 港大醫學院與工程學院讓賽
comment: Pushed forward, 3.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, just held   ground in straight.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，落後快步速的領放馬三個半馬位，走第二疊。直路上僅能保持位置。

comment: Cruised forward to be handily placed 4th, on the fence.     Loomed up 300m, and pulled away at 200m. Needed no urging   from that point, cruised to the line and eased late.
comment_ch: 上前居前列第四位，走內欄。三百米處逐漸上前，二百米處帶離對手。其後毋須催策下奔向終點，末段收慢。

comment: Broke ok, over-raced 1000m & caught 3 wide  no cover        midfield, 5 deep & driven 400m, stayed on dourly, just      missed frame.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，一千米處搶口。居中間位置，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。四百米處走第五疊及受催策，持續力拼，僅未能跑入三甲。
owner: Jimmy Leung Kwok Wai & Thomas Leung Wai Kin

comment: Caught the eye when dashed on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 佳勢上前，表現引人

comment: Began awkwardly then hampered but pressed forward racing    wide without cover to get within 2L of leader at turn.      Under pressure on straightening and faded.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，其後受阻。受催策上前，走外疊，沒有遮擋。直路彎落後領放馬不足兩個馬位。入直路時受催策，力竭。

comment: Eased to worse than midfield; responded ok when asked late.
comment_ch: 早段稍留，末段稍俾有反應

comment: Always in touch; fought on gamely for 2nd.
comment_ch: 有前有後, 力拼第二

comment: Began slowly and held wide without cover 3L behind. Kept on early in straight but weakened upon 200M.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，落後領放馬三個馬位，走外疊，沒有遮擋。直路初保持走勢。二百米處轉弱。

comment: Tailed off; never in contention.
comment_ch: 遙遙墮後, 從未參予競逐

comment: Saved ground throughout; flattened in the straight.
comment_ch: 沿途慳位，直路勁平
owner: Cheung Kwong Kwan & Chadwick Mok Cham Hung

handicap: THE HONG KONG JOCKEY CLUB COMMUNITY TROPHY (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港賽馬會社群盃（讓賽）
comment: Began OK but beaten for early speed, dropping to rear.      Checked passing 880m, stayed on rail around turn, kept on   solidly in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，但前速不快，墮居後列。跑過八百八十米處時勒避。轉直路彎時固守內欄。直路上保持佳勢。

comment: Jumped well but trapped wide and allowed to drift back to   find cover. After racing 3-wide at rear, allowed to roll    forward, turned very wide, but only one-paced in straight   under hard riding.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，但走外疊，獲許留後以尋求遮擋。其後居後列，走第三疊，獲許上前。轉彎時走大外疊，但直路上受力策時僅能保持同速。
owner: James Lau Po Man & Alice Woo Wai See

comment: Ran on ordinary when niggled along throughout.
comment_ch: 騎足全程，反應一般
owner: Mr & Mrs Allen Shi Lop Tak and Kenneth Shi Ho Ming

comment: Slow to muster, bustled to settle fore of midfield 3 deep   no cover, allowed to stride around field 800m, joint lead   600m, ridden along 430m, boxed on but held.
comment_ch: 加速緩慢，在催策下居中間之前位置，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。八百米處獲許繞過馬群展步上前，六百米處與領放馬並跑，四百三十米處受催策，力拼但不敵頭馬。
owner: Dr Henry Kao So Ping, Geoffrey Edward Kao & Timothy Daniel Kao

comment: Hard ridden to lead from outside draw, racing wide before   crossing to fence 1300m. Speeded up when pressured 900m,    headed 500m but battled strongly till flattened 50m.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後在力策下取得領先，走外疊，千三米處移入內欄。九百米處受對手追迫時加速，五百米處被超越，以勁勢力拼，五十米處洩氣。

comment: Flattened halfway; weakened badly.
comment_ch: 半程洩氣, 急劇堕退
owner: Philip Yu Chi Wai & Dr Jennie Hope Peterson

comment: Came from behind for 3rd when clear in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路望空, 後上第三

comment: Started well, pushed on to race 1 off 1 back, shifted out   final turn & driven to challenge lead, tapered final 150m.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受推策，落後一個馬位，走第二疊。直路彎向外移出，受催策挑戰領放馬，最後一百五十米轉弱。

comment: Began fairly, crowded and lost ground 1300m dropping        towards rear. Made progress but wide final turn, ran on     steadily in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘一般。千三米處受擠迫，因而失地，墮居後列。直路彎推進，走外疊。直路上穩步上前。

comment: Pushed forward to obtain a box seat from a wide draw,       harmed by the fast tempo, made minor ground initially,      however, was bumped heavily 150M and weakened thereafter.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後受推策上前，佔取包廂位置。步速甚快，不利發揮。直路初略為追前，但一百五十米處被大力碰撞，其後轉弱。

comment: Laying in when asked; ran on to score when recovered.
comment_ch: 催策內閃，修正再上

comment: Speed to lead 1500m, bustled to rail 1250m & set tempo,     shaken up 400m, pressed 150m, battled on, headed 50m, no    extra.
comment_ch: 千五米處加速上前領先。一千二百五十米處在催策下移入內欄，主宰步速。四百米處受催策，一百五十米處受追迫。持續力拼，五十米處被超越。再無餘力。

comment: Speared to the front from outside gate, cutting in to fence 1300m and then slowing pace. Shaken up top of straight,     under strong challenge from 150m but kept fighting to the   line.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後上前領先，千三米處切入內欄，繼而減慢步速。直路早段受催策。自一百五十米處起受強勁挑戰，持續力拼至終點。

comment: Under a hold in the Straight; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 直路按返，未盡全力
owner: Yu Pang Chun & Yu Kwok Chun

comment: Taken back, travelled 5Ls behind the leader 3 wide with     cover, finished off strongly for 2nd, missed by a short     head.
comment_ch: 留後，落後領放馬五個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。衝刺強勁，以一短馬頭位之差見負，屈居亞軍。

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY LOVE IS BEAUTY COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶愛很美系列讓賽
comment: Pushed forward to lead, clocked advantageous slow           sectionals, ran on well until 50M overhauled, ran on for    2nd.
comment_ch: 受推策上前領先，以有利的緩慢步速領放。以佳勢上前，五十米處被超越。保持走勢，取得亞軍。

comment: Began awkwardly, but recovered to push forward and lead.    Faded out from the 150m, but still held 4th. Found to have  bled.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，恢復走勢後受推策上前，取得領先。自一百五十米處起力竭，但仍居第四位。流鼻血。

comment: Hard ridden to take rail and led at slow sectionals, hung   on until 200M flattened.
comment_ch: 受力策移入內欄，以慢步速領放，保持位置至二百米處洩氣。

comment: Began OK but beaten for early pace, gradually dropping      back. Last into straight, boxed on one-paced.
