comment_ch: 出閘普通，欠缺前速，逐漸墮退。入直路時包尾，保持同速。

comment: Ran on ordinary when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路推騎，走勢欠順
owner: Dr Irene Lau Mun Yee & Lo Yat Fung

comment: Began well from inside draw and pushed forward to hold rail 3-back from leader. Steadied 1200m, lost position turn,     one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 自內檔出閘迅速，受推策上前，落後領放馬三個馬位，走內欄。千二米處收慢。直路彎失位。直路上保持同速。
owner: Mr & Mrs Michael Cheng Wing On

comment: Settled midfield; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 不上不落，按住未試

comment: Early on-pace, flattened late
comment_ch: 早段唔慢，末段勁平
owner: Chan Kam Hung & Alan Chan Kin On

comment: Under restraint throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 全程拉到實, 未受考驗

comment: Jumped OK, not pushed, settling behind midfield in one-off  position. Taken to fence turning for home and ran on        steadily.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，未受推策，居中間之後位置，走第二疊。轉直路彎時移入內欄，穩步上前。
owner: Wilson Wong Kan Po & Derek Wong Sau Leung

comment: Unable to take the lead; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 起步放唔出, 無段好睇

comment: Fractious in gates, jumped awkwardly, raced keenly midrace, bumped at 700m and 300m, did not run on, Rider question re  performance.
comment_ch: 在閘內煩躁不安。出閘笨拙。中段搶口。七百米處及三百米處兩度碰撞對手，未能上前。騎師被查詢有關此駒的表現。
owner: The Hon Martin Liao & Mrs Priscilla Liao

handicap: THE BOCHK WEALTH MANAGEMENT JOCKEY CLUB MILE
handicap_ch: 中銀理財馬會一哩錦標
comment: Got off OK but no early toe, dropping to last and taken to  fence. Improved position passing 1100m, held up for run top of straight, got clear but ran into dead-end 250m and badly checked. Boxed on.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，缺乏前速，墮居包尾位置，移入內欄。跑過千一米處時推進上前，直路初受困而未能望空。望空後於二百五十米處無路可上，大力勒避。力拼。
owner: Sir Po-shing & Lady Woo, Jackson Woo Ka Biu, Dawson Woo Ka Chung and The Executors of the Estate of

comment: Ridden early to find cover but held 4-wide passing 1700m    and allowed to roll forward to lead 1350m. Set strong pace  to 200m when flattened and gave ground gradually.
comment_ch: 早段受催策以尋找遮擋，但跑過千七米處時走第四疊，一千三百五十米處獲許上前帶頭。以甚快步速領放，二百米處洩氣，逐漸墮退。
owner: Mr & Mrs William Yem Wai Lai

comment: Pushed forward to settle in a prominent position, however,  trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, one paced home and weakened 150M.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，居前列，但沿途走第三疊，沒有遮擋。末段保持同速。一百五十米處轉弱。

comment: Began well but unable handle early pace, slipping           three-back along rail 5L from leader. Urged forward turning for home, bumped and unbalanced 200m, boxed on.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，早段未能跟上步速，居內欄的第三位，落後領放馬五個馬位。轉直路彎時受催策上前。二百米處碰撞他駒，失去平衡，持續力拼。
owner: Mr & Mrs Michael Cheng Wing On and Janice Cheng Po Hei

comment: Slightly sluggish at start, raced mainly in worse than      midfield, made steady headway at the finish.
comment_ch: 出閘稍慢，大多居中間之後位置。末段穩步上前。

comment: Settled towards the rear, baulked for a run early in        straight, switched and produced good late finish inside     final 200 metres.
comment_ch: 居後列。直路初受困，向外移出，最後二百米衝刺甚佳。
owner: Eric Mo Pui Woo & Johnny Mo Cheuk Fai

comment: Taken back & soon at tail, 3 wide 600m, driven 500m, kept   on tepidly.
comment_ch: 留後，瞬即居包尾位置。六百米處走第三疊。五百米處受催策，衝刺乏力。

comment: Eased back early; ran on for 2nd when asked.
comment_ch: 早段稍留, 二百推騎追趕
owner: Jose Yu Sun Say & Yu Wah Yung

comment: On-pace early; stayed on well.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑, 走勢持續

comment: Very awkward start, trapped deep, settled 3 deep near rear, hard-ridden 650m, outpaced 500m, sprinted between horses    200m, stayed on.
comment_ch: 出閘十分笨拙，走外疊。其後居後列，移至第三疊。六百五十米處受力策，五百米處被拋離，二百米處在馬匹之間穿插上前，保持走勢。
owner: Mr & Mrs Michael Cheng Wing On

comment: Broke ok, niggled along on rail behind midfield, driven &   shifted out home turn, plugged on tepidly.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，居中間之後位置，受催策，走內欄。直路彎在催策下移出外疊，衝刺乏力。

comment: Urged to lead early; flattened late.
comment_ch: 主動搶放，末段勁平
owner: Leung Lun, Cheung Ming Man, Chan Chi Wah & Paul Leung Yuk Hung

comment: Close up in 4th, always within striking distance, loomed    250M, beaten off by first two 100M but held 3rd             comfortably.
comment_ch: 居第四位，緊隨領放馬。沿途落後領放馬不遠，二百五十米處追近。一百米處不敵頭兩名馬匹，但穩奪季軍。

comment: Hit the line strongly to score when asked at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百稍騎，佳勢上前

comment: Hard ridden to lead on settling then steadied pace. Joined  up front 850m, kicked ahead 300m but caught  passing 200m,  swamped final stages.
comment_ch: 受力策取得領先，其後減慢步速。八百五十米處被追上。三百米處加速上前，但跑過二百米處時被超越。末段被後上馬匹超越。
owner: Mr & Mrs Desmond Wong Shung Yiu

comment: Hit the front at one stage; kept on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 一度透出，末段唔斷

comment: Raced in midfield, 1-3/4L off along the rail, ran on fairly well but couldn't hold off winner inside 50M and settled    for 2nd.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後一又四分三個馬位，走內欄。走勢頗佳，但最後五十米不敵頭馬，取得亞軍。
owner: Chan Hak Shing, Dominic Yuen Pui Lam, Adrian Yuen Moon Lam & Chan Hak Yuen

comment: On pace early; flattened late.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢，拉士稍弱

comment: Made ground steadily; won comfortably.
comment_ch: 分段加快, 贏得輕鬆

comment: Ran on ok when came from behind to run 3rd.
comment_ch: 後上第三，表現不差

comment: Hit the line strongly to score when asked late.
comment_ch: 拉士輕騎兩步, 奮力上前

comment: Given reminders early, led the field to over 200 metres,    dropped out under pressure.
comment_ch: 早段受鞭策，領先至二百米處。受催策，但墮退。

comment: Settled nicely in midfield, took rail, progressed steadily  250M.
comment_ch: 以佳勢居中間位置，走內欄。二百五十米處逐漸上前。

comment: Even break, natural speed, settled just fore of midfield,   racing alone but 1 off, pulled wider 520m, bumping duel     420m, momentary lead 300m, boxed on.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，以本身步速競跑。單騎居中間稍前位置，走第二疊。五百二十米處向外移出，四百二十米處與對手互相碰撞，三百米處一度領先，持續力拼。

handicap: CHEVALIER COLD STORAGE AND LOGISTICS HANDICAP
comment: Very slow away, hard ridden along the fence, not suited by  the slow tempo, blocked 400M, dashed well when clear but    only for 3rd.
comment_ch: 出閘十分衝慢，受力策，走內欄。步速緩慢，不合發揮。四百米處受阻，望空後以佳勢衝刺，但僅能跑獲季軍。

comment: Raced midfield; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 居中跟跑，未見佳處

comment: Driven forward to take the outer fence, travelled nicely    throughout the race, however got beaten by an impressive    winner by 2-3/4Ls.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，走外欄。沿途走勢良佳，但以二又四分三個馬位之差敗於走勢凌厲的頭馬。

comment: Settled just behind speed, 3 wide from 600m when trying to  improve, tried to challenge on straightening but quickly    under pressure and weakened out of it.
comment_ch: 居領放馬稍後位置。六百米處走第三疊，嘗試推進。入直路時試圖展開挑戰，迅速受催策，轉弱，再無爭勝機會。

comment: Jumped well, raced in midfield, taken to the middle of the  track final 400M, weakened gradually thereafter.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居中間位置。最後四百米移至跑道中央，其後逐漸轉弱。

comment: Limited response when under whip early Straight.
comment_ch: 直路初開鞭，無乜進展

comment: Soon took up running under pressure attempting to make all, unable to sustain effort and worn down inside final 100     metres.
comment_ch: 在催策下瞬即領先，試圖一放到底。最後一百米後勁不繼，被超越。

comment: Made ground progressively; hit the line strong to score.
comment_ch: 分段加速, 贏得漂亮

comment: Settled in last few from a poor draw, widest runner into    straight, ran on steadily.
comment_ch: 自第八檔出閘，居最後數位。入直路時走最外疊，穩步上前。

comment: Kept on well; ran on one-paced for 2nd.
comment_ch: 均速第二, 走勢純熟
owner: James Chan Shiu On, Joseph Chan Ho Lim, Janet Chan Ng Chee Tung & Wendy Chan Wing Kei

comment: Ran on well under a hold; plenty in hand.
comment_ch: 拖住仍近，大把在手

comment: Dropped back early and sat at the rear of the field. Over   raced through the early/middle stages and came widest on    the turn. Had very little left in the tank in the straight, and dropped out to be a well beaten last.
comment_ch: 早段墮退，居後列。早段至中段搶口，直路彎走最外疊。直路上已無甚餘力，墮退潰敗，包尾而回。
owner: Justin Yue Kwok Hung & Jeremy Yue Chun Hay

comment: Dropped back from the kick to sit at the rear of the field, on the rail. Stayed close to the rail, and checked off      heels at 300m. Plugged away OK late, without threatening to place.
comment_ch: 出閘後墮居馬群後列，走內欄。持續靠近內欄競跑，三百米處勒避前駒後蹄。末段走勢尚可，但未能威脅入位馬匹。
owner: Yip Yuk Tong & Mary Cheng Wing Yee

comment: Began awkwardly, pressed forward, holding outer rail 2L     from leader. Travelled well to 300m when run ended and      faded. Unacceptable performance.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，受催策上前，落後領放馬兩個馬位，固守外欄。走勢順暢，三百米處無以為繼及力竭。表現難以接受。

comment: Settled in midfield along the rail 5L behind, suited to the fast tempo, dashed strongly to score.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬五個馬位，走內欄。快步速適合發揮，衝刺強勁，勝出賽事。

comment: Travelled in midfield along the rail, 4-1/2L off the pace,  made no impression in the straight.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，走內欄，落後領放馬四個半馬位。直路上毫無表現。

comment: Raced in midfield along the rail, 5-1/4L behind the leader, made minor ground in the straight.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬五又四分一個馬位，走內欄。直路上略為追前。

comment: Tried to find a position in midfield early, but stuck wide  and on heels before getting in 1 off the fence at 1000m.    Well placed and a clear run from the turn, but only ran on  fairly in the straight.
comment_ch: 早段嘗試佔取中間位置，但走外疊，靠近他駒後蹄競跑，一千米處移入第二疊。直路彎居有利位置，得以望空，但直路上僅能保持普通走勢。

comment: Missed break & raced at tail, niggled along until           over-raced on heels 600m, driven 350m, not clear run 250m,  kept on evenly closing stages.
comment_ch: 漏閘，居包尾。受催策，六百米處緊貼他駒後蹄競跑時搶口。三百五十米處受催策，二百五十米處未能望空。末段保持穩定走勢。

comment: Limited response when asked at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百推騎，反應一般

comment: On pace to be nearest at finish; ran on nicely.
comment_ch: 跟前接近，走勢純熟

comment: Limited response when asked in the straight
comment_ch: 直路推騎, 未見加速

comment: Cruised forward from the inside draw to be handily placed   4th, on the rail. Looked gone at the 200m, but kicked again to just miss 2nd in a head bobber.
comment_ch: 自內檔出閘，上前居前列第四位，走內欄。二百米處看似大勢已去，但再度加速，在叮噹馬頭下僅失亞席。
owner: Tony Lau Yiu Tong, Thomas Lau Sum Fai & Lau Yi Fai

comment: Under a hold throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 全程捉到實，未受考驗

comment: Hit the front on the inside to score; moved better than before.
comment_ch: 內檔竄上, 表現勝前

comment: Steadied soon after start then shifted across behind        runners to rail. Lost position back stretch, stayed on rail in straight and finished strongly.
comment_ch: 出閘後瞬即收慢，其後在馬群之後切入內欄。對面直路上失位，直路上固守內欄，衝刺強勁。

comment: Three wide at turn; kept on late for 4th.
comment_ch: 三疊轉彎, 末段仲有

comment: Eased to sit behind midfield along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, held up 4-2, dashed strongly when clear.
comment_ch: 收慢留居中間之後位置，走內欄。步速緩慢，不利發揮。自四百米處起至二百米處受困，望空後衝刺強勁。
owner: Wong Man Kit & Vincent Wong Ling Sun

comment: Ran 3rd under a hold; impressive.
comment_ch: 扣實第三，表現悅目

comment: Jumped well, raced prominently early, 2 wide in midfield in the middle stages, there to turn, angled out in straight    and finished off well to score.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，早段居前列。中段居中間位置，走第二疊。直路彎前居相同位置。直路上向外移出，衝刺良佳，取得勝利。

comment: Jumped with field, ridden to hold rail inside early leaders before settling in box seat 2L from leader. Got clear rails run on straightening and kept on strongly to the line.
comment_ch: 與對手同步躍出。早段受催策固守內欄，居領先馬匹內側，繼而居包廂位置，落後領放馬兩個馬位。入直路時望空，走內欄。保持勁勢至終點。
owner: Pui Kwan Kay & Raymond Chu Yuet Chung

comment: Wide throughout; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 沿途蝕位, 但試來卻不差

comment: Settled worse than midfield and ran home steadily in        straight.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置。直路上保持穩勢。

comment: On-pace early; kept on to win under whip late.
comment_ch: 主動跟前, 鞭騎到底
owner: Lau Chi Tak & Lau Chi Wing

comment: Slow to begin; never in contention.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 從未參予競逐

comment: Sent forward, wide and without cover until leading on the   rail at 800M, headed at 250M, found nothing in the          Straight.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，在沒遮擋下走外疊，八百米處沿欄領放。二百五十米處被超越。直路上再無餘力。
owner: Charles Tung Chung Ho, Ronald Tung Pit Shing & Tung Pit Ching

comment: Steadied at 200m; ran on again when recovered.
comment_ch: 二百收慢, 收正再衝
owner: Wai Siu Kee & Edmond Lee Man Bun

comment: Very slow away, midfield 2 wide, not suited by the slow     pace, demonstrated good finishing efforts 200M.
comment_ch: 出閘十分緩慢，居中間位置，走第二疊。慢步速不合發揮。二百米處衝刺良佳。

comment: Hard ridden forward to share the lead along the fence, kept on only fairly, weakened badly over the last furlong.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，並排領先，沿欄競跑。僅能保持一般走勢，最後二百米嚴重轉弱。

comment: Jumped awkwardly losing ground, settled slightly worse than midfield on rails, awkwardly placed behind runners after    straightening, close on heels passing the 100 metres, kept  on well.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，因而失地。沿欄居中間稍後位置。入直路後在對手之後處於窘境。跑過一百米處時靠近他駒後蹄，保持佳勢。

comment: Began fairly, no pace, dropping towards rear. Under         pressure turning for home and finished tailed out.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，缺乏前速，墮居後列位置。轉入直路時受催策，包尾而回。

comment: At rear and finished tailed out, never a factor.
comment_ch: 居後列，包尾大敗而回。從未有力一爭。

comment: Settled at rear; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑, 走勢生硬

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 2.5Ls behind the leader in the    middle part of the track, kept on steadily to the line.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬兩個半馬位，在跑道中央競跑。保持穩勢至終點。

comment: Eased back early; made progress when asked.
comment_ch: 早段稍留, 輕騎追趕
owner: Simon Tam Ngak Chou & Tam Hin Chi

comment: Eased to rear, never improved.
comment_ch: 收慢，居後列，從未能上前。
owner: Queenie Siu Fung Kou & Lau Kwok Man

comment: Broke ok, caught 3 wide with cover fore of midfield, 4 wide on turn & outpaced, driven 400m, found nil & faded right    out.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可。居中間之前位置，走第三疊，有遮擋。直路彎走第四疊，被拋離。四百米處受催策。再無餘力，隨即力竭。

comment: Under a hold throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 拖住未試，旨在考閘

comment: Dropped back early sitting just worse than midfield, 3-4    wide. Came widest on the turn, and only battled on fairly   to the line.
comment_ch: 早段墮居中間稍後位置，走第三至第四疊。直路彎走大外疊，奔向終點時走勢僅屬普通。
owner: Tony Yue Kwok Leung, Alexander Yue Ka Kuen & Richard Yue Ka Ming

comment: Quickly away from draw 1, took cover behind eventual        winner, shifted out from the box seat nearing 300M, tried   hard but couldn't get closer to winner, held 2nd            comfortably though.
comment_ch: 自第一檔出閘迅速，在頭馬之後取得遮擋。接近三百米處時自包廂位置向外移出。力拼，但未能追近頭馬，輕鬆跑獲亞軍。

comment: Broke well from the two draw near the centre of the         straight course, restrained to just behind first few before let down to issue serious challenge passing the 300 metres, held every chance until run ended about 100 metres out.
comment_ch: 自接近跑道中央的第二檔出閘迅速，在約束下居前數駒稍後位置。跑過三百米處時發力展開挑戰，已獲機會盡展所長，大約一百米處無以為繼。

comment: Shifted across behind horses from wide draw, settling       towards rear but away from fence. Lost position around      turn, one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後於馬群之後切入，居後列，離欄競跑。直路彎失位，直路上保持同速。

comment: Under a hold in the straight; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 直路扣實，點到即止

comment: Began OK, ridden to hold rail at midfield before bumped and unbalanced 700m, dropping back. Urged forward top of        straight but blocked 250m, then one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策固守內欄，居中間位置。七百米處與對手互相碰撞，失去平衡並墮後。直路初受催策上前，二百五十米處受阻，其後保持同速。

comment: Pushed to settle midfield, 4Ls behind the leader on the     fence, ran on well for 3rd.
comment_ch: 受推策，居中間位置，落後領放馬四個馬位，走內欄。走勢良佳，跑獲季軍。

comment: Began well, pressed forward to hold box seat, stalking      leader to straight. Looked chance 250m but no extra close   home.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。受催策上前，佔取包廂位置。直路前跟隨領放馬。二百五十米處看似具爭勝機會，但接近終點時再無餘力。

comment: Pushed forward and sat 1-3/4L behind the leader on the      rail, despite suited to the slow pace, weakened passing     200M.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，落後領放馬一又四分三個馬位，走內欄。步速緩慢，適合發揮，但跑過二百米處時轉弱。

comment: Saved ground to make progress when asked in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路有騎，慳位追趕
owner: Wong Chung Hin & Arnold Wong Chi Chiu

comment: Ran on fairly well when asked at turn.
comment_ch: 轉彎已騎，走勢不弱

comment: Eased back early; made progress along the rail.
comment_ch: 早段稍留, 直路沿欄追趕
owner: Tony Lau Yiu Tong, Thomas Lau Sum Fai & Lau Yi Fai

comment: Settled along the fence, 2Ls off the fast pace, progressed  steadily 300M to score.
comment_ch: 沿欄競跑，落後快步速的領放馬兩個馬位。三百米處逐漸追前，勝出賽事。

comment: Wide throughout; ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 沿途外疊, 不過不失
owner: Mr & Mrs Ben Wong Chung Mat and Vincent Wong Yin Shun

comment: Jumped OK but bumped and unbalanced 1000m, dropping 3-back  along fence, Switched to centre track in straight and       finished strongly to just miss a placing.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，一千米處被碰撞及失去平衡，墮退三個馬位，走內欄。直路上移至跑道中央競跑，衝刺凌厲，僅未能跑入三甲。
owner: Wu Chak Man & Ng Chit Yam

comment: First to jump; ran comfortably for 3rd.
comment_ch: 出閘最快，輕鬆入位
owner: Alan Chan Yau Yuet & Chris Chan Cheong Hoi

comment: Asked momentarily at 400m; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 四百騎咗兩步，末段按返

comment: Even jump, eased to beyond midfield on rail, on heels 750m, under a ride 350m, never a chance.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，收慢留居中間之後位置，走內欄。七百五十米處貼近他駒後蹄，三百五十米處受催策，從未有望爭勝。
owner: Mr & Mrs Raymond Chan Shu Keung

comment: Broke ok, bustled a touch, raced 1 off with cover, ridden   500m, shifted out final turn, stayed on solidly.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，略受催策，走第二疊，有遮擋。五百米處受催策。直路彎向外移出。保持佳勢。
owner: Mr & Mrs Yiu King Chuen & Chris Yiu Chun Hang

comment: Ridden halfway; not stretching out properly.
comment_ch: 半程已騎，步伐凌亂

comment: At rear 5L behind the leader, 2 wide with cover. Shifted    wide for a clear run upon straightening, before finishing   the race off nicely.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬五個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。入直路時移出外疊以望空。末段以佳勢衝刺。

comment: Pressed forward but wide to lead on settling before         crossing to fence first turn. Slowed pace back stretch,     kicked head 300m, run down on line.
comment_ch: 受催策上前帶頭，走外疊。轉首個彎位時移入內欄，對面直路上減慢步速。三百米處加速上前，終點線上被超越。
owner: Ming Shui Sum & Alice Ming Bo Ting

comment: Began fairly, caught wide in midfield, strode forward       passing 1000m settling one-back, one-off. Boxed on steadily in straight under hard riding.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，走外疊，居中間位置。跑過一千米處時展步上前，落後一個馬位，走第二疊。直路上在力策下持續力拼。

comment: Broke ok, over-raced initially, parked midfield 1 off with  cover, every chance when shifted wide home turn & driven,   struggled in run home.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，早段搶口。居中間位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。直路彎移向外疊，受催策，已獲機會盡展所長。直路上掙扎上前。
owner: Siu Chak Wai, Siu Wai Chung & Jimmy Siu Wing Kin

comment: Saved ground throughout; made progress when asked.
comment_ch: 一步不蝕，推騎追趕

comment: Ridden along to find cover, dropping to rear in one-off     position. Taken to rail back stretch, wide into straight,   found nothing and eased final stages. Unacceptable          performance.
comment_ch: 在催策下尋找遮擋，墮居後列，走第二疊。對面直路上移入內欄，入直路時走外疊。末段再無餘力，並且收慢。表現難以接受。
owner: Max Ngan Man Hung & Anthony Wu Ting Yuk

comment: Began OK, ridden along in midfield, swung wide into         straight, finished strongly to win close home.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可。受催策，居中間位置，入直路時移出外疊。衝刺強勁，接近終點時取勝。

comment: Sat worse than midfield early, 1 off the fence. Dropped out in the straight. Jockey reported unsound action and found   to be lame.
comment_ch: 早段居中間之後位置，走第二疊，直路上墮退。騎師報告指坐騎動作感覺欠順，獸醫檢查後發現該駒不良於行。
owner: Tommy Yeung Kin Wing & Yeung Yim Sau Wah

comment: Slow to break & quickly outpaced, long last by 700m &       niggled, ridden entering straight but never a factor.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，迅速被拋離，七百米處遙居於後，受催策。入直路時受催策，但從未有力爭勝。

comment: Moderate start, worked his way forward to assume lead on    rails at the Rock, saved ground turning for home, unable to sustain effort and overhauled inside final 200 metres.      (Lame next day)
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策上前，大石鼓處沿欄領先。直路彎走內疊節省腳程，但無以為繼。最後二百米被超越。（賽後翌日不良於行。）

comment: Hard ridden forward, suited by the slow pace, but dropped   off quickly 400M.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，慢步速適合發揮。四百米處迅速墮退。

comment: Jumped away well; ran on for 3rd when asked.
comment_ch: 起步敏捷，末段推騎入位

comment: Under restraint along the rail; kept on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 貼欄按實, 走勢持續

comment: Saved ground throughout; found nothing when asked.
comment_ch: 沿途慳位，騎都唔郁

handicap: THE HONG KONG ST JOHN AMBULANCE BRIGADE CENTENARY CELEBRATION CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港聖約翰救傷隊百週年紀念盃（讓賽）
comment: Fast start & raced handily, checked off heels 880m &        slotted fore of midfield 1 off with cover, forced 3 deep    750m, driven into stretch, wilted in run.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居前列。八百八十米處勒避他駒後蹄，居中間之前位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。七百五十米處被迫走第三疊。入直路時受催策，力竭。

comment: Overcame wide barrier to sit just behind leaders, chased    home winner inside 300M but always held, sound effort under top weight.
comment_ch: 克服了自最外檔出閘的不利因素，居領放馬匹稍後位置。最後三百米力追頭馬，但一直未能追及。負頂磅上陣，表現出色。
owner: Cheung Ming Man, Cheung Ying Ho, Freddy Choi Kwok Sai & Joseph Lee Chung Tak

comment: Raced midfield, 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover,    despite the fast tempo, made no impression in straight.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬四個馬位，在有遮擋下走第二疊。步速甚快，但直路上毫無表現。
owner: Ng Chong Muk, Wong Man & Ng Siu Luen

comment: Fought on gamely to score when shifted out in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路移出, 奮力上前

comment: Up with the pace; weakened and dropped back in the Straight.
comment_ch: 跟放兩段，直路墮後

comment: Broke ok, bustled along to settle rail fore of midfield,    switched 5 wide into stretch & driven, quickened to press   lead 150m, held & lost 2nd at wire.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居中間之前位置，受催策沿欄競走。入直路時受催策走第五疊，一百五十米處加速上前，追迫領放馬。保持走勢，過終點時失去亞席。
owner: The Executors of the Estate of the late Herbert Hui Ho Ming

comment: Hard ridden forward, sat 2 wide, benefited by the slow      sectionals, out of fuel 250M.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，走第二疊。慢步速有利發揮。二百五十米處力竭。
owner: Chan Wai Nam & Ian Chan Yau Nam

comment: Settled behind the leaders, 2 wide, ran on well to the line for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居領先馬匹之後，走第二疊。走勢良佳至終點，跑獲季軍。
owner: Anthony Sham Hon Sum & Jim Fung Kwong Chun

comment: On pace centre track; faded when under whip at 200m.
comment_ch: 中檔跟前, 二百開鞭, 乏力墮退

comment: Jumped with field but over-raced back stretch between       horses. Held up for run early in straight, steadied 200m,   one-paced.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，對面直路上在馬匹之間競跑，跑來搶口。直路初受困，二百米處收慢，保持同速。
owner: Lincoln Ling & Fione Yip Sze Pui

comment: Pressed forward to hold rail, taking box seat and tailing   leader to straight. Shaken up 400m but found little and     faded.
comment_ch: 受催策固守內欄，佔取包廂位置，直路前跟隨領放馬。四百米處受催策，但再無餘力，力竭。

comment: Raced wide at home turn; finished at rear.
comment_ch: 蝕位轉彎，包尾而回

comment: Always in touch; ran on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 有前有後, 表現甚佳

comment: Camped handy, travelled 2Ls behind the leader 3 wide        without cover, soon flattened after straightening.
comment_ch: 居有利位置，落後領放馬兩個馬位，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。入直路後瞬即洩氣。

comment: Broke ok, rousted initially, trapped 3 wide no cover        midfield, over-raced 820m, ridden 450m, wide & unbalanced   on turn, found nil.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，早段受催策。居中間位置，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。八百二十米處搶口，四百五十米處受催策，直路彎走外疊及失去平衡。再無餘力。

comment: Pushed forward at any cost early, eventually sharing the    lead, 1 off the fence. Ran flat in the straight, dropping   out from the 250m.
comment_ch: 早段受大力推策上前，其後並排領先，走第二疊。直路上走勢平平，自二百五十米處起墮退。

comment: Jumped fairly but soon settled behind midfield, ran on      under pressure in straight without troubling the first trio.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，瞬即居中間之後位置。直路上在催策下持續上前，但未能威脅頭三名馬匹。

comment: Broke evenly, outsped & back to near rear 1 off, hunted     along to hold spot, under riding 650m, struggled to pick up.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，被拋離，墮居後列，走第二疊，受催策以保持位置。六百五十米處再受催策，未能加速。
owner: Chan Hon Ming & Anthony So Hung Gun

comment: Eased back, sat 5-1/4L behind the leader 2 wide with cover, harmed by the slow tempo, unleashed strongly from 300M to   score.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，落後領放馬五又四分一個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。慢步速不利發揮。自三百米處起展開強勁衝刺，勝出賽事。

comment: Ran on fairly well when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段稍騎, 追勢不俗

comment: Raced handy; ran on only fairly.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑, 不過不失
owner: Jason Tsang Chiu Wing, Zeroone Dick Ling Kwok Lung & Ferry Ling Kwok Lun

comment: Ran on ordinary; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 走勢一般，未見佳處

comment: Always in last few, baulked for a run early in straight,    kept on at the same pace. (Questioned for disappointing     performance)
comment_ch: 一直居最後數位。直路初受困，保持同速。（騎師被查詢此駒表現令人失望的原因。）
owner: Rotary Club of Kwai Chung Syndicate

comment: Up with the pace; limited response when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 跟放, 直路騎落唔多

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 8Ls behind the leader on the      fence, one paced home.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬八個馬位，走內欄。保持同速至終點。

comment: Pressed forward early to be handily placed 2nd/3rd, 1 off   the fence. Dropped out quickly from the 200m.
comment_ch: 早段受催策上前，居第二至第三位，走第二疊。自二百米處起迅速墮退。

comment: Jumped well, raced prominently, bumped near 1050M, took the lead thereafter, peaked near 200M and headed, weakened      thereafter.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居前列。接近一千零五十米處時碰撞他駒，其後取得領先。接近二百米處時未能再增速及被超越，其後逐漸轉弱。

handicap: TUEN MUN PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 屯門公眾騎術學校讓賽
comment: Sharp break & soon led 1 off until clear & to rail 850m, 1L clear & shaken up 400m, headed 250m, faded.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，瞬即取得領先，走第二疊，八百五十米處帶離對手，切入內欄。四百米處帶離一個馬位，受催策。二百五十米處被超越，力竭。

comment: Started ok but lacked toe & rousted early, drifted back &   niggled along 1 off with cover behind midfield, under pump  400m, wide into stretch, kept on moderately.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，但缺乏前速，早段受催策，其後墮居中間之後位置，再受催策，走第二疊，有遮擋。四百米處受催策。入直路時走外疊，保持普通走勢。

comment: No early speed and soon at rear along fence. Under pressure turning for home, switched out 200m but made little headway.
comment_ch: 缺乏前速，瞬即居後列，沿欄競跑。直路彎受催策。二百米處移出外疊，略為追前。
owner: The Hon & Mrs Andrew Li Kwok Nang

comment: Bumped and unbalanced start, dropping to rear but kept      wide. Took home turn 3-wide, widest in straight, found      nothing under pressure.
comment_ch: 起步時被碰撞，因而失去平衡，墮居後列，持續走外疊。直路彎走第三疊。直路上走最外疊，受催策，但再無餘力。

comment: Bumped at start, just behind speed early, settled ahead of  midfield 1 off, ridden along 750m, short of room 600m,      shuffled back, ridden 300m, stayed on evenly.
comment_ch: 起步時被對手碰撞。早段居領放馬稍後位置。其後居中間之前位置，走第二疊。七百五十米處受催策。六百米處空位不足，墮退。三百米處受催策，保持穩勢。

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY LOVE FOREVER COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶愛恆久系列讓賽
comment: Bumped and unbalanced start, pressed forward, settling      one-off 3L from leader. Swung wide into straight and ran on steadily under hard riding.
comment_ch: 出閘時受碰撞及失去平衡，受催策上前，落後領放馬三個馬位，走第二疊。入直路時移出外疊。在力策下保持穩勢。
owner: Helena Wai Suk Chong & Cheung Kwok Wing

comment: Broke well but soon taken well behind, trailed the field    into straight, found nothing.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，但瞬即遙居於後。入直路時尾隨馬群，再無餘力。
owner: Mr & Mrs Stephen Ho Wai Man, Fred Ho Ka Chun and Derek Ho Ka Chung

comment: Showed good early speed; weakened late.
comment_ch: 馬有速度，但末段力度已減

comment: Unhurried, detached last 9Ls off the pace middle stages,    made no progress in straight, never a factor.
comment_ch: 未受催策，中段遙遙包尾，落後領放馬九個馬位。直路上毫無進展。從未構成威脅。
owner: Stephen Chang Tso Tung, Timothy Sun & Leung Sze Tien

comment: With leaders early, soon taken back to 5th on rails just    over 2L off, snuck up on inside turning in but baulked      early in straight, renewed effort inside the final 200      metres, ran into heels again just over 100 metres out.
comment_ch: 早段與領放馬匹並跑，瞬即留居第五位，落後僅逾兩個馬位，走內欄。入直路時在內疊上前，但直路初受阻。最後二百米重新發力，跑過一百米處時再度靠近前駒後蹄。
owner: Lincoln Ling & Fione Yip Sze Pui

comment: Pressed forward early to sit behind the pace though wide    before getting cover around turn. Kept on fairly to 200m    before tiring.
comment_ch: 早段受催策上前，居領放馬之後，走外疊，轉直路彎時取得遮擋。二百米處前保持普通走勢，其後洩氣。

comment: Jumped well, ridden between horses in midfield to turn.     Lost position entering straight and faded gradually.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。直路彎前在馬匹之間競跑，居中間位置。入直路時失位，逐漸力竭。

handicap_ch: 皮亞士紀念挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Switched across behind runners from outside draw, settling  at rear along fence. Not much room top of straight, got     split 130m, finished off well.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後於馬群之後切入內欄，居後列。直路初空位不足，一百三十米處取位上前，衝刺良佳。
owner: James Lau Po Man & Alice Woo Wai See

comment: Broke well from a poor gate, raced very wide in midfield    down back straight before moving forward to a prominent     position passing the 800 metres, chased leader into         straight but folded up quickly inside final 200 metres.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘迅速。對面直路上居中間位置，走大外疊。跑過八百米處時上前居前列。入直路時追趕領放馬。最後二百米在內疊迅速力竭。

comment: Wide throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 沿途外叠, 拖住未試
owner: Mr & Mrs Ben Wong Chung Mat and Vincent Wong Yin Shun

comment: Up with the pace; hit the front at 200m; kept on well to score.
comment_ch: 跟放，二百透出，直奔終點

comment: Saved ground throughout; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 沿途慳位, 但走勢卻平常

comment: At rear, 6.5Ls off the good pace, made some ground 200M.
comment_ch: 居包尾位置，落後步速甚快的領放馬六個半馬位。二百米處略為追前。
owner: Paul Lo Chung Wai & Kathy Lo Ho Hsiu Lan

comment: Started well, camped 1 back on rail, niggled 650m & soon    under pump, driven turning in & shifted centre track,       grinding closer final 300m, held.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，落後一個馬位，走內欄。六百五十米處受催策，瞬即受力策。轉入直路時受催策，移至跑道中央，最後三百米處力追頭馬，但未能追上。
owner: Timmy Chan Tien Kay & Jamson Chan Wing Chai

comment: Began fairly, then steadied, racing between horses at rear, Improved position turn, wide in straight, ran on steadily.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，繼而收慢，在馬匹之間競跑，居後列。直路彎推進上前。直路上走外疊，穩步上前。
owner: Stanley Lau Chin Ho, Gary Lau Sun Tao & Ronald Lau Sun Ting

comment: Quickened at turn; ran on strongly wide for 2nd.
comment_ch: 彎位發力, 外檔撲上

comment: Made progress steadily; hit the line strong for 3rd.
comment_ch: 逐步加快, 勁度十足
owner: Mr & Mrs Arthur Wong Chun Mo

comment: Not enough early speed; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 早段唔夠快，走勢普通
owner: Charles Tung Chung Ho, Ronald Tung Pit Shing & Tung Pit Ching

comment: Broke well & bustled initially to race handily 1 off with   cover, shuffled back 700m, niggled 550m, driven 400m &      widest final turn, boxed on one pace.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，早段受催策，居前列，在有遮擋下走第二疊。七百米處墮後。五百五十米處受催策。四百米處再受催策。直路彎走最外疊，保持同速。

comment: Raced greenly; never in contention.
comment_ch: 走勢生硬, 未及水準

comment: Pushed to occupy the box seat, soon weakened after          straightening.
comment_ch: 受推策佔取包廂位置，入直路後瞬即轉弱。

comment: OK start, last early, railed through to sit near rear on    inside, travelled strongly throughout, pushed along 400m,   made significant ground without ever challenging.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，早段包尾，沿欄上前，居後列位置。沿途走勢強勁，四百米處受推策，追前甚多，但未能展開挑戰。

comment: Bumped start, at back, blocked 4-2, dashed well when clear  despite not suited by the slow pace.
comment_ch: 出閘時被碰撞，居後列位置。自四百米處至二百米處受困。慢步速不合發揮，但望空後衝刺強勁。

comment: On-pace early; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢, 末段按返

comment: Pushed forward at all costs early to sit just behind the    leader, on the rail. Held up early in the straight, but     never ran on when clear, and only battled to the line.
comment_ch: 早段受大力推策上前，居領放馬稍後位置，走內欄。直路早段受困，但望空後從未能追前，僅能勉力而為至終點。

comment: Hit the front at 200m; ran on well to score.
comment_ch: 二百透出，愈走愈勁
owner: Peter P C Fan, Montgomery Ho Shun Wah & Dr Michael Mok Hing Hung

comment: Settled worse than midfield about 5Ls behind the leader 2   wide with cover, never ran on.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬約五個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。從未能追前。

comment: Sharp break but snagged to tail, niggled along, shifted out & ridden 500m, plugged on tepidly centre track.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，留居包尾位置，受催策。五百米處向外移出，受催策，在跑道中央競跑，走勢疲乏。

comment: Hard ridden to keep up in front of midfield, 2 wide, not    suited by the fast tempo, weakened 200M.
comment_ch: 在力策下保持在中間之前位置，走第二疊。步速甚快，不合發揮。二百米處轉弱。

comment: Hard ridden to lead passing 1200m before allowing another   to go ahead while holding rail. Retook lead and kicked      clear 300m, run down final stages.
comment_ch: 跑過千二米處時在力策下取得領先，其後讓對手過頭，固守內欄。三百米處再度領先，帶離對手。末段被超越。
owner: Eleanor Kwok Law Kwai Chun & Kitty Kwok Sea Nga

comment: Showed good early pace as usual along the outer fence       early, eased to settle 2L behind the leader mid stages,     crowded 300M, kept on one pace to the line thereafter.
comment_ch: 早段如常展現前速，走外欄。中段收慢，落後領放馬兩個馬位。三百米處受擠迫。其後保持同速至終點。

comment: Hard ridden early, settled in front of midfield, 2 wide,    just held ground in straight for 3rd.
comment_ch: 早段受力策，居中間之前位置，走第二疊。直路上僅能保持位置，跑獲季軍。
owner: Matthew C M Yum, Christopher Carson Yum, Nicholas Kevin Yum & Stephanie Carrie Yum

comment: Limited response when under whip at 300m.
comment_ch: 三百開鞭，反應一般

comment: Slow away, pushed to hold the rail in front of midfield,    suited by the slow pace, just held ground in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居中間之前位置，受推策固守內欄。慢步速適合發揮，直路上僅能保持位置。

comment: Switched off to last from wide barrier, couldn't keep up    with main group passing 700M, well beaten before entering   straight.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，留居包尾位置。跑過七百米處時未能跟上主馬群，入直路前已洩氣潰敗。

comment: At rear, travelled 7.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with      cover, harmed by the very slow sectionals, made no          impression in straight.
comment_ch: 居後列位置，落後領放馬七個半馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。步速十分緩慢有礙發揮，直路上毫無表現。

comment: Raced midfield; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 居中跟跑，未有好感
owner: Charmaine Wong Kam Mei & Chan Fu Ho

comment: Urged to lead along the rail; ran on fairly when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 貼欄搶放, 直路考驗, 中規中矩
owner: Stephen So Chi Ming & Samuel Chan Ying Leung

comment: Came from behind for 3rd when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段稍騎，後上第三

comment: Jumped well from a wide draw, sent forward to take the      lead, travelled comfortably throughout, kicked clear after  straightening, won easily.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘良佳，受催策上前領放，全程走勢暢順。入直路後加速帶離，輕鬆取勝。

owner: Mr & Mrs Vincent To Wai Keung

comment: Jumped away well; drew away to score.
comment_ch: 應聲彈出, 大勝而回

comment: Hung out at turn; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 轉彎斜走, 走勢欠規矩

comment: Tardy start; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 起步麻麻，走勢生硬

comment: Niggled along throughout; under whip in the straight.
comment_ch: 沿途俾住, 直路開鞭
owner: Julian Hui Chun Hang & Michele Monique Reis

comment: Limited response when being asked at 400m.
comment_ch: 四百考驗，未見加速

comment: Even jump, lack of natural speed and restrained to near     rear, keen 970m, settled near tail 1 off, 3 deep 700m and   ridden soon after, never in it.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，缺乏前速，在約束下居後列。九百七十米處跑來搶口，居接近包尾位置，第二疊。七百米處走第三疊，瞬即受催策，但從未能爭勝。

comment: Taken back and travelled at the rear, 7-1/2L behind 2 wide, closed off nicely to finish 2nd on the outer Straight.
comment_ch: 留居後列位置，落後七個半馬位，走第二疊。直路上在外疊以佳勢衝刺，奪得亞軍。

comment: Under a hold throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 沿途扣實，未見真章

comment: Under whip at turn; weakened badly in the Straight.
comment_ch: 轉彎開鞭, 直路散晒

comment: Wide throughout; raced under his own steam.
comment_ch: 全程外疊，拖住順走
owner: Mr & Mrs Ben Wong Chung Mat and Vincent Wong Yin Shun

comment: Taken up early to sit forward of midfield, on the fence.    Well positioned in the straight, but never ran on.
comment_ch: 早段受催策上前，居中間之前位置，走內欄。直路上居好位，但從未能追前。
owner: Sir Po-shing & Lady Woo, Jackson Woo Ka Biu, Dawson Woo Ka Chung and The Executors of the Estate of

comment: Settled midfield; made minor inroads in the Straight.
comment_ch: 居中跟跑，直路稍追

comment: Slow to begin; made progress to settle midfield; flattened late.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 迅即居中, 末段勁平

comment: Under a hold for 2nd; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 按實第二，點到即止

comment: Always in touch; ran on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 前後俱備，走勢純熟

comment: Awkwardly away, settled near the rear 8Ls behind leader,    similar position turning in, not picked up at any stage,    eased 150M.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，居後列，落後領放馬八個馬位。入直路時居相若位置。沿途未能加速，一百五十米處收慢。

comment: Pushed forward early, settling midfield, 1 off the fence.   Became unsettled and checked off heels at 1100m, and lost   ground. Came wider on the turn and ran strongly to the      line, holding 3rd late.
comment_ch: 早段受推策上前，居中間位置，走第二疊。千一米處未能穩定走勢，勒避他駒後蹄並失地。直路彎走更外疊，衝刺強勁，末段保住季軍。

comment: Made progress steadily; ran 3rd comfortably.
comment_ch: 逐步追趕, 姿態輕鬆

comment: Looking for cover after start; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 起步找遮擋，未受考驗

handicap_ch: 法國賽馬會馬主事務部讓賽
comment: Eased to sit in midfield early, however raced too keen,     took lead 1600M, clocked slow sectionals, overhauled 300M,  ran on fairly,
comment_ch: 早段收慢留居中間位置，十分搶口。千六米處取得領先，步速緩慢。三百米處被超越，走勢普通。

comment: Bumped start, recovered to race wide in midfield, no cover  throughout, bumped near 500M and carried wider turning in,  failed to close off in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘時與他駒互相碰撞，恢復走勢後居中間位置，走外疊，沿途沒有遮擋。接近五百米處時被碰撞。入直路時移出外疊。直路上未能以勁勢衝刺。

comment: Showed good early speed; kept on well to score.
comment_ch: 速高帶到, 表現甚佳

comment: Not pushed, settling between horses at rear. Urged forward  top of straight, made some ground to 200m before turning    one-paced.
comment_ch: 未受推策，居後列，在馬匹之間競跑。直路初受催策上前。略為追前至二百米處，繼而保持同速。
owner: Vicky Tang & Lily Scheng Hsi Feng

comment: Always at the rear, never a factor.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列，從未構成威脅。

comment: Never better than midfield on rails, ran home one-paced.
comment_ch: 從未超越中間位置，走內欄。末段保持同速。

comment: Shifted across behind runners from wide draw, settling at   rear but away from fence. Taken widest in straight and ran  home steadily.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後在馬群之後切入，居後列位置，離欄競跑。直路上移出大外疊，走勢平穩。

handicap_ch: 其士企業網絡方案讓賽
comment: Broke well, pressed forward from wide draw to race outside  leader. Urged forward top of straight, took over running    passing 250m and kept on strongly to the line.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘迅速，受催策上前，居領放馬外側。直路初受催策上前，跑過二百五十米處時取得領先。保持勁勢至終點。

comment: Taken across behind runners from wide draw, raced as the    back marker 6Ls behind leader, made steady progress along   the fence final 300M.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後在馬群之後切入內欄，居包尾位置，落後領放馬六個馬位。最後三百米沿欄穩步上前。

comment: Won comfortably when led all the way to score.
comment_ch: 帶放到底，姿態輕鬆
owner: Eleanor Kwok Law Kwai Chun & Kitty Kwok Sea Nga

comment: Restrained throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 全程捉實, 點到即止

comment: Ran on strongly although wide throughout.
comment_ch: 全程蝕位，但走勢仍勁
owner: Tony Lau Hon Kwan, Dominic Lai, David Poon Cheung Fung & Alfred Ronald Li Kwok Lung

handicap: HKU FACULTIES OF BUSINESS & ECONOMICS AND SCIENCE HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 港大經濟及工商管理學院與理學院讓賽
comment: Raced midfield, travelled 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, made some ground in straight despite blocked for     some distance 200M.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬五個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。二百米處在一段途程上受阻，但直路上仍能略為上前。

comment: Began from a wide gate, settled 3-wide just better than     midfield, soon came to challenge upon straightening,        quickened up well to take charge over 200 metres out, won   readily.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，居中間稍前位置，走第三疊。入直路時瞬即展開挑戰，以佳勢加速上前，二百米處取得領先，穩奪冠軍。

comment: Travelled behind midfield, 3-3/4L off the pace 3 wide with  cover, harmed by the slow tempo, remained at rear in the    Straight.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬三又四分三個馬位，在有遮擋下走第三疊。步速緩慢，不利發揮。直路上持續居後列。

comment: Led early to run 2nd; ran on ok.
comment_ch: 快放第二, 表現尚可
owner: Emily Wong Man Yan & Wong Ying Sheung

comment: Failed to muster early, took cover in midfield 2 wide, held ground in straight for 3rd.
comment_ch: 早段未能加速，居中間位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。直路上保持位置，跑獲季軍。

comment: Asked at turn; under a hold in the Straight.
comment_ch: 彎位已騎，直路按返

comment: Wide throughout; made ground steadily to score.
comment_ch: 全程蝕位, 逐步加速上前

comment: Up with early pace, restrained to 6th place middle stages,  responded well leaving the bend to go 2nd 150M, proved no   match with winner, one paced final stages and lost 2nd near line.
comment_ch: 早段跟上步速，中段受約束留居第六位。入直路時受催策反應良好，一百五十米處居第二位。不敵頭馬，末段保持同速，終點前失去第二位。

comment: Tucked in behind midfield, came under urging midway, stayed on moderately to go 3rd 100M out.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置。半程時受催策。最後一百米保持普通走勢，跑獲第三。
owner: Justin Yue Kwok Hung & Jeremy Yue Chun Hay

comment: Always in touch; ran on comfortably for 2nd.
comment_ch: 有前有後，姿態從容

comment: Being niggled along; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 沿途俾住，走勢一般
owner: Shum Mak Ling, Hsu Wei Hsuan, Arthur Chiu Wing Hong & Gary Cheung Hang Ngai

comment: Taken back from widest gate to sit 2nd last 1 off, checked  wide to avoid faller 850m, driven very wide home turn,      stayed on for minor inroads centre track.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後留居尾二位置，走第二疊。八百五十米處勒避跌倒的馬匹，移出外疊。直路彎受催策，走大外疊。直路上在跑道中央保持走勢，略為追前。

comment: Quickened at turn; kept on one-paced in the Straight.
comment_ch: 彎位湧一湧, 直路保持速度

comment: Hard ridden but not muster, behind midfield, 2 wide, not    suited by the slow tempo, no dash.
comment_ch: 受力策，但未能加速。居中間之後位置，走第二疊。步速緩慢，不合發揮。衝刺乏力。

comment: Raced keenly early; weakened badly in the Straight.
comment_ch: 早段搶口, 直路散晒

comment: One off one pace; kept on for 2nd.
comment_ch: 二疊跟前，騎落仲有

comment: Drifted back from the jump to sit at the rear, on the rail. Hampered at the 900m. Never improve his position, and       quietly ridden to the line in the straight.
comment_ch: 出閘後墮居後列，走內欄。九百米處受阻礙。從未能推進，直路上緩緩上前至終點。

comment: Slow into stride and settled towards the rear of the field, on the fence. Held up until forcing a run at the 200m, but  only plugged away fairly to the line.
comment_ch: 起步緩慢，居馬群後列，走內欄。受困至二百米處強行取位。末段走勢僅屬普通。
owner: Allen Shi Lop Tak & Kimmy Ngan King Lin

comment: Settled to race prominently, 2L off but 3 wide without      cover, weakened passing 300M, not competitive.
comment_ch: 居前列，落後兩個馬位，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。跑過三百米處時轉弱，從未有力一爭。

comment: Slow to muster despite ridden along, picked up along the    rail to just worse than midfield passing the 1000 metres,   shuffled back to second last entering straight, produced    good late impression in the run to the line.
comment_ch: 受催策，但加速緩慢。沿欄追前，跑過一千米處時進佔中間稍後位置。入直路時墮居尾二位置。末段追前甚多。
owner: James Chan Shiu On, Joseph Chan Ho Lim, Janet Chan Ng Chee Tung & Wendy Chan Wing Kei

comment: Made ground steadily; ran on ok.
comment_ch: 逐步追趕, 不過不失

comment: Came home on the inside; just scored.
comment_ch: 內檔竄上, 後上險勝
owner: Mr & Mrs Charley Chan Wing Chin

comment: Sent forward from wide barrier, shared lead on outside      750M, remained prominent until 250M, faded to 4th closing   stages.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，受催策上前。七百五十米處並列領先，居對手外側位置。二百五十米處前保持前列位置。末段墮退至第四位。

comment: Led all the way to score with something in hand.
comment_ch: 帶放到底，有餘未盡

comment: Under restraint throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 扣實跟跑, 未受考驗

comment: Hard ridden to stay with pace, keeping tabs on leading trio to straight. Crowded out 400m, checked 300m, one-paced.
comment_ch: 受力策跟上領放馬。直路前跟隨領放三駒。四百米處受擠迫。三百米處勒避，保持同速。

handicap_ch: 浪琴表國際騎師錦標賽（讓賽）－第四關
comment: Dropped back from wide barrier, in last 10Ls off runaway    leader, worked home mildly over final 300M, never got       involved.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後墮居包尾位置，落後遙遙領先的領放馬十個馬位。最後三百米衝刺普通，從未參與競逐。

comment: Began OK, no speed, dropping to rear taking first turn.     Fractured left front leg when clipped heels passing 900m    and pulled up.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，缺乏前速，首次轉彎時墮居後列。跑過九百米處時踢中他駒後蹄，導致左前腿骨裂，因而收停。

comment: Ridden along, took up running in back straight obtaining    rails run at the Rock, led until overshadowed by the cosy   winner inside the final 100 metres.
comment_ch: 受催策。對面直路上取得領先，大石鼓處移入內欄。領先至最後一百米被頭馬超越。
owner: Mr & Mrs Vincent To Wai Keung

comment: Jumped well, settled in midfield, made steady headway down  the inside of straight but without threatening.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居中間位置。直路上走內疊，穩步上前，但未能構成威脅。

comment: Fast into stride from inside alley, positioned outside the  leader in 2nd, there to turn, peaked early in straight and  weakened gradually.
comment_ch: 自內檔出閘迅速，居領放馬外側的第二位。直路彎前居相同位置。直路早段未能再增速，逐漸轉弱。

comment: Moderately away from a wide draw, positioned 2nd to turn,   finished off evenly in straight.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘普通，直路彎前居第二位。直路上穩步衝刺。

comment: Pushed forward to take the fence and share the lead, kept   on until weakened 250M.
comment_ch: 受推策上前移入內欄，並排領先。保持走勢，二百五十米處轉弱。

comment: On-pace early; kept on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，走勢持續
owner: Michael To Kwong Yip, Tso Lai Ming & To Wing Shuen

comment: Jumped awkwardly, soon recovered to rear of midfield,       baulked briefly around the bend, forced to switch inside    for a run at the 400 metres, kept on well to the line.      (Mucus in trachea)
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，瞬即恢復走勢，居中間之後位置。轉直路彎時一度受阻，四百米處被迫向內移入取位，保持佳勢至終點。（氣管內有痰液。）

comment: Snagged back at start & raced near tail 1 off with cover,   driven 420m & shifted out in stretch, stayed on for solid   headway.
comment_ch: 出閘後留居接近包尾位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。四百二十米處受催策，直路上移出外疊。保持走勢，追前甚多。

comment: Began fairly and settled worse than midfield 4L behind the  leader, 2 wide with cover. Kept on and weakened upon final  150M.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，居中間之後位置，落後領放馬四個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。保持走勢，最後一百五十米轉弱。
owner: Mr & Mrs Eddie Wong Ming Chak and Kameny Wong Kam Man

comment: Began OK, ridden but didn't muster, settling midfield in    one-off position. Swung wide into straight, picked up       momentum why laying in 200m, raced tight concluding stages  and not ridden out.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策，但未能加速，居中間位置，走第二疊。入直路時移出外疊。二百米處加速時內閃。末段緊迫競跑，因而未受力策。

comment: Up with the pace; weakened in the Straight.
comment_ch: 跟前, 直路力弱墮退
owner: Mr & Mrs David Lee Fook Sang and Calvin Lee Ka Wo

comment: Limited response when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路有騎, 反應平常

comment: Began OK, ridden along fence 3-back from leader but lost    position around turn, dropping to last 500m. Ran past tired horses close home.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，受催策，落後領放馬三個馬位，走內欄，但轉直路彎時失位。五百米處墮居包尾位置。接近終點時超越已呈疲態的對手。

comment: Pressed forward from widest draw, racing 4-wide until       taking lead 1100m and crossing to fence. Joined up front    passing 600m, battled on gamely to 100m before giving       ground.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後受催策上前，走第四疊。千一米處取得領先，切入內欄。跑過六百米處時被追上，持續力拼至一百米處，其後墮退。

comment: Began OK, and taken forward to sit midfield, on the fence.  Held up until the 200m, and ran on strongly from there.     Showed good turn off foot from the 100m, and just lost on   the line in a head bobber.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，沿欄受催策上前，居中間位置。二百米處前受困，其後走勢強勁。自一百米處起加速不俗，與頭馬叮噹馬頭，過終點時僅敗。
owner: Raymond Chow Wai Kam & Lau Wing Sang

comment: Cut across early; dashed on well for 3rd when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 起步切入，直路稍騎，好肯追馬

comment: Crowded at start, settled midfield, failed to run on in     straight.
comment_ch: 出閘時受擠迫，居中間位置。直路上未能上前。

comment: On-pace early; came home well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑, 後上甚佳

comment: Began well, pressed forward inside leading pack, taking     over lead passing 1180m. Set good pace to 350m when caught, kept on till flattened 100m.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前，居領先馬匹內側。跑過一千一百八十米處時取得領先。步速偏快，三百五十米處被超越。保持走勢，一百米處洩氣。

comment: Ran on fairly well when asked late.
comment_ch: 拉士稍騎，追勢不弱

comment: Made progress for 2nd when asked in a less competitive field.
comment_ch: 推騎追上，對手太曳
owner: Harris Ma Kwan Hin & Jantzen Ma Chi Sun

comment: Jumped with field but raced ungenerously early stages and   clear last at 800m. Made some progress around turn and      early in straight before tiring.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，早段跑來欠順，八百米處居遙遙落後的包尾位置。轉直路彎時及直路初略為上前，其後轉弱。

comment: Ran on ordinary when asked in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路考驗，追勢一般

comment: Bounced well, taken to fence, holding box seat behind       leader to straight. Angled out for a run 300m, finished     strongly to win on the line.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，移入內欄。直路前居領放馬之後的包廂位置。三百米處向外移出取位。衝刺強勁，終點線上取勝。
owner: Kwan Shiu Man & Jeffrey Kwan Chun Ming

comment: Slightly slow to begin; saved ground but limited response when asked.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 慳位騎落一般

comment: Impeded start & raced 1 off near rear, wide advance 900m,   raced midfield 3 deep no cover, driven wide home turn, kept on for minor inroads.
comment_ch: 起步時受妨礙，走第二疊，居後列。九百米處在外疊上前，居中間位置，在沒遮擋下走第三疊。直路彎受催策，走外疊。直路上保持走勢，略為追前。
owner: Lim U Po Chu & Wong Ching Yue

comment: Ran on ordinary; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 走勢平常, 未覺有進

comment: Restrained on jumping, shifted across behind runners and    last on settling. Started forward move 600m, racing around  field, widest into straight, kept on fairly without looking dangerous.
comment_ch: 出閘後受約束，在馬群之後切入內疊，居包尾位置。六百米處開始繞過馬群上前，入直路時走最外疊。保持普通走勢，未看似能構成威脅。

comment: At rear, 9L behind the leader 2 wide with cover, benefited  by the fast pace, ran home fairly.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬九個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。步速甚快，有利發揮。衝刺普通。

handicap_ch: 香港中文大學校友會聯會盃（讓賽）
comment: Pressed forward to lead from wide draw, crossing to fence   1000m. Caught passing 200m but fought back gamely to hold   second.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受催策上前領先，一千米處移入內欄。跑過二百米處時被超越，但以勁勢力拼，保住亞軍。

comment: Rolled forward to obtain the box seat, despite harmed by    the fast tempo, kept on nicely until weakened final 100M.
comment_ch: 上前佔取包廂位置。儘管快步速不利發揮，但仍保持佳勢。最後一百米轉弱。
owner: Mr & Mrs Kenny Cheng Tsin Ki

comment: Urged forward to take the rail and led at slow sectionals,  unleashed once straightened, held off late challenge to     score by a nose.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，切入內欄，以緩慢步速領放。入直路後瞬即全力拼鬥，末段力拒對手的挑戰，以一馬鼻位之先勝出。
owner: Ho Tze Man, Simon Chau Sik Ming, Ralph Hui Shu Tong & Wilson Ng Ching Hung

comment: Hard ridden to stay with pacemakers but kept 3-wide without cover from 1300m. Under pressure soon after straightening   and faded.
comment_ch: 受力策，跟上放頭馬匹。自千三米處起走第三疊，沒有遮擋。入直路後瞬即受催策，但力竭。

comment: Broke ok, soon outpaced & niggled near rear, hung out       exiting back stretch, under pump 400m, wide into stretch,   shifted inside 200m, ran on for minor headway.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，瞬即被拋離，受催策，居後列。跑離對面直路時外閃。四百米處受催策。入直路時走外疊。二百米處移入內疊，持續上前，略為追前。

comment: First out, then set even pace to straight. Collared soon    after straightening but boxed on gamely to 150m before      tiring.
comment_ch: 出閘最快，直路前以平穩步速領放。入直路後瞬即被超越，但持續力拼至一百五十米處，其後呈現疲態。

handicap: THE HONG KONG CLUB CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
comment: Pressed forward to lead passing 1450m, cutting to fence     1200m. Collared soon after straightening but battled on     gamely.
comment_ch: 跑過一千四百五十米處時受催策上前領放。千二米處切入內欄。入直路後瞬即被超越，但以勁勢力拼。

comment: Tracked leader in 2nd, pace slow middle stages, left flat   footed when tempo quickened 450M, failed to make any        impression for the remainder of the event.
comment_ch: 跟隨領放馬，居第二位。中段步速緩慢。四百五十米處步速加快時走勢平平。在餘下途程上毫無表現。

comment: Always in touch; won comfortably.
comment_ch: 有前有後，輕鬆帶到

comment: Sat in front of midfield, 2-3/4L behind the leader 2 wide   with cover, took advantage of the slow pace, ran on well    for 2nd.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，落後領放馬二又四分三個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。步速緩慢，有利發揮。以佳勢上前，取得亞軍。

comment: On-pace early; under a hold in the straight.
comment_ch: 跟前, 直路按住順走

comment: Pushed forward to share the lead on the grand side, kept on strongly to score by 3/4L.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，並排領先，靠近外欄競跑。保持勁勢，以四分三個馬位之先勝出。

comment: Chased leaders along the fence, ran on well down the inside but couldn't accelerate enough to challenge winner.
comment_ch: 追趕領先馬匹，走內欄。在內疊以佳勢上前，但加速力不足以挑戰頭馬。

comment: Under a hold throughout; ran on ok.
comment_ch: 全程拖住，走勢不弱

handicap: THE INDIAN RECREATION CLUB CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 印度遊樂會挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Positioned slightly behind midfield on the rail, 4-1/4L     behind, harmed by the quick tempo, made slight ground only.
comment_ch: 居中間稍後位置，落後四又四分一個馬位，走內欄。步速甚快，不利發揮。僅能略為上前。

comment: Three wide at turn; ran 2nd when asked.
comment_ch: 轉彎三疊，推騎第二

comment: Slightly slowly away, raced 2 wide, 4 lengths back behind   midfield, there to turn, held up for clear running early in straight, finished off evenly when clear thereafter.
comment_ch: 出閘稍慢，居中間之後位置，落後四個馬位，走第二疊。居相同位置至直路彎。直路初受困。望空後以平穩走勢上前。

handicap: AUDEMARS PIGUET ROYAL OAK CONCEPT HANDICAP
comment: Ridden to hold one-off position behind midfield, switched   out around turn to make run but only one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 在催策下居中間之後位置，走第二疊。轉直路彎時向外移出取位。直路上僅能保持同速。

comment: Always in touch; ran on strong to score.
comment_ch: 前後俱備, 一揮即就

comment: Showed good early; kept on for 2nd.
comment_ch: 馬有速度，放入一席

comment: Squeezed out at start and unable to muster, quickly back to 2nd last & outpaced, hard ridden from 800m, stuck to inside in straight, finished willingly.
comment_ch: 出閘時受擠迫，未能加速，迅速墮居尾二位置，被拋離。自八百米處起受力策，直路上走內欄，衝刺良佳。
owner: George Lee Hing Fai, Wong Che Leung, Alan Lee Tat Luen & Wong Chi Kin

comment: Led all the way to score.
comment_ch: 主動搶放，直領到底

comment: Always in touch; ran 2nd and not fully tested.
comment_ch: 有前有後，點到即止

comment: Settled midfield under a hold; ran on strongly.
comment_ch: 扣實居中，走勢有力

comment: Travelled in behind midfield, 5-3/4L behind along the rail, finished off strongly from 200M to score.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後五又四分三個馬位，走內欄。自二百米處起衝刺凌厲，掄元。

comment: Slightly slow to begin; over-raced at 700m; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 七百搶口, 走勢仍嫩

comment: Ridden to hold forward position but held wide behind        midfield and over-raced. Shifted out 750m, taken even wider in straight but only one-paced.
comment_ch: 受催策以佔取前列位置，但居外疊中間之後位置並搶口。七百五十米處移出外疊，直路上移出更外疊，僅能保持同速。

comment: Began fairly, outpaced, dropping to rear along fence. Took  close order around turn, kept on well in straight to 200m   before tiring.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，被拋離，墮居後列，走內欄。轉直路彎時居較接近位置，直路上保持佳勢，二百米處洩氣。

comment: Responded well when asked at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百力騎，反應尚佳
owner: Dr Edward Cheung Wing Yui, Lam Man Chun & Jason Tam Siu Keung

comment: Up with the pace; hit the line strong to score.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，輕騎撲上

comment: Rolled forward to park outside the leader, benefited by the slow sectionals, under pressure 550M, kept on one pace to   the line for 3rd. (Lame right fore after racing)
comment_ch: 持續上前，居領放馬外側。慢步速有利發揮。五百五十米處受催策，保持同速至終點，取得季軍。（賽後右前腿不良於行。）
owner: Mr & Mrs Michael Cheng Wing On

comment: Urged to lead early; kept on late.
comment_ch: 騎住搶放，末段唔斷
owner: Jamson Chan Wing Chai, Cheung Kam Ting, Timmy Chan Tien Kay & Allan Cheung Chun Hoi

comment: Jumped fairly, settled in midfield on rails, switched our   for a run upon straightening, fought on steadily without    quickening.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，沿欄居中間位置。入直路時移出外疊取位。持續力拼，但未能加速。

comment: Driven forward from the widest gate to eventually reach 2nd outside the leader at the Rock, unable to sustain effort    and tired noticeably in the run home.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後受催策上前，大石鼓處居領放馬外側的第二位。直路上後勁不繼，疲態畢呈。

comment: Ridden along early, settling 3-back along fence. Switched   out turning for home, but awkwardly placed halfway up the   straight, then one-paced.
comment_ch: 早段受催策，落後領放馬三個馬位，走內欄。入直路時移向外疊，直路上半程時處於窘境，其後保持同速。

comment: Rolled forward to occupy the box seat, travelled nicely     until final 300M, failed to respond when placed under       pressure. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
comment_ch: 上前進佔包廂位置，三百米處前走勢良佳。在催策下未能作出反應。（練馬師及騎師被查詢有關此駒表現令人失望的原因。）

comment: Away on terms, ridden to press forward, sat 2nd & 3rd 1     off, lost position slightly 850m, under riding 500m,        dropped out meekly.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，受催策上前，居第二至第三位，走第二疊。八百五十米處稍微失位。五百米處受催策，但緩緩墮退。

comment: Not quickened when being hard ridden.
comment_ch: 大力推騎，未見加速
owner: Chan Wing Kwan, Chadwick Mok Cham Hung & Chan Wai Leung

comment: Began well, urged forward to settle one-back, one-off. Held for run early in straight, switched out 300m, kept on       one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前，落後一個馬位，走第二疊。直路初受困。三百米處向外移出，保持同速。
owner: Dr Daniel Lee Tin Chak, Daisy Ho Chiu Fung, Pansy Ho Chiu King & Maisy Ho Chiu Ha

comment: Broke ok, bustled to settle midfield 1 off with cover,      nudged along 580m for 3 deep progress, driven 4 wide to     challenge home turn, grinding run to lead close home.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，受催策佔取中間位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。五百八十米處沿第三疊受催策上前。直路彎受催策上前挑戰，走第四疊。持續力拼，終點前取勝。
owner: Willie Yiu Man Hung & Victor Yiu Wai Yin

comment: Raced in front of midfield, sat 2-1/2L off the lead 2 wide, ran on strongly to take the prize.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，落後領放馬兩個半馬位，走第二疊。走勢強勁，勝出賽事。

comment: Urged to lead early; ran on nicely for 3rd.
comment_ch: 搶放第三, 走勢純熟

comment: Disputed early lead wide, settled 2nd outside leader from   950m, shaken up 500m, driven to lead 280m, extended clear & coasted final strides.
comment_ch: 早段爭奪領先，走外疊。自九百五十米處起居第二位，在領放馬外側競跑。五百米處受催策。二百八十米處在催策下取得領先。帶離對手，最後數步輕鬆上前取勝。
owner: Lo Kui Lun, Lo Hoe, Stanley Lo Shek Yin & Sharon Lo Ching Wun

comment: Always in touch; ran on comfortably for 2nd.
comment_ch: 有前有後, 表現淡定

comment: Slotted in behind midfield, 6-3/4L behind 2 wide, made good ground and finished off nicely to the line.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後六又四分三個馬位，走第二疊。追前甚多，衝刺良佳。

comment: Broke ok, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, advanced under pump from 500m to 4th 350m, peaked on run 200m &      tapered.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可。居中間之後位置，走第三疊，有遮擋。自五百米處起受催策上前，三百五十米處居第四位。二百米處未能再加速，繼而轉弱。

comment: Caught the eye when came home strong on the inside.
comment_ch: 內檔竄上，表現吸引
owner: Mr & Mrs Julian Chow Kai Wo, Chow Wing Shuen and Chow Cheuk Wai

comment: Settled at rear; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑，未受考驗
owner: Peter Li Chak Ming, Ricky Wong Kin Chat, Tommy Wong Kwok Chuen & Shen Hing Sun

comment: Made progress at turn; flattened in the Straight.
comment_ch: 轉彎湧一湧, 直路勁平
owner: Chan Wing Kee, Peter Poon & Parken Tai Pak Kwan

comment: Broke well from the widest draw, worked his way across      steadily to lead on rails rounding stables bend, led to the 400 metres when weakened noticeably.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘迅速，逐漸上前向內移入，轉馬房彎時沿欄領放。領先至四百米處，其後顯著轉弱。

comment: Allowed to stride forward at own pace, settling behind      midfield in one-off position. Urged forward turning for     home, looked a chance passing 200m before turning one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘後順其自然展步，居中間之後位置，走第二疊。轉直路彎時受催策上前。二百米處看似具爭勝機會。其後保持同速。

comment: No clear running late; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 拉士受困, 未見真章

comment: Made ground along the rail to score.
comment_ch: 沿欄竄上, 後上取勝

comment: Strode out well when shifted out in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路移出, 大步追趕

comment: At back along the fence, harmed by the slow tempo, dashed   well 300M.
comment_ch: 居後列位置，走內欄。慢步速不利發揮。三百米處以佳勢衝刺。

comment: Wide throughout; raced under his own steam.
comment_ch: 全程外疊，隨意跟跑
owner: Eleanor Kwok Law Kwai Chun & Patrick Kwok Ho Chuen

comment: Always in touch; kept on well to score.
comment_ch: 有前有後，姿態悅目

handicap: THE HONG KONG GOLF CLUB CENTENARY CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港高爾夫球會百週年紀念盃（讓賽）
comment: Pushed early, settling midfield away from fence. Kept tabs  on leading pack to straight when tired quickly.
comment_ch: 早段受推策，居中間位置，離欄競跑。跟隨領先馬匹，直路上迅速呈現疲態。

comment: Sent forward to take the lead along the outer fence, headed and weakened 250M.
comment_ch: 受催策上前領先，走外欄。二百五十米處被超越及轉弱。

comment: Began fairly, taken to fence, settling towards rear. Not    asked for an effort until passing 400m, ran on gamely       between horses up the straight.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，移入內欄，居後列。跑過四百米處時始受催策。直路上在馬匹之間競跑，走勢強勁。

comment: Pressed forward from good draw to settle one-back, one-off  back stretch. Shaken up passing 400m, looked chance 200m,   kept on well to line.
comment_ch: 自內檔出閘後受催策上前，對面直路上落後領放馬一個馬位，走第二疊。跑過四百米處時受催策，二百米處看似具爭勝機會。保持佳勢至終點。

comment: Niggled along throughout; ran on for 2nd.
comment_ch: 沿途俾住, 搶回一席

comment: Slow break, bustled at tail, driven home turn, stayed on    past beaten rivals.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢。受催策，居尾列。直路彎再受催策。保持走勢，超越已洩氣的對手。

comment: Ran on well to score when asked late.
comment_ch: 拉士稍騎，奮力上前
owner: Dr Philip Ho Kin Hoi, Dr Ernest Yau Hok Shing & Dr Joseph Pang Yeuk She

comment: Under restraint early; found nothing when asked.
comment_ch: 早段拉實, 騎落唔多

comment: Hard ridden early but not muster, 3Ls off the fast pace 2   wide, lack room 300M, no dash when clear.
comment_ch: 早段受力策，但未能加速，落後快步速的領放馬三個馬位，走第二疊。三百米處缺乏空位。望空後衝刺乏力。
owner: Mr & Mrs Desmond Wong Shung Yiu

comment: Broke with others, snagged to race midfield 1 off with      cover, shifted out home turn & driven 300m, one-paced in    run.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，留居中間位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。轉直路彎時向外移出。三百米處受催策，保持同速。

comment: In rear of midfield before crowded on rails losing ground,  towards the rear when hampered and lost further ground      approaching the Rock, no further impression.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置。沿欄競跑時受擠迫，因而失地，墮居後列位置，受阻，趨近大石鼓處時進一步失地。其後再無表現。

comment: Rolled forward to take the fence and share the lead, kept   on strongly and scored with plenty in hand.
comment_ch: 上前佔取內欄，並排領放。保持勁勢衝刺，大幅拋離對手掄元。
owner: Stephen So Chi Ming & Samuel Chan Ying Leung

comment: Crowded start, shaken up but raced keenly first turn and    back stretch. Got close to heels turn, one-paced in         straight.
comment_ch: 起步時受擠迫，受催策，首個彎位及對面直路上跑來搶口。直路彎靠近他駒後蹄。直路上保持同速。
owner: Anthony Chow Wing Kin & Michael Tong Hing Yuen

comment: In front of midfield, 2 wide, ran on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，走第二疊。走勢良佳，跑入亞席。

comment: Threw its head in the air on jumping; under a hold at rear.
comment_ch: 出閘岳頭，按住跟跑

comment: Ridden early; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 起步已騎, 毫無好感

comment: Tardy start; ran on for 3rd when asked.
comment_ch: 起步麻麻, 力騎入位
owner: Ng Chong Muk, Wong Man & Ng Siu Luen

comment: Jumped well; won with something in hand.
comment_ch: 應聲彈出, 似難實易

comment: Pressed on from a wide gate, circled the field around       stables bend to gain to 1L 2nd turning into back straight,  held similar position to top of home straight, dropped out  tamely.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，受催策上前。轉馬房彎時繞過馬群上前，進入對面直路時居第二位，落後一個馬位。直路初前居相若位置，乏力墮退。
owner: Mr & Mrs Li Yiu Keung and Clement Li

comment: Settled just off the leader, favoured by the slow           sectionals, ran on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 居領放馬稍後位置。慢步速有利發揮，走勢甚佳，跑獲亞軍。

comment: At rear throughout, unable to show any acceleration when    asked.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列，受催策但未能加速。
owner: Justin Yue Kwok Hung & Jeremy Yue Chun Hay

comment: Sat towards the rear, 4-1/2L behind the leader but trapped  very wide, improved past some tiring runners only.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬四個半馬位，但走大外疊。僅能超越部分漸呈疲態的對手。
owner: Michael Ng Chun Ho , Randy Chu Wai Ping & Jenny Ng Wing Sum

comment: Chased the pace, 3-wide no cover home turn, had little left passing 350M and retreated.
comment_ch: 追趕領放馬，直路彎走第三疊，沒有遮擋。跑過三百五十米處時再無餘力，其後墮退。

comment: Shared lead on grandstand rail; ran on ok for 2nd.
comment_ch: 沿外欄搶放，從容第二
owner: Ng Sun Wah & Chan Wo Ping

handicap: HKU FACULTIES OF MEDICINE AND ENGINEERING HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 港大醫學院與工程學院讓賽
comment: Pressed forward, took rail, led by 2Ls at good pace, hung   on until 200M emptied.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，佔取內欄位置，以快步速領先兩個馬位。保持走勢，二百米處再無餘力。

comment: At rear throughout, despite the fast tempo, never looked    likely.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列，儘管步速偏快，但從未看似有力一爭。
owner: Chan Nam Lee, Ng Hung Yau, Wong Ting Chung & George Lau Ka Keung

comment: Bumped start, 10Ls off the leader on the rails, suited by   the fast pace, progressed steadily 250M.
comment_ch: 出閘時與對手互相碰撞，落後領放馬十個馬位，走內欄。步速甚快，適合發揮。二百五十米處穩步上前。

comment: Broke on terms, pushed to go forward but unable to match    early speed, settled midfield 1 off, ridden 380m, switched  over heels 220m, one-paced to line.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，受推策上前，但前速不及對手，居中間位置，走第二疊。三百八十米處受催策。二百二十米處移離他駒後蹄，保持同速至終點。

comment: Ridden along early to hold rail position three back from    leader. Close in around turn but only one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 早段受催策，沿欄競跑，落後領放馬三個馬位。轉直路彎時追近，但直路上僅能保持同速。
owner: Mr & Mrs Hans Michael Jebsen and Eddie Hui Ki Bun

comment: Always in touch; ran on well to score.
comment_ch: 前後俱備，有餘未盡

comment: Caught the eye when saved ground to run 2nd.
comment_ch: 慳位上前，表現悅目

comment: Slightly slow to break, ridden to press forward, stuck 4    deep 1st turn, pushed on, sat 2nd 3 deep overracing,        attacked for lead 1 off 950m, ridden 500m, joint lead 400m, shunted 300m and dropped out.
comment_ch: 出閘略為緩慢，受催策上前。首次轉彎時走第四疊。受推策居第二位，走第三疊，搶口。九百五十米處挑戰領放馬，走第二疊。五百米處受催策。四百米處並排領先。三百米處斜跑及墮退。
owner: Albert Hung Chao Hong & Stephanie Hung Yujie

comment: Limited response when asked; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 騎落唔多, 未見佳處

handicap_ch: 新加坡賽馬公會錦標（讓賽）
comment: At the rear throughout, about 7-1/2L behind the lead,       widest at turn and in the Straight, ran on gamely but       couldn't pass the winner.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列，落後領放馬約七個半馬位。轉彎時及直路上走最外疊。走勢凌厲，但未能超越頭馬。

comment: Midfield throughout; performed only fairly.
comment_ch: 全程居中，不過不失

comment: Pushed forward, 2 wide in front of midfield, just held      ground in straight.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，走第二疊，居中間之前位置。直路上僅能保持位置。

comment: Raced greenly when under whip at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百開鞭, 仍覺生硬

comment: Ran on ok when shifted out in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路移出，有點追勢

comment: Jumped well, pressed forward 5-wide to first turn, led into back stretch before being passed and holding box seat.      Tired soon after straightening.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，受催策上前，首次轉彎前走第五疊，進入對面直路時取得領先。其後被超越，居包廂位置。入直路後瞬即呈現疲態。

comment: Jumped OK, restrained and shifted across behind horses to   be last on settling. Taken wide entering straight but only  one-paced under hard riding.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受約束在馬群之後切入內疊，居包尾位置。入直路時移出外疊，受力策，但僅能保持同速。

comment: Ran on comfortably for 3rd under a hold.
comment_ch: 拖住第三，表現從容

comment: Hung in late; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 末段內閃，仍覺稚嫩

comment: On pace early; kept on for 3rd comfortably.
comment_ch: 跟前入位, 姿態從容

comment: Sat 2-wide in mid-division, not quickened leaving the home  bend, kept on same pace to line.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，走第二疊。跑離直路彎時未能加速，保持同速至終點。
owner: Ng Chong Muk, Wong Man & Ng Siu Luen

comment: Began well before easing back to be handily place 5th, 1    off the fence. Stoked up from the 300m, easily passed early leader 100m and only had one challenger late.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，繼而收慢留居有利的第五位，走第二疊。自三百米處起推進上前，一百米處輕鬆超越領放馬。末段僅受一駒挑戰。

comment: Led along the rail; kept on to score.
comment_ch: 起步搶欄，直領到底

comment: Average to begin, raced 6 lengths back on rail at rear,     similar position on turn, failed to close off in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居後列，落後六個馬位，走內欄。直路彎居相若位置。直路上衝刺乏力。

comment: Urged forward from the widest barrier to take the rail and  led by 1-1/4L, headed by the eventual winner at 200M,       closed off okay.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後受催策上前，繼而移入內欄帶頭，領先一又四分一馬位。二百米處被頭馬超越，衝刺尚可。
owner: Matthew C M Yum, Christopher Carson Yum, Nicholas Kevin Yum & Stephanie Carrie Yum

comment: Began well, pressed forward to lead until 1100m when        settled in box seat 3L from leader. Came off fence 500m,    got clear run in straight but unable to run down winner.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前領放。千一米處居包廂位置，落後領放馬三個馬位。五百米處移離內欄。直路上望空，但未能超越頭馬。

comment: On-pace early; ran on to score when asked in the straight.
comment_ch: 跟前，直路考驗趕過
owner: Lim U Po Chu & Wong Ching Yue

comment: Ran on comfortably under a hold.
comment_ch: 按住追趕，走勢輕鬆

handicap: THE SPORTS CLUB DIAMOND JUBILEE CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 五陵會鑽禧挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Hard ridden forward to take the fence and led by 1L, kept   on until weakened over the final furlong.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，移入內欄，領先一個馬位。保持走勢，最後二百米轉弱。
owner: Siu Chor Kee, Chu Man Chung & Tam Ping Lap

comment: Awkward start, raced in midfield 2-1/2L behind 2 wide with  cover, awkwardly placed at 300M, run ended when steadied at 200M.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，居中間位置，落後兩個半馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。三百米處處於窘境，後勁不繼，二百米處收慢。

comment: Got off well, ridden along one-off to hold midfield         position back stretch. Urged forward turning for home,      taken wide in straight and ran on strongly.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，對面直路上居中間位置，走第二疊，受催策。轉直路彎時受催策上前，直路上移出外疊，衝刺凌厲。

comment: Strong start, pushed between runners to be near speed,      settled 3rd 1 off, travelled boldly, moved up to leaders on turn, outright lead 320m, challenged but fought on gamely,  just beaten.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，在馬匹之間受推策上前，居於接近領放馬的第三位，走第二疊。展步上前，直路彎追上領先馬匹。三百二十米處取得領先，受挑戰，以勁勢力拼，僅敗。

comment: Raced under his own steam; ran on comfortably for 3rd.
comment_ch: 紋風未動，走勢從容

comment: Broke well but bumped shortly after and taken to fence 3L   from leader. Not happy with slow pace and travelled keenly  first turn. Left fence 700m to go forward, taken to centre  track on straightening, finished off strongly.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，但其後不久被碰撞，移入內欄，落後領放馬三個馬位。步速緩慢，不合發揮，首次轉彎時跑來搶口。七百米處移離內欄上前。入直路時移至跑道中央，衝刺強勁。
owner: Wong Chung Hin & Arnold Wong Chi Chiu

comment: Jumped fairly from a middle gate, shared pace when very     wide far side before shifted 2L back, widest runner         entering straight, never recovered.
comment_ch: 自中檔出閘一般。對面直路上並排領先，走大外疊，其後向內移回，落後兩個馬位。入直路時走最外疊，從未能恢復走勢。
owner: Liu Shun Hong & George Ma Pui Pui

comment: In behind midfield, 4-1/4L behind the leader grand side,    held up until 250M, improved slightly thereafter.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬四又四分一個馬位，靠近外欄競跑。二百五十米處前受困，其後略為追前。

handicap_ch: 其士企業網絡方案讓賽
comment: Hard ridden early to hold midfield position but lost ground passing 800m when bumped and unbalanced. Weakened gradually in straight.
comment_ch: 早段受力策保持中間位置。跑過八百米處時被碰撞及失去平衡，因而失地。直路上逐漸轉弱。

comment: Settled at rear; never in contention.
comment_ch: 全程跟跑, 無段好睇

comment: In midfield along the rail, 4-1/4L behind the leader, never looked likely in the straight.
comment_ch: 沿欄居中間位置，落後領放馬四又四分一個馬位。直路上從未看似有力爭勝。

comment: Prominent, 2Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, not     suited by the fast sectionals, kept on one paced initially, however, was checked 150M, well beaten thereafter.
comment_ch: 居前列，落後領放馬兩個馬位，在有遮擋下走第二疊。步速甚快，不合發揮。直路初保持同速，但一百五十米處勒避，其後洩氣潰敗。
owner: Tony Yue Kwok Leung, Alexander Yue Ka Kuen & Richard Yue Ka Ming

comment: Slow to begin; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 走勢平常

comment: Hit the line strongly for 3rd centre track.
comment_ch: 中檔竄上, 餘勢猶強

comment: Travelled in midfield, 2-3/4L behind 2 wide with cover, not suited to the slow tempo, one paced home.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後二又四分三個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。慢步速不合發揮，末段保持同速。
owner: Hui Leung Wah & Hui Chun Yuen

comment: Gave nothing under whip in straight.
comment_ch: 直路鞭騎，毫無走勢
owner: The Hon Tommy Cheung Yu Yan & Alvin Li Yuok Lun

comment: Four wide at home turn; ran on only fairly when asked.
comment_ch: 四疊轉彎，騎落一般
owner: Mr & Mrs Michael Cheng Wing On and Janice Cheng Po Hei

comment: Ran under his own steam; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 拖住順走，未見真章

comment: Camped handy, travelled 2Ls behind the leader near the      grand side, kept on steadily to the line for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居前列，落後領放馬兩個馬位，在偏向外欄跑線競跑。保持穩勢至終點，跑獲季軍。

comment: Raced wide throughout far side after beginning from a       tricky gate, improved to join the leaders coming onto home  bend, unable to sustain effort and gave ground under        pressure in straight.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，對面直路上沿途走外疊。其後上前，入直路彎時追上領先馬匹。未能保持走勢，直路上在催策下墮退。
owner: Siu Chak Wai, Siu Wai Chung & Jimmy Siu Wing Kin

comment: Quickened progressively; ran on well to win.
comment_ch: 分段加快, 佳勢上前

comment: Jumped with them, positioned 2 wide in 5th, 2 lengths or so back on turn, no daylight in straight, finished off         one-paced. (Lost left front plate near 700M.)
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，直路彎居第五位，落後約兩個馬位，走第二疊。直路上未能望空，僅能保持同速。（於接近七百米處失去左前蹄的蹄鐵。）

comment: Ran on ordinary when shifted out in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路移出，騎落欠勁
owner: Cris Ng Ka Shuen & Gregory James Holmes

comment: Travelled in midfield, 7L behind 2 wide with cover, not     suited to the slow pace, improve steadily in the Straight.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬七個馬位，在有遮擋下走第二疊。步速緩慢，不合發揮。直路上逐漸上前。

comment: Midfield, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast  sectionals, never improved.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬六個馬位，走第二疊。步速甚快，有利發揮。從未能追前。

comment: Raced just in front of midfield, 4-1/2L off 2 wide with     cover, despite not suited to the slow pace, ran on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 居中間稍前位置，落後領放馬四個半馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。步速緩慢，不合發揮，但仍以佳勢上前，跑獲亞軍。

comment: Began very awkwardly, failed to muster speed and raced back in the field 8Ls off the pace, made some progress final     250M, steadied 50M from home.
comment_ch: 出閘十分笨拙，未能加速，居馬群後列，落後領放馬八個馬位。最後二百五十米略為追前，五十米處收慢。
owner: Edward Chan Kwok Man & Karen Chan Ka Yin

comment: Occupied a prominent spot, pace good, ran on well for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居前前。步速甚快。走勢甚佳，跑獲季軍。

comment: Urged to lead on rail; just caught.
comment_ch: 主動搶欄, 拉士被過

comment: Pushed along early to settle forward of midfield, tried to  improve passing 500m, hard ridden home turn and weakened    out of it in straight.
comment_ch: 早段受催策上前，居中間之前位置。跑過五百米處後嘗試上前，直路彎受大力催策，直路上轉弱。
owner: Ian Wan Yee Hang, Eugenia Wan Yee Ching & Mr & Mrs John Wan Hak Chung

comment: Under restraint and settled midfield; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 按實居中，未見真章
owner: Raymond Leung Yim San, Leung Chung Wai & Leung Chung Shun

handicap: THE PRINCE JEWELLERY & WATCH PREMIER CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 太子珠寶鐘錶精英盃（讓賽）
comment: From wide draw shifted across behind runners, travelled  in rear pair 5-6Ls behind, over-raced in early and middle      stages, not picked up pace inside 400M, left behind         mid-straight.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，於馬群之後切入內疊，屬包尾兩駒之一，落後五至六個馬位。早段及中段表現搶口。最後四百米未能加速，直路中段被拋離。
owner: Julian Hui Chun Hang & Michele Monique Reis

handicap: THE HOPEFUL FUTURE FOR YOUTH HANDICAP
comment: Shifted across behind runners soon after start and last on  settling. Trailed field to straight, taken to centre track  and made up some late ground.
comment_ch: 出閘後不久在馬群之後切入內疊，居包尾位置。尾隨馬群至直路，移至跑道中央競跑。末段略為追前。
owner: Kwan Shiu Man & Jeffrey Kwan Chun Ming

comment: Stumbled at start; made progress in the Straight along the rail.
comment_ch: 出閘中一中, 直路沿欄追趕

comment: Up with the pace; kept on ok in the straight.
comment_ch: 跟前，直路保持走勢

comment: Broke well, sat 1 back on rail, driven 350m & shifted out   entering stretch, boxed on one-pace in 2nd until tapered &  swamped close home.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，落後領放馬一個馬位，走內欄。三百五十米處受催策。入直路時向外移出，居第二位，保持同速。末段轉弱，被後上馬群超越。

comment: Going backwards and weakened when under whip at 300m.
comment_ch: 三百開鞭, 乏力墮退

comment: Settled towards the rear after beginning from a wide gate,  commenced move rounding home turn, continued to come under  strong pressure in straight, ran on to be nearest at        finish.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，居後列。轉直路彎時開始發力。直路上持續受力策。保持走勢，過終點時最為接近。

comment: Always in touch; ran on well to score narrowly.
comment_ch: 留放出色, 後上險勝
owner: Mr & Mrs Ronald Lo Yeung Chun

comment: Eased back, 7Ls off the leaders 2 wide, held up 4-2, dashed strongly when clear despite not suited by the slow pace.
comment_ch: 出閘後收慢，落後領放馬匹七個馬位，走第二疊。自四百米處至二百米處受困，望空後以勁勢衝前，惟慢步速不合發揮。

comment: Up with the pace; under a hold in the Straight.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢, 直路按返

comment: Quickened at turn; ran on strongly for 2nd.
comment_ch: 彎位發力, 望空湧上

comment: Moderate start, bustled on stands rail, unable to hold mid  rank slot & squeezed up 800m, 2nd last & driven 400m,       switched inside, stayed on for minor headway.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策，走外欄。未能保持在中間位置，八百米處受緊迫。四百米處居尾二位置，受催策。向內移入，保持走勢，略為上前。

comment: Set good pace first 800M, opened up 3Ls lead mid-stages,    caught by rivals 350M, weakened rapidly in straight.
comment_ch: 首八百米以中等步速領放。中段帶離三個馬位。三百五十米處被對手超越。直路上迅速轉弱。

comment: Quickly into stride to lead on settling, setting strong     pace. Joined by another before entering straight but kicked clear passing 200m and held off late challenge.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，取得領先，繼而以快步速領放。入直路前被另一駒追上，跑過二百米處時加速帶離對手。末段力拒對手挑戰勝出。

comment: OK away and taken forward to be handily placed in 4th on    the rail, 2.5L off the early leaders. Positioned OK on the  turn, but didn't respond to hands and heels riding in the   straight and never ran on.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，早段沿欄上前，居第四位，落後領先馬匹兩個半馬位。直路彎走位不俗，但直路上對騎師手足並用催策毫無反應，從未能上前。

handicap: POK FU LAM COUNTRY PARK HANDICAP
comment: Crossed to the lead just before entering home turn, headed  500M, rallied to re-gain lead 300M, one paced final 150M    and swamped by pursuers.
comment_ch: 入直路彎前切入內欄領先，五百米處被超越。力拼上前，三百米處重奪領先位置。最後一百五十米保持同速，被後上馬匹超越。

comment: Found nothing when being hard ridden.
comment_ch: 大力推騎，未見加速

comment: Eased at start, at rear 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, held up 4-2, progressed steadily when clear.
comment_ch: 出閘時收慢，居後列，走第二疊。步速甚快，有利發揮。自四百米處至二百米處受困，望空後以穩定走勢上前。

comment: Shifted out at turn; hit the line strongly to score.
comment_ch: 彎位移出，勁勢上前

comment: Eased back as usual, travelled 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, despite harmed by the slow sectionals, closed   to the line well for 3rd.
comment_ch: 如常收慢留後，落後領放馬五個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。慢步速不利發揮，但衝刺良佳，取得季軍。

comment: Hard ridden to sit in front of midfield, 2 wide, just held  ground in straight.
comment_ch: 受力策，居中間之前位置，走第二疊。直路上僅能保持位置。

comment: Settled in prominent spot 2 wide, benefited by the slow     tempo, ran on strongly 300M to score.
comment_ch: 居前列位置，走第二疊。步速緩慢，有利發揮。三百米處走勢強勁，勝出賽事。

comment: Hard ridden from wide draw to go forward, sitting half a    length behind leader to and around turn. Caught flat-footed when leader kicked 400m but picked up the bit and gave      chase though unable to close gap.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受力策上前，直路彎前及轉直路彎時落後領放馬半個馬位。四百米處領放馬加速時未能跟上。加速上前力追對手，但未能追近。
owner: Dr Eric Li Ka Cheung, Omelia Li Kwan Chi Hing & Krizia Li Po Yee

comment: Eased halfway; ran on for 3rd under whip.
comment_ch: 中段稍留，末段鞭騎第三

comment: Began awkwardly and blundered, but still managed to push    forward to be the early leader, on the rail. Still in front at 75m, but peaked soon after and was swamped near the line late.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙及失蹄，但仍能受推策上前，早段領先，走內欄。七十五米處仍然領先，但其後瞬即未能再增速，接近終點時被後上馬匹超越。

comment: Under restraint early; came home strong on the inside for 3rd.
comment_ch: 早段扣到實, 直路從內檔撲上

comment: Began well, ridden between horses 3L from leader in one-off position. Urged forward 3-wide at 500m, hit front 150m,     held off strong challenge.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，在馬匹之間競跑，落後領放馬三個馬位，走第二疊。五百米處受催策上前，走第三疊。一百五十米處取得領先，力拒對手的強勁挑戰勝出。

comment: Held up behind midfield, 4Ls to make up on leader at 400M,  kept on evenly without threat.
comment_ch: 留居中間之後位置。四百米處落後領放馬四個馬位。保持均速，未能構成威脅。
owner: Stanley Chiang Li Biau & Howard Yung Kung Ho

comment: Found nothing when under whip in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路開鞭，毫無進展

comment: Eased back early; hit the front centre of track to score.
comment_ch: 留前試後，中檔突圍

comment: Taken back on jumping from wide barrier, 6Ls off the good   pace middle stages, switched wide approaching home          straight, got too far back and never in the hunt. (Jockey   lost whip 200M.)
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後留後，中段落後步速中等的領放馬六個馬位。趨近直路時移出外疊。落後太遠，從未參與競逐。（騎師於二百米處跌掉馬鞭。）

comment: Jumped away well; led all the way to score.
comment_ch: 起步敏捷, 愈放愈順

comment: Slow to begin. Recovered to sit forward of midfield, on the fence. Off heels at 400m, but had nothing in the straight.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，恢復走勢，居中間之前位置，走內欄。四百米處避開他駒後蹄，但直路上再無餘力。

comment: Ran on well under a hold when clear in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路望空, 按實仍近

comment: Slow to begin; made little progress in straight.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 直路稍追
owner: Dr & Mrs Horace Ngan Kit Keung

comment: Slow start, sat 1 off with cover behind midfield, hard      ridden into stretch, stayed on dourly.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居中間之後位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。入直路時受力策，持續力拼。

comment: Eased forward early to settle midfield, but stuck 3 wide    with cover. Came wider on the turn and ran strongly to the  line, holding off a late charge by 2nd.
comment_ch: 早段上前，居中間位置，但走第三疊，有遮擋。轉彎時移出更外疊，走勢強勁，末段力壓亞軍馬匹取勝。

handicap: HKU FACULTIES OF MEDICINE AND ENGINEERING HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 港大醫學院與工程學院讓賽
comment: Missed break, taken to rail behind midfield, shifted out    520m, driven turning in, kept on evenly.
comment_ch: 漏閘。移入內欄，居中間之後位置。五百二十米處向外移出。入直路時受催策。保持穩勢。

comment: Lifted front feet when gates opening and began only fairly. Urged forward but wide approaching turn, one-paced in       straight.
comment_ch: 開閘時一對前腳並舉，出閘僅屬一般。趨近直路彎時受催策，走外疊。直路上保持同速。

comment: Ran 2nd when being asked late.
comment_ch: 拉士稍騎，後上第二

comment: On pace early; flattened in the Straight.
comment_ch: 跟前，直路去勢已減
owner: Frank Fu Hoo Kin & John Hui Kin Yip

comment: Soon led, took them along at sound pace, still going on     well passing 150M, caught by winner final 40M, lost 2nd     post.
comment_ch: 瞬即帶頭，以甚快步速領放。跑過一百五十米處時仍能保持佳勢。最後四十米被頭馬超越，並失去亞席。

comment: Slow start, settled rail near tail, driven 400m & shifted   out, found little & plugged on evenly.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居接近包尾位置，走內欄。四百米處受催策，移向外疊。再無餘力，保持穩定走勢。

comment: Travelled in rear of midfield, made no impression in        straight.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，直路上毫無表現。

handicap: LEI YUE MUN PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 鯉魚門公眾騎術學校讓賽
comment: Strong start, quickly up near lead 3 deep, ridden along     400m, narrow lead 200m, claimed soon after but fought on.
comment_ch: 出閘快速，迅速上前，居於接近領放馬位置，走外欄第三疊。四百米處受催策。二百米處以短距離領先，其後瞬即被超越，但持續力拼。
owner: Mr & Mrs Chau Kam Chuen and Helen Chau Hoi Man

comment: Lost ground at the start, brought across towards stands'    rail, detached from the field halfway, made up some ground  late but never reached contention.
comment_ch: 起步時失地，繼而在馬群之後移向外欄。半程時被馬群拋離。末段略為追前，但從未有力爭勝。

comment: Missed break, recovered to race rail back of midfield,      niggled 700m, under pump 500m, found nil & weakened.
comment_ch: 漏閘，恢復走勢後居中間之後位置，走內欄。七百米處及五百米處受催策。再無餘力，並且轉弱。

comment: Brushed on jumping; under whip and hard ridden late.
comment_ch: 起步挨碰，拉士鞭騎

comment: Hard ridden forward to cross and led, handed up passing     700M, couldn't find extra near 250M.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，切入內欄領放。跑過七百米處時被超越，接近二百五十米處時未能再增速。
owner: Lim U Po Chu & Wong Ching Yue

comment: no show
comment_ch: 冇到

comment: Saved ground throughout; limited response when asked.
comment_ch: 沿途慳位，騎落一般
owner: Wai Siu Kee & Edmond Lee Man Bun

comment: Hard ridden forward 2 wide, pace good, emptied 250M.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，走第二疊，步速甚快。二百五十米處力竭。

comment: Raced inside throughout; performed ok.
comment_ch: 沿途慳位，表現唔曳

comment: Taken back early; dashed on well when asked at 200m.
comment_ch: 起步拖後, 二百輕騎, 追勢甚佳
owner: Danny Lau Tat Pong, Liu Ling Yi, Ho Tak Sum & Lee Wong Tim

comment: Blocked after start; raced under his own steam in the Straight.
comment_ch: 起步受阻，直路未曾騎過
