owner: Tommy Ho Chung Shing, Ho Ka Chun, Nancy Ho Kar Mei & Michael Ho Chung Hing

comment: No room early; hit the line strongly when changed ground.
comment_ch: 早段無位，拉士轉跑線即撲上

comment: Raced midfield, 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, despite the fast pace, never ran on.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬四個馬位，走內欄。儘管步速偏快，但從未能上前。

comment: Began awkwardly, recovered to a position behind midfield,   not picked up on straightening, never reached contention.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，恢復走勢後居中間之後位置。入直路時未能加速，從未進佔有力爭勝的位置。

comment: Slow to begin; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 毫無好感
owner: The Hon Tommy Cheung Yu Yan & Alvin Li Yuok Lun

comment: Began well, pressed forward behind the pace but severely    hampered 850m, dropping back to midfield 4L from leader.    Shaken up top of straight and kept on fairly.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前，居領放馬之後位置，但八百五十米處嚴重受阻礙，墮居中間位置，落後領放馬四個馬位。直路初受催策，保持一般走勢。

comment: Took box-seat, sat 1-3/4L off the lead, crowded and checked at 600M, dropped off gradually in the Straight.
comment_ch: 佔取包廂位置，落後領放馬一又四分三馬位。六百米處受擠迫及勒避。直路上逐漸墮退。

comment: Began awkwardly and bumped, settled forward of midfield     wide without cover, under pressure home turn and weakened   out of it.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，與對手互相碰撞，居中間之前位置，走外疊，沒有遮擋。轉直路彎時受催策，轉弱。
owner: Charles Chan Kam Kwong, Bruce Lee Sing Keung & Yuen Shun Yiu

comment: At rear, 6.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast pace, ran on nicely.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬六個半馬位，走內欄。快步速有利發揮，走勢良佳。

comment: Never better than midfield, kept on same speed turning in,  no extra 200M.
comment_ch: 一直居中間或之後位置。入直路時保持同速。二百米處再無餘力。

comment: Settled just off the leaders 2 wide, ran on strongly for    2nd.
comment_ch: 居領先馬匹稍後位置，走第二疊。以勁勢上前，取得亞軍。

comment: Jumped with field, ridden along to grab box seat but lost   position, dropping 4L behind leader 800m. Looked chance at  400m but tired quickly.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，受催策佔取包廂位置但失位，八百米處墮居領放馬四個馬位之後的位置。四百米處看似具爭勝機會，但迅速呈現疲態。
owner: Chu Siu Cheong & Yih Kwe Sun

comment: Being asked throughout; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 沿途俾住，未見佳處
owner: Lillian El-Azar, Karim El-Azar & J A Filmer-Wilson

comment: Four wide at turn; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 四疊轉彎，但表現卻不差
owner: Chan Ying Kit & Chan Kan Sau Han

comment: Ran on ordinary; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 走勢平常, 未見佳處

comment: Eased back early; ran on strong when clear.
comment_ch: 早段稍留, 望空湧上
owner: Ricky Wong Kin Chat & Helen Leung Yee Wan

comment: Fast start & shared early lead but soon settled 3rd 1 back  on rail, 4th turning in & shaken up 400m, found little in   one-paced run home.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，早段並排領先，瞬即居第三位，落後一個馬位，走內欄。轉入直路時居第四位，四百米處受催策。末段保持同速，略為上前。
owner: Michael Lam King Poy, Ernest Lam Jen Ho & Christopher Lam Jen Toa

comment: Eased back, 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, unleashed     strong finishing efforts 200M.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，走第二疊。慢步速不利發揮。二百米處衝刺強勁。

comment: Brushed at 600m; ran on strongly to score when recovered.
comment_ch: 六百挨碰，收正後走勢強勁

comment: Eased back from the wide draw, eventually settling just     behind midfield, on the rail. Stayed closer to the inside   in the run home and ran strongly, with the fastest last     400m and taking 2nd in the last 25m.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後收慢留居中間稍後位置，走內欄。直路上保持走較內疊，走勢強勁。最後四百米締速最快。二十五米處進佔第二位。
owner: So Shek Wing & Frederick Leung Sek Cheung

handicap: PANASONIC STEAM IH WARM JAR HANDICAP
comment: Rousted at start, settled midfield on rail, niggled 550m,   driven 400m, plugged on tepidly.
comment_ch: 起步時受催策，居中間位置，走內欄。五百五十米處受催策。四百米處再受催策，走勢一般。

comment: Niggled along to make minor progress when clear in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路望空，推騎稍追

comment: Began on terms, ridden to improve, settled midfield 1 off,  ridden along 500m, bumped 200m, stayed on.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，受催策上前，居中間位置，走第二疊。五百米處受催策。二百米處被碰撞，保持走勢。

comment: Dropped back from wide barrier, settled down towards the    rear over 10Ls off the good pace, not quickened turning in, never threatened.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘，墮居後列，落後快步速的領放馬逾十個馬位。入直路時未能加速。從未能構成威脅。

comment: Prominent, travelled 2.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with    cover, despite suited by the very slow sectionals, kept on  until 200M flattened.
comment_ch: 居前列，落後領放馬兩個半馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。步速十分緩慢，適合發揮。保持走勢，二百米處洩氣。

comment: Up with the pace early; flattened in the straight.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑, 直路勁平

comment: Not quickened when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段稍騎, 無加速力

comment: Pushed to keep up in midfield along the fence, pace good,   held up and checked 250M, made some ground when clear.
comment_ch: 受推策保持居中間位置，走內欄，步速中等。二百五十米處受困及勒避。望空後略為追前。

comment: Jumped away well; dashed on well late.
comment_ch: 出閘最快，拉士自動湧上

comment: Started well, slotted 1 back 1 off, niggled 500m, shifted 3 deep & driven 400m, wide into stretch, kept on evenly.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，落後一個馬位，走第二疊。五百米處受催策。四百米處移至第三疊，受催策。入直路時走外疊，保持穩勢。

comment: Under restraint early; ran on ok.
comment_ch: 早段撐實，走勢不差
owner: Yu Pang Chun & Yu Kwok Chun

comment: Good start, pushed to race handy, outpaced slightly,        settled fore of midfield 1 off, niggled at times            throughout, pulled centre track in straight, sprinted to    lead 150m but gave out late.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受推策，居前列，略被拋離，居中間之前位置，走第二疊。沿途不時受催策。直路上移至跑道中央，加速上前，一百五十米處取得領先，但末段洩氣。

comment: Pushed forward to contest lead, taking over before final    turn but unable to kick clear. Caught 250m and faded.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，爭奪領先。直路彎前取得領先，但未能加速帶離。二百五十米處被超越及力竭。

comment: Fast break, ridden to hold spot, shuffled back to just      beyond midfield on rail, under a drive 320m, tightened for  room 150m, not fully tested.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策以保持位置，墮居中間稍後位置，走內欄。三百二十米處受催策。一百五十米處受緊迫，未能全力施為。
owner: Susan Wong Suk Ching, Ginny Man Wing Yee & Cheng Tsz Bong

comment: Bumped on jumping before pressing forward to be handily     placed 4th-5th early, before dropping back to be forward of midfield, 1 off the fence. Steady to the line in the        straight, stealing 3rd late under minimal urging.
comment_ch: 出閘時被碰撞。早段受催策上前，居有利的第四至第五位。其後墮居中間之前位置，走第二疊。直路上保持穩勢，末段在略受催策下取得季軍。
owner: Mr & Mrs Philip Ng Yuk Wing and Michael Ng Mun Kit

handicap: THE EBENEZER SCHOOL & HOME FOR THE VISUALLY IMPAIRED 120TH ANNIVERSARY CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 心光盲人院暨學校１２０週年紀念盃（讓賽）
comment: Slow to jump and settled at rear, made ground home turn,    raced greenly in straight when finishing strongly.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居後列。直路彎追前。直路上衝刺強勁，但走勢稚嫩。
owner: David Chiu Tat Cheong, Andrew Chiu Wah Wai & Josephine Chiu Wing Kei

comment: Always in touch; has improved to score.
comment_ch: 前後俱備，進步良多

comment: Worked his way up steadily to reach 2nd outside leader 1200 metres out, hit the front from the tiring leader 200 metres out but only to be collared close to home.
comment_ch: 在催策下穩步上前，千二米處進佔第二位，居領放馬外側。二百米處超越已呈疲態的領放馬，但接近終點時被超越。

comment: Prominent, 1-1/2L off the pace, trapped 3 wide without      cover, despite benefited by the slow tempo, flattened at    350M.
comment_ch: 居前列，落後領放馬一個半馬位，在沒遮擋下走第三疊。步速緩慢，有利發揮，但三百五十米處洩氣。

comment: Caught the eye; ran on strongly for 3rd when shifted out in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路移出, 追勢悅目

comment: Jumped away well; kept on to score.
comment_ch: 應聲彈出，貫注到底
owner: Michael T H Lee & Dr Henry Chan Hin Lee

comment: Racing wide; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 外疊跟跑, 未見佳處

comment: Pressed forward, racing wide to 1200m before rolling        forward to sit 1L behind leader. Caught flat-footed 450m    when leader kicked but boxed on gamely.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，走外疊至千二米處，其後上前，落後領放馬一個馬位。四百五十米處未能與領放馬一起加速，但持續力拼。
owner: Lim U Po Chu & Wong Ching Yue

comment: Showed good early speed; limited response when asked late.
comment_ch: 馬有速度，末段騎落唔多

comment: Settled at rear; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑，走勢平常

comment: Taken back to 10th towards the rear from a wide gate,       finished off race well, nice run.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，留居第十位。以佳勢衝刺，走勢良佳。
owner: Kathy Lo Ho Hsiu Lan & Paul Lo Chung Wai

comment: Showed good early speed; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 馬有速度, 末段按番住

comment: OK away, and eased up to be worse than midfield before over racing onto heels at the 1400m. Didn't let down when asked  in the straight, and packed up from the 150m when not       improving.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可。收慢留居中間之後位置，千四米處緊貼前駒後蹄競跑時搶口。直路上受催策時未能展開衝刺。自一百五十米處起再無餘力，未能追前。

comment: Rolled to occupy the box seat, despite benefited by the     slow tempo, kept on one pace to the line without            threatening.
comment_ch: 上前進佔包廂位置。儘管十分緩慢步速有利發揮，僅能保持同速至終點，未能構成威脅。

comment: On pace early; kept on in the Straight for 3rd.
comment_ch: 跟前入位, 直路僅保持速度
owner: Cheuk Hon Kit, Chung Tai Keung, Roland Leung Wing Cheung & Cheuk Lit Piu

comment: Jumped away well; stayed on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 起步敏捷，放入一席

comment: Taken forward early to be handily placed in 4th, but 3 wide with no cover. Forced into a 4 wide position at the 700m.   Ran well in the straight, and hampered at 200m. Peaked in   the last 20m.
comment_ch: 早段受催策上前，居第四位，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。七百米處須走第四疊。直路上走勢良佳，二百米處受阻。最後二十米未能再增速。

comment: Slow to begin; made progress inside.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，直路慳位追趕

comment: Settled midfield, travelled 9Ls behind the leader 2 wide    with cover, suited by the fast sectionals, ran on nicely    for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬九個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。快步速適合發揮，走勢良佳，跑獲季軍。
owner: Mr & Mrs Julian Chow Kai Wo, Chow Wing Shuen and Chow Cheuk Wai

comment: Broke well, disputed lead early stages, faded under         pressure from home bend.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，早段爭奪領先。自直路彎起在催策下力竭。

comment: Shifted across behind runners from outside draw, settling   towards the rear in one-off position. Made some progress    around turn, switched wide halfway up straight and finished strongly.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後於馬群之後切入第二疊，居後列。直路彎略為上前，直路半途移出外疊，衝刺凌厲。

handicap: HKU FACULTIES OF DENTISTRY AND EDUCATION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 港大牙醫學院與教育學院讓賽
comment: Box seat, not suited by the fast sectionals, led 300M, ran  on well until 100M overhauled, ran on for 2nd.
comment_ch: 居包廂位置。步速甚快，不合發揮。三百米處領先，保持佳勢。一百米處被超越，跑獲亞軍。

comment: Pushed forward and raced outside the leader, 1-1/4L off the pace, remained in touch until weakened 150M.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，居領放馬外側，落後一又四分一個馬位。緊隨領先馬匹，一百五十米處轉弱。

comment: Rolled forward to park outside the leader, not suited by    the fast sectionals, soon weakened after straightening. (   Rider concerned the action of the horse)
comment_ch: 上前居領放馬外側。快步速不合發揮。入直路後瞬即轉弱。（騎師對此駒的動作表示關注。）

comment: Driven forward to park outside the leader, despite suited   by the slow tempo, flattened 300M.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，居領放馬外側位置。步速緩慢，適合發揮，但三百米處洩氣。
owner: Tang Yip Sau Yung & Tang Kwok Yung

comment: Behind midfield, trapped 3 wide throughout, pace good, ran  on ok.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，沿途走第三疊。步速甚快。走勢尚可。

comment: Began OK, not pushed, settling behind midfield along rail.  Left fence 700m but found little room top of straight. Got  clear 250m and finished off nicely.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，未受推策，居中間之後位置，走內欄。七百米處移離內欄，但直路初空位不足。二百五十米處望空，衝刺良佳。
owner: Paul Lo Chung Wai & Kathy Lo Ho Hsiu Lan

comment: Weakened in the straight; dropped back to rear.
comment_ch: 直路乏力, 急劇墮退

comment: Raced wide most of the journey; never tested.
comment_ch: 沿途走中外叠, 未見真章

comment: Ran 4th comfortably; moved better than before after a spell.
comment_ch: 輕鬆第四，休後見好

comment: Ridden forward, emerged as leader nearing 1200M, set good   pace and opened up 3Ls lead 300M out, stuck to task well    and holding off a late challenge for first win since        arrival.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，接近千二米處時取得領先，以中等步速領放。三百米處領先三個馬位，以佳勢力拼，末段力拒對手的挑戰，取得來港後首場勝仗。

comment: On-pace early; impressive run.
comment_ch: 跟前入位, 表現吸引

comment: Began well, positioned a length behind the leader on rail,  saved ground on turn, showed no response in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，落後領放馬一個馬位，走內欄。直路彎走內欄節省腳程。直路上未能對催策交出反應。

comment: Guided to the fence 3-4Ls back in midfield, shaken up 450M, kept on steadily in the run to the line, lacked extra final 200M.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬三至四個馬位，走內欄。四百五十米處受催策。保持穩勢，最後二百米再無餘力。

comment: Broke well, down to box seat, settled 3rd on rail, ridden   550m, switched over heels 280m, boxed on.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，留居包廂位置。居第三位，走內欄。五百五十米處受催策，二百八十米處避開他駒後蹄，力拼上前。

comment: Outpaced early, settling at rear, made progress around      turn, taken wide in straight and ran on steadily.
comment_ch: 早段被拋離，居後列。直路彎追前，直路上走外疊，保持穩勢。

comment: Slow break, rolled from tail to 2nd last 900m, bustled 3    deep 550m, widest into stretch, checked 400m, found nil in  tame run home.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢。自包尾位置上前，九百米處居尾二位置。五百五十米處受催策，走第三疊。入直路時走最外疊。四百米處勒避。末段再無餘力，走勢疲弱。

comment: Found nothing when asked at turn.
comment_ch: 轉彎已騎，無加速力

comment: Jumped OK; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 起步順利，走勢欠勁

comment: Travelled in front of midfield, 2-1/2L behind 2 wide with   cover, boxed-in until shifted out to get clear running at   250M, ran on strongly to score.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，落後兩個半馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。持續力拼，二百五十米處向外移出以望空。以勁勢上前，取得勝利。

comment: Pulled up in the straight; jockey dismounted.
comment_ch: 直路收停, 騎師落馬

comment: On pace for 3rd; ran on Ok coming back from a spell.
comment_ch: 跟前入位，休後未見不妥

comment: Rolled forward to occupy the box seat, moved forward 600M,  kept on strongly to score again by 1-3/4Ls.
comment_ch: 上前佔取包廂位置。六百米處上前。保持勁勢，以一又四分三個馬位之先再次取勝。

comment: Inconvenienced start, then taken to fence 3-back from       leader. Lost position final turn but stayed on rail and ran on steadily in straight.
comment_ch: 起步時受妨礙，其後移入內欄，落後領放馬三個馬位。直路彎失位，固守內欄。直路上穩步上前。

comment: Hard ridden from outside draw to lead on settling, crossing to fence 1300m. Under pressure turning for home, caught     passing 150m but kept finding until swamped final strides.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受力策，取得領先。千三米處切入內欄，直路彎受催策。跑過一百五十米處時被超越，但持續上前，最後數步被超越。

comment: Behind midfield along the fence, ran on only fairly in      straight.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，走內欄。直路上走勢僅屬普通。

comment: Settled in worse than midfield along the rail, 6-1/4L       behind the leader, not suited to the slow tempo, made       slight ground only.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，走內欄，落後領放馬六又四分一個馬位。步速緩慢，不合發揮。僅能略為上前。
owner: Michael Ng Chun Ho , Randy Chu Wai Ping & Jenny Ng Wing Sum

comment: Eased back early, settling 3rd last on the fence. Battled   on steadily in the straight, and just run over for 3rd      late.
comment_ch: 早段收慢，留居尾三位置，走內欄。直路上穩步上前，末段僅失季席。

comment: Broke well, hard ridden to lead but kept away from rail by  inside runner. Dropped back 1000m to take sit on leader,    boxed on gamely in straight to hold down minor placing.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。受力策取得領先，但因內側馬匹阻隔而保持離欄競跑。一千米處墮居領放馬之後。直路上以勁勢力拼，保住季席。
owner: Lo Kui Lun, Lo Hoe, Stanley Lo Shek Yin & Sharon Lo Ching Wun

comment: On pace early; midfield halfway; ran on again under whip.
comment_ch: 車前倒後, 直路開鞭再上

comment: Urged to lead early; flattened in the Straight.
comment_ch: 搶放兩段，直路勁平

comment: Ran on ordinary when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段推騎，走勢一般

comment: Pushed forward from the jump to lead by 2L over 2nd place   at the 800m. Lead easily rounding the turn, but faded from  the 200m, and was swamped late. Hung out under pressure     late.
comment_ch: 出閘後受推策上前，八百米處領先兩個馬位。轉直路彎時輕鬆領放，但二百米處力竭，末段被馬群超越，在催策下外閃。
owner: Stanley Chiang Li Biau & Howard Yung Kung Ho

comment: Settled down in midfield 4-5Ls back, had to push along 550M to keep up, didn't find much entering straight, left behind by main rivals 200M. (No Vet findings)
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬四至五個馬位。五百五十米處須受催策以保持走勢，入直路時未能加速。二百米處被主要對手拋離。（獸醫檢查後並無發現任何明顯異常之處。）

comment: Pushed to settle midfield, travelled 5Ls behind the leader  3 wide with cover, harmed by the slow tempo, ran on only    fairly.
comment_ch: 受推策居中間位置，落後領放馬五個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。慢步速不利發揮，走勢僅屬一般。

comment: Niggled along throughout; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 沿途俾住，反應不差

comment: Unable to cross from widest draw, caught 3 wide no cover    outside the pace, weakened rapidly passing 400M, finished   tailed out. (Unacceptable Performance.)
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後未能切入內疊，在沒遮擋下走第三疊，居領放馬外側位置。跑過四百米處時迅速轉弱。遙遙尾隨而回。（表現難以接受。）

comment: Being ridden coming down the Rock; weakened and tailed off.
comment_ch: 落山推騎，乏力包尾

comment: Laying in slightly when shifted out in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路移出，有點內閃

handicap: THE BOCHK WEALTH MANAGEMENT JOCKEY CLUB MILE
handicap_ch: 中銀理財馬會一哩錦標
comment: Quickly in front but wide, crossing to fence 1400m and      setting hot pace. Collared passing 300m and faded.
comment_ch: 迅速領先，走外疊。千四米處切入內欄，以快步速領放。跑過三百米處時被超越，力竭。

comment: On pace early; flattened in the Straight.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢，直路勁平

comment: Asked at 400m; weakened to finish last.
comment_ch: 四百已騎，墮退而回
owner: Civic Chan Sin Wik & Chu Po Yi

comment: Always in touch; won comfortably.
comment_ch: 有前有後, 輕鬆趕過

comment: Last to jump; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 出閘最慢, 走勢平常

comment: Wide at turn; flattened in the Straight.
comment_ch: 蝕位轉彎, 直路勁平

comment: Jumped OK, urged forward 4-wide first turn to sit outside   leader 1150m. Forged ahead 900m when pace slackened, and    increased tempo 600m when challenged. Led field to 200m     before running out of stamina.
comment_ch: 出閘普通。首次轉彎時走第四疊，受催策上前，一千一百五十米處進佔領放馬外側位置。九百米處步速減慢時取得領先。六百米處受挑戰時加快步速。領先至二百米處，其後洩氣。

comment: Made progress steadily; ran on fairly well after a spell.
comment_ch: 逐步上前，休後不差

comment: Lifted leg at start and lost considerable ground, trailing  field before making ground around turn. Steadied 150m when  finishing off strongly.
comment_ch: 出閘時一對前腳並舉，因而失地甚多。跟隨馬群，直路彎追前。衝刺強勁，一百五十米處收慢。

comment: Ridden from the one gate, settled over 3L back in 5th on    rails, faded under pressure shortly after straightening.
comment_ch: 自第一檔出閘後受催策，居第五位，落後逾三個馬位，走內欄。入直路後不久在催策下力竭。

comment: Missed break & raced last, soon well adrift of next runner, ridden along until turning in, tailed off & eased.
comment_ch: 漏閘，居包尾位置。瞬即被前一位馬匹遙遙拋離。入直路前受催策。遙遙尾隨及收慢。
owner: Julian Hui Chun Hang & Michele Monique Reis

comment: Ran on fairly well when shifted out at 300m.
comment_ch: 三百移出，追勢不差

comment: Dashed on well when asked in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路力推，好肯追馬

comment: Jumped OK but outpaced, dropping to last from 1100m and     trailing field thereafter.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，但被拋離。自千一米處起墮退至包尾位置。其後跟隨馬群。

comment: Wide throughout; under a hold and not fully tested.
comment_ch: 沿途外疊, 按住未試
owner: Allen Shi Lop Tak & Kimmy Ngan King Lin

comment: Pushed to obtain box seat, pace good, flattened 250M.
comment_ch: 受推策佔取包廂位置，步速中等。二百五十米處洩氣。

comment: Taken back from a wide gate, travelled 6.5Ls behind the     leader 2 wide with cover, not suited by the slow tempo,     never ran on.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後留後，落後領放馬六個半馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。步速緩慢，不合發揮。從未能追前。

comment: Midfield along the fence, pace good, lack room 400M,        slightly hampered 100M, made ground for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，走內欄，步速偏快。四百米處缺乏空位。一百米處略為受阻。其後追前，跑獲季軍。

comment: Began well, pressed forward, taking box seat to turn. Got   split top of straight but shifted out 200m and bumped,      before fading final 100m.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前，直路彎前居包廂位置。直路初取得空位上前。二百米處向外斜跑，碰撞對手。最後一百米力竭。

handicap: THE HONG KONG JOCKEY CLUB COMMUNITY TROPHY (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港賽馬會社群盃（讓賽）
comment: Began fairly, pressed forward, making ground along rail to  be two-back at turn, Blocked for run in straight until      280m, then gradually overhauled leader for narrow win.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，受催策上前，沿欄追前，直路彎落後兩個馬位。直路上受困至二百八十米處，其後逐漸超越領放馬，以短距離之先勝出。

comment: Led early; under a hold in the Straight.
comment_ch: 帶放兩段，直路按返
owner: Mr & Mrs Tony Tang Wai Bun and Kenneth Tang

comment: Hard ridden to take the rail and led at advantageous slow   sectionals, hung on until 200M overhauled, ran on for 2nd.
comment_ch: 在力策下移入內欄，以有利的慢步速領放。保持走勢，二百米處被超越。持續上前，跑獲亞軍。
owner: St Joan of Arc School PSA Syndicate

handicap: THE HONG KONG EXCHANGES CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港交易所挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Awkward start, niggled, natural pace into midfield spot on  rail, pulled off rail 280m & ridden, still green but stayed on well.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，受催策，以本身步速上前居中間位置，走內欄。二百八十米處移離內欄，受催策。走勢仍稚嫩，但保持佳勢。

comment: Tracked leaders along the inside, but raced with its head   on the side throughout and inclined to shift away from      fence, not quickened on straightening, soon out of          contention.
comment_ch: 跟隨領先馬匹，走內欄，但沿途將頭轉側，並傾向移離內欄。入直路時未能加速，瞬即再無爭勝機會。

comment: Tardy start; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 起步麻麻, 走勢一般

comment: Hard ridden early to hold forward position but held wide    without cover 5L from leader. Wide into straight, faded     gradually.
comment_ch: 早段受力策，保持居前列位置，落後領放馬五個馬位，在沒有遮擋下走外疊。入直路時走外疊，逐漸力竭。

comment: On pace early; ran on comfortably for 2nd.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑, 姿態從容

comment: Under restraint behind runners; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 拖住跟走，未見真章

comment: Raced towards the rear, 8L behind the leader 2 wide with    cover, suited to the quick tempo, made ground steadily in   the straight.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬八個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。快步速適合發揮。直路上逐漸追前。

comment: Showed good early speed; ran on comfortably to score.
comment_ch: 速高帶到，贏得輕鬆

comment: Began OK, racing between horses behind midfield to and      around turn. Tightened 300m, no clear run early in          straight, finished strongly when clear.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，於馬匹之間競跑，直路彎及之前居中間之後位置。三百米處受緊迫，直路早段缺乏空位，望空後以勁勢衝刺。

comment: Ran on ok in 4th position throughout.
comment_ch: 全程四位, 不過不失

comment: Shaken up early to take up a forward position,  raced       keenly, in 4th making the turn for home, failed to find     extra when placed under pressure.
comment_ch: 早段受催策，居前列，跑來搶口。轉直路彎時居第四位。受催策，但再無餘力。
owner: Boniface Ho Ka Kui & Steve Ho

handicap: AUDEMARS PIGUET LADY ROYAL OAK HANDICAP
comment: Began fairly, settling towards rear along rail. Shaken up   600m, switched to centre field 350m, picked up momentum     gradually to just hit the line in time.
comment_ch: 出閘一般。居後列，沿欄競跑。六百米處受催策。三百五十米處移至跑道中央競跑。逐漸增速，終點線上及時取勝。

comment: Pressed forward from wide draw before cutting in 1500m and  moving to within a half length of leader back stretch. Kept on fairly to 200m before tiring.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後受催策上前，千五米處切入內疊。對面直路上上前，落後領放馬不逾半個馬位。二百米處前保持一般走勢，其後漸呈疲態。

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls behind the leader on the      fence, ran on steadily for 4th.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬三個馬位，走內欄。穩步上前，跑獲殿軍。

comment: Pressed forward from the inside draw to settled 3rd, on the fence. Stayed on OK early in the straight, but peaked at    100m and dropped out from there.
comment_ch: 自內檔出閘後受催策上前，居第三位，走內欄。直路初保持普通走勢，一百米處未能再增速，繼而墮退。

comment: Eased back, trapped 2-3 wide, dashed well 200M despite not  suited by the slow pace.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，走第二至第三疊。步速緩慢，不合發揮。二百米處衝刺良佳。

comment: Steadied soon after start and shifted across behind         runners, settling at rear but wide. Swung wide into         straight but only one-paced under hard riding.
comment_ch: 出閘後瞬即收慢，在馬群之後向內移入，居後列位置，仍走外疊。入直路時走外疊，在力策下僅能保持同速。
owner: Vijay Harish Mohinani, Nilesh Murli Sajnani & Jaikishin Ishwardas Daswani

comment: Hard ridden to keep up at rear, suited by the fast pace,    lack room 4-2, made minor ground when clear.
comment_ch: 受力策保持居後列，快步速適合發揮。自四百米處至二百米處缺乏空位，望空後略為追前。
owner: Mr & Mrs Chan Chung Yin and Mr & Mrs Clevin Got Chong Key

comment: Speed to lead, eased a touch & headed 1040m, raced on pace  3 wide no cover until snagged to 1L back at 720m, driven    turning in but emptied & weakened tamely.
comment_ch: 迅速上前帶頭。稍微收慢，一○四○米處被超越。跟隨領放馬，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。七百二十米處留居落後領放馬一個馬位的位置。入直路時受催策，但再無餘力，並且轉弱墮退。
owner: Lai Kim Wai, Lyon Cheng Lai Fung, Lai Ka Yee & Lai Ka Fung

comment: At rear, travelled 7Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover  1200M, not suited by the slow tempo, under pressure 700M,   flattened soon after straightening.
comment_ch: 千二米處居後列，落後領放馬七個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。慢步速不合發揮。七百米處受催策。入直路後瞬即洩氣。

comment: Slow to begin; made progress when asked.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 推騎追趕

comment: Slow to begin; ridden throughout; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 騎足全程, 未見佳處
owner: The Hon Tommy Cheung Yu Yan & Alvin Li Yuok Lun

comment: Limited response when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路有騎, 反應一般

comment: Settled at rear, forward move passing 700m, asked for       effort on straightening but failed to respond and gave      ground in straight.
comment_ch: 居後列。跑過七百米處時上前。入直路時受催策，但未能交出反應。直路上墮退。

comment: On pace along rail; shifted to midtrack in straight; won with plenty in hand.
comment_ch: 貼欄跟前, 直路移出中檔, 大把在手

comment: Rushed to the lead from draw 9, slowed things down from     1100M, relinquished lead nearing 800M, no extra and faded   mid-straight.
comment_ch: 自第九檔出閘後受催策上前帶頭。自千一米處起減慢步速。接近八百米處時被超越。直路中段力竭墮退。

comment: Broke well, parked rail midfield, shifted out & driven      340m, tapered to wire.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居中間位置，走內欄。三百四十米處向外移出，受催策。末段轉弱。

comment: At back always, never looked likely.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列。從未看似有力一爭。
owner: Raymond Chow Wai Kam, Lau Wing Sang & Enrico Chow Yue Hin

comment: Led early; raced under his own steam in the Straight.
comment_ch: 搶放兩段, 直路無騎

comment: Ridden shortly after jumping; flattened in the straight.
comment_ch: 起步已騎, 直路墮退

comment: Never a factor.
comment_ch: 從未有力一爭。

comment: Taken back from a wide draw, raced 6 to 7 lengths back at   rear, improved on turn, taken wide in straight and made     good progress to make frame.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後留居後列，落後六至七個馬位。直路彎推進，直路上移出外疊，追前甚多，跑獲殿軍。
owner: Au Kai Kwong & Michelle Jessica Au

comment: Speedy break to press lead close 2nd 1 off, shaken up 400m, battled to lead 260m, gritty effort under pressure to just  hold on.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，追迫領放馬，居接近的第二位，走第二疊。四百米處受催策。二百六十米處力拼，取得領先。在催策下持續力拼，僅保住勝果。

comment: Niggled along throughout; struggled for 4th.
comment_ch: 沿途俾住，有點勉強

comment: Sluggish start & bustled, parked rail behind midfield,      hard-driven into stretch, lacked toe but stayed on dourly   to wire.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢。受催策，居中間之後位置，走內欄。入直路時受力策。未能增速，但仍持續力拼至終點。

comment: Ridden forward and shared lead on stand side, kept on well  until 200M, held on for 4th.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，並排領先，走外欄。保持佳勢至二百米處。其後保持走勢，跑獲殿軍。
owner: Alan Chan Yau Yuet & Chris Chan Cheong Hoi

comment: On-pace early; weakened in straight.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢, 直路墮退

comment: Tracked leader, ran on well to take command from 200M, led  to near 50M.
comment_ch: 跟隨領放馬。以佳勢上前，自二百米處起控制大局。領先至接近五十米處被超越。

comment: Being hard ridden when clear in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路望空，大力推騎

comment: Looking for cover early; responded OK when asked late.
comment_ch: 起步找遮擋，拉士騎落有反應

comment: Got off OK, taken in, settling one-off, three-back. Checked off heels 800m. Switched widest entering straight and       finished strongly down centre field.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，移入第二疊，落後領放馬三個馬位。八百米處勒避他駒後蹄。入直路時移至最外疊。直路上在跑道中央競跑，末段衝刺強勁。
owner: Johnson Lam Pui Hung & Anderson Lam Hin Yue

comment: Handily placed 3rd/4th early. Ran on OK early in the        straight, but 1 paced from the 250m.
comment_ch: 早段居前列第三或第四位。直路初走勢尚可，但自二百五十米處起僅能保持同速。

comment: Taken back from the widest gate to travel just behind       midfield, shifted out for a run entering straight,          responded well to take charge inside final 200 metres.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後留後，居中間稍後位置。入直路時向外移出取位。在催策下反應良佳，最後二百米取得領先。
owner: Mr & Mrs Charley Chan Wing Chin

comment: Rolled forward to park outside the leader, suited by the    slow tempo, ran on nicely to score by a short head.
comment_ch: 上前居領放馬外側位置，慢步速適合發揮。走勢良佳，以一短馬頭位之先勝出。

comment: Raced midfield along the rail, 3L behind the leader, dashed strongly from 300M to score by a head.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬三個馬位，走內欄。自三百米處起衝刺強勁，以一馬頭位之先勝出。

comment: Failed to muster speed despite ridden, settled down in      midfield 4-5Ls off the pace, kept to inside throughout, ran on mildly and unable to trouble first 2.
comment_ch: 受催策，但未能加速，居中間位置，落後領放馬四至五個馬位。沿途走內疊，衝刺普通，未能威脅頭兩名馬匹。

comment: Ran on ordinary; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 走勢平常，未見佳處

comment: Led along the rail; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 貼欄搶放，拉士按返

comment: Ridden along throughout; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 騎足全程，未有好感

comment: Broke well settling just off the lead on rails, did not     find much room the length of straight.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居領放馬稍後位置，走內欄。直路上空位不足。

comment: Sent forward to take the fence and led by 2Ls, kept on      until flattened final 250M.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，移入內欄，以兩個馬位之先領放。保持走勢，最後二百五十米洩氣。

comment: Made ground steadily; ridden out to score.
comment_ch: 逐步加快, 考驗到底

comment: Pushed forward from widest draw to get midfield position    but 3-wide 4L from leader. Remained wide around home turn   and spent force soon after straightening.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘，受推策上前，居中間位置，落後領放馬四個馬位，走第三疊。直路彎走外疊，入直路後瞬即再無餘力。

comment: Settled behind runners throughout; never tested.
comment_ch: 全程跟馬林，扣實未試

comment: Quickened at turn; hit the front at 200m to score.
comment_ch: 彎位發力, 二百透出
owner: Mr & Mrs Arthur Wong Chun Mo

comment: Always at rear; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑, 無段好睇

comment: Racing slightly wide throughout; ran on OK when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 沿途走中外疊, 但直路騎落肯走

comment: Moderately away, raced 2 wide, 2 to 3 lengths back,         travelled well throughout, improved from 600M, finished off very well in straight to score.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，走第二疊，落後兩至三個馬位。沿途走勢良佳。自六百米處起上前，直路上衝刺甚佳，勝出賽事。

comment: Under a hold in the straight; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 直路拖住, 未見真章

owner: Mrs Kao Chan Ming Man & Cheung Ka Wai

comment: Raced in behind midfield, 4-1/4L off along the rail,        checked at 500M, ran on strongly once cleared near 150M.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後四又四分一個馬位，走內欄。五百米處勒避。接近一百五十米處望空後走勢強勁。

comment: Ridden along to hold a prominent place, lost position       coming out of far side, dropped out tamely from just better than midfield into straight.
comment_ch: 受催策，居前列位置，跑離對面直路時失位。居中間稍前位置，入直路時乏力墮退。

comment: Blocked for a clear running at 300m; hit the line strongly late.
comment_ch: 三百受阻, 拉士竄上甚勁

comment: Flattened at turn; finished last.
comment_ch: 彎位洩氣, 乏力包尾

handicap_ch: 維多利亞賽馬會錦標（讓賽）
comment: Bustled at break to park midfield 1 off with cover, niggled 600m, under pump 500m, swung wide into stretch &            hard-ridden, boxed on to wire.
comment_ch: 出閘後受催策，居中間位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。六百米處受催策。五百米處受催策。入直路時移出外疊，受力策，力拼至終點。
owner: Ming Shui Sum & Alice Ming Bo Ting

comment: Jumped well, allowed to slide forward down centre track,    about 1L inside pacemakers. Hit the front passing 250m      while shifting out and pulled clear under hands and heels   riding.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，獲許在跑道中央上前，居領先馬匹內側，落後約一個馬位。跑過二百五十米處向外移出時取得領先，在騎師手足並用催策下帶離勝出。
owner: Lee Yuen Fat & Ng Kam Ming

comment: Hard ridden to occupy a midfield spot, 2 wide, pace good,   made steady ground 300M for 2nd.
comment_ch: 受力策佔取中間位置，走第二疊，步速中等。三百米處穩步上前，跑獲亞軍。

comment: Started ok, raced 3 wide with cover back of midfield,       checked 600m, shifted out & driven 320m, tame effort.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，居中間之後位置，走第三疊，有遮擋。六百米處勒避，三百二十米處向外移出，受催策，走勢疲弱。

comment: Jumped awkwardly; niggled throughout; made minor inroads late.
comment_ch: 起步論盡, 騎足全程, 末段稍追

comment: Began well, ridden to hold rail behind the pace and allowed to settle. Came off fence turning for home, rolled forward  to lead 150m, kept on well.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策，沿欄居領放馬之後的位置，走勢穩定。轉直路彎時移離內欄，一百五十米處上前取得領先，保持佳勢。

comment: Raced against rail in midfield, pushed along 400M,          responded moderately, tight for room mid-straight and late  stages, never a serious threat.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，走內欄。四百米處受推策，反應普通。直路中段及末段受擠迫，從未能構成真正威脅。

comment: Remained prominent from barrier 12, 1-1/2L off the pace,    however finished off only one paced.
comment_ch: 自第十二檔出閘後保持居前列位置，落後領放馬一個半馬位。末段僅能保持同速。

comment: First to jump; laid in at 300m.
comment_ch: 出閘最快，三百內閃

comment: Settled at rear; made minor inroads when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑, 直路推騎稍追

comment: Sharp start, restrained to midfield 1 off with cover,       niggled 500m & outpaced, hard-driven turning in, found      nothing in tame run home.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受約束居中間位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。五百米處受催策，被拋離，入直路時受力策。末段再無餘力，走勢疲乏。
owner: Mr & Mrs Baffin Wong Yu Kwan

comment: At back, pace good, ran on ok in straight.
comment_ch: 居後列，步速中等。直路上走勢尚可。

comment: Hard ridden but failed to respond and soon clear last.      Continued to give ground first turn and eased down.         Unacceptable performance.
comment_ch: 受力策但未能交出反應，瞬即遙遙包尾。首次轉彎時持續墮退，收慢。表現難以接受。
owner: To Wai, Andy To Kai Pong, Benson To Kai Sang & Canning To Kai Fung
Albert Hung Chao Hong & Stephanie Hung Yujie

comment: Settled mainly in midfield on rails, switched out for a run entering straight, ran on steadily to hit the front         momentarily 100 metres out, soon outsprinted.
comment_ch: 大多居中間位置，走內欄。入直路時移出外疊取位。穩步上前，一百米處一度取得領先，但瞬即被超越。

comment: On-pace early; flattened late.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑, 拉士勁平

comment: Not quickened when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段有騎，無加速力

comment: Made progress under a hold; impressive.
comment_ch: 按住上前, 惹人好感
owner: Sandia Yit Lau Ying Lam & Yit Kwok Leung

comment: Without cover all the way; made ground steadily to score.
comment_ch: 全程望空，逐步追上
owner: Mr & Mrs Johnny Ng Sai Chun, Raymond Ng Lok Man and Dr Kevin Ng King Man

comment: Pushed forward, took rail, shared lead at good pace, hung   on well until 150M overhauled, ran on for 2nd.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，移入內欄，以快步速並排領先。保持佳勢，一百五十米處被超越。保持走勢，跑獲亞軍。

comment: Hit the front in the straight; won comfortably.
comment_ch: 直路透出, 姿態輕鬆

comment: Behind midfield along the fence, harmed by the slow pace,   no dash.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，沿欄競跑。步速緩慢，不利發揮。衝刺乏力。
owner: Liang Lo Ching Yung & Rose Ng Kai Ching

comment: Not hurried early stages, settled down 5Ls off the pace     behind midfield,  held up from top of the straight to 200M, finished off willingly when switched into clear, nearest    finish.
comment_ch: 早段未受催策，居中間之後位置，落後五個馬位。直路初至二百米處受困，望空後奮力衝刺，終點線上最為接近。

comment: Hit the front in the Straight; won comfortably.
comment_ch: 直路透出, 輕勝對手

handicap_ch: 滙豐百週年紀念碗（讓賽）
comment: Shifted across behind horses from wide draw and last on     settling. Stayed on rail around turn and kept on fairly in  straight.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘，在馬群之後切入，居包尾位置。轉彎時固守內欄。直路上保持一般走勢。

comment: Slow to begin; under a hold throughout and not fully tested.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，沿途拖住未試

comment: Jumped well, natural speed to cross and lead, passed 1700m, settled 3rd on rail, clicked up 500m, checked 400m, back to rail 250m, even finish.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，順其自然地切入內欄領先。千七米處被超越，居第三位，走內欄。五百米處加速，四百米處勒避，二百五十米處移回內欄。以普通走勢衝刺。

comment: Under restraint early; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 早段稍留, 直路按返
owner: Emily Wong Man Yan & Wong Ying Sheung

handicap_ch: 浪琴表國際騎師錦標賽（讓賽）－第四關
comment: Reserved near last, 8Ls off the pace making home turn,      closed off fastest down outside, nearest finish.
comment_ch: 留居接近包尾位置。轉直路彎時落後領放馬八個馬位。在外疊衝刺最快，過終點時最為接近。

comment: Never better than midfield, made no impression in straight. (Bled)
comment_ch: 從未超越中間位置。直路上毫無表現。（流鼻血）

comment: Always in touch; moved better than before.
comment_ch: 前後俱備, 走勢復甦
owner: Mr & Mrs Peter P C Fan

comment: Began well, rolled forward along rail, two-back from        leader. Held for clear run early in straight before         finishing off nicely final stages.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，沿欄上前，落後領放馬兩個馬位。直路初受困，末段衝刺良佳。
owner: Wilson Wong Kan Po & Derek Wong Sau Leung

comment: Crowded & taken behind at start, raced midfield 1 off with  cover, overraced 1100m & shuffled back a spot, bustled a    touch 500m, driven into stretch, one-paced in tepid run     home.
comment_ch: 出閘時受擠迫，留居中間位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。千一米處搶口，略為墮後。五百米處略受催策。入直路時受催策。末段保持同速，走勢疲弱。

comment: Ran on for 3rd when persuaded at 300m.
comment_ch: 三百稍騎，加速入位
owner: Dr & Mrs Wilson Ip Chun Heng

comment: Jumped well, among leaders early, narrow lead post 1st time on rail, slightly keen, headed 960m, urged along with       leader, regained front 550m, ridden 360m, joined 150m,      one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，早段居領放馬群中。首次跑過終點時以短距離領先，走內欄，跑來略為搶口。九百六十米處被超越。與領放馬一同受催策，五百五十米處再度領先。三百六十米處受催策。一百五十米處被追上，其後保持同速。

comment: Under restraint early; made progress momentarily at turn; under a hold in the Straight.
comment_ch: 起步捉實，轉彎湧一湧，末段按返

comment: On pace early; being asked late.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，末段要騎

comment: Under restraint throughout; moved better than before after a break.
comment_ch: 沿途抽實，休後見好

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY PT GRACEFUL COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶娉婷系列讓賽
comment: Outpaced initially, raced rail behind midfield, shifted out turning in but crowded, angled inside 330m, driven & kept   on late for 3rd.
comment_ch: 初時被拋離，居中間之後位置，走內欄。轉入直路時向外移出，受擠迫，三百三十米處移回內疊。末段在催策下保持走勢，跑入季席。

comment: Always in touch; narrowly beaten.
comment_ch: 前後俱備, 影相僅敗

comment: Settled along the rail; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 貼欄跟跑, 未見佳處

comment: Began well but beaten for speed and dropped back towards    rear. One-paced early in straight before picking up the bit 200m and finishing well.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，但前速不快，墮居後列位置。直路初保持同速，二百米處上口，衝刺良佳。
owner: Michael Lam King Poy, Ernest Lam Jen Ho & Christopher Lam Jen Toa

comment: Had head turned at start and lost ground. Taken to rail at  rear and settled. Switched out turning for home and         finished off nicely.
comment_ch: 開閘時將頭轉側，因而失地。移入內欄，居後列位置。轉直路彎時向外移出，衝刺良佳。

comment: Raced midfield, 4L behind 2 wide with cover, held up until  250M, ran on well thereafter.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後四個馬位，在有遮擋下走第二疊。二百五十米處前受困，其後走勢甚佳。
owner: Mr & Mrs Julian Chow Kai Wo, Chow Wing Shuen and Chow Cheuk Wai

comment: Out-paced early; made progress when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 早段跟唔住，直路推騎肯追

comment: Led all the way; hit the line strongly to score.
comment_ch: 帶放到底，一氣呵成

comment: Quickened at turn; came from behind to score.
comment_ch: 彎位發力，後上取勝

comment: On pace for 3rd; moved better than before.
comment_ch: 快放入位，有點進步
owner: Mr & Mrs David Lee Fook Sang and Calvin Lee Ka Wo

comment: Began well, and allowed to ease forward to be handily       placed, 1 off the fence. Slightly 1 paced in the straight,  but plugged away steadily.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，獲許上前佔取有利位置，走第二疊。直路上稍為均速，走勢穩定。

handicap: THE PENINSULA GOLDEN JUBILEE CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
comment: Raced in about midfield, 2L behind on inner track, kept on  one paced in the run home.
comment_ch: 約居中間位置，落後兩個馬位，走內疊。末段保持同速。

comment: Made ground progressively and won comfortably.
comment_ch: 逐步加速, 姿態輕鬆
owner: Star Chan Iu Seng, Winnie Chan Wing Yan, Simon Chan Cham Man & Vincent Chan Cham Wai

comment: At rear, 9-3/4L behind 2 wide with cover, not suited to the slow pace, finished off well for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬九又四分三個馬位，在有遮擋下走第二疊。步速緩慢，不合發揮。末段衝刺良佳，跑獲季軍。

comment: Sent forward, led from 1000 to near 800M, failed to kick on inside 200M.
comment_ch: 受催策上前。自一千米處至接近八百米處領放。最後二百米衝刺乏力。
owner: Eric Cheng Kam Chung & Vene Cheng Wing Ni

comment: Under a hold behind runners; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 沿途跟馬尾, 扣實未試

comment: Limited response when being hard ridden.
comment_ch: 又推又打，唔多肯走

comment: Ridden to gradually gain close-up 3rd far side, forced to   steady off heels and lost position inside the 800 metres,   dropped out tamely in straight.
comment_ch: 受催策，對面直路上逐漸進佔第三位，緊隨領放馬。八百米處須收慢避開他駒後蹄，因而失位。直路上乏力墮退。

comment: Settled in worse than midfield, 2-3/4L off 2 wide with      cover, not suited to the slow tempo, closed off well in the Straight.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後二又四分三個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。步速緩慢，不合發揮，直路上衝刺良佳。

comment: Settled about 2Ls behind the leader in the middle of the    track, dropped off 300M.
comment_ch: 約居領放馬兩個馬位之後的位置，在跑道中央競跑。三百米處墮退。
owner: Rotary Club of Kwai Chung Syndicate

comment: Moderate start & bustled to race midfield 1 off with cover, ridden 600m, shifted wide into stretch, lacked toe, stayed  on ok centre track.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策居中間位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。六百米處受催策，入直路時移出更外疊。未能加速，沿跑道中央保持普通走勢。

comment: Looking for cover after start; not properly tested.
comment_ch: 起步找遮擋，未盡全力

comment: Settled midfield, 5.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬五個半馬位，走內欄。走勢普通。

comment: Not hurried, settled down 6Ls behind midfield, wide no      cover after 900M, lacked a closing response and left behind by rivals mid-straight.
comment_ch: 未受催策，居中間之後位置，落後六個馬位。過了九百米處後走外疊，沒有遮擋。在催策下衝刺乏力，直路中段被對手拋離。

comment: Always at rear; never in contention.
comment_ch: 居後跟跑, 遠離水準

comment: Up with the pace early; ran on ok.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑, 表現唔曳
owner: Poon Chi Keung & Thomas Poon Ho Wing

comment: Quickened at home turn; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 彎位發力, 點到即止

comment: Pressed forward, pace good, led 400M, flattened 200M.
comment_ch: 受催策上前。步速中等。四百米處取得領先。二百米處洩氣。

comment: Led all the way to score.
comment_ch: 主動搶放, 愈走愈順

comment: Made good progress when let go in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路一鬆，自動上前

comment: Taken back after start; moved midfield; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 起步拖後，迅即居中，試來一般

comment: Broke ok, slotted back of midfield 1 off with cover,        shifted out 400m & driven, closed off for late inroads.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可。居中間之後位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。四百米處移出外疊，受催策。展開衝刺，末段追前。
owner: Danny Lau Tat Pong, Liu Ling Yi, Ho Tak Sum & Lee Wong Tim

comment: Settled behind leaders, rifted back to midfield near 500m,  pulled out to challenge on straightening, ran home well but no match for winner.
comment_ch: 居領先馬匹之後，接近五百米處時墮退至中間位置。入直路時向外移出展開挑戰。以佳勢衝刺，但不敵頭馬。
owner: Wong Hing Chun, Wong Mee Chun & The Executors of the Estate of the late Wong Man Yui

comment: Rolled forward to park outside the leader, made an early    move rounding the Home Turn, kept on strongly to the line   to score by a short head.
comment_ch: 上前居領放馬外側位置。轉直路彎時已發力上前。保持勁勢至終點，以一短馬頭位之先勝出。
owner: Mr & Mrs James Lau Chi Wing, Lau Kai Tai & Michelle Lau Wing Sheung

comment: In front of midfield, 3-1/2L behind the leader 2 wide with  cover, no dash and weakened after 150M.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，落後領放馬三個半馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。過了一百五十米處後衝刺乏力及轉弱。

comment: At rear, 10Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast  tempo, made some late ground 200M.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬十個馬位，走第二疊。步速甚快，有利發揮。二百米處略為追前。

comment: Always at rear, never ran on.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列，從未能追前。

comment: Taken back from a wide draw, travelled 5Ls behind the       leader 3 wide with cover, despite the slow tempo, finished  off well.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後留後，落後領放馬五個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。儘管步速緩慢，但仍能以佳勢衝刺。
owner: Mr & Mrs Peter P C Fan

comment: Taken back early; made minor progress inroads late.
comment_ch: 刻意留後, 拉士稍追
owner: Lily Scheng Hsi Feng & Vicky Tang

comment: Up with pace; kept on in the Straight.
comment_ch: 跟前，直路保持走勢

comment: OK away and eased forward to be handily place 1.5L behind   the leader, on the fence. Came inside heels in the straight to hug the rail. Ran on well, and lead by the 150m, only to be swamped on the line.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，沿欄上前，居前列，落後領放馬一個半馬位。直路上在他駒後蹄內側，固守內欄。走勢良佳，一百五十米處取得領先。僅於過終點時被超越。

comment: Wide throughout; never in contention.
comment_ch: 全程外叠, 無段好睇

comment: Settled on rails in 5th within 3L of pace, similar turning  in, failed to quicken to threaten.
comment_ch: 沿欄居第五位，落後領放馬不逾三個馬位。入直路時居相若位置，未能加速，無法構成威脅。
owner: Julian Hui Chun Hang & Michele Monique Reis

handicap_ch: 皮亞士紀念挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Slow into stride, dropping to rear, shifted in and improved position. Shaken up 900m when rival moved forward, barged   through gap 350m, finished strongly while laying in to grab minor placing.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，墮居後列，移向內疊推進。九百米處對手上前時受催策，三百五十米處穿過空位上前。內閃，衝刺強勁，取得季軍。
owner: So Shek Wing & Frederick Leung Sek Cheung

comment: Pressed forward, sitting one-off, two-back 900m. Swung wide entering straight, kept on fairly while hanging out under   pressure.
comment_ch: 受催策上前。九百米處落後兩個馬位，走第二疊。入直路時移出外疊，在催策下外閃，保持一般走勢。

comment: Jumped fairly but lacked early pace, tailed-off from the    800 metres but picked up quite well inside the final 200    metres for a good closing.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，缺乏前速，自八百米處起尾隨馬群。最後二百米加速頗勁，末段衝刺良佳。

comment: Jumped well; led all the way to score.
comment_ch: 應聲彈出, 一氣呵成
owner: Mr & Mrs Leung Lun, Paul Leung Yuk Hung and Kenneth Leung Yuk Wai

comment: On-pace early; kept on in the straight.
comment_ch: 跟前, 直路騎落仲有

comment: Bumped start, hard ridden but didn't muster, dropping       four-back along fence on settling. Stayed on rail in        straight and boxed on one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘時碰撞他駒，受力策，但未能加速，墮居領放馬四個馬位之後的位置，走內欄。直路上固守內欄，保持同速。

comment: Blundered shortly after start, restrained, shifted across   behind runners but away from fence. Dropped to last         entering straight, ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 出閘後瞬即失蹄，受約束。在馬群之後切入，離欄競跑。入直路時墮至包尾，以普通走勢上前。
owner: Mr & Mrs Hamen Fan Shi Hoo and Alex Fan Chen Yen

comment: Ran under his own steam midtrack.
comment_ch: 中檔競走，輕抒腳頭

comment: Broke ok, taken back to 1 off with cover behind midfield,   niggled 500m & hard-ridden turning in, lacked toe but       stayed on for minor late headway.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，收慢留居中間之後位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。五百米處受催策，入直路時受大力催策，未能加速但保持走勢，末段上前少許。
owner: Mr & Mrs Eddie Wong Ming Chak and Kameny Wong Kam Man

comment: Camped handy, travelled 1L behind the leader, fought on     gamely to score by a neck.
comment_ch: 居前列，落後領放馬一個馬位。以勁勢力拼，以一馬頸位之先勝出。

comment: Led all the way; hit the line strongly to score.
comment_ch: 主動帶放，直領到底

comment: Pushed forward to take the lead along the fence at very     slow sectionals, kept on gamely until final furlong, hung   on for 4th.
comment_ch: 沿欄受推策上前取得領先，以十分緩慢的步速領放。保持勁勢直至最後二百米。保持走勢，跑獲殿軍。

comment: On pace centre track; raced under his own steam in the Straight.
comment_ch: 中檔跟前, 直路未曾騎過

comment: Nicely away, raced 2 wide, 2 lengths or so back in 3rd,     similar position to turn, kept on well in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。居第三位，落後領放馬約兩個馬位，走第二疊。直路彎前居相若位置。直路上保持佳勢。
owner: Kenneth Hui Yat Hing, Alexander Hui Yat Chuen & The Executors of the Estate of the late Hui Kwong Ch

comment: Rolled forward to occupy the box seat, harmed by the fast   pace, kept on until weakened final 200M.
comment_ch: 上前佔取包廂位置。步速甚快，不利發揮。保持走勢，最後二百米轉弱。

comment: On-pace early; responded well for 2nd under urge late.
comment_ch: 拉士稍騎, 佳勢上前

handicap: THE HONG KONG RUGBY UNION CUP (HANDICAP)
comment: Given reminders at start, pressed forward to one-off spot   in midfield. Lost position back stretch, took off from 500m circling field to within 1L of leader at 200m before run    ended.
comment_ch: 起步時受鞭策。受催策上前，居中間位置，走第二疊。對面直路上失位。自五百米處起繞過馬群發力上前，二百米處落後領放馬不逾一個馬位，其後無以為繼。

comment: Pushed to sit in front of midfield, 2 wide, made steady     ground 300M for 2nd.
comment_ch: 受推策居中間之前位置，走第二疊。三百米處逐漸上前，跑獲亞軍。

comment: Taken back, travelled 4.5Ls behind the leader along the     fence, dashed strongly to the line despite couldn't find a  day light most of the straight.
comment_ch: 出閘後留後，落後領放馬四個半馬位，沿欄競跑。直路上大部分途程未能望空。末段衝刺強勁。
owner: Mr & Mrs Charley Chan Wing Chin

comment: Flattened halfway; weakened badly and dropped back.
comment_ch: 半程乏力，急劇墮退

comment: On pace and three wide; under a hold in the Straight.
comment_ch: 三疊跟前, 直路按返

handicap: THE HONG KONG ST JOHN AMBULANCE BRIGADE CENTENARY CELEBRATION CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港聖約翰救傷隊百週年紀念盃（讓賽）
comment: Settled back at start & niggled rail near tail, advanced a  spot 800m, niggled 500m, shifted out 430m & driven, stayed  on moderately.
comment_ch: 起步時留後，居接近包尾位置，受催策，走內欄。八百米處略為上前。五百米處受催策。四百三十米處向外移出及受催策，保持普通走勢。

comment: Limited response when being asked at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百推騎，反應麻麻

handicap: THE HONG KONG RIDING FOR THE DISABLED ASSOCIATION CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港傷健策騎協會盃（讓賽）
comment: Steadied after start to obtain cover, settling behind       midfield in one-off position. Taken wide around final turn, ran on fairly in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘後收慢以取得遮擋，居中間之後位置，走第二疊。轉直路彎時走外疊，直路上保持普通走勢。
owner: Chan Cheung Hi, Lam Suet Wan & Tsoi Huk Yam

comment: Up with the pace; kept on strongly late for 2nd.
comment_ch: 大步跟前，末段仍勁

comment: Moderately away, raced 3 wide with cover in 6th, similar    position on turn, kept on very well in straight to get 2nd.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居第六位，走第三疊，有遮擋。直路彎居相若位置。直路上保持極佳走勢，取得亞軍。

comment: Wide throughout; responded ok when asked.
comment_ch: 外疊競走，騎落肯走

comment: Never far off, 2.5Ls back in 4th making the home turn, ran  on strongly to lead 50M.
comment_ch: 從未遠離領放馬。直路彎居第四位，落後領放馬兩個半馬位。以勁勢上前，五十米處取得領先。

comment: Pushed to take rail and lead, closed off strongly 300M to   score.
comment_ch: 在推策下切入內欄領先。三百米處以勁勢衝刺，勝出賽事。

comment: Jumped away well; kept on one-paced late.
comment_ch: 起步敏捷, 拉士僅保持速度

comment: One of the first into stride before settling between horses 2L from leader. Took home turn 4-wide, loomed alongside     leaders approaching 300m, kept on gamely to line.
comment_ch: 出閘最快的賽駒之一，落後領放馬兩個馬位，在馬匹之間競跑。直路彎走第四疊。趨近三百米處時追近領先馬匹。保持勁勢至終點。

comment: Urged to lead; stayed on well.
comment_ch: 沿途搶放，末段唔斷
owner: Mr & Mrs Didier Li Kwok Wai

comment: At back, pace good, held up final 2 furlongs, not properly  tested.
comment_ch: 居後列，步速頗快。最後四百米受困，未能全力發揮。

comment: Moderately away, raced prominently, 2 wide throughout,      peaked on turn, one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居前列位置，沿途走第二疊。直路彎未能再增速，直路上保持同速。
owner: Chan Wai Nam & Ian Chan Yau Nam

comment: Quickened at turn; ran on strongly to score although laying in late.
comment_ch: 彎位發力, 拉士內閃, 但走勢仍勁
owner: Michael Chan Se Ping & Law Lai Wan

handicap_ch: 多維爾八月週歲馬拍賣會讓賽
comment: Travelled 3-wide without cover in forward of midfield,      improved to 3L 4th approaching the Rock, faded under        pressure after straightening.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。趨近大石鼓處時進佔第四位，落後三個馬位。入直路後在催策下力竭。
owner: Mr & Mrs Tam Kwok Chu and Thomas Tam Wing Yiu

comment: Began well and pushed up to sit just behind the early       leader, on the rail. Became unsettled and had to check off  heels 900m. Under pressure before the turn, and dropped out quickly from the 300m.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，早段在推策下居領放馬稍後位置，走內欄。九百米處難以穩定走勢，須勒避他駒後蹄。直路彎前已須受催策。自三百米處起迅速墮退。
owner: Wallace Chim Hon Chun & Leung Man Wei

comment: Raced at rear; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑, 毫無好感

comment: Trapped 3wide throughout in midfield, closed off strongly   200M for 3rd.
comment_ch: 沿途走第三疊，居中間位置。二百米處展開強勁衝刺，跑獲季軍。
owner: Chan Wai Nam & Ian Chan Yau Nam

comment: Slow start, raced midfield 1 off with cover, niggled 600m,  shifted out & driven centre track, tepid run home.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居中間位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。六百米處受催策。直路上向外移出，在跑道中央競跑，受催策。衝刺乏力。

comment: Hard ridden forward, sat 2 wide, closed off strongly 300M   to score.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，走第二疊。三百米處衝刺強勁，勝出賽事。

comment: Tardy break, taken to rail & soon 2.5L adrift at tail,      niggled to chase 400m, shifted centre & stayed on for late  inroads.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，移至外欄，瞬即居包尾位置，落後前駒兩個半馬位。四百米處受催策力追。移至跑道中央，保持走勢，末段追前。

comment: Always in touch; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 有前有後，點到即止

comment: Settled at rear; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑，走勢平淡

comment: Chased leaders, held every chance turning in, stayed on to  final 200M and wilted. (No Vet findings)
comment_ch: 追趕領先馬匹，入直路時已獲機會盡展所長。二百米處前保持走勢，其後力竭。（獸醫檢查後並無發現任何明顯異常之處。）

comment: Taken back early; found nothing when asked in the straight.
comment_ch: 起步拖後, 直路騎落欠勁

comment: Stumbled out of the barriers and dropped back early. At the back of the pack, and played no part in the race.
comment_ch: 出閘時失蹄，早段墮後。居後列，並無參與競逐。

comment: Pressed forward from widest draw, sharing early pace before taking lead passing 1400m, crossing to fence 1150m and      slowing pace. Overtaken passing 650m but kept on gamely to  200m before running out of steam.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後受催策上前，早段並排領先。跑過千四米處時取得領先。一千一百五十米處切入內欄，減慢步速。跑過六百五十米處時被超越。保持勁勢至二百米處，力竭。

comment: Pushed forward between horses to race outside leader at     first turn. Followed leader back stretch, urged forward     passing 500m but ran out of steam 300m and plodded home.
comment_ch: 在馬匹之間受推策上前，首次轉彎時居領放馬外側。對面直路上跟隨領放馬，跑過五百米處時受催策上前，三百米處無以為繼，末段走勢疲乏。
owner: Dawson Woo Ka Chung, Jackson Woo Ka Biu & The Executors of the Estate of the late Wilson Woo Ka Wah

comment: Led all the way; hit the line strong to score.
comment_ch: 帶放到底, 有餘未盡

comment: Asked at turn; held up at 300m.
comment_ch: 入彎已騎, 三百受阻

comment: Began fairly, then crowded for room and shuffled four-back, one-off on settling. Lay out 500m, bumped and unbalanced    450m, wide into straight, one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，受擠迫，落後領放馬四個馬位，走第二疊。五百米處外閃。四百五十米處被碰撞，失去平衡。入直路時走外疊，保持同速。

comment: Began well, pressed forward, settling 4L from leader in     one-off position. Took closer order approaching home turn,  urged forward passing 550m, 3-wide into straight, kicked    ahead 200m and went to the post unchallenged.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前，落後領放馬四個馬位，走第二疊。趨近直路彎時進佔較接近位置。跑過五百五十米處時受催策上前。入直路時走第三疊。二百米處加速帶離。終點前未受挑戰。

comment: Settled behind runners; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 跟馬林走，末段按返

comment: Fast start & raced 2nd 1 off no cover, niggled 650m, driven 500m, found little & gradually faded in run home.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居第二位，走第二疊，沒有遮擋。六百五十米處受催策。五百米處再受催策。末段再無餘力，逐漸力竭。

handicap_ch: 浪琴表國際騎師錦標賽（讓賽）－第一關
comment: Pressed forward 3-wide from an outside draw before cutting  in to one-off position 3L from leader around turn. Switched out in straight and ran on solidly.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受催策上前，走第三疊。轉直路彎時切入第二疊，落後領放馬三個馬位。直路上向外移出，走勢強勁。

comment: Raced towards the rear, 5L behind 2 wide, made ground       steadily and kept on nicely for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後五個馬位，走第二疊。逐漸上前，保持佳勢，跑獲季軍。

comment: Struggled for 3rd when under whip late.
comment_ch: 末段鞭騎，捱入一席

comment: Hard ridden forward to share the lead on the fence, hung on strongly until final 50M headed by the winner.
comment_ch: 受大力催策上前並排領放，走內欄。保持勁勢至最後五十米處被頭馬超越。

comment: On-pace along rail; stayed on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 貼欄跟前, 闖入一席

comment: Smart break & prominent but trapped wide, snagged 1250m to  1 off 1 back & niggled 1050m, shuffled back & under         pressure 650m, crowded & checked off heels turning in,      driven 350m, tepid run home.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居前列，但走外疊。一千二百五十米處收慢，居第二疊第二位，一千零五十米處受催策。六百五十米處墮退，受催策。入直路時受擠迫並勒避他駒後蹄。三百五十米處受催策。末段衝刺乏力。
owner: Wu Kai Char & Wu Wai Chor

comment: Rolled to settle in a prominent spot along the fence,       despite suited by the slow tempo, one paced until weakened  100M.
comment_ch: 沿欄上前，居前列。步速緩慢，適合發揮，但僅能保持同速，一百米處轉弱。

comment: Restrained on jumping, shifted across behind runners,       settling four-back, one-off. Improved position around turn, taken to centre track in straight and finished off nicely.
comment_ch: 出閘時受約束，在馬群之後切入，落後四個馬位，走第二疊。轉直路彎時推進，直路上移至跑道中央，以佳勢衝刺。
owner: Simon Tam Ngak Chou & Tam Hin Chi

comment: Chased leaders, came under serious pressure 600M, dropped   out sharply turning in, eased and finished tailed out on    AWT debut. (Unacceptable Performance.)
comment_ch: 追趕領先馬匹。六百米處受力策。入直路時急促墮退，收慢。首次角逐全天候跑道賽事，包尾而回。（表現難以接受。）

comment: Got its head up on jumping; under whip at turn; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 起步岳一岳,轉彎開鞭,毫無好感
owner: Yeung Lin Kar, Yeung Lei Sha & Sam Yeung Wai Shing

comment: Going all over the place on jumping; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 起步閃出閃入，走勢稚嫩

comment: Failed to muster and raced towards the rear, 6L behind 2    wide, showed good dash at 150M and made ground late.
comment_ch: 未能加速，居後列，落後六個馬位，走第二疊。一百五十米處衝刺強勁。末段追前。

comment: Taken back early; made minor inroads when under whip at 200m.
comment_ch: 起步拖後，二百開鞭稍追

comment: Under whip after start; niggled along throughout.
comment_ch: 起步已開鞭，騎足全程

comment: Wide throughout; ran on ok.
comment_ch: 全程蝕位, 走勢不弱

comment: Tardy start; made progress steadily; hit the front late to score.
comment_ch: 起步麻麻, 分段加快, 拉士透出
owner: Chan Kam Hung & Alan Chan Kin On

comment: Broke ok, settled 3 back on fence 3rd, driven 520m,         switched out 400m but outpaced & tapered in run.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，居第三位，落後三個馬位，走內欄。五百二十米處受催策，四百米處向外移出，但被拋離，走勢轉弱。

comment: Led all the way to score.
comment_ch: 主動帶放，考驗到底

comment: Dashed on fairly well on the inside for 2nd.
comment_ch: 內檔竄上，表現唔曳
owner: Lily Scheng Hsi Feng & Vicky Tang

comment: Bumped on jumping; niggled along throughout.
comment_ch: 起步受碰，沿途要俾住
owner: Arthur Antonio da Silva, Betty da Silva & Teresa Marie da Silva

comment: Lacked toe & bustled early, raced rail behind midfield,     behind heels & shuffled to last turning in, kept on         moderately.
comment_ch: 缺乏前速，受催策。居中間之後位置，走內欄。入直路時靠近前駒後蹄，墮居包尾位置。其後保持一般走勢。

comment: Slightly crowded at start, remained at the rear throughout, never a factor.
comment_ch: 出閘後略受擠迫，沿途居後列。從未有力一爭。

comment: Pressed forward to midfield before being shuffled back      around turn. Last into straight and plodded. Had            substantial amount of blood in trachea.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，居中間位置，轉直路彎時墮後。包尾入直路，緩緩上前。氣管內有大量血液。

comment: Taken back to tail, 2L detached & niggled, kept on past     beaten rivals but no impact in tame run home.
comment_ch: 留居包尾位置，落後馬群兩個馬位，受催策。直路上持續超越已洩氣的對手，但走勢疲乏，毫無表現。
owner: Mr & Mrs Senta Wong and Vinci Wong

comment: Limited response when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段推騎，反應平常

comment: Asked at turn; ran on ordinary in the Straight.
comment_ch: 轉彎已騎, 直路無走勢
owner: Elseda Shum Mei Chu, Professor Hextan Ngan Yuen Sheung, Chu Kwong Por & Andrew Shuen Pak Man

comment: In midfield, 5-1/4L behind 2 wide, checked at 1000M,        awkward to heels at 600M, showed nothing and finished       tailed out.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後五又四分一個馬位，走第二疊。一千米處勒避。六百米處靠近他駒後蹄處於窘境。毫無表現，包尾大敗而回。

comment: First out, racing with pace till switched out 1300m, racing between horses 4L from leader. Began forward move 400m,     kept on well until flattened final stages. Had cut inside   left hind cannon.
comment_ch: 出閘最快，與領放馬並跑。千三米處向外移出，落後領放馬四個馬位，在馬匹之間競跑。四百米處開始上前，保持佳勢，末段洩氣。左後腿脛部內側有一處割傷。

comment: Niggled along early; dashed on for 3rd centre track.
comment_ch: 一早已騎，中檔湧上

comment: Came from behind for 3rd; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 後上第三，似模似樣

comment: Broke ok, raced wide with cover behind midfield, niggled    680m, driven home turn, lacked pace & struggled in run home.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可。居中間之後位置，走外疊，有遮擋。六百八十米處受催策，直路彎再受催策。直路上未能增速，掙扎上前。
owner: Wai Siu Kee & Edmond Lee Man Bun

comment: Ridden along early close to pace but wide before losing     position around turn. Kept on fairly early in straight      before tiring final 200m.
comment_ch: 早段受催策，追近領放馬，走外疊，轉直路彎時失位。直路初保持普通走勢，最後二百米洩氣。

comment: Jumped well, striding forward to settle behind leading pair but away from rail. Kept on well in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，展步上前，居領放二駒之後，但離欄競跑。直路上保持佳勢。

comment: Got off OK, pressed forward along rail, settling 3L from    leader 1000m. Took inside run in straight and finished off  strongly.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策上前，走內欄。一千米處落後領放馬三個馬位。直路上走內疊，衝刺強勁。

comment: Led early; stayed on well for 3rd.
comment_ch: 沿欄帶放，末段仍勁

comment: Settled worse than midfield about 5Ls behind the leader on  the fence, suited by the fast sectionals, ran on gradually  for 3rd.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬約五個馬位，走內欄。步速甚快，適合發揮。逐漸上前，跑獲季軍。

comment: Made progress steadily; ran on comfortably for 2nd.
comment_ch: 逐步追趕, 姿態輕鬆

comment: Travelled in worse than midfield, 3-1/2L behind 3 wide with cover, did not look likely.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後三個半馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。從未看似有力一爭。

handicap: HONG KONG PEOPLE ADMINISTERING HONG KONG HANDICAP
comment: Jumped well and sent forward to share lead, held together   home turn, tried to quicken on straightening, overpowered   at 300m and battled to the line.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。受催策上前，並排領先。直路彎未受催策，入直路時嘗試加速。三百米處被超越，其後力拼至終點。
owner: Chan Bing Woon, Chan Hai Ming, Samson Chan Hung Sing & Chan Ming Shun

comment: Began ordinary; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 起步一般，毫無好感
owner: Mr & Mrs Mark Fong Chung, Matthew Fong and Victoria Fong

comment: Failed to muster speed despite hard ridden along in the     early stages, 5Ls off the leader, never a factor.
comment_ch: 儘管於早段受力策，但未能加速，落後領放馬五個馬位。從未有力一爭。

comment: Bumped start, pressed forward but wide, settling 6th 4L     from leader. Shaken up on straightening and ran on steadily to be closest at finish.
comment_ch: 起步時與對手互相碰撞。受催策上前，居第六位，落後領放馬四個馬位，走外疊。入直路時受催策。穩步上前，過終點時最為接近。

comment: Taken back from gate 11, raced 3 wide with cover, 5 lengths back at rear, same position turning, taken widest in        straight and finished off evenly.
comment_ch: 自第十一檔出閘後留居後列，落後五個馬位，在有遮擋下走第三疊。轉直路彎時居相若位置。直路上移出最外疊，末段保持穩勢。

comment: Slow to begin; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，走勢平常
owner: Mr & Mrs Patrick Lau Tak Wai and William Lau Man Yuen

comment: Eased at start, took cover at rear, unleashed strong        finishing efforts 250M despite not suited by the slow pace.
comment_ch: 出閘時收慢，居後列，取得遮擋。儘管慢步速不合發揮，二百五十米處以勁勢衝刺。
owner: Charles Chan Kam Kwong, Bruce Lee Sing Keung & Yuen Shun Yiu

comment: Pressed forward from wide draw to sit outside leader        initially before taking the sit 1.5L behind. Kept on well   early in straight before tiring final 200m.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受催策上前，早段居領放馬外側，其後居領放馬一個半馬位之後的位置。直路初保持佳勢，最後二百米呈現疲態。

comment: Hard ridden early but not muster, 3 back on the fence,      harmed by the slow pace, no dash.
comment_ch: 早段受力策，但未能加速，落後領放馬三個馬位，走內欄。慢步速不利發揮，衝刺乏力。
owner: Simon Leung Yuen Ho & Kirby Leung Kae Bik

comment: Settled towards the rear of the field. Widest on the turn,  but only plugged away fairly in the straight.
comment_ch: 居馬群後列。直路彎走最外疊。直路上僅能保持普通走勢。
owner: Bonnie Chan Yiting, Anthony Derek Lai Shu Yan, Ricky Choy Wing Kay & Dominic Lee Kan Nam

comment: Broke ok, taken back to slot rail near rear, to last 600m,  under pump 450m, found nil in weak run to wire.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，留居後列，走內欄。六百米處居包尾位置。四百五十米處受催策。末段再無餘力，並且轉弱。

comment: Ran on for 3rd when being asked late.
comment_ch: 末段稍騎，追回一席

comment: Began OK and found a position midfield 1 off the fence.     Came to the better part of the track in the straight, but   never closed off late.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，居中間位置，走第二疊。直路上移至跑道狀況較佳部分競跑，但末段衝刺乏力。

comment: Began awkwardly, taken back, settling at rear. Left fence   approaching 700m, switched out to make run from 400m, hit   front 200m, pulled clear.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，留居後列。趨近七百米處時移離內欄。自四百米處起移出外疊上前，二百米處取得領先。帶離餘駒取勝。
owner: Sir Po-shing & Lady Woo, Jackson Woo Ka Biu, Dawson Woo Ka Chung and The Executors of the Estate of

comment: Crowded start, ridden to go forward but not enough speed,   settling four-back along rail. Got clear run in straight    and finished off strongly.
comment_ch: 出閘時受擠迫，受催策上前，但欠缺前速。落後領放馬四個馬位，走內欄。直路上望空，衝刺凌厲。

comment: Settled midfield; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 居中跟跑, 走勢一般

handicap_ch: ＰＡＮＡＳＯＮＩＣ一撻即著藍馳王汽車電池讓賽
comment: Pushed forward, benefited by the slow tempo, ran on until   200M flattened.
comment_ch: 受推策上前。慢步速有利發揮。保持走勢，二百米處洩氣。
owner: Arthur Antonio da Silva, Betty da Silva & Teresa Marie da Silva

comment: Under a hold throughout; raced under his own steam.
comment_ch: 拖住未試，輕抒腳頭

comment: Pushed early, trapped 3 wide, continued forward to take     rail and led at good pace, out of fuel 250M.
comment_ch: 早段受推策，走第三疊。持續上前移入內欄，以中等步速領放。二百五十米處再無餘力。
owner: Lau Yiu Chu, Cynthia Lau, Sandra Lau & Robert Lau

comment: First to jump; just missed.
comment_ch: 起步敏捷，埋門被過

comment: Crowded out start, recovered to race 2 lengths behind the   leader on the stands' rail, finished off evenly to get 3rd, never a threat to the first two.
comment_ch: 出閘時受擠迫，恢復走勢後落後領放馬兩個馬位，走外欄。穩步衝刺，跑獲季軍，從未能威脅頭馬及亞軍馬匹。

comment: Always in touch; moved better than before to score.
comment_ch: 前後俱備, 進步良多

comment: Camped handy, trapped 3 wide without cover throughout,      suited by the very slow tempo, one paced to the line        without any serious threat.
comment_ch: 居有利位置，沿途走第三疊，沒有遮擋。步速十分緩慢，適合發揮。保持同速至終點，但未能構成嚴重威脅。
owner: Charles Chan Kam Kwong, Bruce Lee Sing Keung & Yuen Shun Yiu

comment: Taken back from a wide gate, travelled 7Ls behind the       leader 3 wide with cover, ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後留後，落後領放馬七個馬位，在有遮擋下走第三疊。走勢一般。
owner: Justin Yue Kwok Hung & James Yue Chun Hong

comment: Saved ground throughout; hit the front late to score.
comment_ch: 沿途慳位，末段透出

comment: Broke well, snagged to park midfield 1 off, shuffled back a spot 800m, niggled 500m, under pump turning in, driven &    progress to 2nd close home, no extra final strides.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，收慢留居中間位置，走第二疊。八百米處略為墮後。五百米處受催策。入直路時受催策。接近終點時在催策下進佔第二位。最後數步再無餘力。

comment: Ridden climbing up the hill; faded when under whip in the Straight.
comment_ch: 上山已騎，直路開鞭，走勢乏力
owner: Edward Wong Chung Bun, Andy Wong Ka Wai, Dickson Wong Chung Wai & Ceicy Wong Wing Sze

comment: Urged to lead early; ran on to score when asked.
comment_ch: 沿途快放, 推騎取勝

comment: Under a hold throughout; ran on well for 3rd.
comment_ch: 紋風未動，走勢純熟

comment: Limited response when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段推騎, 反應一般

comment: Unhurried early stages, settled down behind midfield 5-6Ls  off the pace, finished willingly for 4th.
comment_ch: 早段未受催策，居中間之後位置，落後領放馬五至六個馬位。末段衝刺強勁，跑獲殿軍。
owner: Allen Shi Lop Tak & Kimmy Ngan King Lin

comment: Jumped well, hard ridden along rail inside leader. Led      marginally from 700m to 400m, before giving ground in       straight. Had substantial amount of blood in trachea.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。受力策，居領放馬內側，沿欄競跑。自七百米處起至四百米處以短距離領先，繼而在直路上墮退。氣管內有大量血液。
owner: James Ngai & Joseph Hui Ying Biu

comment: Quickly unto stride, chased leader into first turn but      hampered 600m and lost position. Spent force on             straightening and faded.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，首次轉彎時追趕領放馬。六百米處受阻，失位。入直路時洩氣及力竭。
owner: Christopher So Chi Hang & Eddie Ng Tao

comment: Urged to jump out, quickened steadily
comment_ch: 起步擠迫，逐步追上
owner: Arthur Antonio da Silva, Betty da Silva & Teresa Marie da Silva

comment: Slow into stride & then bumped heavily, nudged along at 1st turn, settled beyond midfield 1 off, hard ridden 600m,      pulled wide in straight, couldn't get into it.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，與他駒互相大力碰撞。首次轉彎時受催策，居中間之後位置，走第二疊。六百米處受力策。直路上移至外疊。未能上前爭勝。
owner: Mr & Mrs Allen Shi Lop Tak and Kathleen Shi Pui Ka

comment: Jumped well, pressed forward to hold second spot, 1L from   leader. Looked a chance top of straight but ran out of      stamina 200m and weakened. Lame right front leg.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，受催策進佔第二位，落後領放馬一個馬位。直路早段看似具爭勝機會，但二百米處洩氣並轉弱。右前腿不良於行。

comment: Smart start, bustled initially to race fore of midfield 1   off with cover, niggled 650m, driven 500m & lost ground,    wide into stretch, plodded home tamely.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策，居中間之前位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。六百五十米處受催策，五百米處受催策但失地，入直路時走外疊。末段走勢疲乏。

comment: Began well, pressed forward but unable find cover and kept  3-wide 3L from leader. Under pressure turning for home but  only one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前，未能取得遮擋，持續走第三疊，落後領放馬三個馬位。轉直路彎時受催策，但僅能保持同速。
owner: Dr Edward Cheung Wing Yui, Lam Man Chun & Jason Tam Siu Keung

handicap: THE INDIAN RECREATION CLUB CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 印度遊樂會挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Raced in front of midfield, 3L behind the leader however    trapped 3 wide without cover, faded quickly after           straightening.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，落後領放馬三個馬位，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。入直路後迅速力竭。

comment: At back, raced on the inner part of track, never progressed.
comment_ch: 居後列，走內疊。從未能上前。

comment: Raced keenly early stages, restrained to race ahead of      midfield, closed off well down outside final 200M, late     impression on first 3.
comment_ch: 早段跑來搶口，在約束下居中間之前位置。最後二百米走外疊，衝刺甚佳，末段追近三甲馬匹。

comment: Found nothing when under whip at 300m.
comment_ch: 三百開鞭，毫無反應

comment: Up with the pace; hit the line strong for 3rd.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，末段追勢甚勁
owner: Dr Philip Ho Kin Hoi, Dr Ernest Yau Hok Shing & Dr Joseph Pang Yeuk She

comment: Broke well but restrained and taken back through field to   be last passing 1200m. Taken to rail 700m but not asked for effort till 400m when ran on strongly along rail to hit the front 50m before pulling clear.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，但受約束，留居馬群後列位置，跑過千二米處時包尾。七百米處移入內欄，但未受催策。四百米處受催策，沿欄走勢強勁。五十米處取得領先，帶離勝出。

comment: Slow to begin; shifted out at 300m; fought on gamely for 2nd.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，三百移出，奮力上前
owner: So Shek Wing & Frederick Leung Sek Cheung

comment: Broke well, taken back from wide gate to race near rear 1   off, shifted wide & driven 450m, found nil, plodded on      centre track.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘迅速，留居後列位置，走第二疊。四百五十米處移出外疊，受催策。再無餘力。直路上在跑道中央緩緩上前。

comment: Pushed forward, sat 2 wide, not suited by the fast          sectionals, lack room 400M, held ground for 3rd.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，走第二疊。快步速不合發揮。四百米處缺乏空位，保持位置得季軍。

comment: Pushed early from the wide draw to lead. In front at the    200m, but peaked and weakened quickly from that point       before easing out late.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘，早段受推策，取得領先。二百米處帶頭。自此未能再增速及迅速轉弱。末段墮退。

comment: Shifted across behind runners from wide draw, settling      between horses at rear. Improved position around turn,      switched out entering straight and finished off strongly.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，在馬群之後切入，在馬匹之間競跑，居後列。轉直路彎時上前。入直路時向外移出。末段衝刺強勁。
owner: Mr & Mrs Hamen Fan Shi Hoo and Alex Fan Chen Yen

comment: Ridden along in mid-division from the jump, found nothing   under pressure in the run home.
comment_ch: 出閘後居中間位置，受催策。末段在催策下毫無反應。

comment: At back, along the fence, pace good, ran on ok in final     stages.
comment_ch: 居後列，走內欄。步速中等，末段走勢尚可。
owner: Emily Wong Man Yan & Wong Ying Sheung

comment: Slightly awkward start, eased to back, settled near rear on rail, back to last 600m, railed up, ridden 350m, one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘略為笨拙，收慢留居後列，走內欄。六百米處墮居包尾位置，其後沿欄上前。三百五十米處受催策，保持同速。

comment: Jumped quickly to soon take up running on stands rails,     held narrow advantage until headed slightly passing the 400 metres, renewed effort to assert authority over 100 metres  out, hung on under pressure.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，瞬即帶頭，走外欄。以短距離領先，跑過四百米處時被超越，落後些微距離。再度發力，一百米處控制大局，在催策下保持走勢。
owner: Peter P C Fan, Montgomery Ho Shun Wah & Dr Michael Mok Hing Hung

comment: Quickly into stride, racing wide without cover 3L from      leader. Three-wide into straight and boxed on gamely        without looking a threat.
comment_ch: 展步迅速，落後領放馬三個馬位，走外疊，沒有遮擋。入直路時走第三疊，以勁勢力拼，但未能構成威脅。

comment: Eased to rear, harmed by the slow pace, never competitive.
comment_ch: 收慢留居後列位置，慢步速不利發揮。從未有力爭勝。

comment: Jumped well, settled midfield, took time to get balanced    early straight before finishing strongly.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居中間位置。直路初取得平衡需時。其後衝刺強勁。
owner: Samson Yip Yan Tion, Dumas Chow Wai Sang & Eric Tong Man Leung

comment: Jumped well from a tricky gate, sent forward to take the    lead, enjoyed the easy lead throughout, kicked clear after  turning in, scored easily.
comment_ch: 自第九檔出閘迅速，受催策上前領先。沿途從容領先，入直路後帶離對手，輕鬆勝出。
owner: Peter Young Wai Po & Dr Arthur Leung Shing Tat

comment: Bumped start, sent forward to race prominently, peaked on   turn, emptied early in straight, finished tailed out.
comment_ch: 出閘後被碰撞，受催策上前，居前列位置。直路彎未能再增速，直路初再無餘力，尾隨而回。
owner: Poon Tit Man & Wong Kwong Fai

comment: Sent forward to take the fence and raced behind the leader, enjoyed the slow sectionals, hit the front 200M, hung on to score by a neck.
comment_ch: 受催策上前切入內欄，居領放馬之後位置。步速緩慢，有利發揮。二百米處取得領先，保持走勢，以一馬頸位之先勝出。

comment: Eased and raced in worse than midfield, 5-1/4L behind 2     wide, made minor progress.
comment_ch: 收慢，居中間之後位置，落後五又四分一馬位，走第二疊，略為追前。

comment: Settled worse than midfield about 9Ls behind the leader on  the fence, harmed by the very slow tempo, never ran on.     (substantial amount of mucus in its trachea)
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬約九個馬位，走內欄。步速十分緩慢，不利發揮。從未能追前。（氣管內有大量痰液)
owner: Mr & Mrs Robert Lau Siu Kit

comment: Quickened at turn; ran on for 2nd under whip.
comment_ch: 彎位發力, 鞭騎第二

comment: Shifted out in the straight; came from behind for 2nd.
comment_ch: 直路移出, 後上第二

comment: Asked at turn; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 轉彎已騎, 毫無威脅
owner: Cheung Tin Chai & Cheung Shu Yan

comment: Wide throughout; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 全程外疊，未見佳處

comment: Restrained at start, caught 3 deep & taken back to near     rear, advanced a spot 600m, wide into stretch & driven      400m, boxed on one pace.
comment_ch: 起步後受約束，走第三疊，留居後列。六百米處略為上前。入直路時走外疊，四百米處受催策，保持同速。

comment: Under a hold throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 緊韁扣實，未受考驗

comment: First out, led to 800m when pressured by another. Kicked    clear 350m but run down 250m and faded gradually.
comment_ch: 出閘最快。取得領先，八百米處受對手施壓。三百五十米處加速帶離，但二百五十米處被超越，逐漸力竭。

comment: Being niggled early; made minor inroads in the Straight.
comment_ch: 一早已騎, 直路稍追

comment: Jumped evenly, restrained to settle well beyond midfield 1  off, clicked up 400m, pulled widest, wayward in straight,   never nearer.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，在約束下居中間頗後位置，走第二疊。四百米處加速，移至最外疊。直路上難以穩定走勢，以末段最為接近。

comment: Under a hold throughout; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 沿途拖住，走勢含蓄
owner: Michael Ng Chun Ho , Randy Chu Wai Ping & Jenny Ng Wing Sum

comment: Under restraint throughout; ran on well under his own steam.
comment_ch: 全程扣實，自動肯走

comment: Jumped in rear, remained well behind to straight, kept on   past well-beaten horses.
comment_ch: 出閘後居後列。直路前仍遙居於後。保持走勢，超越已洩氣潰敗的對手。
owner: Sin Tung Hing, Sin Yuk San & Sin Yuk Lok

comment: Slow to begin; then moved forward; limited response in the Straight.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢, 迅即上前, 直路唔多

handicap: THE HONG KONG EXCHANGES CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港交易所挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Broke well, settled 3rd 1 off & keen, ridden 320m, stayed   on.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居第三位，走第二疊，跑來搶口。三百二十米處受催策，保持走勢。
owner: Chan Hak Shing, Dominic Yuen Pui Lam, Adrian Yuen Moon Lam & Chan Hak Yuen

comment: Settled 4Ls off the strong pace in the first half, crept    closer home turn, continued to give chase but couldn't reel in leaders.
comment_ch: 前半程落後步速甚快的領放馬四個馬位。直路彎進佔較接近位置。持續追趕，但未能追近領先馬匹。

comment: Broke well; ran on only fairly.
comment_ch: 起步順利, 但走勢一般
owner: Yeung Kwok Ki & Cheng Kar Shing

comment: Pushed forward to settle in a prominent position with       cover, kept on one pace to the line without any serious     threat.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，居前列，有遮擋。保持同速至終點，未能構成真正威脅。

comment: Up with the pace early; flattened late.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑，末段勁平

handicap: CHEVALIER COLD STORAGE AND LOGISTICS HANDICAP
comment: Pushed forward, benefited by the slow tempo, ran on well    for 3rd.
comment_ch: 受推策上前。步速緩慢，有利發揮。以佳勢上前，跑獲季軍。

comment: Jumped with them, positioned a length behind the leader on  rail, easy run on turn, finished off evenly in straight.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，落後領放馬一個馬位，走內欄。直路彎走勢輕鬆。直路上保持穩勢。

comment: Flattened halfway; dropped back to rear.
comment_ch: 半程洩氣, 墮退而回

comment: Eased early; quickened ok for 2nd when asked.
comment_ch: 早段稍留, 考驗追上

comment: Showed good early pace; just caught.
comment_ch: 速度甚佳, 埋門被過
owner: Mr & Mrs Wong Shun Yuen and Wong Shing Ngai

comment: Under restraint early; ran on fairly well when asked late.
comment_ch: 早段抽實，末段騎落肯走
owner: Alfred Chong Kin Ngai & Jack Chong Chun Kit

comment: Midfield early; quickened ok inside.
comment_ch: 內檔竄上, 姿態輕鬆

comment: Hard ridden early but not muster, trapped 3 wide, suited by the fast tempo, progressed steadily 200M.
comment_ch: 早段受力策，但未能加速，走第三疊。快步速適合發揮。二百米處穩步上前。
owner: Stephen So Chi Ming & Samuel Chan Ying Leung

comment: Pushed forward, pace good, soon emptied 300M.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，步速中等。三百米處瞬即再無餘力。

handicap_ch: 皮亞士紀念挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: No early pace, dropping to last pair in one-off position.   Dropped to last around home turn, taken wide in straight    and finished off nicely to be closest at finish.
comment_ch: 欠缺前速，墮居最後兩位，走第二疊。轉直路彎時墮居包尾位置，直路上走外疊。以佳勢衝刺，過終點時最為接近。
owner: Lillian El-Azar, Karim El-Azar & J A Filmer-Wilson

comment: Limited response when asked in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路推騎，反應平平

comment: Midfield, 4Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow tempo, little dash in final stages.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬四個馬位，沿欄競跑。慢步速不利發揮。末段略為上前。

comment: Always in touch; ran on for 2nd with plenty in hand.
comment_ch: 前後俱備, 大把在手

comment: Led under good pace; kept on well to score.
comment_ch: 速高帶到，一氣呵成

comment: In rear of midfield to straight, came under pressure        turning in, made up good ground under pressure down the     centre of the track.
comment_ch: 入直路前居中間之後位置，入直路時受催策。直路上在跑道中央受催策，追前甚多。
owner: Wong Chung Hin & Arnold Wong Chi Chiu

comment: Moderately away from a wide draw, raced 7 lengths back at   rear, well back on turn, one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘普通，居後列位置，落後七個馬位。直路彎遙居於後，直路上保持同速。
owner: Helena Wai Suk Chong & Cheng Chor Kit

comment: Settled at rear along the rail; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 沿欄落後，表現一般
owner: Philip Liu Chun Hang & Danny Ng Tsz Lung

comment: Urged to lead early; flattened late.
comment_ch: 搶放兩段，拉士勁平

comment: Prominent, raced along the rail 1-1/4L behind the leader,   reduced near 250M.
comment_ch: 居前列，落後領放馬一又四分一個馬位，走內欄。接近二百五十米處時墮退。
owner: Bonnie Chan Yiting, Anthony Derek Lai Shu Yan, Ricky Choy Wing Kay & Dominic Lee Kan Nam

comment: From draw 11 caught 3-wide no cover on midfield, urged      along 500M and moved into contending position top of        straight, led inside 150M and drew readily clear, eased     towards the line.
comment_ch: 自第十一檔出閘後居中間位置，在沒遮擋下走第三疊。五百米處受催策，直路初進佔爭勝位置。一百五十米處取得領先，逐漸帶離對手，接近終點時收慢。

comment: Eased back, at rear 8L behind the leader, 2 wide with       cover, made ground steadily in the straight.
comment_ch: 收慢留居後列，落後領放馬八個馬位，在有遮擋下走第二疊。直路上穩步上前。

comment: Settled at rear; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑，未受考驗

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 4.5Ls behind the leader on the    fence, never ran on and dropped off 250M.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬四個半馬位，走內欄。從未能追前，二百五十米處墮退。

handicap: POK FU LAM PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 薄扶林公眾騎術學校讓賽
comment: Sluggish start, caught 3 wide no cover midfield, pushed 4   wide on turn & hard-ridden 500m, forced even wider into     stretch & found nil.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居中間位置，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。直路彎受催策，走第四疊。五百米處受力策，入直路時被迫移至更外疊，再無餘力。

handicap_ch: 新加坡賽馬公會錦標（讓賽）
comment: Slow start, driven forward to fore of midfield on inner,    ridden into stretch, switched out 350m, outpaced & tapered  in run.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，受催策上前，居中間之前位置，走內疊。入直路時受催策。三百五十米處向外移出，衝刺不及對手，走勢轉弱。
owner: Brandon Lau, Gilda Liu, Gabrielle Liu & Issac Liu

comment: Hit the line strongly when let go late.
comment_ch: 拉士一鬆，加速撲上

comment: Sharp start, bustled to lead 1 off 1030m, 1L clear & to     rail 900m, shaken up 300m, all out & headed 230m, tapered.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。受催策，一千零三十米處取得領先，走第二疊。九百米處帶離一個馬位，移入內欄。三百米處受催策。二百三十米處受力策，但被超越，繼而轉弱。
owner: Lai Kim Wai, Lyon Cheng Lai Fung, Lai Ka Yee & Lai Ka Fung

comment: Settled in last few, finished off race well down the centre of the straight.
comment_ch: 居最後數位。直路上在跑道中央以佳勢衝刺。

comment: Settled midfield under a hold; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 按實居中, 但試來卻不差
owner: Mr & Mrs Lo Chung Yin and Lo Chin Pang

comment: Hit the front at 300m; won comfortably.
comment_ch: 三百透出, 有餘未盡

comment: Began awkwardly, shifted in an bumped. Ridden to make up    ground but wide, got within striking distance 200m before   tiring. Bled for third time.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，向內斜跑，碰撞他駒。受催策追前，走外疊。二百米處落後領放馬不遠，其後呈現疲態。第三次流鼻血。
owner: Ken Leung Woon Kin & Leung Kwun

comment: Pushed forward to take the rail and led, out of steam and   faded passing 300M.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，切入內欄領放。跑過三百米處時洩氣力竭。

comment: Began well from inside draw, never far off from leaders,    switched out from fence near top of straight but held up    until 200M, ran on same pace when clear.
comment_ch: 自最內檔出閘迅速，從未遠離領先馬匹。接近直路初時移離內欄，但受困至二百米處，望空後保持同速。

comment: Made ground at turn; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 彎位湧一湧, 拉士按番住

comment: Made minor progress when under whip in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路開鞭, 追番多少

comment: Raced handy; gave limited response when asked.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑, 騎落唔多
owner: Lee Yuen Fat & Ng Kam Ming

comment: Lacked toe & bustled to race back of midfield 3 wide with   cover, overraced 600m, driven very wide final turn, rattled centre, just failed.
comment_ch: 缺乏前速，受催策，居中間之後位置，在有遮擋下走第三疊。六百米處跑來搶口。直路彎受催策，走大外疊。直路上在跑道中央以勁勢衝刺，僅敗。
owner: Mr & Mrs Leung Lun, Paul Leung Yuk Hung and Kenneth Leung Yuk Wai

comment: Made minor inroads when being hard ridden and under whip late.
comment_ch: 拉士又推又打，稍騎上前

comment: Used the low draw to gain narrow advantage on rails after a moderate start, held lead to the 150 metres, folded up      quickly. (Blood in trachea)
comment_ch: 出閘普通，其後善用內檔之利以短距離領先，走內欄。一百五十米處前保持領先，迅速力竭。（氣管內有血。）

comment: Settled midfield; in traffic momentarily.
comment_ch: 居中跟跑，一度受困
owner: Chadwick Mok Cham Hung, Wong Wing Hong & Wilson Lam Jing Shing

comment: Shifted in from wide draw but no pace and soon at rear away from fence. Found nothing when asked in straight.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘，向內移入，但缺乏前速，瞬即居後列，離欄競跑。直路上受催策時再無餘力。

comment: Raced wide throughout; ridden out for 2nd.
comment_ch: 全程外叠, 推騎入位

comment: Broke well, bustled to press lead 3 wide, rolled on to lead 1130m & berthed 1 off, 1L clear &to rail 750m, driven       turning in, all out & headed 340m, faded out.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策，追迫領放馬，走第三疊。一千一百三十米處上前領先，走第二疊。七百五十米處領先一個馬位，切入內欄。入直路時受催策，三百四十米處受力策，被超越。末段力竭。

comment: Camped handy, travelled 3Ls behind the leader 2 wide with   cover, ran on strongly to miss by only a nose in a tight    finish.
comment_ch: 居前列，落後領放馬三個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。走勢強勁，在多駒幾乎齊過終點下僅以一馬鼻位之差落敗。

comment: Four wide at turn; quickened for 2nd.
comment_ch: 四疊轉彎, 加速第二

comment: Trapped 3 wide in front of midfield, held ground in         straight.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，走第三疊。直路上保持位置。

comment: Started ok, unable to slot & raced 3 wide no cover near     rear, gained cover 850m, shifted wider & driven turning in, plugged on moderately.
