comment_ch: 出閘普通，未能切入內疊，走第三疊，沒有遮擋，居接近後列位置。八百五十米處取得遮擋。入直路時受催策並移出更外疊，其後走勢普通。

handicap: CHEVALIER COLD STORAGE AND LOGISTICS HANDICAP
comment: At back, not suited by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
comment_ch: 居後列。步速緩慢，不合發揮。二百米處略為上前。
owner: Kathy Lo Ho Hsiu Lan & Paul Lo Chung Wai

comment: Taken back to midfield from wide gate & trapped 4 wide no   cover, advanced 820m to sit handy 3 deep, driven 380m,      found nil & faded weakly.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後留居中間位置，走第四疊，沒有遮擋。八百二十米處上前，居有利位置，走第三疊。三百八十米處受催策。再無餘力，力竭轉弱。

handicap: TUEN MUN PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 屯門公眾騎術學校讓賽
comment: At the start bumped and became unbalanced, after that was   buffeted for some distance, raced behind midfield, after    800M commenced to improved and travelled wide and without   cover, finished solidly.
comment_ch: 起步時碰撞他駒並失去平衡，其後在一段途程上受擠碰，居中間之後位置。跑過八百米處後開始推進，在沒有遮擋下走外疊。末段衝刺強勁。

comment: Raced awkwardly; never in contention.
comment_ch: 走勢欠暢順, 從未參予競逐

comment: Jumped slowly, at rear throughout, never ran on.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，沿途居後列。從未能追前。

comment: Taken back to race 6 lengths back at rear, there to turn,   made minor progress in straight, never a threat to the      first few.
comment_ch: 收慢留居後列，落後六個馬位。直路彎前居相同位置。直路上略為追前。從未能威脅頭數名馬匹。
owner: Sir Po-shing & Lady Woo, Jackson Woo Ka Biu, Dawson Woo Ka Chung and The Executors of the Estate of

comment: Quickened to run 3rd; ran on nicely.
comment_ch: 加速入位，表現純熟
owner: Charles Tung Chung Ho, Ronald Tung Pit Shing & Tung Pit Ching

comment: Speedy start, settled 1 back on rail, 4th & shuffled to 2   back 700m, ridden into stretch, lacked toe, tapered in run  home.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。居第四位，落後一個馬位，走內欄。七百米處落後兩個馬位。入直路時受催策。未能加速，末段轉弱。

comment: Settled in box seat, benefited by the slow sectionals,      closed off strongly 300M to score.
comment_ch: 居包廂位置，慢步速有利發揮，三百米處衝刺強勁，勝出賽事。

comment: Taken back from a wide draw, raced 9 lengths back at rear,  still 6 to 7 lengths back on turn, kept to inside after     straightening, finished off evenly.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，留居後列，落後九個馬位。轉彎時仍落後六至七個馬位。入直路後走內疊，走勢平穩。

comment: Always in touch; ran on nicely to score.
comment_ch: 有前有後，體力充沛

comment: Not willing to stretch when under whip early.
comment_ch: 一早開鞭，唔多肯走

comment: Moderately away from a wide draw, unable to slot in, raced  wide and without cover throughout, emptied early in         straight when hard run took toll.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘普通，未能切入內疊。沿途在沒遮擋下走外疊。耗力太多，直路初已力竭。

comment: Cut across and lead; just caught.
comment_ch: 望空切入, 拉士被過

comment: Urged forward and led by 1-1/4L until 700M, weakened near   250M.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，領先一又四分一個馬位直至七百米處。接近二百五十米處時轉弱。

comment: Settled midfield; under a hold in the Straight.
comment_ch: 居中跟跑，直路按住

comment: At rear throughout, never a factor.
comment_ch: 沿途居後列，從未有力一爭。
owner: Michael Lam King Poy, Ernest Lam Jen Ho & Christopher Lam Jen Toa

comment: Began well but took time to muster, gradually edging into   box seat back stretch. Revved up on straightening but       unable to catch leader.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，但加速需時。對面直路上漸居包廂位置。入直路時加速，但未能追及頭馬。

comment: Found nothing when under whip in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路開鞭, 反應平常

comment: Awkward & slow at break, settled rail near rear, 5L back &  driven into stretch, closed off for late gains.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙及緩慢，沿欄居後列。入直路時落後五個馬位，受催策。末段追前。
owner: Mr & Mrs Lee Bing Kwong and Michael Lee Chak Hol

comment: Always in touch; fought on gamely for 2nd.
comment_ch: 有前有後，力拼第二
owner: Mr & Mrs Tam Kwok Chu and Thomas Tam Wing Yiu

comment: Slow to begin; made up good ground late.
comment_ch: 起步最慢, 拉士追回甚多
owner: Matthew C M Yum, Christopher Carson Yum, Nicholas Kevin Yum & Stephanie Carrie Yum

comment: Ridden early settling in one-off position three-back from   leader. Lost position around turn, gave ground gradually in straight.
comment_ch: 早段受催策，居領放馬三個馬位之後的位置，走第二疊。轉直路彎時失位。直路上逐漸墮退。
owner: Chan Wai Nam & Ian Chan Yau Nam

comment: Settled at rear; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑, 騎落一般

comment: Overcame wide barrier to lead without making too much early use, travelled smoothly to straight, kept finding final     200M and held on safely.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後領先，早段未受力策。入直路前走勢暢順，最後二百米持續力拼，保住冠軍。
owner: Dr Philip Ho Kin Hoi, Dr Ernest Yau Hok Shing & Dr Joseph Pang Yeuk She

comment: Eased to rear for cover, 2 wide, lack room 4-2, dashed well when clear despite not suited by the slow pace.
comment_ch: 收慢留居後列以取得遮擋，走第二疊。自四百米處至二百米處缺乏空位。儘管慢步速不合發揮，望空後衝刺強勁。

handicap: THE EBENEZER SCHOOL & HOME FOR THE VISUALLY IMPAIRED 120TH ANNIVERSARY CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 心光盲人院暨學校１２０週年紀念盃（讓賽）
comment: Taken back shortly after start to obtain cover, pushed      along passing 500m, awkward home turn and ran home well,    hampered at 200m.
comment_ch: 起步後不久留後取得遮擋。跑過五百米處時受推策。直路彎走勢笨拙。直路上衝刺甚佳，二百米處受阻礙。
owner: Billy Albert Kan Che Kin & Benjamin Kan Yiu Chung

comment: Dropped back early from the wide draw to sit towards the    rear of the field. Ridden for luck from the top of the      straight, and progressed strongly late.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，早段墮居後列。直路初伺機而動。末段以勁勢追前。
owner: Wong Chung Hin & Arnold Wong Chi Chiu

comment: Jumped with field, eased back, settling one-out behind      midfield 800m. Dropped back and caught three-wide pace      quickened 600m. Switched out wider in straight and ran on   steadily.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，收慢留後，八百米處居中間之後位置，走第二疊。六百米處步速加快時墮退，走第三疊。直路上移出更外疊，保持穩勢。
owner: Timmy Chan Tien Kay & Jamson Chan Wing Chai

comment: Limited response when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路推騎，反應平常

comment: Taken forward early to be handily placed in 3rd, 1 off the  fence. Progressed solidly to the line and held off 2nd      place challengers, but no match for winner.
comment_ch: 早段上前，居前列第三位，走第二疊。以勁勢上前至終點，力拒對手的挑戰，跑獲亞軍，但不敵頭馬。

comment: Settled midfield; ran on ok.
comment_ch: 居中跟跑, 但走勢不弱

comment: Ran on ordinary when being asked late.
comment_ch: 末段要騎, 反應麻麻
owner: Elseda Shum Mei Chu, Professor Hextan Ngan Yuen Sheung, Chu Kwong Por & Andrew Shuen Pak Man

comment: Ran on well for 2nd comfortably.
comment_ch: 從容第二，毫不費力

comment: Restrained on jumping and shifted across behind runners,    settling last. Began forward move 700m, loomed 300m, run    ended close home.
comment_ch: 出閘後受約束，在馬群之後切入，居包尾位置。七百米處開始上前，三百米處似具威脅，接近終點時無以為繼。

comment: Inconvenienced start, raced at rear throughout, never       competitive. (See Racing Incidents.)
comment_ch: 起步時受妨礙，沿途居後列。從未有力一爭。（見競賽事件報告。）
owner: Ho Sau Ki & Tommy Ho Chung Shing

comment: Bumped start, ridden to get forward position but found a    few others faster and forced to race wide without cover at  midfield. Put under pressure 300m but found nothing and     faded.
comment_ch: 出閘時被碰撞。受催策以佔取前列位置，但因數匹對手的速度更快而被迫居中間位置，在沒有遮擋下走外疊。三百米處受催策，但再無餘力，並且力竭。

comment: Finished last; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 包尾而回，未見佳處
owner: Albert Hung Chao Hong & Stephanie Hung Yujie

comment: Jumped fairly; shifted out in the Straight; raced under his own steam.
comment_ch: 出閘一般, 直路移出, 按住順走

comment: Midfield throughout; ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 全程居中, 表現尚可

comment: Hard ridden along to settle in midfield, harmed by the slow pace, kept on one pace and weakened 150M.
comment_ch: 受力策，居中間位置。慢步速不利發揮，保持同速，一百五十米處轉弱。

comment: Limited response when asked at turn.
comment_ch: 轉彎已騎, 反應平常
owner: Jameson Leung Tai Lin & Rene Leung Yan Ting

comment: Began well, not pushed, settling behind midfield in one-off position. Checked 900m, swung wide into straight, closed    off strongly down centre track to finish a close third.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，未受推策，居中間之後位置，走第二疊。九百米處勒避，入直路時移出外疊。在跑道中央衝刺強勁，奪得季軍。
owner: Chan Hak Shing, Dominic Yuen Pui Lam, Adrian Yuen Moon Lam & Chan Hak Yuen

comment: Began ordinary; then moved forward; weakened in the Straight.
comment_ch: 起步一般，迅即上前，直路腳軟

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, not suited by the slow pace, never ran on and        weakened 300M.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬三個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。慢步速不合發揮，從未能上前。三百米處轉弱。

comment: Quickened to score when shifted out late.
comment_ch: 拉士移出, 加速上前

comment: Made progress saving ground; ran on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 慳位追上, 表現甚佳

comment: Under restraint early; ran on well to score when asked at 200m.
comment_ch: 早段捉到實, 二百輕鬆趕過

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, dashed home nicely to get 2nd, missed by a neck.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬四個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。衝刺良佳，取得亞軍，以一馬頸位之差落敗。
owner: Charles Tung Chung Ho, Ronald Tung Pit Shing & Tung Pit Ching

comment: Pressed forward from outside draw, taking first turn 4-wide before settling 3-wide 2L from leader back stretch. Rolled  forward final turn, gradually forged forward under vigorous riding to score narrowly.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，受催策上前，首次轉彎時走第四疊，對面直路上落後領放馬兩個馬位，走第三疊。直路彎上前，在力策下逐漸推進，以短距離險勝。

comment: Slow to begin; made progress by saving ground.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，慳位追趕

comment: Smart start, raced 1 back 1 off, shifted out & driven in    3rd 420m, boxed on in pursuit, tapered closing stages.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，落後領放馬一個馬位，走第二疊。四百二十米處移出外疊及受催策，居第三位。持續力拼，末段轉弱。
owner: Au Kai Kwong & Michelle Jessica Au

comment: Settled in midfield, 4-1/4L behind the leader 2 wide with   cover, not suited to the fast tempo, remained one-paced to  the line.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬四又四分一個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。步速甚快，不合發揮。保持同速至終點。

comment: Ran on rails, strove for 2nd
comment_ch: 沿欄帶放, 力拼第二

comment: Good break, raced rail midfield, niggled 1100m & never      settled, under pump 500m, outpaced & struggled.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，沿欄居中間位置。千一米處受催策，從未能穩定走勢。五百米處受催策，被拋離，掙扎上前。

comment: Pushed forward and shared lead on the rail, bumped a runner heavily at 250M, dropped off from 200M.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，並排領先，走內欄。二百五十米處大力碰撞對手。自二百米處起墮退。

comment: Jumped well, eased, settled beyond midfield 4 deep limited  cover, ridden 400m, faded tamely.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，收慢，居中間之後位置，走第四疊，略有遮擋。四百米處受催策，力竭墮退。

comment: Under restraint early; dashed on well to score when asked late.
comment_ch: 早段撐實，拉士一騎即有
owner: Ngan Pui Ying & Ngan Ng Yu Ying

comment: Slightly slow out, difficult to settle near 900M,           positioned 2 wide in 5th throughout, finished off evenly in straight to make frame.
comment_ch: 出閘略為緩慢。接近九百米處時難以穩定走勢。沿途走第二疊，居第五位。直路上穩步衝刺，跑獲殿軍。

comment: Taken back after smart start, raced on inner behind         midfield, niggled 500m & shifted out, driven 420m, wide     into stretch, closed off centre track to nick 3rd late.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，留居中間之後位置，走內疊。五百米處受催策，向外移出。四百二十米處再受催策。入直路時走外疊。末段在跑道中央衝刺，跑獲季軍。

comment: Moderate start, trapped 4 wide no cover initially, soon 3   wide no cover behind midfield, wide into stretch, ridden    250m, found little in even run home.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，早段在沒遮擋下走第四疊，瞬即居中間之後位置，在沒遮擋下走第三疊。入直路時走外疊。二百五十米處受催策，無甚餘力，走勢一般。
owner: Michael Lau Chor Chiu & Steve Lau Tsz Chung

comment: Never far off in 5th, 3Ls off leader as they settled down,  ran on only fairly inside 300M, never a serious threat.
comment_ch: 居第五位，從未遠離領放馬。步速減慢時落後領放馬三個馬位。最後三百米走勢僅屬普通，從未能構成真正威脅。

comment: Outpaced & rousted early, raced rail behind midfield,       niggled 450m, fanned out & driven final turn, kept on for   minor headway.
comment_ch: 早段未能跟上步速，受催策，沿欄居中間之後位置。四百五十米處受催策。直路彎移出外疊，受催策。保持走勢，略為追前。

comment: Under restraint at turn; limited response when asked.
comment_ch: 轉彎撐實, 末段騎落唔多

handicap: HKU FACULTIES OF LAW AND SOCIAL SCIENCES HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 港大法律學院與社會科學學院讓賽
comment: Raced prominently, 2-1/4L behind the leader, drifted away   at 200M and kept challenging to the wire.
comment_ch: 居前列，落後領放馬二又四分一個馬位。二百米處斜跑，持續挑戰頭馬至終點。

comment: Hard ridden forward, sat 2 wide, harmed by the fast pace,   emptied 300M.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，走第二疊。快步速不利發揮。三百米處再無餘力。

comment: Ridden forward to share the lead, dropped off rapidly 300M.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，並排領先。三百米處迅速墮退。

comment: Hard ridden forward, sat 2 wide, harmed by the fast pace,   ran on until 200M flattened.
comment_ch: 受力策上前，走第二疊。快步速不利發揮。持續上前，二百米處洩氣。

comment: Settled midfield; kept on ok.
comment_ch: 不上不落，保持走勢

comment: Quickly into stride, led to first turn before easing off    and following new leader. Shaken up 400m, hit front 300m,   kept on well till swamped final stages.
comment_ch: 展步迅速。首次轉彎前領放。其後收慢跟隨新領放馬。四百米處受催策。三百米處取得領先。保持佳勢，末段被超越。

comment: Began well, eased to settle beyond midfield 4 deep no       cover, back to 3 deep with cover 650m, widest into straight and ridden, stayed on.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，收慢，居中間之後位置，走第四疊，沒有遮擋。六百五十米處走第三疊，有遮擋。入直路時受催策，走最外疊，保持走勢。

comment: Bumped start, pressed forward holding rail 3L from leader.  Checked turning into straight, blocked for run 200m and not tested until after passing 150m, kept on fairly.
comment_ch: 出閘時碰撞他駒，受催策上前固守內欄，落後領放馬三個馬位。轉入直路時勒避。二百米處受困，未能全力施為直至跑過一百五十米處。保持一般走勢。

comment: Niggled along throughout, never a factor.
comment_ch: 沿途受催策，從未構成威脅。

comment: Got off OK, taken to fence, settling behind midfield.       Stayed on fence throughout and one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，移入內欄，居中間之後位置。沿途固守內欄。直路上保持同速。

comment: Ran on ordinary; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 走勢平常，未見佳處

comment: Hit the front at 200m to score; moved better than before.
comment_ch: 二百透出, 表現進步

comment: Moderate break, rousted & soon prominent 1 off no cover,    snagged to 1 off 1 back 1000m, niggled 500m, driven 4 wide  into stretch, boxed on dourly.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策上前，瞬即居前列，走第二疊，沒有遮擋。一千米處落後一個馬位，走第二疊。五百米處受催策，入直路時走第四疊，持續力拼。

comment: Pushed to sit in midfield, 2 wide, favoured by the fast     tempo, ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 受推策，居中間位置，走第二疊。步速甚快，有利發揮。走勢一般。
owner: Mr & Mrs Mark Fong Chung and Matthew Fong

comment: Tardy start; under a hold in the Straight.
comment_ch: 起步麻麻, 直路捉到實
owner: Mr & Mrs Andrew Wong Kwok Kin

comment: Failed to muster despite hard ridden along, taken back to   settle 4Ls off the leader 3 wide with cover, not suited by  the very slow sectionals, never ran on.
comment_ch: 受力策，但未能加速。留居後列，落後領放馬四個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。步速十分緩慢，不合發揮。未能保持走勢。

comment: Led early; kept on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 沿途帶放，表現從容
owner: Edward Chan Kwok Man & Karen Chan Ka Yin

handicap: THE HOPEFUL FUTURE FOR YOUTH HANDICAP
comment: First out, led to 1150m before taking sit, 2L behind        leader. Shifted out on straightening but found little under hard riding and faded final 200m. Unacceptable performance.
comment_ch: 出閘最快。領先至一千一百五十米處，繼而居領放馬之後，落後兩個馬位。入直路時向外移出，但在力策下再無餘力，最後二百米力竭。表現難以接受。

comment: Camped midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide     with cover, despite the slow sectionals, ran home well for  3rd.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬四個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。儘管步速緩慢，衝刺良佳，跑獲季軍。

comment: Broke well but no early toe, dropping behind midfield but   wide. Began long forward move 1200m to race outside         hindquarters of leader 600m. Shaken up 400m, hit front      250m, pulled clear.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，缺乏前速。墮居中間之後位置，走外疊。千二米處開始上前，六百米處居領放馬後軀外側。四百米處受催策。二百五十米處取得領先，帶離勝出。
owner: William Ching Hon Kuen & Raymond Ching Wei Man

comment: Pressed forward, racing 3-wide before settling in one-off   position 2L from leader. Urged forward top of straight but  flattened 150m and faded.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，走第三疊，其後走第二疊，落後領放馬兩個馬位。直路初受催策上前，但一百五十米處轉弱，繼而力竭。

comment: Sat one off and one behind the leader, not suited to the    quick tempo, hung on until 150M weakened.
comment_ch: 落後領放馬一個馬位，走第二疊。快步速不合發揮，保持走勢，一百五十米處轉弱。
owner: Ho Tze Man, Simon Chau Sik Ming, Ralph Hui Shu Tong & Wilson Ng Ching Hung

comment: Eased to rear, too rail, favoured by the fast tempo,        improved nicely from 400M, finished off strongly to score.
comment_ch: 收慢留居後列，移入內欄。步速甚快，有利發揮。自四百米處起以佳勢上前。末段衝刺強勁，取得勝利。

comment: Under a hold to settle at rear; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 拖住居後, 未受考驗

comment: Pushed hard early from wide gate to settle outside leader,  issued challenge passing 400m, tried hard before weakening  late.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘。早段受大力推策，居領放馬外側。跑過四百米處時展開挑戰。持續力拼，末段轉弱。
owner: Wu Kai Char & Wu Wai Chor

comment: Led in fast pace; weakened badly in the Straight.
comment_ch: 放得太急, 直路散晒

comment: Always in touch; won well.
comment_ch: 有前有後, 姿態俐落

comment: Quickened strongly to win under urge at 200m.
comment_ch: 二百稍騎，奮力撲上

comment: Settled about 2Ls behind the leader in the middle of the    track, found nothing when placed under pressure.
comment_ch: 約居領放馬兩個馬位之後的位置，在跑道中央競跑。受催策，但再無餘力。

comment: Taken up early, before easing back slightly to be 4th/5th,  1 off the fence. Ran solidly in the straight to hold a      clear 3rd, but no hope of getting the first 2.
comment_ch: 早段上前，其後略為收慢，居第四至第五位，走第二疊。直路上走勢強勁，居第三位，帶離餘駒，但未能追上冠亞軍馬匹。

comment: Asked at turn; under whip in the Straight.
comment_ch: 轉彎推騎，直路開鞭

comment: Niggled along throughout, never looked likely.
comment_ch: 全程受催策，但從未看似有力一爭。

handicap_ch: 新加坡賽馬公會錦標（讓賽）
comment: Started well, restrained to 3 wide with cover midfield,     driven into stretch, closed centre track until flattened    out final 100m.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受約束居中間位置，走第三疊，有遮擋。入直路時受催策。在跑道中央追前，一百米處洩氣。
owner: Rotary Club of Sha Tin Syndicate

comment: Ridden positively from a wide draw, took up running on      rails after straightening onto back straight, led the field until joined rounding home bend, headed into straight and   weakened.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受積極催策，入對面直路後沿欄帶頭。領先至轉直路彎時被追上，入直路時被超越，轉弱。

comment: Tardy start; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 起步麻麻，試來卻含蓄

comment: Ran on fairly for 3rd when asked.
comment_ch: 騎住第三, 不過不失

comment: Prominent early but checked, sat midfield, 3Ls off the      leaders along the fence, not suited by the slow tempo,      flattened in straight.
comment_ch: 早段居前列位置但勒避，其後居中間位置，落後領放馬匹三個馬位，沿欄競走。慢步速不合發揮，直路上洩氣。

comment: Very awkward away, at rear, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 100M.
comment_ch: 出閘十分笨拙，居後列。步速緩慢，不利發揮。一百米處略為上前。

comment: Urged throughout; failed to quicken.
comment_ch: 沿途俾住，未見加速

comment: Sent forward vying for lead on the inside, set good pace,   kept on well early straight and kicked 2L clear 200M,       caught by first 2 inside 100M, weakened but held on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，爭奪領先，以中等步速領放，走內疊。直路初走勢良佳，二百米處帶離兩個馬位。最後一百米被首兩名馬匹追上，轉弱，但仍保住季軍。

comment: Well there, hit the front 600 metres out, laying in off the stands rail when headed at the 400 metres, fought on dourly to assert authority final strides.
comment_ch: 居好位。六百米處取得領先。四百米處被超越時內閃離開外欄。奮起力拼，最後數步取得領先。
owner: Gary Ling Kay Wai & Ling Chiu Shing

comment: Broke ok and bustled to race handy 3 deep with cover,       slipped back to midfield & niggled 600m, very wide turning  in, driven 300m, plugged on tamely.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策，居前列，走第三疊，有遮擋。六百米處墮居中間位置，受催策。入直路時走大外疊。三百米處受催策，走勢疲乏。

comment: Settled in last few to straight, improving when baulked     twice at 200 and 150 metres out, no further impression.
comment_ch: 直路前居後列。推進上前，二百米處及一百五十米處兩度受阻，其後再無表現。
owner: Elseda Shum Mei Chu, Professor Hextan Ngan Yuen Sheung, Chu Kwong Por & Andrew Shuen Pak Man

comment: First to jump; under a hold in the Straight.
comment_ch: 出閘最快, 直路按返

handicap: HKU FACULTIES OF BUSINESS & ECONOMICS AND SCIENCE HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 港大經濟及工商管理學院與理學院讓賽
comment: Raced midfield, travelled 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, one paced to the line.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬六個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。保持同速至終點。
owner: William Ching Hon Kuen & Raymond Ching Wei Man

comment: Began fairly, ridden but didn't muster, dropping to rear.   Struggled to hold position from 500m, one-paced. Rider      reported was never comfortable.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，受催策但未能加速，墮居後列。自五百米處起掙扎以保持位置，保持同速。騎師報告坐騎走勢全程欠順。

comment: Pressed forward but unable match early leader, settling 3L  second in one-off position. Kept on steadily to straight    before giving ground steadily.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，但早段未能追上領放馬，居第二位，落後三個馬位，走第二疊。直路前保持穩勢，其後逐漸墮退。
owner: Dr Carl Leung Ka Kui, Paulo Sam, Henry Sam Chien Man & Chow Hong

comment: Bumped soon after start, ridden to hold fence behind leader to straight, then one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘後不久被碰撞，直路前受催策固守內欄，居領放馬之後位置，其後保持同速。

comment: Quickly into stride, led from 1200M at a well-handled pace, pressed by rival 500M, continued on well in the lead but    ended near 50M, weakened into 4th near line.
comment_ch: 展步迅速，自千二米處起以穩妥步速領放。五百米處受對手追迫，以佳勢保持領先，接近五十米處被超越，轉弱，接近終點時墮居第四。
owner: Joseph Choi Yip Leung & Choi Fong Hon Mei

comment: Held up 3-wide behind midfield, 5Ls to make up on leader    400M, kept on fairly to line only holding his position.
comment_ch: 留居中間之後位置，走第三疊。四百米處落後領放馬五個馬位。保持一般走勢至終點，僅保位置。

comment: Sluggish & bumped start, bustled initially to race 2nd last , ridden 550m, 8L back & shifted widest into stretch, solid closer to claim 4th.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢及被碰撞。起初受催策，居尾二位置。五百五十米處受催策。入直路時落後八個馬位，移出最外疊，追前甚多，跑獲殿軍。

comment: Started well, parked 3 deep no cover 3rd & overraced, given its head 800m to lead 700m, headed 420m & faded.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。居第三位，走第三疊，沒有遮擋，跑來搶口。八百米處獲許上前，七百米處取得領先。四百二十米處被超越，繼而力竭。

comment: Found nothing when asked; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 又推又打, 未見佳處

comment: Sat towards the rear along the rail, 6-3/4L behind the      pace, not competitive.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬六又四分三個馬位，走內欄。從未見具競爭力。

comment: Slow to begin; made progress steadily.
comment_ch: 起步稍慢，逐步追趕

comment: Quickened coming down the Rock; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 落山發力，拉士按番住
owner: Fung Wing Chung, Kenneth Fung King Keung, Patrick Fung King Hung & Monica Fung Mun Sin

comment: Smart start, raced handy but exposed until gained cover 1   off 1 back 1200m, niggled 650m, under pump 500m, 4 wide     turning in, kept on doggedly until faded close home.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居前列，但沒有遮擋。千二米處取得遮擋，走第二疊，落後領放馬一個馬位。六百五十米處及五百米處受催策。入直路時走第四疊，持續力拼。接近終點時力竭。

comment: Not quickened when under whip late.
comment_ch: 拉士開鞭，未見加速

comment: Settled midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader on the    fence, dashed well to score by a short head.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬四個馬位，走內欄。末段衝刺甚佳，以短馬頭位之先勝出。
owner: Chan Kam Hung & Alan Chan Kin On

comment: Missed break, hung out rounding the Home Bend, never looked likely.
comment_ch: 漏閘，轉直路彎時外閃。從未看似有力一爭。

comment: Broke ok & raced handily initially, soon eased to midfield  1 off with cover, niggled 800m, driven 350m, boxed on       evenly.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，早段居有利位置。瞬即收慢至中間位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。八百米處受催策，三百五十米處再受催策，保持穩勢。
owner: Mr & Mrs Li Yiu Keung and Clement Li

comment: Settled 2 back in 4th, gained slightly closer near the      Rock, badly hampered by faller on home turn, never          recovered. (Lame next day)
comment_ch: 居第四位，落後領放馬兩個馬位。接近大石鼓處時略為追近。直路彎被跌倒的馬匹嚴重阻礙，其後從未能恢復走勢。（賽後翌日不良於行。）

comment: Out quickly but restrained and taken to fence 4L from       leader. Came off fence in straight to make challenge but    only one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，但受約束，移入內欄，落後領放馬四個馬位。直路上移離內欄，展開挑戰，但僅能保持同速。
owner: Mr & Mrs James Tien Pei Chun

comment: Quickened for 3rd when asked.
comment_ch: 輕騎兩步, 加速入位

comment: Beaten for pace early pace then lay out approaching first   turn, dropping back towards rear. Dropped to last turning   for home, one-paced.
comment_ch: 缺乏前速，趨近首個彎位時外閃，墮居後列。直路彎墮居包尾位置，保持同速。

comment: Bumped at start; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 起步受碰, 走勢平常

comment: Showed early speed; going all directions in the Straight.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢, 但直路走勢欠規矩

comment: Prominent, 1-1/2L behind the leader, 2 wide with cover.     Benefited by the slow tempo, ran home one paced until       weakened in the final stages.
comment_ch: 居前列，落後領放馬一個半馬位，在有遮擋下走第二疊。步速緩慢，有利發揮。直路上保持同速，末段轉弱。
owner: Dr Daniel Lee Tin Chak, Daisy Ho Chiu Fung, Pansy Ho Chiu King & Maisy Ho Chiu Ha

comment: Pressed forward, not suited by the fast pace, raced close   to the inner part of track, dropped off rapidly 250M.
comment_ch: 受催策上前。步速甚快，不合發揮。靠近內疊競跑，二百五十米處迅速墮退。

comment: Travelled at rear along the rail, 4L off the pace, harmed   by the slow tempo, made steady ground after straightening.
comment_ch: 居後列，落後領放馬四個馬位，走內欄。步速緩慢，不利發揮，入直路後穩步上前。

comment: Tardy start; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 起步一般，走勢平常

comment: On pace early; kept on one-paced late.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢，拉士保持同速
owner: Philip Yu Chi Wai & Dr Jennie Hope Peterson

comment: Got its feet up on jumping; ridden along throughout; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 出閘起擒, 騎足全程, 未有好感
owner: Tony Ng Fung Sing & Michael Ling Siu Ming

comment: Ran on ordinary when asked coming down the Rock.
comment_ch: 落山已騎，走勢平常

comment: Eased to rear, trapped very wide, harmed by the slow pace,  never improved.
comment_ch: 收慢留居後列位置，走大外疊。慢步速不利發揮，從未能上前。

comment: Began moderately; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，走勢乏力

comment: Hard ridden from inside draw to hold rail position,         two-back from leader. Hard ridden turning for home, hung in under pressure in straight, giving ground.
comment_ch: 自內檔出閘後受力策，落後領放馬兩個馬位，固守內欄。直路彎受力策，直路上在催策下內閃，繼而墮退。
owner: Chan Wing Kwan, Chang Wing Yiu & Cheung Kwok Wa

comment: Sat 3-wide no cover in midfield, moved into contention      550M, ran on same pace entering straight, out of contention 250M.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。五百五十米處發力上前。入直路時保持同速。二百五十米處再無爭勝機會。

comment: Eased to sit in midfield, 2 wide, demonstrated strong       finishing efforts 250M despite not suited by the very slow  pace.
comment_ch: 收慢留居中間位置，走第二疊。步速十分緩慢，不合發揮，但二百五十米處仍以勁勢衝刺。

comment: Lost a considerable amount of ground at the start, trailed  the field to the Rock before circling them around home      bend, sustained progress down the centre of the straight,   nearest at finish.
comment_ch: 起步時失地甚多。尾隨馬群至大石鼓處，直路彎繞過馬群上前。直路上在跑道中央持續上前，過終點時最為接近。

comment: Settled just worse than midfield, tight between runners     early in straight, produced good late impression inside the final 200 metres.
comment_ch: 居中間稍後位置。直路初在馬匹之間受緊迫，最後二百米追前甚多。

comment: Cut across in the straight; made progress steadily to run 3rd.
comment_ch: 直路切入，逐步加快，闖入一席

comment: Made ground centre of track; ran on well to score.
comment_ch: 中檔竄上，表現吸引

comment: Shifted out in the straight; made progress under whip.
comment_ch: 直路移出, 鞭騎追近
owner: Mr & Mrs Lee Man Bing, Lee Siu Fung and Mic Lee Wing Lun

comment: Eased back at start from wide gate to settle towards rear,  kept to rail home turn, eased out for clear running at 300m and ran home nicely.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後收慢，留居後列。直路彎固守內欄。三百米處向外移出以望空，末段衝刺良佳。
owner: Mr & Mrs Hans Michael Jebsen and Eddie Hui Ki Bun

comment: Ridden forward to park outside the leader, enjoyed the slow tempo, kept on strongly to get 2nd.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，居領放馬外側。步速緩慢，有利發揮。保持勁勢，跑獲亞軍。

comment: Away well, pressed forward, settling one-out 3L from        leader. Given more rein passing 700m, got clear run top of  straight, hit front 150m, battled but unable hold off first two final strides.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前，落後領放馬三個馬位，走第二疊。跑過七百米處時騎師放長韁繩。直路初望空，一百五十米處帶頭，力拼，但最後數步不敵前兩名馬匹。

comment: Pushed forward to share the lead, 2 wide, clocked fast      sectionals, soon emptied 250M.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，以快步速並排領先，走第二疊。二百五十米處瞬即力竭。

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, not suited by the very slow tempo, made no           impression in straight.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬三個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。步速十分緩慢，不合發揮。直路上毫無表現。

comment: Outpaced early, dropping to last along rail. Switched out   turning for home, hard ridden from 350m but only one-paced.
comment_ch: 早段被拋離，墮居包尾位置，走內欄。轉直路彎時向外移出。自三百五十米處起受力策，但僅能保持同速。

comment: Sent forward and raced on pace, tried hard entire straight  but no match for winner.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，跟隨領放馬。直路上全程受力策，但不敵頭馬。

comment: Began well and punched forward early to lead, before being  crossed at 1000m and settling 4th. Pushed from the 400m,    but never responded, and dropped back quickly before easing late.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速。早段受催策上前帶頭，一千米處被超越，居第四位。自四百米處起受推策，但毫無反應。末段迅速墮退，繼而收慢。
owner: Philip Ma King Huen & Bankee Kwan Pak Hoo

comment: Flattened halfway; weakened and dropped back.
comment_ch: 半程洩氣, 急劇墮退
owner: Queenie Siu Fung Kou & Lau Kwok Man

comment: Flattened halfway; dropped back to rear.
comment_ch: 半程洩氣, 直路墮退
owner: Tony Lau Hon Kwan, Dominic Lai, David Poon Cheung Fung & Alfred Ronald Li Kwok Lung

comment: Ridden out at home turn; ran on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 轉彎推騎，闖入一席
owner: Jose Yu Sun Say & Yu Wah Yung

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, made no impression in straight.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬三個馬位，在有遮擋下走第二疊。直路上毫無表現。

comment: Slow into strides early; shifted out in the straight; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 早段落腳慢，直路移出，衝刺不弱

handicap: LEI YUE MUN PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 鯉魚門公眾騎術學校讓賽
comment: Slow break, recovered to race midfield 1 off stands' fence, unable to hold position & drifted back, outpaced & driven   400m, found nil & faded.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，恢復走勢後居中間位置，走外欄第二疊。未能保持位置，墮退。四百米處被拋離，受催策，再無餘力，力竭。

comment: Taken back, sat 6-1/4L behind the leader 2 wide with cover, made slight ground only in the Straight.
comment_ch: 留居後列，落後領放馬六又四分一個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。直路上僅能略為上前。

comment: Jumped well from gate 12, taken back to race 5 lengths back at rear, 3 wide with cover, slightly improved on turn,      closed off evenly in straight.
comment_ch: 自第十二檔出閘迅速，其後留居後列，落後五個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。直路彎略為上前，直路上保持穩勢。

comment: Midfield along the fence, benefited by the fast pace, lack  room 400M, progressed steadily when clear.
comment_ch: 沿欄居中間位置。步速甚快，有利發揮。四百米處缺乏空位。望空後穩步上前。

comment: Ridden forward to take the fence and led by 1L at slow      sectionals, kept on strongly to the line until headed by    the winner over the final stride.
comment_ch: 受催策上前移入內欄，以慢步速領先一個馬位。保持勁勢至終點，最後一步被頭馬超越。
owner: Mr & Mrs Peter Chan On Tak and Robert Chan Chi Man

comment: Fair start, raced rail midfield, driven into stretch, kept  on evenly.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，居中間位置，走內欄。入直路時受催策，保持穩勢。
owner: Michael Lam King Poy, Ernest Lam Jen Ho & Christopher Lam Jen Toa

comment: Bumped and unbalance at start, settled off pace, loomed to  challenge Home Turn but quickly under pressure and became   unbalanced in action. Must trial.
comment_ch: 出閘時被碰撞及失去平衡，居領放馬之後位置。直路彎逐漸上前展開挑戰，但迅速須受催策，動作失去平衡。必須試閘及格才可再次出賽。
owner: Conrad Fung Kwok Keung, Chris Fung Kwok Hung & The Executors of the Estate of the late Fung Cheung

comment: Under a hold in the straight behind runners.
comment_ch: 直路扣實, 跟馬林走
owner: Sammy Sean Lee & Aaron Lee Ho Ting

comment: Travelled in box-seat, weakened badly after turn, well      beaten.
comment_ch: 居包廂位置，入直路後嚴重轉弱，洩氣潰敗。
owner: Eric Cheng Kam Chung & Vene Cheng Wing Ni

handicap: THE HEUNG YEE KUK 90TH ANNIVERSARY CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 鄉議局九十周年盃（讓賽）
comment: Pressed forward to sit outside leader on settling. Put      under pressure top of straight and kept battling to the     line.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，居領放馬外側。直路初受催策，持續力拼至終點。

comment: Ran on ordinary when asked late.
comment_ch: 拉士稍騎, 但試來仍見平淡

comment: Three wide turning in; ran on comfortably for 2nd.
comment_ch: 三疊轉彎, 從容第二
owner: Tommy Ho Chung Shing, Ho Ka Chun, Nancy Ho Kar Mei & Michael Ho Chung Hing

comment: Got off nicely, racing close to outer fence 3L from leader. Raced in restricted room 700m but remained in contention    till final 200m when tired slightly.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳。靠近外欄競跑，落後領放馬三個馬位。七百米處在窄位競跑，但仍有力一爭。最後二百米略呈疲態。

comment: Broke well, pressed forward to lead on settling close to    outer rail. Joined up front by several rivals approaching   400m when failed to respond to hard riding and faded.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前領先，靠近外欄競跑。趨近四百米處時受力策，但毫無反應，被數駒追上，力竭。

comment: Came home strong from behind.
comment_ch: 後上接近, 走勢純熟

handicap: THE BOCHK WEALTH MANAGEMENT JOCKEY CLUB SPRINT
handicap_ch: 中銀理財馬會短途錦標
comment: Chased the pace along in the 2-path, loomed a threat 350M,  ran on steadily final 200M but didn't have enough late and  was readily held in 3rd.
comment_ch: 追趕領放馬，走第二疊。三百五十米處構成威脅，最後二百米保持穩定走勢，但末段後勁不繼，僅得季軍。

comment: Trapped 4 wide throughout in front of midfield, race on     well until 100M flattened.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，沿途走第四疊。保持佳勢，一百米處洩氣。

comment: Eased back to the rear 8Ls adrift of the leader, didn't     respond to urging passing 550M, soon left behind.
comment_ch: 收慢留居後列位置，落後領放馬八個馬位。跑過五百五十米處時受催策但未能交出反應，瞬即被拋離。

comment: Began moderately, soon driven up the firing line, obtained  position just outside the leader coming onto home bend,     however, folded up quickly after straightening.
comment_ch: 出閘普通。瞬即受催策上前，直路彎居領放馬外側稍後位置。入直路後迅速力竭。

comment: Broke on terms, showed superior natural speed to lead       quickly, slow pace, joined 650m, under pressure 450m,       response short-lived, weakened 250m.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，展現驚人前速，迅速取得領先。減慢步速，六百五十米處被追上，四百五十米處受催策，一度交出反應，二百五十米處轉弱。

comment: Shifted across behind runners from wide draw settling at    rear in one-off position. Well back entering straight but   finished off nicely before getting close to heels final     stages.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後在馬群之後切入，居後列，走第二疊。入直路時遙居於後，但以佳勢衝刺。末段靠近他駒後蹄。

comment: Urged to lead early; kept on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 搶欄放出, 末段仍勁

comment: Going backwards when asked at 400m.
comment_ch: 四百推騎, 不進反退

comment: Moderate start, raced 3 lengths back on rail, came closer   rounding home bend but didn't find much room early in       straight, fought on doggedly closing stages while shifting  ground to just fail to get up on line.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，落後三個馬位，走內欄。轉直路彎時居較接近位置，但直路初空位不足。末段斜跑，力拼上前，過終點時僅敗。
owner: Wong Man Kit & Vincent Wong Ling Sun

comment: Taken well behind from the middle gate, gained slightly     closer on rails briefly rounding home bend, kept on past    well-beaten horses in straight.
comment_ch: 自中檔出閘後大幅留後，轉直路彎時一度略為追近，走內欄。直路上保持走勢，超越已洩氣潰敗的對手。

comment: Rearward early; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑, 未見佳處

comment: Began awkwardly and then crowded before picking up pace     some 5L from leader. Kept on fairly till passing 200m       before tiring.
comment_ch: 出閘笨拙，受擠迫，加速上前，落後領放馬約五個馬位。保持普通走勢，跑過二百米處後呈現疲態。
owner: Lam Ngai Fung & Thomas Poon Ho Wing

comment: Up with the pace; ran on fairly well.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑, 表現不差

comment: Away well, ridden along early, outpaced, settled ahead of   midfield 1 off, back to midfield 1100m, short of room 550m, angled out 400m, hanging in 350m, widest 200m, limited      response.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，早段受催策，但被拋離，居中間之前位置，走第二疊。千一米處墮居中間位置。五百五十米處缺乏空位。四百米處向外移出，三百五十米處內閃。二百米處走大外疊，對催策反應平平。

comment: Unable to slot in and raced in midfield 3-wide no cover     throughout, moved closer inside 600M, failed to pick up on  this first attempt over 1650M.
comment_ch: 未能切入內疊，沿途居中間位置，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。六百米處追近領先馬匹，但未能加速。首次競逐一千六百五十米途程。

comment: Shifted in at break, good pace to track front rank 3 wide,  snagged back a spot 950m, niggled 550m, hard-ridden into    stretch, faded tamely.
comment_ch: 出閘時向內斜跑，前速甚快，跟隨領先馬匹，走第三疊。九百五十米處略為收慢。五百五十米處受催策。入直路時受力策，力竭墮退。

comment: Always in touch; ran on nicely for 2nd.
comment_ch: 有前有後，姿態純熟

comment: Always in touch; just caught.
comment_ch: 前後俱備，埋門被過
owner: Timmy Chan Tien Kay & Jamson Chan Wing Chai

comment: Made progress at 400m; won comfortably.
comment_ch: 四百湧上，有餘未盡

comment: Under whip at 400m; never in contention.
comment_ch: 四百開鞭，遠離水準

comment: Outpaced and soon trailing field. Last into straight, ran   past beaten horses.
comment_ch: 被拋離，瞬即跟隨馬群。最後一駒入直路，超越已洩氣對手。
owner: Dawson Woo Ka Chung, Jackson Woo Ka Biu & The Executors of the Estate of the late Wilson Woo Ka Wah

comment: Blundered badly on jumping, losing ground, before dropping  back to sit last. Battled on OK late down the outside,      given the circumstances, but had too much to do.
comment_ch: 躍出時嚴重失蹄，逐漸失地，墮居包尾位置。末段在外疊力拼。鑒於賽事情況，走勢尚可，但已落後太遠。

comment: Hit the front top of the Straight; ran on well to score.
comment_ch: 直路初透出, 愈走愈順

comment: Shifted out in the Straight; ran on for 2nd when asked.
comment_ch: 直路移出, 推騎第二
owner: Guo Qin Jun, Kwok Ho & Chiu Yi

comment: Always in touch; ran on ok for 3rd.
comment_ch: 前後俱備, 表現唔曳
owner: Siu Chor Kee, Chu Man Chung & Tam Ping Lap

comment: Shifted in on jumping; not stretching out properly.
comment_ch: 起步斜跑，沿途試來欠暢順
owner: Mr & Mrs Li Yiu Keung and Clement Li

comment: Always at rear; never tested.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑，未受考驗

comment: Settled midfield, commenced to improve 450m but one paced   in straight.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，四百五十米處開始推進，直路上保持同速。

comment: Away nicely, crowded 1700m but ridden to hold one-off       position 3L from leader. Lost position 900m, rolled forward again to look chance, boxed on.
comment_ch: 出閘良佳，千七米處受擠迫，受催策，落後領放馬三個馬位，走第二疊。九百米處失位，再度發力上前，看似具爭勝機會，持續力拼。
owner: Liang Lo Ching Yung & Rose Ng Kai Ching

comment: Cruised forward from the low draw to sit midfield, 1 off    the fence. Ran solidly in the straight and was just nosed   out for 3rd on the line.
comment_ch: 自內檔出閘，上前居中間位置，走第二疊。直路上走勢強勁。過終點時僅以短距離之差失去季軍。

comment: Raced in front of midfield, travelled 3.5Ls behind the      leader on the fence, kept on one pace until final 200M      weakened.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，落後領放馬三個半馬位，走內欄。保持同速，最後二百米轉弱。

comment: Behind midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, no dash.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬五個半馬位，走第二疊。步速緩慢，不合發揮，衝刺乏力。

comment: Wide throughout; ran on well to score comfortably.
comment_ch: 全程外壘，輕鬆趕過
owner: Chan Cheung Hi, Lam Suet Wan & Tsoi Huk Yam

handicap_ch: 新加坡賽馬公會錦標（讓賽）
comment: Broke ok & bustled forward to race midfield 1 off with      cover, niggled 500m, hard-ridden final turn, shifted out    300m, plugged on evenly.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，受催策上前，居中間位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。五百米處受催策。轉直路彎時受力策。三百米處向外移出，保持穩勢。

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY GOLD CHARISMA COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶金飾魅力系列讓賽
comment: Rolled forward and settled into box-seat, sat 1-3/4L off,   no clear run near 200M  but still ran on well to the line.
comment_ch: 上前佔取包廂位置，落後一又四分三個馬位。接近二百米處時未能望空，末段走勢良佳。
owner: Mrs Kao Chan Ming Man & Cheung Ka Wai

comment: Taken back to rail, 2L adrift & niggled 550m, hard ridden   into stretch, never a factor.
comment_ch: 留後移入內欄。五百五十米處落後尾二一駒兩個馬位，受催策。入直路時受力策。從未有力一爭。
owner: Sandia Yit Lau Ying Lam & Yit Kwok Leung

comment: On pace early; kept on when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑, 直路騎落仲有

comment: First to jump; ran on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 出閘最快，放入一席

comment: Allowed to stride forward at own pace while looking for     cover. Raced fiercely passing 800m, shaken up and kept on   steadily without looking dangerous.
comment_ch: 獲許順其自然地展步上前，尋找遮擋。跑過八百米處時搶口。在催策下保持穩勢，但未看似能構成威脅。
owner: Alan Tsang Ping Sing, Fiona Tsang Wai Sze & Claudia Tsang Hei Man

comment: Eased back, trapped 3-4 wide, dashed strongly 300M despite  not suited by the slow pace.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，走第三至第四疊。儘管慢步速不合發揮，但三百米處仍以勁勢衝刺。

comment: Settled in worse than midfield, 6-1/4L behind the leader 2  wide with cover, no dash and never threatened.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬六又四分一個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。衝刺乏力，從未能構成威脅。

comment: On-pace early; faded in the Straight.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢, 直路墮退

comment: Taken back from the wide draw to sit towards the rear of    the field, 2-4 wide. Came widest on the turn, and only      plugged away late.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後收慢，居後列位置，走第二至第四疊。直路彎走最外疊，末段僅能保持同速。
owner: Hui Yip Wing & Hui Chen Shu Ling

comment: Led early stages, sat in 2nd behind runaway leader passing  1000M, no extra and weakened entering 350M.
comment_ch: 早段領先，跑過一千米處時居第二位，遙遙落後於領放馬。進入最後三百五十米時再無餘力及轉弱。
owner: Mr & Mrs Francis Lee Bing Kwong, Yves Lee Kun Fun and Richard Lo Yuen Kin

comment: Broke well, soon taken back to sit midfield on rail, shaken up 300m, ran on for solid headway.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，瞬即留居中間位置，走內欄。三百米處受催策，保持走勢，穩步上前。

comment: Ridden early to hold forward position, settling one-back,   one-off 1300m. Allowed to stride forward passing 500m,      3-wide into straight, kept on solidly to line.
comment_ch: 早段在催策下保持居前列位置，千三米處落後一個馬位，走第二疊。跑過五百米處時獲許展步上前。入直路時走第三疊，保持勁勢至終點。

comment: In last few, one-paced under pressure.
comment_ch: 居後列，受催策但僅能保持同速。

comment: Slow start & sat 1 off with cover near rear, niggled 1000m, under pump 550m, plodded home weakly.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居後列位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。一千米處受催策。五百五十米處受催策，末段走勢疲乏。

comment: Settled in worse than midfield, 7-1/4L behind the leader 3  wide with cover, did not improve.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬七又四分一個馬位，走第三疊，有遮擋。未能推進。

comment: Eased back, trapped 4-5 wide, harmed forward by the slow    tempo, little dash in straight.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，走第四至第五疊。慢步速不利發揮，直路上略為上前。
owner: Chan Ying Kit & Chan Kan Sau Han

comment: Pushed forward, 2 wide, not suited by the fast pace, ran on until 200M flattened.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，走第二疊。步速甚快，不合發揮。持續上前，二百米處洩氣。
owner: Tang Yip Sau Yung & Tang Kwok Yung

comment: Broke ok & bustled initially, raced 3 wide no cover fore of midfield, rolled to close 3rd 700m, driven 430m, outpaced & weakened in tame run home.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，早段受催策，居中間之前位置，在沒遮擋下走第三疊。七百米處進佔接近的第三位。四百三十米處受催策。直路上被拋離，走勢疲乏。

comment: Average to begin, unable to slot in, raced 3 wide and       without cover throughout, emptied early in straight when    hard run took effect.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，未能切入內疊，沿途在沒遮擋下走第三疊。因已耗力太多，直路初再無餘力。

handicap: THE HONG KONG RIDING FOR THE DISABLED ASSOCIATION CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港傷健策騎協會盃（讓賽）
comment: First out but 3-wide first turn and eased back. Shaken up   800m to hold position, picked up bit 300m, challenged       leader from 100m but pipped on line.
comment_ch: 出閘最快，首次轉彎時收慢留後，走第三疊。八百米處在催策下保持位置，三百米處略為加速。自一百米處起挑戰領放馬，但過終點時被超越。

comment: Pushed forward to take the rail and led through quick       sectionals, despite that ran on and only headed by the      winner inside the final 100M.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，移入內欄，以快步速領放，並保持走勢，僅於最後一百米被頭馬超越。
owner: Eleanor Kwok Law Kwai Chun & Kitty Kwok Sea Nga

comment: At rear, travelled 7.5Ls behind the leader on the fence,    made minor ground in straight.
comment_ch: 居後列位置，落後領放馬七個半馬位，走內欄。直路上略為追前。
owner: Eric Cheng Kam Chung & Vene Cheng Wing Ni

comment: Began OK, didn't stretch out and had to be ridden 1200m to  hold position. Put under pressure 500m, got clear run 300m, kept on steadily.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，未能展步，千二米處須受催策以保持位置。五百米處受催策，三百米處望空，保持穩勢。
owner: Lillian Lee Lai Man & Kenny Tse Chiu Ping

comment: Taken across behind runners, 7Ls off the pace in rear, kept to inside throughout and had to make his run from an        unpromising position passing 350M, made limited progress.
comment_ch: 在馬群之後移入內疊，居後列位置，落後領放馬七個馬位。全程走內疊，跑過三百五十米處時從後列位置推進，略為上前。

comment: Took rail in front of midfield, raced keenly, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash in straight.
comment_ch: 移入內欄，居中間之前位置，跑來搶口。慢步速不合發揮。直路上略為上前。

comment: Settled midfield; limited response when asked.
comment_ch: 居中跟跑, 騎落一般

comment: Settled in midfield, 3-3/4L behind 2 wide with cover,       finished off steadily without threatening.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後三又四分三個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。以穩定走勢衝刺，未能構成威脅。
owner: Sir Po-shing & Lady Woo, Jackson Woo Ka Biu and The Executors of the Estate of the late Wilson Woo K

comment: Settled in 5th 2-3Ls off the pace, gave limited response    only entering straight, never threatened.
comment_ch: 居第五位，落後領放馬兩至三個馬位。入直路時受催策，反應僅屬平平。從未能構成威脅。

comment: Not quickened when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路推騎, 未見加速
owner: Lau Chi Tak & Lau Chi Wing

handicap: TUEN MUN PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 屯門公眾騎術學校讓賽
comment: Urged hard after start to take lead, asked for effort in    the straight, one-paced.
comment_ch: 起步後受力策取得領先。直路上受催策。保持同速。

comment: Up with the pace along rail; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 貼欄跟前, 末段按返

comment: Flattened at turn; dropping back to rear.
comment_ch: 彎位乏力, 墮退而回

comment: Always in touch and won; moved better than before.
comment_ch: 有前有後, 再進一步

comment: Niggled along behind midfield, in last few before taking    off under pressure at the 1000 metres, made swift progress  down far side to chase leader round home bend, sustained    effort down home straight to gain upper hand final strides.
comment_ch: 受催策，居中間之後位置。其後居最後數位，一千米處在催策下發力上前。對面直路上迅速推進，轉直路彎時追趕領放馬。直路上保持走勢，最後數步佔得上風。

comment: Wide no cover at the rear of the field early, before        pushing to sit forward of midfield at 800m. Gave nothing in the straight, and eased a long way from home.
comment_ch: 早段居馬群後列，走外疊，沒有遮擋。受推策，八百米處居中間之前位置。直路上再無餘力，離終點尚遠已收慢。

comment: Up with pace; faded late.
comment_ch: 跟前，拉士力度已減弱

comment: Began well, raced prominently on the stands rail, weakened  in the concluding stages.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居前列，走外欄。末段轉弱。

comment: Pressed forward from awkward draw, racing wide till finding cover three-back, one-off at 1000m. Closed in top of        straight and boxed on gamely to the line without being able to narrow gap on first two.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後受催策上前，走外疊，至一千米處尋獲遮擋，落後三個馬位，走第二疊。直路早段上前，保持勁勢至終點，但未能收窄與前兩駒之間的距離。

comment: Asked at turn; weakened badly.
comment_ch: 彎位已騎, 乏力墮退

comment: Started ok & bustled along to race handily, caught 3 wide   no cover, under pump 550m, driven 4 deep final turn, found  nil.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，受催策，居前列，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。五百五十米處受催策。直路彎在催策下走第四疊，再無餘力。
owner: Tony Lau Hon Kwan, Dominic Lai, David Poon Cheung Fung & Alfred Ronald Li Kwok Lung

comment: Went to press forward early, but was stuck forward of       midfield, 3 wide with no cover. Stayed on well in the       straight and was gaining on the placegetters late.
comment_ch: 早段受催策上前，但受困於中間之前位置，在沒遮擋下走第三疊。直路上保持佳勢，末段逐漸追近入位馬匹。

comment: Shifted out and asked at 300m; dashed on for 2nd.
comment_ch: 三百移出, 力推追上

comment: Began smartly, raced prominently near to the stand side,    peaked near 200M, weakened thereafter.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居前列，靠近外欄競跑。接近二百米處時未能再增速，其後轉弱。

comment: Reserved in mid-division, 4Ls off leader 400M, closed off   strongly to lead 50M, steadily pulled away.
comment_ch: 留居中間位置。四百米處落後領放馬四個馬位。末段衝刺強勁，五十米處取得領先，逐漸帶離對手。

comment: Hit the line strong for 3rd when under a hold in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路捉到實, 走勢仍勁

comment: Led early; kept on for 3rd when asked late.
comment_ch: 快放第三，但末段要騎
owner: Charmaine Wong Kam Mei & Chan Fu Ho

comment: Tardy start, lacked pace & rousted early to race midfield   on rail, niggled throughout, driven 500m, found nothing &   weakened in stretch.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，欠缺前速，早段受催策。居中間位置，走內欄。沿途受催策，五百米處再受催策。直路上再無餘力及轉弱。

comment: Crowded out start, recovered to race 5 lengths or so back   in midfield, similar position to turn, closed off           one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘時受擠迫，恢復走勢後居中間位置，落後約五個馬位。直路彎前居相若位置，末段保持同速。

comment: In touch early; hit front late.
comment_ch: 跟前，末段透出取勝

comment: Jumped away well; led all the way to score.
comment_ch: 起步敏捷，愈走愈勁
owner: Wu Chak Man & Ng Chit Yam

comment: Led along the rail; kept on one-paced.
comment_ch: 搶欄帶放, 保持同速

comment: Vigorously ridden after jumping well but didn't muster      enough speed, dropping towards rear between horses. Bumped  and unbalanced 600m, rolled forward from 500m, wide into    straight before finishing strongly to just miss.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，其後受力策，但加速力不足，在馬匹之間墮居後列。六百米處受踫撞及失去平衡，自五百米處起上前。入直路時走外疊，以勁勢衝刺，僅敗。

comment: Pushed forward, benefited by the slow tempo, emptied 300M.
comment_ch: 受推策上前。步速緩慢，有利發揮。三百米處再無餘力。
owner: Tommy Yeung Kin Wing & Yeung Yim Sau Wah

comment: Rolled forward to lead 4 wide 1180m, to rail 850m, 0.5L     ahead & shaken up 350m, quickened 1L clear, emptied final   50m & headed.
comment_ch: 出閘後上前，一千一百八十米處取得領先，走第四疊。八百五十米處移入內欄。三百五十米處領先半個馬位，受催策。加速上前，帶離一個馬位。最後五十米再無餘力，並被超越。

comment: Made minor inroads in the Straight; ran on ok.
comment_ch: 直路稍追, 似好非好

comment: Midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow   pace, no turn of foot.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬五個半馬位，走第二疊。慢步速不利發揮，未能加速。

comment: Ran on to score when asked late.
comment_ch: 拉士稍騎，後上取勝
owner: Mr & Mrs Leung Lun, Paul Leung Yuk Hung and Kenneth Leung Yuk Wai

comment: Made use of inside draw to hold rail though 5L from leader  on settling. Made ground around turn, kept on steadily to   200m before tiring.
comment_ch: 把握排內檔的優勢，固守內欄 ，落後領放馬五個馬位。直路彎追前。保持穩勢至二百米處，繼而漸呈疲態。

comment: Niggled along throughout; not willing to stretch.
comment_ch: 騎足全程, 唔多肯走

comment: Taken back early; impressive run.
comment_ch: 留前試後, 表現甚佳
owner: Mr & Mrs Philip Ng Yuk Wing and Michael Ng Mun Kit

comment: Rolled forward to take the rail and led by 1/2L, kept on    well until headed by the eventual winner at 150M, held on   for 3rd.
comment_ch: 上前佔取內欄，領先半個馬位。保持佳勢，一百五十米處被頭馬超越。保持走勢，跑獲季軍。

comment: Sent forward from a wide gate to park outside the leader,   not suited by the fast sectionals, weakened over the last   furlong.
comment_ch: 自大外檔出閘，受催策上前，居領放馬外側。快步速不合發揮。最後二百米轉弱。

comment: Niggled along after start; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 起步已騎，未見佳處

comment: On-pace early; not quickened when asked.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑, 無加速力

comment: Travelled in midfield, sat 3-1/2L behind along the fence,   kept improving and hit the line well.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後三個半馬位，走內欄。持續推進，衝刺良佳。

comment: Eased back, took rail, benefited by the fast tempo,         progressed steadily 400M for 3rd.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，移入內欄。快步速有利發揮，四百米處穩步上前，跑入季席。

comment: Broke well, travelled in 2nd just outside the leader, hit   the front briefly inside the 300 metres out but soon        headed, lost 2nd final strides.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居領放馬外側的第二位。三百米處一度取得領先，但瞬即被超越。最後數步失去亞軍。

comment: Up with the pace; under a hold in the Straight.
comment_ch: 前列跟跑, 直路按返

comment: Under a hold throughout; still ran on strong.
comment_ch: 全程拖住，走勢仍勁

handicap: THE HONG KONG CHINESE AMATEUR ATHLETIC FEDERATION CENTENARY GOLD CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 華協會百週年紀念金盃（讓賽）
comment: Sent forward to lead on the rail by 1L, kept on going to    the line and was never challenged.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，沿欄領先一個馬位。保持走勢至終點，從未受挑戰。

comment: Slow to begin; found nothing when under whip in the Straight.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢, 直路打都唔郁

comment: Fractious in gate, reared at start and lost considerable    ground. Trailed field to straight, ran past beaten horses.
comment_ch: 在閘廂內煩躁不安，開閘時以後足豎立，失地甚多。直路前跟隨馬群，超越兩匹已洩氣對手。
owner: Chan Kam Hung & Alan Chan Kin On

comment: Eased back early; quickened at turn; ran on to score when clear.
comment_ch: 起步拖後，彎位發力，望空撲上

comment: Up with the pace early; under a hold late.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢，拉士按返

comment: Slightly awkward start, eased to rear on rail, under riding 650m, quickly beaten, eased right out.
comment_ch: 出閘略為笨拙，收慢留居後列，走內欄。六百五十米處受催策，迅速洩氣，其後收慢。

handicap: TUEN MUN PUBLIC RIDING SCHOOL HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 屯門公眾騎術學校讓賽
comment: Broke ok, rousted to lead on fence, driven under pressure   350m, fought off challengers to hold on at wire.
comment_ch: 出閘尚可，在催策下取得領先，走內欄。三百五十米處受催策，力拒挑戰馬匹，終點線上險勝。

comment: Shifted out in the straight; made ground under a hold.
comment_ch: 直路移出, 按實追近

handicap_ch: 法國賽馬會馬主事務部讓賽
comment: Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 2-3 wide, dashed well   250M despite not suited by the slow pace.
comment_ch: 受力策，保持居中間位置，走第二至第三疊。慢步速不合發揮，但二百五十米處仍以佳勢衝刺。

comment: Led early; won with plenty in hand.
comment_ch: 主動搶放，大把在手

comment: Fair break only, at back 5-3/4L off 2 wide with cover, not  competitive in the straight.
comment_ch: 出閘普通，居後列，落後五又四分三個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。直路上毫無競爭力。

comment: Travelled in front of midfield, 3L behind the leader 2 wide with cover, not suited to the slow tempo and difficult to   settle throughout, did not run on.
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，落後領放馬三個馬位，在有遮擋下走第二疊。步速緩慢，不合發揮。沿途難以穩定走勢，未能保持走勢。

comment: Eased back, trapped 3 wide, suited by the fast pace, ran on fairly.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，走第三疊。快步速適合發揮。走勢普通。

comment: Made progress steadily; ran on strongly wide to score.
comment_ch: 分段加快, 外疊撲上

comment: Hit the front turning in; ran on strongly to score.
comment_ch: 彎位透出, 直奔終點

comment: Began only fairly, proved difficult to settle, in rear 8Ls  off the pace home turn, brought wide and closed off         strongly final 300M to just miss 3rd.
comment_ch: 出閘僅屬一般，難以穩定走勢。直路彎居後列，落後領放馬八個馬位。最後三百米在外疊以勁勢衝刺，僅未能跑入三甲。

comment: Always in touch; moved better than before and ran 3rd.
comment_ch: 留前試後，表現勝前

comment: Shared lead early; playing with his tongue in the Straight; ran on greenly.
comment_ch: 拍實鬥放, 直路玩脷, 仍欠成熟

comment: Laying in at 300m; ran on again when recovered.
comment_ch: 三百內閃, 收正再衝

comment: Close up early, gradually shifted backward behind midfield  on rails, saved ground turning for home, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
comment_ch: 早段緊隨領放馬。逐漸墮居中間之後位置，走內欄。轉直路彎時節省腳程。持續力拼，過終點時最為接近。

comment: Pushed forward to obtain the box seat, ran on steadily for  3rd.
comment_ch: 受推策上前，佔取包廂位置。穩步上前，跑獲季軍。

comment: Shifted out in the straight; found nothing when asked.
comment_ch: 直路移出, 推騎欠反應
owner: Mr & Mrs Hamen Fan Shi Hoo and Alex Fan Chen Yen

handicap: HKU FACULTIES OF MEDICINE AND ENGINEERING HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 港大醫學院與工程學院讓賽
comment: Sluggish start & rousted to midfield 1 off with cover,      under pump 850m, shifted wider 500m & outpaced, stayed on   to 3rd under vigorous drive.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢。在催策下進佔中間位置，走第二疊，有遮擋。八百五十米處受催策。五百米處移出更外疊，被拋離。在力策下保持走勢，跑獲季軍。
owner: James Lau Chi Wing, Lau Kai Tai & Michelle Lau Wing Sheung

comment: Ridden along early before seeking cover, eventually getting to fence 800m. Mixed on gamely in straight while            continually switching out to get clear running.
comment_ch: 早段受催策，其後尋找遮擋。八百米處移入內欄。直路上持續向外移出以望空，以勁勢力拼。

comment: Slow away, hard ridden along the fence to keep up behind    midfield, favoured by the fast pace, progressed steadily    300M.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，沿欄受力策以保持在中間之後位置。快步速有利發揮。三百米處穩步上前。
owner: Henry Chan Chi Chiu & Chan Chee Ling

comment: Led along the rail; kept on strongly to score.
comment_ch: 沿欄搶放, 貫注到底

comment: Taken back early; shifted out in the straight; ran on ok.
comment_ch: 刻意拖後，直路移出，有點追勢
owner: Mr & Mrs Senta Wong and Vinci Wong

comment: Quickened for 3rd when asked late.
comment_ch: 拉士稍騎, 加速第三

comment: Slow start, raced 1 off with cover near rear, shifted wide  & minor progress 750m, niggled 580m, driven wider final     turn, plugged on one pace.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居後列，走第二疊，有遮擋。七百五十米處移出外疊，略為追前。五百八十米處受催策。直路彎再受催策，走更外疊。保持同速。

comment: Jumped well, rolled forward, sharing pace to back stretch   before settling 2.5L back in one-off position. Under        pressure turning for home, weakened badly in straight.      Unacceptable performance.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速後上前，對面直路前並排領先，其後居領放馬兩個半馬位之後的位置，走第二疊。轉直路彎時受催策。直路上嚴重轉弱。表現難以接受。

comment: In mid-division 5Ls off the pace, driven wide passing 400M, ran on only fairly, never troubled leaders.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬五個馬位。跑過四百米處時受催策，走外疊。走勢僅屬普通，從未能威脅領先馬匹。

comment: Flattened halfway; dropped back to rear.
comment_ch: 半程洩氣，乏力墮退
owner: Pui Kwan Kay & Raymond Chu Yuet Chung

comment: Racing backwards; not back to his old form.
comment_ch: 愈跑愈後，未復舊觀
owner: Mr & Mrs Ben Wong Chung Mat and Vincent Wong Yin Shun

comment: Ridden vigorously to obtain forward position but unable to  cross to rail and held wide without cover from 900m when 3L from leader. Kept on gamely in straight.
comment_ch: 受力策佔取前列位置，但未能移入內欄，自九百米處起落後領放馬三個馬位，在沒有遮擋下走外疊。直路上持續力拼。
owner: Edward Chan Kwok Man & Karen Chan Ka Yin

comment: Moderately away from a tricky gate, sent forward to race    prominently, 3/4 length back in 2nd on turn, continued on   willingly to the finish and fought off the late challenge   to score.
comment_ch: 自第九檔出閘普通，受催策上前，居前列。直路彎居第二位，落後四分三個馬位。持續力拼至終點，末段力拒對手的挑戰勝出。

comment: Jumped awkwardly; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 出閘論盡，走勢仍嫩

comment: Eased back from a wide draw, 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide   with cover, never ran on.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後收慢留後，落後領放馬五個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。從未能追前。

comment: Rearward early; made ground along the fence.
comment_ch: 早段落後, 沿欄追趕

comment: Bumped start, used up early down centre track to get within 3L of leader passing 600m. Gave ground quickly final 400m.
comment_ch: 起步時與對手互相碰撞。早段在跑道中央受催策。跑過六百米處時落後領放馬不超過三個馬位。最後四百米迅速墮退。

comment: Began fairly, settled one-out-one-back in 4th, became 5th   entering back straight, took closer order under pressure    down far side, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，居第四位，落後一個馬位，走第二疊。入對面直路時居第五位。對面直路沿途受催策進佔較接近位置，持續力拼，終點前最接近。

comment: Taken back from a wide draw, raced 6 lengths back at tail,  still well back on turn, made some progress in straight.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後留居尾列，落後六個馬位。直路彎仍遙居於後。直路上略為上前。

comment: Not far off early stages, shuffled back to behind midfield  approaching the course proper, never recovered.
comment_ch: 早段落後領放馬不遠。將跑離分支直路時墮居中間之後位置，從未能恢復走勢。
owner: Vincent Chan Wing Sing & Jason Chan Kam Kwan

handicap_ch: 香港特區行政長官盃（讓賽）
comment: Pushed to settle 3Ls behind the leader along the fence,     dashed strongly when clear 300M to take the trophy.
comment_ch: 受催策，落後領放馬三個馬位，走內欄。三百米處望空後以佳勢衝前，取得冠軍。

comment: Raced handy, flattened late
comment_ch: 早段唔慢，末段勁平

comment: Weakened when under whip in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路開鞭, 乏力墮退

comment: Quickly into stride, pressed forward along rail to lead     into first turn. Passed by another 700m, dropping into box  seat 600m. Kept on fairly until 200m when gave ground       abruptly.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前，走內欄，首次轉彎時取得領先。七百米處被另一駒超越。六百米處墮居包廂位置。保持一般走勢，二百米處急促墮退。

handicap: POK FU LAM RESERVOIR ROAD HANDICAP
comment: Taken back and raced in behind midfield, 4-3/4L behind 3    wide, closed off nicely to take 2nd.
comment_ch: 留居中間之後位置，落後四又四分三個馬位，走第三疊。末段衝刺良佳，跑獲亞軍。

handicap: HKU FACULTIES OF BUSINESS & ECONOMICS AND SCIENCE HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 港大經濟及工商管理學院與理學院讓賽
comment: Settled worse than midfield about 7Ls behind the leader on  the fence, swung widest rounding the Home Turn, ran on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 居中間之後位置，落後領放馬約七個馬位，走內欄。轉直路彎時移至最外疊，以佳勢上前，跑獲亞軍。

comment: Tardy start & bustled along on rail near rear, edged out &  ridden 300m, close to heels & checked to rail 180m, stayed  on for minor late headway.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居後列，沿欄受催策。三百米處受催策移離外欄。一百八十米處靠近他駒後蹄，勒避，移回外欄。保持走勢，末段略為上前。

comment: Travelled wide without cover in forward of midfield,        circled the field to join the leader rounding home bend,    weakened passing the 300 metres before checked and dropped  quicker backward 200 metres out.  (Blood in trachea)
comment_ch: 居中間之前位置，走外疊，沒有遮擋。繞過馬群上前，直路彎追上領放馬。跑過三百米處時轉弱，二百米處勒避，迅速墮退。（氣管內有血。）

handicap: CHEVALIER COLD STORAGE AND LOGISTICS HANDICAP
comment: Eased back, 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated   strong finishing efforts after being held up from 4-2.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，走第二疊。步速緩慢，不利發揮。自四百米處起至二百米處受困，其後以勁勢衝刺。

comment: Restrained to race behind midfield, driven 400M but not     making any real progress, never a threat.
comment_ch: 在約束下居中間之後位置。四百米處受催策，但未能追前。從未能構成威脅。

comment: Out quickly but pulled out of pace battle, settling behind  midfield. Given reminder passing 550m, hard ridden in       straight, finished off strongly to just miss a placing.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，但放棄爭先，居中間之後位置。跑過五百五十米處時受鞭策，直路上受力策。衝刺凌厲，僅失季席。

comment: Tightened at start and dropped to last few, trailed the     field most of way down back straight and around home bend,  went widest turning in, ran on to be nearest at finish.
comment_ch: 出閘時受緊迫，墮居最後數位。對面直路上及轉直路彎時大部分途程尾隨馬群。入直路時走最外疊。保持走勢，過終點時最為接近。

comment: Wide throughout; came from behind for 3rd.
comment_ch: 全程外疊, 後上第三
owner: Mr & Mrs Mark Fong Chung, Matthew Fong and Victoria Fong

comment: Began fairly, taken out but unable get closer than 3-wide   from outer fence. Shaken up passing 400m and finished off   nicely down centre track to be closest at finish.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，向外移出，但走外欄第三疊或更外疊。跑過四百米處時受催策，在跑道中央衝刺良佳。過終點時最為接近。

comment: Always in touch; kept on well for 2nd.
comment_ch: 有前有後, 靱力十足

comment: Midfield, trapped 3 wide, made some ground 200M.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，走第三疊。二百米處略為追前。

comment: Slow away, 4.5Ls off the good pace along the fence, no      progress.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，落後步速甚快的領放馬四個半馬位，走內欄。毫無進展。

handicap_ch: 香港中文大學校友會聯會盃（讓賽）
comment: Shifted across behind runners shortly after start, dropping to last pair but kept away from fence. Remained at the rear till well into the straight before running past tired       horses. Lame left front and left hind legs.
comment_ch: 出閘後不久在馬群之後切入，墮居最後兩位，離欄競跑。入直路前仍居後列，其後超越已呈疲態的對手。左前腿及左後腿均不良於行。

comment: Led early stages, taken 2.5L back to 4th coming onto home   bend, came under pressure to challenge when 3rd into        straight but failed to quicken to threaten.
comment_ch: 早段取得領先，入直路彎時居第四位，落後兩個半馬位。在催策下上前展開挑戰，入直路時居第三位，但未能加速上前威脅對手。

comment: Began well, pressed forward to hold position one-off,       one-back. Urged forward turning for home, took lead early   in straight before running on empty from 200m and dropping  back.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策上前，落後領放馬一個馬位，走第二疊。轉直路彎時受催策上前。直路初取得領先。自二百米處起再無餘力，墮退。

comment: On pace early; kept on in the Straight.
comment_ch: 跟前，直路保持走勢

comment: Slightly slow out, recovered to race prominently, 2 wide on turn, peaked early in straight, weakened gradually after    200M.
comment_ch: 出閘稍慢，恢復走勢後居前列。直路彎走第二疊。直路初未能再增速。過了二百米處後逐漸轉弱。

comment: On pace for 3rd; raced under his own steam in the Straight.
comment_ch: 跟前，直路紋風未動

comment: Raced midfield under a hold; ran on ok.
comment_ch: 按實居中, 走勢從容

comment: Up with the pace; limited response when asked late.
comment_ch: 早段唔慢, 拉士騎落唔多
owner: Stephen So Chi Ming & Samuel Chan Ying Leung

comment: Travelled strongly behind midfield, moved closer to a       contending position 500M, led 300M, continued on well down  the outside and was always holding off the persistent 2nd.
comment_ch: 走勢強勁，居中間之後位置。五百米處追近，爭奪領先。三百米處帶頭，走外疊，保持佳勢，一直力拒窮追不捨的亞軍取勝。

comment: Away with them, positioned on rail in midfield, there to    turn, kept to inside after straightening, finished off      one-paced.
comment_ch: 與對手同步出閘，居中間位置，走內欄。直路彎前居相同位置。入直路後固守內欄，末段保持同速。

comment: Pressed forward but wide to sit 2L behind leader at first   turn and then kept tabs until 400m when gave ground quickly finished tailed out. Unacceptable performance.
comment_ch: 受催策上前，走外疊，首次轉彎時落後領放馬兩個馬位。其後跟隨領放馬。四百米處迅速墮退，大敗而回。表現難以接受。
owner: Sir Po-shing & Lady Woo, Jackson Woo Ka Biu and The Executors of the Estate of the late Wilson Woo K

comment: Hampered at start; ran on ok when recovered.
comment_ch: 起步碰撞，修正後有追勢
owner: Mr & Mrs So Chun Yu and Celine So

comment: Always in touch; performed nicely for 2nd.
comment_ch: 有前有後, 走勢純熟

comment: Under a hold for 2nd; not fully tested.
comment_ch: 按住第二，見好即收

comment: Wide throughout; limited response when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 全程外疊, 末段騎落一般
owner: Tony Lau Yiu Tong, Thomas Lau Sum Fai & Lau Yi Fai

comment: Eased back, trapped 4-5 wide, harmed by the slow tempo,     made early move 600M, dashed strongly 300M.
comment_ch: 收慢留後，走第四至第五疊。步速緩慢，不利發揮。早自六百米處已發力。三百米處以勁勢衝刺。

comment: Midfield along the fence, suited by the fast tempo, lack    room 400M, made steady ground when clear.
comment_ch: 沿欄居中間位置，快步速適合發揮。四百米處缺乏空位，望空後穩步上前。

handicap: HKU JOCKEY CLUB STUDENT VILLAGES HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 香港大學賽馬會舍堂村讓賽
comment: Pushed forward early to be handily place in 3rd, but 3 wide with no cover. Never responded to rider early in the        straight, and was eased out from the 200m.
comment_ch: 早段受推策上前，居前列第三位，走第三疊，沒有遮擋。直路初在催策下毫無反應，自二百米處起收慢。
owner: Wong Yuet Sing & Tony Wong Sze Ho

comment: Some progress under a hold; performed ok.
comment_ch: 按住追趕，表現不差

comment: Urged forward and eventually took lead near 1100M, despite  benefitted the slow tempo, emptied at 250M.
comment_ch: 受催策上前。接近千一米處時取得領先。儘管慢步速有利發揮，二百五十米處再無餘力。

comment: Raced midfield under restraint; moved ok.
comment_ch: 扣實居中, 走勢不弱

comment: Slightly slow out, raced 5 lengths back at 9th, same margin back on turn, taken wide in straight and finished off very  strongly to be nearest on line, just missed.
comment_ch: 出閘稍慢，居第九位，落後五個馬位。直路彎落後相同距離，直路上移出外疊，衝刺十分凌厲，終點線上最為接近，僅敗。
owner: Brian Leung Hung Tak & Sophie Leung Lau Yau Fun

comment: Jumped awkwardly; raced greenly.
comment_ch: 出閘欠順，走勢稚嫩

comment: Taken back to settle worse than midfield, 9Ls behind the    leader 2 wide with cover, benefited by the fast sectionals, stormed home for a stylish win.
comment_ch: 留居中間之後位置，落後領放馬九個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。步速甚快，有利發揮。衝刺凌厲，以漂亮走勢勝出。

comment: Raced forward to take the rail from an inner gate and led   by a nose. Kept on well until headed by the third           place-getter at 300M.
comment_ch: 自最內檔出閘，沿欄上前，領先一馬鼻位。保持佳勢，三百米處被季軍馬匹超越。

comment: Shifted out in the Straight; ran on for 3rd when asked.
comment_ch: 直路移出, 推騎第三

comment: Urged to lead along the rail; kept on for 2nd.
comment_ch: 搶欄帶出, 放入一席
owner: Poon Tit Man & Wong Kwong Fai

comment: Began fairly, bumped, ridden forward to midfield but badly  crowded 1350m and dropped back. Took inside run in straight but soon under pressure and eased out passing 200m,         finishing tailed out. Had irregular heart rhythm.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，被對手碰撞，受催策上前，居中間位置，但一千三百五十米處嚴重受擠迫及墮退。直路上在內疊取位上前，但瞬即受催策，跑過二百米處時收慢，包尾大敗而回。心律不正常。

comment: Began well, ridden to keep close to pace, settling 3L from  leader. Taken wide in straight and kept on fairly to 200m   turning one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策，持續追近領放馬，落後三個馬位。直路上移出外疊。二百米處前保持普通走勢。其後保持同速。

comment: Ridden to hold fence 2-back from leader entering back       stretch. Lost position around final turn but stayed on      fence and kept on steadily in straight.
comment_ch: 進入對面直路時受催策固守內欄，落後領放馬兩個馬位。直路彎失位，走內欄，直路上保持穩勢。

comment: Fractious going into stall; slow to begin; niggled throughout.
comment_ch: 閘前扭計，起步稍慢，騎足全程
owner: Mr & Mrs Michael Cheng Wing On

comment: Hard ridden to take the rail and led at fast sectionals,    ran on strongly until 150M overhauled, checked 50M.
comment_ch: 受力策，移入內欄，以快步速領放。走勢強勁，一百五十米處被超越。五十米處勒避。

comment: On-pace early; kept on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 跟前入位，末段唔斷

comment: Jumped ok; made progress steadily.
comment_ch: 起步順利，逐步追趕

comment: Ran on well throughout, competed at best
comment_ch: 快放第二, 已盡所能

comment: On pace for 2nd; ran on OK.
comment_ch: 跟前入位，表現尚可

comment: Missed break, soon bustled & detached at tail, veered wide  to avoid faller 850m, tailed off.
comment_ch: 漏閘，其後瞬即受催策，遙居包尾位置。八百五十米處移出外疊以避開跌倒的馬匹。包尾而回。

handicap: THE HONG KONG EXCHANGES CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港交易所挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Fast getaway, eased to beyond midfield 1 off, under riding  370m but blocked soon after, switched over heels 250m,      found line very late.
comment_ch: 出閘快速，收慢留居中間之後位置，走第二疊。三百七十米處受催策，但瞬即受困。二百五十米處移離他駒後蹄。接近終點時始能上前。

comment: Limited response when under whip in the straight.
comment_ch: 直路開鞭，未見加速

comment: Well behind, ran past well-beaten horses down the centre of the straight.
comment_ch: 沿途遙居於後。直路上在跑道中央競跑，超越已洩氣潰敗的對手。
owner: St Joan of Arc School PSA Syndicate

comment: Made progress steadily; came from behind for 3rd.
comment_ch: 逐步追趕，後上第三
owner: Cris Ng Ka Shuen & Gregory James Holmes

handicap: AUDEMARS PIGUET LADY ROYAL OAK OFFSHORE HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 愛彼ＬＡＤＹ　ＲＯＹＡＬ　ＯＡＫ　ＯＦＦＳＨＯＲＥ讓賽
comment: Hard ridden to hold the rail in midfield, favoured by the   fast tempo, ran on ok in straight.
comment_ch: 在力策下居中間位置，走內欄。步速甚快，有利發揮。直路上走勢尚可。

comment: Ridden along throughout; never in contention.
comment_ch: 騎足全程，無段好睇
owner: Sherman Ting Wing Cheung, Joyce Ting Tung Sum & David Ting Chi Ho

handicap: POK FU LAM RESERVOIR ROAD HANDICAP
comment: Quickly crossed to the rail, always prominent, difficult to settle when crossed by rival 700M, couldn't find another    gear turning in, no clear run final 100M but already out of contention.
comment_ch: 迅速切入內欄，沿途居前列。七百米處對手切入領放時難以穩定走勢，入直路時未能加速。最後一百米未能望空，但早已無爭勝機會。

comment: Broke well, raced 4th 1 off with cover, shifted 3 deep no   cover 850m & advanced, narrow lead 600m & posted 1 off,     headed 420m, driven but emptied quickly & faded.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居第四位，走第二疊，有遮擋。八百五十米處移至第三疊，沒有遮擋，上前。六百米處以短距離領先，走第二疊。四百二十米處被超越，受催策，但迅速再無餘力及力竭。

comment: Steady start, raced last pair on rail, to last 880m &       niggled, driven into stretch, found nil.
comment_ch: 出閘平穩，居最後兩位，走內欄。八百八十米處包尾，受催策。受催策入直路，再無餘力。
owner: Chan Wing Kwan, Chadwick Mok Cham Hung & Chan Wai Leung

comment: Slow to begin, taken back from wide barrier, raced as the   back-marker for much of the way, closed off fairly down the inside on straightening, never a serious threat.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘緩慢，繼而留後，大部分途程居包尾位置。入直路時沿內欄展開衝刺，走勢一般。從未構成真正威脅。

comment: Settled midfield; moved better than before.
comment_ch: 不上不落, 但走勢有進

comment: Made progress steadily; ran on well.
comment_ch: 逐步加快，表現良好
owner: Justin Yue Kwok Hung & Jeremy Yue Chun Hay

handicap: THE HONG KONG UNIVERSITY ALUMNI ASSOCIATION CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
handicap_ch: 香港大學校友會挑戰盃（讓賽）
comment: Steadied after start and taken in for cover but outpaced,   dropping behind midfield. Urged forward after 600m, ran on  nicely under hard riding.
comment_ch: 出閘後收慢，向內移入以取得遮擋，但被拋離，墮居中間之後位置。過了六百米處後受催策上前，在力策下走勢良佳。

comment: Raced midfield, travelled 2Ls behind the leader, ran on     well for 2nd, beaten by a neck.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，落後領放馬兩個馬位。走勢良佳，跑獲亞軍，以一馬頸位見負。

comment: Broke well but driven initially, settled rail midfield,     driven into stretch, plugged on evenly.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策，居中間位置，走內欄。受催策入直路，走勢平穩。

comment: Settled at rear; never in contention.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑，無段好睇

comment: Taken back early; made progress when clear in the Straight.
comment_ch: 刻意拖後, 直路望空追趕

comment: Very slow away, at rear, benefited by the fast tempo, never improved.
comment_ch: 出閘十分緩慢，居後列。快步速有利發揮。從未能推進上前。
owner: Jimmy Chung Kwok Man & Dominic Chung Won Lok

comment: Jumped well, ridden to hold rail, settling 5L from leader.  Travelled comfortably to home turn when lost position, then one-paced in straight.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，受催策固守內欄，落後領放馬五個馬位。走勢順暢，轉直路彎時失位。直路上保持同速。
owner: The HK Racehorse Owners Association Syndicate

handicap: CHEVALIER COLD STORAGE AND LOGISTICS HANDICAP
comment: Midfield, 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
comment_ch: 居中間位置，走第二疊。直路上僅能保持位置。

comment: Began fairly, raced 2 wide, 3 lengths back in midfield,     found rail on turn and improved, angled out in straight and finished off strongly to score by a neck.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，居中間位置，落後領放馬三個馬位，走第二疊。轉彎時移入內欄推進。直路上向外移出，衝刺強勁，以一馬頸位之先勝出。

comment: Taken back from a wide gate, settled 6Ls behind the leader  2 wide with cover, dashed well for 3rd when clear 200M.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘後留後，落後領放馬六個馬位，走第二疊，有遮擋。二百米處望空後衝刺良佳，跑獲季軍。
owner: Kathy Lo Ho Hsiu Lan & Paul Lo Chung Wai

comment: Made ground steadily; came from behind for 2nd.
comment_ch: 分段加快，後上第二

comment: Found nothing when being hard ridden.
comment_ch: 大力推騎, 毫無反應

comment: Settled at rear; ran on ordinary.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑,走勢平常

comment: Never better than midfield, came under pressure early in    home bend but could only run home at the one pace.
comment_ch: 從未超越中間位置。直路彎早段受催策，但直路上僅能保持同速。

comment: Under whip halfway; weakened and racing backwards.
comment_ch: 半程開鞭，乏力墮退

comment: Taken back early; ran on strongly late.
comment_ch: 起步拖後，拉士追勢甚勁

comment: Broke well, sat rail fore of midfield, shifted out & ridden 420m, quickened to lead 140m, edged ahead.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，居中間之前位置，走內欄。四百二十米處受催策向外移出。一百四十米處加速上前領先，勝出賽事。
owner: St Joan of Arc School PSA Syndicate

handicap: THE HONG KONG CLUB CHALLENGE CUP (HANDICAP)
comment: Jumped fairly, taken to fence, settling 4L from leader      first turn. Shaken up passing 500m, hard ridden around      turn, battled on strongly under vigorous riding to win      close home.
comment_ch: 出閘一般，移入內欄。首次轉彎時落後領放馬四個馬位。跑過五百米處時受催策。轉直路彎時受力策。在力策下以勁勢力拼，接近終點時勝出。

comment: Smart start, snagged to midfield 3 wide with cover,         outpaced & ridden along 800m, 3rd last at top of stretch,   plodded on same speed.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，收慢留居中間位置，在有遮擋下走第三疊。八百米處被拋離，受催策。直路初居尾三位置。僅能保持同速。
owner: Derrick Liu Lap Wai & Alcott Liu Kin Ping

comment: Up with the pace early; quickened for 2nd.
comment_ch: 留守好位, 加速第二

comment: Not quickened when asked in the Straight.
comment_ch: 直路稍騎，未見加速

comment: Pressed forward from outside draw, settling one-back,       one-off. Bumped turn, started forward move 400m, hit front  200m, pulled clear.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘，受催策上前，落後領放馬一個馬位，走第二疊。轉彎時被碰撞。四百米處開始發力上前。二百米處取得領先，帶離勝出。

comment: Broke well to share the pace early, soon shifted back to    one-out-one-back position, faded out of contention upon     straightening. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，早段並排領先，瞬即墮居第二疊第二位。入直路時力竭，再無爭勝機會。（騎師及練馬師被查詢有關此駒表現令人失望的原因。）
owner: Mr & Mrs Lai Tin Kiu and Alfred Lai Hang Fat

comment: Hard ridden forward, harmed by the fast pace, reduced       quickly 400M.
comment_ch: 受力策上前。步速甚快，不利發揮。四百米處迅速轉弱。

comment: On-pace early; kept on well for 3rd.
comment_ch: 跟前入位，姿態輕鬆

comment: Cruised forward early to find a position midfield, 4 wide.  Stayed wide when pushing forward at 600m, and went for the  better ground up the middle of the straight. Ridden         positively, but didn't have a big kick in the straight.
comment_ch: 早段上前，居中間位置，走第四疊。六百米處受推策上前，走外疊，直路中段移至跑道狀況較佳位置。直路上受力策，但加速力不足。

comment: Hit the front at one stage; under a hold late for 4th.
comment_ch: 一度透出, 拉士按返

comment: Sharp start wide, raced fore of midfield 3 wide no cover,   overraced 1100m, shunted 4 wide 500m & ridden, emptied 300m & faded.
comment_ch: 自外檔出閘迅速，居中間之前位置，在沒遮擋下走第三疊。千一米處跑來搶口。五百米處移出第四疊，受催策。三百米處洩氣力竭。
owner: Anthony Sham Hon Sum & Jim Fung Kwong Chun

comment: Niggled along, travelled mainly one back on rails in 4th,   dropped out tamely in straight.
comment_ch: 受催策，大多居第四位，落後一個馬位，走內欄。直路上乏力墮退。
owner: Mr & Mrs James Lau Chi Wing, Lau Kai Tai & Michelle Lau Wing Sheung

handicap: AUDEMARS PIGUET LADY ROYAL OAK HANDICAP
comment: Quickly into stride, racing outside leader to turn. Joint   leader 400m, kept on well to 200m when shifted out under    pressure, then one-paced.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，直路彎前居領放馬外側。四百米處並排領先。保持佳勢，二百米處在催策下向外斜跑，其後保持同速。

comment: Ran on ok when asked late.
comment_ch: 末段稍騎, 幾肯追馬

handicap: LUKFOOK JEWELLERY GOLD CHARISMA COLLECTION HANDICAP
handicap_ch: 六福珠寶金飾魅力系列讓賽
comment: Slow start, raced towards the rear, 6-1/2L behind along the fence, hit the line strongly when cleared after 100M.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，居後列位置，落後六個半馬位，走內欄。過了一百米處後望空，以勁勢衝過終點。

comment: Always at rear; unimpressive.
comment_ch: 落後跟跑, 無段好睇
owner: Patrick Lee Pak Wing, Edmond Chau Chin Hung & Christina Lee Oi Ping

comment: Steadied soon after start and shifted across behind         runners, settling in last pair along rail. Came off fence   turning for home, shifted wide in straight and ran on       fairly.
comment_ch: 起步後不久收慢，在馬群之後切入內欄，居最後兩位。轉直路彎時移離內欄，直路上移出外疊，走勢普通。

comment: Tardy start & niggled initially, raced 3 wide with cover    behind midfield, niggled 500m, wide into stretch, driven    home centre track for modest headway.
comment_ch: 出閘緩慢，早段受催策，居中間之後位置，在有遮擋下走第三疊。五百米處受催策。入直路時走外疊。直路上在跑道中央競跑，受催策，略為追前。

comment: Reared on jumping, struck head on the barriers and was very slow to begin. Sat at the tail of the field, 4-5 wide,      before moving forward mid race. Never improved better than  midfield, and never ran on in the straight.
comment_ch: 躍出時以後足豎立，頭部碰撞閘廂，因而出閘十分緩慢。居馬群尾列，走第四至第五疊，繼而於賽事中段上前。從未推進至超逾中間位置，直路上從未能追前。

comment: Jumped well from gate 12, sent forward to take the lead,    enjoyed the easy lead throughout, kicked clear early in     straight, headed near 150M, stayed on for 3rd.
comment_ch: 自第十二檔出閘良佳，受催策上前領先，沿途輕鬆領放。直路早段帶離群駒，接近一百五十米處時被超越，保持走勢，跑獲第三。

comment: Dropped back to rear 6Ls off the pace, brought wide home    turn, stayed on well for 3rd.
comment_ch: 墮居後列，落後領放馬六個馬位。直路彎移出外疊，保持佳勢，跑獲季軍。

comment: Taken forward early to share the lead, 1 off the fence.     Stayed on well in front in the straight, battling with the  winner and just peaking before the line.
comment_ch: 早段受催策上前，並排領先，走第二疊。直路上居前列位置，走勢良佳，與頭馬拼鬥，終點前未能再增速。
owner: Howard Liang Yum Shing, Charis Liang Shun Xing & Chester Liang Jun Yu

comment: Taken back, travelled 6Ls behind the leader on the fence,   made some ground in straight. (Questioned for riding)
comment_ch: 留後，落後領放馬六個馬位，沿欄競跑。直路上略為追前。（騎師被查詢騎法。）

comment: Urged to lead along the rail; flattened in the straight.
comment_ch: 貼欄搶放, 直路減弱

comment: Shifted across from wide draw but left without cover 1000m  to 800m and again from 700m. Rolled forward turn to look a  chance before tiring quickly final 200m.
comment_ch: 自最外檔出閘後移入內疊。自一千米處至八百米處欠缺遮擋，自七百米處起再度缺乏遮擋。直路彎上前，看似具爭勝機會。最後二百米迅速呈現疲態。
owner: Wilson Wong Kan Po & Derek Wong Sau Leung

comment: Began well, shifted in to find cover, finding fence 4-back  from leader passing 1200m. Came off fence turning for home  and ran on steadily.
comment_ch: 出閘迅速，向內移入，取得遮擋。跑過千二米處時落後領放馬四個馬位，走內欄。轉直路彎時移離內欄，保持穩勢。
